<p>23a.3</p>grangs ba'i skabs su mang tshig bdun po kho na 'jug ste/ dang po'i mang tshig la/ tri asra zhes gnas pa la/ e o dzasra la 'os/ tra yaH gnyis pa gsum pa bzhi pa gnyis dag gis/ gnyis dag gi ched du/ gnyis dag las/ gnyis dag gi/ gnyis dag la/ lnga pa rnams kyi mang
<p>23a.4</p>tshig rnams la/ trI nra/ trib+hiH trib+h+yaH drug pa'i mang tshig la/ tre ra yadra/ tri'i a yang+ra ngo / /tri'i i yig ni drug pa'i mang tshig nuT gsum rnams/ dang bcas pa'i nAmra pha rol la a yang du 'gyur te/ nga yig mtha'i dbyangs 'gog pa'i don/ tra yA NAM/ 
<p>23a.5</p>gsum rnams la/ gsum rnams kyis/ gsum rnams kyi ched du/ gsum rnams las/ bdun pa'i mang tshig la/ tri Shu/ ka ti'i sgra la yang mang tshig kho na 'jug cing dzasra shasra dag dbyi bar bshad pas/ ka ti/ ka ti/ ka ti b+hiH ka ti b+h+yaH ka ti b+h+yaH ka tI nAM/ ka ti Shu/ gsum rnams kyi
<p>23a.6</p>ka ti ni rtags gsum ga 'jug rung ngo / /de rnams kyi skyes pa'i rtags i thung dang u thung gsum rnams la/ ci tsam/ mtha' can spyir btang dmigs bsal dang bcas pa rnams so// //de nas dzasa?/ shasa?/ skyes pa'i rtags I ring mtha' can las su shrI zhes pa'i sgra la
<p>23a.7</p>mtshon na/ rnam dbye dang po'i gcig tshig la/ su shrIH si/ gzugs mdzes sam dpal lam phun sum tshogs pa/ dang po'i gnyis tshig la/ y+bor+d+hA to ri la bau swa re/ byings kyi I U ngag gi iy+ra ubra dag dbyangs la'o/ /byings kyi ngo bor gnas pa'i ming mtha'i I
<p>23b</p>
<p>23b.1</p>dang U dag ni rnam dbye dbyangs dang po can pha rol la iy+ra uw+ra dag tu 'gyur te/ su shriy+rau/ au/ mang tshig la/ su shri y+raH dzasra/ bod tshig gsum la/ he su shrIH si/ ha su shri y+rau/ au/ he su shri y+raH dzasra/ gnyis pa gsum la/ su shri yaM/ su shri yau/ 
<p>23b.2</p>su shri yaH gsum pa gsum la/ su shri yA/ TA/ su shrI b+h+yAM/ su shrI b+hiH bzhi pa gsum la/ su shri ye/ nge/ sushrI b+h+yaH lnga pa gsum la/ su shri yaH nga si/ su shrI b+h+yAM/ su shrI b+h+yAH drug pa gsum la/ su shri yaH ngasra/ su shri yoH osra/ amra/ au/ 
<p>23b.3</p>shasra/ su shri yAM/ bdun pa gsum la/ su shri yi/ su shri yoH su shrI Shu/ de bzhin du su d+hI'i sgra la yang / ! su d+hIH su d+hi yau/ su d+hi yaH sogs te dmigs bsal med pa'i spyir btang skyes pa'i rtags I ring mtha' can thams cad 'di dang 'dra la/ 'on kyang
<p>23b.4</p>'og nas amra/ 'byung ba'i se nA nI'i bya ba rnams ngi/ osra/ subra/ kyang skyes pa'i rtags I ring dang U ring gi blo bzang / mtha' can spyi la yang 'jug par bshad do// //de nas skyes pa'i rtags U ring mtha' can la yang swa yaM b+hU zhes pa'i sgra la I iy+ra dang / 
<p>23b.5</p>U uw+ra'i khyad tsam ma gtogs cho ga thams cad 'dra ste/ dang po gsum la/ ! swa yaMb+hUH si/ swa yaM b+hu bau/ au/ swa yaM b+hu baH dzas/ gnyis pa gsum la/ swa yaM b+ha baM/ amra/ swa yaM b+hu bau/ au/ swa yaM b+hu baH shasra/ gsum pa gsum la/ swa yaM b+hu bA/ 
<p>23b.6</p>swa yaM b+hU b+h+yAM/ swa yaM b+hU b+hiH bzhi pa gsum la/ swa yaM b+hu be/ nge / swa yaM b+hU b+h+yAM/ swa yaM b+hU b+h+yaH lnga pa gsum la/ swa yaM b+hu baH nga si/ swa yaM b+hU b+h+yAM/ swa yaM b+hU b+h+yaH drug pa gsum la/ swa yaM b+hu braH ngasra/ swa yaM b+hu boH osra/ swa yaM b+hu bAM/ Amra/ bdun pa gsum la/ TA/ 
<p>23b.7</p>swa yaM b+hu bi/ ngi/ swa yaM b+hu poH osra/ swa yaM d+hU Shu/ supra/ bod tshig gsum la/ he swa yaM b+hUH si/ he swa yaM b+hu bau/ au/ he swa yaM b+hu paH dzasa?/ se nA nI'i sgra la rnam dbye dbyangs thog ma can rnams la bya ba mi 'dra ba yod de/ dang po'i gcig tshig la/ ! / 
<p>24a</p>
<p>24a.1</p>se nA nIH si/ gnyis tshig dang mang tshig la/ y+bo bA/ y+ra w+ra dag yang na'o/ /byings kyi ngo bor gnas pa'i ming mtha'i I yig dang U yig gi mtha' can dbyangs gcig pa ma yin pa yi ge gnyis gsum sogs sngon na yod pa/ sngon ma de yang
<p>24a.2</p>yi ge mang po brtsegs sde'i 'dren pa ste dmag dpon/ pa ma yin pa/ b+ha Sha r+b+hU dang pu nar+b+hU gnyis por ba'i b+hU dang d+hI'i sgra ma yin pa rnams ni/ rnam dbye dbyangs dang po rnams pha rol la Iy+ra dang U w+ra dag tu yang na 'gyur te/ se nA n+yau/ au/ se nA n+yaH dzasra/ gnyis pa
<p>24a.3</p>gsum la/ se nA n+yaM/ amra/ se nA n+yau/ o/ se nA n+yaH shasra/ gsum pa gsum la/ se nA n+yA/ TA/ se nA nI b+h+yAM/ se nA nI b+hiH bzhi pa gsum la/ se nA n+ye/ nge/ se nA nI b+h+yAM/ se nA nI b+h+yaH lnga pa gsum la/ se nA n+yaH nga si/ se nA nI b+h+yAM/ se nA nI b+h+yaH drug pa'i
<p>24a.4</p>gcig tshig dang gnyis tshig la/ se nA n+yaH ngas/ senA n+yoH osra/ mang tshig la/ se nA nI sogs las/ Amra la nuT yang na ster bar bshad pas/ se nA n+ye/ Amra/ se nA n+yAM/ Amra/ bdun pa'i gcig tshig la/ A m+ngeH ngi'i Amra'o/ /mo rtags Apra kyi
<p>24a.5</p>mtha' can dang A+opra mtha' dang nI'i sgra rnams las pha rol gyi ji ni Amra du 'gyur te/ se nA n+YaM/ ngi/ gnyis tshig dang mang tshig la/ se nA n+yoH o su/ se nA nI Shu/ supra/ bod tshig gsum la/ he se nA nIH se/ he se nA n+yau/ au/ he se nA n+yaH dzasra/ de bzhin du U yig
<p>24a.6</p>mtha' la/ ! si/ ya ba lUH nas brdab/ ya pa lwau/ au/ ya ba lwaH dzas/ ya ba lwaM/ amra/ ya ba lwau/ au/ ya ba lwaH shasra/ ya ba lwA/ TA/ ya ba lU b+h+yAM/ ya ba lU b+hiH sogs so/ /dbyangs gcig pa ma yin pa zhes pas dbyangs gcig pa la su shrI dang 'dra bas/ ! 
<p>24a.7</p>riH 'dren pa/ ni yau/ au/ ni yaH dzasra/ ni yaM sogs so/ amra/ de bzhin du U mtha' la/ gcod/ lUH si/ lu bau/ au/ lu buH dzasra lu baM/ a mra/ lu bau/ au/ lu baH shasra/ TA/ lu bA sogs so/ /de bzhin du b+ha R+Sha b+hA la yang / ! dus su 'gyur ba/ b+ha R+Sha b+hUH b+ha R+Sha b+hu bau/ au/ 
<p>24b</p>
<p>24b.1</p>b+ha r+Sha b+hu baH sogs dang pu nar+b+hU la/ ! pu nar+b+hUH si/ pu nar+b+hU bau/ au/ pu nar+b+hu baH dzasra/ sogs so/ /bA da pra mI zhes pa la rnam dbye gzhan rnams thams cad se nA nI dang 'dra ba la amra dang shasra la amra shasra gyi a dbyi ba dang ngi la 'dra ba 'dus pa la ring po byed de/ 
<p>24b.2</p>dzasa?! pAd bra mIH bA da pra myau/ au/ slar yang 'byung ba/ bA da pra myaH dzasra/ bA da pra mIM/ amra/ bA da pra mI nra/ shasra/ bA da pra mI sogs so/ /de rnams kyi skyes pa'i rtags I ring dang U ring gi mtha' can spyir btang dang dmigs bsal rnams so// //de nas skyes pa'i
<p>24b.3</p>rtags r-i yig /ri dwags kriSh+Na sar/ mtha' can la bi tr-i zhes pa'i sgra la dper brjod na/ dang po'i gcig tshig la/ ngi/ bi tr-i si zhes gnas pa la/ se rA/ si'i A'o/ /r-i yig mtha' las pha rol gyi si ni A zhes par 'gyur te/ si A/ de Di tra/ Ti phyis/ ! 
<p>24b.4</p>pha/ pi tA/ si/ gnyis tshig dang mang tshig la/ a ra pany+tsa su/ lnga la a ra'o/ /rnam dbye si sogs thog ma lnga po gang rung pha rol la r-i yig mtha' ni ar du 'gyur te/ pi ta rau/ au/ pi ta raH dzasra/ bod pa'i don gyi gcig tshig la/ d+heraH d+hi'i ar+ra'o/ / 
<p>24b.5</p>r-i yig mtha' las pha rol gyi d+hi ni ar+ra zhes par 'gyur te/ de Ditra/ Ti phyis/ he pi taH si/ gnyis tshig dang mang tshig la/ he bi ta rau/ au/ he pi ta raH dzasra/ gnyis pa gsum la/ pi ta raM/ a mra/ pi ta rau/ au/ pi tr-I nA/ shasra/ gsum pa gsum la/ pi trA/ TA/ bi tr-i b+h+yAM/ 
<p>24b.6</p>pi tr-i b+h+yaH bzhi pa gsum la/ pi tre/ nge / bi tr-i b+h+yAM/ pi tr-i b+h+yaH lnga pa gsum la/ r-itra las nga u/ pi tuH nga si/ pi tr-i b+h+yAM/ pi tw-i b+h+yAMH drug pa gsum la/ pi tuH ngasra/ pi troH osra/ pi tr-I NAM/ Amra/ bdun pa'i gcig tshig la/ ngau / ngi la'o/ /r-i yig mtha' ni
<p>24b.7</p>rnam dbye bdun pa'i ngi pha rol la ar du 'gyur te/ pi ta ri/ ngi / gnyis tshig dang mang tshig la/ pi troH osra/ pi tr-i Shu/ subra/ de bzhin du/ dzA mA tr-i la sogs pa mang po dag 'di dang 'dra zhing / mag pa/ dzA mA tr-i la nuT+ra dang bcas pa'i Am pha rol la ring por bsgyur ba dang mi
<p>25a</p>
<p>25a.1</p>bsgyur ba 'dam kha can te/ dzA mA tr-i NAM/ Amra/ dzA mA tr-I NAM/ Amra/ sogs so/ /r-i yig mtha' can s+t+r-i'i rkyen can ka r+t+r-i'i sgra la rnam dbye thog ma lnga la khyad par yod de/ stu rA r+ra/ s+t+r-i'i Ar+ra'o/ /ming du sgrub pa'i rkyen s+t+r-i byin pa'i r-i yig mtha' can ni
<p>25a.2</p>rnam dbye thog ma lnga pha rol la Ar+ra du 'gyur te/ dang pa'i gcig tshig la/ r-i Ar+ra/ si A/ Ditra la Ti phyis/ ! si/ kartA/ byed pa po/ gnyis tshig dang mang tshig la/ kartA rau/ au/ kartA raH dzasra/ gnyis pa gsum la/ kartA raM/ amra/ kartA rau/ au/ kar+t+r-Inra/ 
<p>25a.3</p>gsum pa gsum la/ kar+t+rA/ TA/ kar+t+r-ib+h+yAM/ kar+t+r-ib+hiH bzhi pa gsum la/ kar+t+re/ nge / kar+t+r-i b+h+yAM/ kar+t+r-i b+h+yaH lnga pa gsum la/ kartuH nga si/ kar+t+r-i b+h+yAM/ kar+t+r-i b+h+yaH drug pa gsum la/ kartuH kar+t+roH kar+t+r-I NI/ bdun pa gsum la/ karta ri/ ngi/ kar+t+roH osra/ kar+t+r-i Shu/ supra/ shasra/ 
<p>25a.4</p>bod tshig gsum la/ he kartaH si/ he kartA rau/ au/ he kartA ra/ dzasra/ de bzhin du/ ! nap+t+r-i/ tsha'o/ /pra shA s+t+r-i/ ho tr-i/ sho tr-i/ gA tr-i sogs s+t+r-i'i rkyen can thams cad 'di dang 'dra'o/ ngasra/ osra/ Amra/ u yig mtha' can groSh+Tu'i sgra la dang po snga s+t+r-i'i rkyen mtha' can dang 'dra
<p>25a.5</p>ba la/ shasra la u thung rang lugs dang / TA nam dbyangs thog ma can rnams la r-i chad ma'i mtshon cha can/ sbyin sreg /thos pa can/ smra ba can/ mtha'i bya ba dang u mtha' rang gi bya ba 'dam khar bshad do/ /dang po gsum la/ ! kroSh+TA si/ kraSh+TAH rau/ au/ kroSh+TA ranaH/ dzasra/ 
<p>25a.6</p>gnyis pa gsum la/ kroSh+TA raM/ amra/ kroSh+TA rau/ au/ kroSh+TU nra/ shasra/ gsum pa gsum la/ kroSh+T+rA/ TA/ kroSh+Tu nA/ TA/ kroSh+Tu b+h+yAM/ kroSh+Tu b+hiH bzhi pa gsum la/ kroSh+T+re/ nge / kroSh+Ta be/ kroSh+Tu b+h+yAM/ kroSh+Tu b+h+yaH lnga pa gsum la/ ce spyang / kroSh+TuH nga si/ kroSh+ToH nga si/ kroSh+Tu
<p>25a.7</p>b+h+yAM/ kroSh+Tu b+h+yaH drug pa'i gcig tshig dang gnyis tshig la/ kroSh+TuH nga sra/ kroSh+ToH ngasra/ kroSh+ToH osra/ kroSh+TA+oH osra/ drug pa'i mang tshig la/ kr-i tA kr-i ta pra saM gI yo bi d+hi sa ni t+yaH/ ni t+yA ni t+ya yorni t+ya bi d+hi rbal ban+taH byed dang mi byed kun tu brjod pa yi/ /gang de'i
<p>25b</p>
<p>25b.1</p>cho ga rab tu nges pa ni/ /rtag pa dang ni mi rtag pa dag gi/ /rtag pa'i cho ga stobs dang ldan pa'o/ /de yang u mtha'i bya ba ni rtag pa'i cho ga dang r-i mtha'i cho ga ni mi rtag pa bcos ma'i cho ga yin pas rtag tu rtag pa'i cho ga stobs che bas drug pa'i mang tshig la u mtha'i cho ga
<p>25b.2</p>kho na bya ste/ kroSh+TU nAM/ Amra/ bdun pa gsum la/ kroSh+Ta rai/ ngi/ kroSh+T+rau/ ngi/ kroSh+T+roH osra/ kroSh+T+roH osra/ groSh+Tu Shu/ umra/ bod tshig gsum la/ he kroSh+To/si/ te kroSh+Ta rau/ he kroSh+Ta raH de rnams rnams kyi skyes pa'i rtags r-i yig mtha' can rnams so// //r-I
<p>25b.3</p>yig dang l-i yig dang e yig rnams kyi mtha' can ni rab tu ma grub bo/ ! /skyes pa'i rtags ai yig mtha' can las su rai'i zhes pa'i sgra la mtshon na/ dang po'i gcig tshig la/ rai s+b+hi/ rai'i sa dang b+ha la'o/ /rai lta bu'i ai yig mtha' ni rnam dbye sa yig dang
<p>25b.4</p>b+ha yig dang po rnams pha rol la A yig tu 'gyur te/ ! su rAH dbyangs thog ma can thams cad la Ay+ra ru bsgyur bas gnyis tshig dang mang tshig la/ su rA yau/ au/ su rA yaH dzasra/ gnyis pa gsum la/ su rA yaM/ amra/ su rA yau/ au/ su rA yaH shasra / 
<p>25b.5</p>gsum pa gsum la/ su rA yA/ TA/ su rA b+h+yAM/ su rA b+hiH nor can/ sogs so// //skyes pa'i rtags o yig mtha' can go'i sgra la mtshon na/ e rau/ o au'o/ /si sogs rnam dbye thog ma lnga po gang rung pha rol la rtags mtha' o yig ni au yig
<p>25b.6</p>tu 'gyur te/ dang po gsum la/ ! goH se/ gA bo/ au/ gA baH dzasra /gnyis pa'i gcig tshig la/ am+sha si/ amra shasra la'o/ /o yig mtha' ni rnam dbye am dang shasra pha rol la A yig tu 'gyur te/ gAM/ amra/ gnyis tshig dang mang tshig la/ 
<p>25b.7</p>gA bau/ gAH shasra/ gsum pa gsum la/ ba lang / ga bA/ TA/ go b+h+yAM/ go b+hiH/ bzhi ba gsum la/ ga be/ nge / bo b+h+yAM/ go b+h+yaH lnga pa'i gcig tshig la/ /nga si ngas zhes pas a phyis pas/ goH nga si/ gnyis tshig dang mang tshig la/ go b+h+yAM/ go b+h+yaH 
<p>26a</p>
<p>26a.1</p>drug pa'i gcig tshig dang gnyis tshig la/ goH ngasra/ ga boH osra/ mang tshig amra la sdeb sbyor las nuT+ra yang na bar bshad pas/ ga bAM/ Amra/ ga nAM/ Amra/ bdun pa gsum la/ ga bi/ ngi/ ga boH osra/ go ShuH subra/ bod pa gsum la/ 
<p>26a.2</p>he bauH si/ hegA bau/ au/ he gA baH ngasra/ de bzhin su su r+Yo zhes pa'i sgra sogs o mtha' can thams cad 'di dang 'dra'o// //skyes pa'i rtags au yig mtha' can glau zhes pa'i sgra la dper brjod na/ de yang rnam dbye ha sa dang pa can rnams la bya ba lhag po med cing / 
<p>26a.3</p>dbyangs thog ma can rnams la au A w+ra ru bsgyur ba kho na ste/ rab tu snang ba/ dang po gsum la/ ! glauH glA bau/ glA baH gnyis pa gsum la/ glA baM/ glA bau/ glA baH gsum pa gsum la/ glA bA/ TA/ glau b+h+yAM/ glau g+hiH bzhi pa gsum la/ glA be/ nge / glau b+h+yAM/ glau b+h+yaH 
<p>26a.4</p>lnga pa gsum la/ glA baH nga si/ glau b+h+yAM/ glau b+h+yaH drug pa gsum la/ glA baH glA boH glA bAM/ bdun si/ au/ dzasra/ pa gsum la/ glA bi/ glA bo/ glau Shu/ amra/ au/ shasra/ bod tshig gsum la/ he glau/ he glA bau/ he glA baH de bzhin du au yig mtha' can thams cad des
<p>26a.5</p>rigs 'gre'o// //i ti swa ra swa sti byA ka ra Na s+ya sU trA t+s+wa rAn+tAHpul+liM gAH ngasa?/ omra/ sa mAp+tAH zhes pa brda sprod pa dbyangs nge / omra/ supra/ can gyi mdo las skyes pa'i rtags dbyangs kyi si/ au/ dzasa?/ mtha' can rnams rdzogs so// ! //de nas dbyangs can mtha'
<p>26a.6</p>las bud med kyi rtags rnams bshad par bya ste/ de la a yig mtha' can gaM ga zhes pa'i sgra la/ A pa taH s+t+ri yAM/ bud med la a la Apra'o/ /a yig mtha' las bud med du brjod pa'i don la Apra rkyen du 'gyur te/ Apra byin/ gaM gA zhes grub pa
<p>26a.7</p>la/ dang po'i gcig tshig si byin/ A paH Apra las so/ /mo rkyen Apra byin pa'i mtha' las pha rol gyi si ni dbye bar bya ste/ si phyis/ gaM gA/ 'gro ldan ma ste chu bo gang+gA/ gnyis tshig la/ au rI/ au I'o/ /Apra mtha' las pha rol gyi rnam dbye au ni I ru
<p>26b</p>
<p>26b.1</p>'gyur te/ a i la e/ gaM ge/ au/ mang tshig la/ gaM gAH dzasa?/ kun tu bod pa'i gcig tshig la/ d+hi riH d+hi i'o/ /A pra mtha' las pha rol gyi d+hi ni i ru 'gyur te/ he gi ge/ si/ gnyis tshig dang mang tshig la/ he gaM ge/ au/ he gi gAH dzasa?/ ! 
<p>26b.2</p>AsbA/ ak+kA/ Al+lA rnams ni d+hi pha rol la Apra kyi mtha' can de thung ngur bsgyur bar bshad pas/ he Am+ba/ si/ he ak+ka/ si/ he al+la/ si/ gnyis pa gsum la/ gi gAM/ amra/ gaM ge/ gaM gAH gsum pa'i gcig tshig la/ Tau sau re/ TA os
<p>26b.3</p>na kar ko Ta'i lha mo/ 'bigs byed lha mo/ nor rgyun ma/ dag la e'o/ /Apra mtha' ni rnam dbye TA dang osra dag pha rol la e ru 'gyur te/ gaM ga yA/ TA/ gnyis tshig dang mang tshig la/ gaM ga b+h+yAM/ gaM gA b+hiH bzhi pa'i gcig tshig la/ ngi tAM yaT+ra/ ngitra rnams kyi
<p>26b.4</p>yaTa'o/ /Apra mtha' las pha rol gyi ngitra ste nge nga si ngasra ngi rnams la yaT A ga ma 'gyur te/ gaM gA yai/ nge/ gnyis tshig dang mang tshig la/ gaM gA b+h+yAM/ gaM gA b+h+yaH lnga pa gsum la/ gaM gA yAH nga si/ gaM gA b+h+yAM/ gaM gA b+h+yaH drug pa gsum la/ gaM
<p>26b.5</p>gA yAH ngasa?/ gaM ga yoH osa?/ gaM gA nAM/ Amra/ bdun pa'i gcig tshig la/ ga ga yoH yaT+ra/ ngi Am/ gaM gA yAM/ ngi/ gnyis tshig dang mang tshig la/ gaM gi yoH osra/ gaM gA su/ supra/ de bzhin du/ shrAd+d+hA/ med+hA/ shA lA/ mA lA/ he lA/ do lA sogs
<p>26b.6</p>spyir btang bud med kyi rtags Apra mtha' can thams cad 'di dang 'dra'o/ /sarba sogs la yang bud med la a las Apra byin pas/ rnam dbye ng+ra yig 'gro ba rnams ma gtogs gaM gA dang 'dra/ ng+ra 'gro ba  dad can ma/ blo gros/ khang pa/ 'phreng ldan ma/ smad ra/ khyogs/ 
<p>26b.7</p>rnams la khyad par yong de/ bzhi pa'i gcig tshig la/ ya To\u0f85ts+tsa/ yaT+ra las atra yang ngo / /sarba sogs Apra mtha' can ni yaT+ra pha rol la thung ngur 'gyur zhing yaT+ra de la yang suT+ra A ga ma ster bar bya ste/ ! sarba s+yai/ nge / gnyis tshig dang mang tshig la/ sarba b+h+yAM/ 
<p>27a</p>
<p>27a.1</p>sarbA b+h+yaH lnga pa gsum la/ sarbas+yAH nga si/ sarbA b+h+yAM/ sarbA b+h+yaH drug pa gsum la/ sarbas+yAH sarbayoH sarbAsAMH bdun pa gsum la/ sarbas+yAM/ sarba yoH sarbAsu/ A yig mtha' can dza rA'i sgra la ni rnam dbye dbyangs thog ma can
<p>27a.2</p>rnams pha rol la dza rasra su bsgyur ba dang spyir btang gaM gA'i lugs gnyis 'dam kha can du bshad pas/ dang pa gsum la/ ngasa?/ osra/ Amra/ ! dza rA/ dza ra sau/ dza re/ ngi/ osra/ supra/ dza ra saH dza rA/ bod pa gsum la/ he dza re/ si/ he dza ra sau/ au/ 
<p>27a.3</p>he dza re/ au/ he dza ra saH dzasra/ he dza rAH dzas/ gnyis pa gsum la/ dza ra saM/ dza rAM/ dza ra sau/ au/ dza re/ au/ dza ra sa/ shas/ dza rAH shasra/ si/ rgad po/ au/ au/ gsum pa gsum la/ dza ra sA/ TA/ ngasra/ dzas/ dza ra yA/ TA/ dza rA b+h+yAM/ dza rA b+heH bzhi pa
<p>27a.4</p>gsum la/ dza ra se/ nge / dza rA ye/ nge / dza rA b+h+yAM/ dza rA b+h+yaH lnga pa gsum la/ amra/ simra/ dza ra sa/ nga si/ dza rA yAH nga si/ dza rA b+h+yAM/ dza rA b+h+yaH drug pa gsum la/ dza ra saH ngasra/ dza rA yAH ngas/ dza ra soH osra/ dza ra yoH osra/ dza ra sAM/ Asra/ dza rA hAM/ Amra/ 
<p>27a.5</p>bdun pa gsum la/ dza ra si/ ngi/ dza rA yAM/ nge / dza ra soH os/ dza ra oH o/ dza rA su/ de rnams kyi bud med kyi rtags A yig mtha' can rnams so// //de nas mo rtags i yig mtha' can bud+d+hi'i sgra la rnam dbye dang po gsum dang gnyis
<p>27a.6</p>pa gsum ha ri'i skabs dang 'dra la/ 'on kyang shas la skyes ba la zhes pas sran nga mi 'gyur te/ ! rbA bud+d+hiH si/ bud+d+hI/ au/ bud+d+ha yaH dzasra/ he bud+d+ha/ si/ he bud+d+hI/ au/ he bud+d+ha yaH dzasra/ gnyis pa gsum la/ bud+d+hiM/ amra/ bud+d+hi/ shasra/ gsum pa
<p>27a.7</p>gsum la/ bud+d+h+ya/ TA/ bud+d+hi b+h+yAM/ bud+d+hi b+hiH bzhi pa'i gcig tshig la/ i dud+d+hUM/ itra utra dag las so/ /bud med kyi rtags itra dang kyi mtha' dag las pha rol gyi rnam dbye ng+ra 'gro ba rnams la aT A gam yang na 'gyur te/ bud+d+h+yai/ nge / bud+d+ha
<p>27b</p>
<p>27b.1</p>ye/ nge / bud+d+hib+h+yAM/ bud+d+hi b+h+yaH lnga pa gsum la/ bud+d+h+yAH nga si/ bud+d+heH nga si/ bud+d+hi b+h+yAM/ bud+d+hi b+h+yaH drug pa gsum la/ bud+d+h+yAH ngasra/ bud+d+heH ngasra/ bud+d+h+yoH osra/ bud+d+hI nAM/ Amra/ bdun pa'i gcig tshig la/ s+t+ri yAM yo/ bud med kyi i u dag la'o/ /bud med kyi
<p>27b.2</p>rtags i ring thung dag las pha rol gyi ngi ni Amra du yang na 'gyur te/ a T+ra/ ngi Amra/ bud+d+h+yAM/ ngi/ yang na/ bud+d+hau/ ngi/ gnyis tshig dang mang tshig la/ bud+d+h+yoH osra/ bud+d+hi Shu/ de bzhin du/ ma ti/ b+hU ti/ b+h+r-iti/ ru tsi la sogs pa mang po dag
<p>27b.3</p>kyang ngo // //mo rtags u yig mtha' can la yang i dang u'i khyad par tsam ma gtogs cho ga thams cad de dang 'dra ste/ d+he nu zhes pa'i sgra las/ dang po gsum la/ ! 'byor ma/ d+he nuH si/ blo gros/ 'byor pa/ 'dzin ma/ mdzes ma/ d+he nU/ au/ d+he na baH dzasa?/ 
<p>27b.4</p>bod pa gsum la/ he d+he no/ si/ he d+he nU/ au/ he d+he na baH dzasra/ gnyis pa gsum la/ d+he naM/ amra/ d+henU/ au/ d+henUH shasra/ gsum pa gsum la/ d+he nA/ TA/ d+he nu b+h+yAM/ d+he nu b+hiH bzhi pa gsum la/ d+he nA+ai/ nge / d+he na be/ nge / d+he nu b+h+yAM/ d+he nu b+h+yaH lnga pa
<p>27b.5</p>gsum la/ d+he n+wAH nga si/ d+he noH nga si/ d+he nu b+h+yA/ d+he nu b+h+yaH drug pa gsum la/ d+he n+wAH ngasra/ d+he noH ngasra/ d+he n+woH osra/ d+he nU nAM/ Amra/ bdun pa gsum la/ d+he n+wAM/ ngi/ d+he nau/ ngi/ d+he n+woH osa?/ d+he nu Shu sogs so// //bud med kyi rtogs Ipa mtha' can la na dI
<p>27b.6</p>zhes pa'i sgra la dper mtshon na/ dang po'i gcig tshig la/ ha se paH serlo pa/ ha sa Ipra la si dbyi'o/ /rtags mtha' ha sa sor bsdu ba'i yi ge dang mo rkyen Ipra mtha' dag las pha rol gyi si ni dbyi subra/ bar bya ste/ ! na dI/ sa/ gnyis tshig dang mang tshig
<p>27b.7</p>la/ nad+yau/ au/ na d+yaH dzas/ bod pa'i gcig tshig la/ d+hau drasbaH I yig dang U yig bud med kyi rtags byings kyi ngo bor gnas pa ma yin pa de ni d+he pha rol la thung ngur 'gyur te/ he na di/ si/ rgyun can te chu bo/ gnyis tshig dang mang tshig la/ 
<p>28a</p>
<p>28a.1</p>he na d+hau/ au/ he na d+yaH dzasra/ gnyis pa gsum la/ na dIM/ amra/ na d+yau/ au/ na dIH shasra/ gsum pa gsum la/ nad+yA/ TA/ na dI b+h+yAM/ na dI b+hiH bzhi pa'i gcig tshig la/ na dI/ nge zhes gnas pa la/ ngi tA maT+ra/ ngitra rnams kyi iTa'o/ /bud med kyi rtags I yig dang U yig mtha' las pha rol gyi rnam dbye nga
<p>28a.2</p>'gro ba rnams la aT+ra A ga ma ster bar bya ste/ na d+yai/ nge / gnyis tshig dang mang tshig la/ na dI b+h+yAM/ na dI b+h+yaH lnga pa gsum la/ na d+yAH nga si/ na dIb+h+yAM/ na dI b+h+yaH drug pa gsum la/ na d+yAH na d+yoH osra/ na dI nAM/ Amra/ bdun pa gsum la/ na d+yAM/ ngi/ na d+yoH osra/ na dI Shu/ supra/ ! de bzhin du/ gau rI/ sa ra swastI/ brAh+ma NI/ ku ma rI/ 
<p>28a.3</p>ki sho rI/ ka la b+hI sogs so/ /lak+Sh+mI'i sgra la yang si mi dbyi d+hi la thung ngur byed la gzhan cho ga thams cad na dI dang 'dra ste/ ! lak+Sh+mIH lak+Sh+mA+au/ au/ lak+Sh+m+yaH dzasra/ si/ he lak+Sh+mi sogs so/ /s+t+rI zhes pa'i sgra la yang Ipra mtha' ltar si dbyi bas/ dang po'i gcig tshig la/ ! s+t+rI/ gnyis dkar mo/ mtsho ldan ma/ bram ze mo/ gzhon nu ma
<p>28a.4</p>lo brgyad ma/ mdzes ma/ tshig dang mang tshig la/ s+t+rI b+h+ru boH s+t+rI b+h+ru'i'o/ /s+t+rI'i sgra dang b+h+rU'i sgra dag ni rnam dbye dbyangs thog ma can pha dpal lam phun sum tshogs pa'am bkra shis pa/ rol la iy+ra uw+ra dag tu 'gyur te/ s+t+ri yau/ au/ s+t+ri yaH dzasra/ bod tshig gsum la/ bud med/ he s+t+ri/ si he s+t+ri yau/ au he s+t+ri yaH dzas/ gnyis pa'i
<p>28a.5</p>gcig tshig la/ bAm+sha si/ a mra shasra dag la yang na'o/ /s+t+rI'i sgra ni amra shasra dag pha rol la iy+ra ru yang na 'gyur te/ s+t+ri yaM/ amra/ s+t+riM/ amra/ gnyis tshig dang mang tshig la/ sI yau/ o/ s+t+ri yaH shasra/ s+t+rIH shasra/ gsum pa gsum la/ s+t+ri yAH nA/ s+t+rI b+h+yAM/ s+t+rI b+hiH bzhi pa gsum la/ s+t+ri yai s+t+rI b+h+yAM/ s+t+rI b+h+yaH ldang
<p>28a.6</p>gsum la/ s+t+ri yAH nga si/ s+t+rI b+h+yAM/ s+t+rI b+h+yaH drug pa gsum la/ s+t+ri yA dzas/ s+t+ri yoH osra/ s+t+rI NAM/ Amra/ bdun pa gsum la/ s+t+ri yAM/ ngi s+t+ri yoH osra/ s+t+rI Shu/ supra/ ! de bzhin du shrI'i sgra la'ang rnam dbye dang po gsum la/ shrI/ si/ shri yau/ au shri yaH dzasra/ gnyis pa gsum la/ shri yaM/ au/ shri yaH shasra/ gsum pa 
<p>28a.7</p>gsum la/ shri yA/ TA/ shrI b+h+yAM/ shrI b+hiH bzhi pa'i gcig tshig la/ be yu baH iy+ra uw+ra dag yang na'o/ bud med kyi rtags byings kyi ngo bor gnas pa iy+ra uw+ra thob pa dag las pha rol gyi rnam dbye nga 'gro ba rnams la aT+ra A ga ma ster ba dang mi ster ba yang na bar bya ste/ shri yai/ nge / shri ye/ nge / gnyis
<p>28b</p>
<p>28b.1</p>tshig dang mang tshig la/ shrI b+h+yAM/ shrI b+h+yaH lnga pa gsum la/ shri yAH nga si/ shri yaH nga si/ shrI b+h+yAM/ shrI b+h+yaH drug pa'i gcig tshig dang gnyis tshig la/ shri yAH shri yaH ngasra/ shri yoH osra/ mang tshig la Amra la nuT+ra yang na bar bshad pas/ shri yAM/ Amra/ shrINAM/ Amra/ bdun pa gsum la/ shri yAM/ shri yI/ ngi/ 
<p>28b.2</p>shri yoH osra/ shrI Shu/ supra/ ! de bzhin du/ d+hI/ hrI sogs te Ipra mtha' ma yin pa thams cad do/ /b+hU'i sgra dang b+h+rA'i sgra sogs kyang 'di dang 'dra la/ ba d+hU'i sgra dang dzam+bU'i sgra sogs mang po zhig ni na dI'i sgra dang 'dra ba ste/ ! ba d+hUH ba d+h+rau/ au/ bad+hAH dzasa? sogs so/ /r-i yig mtha' can bud med kyi
<p>28b.3</p>rtags la mA tr-i zhes pa la mtshon na/ blo/ ngo tsha/ de yang thams cad skyes pa'i rtags pi tri'i skabs su bshad pa dang 'dra ste/ ! mA tA/ si/ mA ta rau/ /au/ mA ta raH dzasra/ shing dzam+bU shing / he mA taH si/ mA ta raM/ amra/ mA ta rau/ au/ mA trIH bu mo/ sogs te shasa? la ring po nyid las sa? nrar mi 'gyur ba gzhan rnams 'gro'o/ / 
<p>28b.4</p>mo rtags swa sr-i sogs ni gong skyes pa'i rtags kar+t+r-i'i skabs su bshad pa dang 'dra'o// //mo rtags ai yig gi mtha' can rai zhes pa'i sgra sogs ni skyes pa'i rtags su rai zhes pa'i skabs su brjod pa dang 'dra ste/ shasa?/ ! rAH si/ rA yo/ au/ rA yaH dzasa?/ sogs so// //mo rtags o
<p>28b.5</p>yig mtha' can rgyug mo/ yang skyes pa'i skabs su bshad pa'i go'i sgra dang 'dra la/ au yig mtha' can nau zhes pa lta bu yang glo zhes pa'i skabs su bshad pa dang 'dra ba nyid do/ /i ti swa ra swaste byA ka ra Na s+ya sU trAt+s+wa rAn+ta s+t+rI ling+gAs+sa mAp+tAH/ sgra sgrogs/ zhes pa brda sprod pa dbyangs can gyi mdo las bud med kyi
<p>28b.6</p>rtags dbyangs mtha' can rnams rdzogs so// //de nas dbyangs kyi mtha' can ma ning gi rtags rnams rab tu bstan par bya ste/ de la a yig mtha' can las ku la zhes pa'i sgra la mtshon na/ dang po'i gcig tshig la/ a to amra/ a tra las amra'o/ /a yig mtha' can ma ning gi
<p>28b.7</p>rtags las pha rol gyi d+hi ma yin pa'i si dang amra ni amra du 'gyur la/ amra amra du bsgyur ba ni ma ning la amra shasra dag 'jig go zhes pa de 'gog pa'i 'don te/ si amra/ amra shasra kyi a phyis pas/ ! si/ ku laM/ rigs/ gnyis tshig la/ I mau/ au I'o/ /ma ning gi rtags las pha rol gyi
<p>29a</p>
<p>29a.1</p>rnam dbye au gnyis ni I yig tu 'gyur te/ kun le/ au/ mang tshig la/ dzash+sha so shiH dzasra shasra dag gi shi'o/ /ma ning gi rtags las pha rol gyi dzasa? dang shasra dag ni shi ru 'gyur la sha yig dzasra shasra yongs rdzogs bsgyur ba'i don te/ dzasra shi/ nu ma ya maH ya ma ma yin pas numra'o/ / 
<p>29a.2</p>rtags mtha' yam so sor bsdu ba'i yi ge med pa'i ma ning gi rtags la shi pha rol las numra A ga ma ster bar bya ste/ mra yig ni ma 'gro ba dbyangs las pha rol tu ster bar bshad pas/ gnas kyi don/ u brjod pa'i don/ no pa d+hA yAH nra'i u pa d+hA'i'o/ /shi pha rol na yod pa'i nra'i u pa
<p>29a.3</p>d+hA ni ring por 'gyur te/ ku lA ni/ dzasra/ bod pa gsum la/ he ku la/ si/ he ku le/ au/ he ku lA ni/ dzasra/ gnyis pa gsum la yang / ku laM/ amra/ ku le/ au/ ku lA ni/ shasra/ gsum pa sogs lhag ma thams cad skyes pa'i rtags de ba'i skabs dang 'dra bas/ ku le na/ TA/ ku lA b+h+yAM/ ku laiH b+hisra/ /sogs so/ /de
<p>29a.4</p>bzhin du/ mU la/ phal/ pa tra/ puSh+pa/ kuN+Da/ ku Tum+ba sogs spyir btang ma ning gi rtags a yig mtha' can thams cad 'di dang 'dra'o/ /a yig mtha' can ma ning du sgrub pa a n+ya sogs la ni bya ba mi 'dra ba yod de/ dang po'i gcig tshig la/ sh+tAn+yA deH an+ya sogs la sh+tu'o/ /an+ya la sogs
<p>29a.5</p>pa'i pha rol rtsa ba/ 'bras bu/ lo ma/ me tog/ snod dam dong / nye du/ gyi si dang amra ni sh+tu ru 'gyur te/ sha yig thams cad 'gyur ba'i don/ u brjod don/ ! si/ a n+yatra/ gnyis tshig dang mang tshig la/ an+ye/ au/ an+ya ni/ dzasa?/ gnyis pa gsum la yang / a n+yatra/ amra/ a n+ye/ au/ a n+yA ni/ shasa? sogs so/ /de bzhin du/ 
<p>29a.6</p>i ta ratra/ si/ i ta re/ au/ i ta rA Ni/ dzasra slar yang / i ta ratra/ amra i ta re/ au/ i ta rA Ni/ shasa?/ sogs dang / ! ka ta ratra/ si/ ka ta re/ au/ gzhan ka ta rA Ni/ dzasra/ slar yang / ka ta matra/ amra ka ta re/ au ka ta rA Ni/ shasa? sogs dang / ! si/ ka ta matra/ ke ta me/ au/ ka ta mA ni/ dzasra/ slar yang / ka ta me/ 
<p>29a.7</p>rang las thadad/ ka ta mA ni/ shasa? ! de bzhin du an+ya ta ra'i sgra la yang / si/ an+ya ta ratra/ gzhan dang gzhan/ he an+ya ta ratra/ si/ ji tsam/ sogs te/ TA nas brtsams lhag ma rnams skyes pa'i rtags rba sogs dang 'dra'o// //de nas ma ning gi ji tsam/ rtags i yig mtha' can ni as+thi zhes pa'i sgra lta bu la au/ 
<p>29b</p>
<p>29b.1</p>mtshon na/ napuM sa kAt+s+yamo rlukra/ na ning las si amra dag 'jig go /ma ning gi rtags las pha rol gyi rnam dbye dang po'i si dang gnyis pa'i amra dag ni 'jig par 'gyur te/ si 'jig /si/ as+thi/ rus pa/ bod tshig la/ y+b+r-i NAM/ i u r-i rnams kyi'o/ /ma ning gi rtags las d+hi pha rol la nA ma'i dbyangs
<p>29b.2</p>rnams ni yang na yon tan du 'gyur te/ he as+the/ he as+thi/ smras pa/ saM bo d+ha ne tU sha na sa s+t+ri rU paM sAn+tA ta thA nAn+ta ma thA pyadan+tiM/ mA d+h+yaM di nirbaSh+Ti ku NaM twi gan+te na puM sa ke byA g+h+ra pa dAM ba riSh+ThaH kun tu bod par u sha nas kyi gzugs gsum ste/ sa mtha' de bzhin na mtha' de nas a mtha' dang / /ika mtha'i
<p>29b.3</p>yon tan du ni stag rkang mchog ldan pa/ /drang srong lha min nyi ma ma ning rtags la 'dod/ /ma ning gi rtags kyi skabs 'dir bod tshig pha rol la u sha nasra zhes pa'i rtags 'di'i mtha' sa dang na dang a rnams kyi mtha' can gzugs gsum 'dam kha can dang / ika ste nA mi'i dbyangs rnams la yon tan byed pa/ stag rkang mchog ces pa'i rigs las byung ba'i drang srong lha min nyi ma
<p>29b.4</p>zhes pa des 'dod pa yin no/ /nA minaHswa re/ nA mi las dbyangs la numra'o/ /ma ning gi rtags nA ma'i mtha' las rnam dbye dbyangs dang po can pha rol la numra A ga ma ster bar bya ste/ numra/ au I/ as+thi nI/ au/ mang tshig la/ as+thI ni/ dzasa?/ gnyis pa gsum la yang / as+thi/ amra/ as+thi nI/ o/ as+thI ni/ shasra/ gsum
<p>29b.5</p>pa'i gcig tshig la/ ats+tsA s+th+nAM sha sA dau/ shasra la sogs pa la as+thi sogs kyi atra yang ngo / /shasra sogs te rnam dbye gsum pa'i TA nas brtsams dbyangs thog ma can rnams pha rol la as+thi sogs la numra A ga ma 'gyur zhing rtags mtha'i i yig de yang atra du 'gyur te/ numra/ i a/ al+lo paH swa
<p>29b.6</p>te\u0f85m+ba yuk+tAts+cha sA dau/ shas la sogs pa dbyangs la mra bra yang dag par sbyor ba ma yin pa'i atra dbyi'o/ /shasa? la sogs pa ste rnam dbye gnyis pa'i shasra nas bzung dbyangs thog ma can rnams pha rol la/ sngon na ma yig dang ba yig brtsegs pa med pa'i nra mtha'i u pa d+hA'i a yig de ni dbyi bar bya ste/ 
<p>29b.7</p>a phyis pas/ as+th+nA/ TA/ sas+thi b+h+yAM/ as+thi b+hiH bzhi pa gsum la/ as+th+ne/ nge / as+thi b+h+yAM/ as+tha b+h+yaH lnga pa gsum la/ as+thaH nga si/ as+thi b+h+yAM/ as+thi b+h+yaH drug pa gsum la/ asraH ngas/ as+th+noH osra/ bdun pa'i gcig tshig la/ bed+moH i ngi dag la yang na'o/ /nra mtha'i u pad+hA'i a yig ni i dang ngi dag pha
<p>30a</p>
<p>30a.1</p>rol la yang na dbyi bar bya ste/ as+th+ni/ a s+thi ni/ gnyis tshig dang mang tshig la/ as+th+noH osra/ as+thi Shu/ supra/ ! de bzhin du as+thi sogs ni/ da d+hi/ sak+thi/ ak+Sh-i la sogs pa mtha' yas so/ ! bA ri zhes pa'i rtags la yang TA sogs la i atra tu mi 'gyur
<p>30a.2</p>ba'i khyad tsam ma gtogs as+thi dang 'dra la/ ma ning gi rtags i mtha' can spyi la'ang bA ri'i cho ga 'di 'jug pa shas che ste/ ! chu/ bA ri/ si/ bA ri NI/ au/ bA rI Ni/ dzasa?/ zho/ mdung / mig/ bA ri/ amra/ bA ri NI/ au/ bA rI Ni/ shasa?/ bA ri NA/ TA/ pA ri b+h+yAM/ bA ri b+hiH bA ri Ne/ nge / bA ri NaH 
<p>30a.3</p>sogs so// //ma ning gi rtags I ring mtha' can la grA ma NI zhes pa'i sgra la mtshon na de yang / na puM sa ka s+yahra swaH ma ning gi thung ngu'o/ /ma ning gi rtags mtha' dbyangs ring po rnams ni thung ngur 'gyur te/ grwa ma Ni zhes bsgyur ba la rnam dbye rnams byin pas/ dang po nga si 
<p>30a.4</p>gsum la/ grwa ma Ni/ si/ grwa ma Ni nI/ au/ grwa ma NI ni/ dzasra / gnyis pa gsum la yang / grwa ma Ni/ amra/ grwa ma Ni nI/ au/ grwa ma NI ni/ shasra / gsum pa'i gcig tshig la/ TA dAbuk+ta puMsko puM bad+bA/ TA sogs la skyes par bshad grong sde'i phra ma mkhan  pa'i skyes pa bzhin yang na'o/ /ma ning gi
<p>30a.5</p>rtags nA mi'i dbyangs mtha' can rnams TA la sogs pa dbyangs dang po can rnams pha rol la/ sngar skyes pa'i rtags kyi skabs su bshad pa'i cho ga rnams kyis skyes pa bzhin du sgrub pa dang ma ning rang lugs su sgrub pa 'dam kha can te/ grwa ma N+yA/ TA grwa ma Ni nA/ TA/ gnyis tshig dang
<p>30a.6</p>mang tshig la/ grwa ma Ni b+h+yAM/ grwa ma Ni b+hiH bzhi pa gsum la/ grwa ma N+ye/ nge / grwa ma Ni ne+e/ nge / grwa ma Ni b+h+yAM/ grwa ma Ni b+h+yaH lnga pa gsum la/ grwa ma N+yaH nga si/ grwa ma Ni naH nga si/ grwa ma Ni b+h+yAM/ grwa ma Ni b+h+yaH drug pa gsum la/ grwa ma N+yaH ngasra/ gA ma Ni naH ngasra/ grwa ma N+yeH grA ma Ni noH grwa ma N+yAM/ 
<p>30a.7</p>grwa ma NI nAM/ Amra/ bdun pa gsum la/ grwa ma N+yAM/ ngi/ grwa ma Ni ni/ ngi/ grwa ma N+yoH osra/ grwa ma Ni noH asra/ grwa ma Ni Shu/ supra/ bod pa gsum la/ he grA ma Ni/ si/ he grwa ma Ni nI/ au/ he grwa ma NI ni/ dzasra/ de bzhin du ma ning gi rtags I ring / mtha' can thams osra/ osra/ cad 'di dang Amra 
<p>30b</p>
<p>30b.1</p>'dra'o// //ma ning gi rtags A yig mtha' can la so ma pA zhes pa la dper brjod na/ de yang ma ning gi thung ngu 'os thung ngur bsgyur bas cho ga thams cad a thung mtha' can ku la'i skabs dang 'dra ste// ! si so ma paM/ zhi ba 'thung / so ma pe/ au/ so ma pA ni/ dzasra/ slar yang
<p>30b.2</p>so ma paM/ amra/ so ma pe/ au/ so ma pA ni/ shasa?/ so ma pe na/ TA so ma pA b+h+yAM/ so ma paiH b+hisa?/ so ma pA ya/ nge so ma pA b+h+yAM/ so ma pe b+h+yaH sogs so// //ma ning gi rtags la u yig mtha' can la ma d+hu zhes pa'i sgra la mtshon na/ de yang nA ma'i dbyangs la
<p>30b.3</p>numra ster ba kho na ste/ sbrang rtsi/ ma d+hu/ si/ ma d+hu nI/ au/ ma d+hU ni/ dzasa?/ slar yang / ma d+hu/ amra/ ma d+hu nI/ au/ ma d+hU ni/ shasa?/ ma d+hu nA/ TA ma b+hu b+h+yAM/ ma b+hu b+hiH ma d+hu ne/ nge ma d+hu b+h+yAM/ ma d+hu b+h+yaH sogs so// //ma ning gi rtags ai yig mtha' can la a ti rai zhes
<p>30b.4</p>pa'i rtags la/ ma ning la thung ngu 'os thung ngur bsgyur la de yang thung ngur bsgyur ba la mtshams sbyor gyi yi ge rnams kyi i yig dang u yig dag go zhes bshad pas a ti ri zhes par bsgyur bas/ ! a ti ri/ si a te ti NI/ au a ti rI Ni/ dzasa?/ slar yang / a ti ri/ 
<p>30b.5</p>a ti ri NI/ au/ a ti rI Ni/ shasa?/ a ti ri NA/ TA/ a ti ri b+h+yAM/ sogs so// //de bzhin du au yig mtha' can a ti no zhes pa la thung ngur byas pas a ti nu zhes par bsgyur ba la/ shin tu nor can/ ! a ti nu/ si a ti nu nI/ sko a ti nU ni/ dzasa?/ slar yang / amra/ 
<p>30b.6</p>a ti nu/ amra/ a ti nu nI/ au/ a ti nU ni/ shasa?/ a ti nu nA/ TA a ti nu b+h+yAM/ sogs so// //ma ning gi rtags U ring mtha' can la kha la pU zhes pa'i sgra la mtshon na/ ma ning la thung ngu dang / gru shin tu lci ba/ TA nas brtsams ma ning rang lugs ltar rnam dbye thams cad la thung
<p>30b.7</p>ngur bsgyur nas dbyangs thog ma can rnams la numra ster ba dang / skyes par bshad pa zhes pas skyes pa'i rtags la pa lU'i skabs su bshad pa rnams yang na bar bya ste/ ! ngan pa/ kha la pu nI/ si kha la pu byA/ au kha la pU ni/ dzasa? slar yang / kha la pu/ amra/ kha la pu nI/ au/ kha la pU
<p>31a</p>
<p>31a.1</p>ni/ shasa?/ kha la pu nA/ T+rA/ kha la p+wA/ TA kha la pu b+h+yAM/ kha la pU b+h+yAM/ kha la pU b+hiH sogs so// //ma ning gi rtags r-i yig mtha' can kar+t+r-i zhes pa'i sgra lta bu la yang cho ga thams cad sngon ma rnams kyis rigs 'gre ste/ dang po gsum
<p>31a.2</p>la/ ! kar+t+r-i/ si kar+t+r-i NI/ au/ kar+t+r-I Ni/ dzasra/ gnyis pa rang lugs/ skyes pa'i lugs/ gsum la yang / kar+t+r-i/ amra au kar+t+r-I Ni/ shasa? gsum pa gsum la/ kar+t+rA/ TA kar+t+r-i NA/ TA kar+t+r-i b+h+yAM/ kar+t+r-i b+hiH bzhi pa gsum la/ kar+t+re/ nge / kar+t+r-i Ne/ nge kar+t+r-i b+h+yAM/ 
<p>31a.3</p>kar+t+r-i b+h+yaH byed pa/ lnga pa gsum la/ kartuH nga si kar+t+r-i NaH nga si kar+t+r-i b+h+yAM/ kar+t+r-i b+h+yaH drug pa gsum la/ kartuH ngasra kar+t+r-i NaH ngasa? kar+t+roH r+t+r-i NoH omra shar+t+r-i NAM/ Amra kar+t+r-I NAM/ Amra bdun pa gsum la/ karta ri/ ngi kar+t+r-i N-i/ ngi kar+t+roH kar+t+r-i NoH kar+t+r-i Sha/ bod pa
<p>31a.4</p>gsum la/ he kar+t+r-i/ si he kar+t+r-i NI/ au he kar+t+r-i Ni/ dzasra sogs so/ /i ti swa ra swa sti byA ka ra Na s+ya sU trAt+s+wa rAn+tAHna puM sa ka ling+gAs+sa mAp+tAH osra zhes pa brda sprod pa dbyangs can gyi mdo las ma ning gi rtags dbyangs mtha' can rnams rdzogs so// ! //de nas ha sa'i mtha'
<p>31a.5</p>can skyes pa'i rtags rnams bshad par bya ste/ de la hra yig mtha' can las a na Du hra zhes pa'i sgra las/ dang po'i gcig tshig la/ a na Du hra zhes pa'i rtags la rnam dbye dang po lnga pha rol la A mra A ga ma ster bar bshad pas/ Amra byin/ sA ba na Du haH a na Du hra'i si la'o/ / 
<p>31a.6</p>a na Du hra'i sgra las rnam dbye si pha rol la numra A ga ma ster bar bya ste numra byin/ saM yo gAn+ta s+ya lo paH yang dag par sbyor ba'i mtha' dbyi'o/ /ra sa so sor bsdu ba'i yi ge pha rol dang tshig mtha' las kyang yang dag par sbyor ba'i mtha' dbyi bar bya ste/ hra phyis/ ha sa Ipra zhes pas
<p>31a.7</p>si yang phyis/ ! glang khyu pa/ a na D+wAnra/ si de bzhin du gnyis tshig dang mang tshig la/ a na D+wA hau/ au a na D+wA haH dzasa? kun tu bod pa'i tshig gcig la/ d+hA bamra/ d+hi la a mra'o/ /a na Du hra'i sgra las d+hi pha rol la amra A ga ma ster bar bya ste/ amra byin/ he a na D+wanra/ si gnyis
<p>31b</p>
<p>31b.1</p>tshig dang mang tshig la/ he a na D+wA hau/ au he a na D+wA haH dzasra gnyis pa gsum la/ a na D+wA haM/ amra a na D+wA hau/ au a na Du haH gsum pa'i gcig tshig la/ a na Du hA/ TA gnyis tshig dang mang tshig la/ ba sAM ra se/ ba sra rnams kyi ra sa la'o/ /bsra/ sraMsra/ d+h+waMsra/ 
<p>31b.2</p>b+h+raMsra/ a na Du hra rnams kyi mtha' ni ras so sor bsdu ba'i yi ge pha rol dang tshig mtha' las kyang dra yig tu 'gyur te/ an Du d+b+h+yaM/ a na Du d+b+hiH bzhi pa gsum la/ a na Du d+b+h+yAM/ a na Du d+b+h+yaH lnga pa gsum la/ a na Du haH nga si 'gebs pa/ mtshon snun/ 'joms pa/ a na Du d+b+h+yAM/ 
<p>31b.3</p>a na Du d+b+h+yaH drug pa gsum la/ a na Du haH ngasa? a na Du hoH osra a na Du hAM/ Amra bdun pa'i gcig tshig dang gnyis tshig la/ a na Du hi/ a na Du hoH mang tshig la/ pasra rnams kyi zhes pas/ hra dra/ kha sa la dz+ha sa rnams kyi tsa pa 'os dra tra/ a na
<p>31b.4</p>Dut+su/ ! go du hra zhes pa'i sgra la mi 'dra ba yod de/ dang po'i gcig tshig la/ dA der+g+haH da sngon ma'i g+h+ra'o/ /da yig sngon na yod pa'i mtha'i hra yig ni byings yin na dz+ha sa'i yi ge dang / ming yin na ra sa'i yi ge pha rol na yod pa dang tshig mtha' las kyang g+h+ra yig tu 'gyur
<p>31b.5</p>te/ hra g+h+ra/ go dug+h+ra/ si zhes gnas pa la/ A di dza bA nAM dz+ha b+hAn+ta s+ya dz+ha b+hAs+d+h+woH dz+ha b+ha'i mtha' las sngon ma'i dza ba rnams ni dz+ha b+ha ste sa d+h+wa dag la'o/ /dz+ha b+ha so sor bsdu ba'i yi ge mtha' na yod pa'i sngon ma'i dza ba'i yi ge rnams ni byings yin nas yig dang d+h+wa zhes pa'i sgra dang / ming
<p>31b.6</p>yin na ra sa'i yi ge pha rol na yod pa dang tshig mtha' las kyang dz+ha b+ha'i yi ge rnams su 'gyur te/ dra d+h+ra/ bA ba sa ne/ gnas med pa la yang na'o/ /gnas med pa ste gsal byed mtha' can dz+ha sa'i yi ge rnams dza ba'i yi ge rnams su 'gyur zhing yang na tsa pa rnams su 'gyur te/ g+h+ra gra'am
<p>31b.7</p>ka/ go d+hugra/ ba 'jo ba go d+hukra/ si gnyis tshig dang mang tshig la/ go du hau/ au go du haH ngasa? bod pa gsum la/ he go d+hukra/ si he go du hau/ au he go du haH dzasa? gnyis pa gsum la/ go du haM/ amra go du hau/ au go du heH shasa? gsum pa'i
<p>32a</p>
<p>32a.1</p>gcig tshig la/ go du hA/ TA gnyis tshig dang mang tshig la/ da sngon ma'i g+ha 'os hra g+h+ra/ dz+ha b+ha'i mtha' sogs kyis dra d+h+ra/ dz+ha b+ha la dza ba'o sa/ g+h+ra gra/ go d+hug+b+h+yAM/ go d+hug+b+hiH bzhi pa gsum la/ go du he/ go d+hu g+b+h+yAM/ go d+hu g+b+h+yaH lnga pa gsum la
<p>32a.2</p>go du haH go d+hug+b+h+yAM/ go d+hug+b+h+yaH drug pa gsum la/ go du hi/ go du hoH go du hAM/ bdun pa'i gcig tshig dang gnyis tshig la/ go du hi/ go du hoH mang tshig la/ go d+hu g+h+ra/ su zhes gnas pa la/ kha sa la dz+ha sa rnams kyi tsa pa 'os/ g+h+ra kra/ ku i la las zhes
<p>32a.3</p>pas/ sa Sh+ra/ kra Sh+ra yang dag par sbyor ba k+Sha'o zhes bshad pas/ go d+hu k+Shu/ ! yang ma d+hu lihra zhes pa'i sgra la'ang khyad par yod de/ dang po'i gcig tshig la/ ho D+haH ha'i D+ha'o/ /mtha'i ha yig ni byings la dz+ha sa'i yi ge dang / ming la ra sa'i yi gi pha rol na yod pa dang
<p>32a.4</p>tshig mtha' las kyang D+h+ra yig tu 'gyur te/ hra D+h+ra/ gnas med pa zhes pas/ dza ba'am tsa pa/ ! ma d+hu liD+ra/ si ma d+hu liT/ si gnyis tshig dang mang tshig la/ ma d+hu li hau/ au ma d+hu li haH dzasa? bod pa gsum la/ he ma d+hu liD+ra/ si he ma d+hu liT+ra/ si he ma d+hu li hau/ au 
<p>32a.5</p>he ma d+hu li haH dzasa? gnyis pa gsum la/ ma d+hu li haM/ amra ma d+hu li hau/ au ma d+hu li haH shasa? sbrang rtsi 'thung ba ste/ bung ba/ gsum pa'i gcig tshig la/ ma d+hu li hA/ gnyis tshig dang mang tshig la/ hra D+h+ra/ dz+ha b+ha la zhes pas D+h+ra D+ra/ ma d+ha liD+b+h+yAM/ ma d+hu liD+b+hiH sogs dang
<p>32a.6</p>bdun pa'i mang tshig la/ kha sa la zhes pas/ ma d+hu liT+su/ ! yang mi tra dru hra zhes pa'i sgra la/ dang po'i gcig tshig la/ dru hA dI nAM g+ha twa b+ha twe bA/ dru hra sogs kyi g+ha nyid D+h+ra nyid yang na'o/ /druhra la sogs pa'i mtha' ni byings la dz+ha sa'i yi ge dang ming la ra sa'i yi ge pha rol na yod
<p>32a.7</p>pa dang / tshig mtha' las kyang g+h+ra yig dang D+h+ra yig tu bsgyur ba 'dam kha can du bya ste/ ! si mi tra d+h+rakra/ grogs bshes la 'khu ba/ mi tra d+h+rugra/ si mi tra d+h+ruT+ra/ si mi tra d+h+ruD+ra/ si gnyis tshig dang mang tshig la/ mi tra dru hau/ au/ mi tra dru haH dzasra bod tshig gsum la/ he mi tra d+h+rukra/ si 
<p>32b</p>
<p>32b.1</p>he mi tra d+h+rugra/ si he mi tra d+h+ruT+ra/ si he mi tra d+h+ruD+ra/ si he mi tra dru hau/ au he mi tra dru haH dzasa? gnyis pa gsum la/ mi tra dru haM/ amra mi tra dru hau/ au mi tra dru hAH shasa? gsum pa gsum la/ mi tra dru hA/ TA mi tra d+h+rug+b+h+yI/ mi tra d+h+ruD+b+h+yAM/ mi tra d+h+rug+b+hiH mi tra d+h+ruD+b+hiH 
<p>32b.2</p>sogs dang bdun pa'i mang tshig la/ mi tra d+h+ruk+Shu/ supra/ de bzhin du ta twa muhra la sogs pa rnams kyang ngo / ! b+hA ra bAhra zhes pa'i sgra la rnam dbye gnyis pa'i mang tshig shas man la bya ba mi 'dra ba yod de/ dang po gsum la/ b+hA ra bAT+ra/ si 
<p>32b.3</p>b+hA ra bAT+ra/ si b+hA ra bA hau/ au/ b+hA ra bA haH dzasra bod pa gsum la/ he b+hA ra bAT+ra/ si he b+hA ra bAT+ra/ si de kho na nyid la rmongs pa/ he b+hA ra bA hau/ au he b+hA ra bA haH dzasa? gnyis pa'i gcig tshig dang gnyis tshig la/ b+hA ra bA haM/ b+hA ra bA hau/ au/ mang tshig la/ bA khur skyed de bong bu/ ho bau sha sA
<p>32b.4</p>dau swa re/ shas sogs dbyangs la bA hra'i bA'i au'o/ /shasra sogs rnam dbye dbyangs dang po can pha rol la bAhra'i bA yig dbyangs bcas au zhes par 'gyur te/ bA au/ o dang au la au/ b+hA rau haH shasa? gsum pa gsum la/ b+hA rau hA/ TA b+hA ra bAD+b+h+yAM/ b+hA ra bAD+b+hiH sogs dang / 
<p>32b.5</p>bdun pa'i mang tshig la/ b+hA ra bAT+su/ ! tu rA sAhra zhes pa'i sgra la'ang mi 'dra ba yod de/ dang po'i gcig tshig la/ sa heHShaHsAD+hi/ sA ha'i sa'i D+ha la ShA'o/ /sAhra'i sA yig ni ha 'gyur ba'i D+ha pha rol la ShA yig tu 'gyur te/ ! tu rA ShAD+ra/ si gnyis
<p>32b.6</p>tshig dang mang tshig la/ tu rA sA hau/ au tu rA sA haH dzasa? bo tshig gsum la/ he tu rA ShAT+ra/ si he tu rA ShAD+ra/ si he tu rA sA hau/ au tu rA sA haH dzasa? gnyis pa gsum la/ tu rA sA haM/ amra tu rA sA hau/ au tu rA sA haH shasra brgya byin gyi rta/ gsum pa gsum la/ tu
<p>32b.7</p>rA sA hA/ TA tu rA ShAD+b+h+yAM/ tu rA ShAD+b+hiH sogs dang bdun pa'i mang tshig la/ tu rA ShAT+su/ ! ra yig mtha' can la tsa tur+ra zhes pa'i sgra la mtshon na/ de yang tsa tur+ra zhes pa grangs bgrang ba la rnam dbye rnams kyi mang tshig kho na 'jug cing / dngos po brjod pa'i skabs su ni gcig
<p>33a</p>
<p>33a.1</p>tshig sogs thams cad 'jug pa las/ re zhig grangs kyi dbang du byas te/ tsa tu rA m+shautsa/ tsa tur+ra gyi shi la Amra yang ngo / tsa tur+ra gyi sgra las shi ste rnam dbye dang po lnga pha rol la Amra A ga ma sbyin par bya ste/ dang po'i mang tshig la/ ! tsa twA raH dzasa? 
<p>33a.2</p>gnyis pa gsum pa bzhi la lnga pa rnams kying ming tshig la rim pa bzhin/ tsa tu raH shasra tsa tur+b+hiH tsa tur+b+h+yaH tsa tar+b+h+yaH drug pa'i mang tshig la/ raHsaM khyA yaH ra'i grangs la'o/ /ra yig mtha' can grangs kyi don dang 'brel pa las rnam dbye Amra la nu T+ra A ga ma 'gyur te/ bzhi rnams 
<p>33a.3</p>nuT+ra ra las ya yang zhes pa'i/ na gnyis/ tsa tur+N+NAM/ bdun pa'i mang tshig la/ tsa tu R+Shu/ sogs ta dngos po'i don brjod pa'i skabs su yang des rigs 'gre ste shes par bya'o/ /na yig mtha' can las rA dzanra zhes pa'i sgra la/ dang po'i gcig tshig la/ na'i u pa d+hA zhes pas/ 
<p>33a.4</p>u pa d+hA ring po/ nAm+no no lo pa sha d+hau/ d+hi ma yin pa la ming gi na dbyi'o/ /d+hi ma yin pa'i ra sa so sor bsdu ba'i yi ge dang tshig mtha' las kyang ming mtha'i na yig ni dbyi bar bya ste/ nra phyis/ ! rA dzA/ si gnyis tshig dang mang tshig la/ rA dzA nau/ au rA dzA naH dzasra bod tshog
<p>33a.5</p>la d+hi ma yin pa zhes pa'i na mi dbyi ba dang ring po mi byed/ he rA dzanra/ si he rA dzA nau/ au he rA dzA naH gnyis pa'i gcig tshig dang gnyis tshig la/ rA dzA naM/ rA dzA nau/ mang tshig la/ shasa? rgyal po/ la sogs pa dbyangs la ma ba sogs kyi mdos a phyis/ sa tu'i zhes pas
<p>33a.6</p>nra ny+ra/ dza nyo r+dz+nyaH dzra ny+ra dag gi dz+nya'o/ /dzra yig dang ny+ra yig yang dag par 'dus pa ni dz+nya zhes par 'gyur te/ rA dz+nyaH shasa? gsum pa'i gcig tshig la/ rA dz+nyA/ TA gnyis tshig dang mang tshig la/ d+hi ma yin pa sogs kyis nra phyis/ phyis pa la ni zhes pas ring por mi 'gyur/ rA dza
<p>33a.7</p>b+h+yAM/ rA dza b+hiH bzhi pa gsum la/ rA dz+nye/ nge / rA dza b+h+yAM/ rA dza b+h+yaH lnga pa gsum la/ rA dz+nyaH nga si rA dza b+h+yAM/ rA dza b+h+yaH drug pa gsum la/ rA dz+nyaH ngasra rAdz+nyoH osra rAdz+ny-I/ Amra bdun pa'i gcig tshig la/ /i ngi dag la yang na 'os/ rA dz+nyi/ ngi rA dza ni/ nge gnyis tshig dang
<p>33b</p>
<p>33b.1</p>mang tshig la/ rAdz+nyoH osra rA dza su/ ! de bzhin du/ ya dz+wanra/ at+manra/ su d+harma nra/ sogs na mtha' phal cher 'di dang 'dra la 'on kyang / shas la sogs pa dbyangs la ma bzhes pas ma yig dang ba yig brtsegs pa rnams la a mi dbyi ste/ ya dz+wa nA/ shasa? ya dz+wa nA/ TA 
<p>33b.2</p>at+ma naH shasra at+ma nA/ TA sogs so/ ! /shwanra/ khyi lha mchod mkhan/ nga'am bdag/ lugs bzang / yu banra/ ma g+ha banra rnams la ni dang po lnga rA dzanra dang 'dra ba la shasra nas brtsams khyad par yod de/ shwA desh+tsa/ shwa la sogs pa'i yang ngo / shwa la sogs pa'i ba yig
<p>33b.3</p>dbyangs bcas ni shasra sogs rnam dbye dbyangs dang po can rnams dang / de phan gyi rkyen dang / mo rkyen lang tsho/ brgya byin Ipra dang / I yig rnams pha rol las kyang u yig tu 'gyur te/ ! shu naH shasra shunA/ TA sogs dang de bzhin du yu banra la'ang ba u/ 'dra ba'i
<p>33b.4</p>yi he 'dus pa la ring po 'os/ ! yU naH shasra yU nA/ TA sogs so/ /ma g+ha banra lalang ba u/ u la o 'os/ ! ma g+ho naH shasra ma g+ho nA/ TA ma g+ha ba b+h+yAM/ ma g+ha ba b+hiHsogs so/ ! /na yig mtha' can pa thinra zhes pa'i sgra la'ang khyad par yod de/ dang po'i gcig
<p>33b.5</p>tshig la/ i to\u0f85t+pany+tsa su/ lngal itra kyi atra'o/ /rnam dbye thog ma lnga pha rol la pa thinra la sogs pa'i u pa d+hA'i itra ni atra tu 'gyur te/ i a/ pa tho nuT+ra/ pa thinra gyi nuT+ra'o/ /pa thinra la sogs pa'i tha yig la rnam dbye thog ma lnga pha rol la nuT+ra A ga ma 'gyur te/ 
<p>33b.6</p>nuT+ra byin pas/ panra thanra/ si zhes gnas pa la/ A sau/ si la A'o/ /pa thinra la sogs pa'i Ti ni rnam dbye si pha rol la A ru 'gyur te/ Ti A/ sra rnam bcad/ ! lam pan+thAH si gnyis tshig dang mang tshig la/ na'i u pa d+hA 'os/ ring por bsgyur bas/ pan+thAnau/ au 
<p>33b.7</p>pan+thAnaH dzasa? gnyis pa'i gcig tshig dang gnyis tshig la/ pan+thA naM/ amra pan+thAnau/ au ming tshig la/ pa thAM TeH pa thinra rnams kyi Ti'o/ /pa thinra la sogs rnams kyi Ti ni shasra sogs rnam dbye dbyangs dang po can rnams pha rol la dbyi bar bya ste/ Ti phyis pas/ pa thaH shasra gsum
<p>34a</p>
<p>34a.1</p>pa gsum la/ pa thA/ TA pa thi b+h+yAM/ pa thi b+hiHsogs so/ ! /de bzhin du/ mthinra/ r-i b+hu k+Shinra sogs kyang de kho na dang 'dra'o/ ! /nra yig mtha' can daN+Din zhes pa la sogs pa'i sgra la ni mi 'dra ba yod de/ dang po'i gcig tshig la/ i nAM shau sau/ inra
<p>34a.2</p>rnams kyi shi dang si la'o/ /inra/ hanra/ pu Shanra/ aR+Ya manra zhes pa rnams kyi u pa d+hA ni dzasa? shasa? bsgyur srub pa/ byin/ ba'i shi dang d+hi ma yin pa'i si pha rol la ring por 'gyur te/ u pa d+hA ring po/ ming mtha'i nra phyis pas/ ! daN+Di/ si dbyug pa can/ gnyis tshig dang mang tshig la/ 
<p>34a.3</p>daN+Di nau/ au daN+Di naH dzasra bod tshig 'tshe ba/ rgyas pa/ nyi ma gsum la/ he daN+Dinra/ si he daN+Di nau/ au he daN+Di naH dzasra gnyis pa gsum la/ daN+Di naM/ amra daN+Di nau/ au daN+Di naH shasra gsum pa gsum la/ daN+Di nA/ TA daN+Di b+h+yAM/ daN+Di b+hiHsogs so/ ! /de bzhin du/ ka linra/ 
<p>34a.4</p>ka pA linra/ mu sha linra/ dan+tinra/ mA linra/ d+ha ninra/ sogs so/ ! /nra yig mtha' can brah+ma hanra zhes pa'i sgra la ni rnam dbye thog ma lnga de dang 'dra zhing shas sogs la khyad par yod de/ ! /brah+ma hA/ si brah+ma ha Nau/ au brah+ma ha NaH dzasa? gnyis pa'i gcig tshig dang cha shas can/ 
<p>34a.5</p>thod pa can/ gtun shing can/ mche ba can te glang po/ 'phreng ba can/ nor can/ gnyis tshig la/ brah+ma ha NaM/ amra brah+ma ha Nau/ au mang tshig la/ shas la sogs pa dbyangs la ma ba sogs kyis a phyis/ ha  tshangs 'joms/ na g+h+ne/ han gyi na la g+ha'o/ /han gyi ha ni a phyis pa lta bu'i bar na
<p>34a.6</p>yi ge gzhan med pa'i nra yig dang rkyen ny+ra Na kra ng+ra rnams 'gro ba pha rol la'ang g+ha yig tu 'gyur te/ hra g+h+ra/ brah+mag+h+naH shasa? gsum pa gsum la/ brah+mag+h+nA/ TA brah+ma ha b+h+yAM/ brah+ma ha b+hiH sogs so/ ! /de bzhin du pu Shanra zhes pa'i sgra la'ang rnam dbye bdun pa'i gcig tshig
<p>34a.7</p>ma gtogs sngon ma rnams dang 'dra ste/ ! /rgyas pa/ pu ShA/ si pu Sha Nau/ au/ pu Sha NaH dzasra pu Sha NaM amra pu Sha Nau/ au pu Sha NaH shasra pu Sha NA/ TA pu Sha b+h+yAM/ pu Sha b+hiH sogs dang bdun pa'i gcig tshig la/ skabs la lar ngi la pu Shanra gyi Ti dbyi bar bshad pas/ Ti dbyi ba
<p>34b</p>
<p>34b.1</p>dang / a dbyi ba dang / mi dbyi ba gsum 'dam kha can du byas pas/ pu Shi/ ngi puSh+Ni/ ngi pu Sha Ni/ ngi sogs so/ ! /mchod pa byed/ aR+Ya manra zhes pa'i sgra la'ang gzhan thams cad de dang 'dra ba la ngi la Ti mi dbyi/ a dbyi ba dang mi dbyi ba yang na bar byas pas/ ! aR+Ya mA/ si 
<p>34b.2</p>aR+Ya ma Nau/ au/ ar+Ya ma NaH dzasa? ar+Ya ma NaM/ amra ar+Ya ma Nau/ au ar+Ya m+NaH shasra ar+Ya m+NA/ TA/ ar+Ya ma b+h+yAM/ ar+Ya ma b+hiH sogs dang / ar+Ya m+Ni/ ngi ar+Ya ma Ni/ ngi sogs so/ ! /nra yig mtha' can pany+tsanra la grangs kyi don brjod pa la mang tshig kho na las mi 'jug cing
<p>34b.3</p>rkyen la mi ltos par rang bzhin gyi rtags gsum pa zhes zer te/ dang po'i mang tshig la/ pany+tsanra/ dzasa? zhes gnas pa la/ dzash+sha sorlukra/ dzasa? shasa? dag ni 'jig go /grangs kyi sgra Sh+ra yig dang nra yig gi mtha' las pha rol gyi dzasra shasa? dag 'jig ste/ ming mtha'i nra
<p>34b.4</p>yang phyis/ rkyen phyis pa la rkyen gyi bya ba yod la/ 'jig pa la ni bya ba med do zhes bshad pas/ bya ba gzhan med/ ! lnga pany+tsa/ dzasa? de bzhin du shasra la yang / pany+tsa/ shasa? gsum pa bzhi pa lnga pa rnams la/ pany+tsa b+hiH pany+tsa b+h+yaH pany+tsa b+h+yaH drug pa'i Amra la/ Sh+NaHSha Na
<p>34b.5</p>las so/ grangs kyi sgra Sh+ra yig gi mtha' las pha rol gyi Amra la nuT A ga ma ster bar bya ste/ nuT+ra byin/ ming mtha'i na phyis/ nAmra la 'os ring po/ pany+tsA nAM/ Amra bdun pa'i mang tshig la/ pany+tsa su/ ! de bzhin du/ sap+tanra/ na banra/ da shanra sogs
<p>34b.6</p>so/ ! yang nra yig mtha' can aSh+Tanra zhes pa'i sgra la bya ba mi 'dra ba yod de/ de yang grangs kyi dbang du byas te dang po'i mang tshig la/ aSh+Ta nau bA Dau/ aSh+Tanra las Dau yang na'o/ /aSh+Tanra las pha rol gyi dzasra shasra gnyis ni yang na Dau zhes par bdun/ dgu/ bcu/ 'gyur te/ 
<p>34b.7</p>Ditra la Ti phyis/ ! brgyad a Sh+Tau/ dzasa? aSh+Ta/ dzasa? de bzhin du shas la/ aSh+Tau/ shasa? gsum pa'i mang tshig la/ bA su/ 'di rnams la A yang na'o/ /aSh+Tanra gyi u pa d+hA'i a ni 'di rnams te rnam dbye rnams pha rol la ring por yang na 'gyur te/ aSh+TA b+hiH aSh+Ta
<p>35a</p>
<p>35a.1</p>b+hiH bzhi pa'i mang tshig la/ aSh+TA b+h+yaH aSh+Ta b+h+yaH lnga pa la'ang / aSh+TA b+h+yaH aSh+Ta b+h+yaH drug pa'i mang tshig la cho ga yang na bar byed kyang gzugs gcig pas/ aSh+TA nAM/ bdun pa'i mang tshig la/ aSh+TA su/ aSh+Ta su/ ! ma yig mtha' can
<p>35a.2</p>i damra gyi sgra la/ dang po'i gcig tshig la/ i da mo\u0f85yaM puM si/ i damra gyi skyes pa la a yaM mo/ i damra gyi sgra ni skyes pa'i rtags kyi skabs su si dang lhan cig par a yaM zhes par 'gyur re/ ! si a yaM/ 'di gnyis tshig la/ t+yadra sogs kyi si sogs la Ti a 'os/ 
<p>35a.3</p>i da/ o zhes gnas pa la/ da s+ya maH da'i ma'o/ /t+yadra la sogs pa'i da yig ni rnam dbye si la sogs pa pha rol la ma yig tu 'gyur te/ da ma/ o dang au la au 'os/ i mau/ au ming tshig la/ dzasa? I 'os/ i me/ dzasa? t+yadra sogs la bod tshig ni mi 'jug
<p>35a.4</p>la/ gnyis pa gsum la/ i maM/ amra au i mAnra/ shasa? gsum pa'i gcig tshig la/ a na Tau sauH Ta os dag la a na'o/ /i damra gyi sgra ni rnam dbye TA dang osra dag pha rol la a na zhes par 'gyur te/ a ne na/ TA gnyis tshig la/ s+b+h+yaH sa b+ha la a'o/ /i
<p>35a.5</p>dam gyi sgra ni sa yig dang b+ha yig pha rol la a yig tu 'gyur te/ i ma a b+ha la A 'os/ de ring po/ A b+h+yAM/ mang tshig la/ b+his+b+hiH b+his b+hisra 'o/ /i damra dang a dasra kyi sgra las pha rol gyi rnam dbye b+hisra ni b+hisra ru 'gyur la de yang b+ha ar 'gyur ba 'gog pa'o don te/ b+ha sa
<p>35a.6</p>mang po nyid la e 'os a er bsgyur bas/ e b+hiH bzhi pa'i gcig tshig la/ sarba sogs la smaT+ra byin pas/ a smi/ nge gnyis tshig dang mang tshig la/ A b+h+yAMH e b+h+yaH de bzhin du/ lnga pa gsum la/ asmAtra/ nga si sA b+h+yAM/ e b+h+yaH drug pa gsum la/ 
<p>35a.7</p>as+ya/ ngasra a na yoH osra eShAM/ Amra bdun pa gsum la/ a sminra/ ngi a na yoH osra e ShA/ sapra ! ma yig mtha' can kimra gyi sgra las/ t+yadra sogs kyi si sogs la Ti a 'os/ ka zhes bsgyur ba la cho ga thams cad sarba'i skabs ltar bsgrubs pas/ 
<p>35b</p>
<p>35b.1</p>kaH kau/ ke/ kaM/ kau/ kAnra sogs so/ ! /d+ha yig mtha' can ta twa bud+h+ra zhes pa'i sgra la/ rnam dbye dbyangs thog ma can la 'dren pa dang / ra sa'i yi ge thog ma can rnams la dz+ha b+ha'i mtha' las zhes pa dang / gnas med pa sogs kyi cho gas bsgrubs pas/ ! ta twa 
<p>35b.2</p>ci/ si/ o/ dzasa?/ amra/ au/ shasa? b+hutra/ si ta twa b+hudra/ si ta twa bu d+hau/ au ta twa bu d+haH dzasra he ta twa b+hutra/ si he ta twa b+hudra/ si ta twa bu d+haM/ amra ta twa bu d+hau/ au ta twa bud+haH TA ta twa b+hud+b+h+yAM/ ta twa b+hud+b+hiH ta to b+hut+su sogs so/ ! /dzra yig mtha' can samrAdzra zhes
<p>35b.3</p>pa'i sgra la/ dang po'i gcig tshig la/ de kho na nyid rtogs pa/ tsha sha Sha rA dzA deHShaH tsha sha Sha rA dzra la sogs pa'i Sha'o/ /tsh+ra yig dang shra yig dang Sh+ra yig rnams kyi mtha' can dang rA dzra yadzra mr-idzra b+h+radzra la sogs pa'i mtha' ni byings supra yin dz+ha sa'i yi ge dang ming yin na ra sa'i yi
<p>35b.4</p>ge pha rol tu byung ba dang tshig mtha' las kyang Sha nyid du 'gyur te/ dzraSh+ra/ Sho DaH Sha'i D+ra'o/ /mtha'i Sh+ra yig ni byings yin na dz+ha sa'i yi ge dang ming la ra sa'i yi ge pha rol gsal ba/ lha mchod pa/ gtong ba/ brtan pa/ na yod pa dang tshig mtha' las kyang Da yig tu 'gyur te/ Sh+ra D+ra/ 
<p>35b.5</p>gnas med pa la yang na 'os/ ! samrAT+ra/ si samrAD+ra/ si gnyis tshig dang mang tshig la/ samrA dzau/ au samrA dzaH dzasra bod tshig gsum la/ he samrAT+ra/ si he samrAD+ra/ si he sa mrA dzau/ au he sa mrA dzaH dzasra gnyis pa gsum la/ sa mrA dzaM/ amra samrA dzau/ au 
<p>35b.6</p>samrA dzaH shasa? gsum pa gsum yang dag par gsal ba/ la/ samrA dzA/ TA samrAD+b+h+yAM/ samrA D+b+hiH sogs dang bdun pa'i mang tshig la/ samrAT+su/ ! de bzhin du/ bi rA dzra la sogs pa yang 'di dang 'dra'o/ ! /da yig mtha' can t+yadra tadra yadra e tadra rnams kyi sgra las/ dang
<p>35b.7</p>po'i gcig tshig la/ t+yadra sogs kyi si sogs la Ti a 'os/ Ti a/ staH ta'i sa'o/ t+yadra la sogs pa'i tra yig ni si pha rol la sra yig tu 'gyur te/ ! de s+yaH si nam par gsal ba/ de bzhin du/ Ti ar bsgyur ba la sarba sogs kyi cho gas bsgrubs pas/ gnyis tshig
<p>36a</p>
<p>36a.1</p>dang mang tshig la/ t+yau/ au t+ye/ dzasra gnyis pa gsum la/ t+yaM/ amra t+yau/ au t+yAnra/ shasa? gsum pa gsum la/ t+ye na/ TA t+yA b+h+yAM/ t+yaiH b+himra bzhi pa gsum la/ t+yasmai/ nge t+yA b+h+yAM/ t+ye b+h+yaH lnga pa gsum la/ t+yasmAta/ nga si/ t+yA b+h+yAM/ t+ye b+h+yaH drug pa gsum la/ t+ya s+ya/ 
<p>36a.2</p>t+ya yoH osra t+ya ShAM/ Amra bdun pa gsum la/ t+ya sminra/ nge / t+ya yoH osra/ t+ye Shu/ ! de bzhin du/ siH tau/ te/ sogs dang / ! yaH yau/ ye/ e ShaH e tau/ e te sogs so/ /yang e tadra kyi sgra las slar yang lnga bas te brjod pa'i don la rnam dbye gnyis pa rnams dang TA
<p>36a.3</p>os dag pha rol la e na zhes par bsgyur ba dang mi bsgyur ba 'dam kha can du bshad pas/ nge si au dzasra e nar bsgyur na/ gang si au dzasra 'di si au dzasra e naM/ amra e nau/ au e nAnra/ shasra e ne na/ TA e na yoH osra e na yoH osra zhes pa'o/ ! /tsha yig mtha'
<p>36a.4</p>can ta twa prAtsh+ra zhes pa'i sgra la/ tsha sha Sha sogs kyis tsh+raSh+ra/ Sha'i Da 'os Sh+ra D+ra/ gnas med pa sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/ ! ta twa prAT+ra/ si ta twa prAD+ra/ si ta twa prA tshau/ au/ ta twa prA tshaH dzasra he ta twa prAT+ra/ si he ta twa prAD+ra/ si ta twa prA tshaM/ amra ta twa prA tshau/ au ta twa prA tshaH shasra ta twa
<p>36a.5</p>prA tshA/ TA ta twa prAD+b+h+yAM/ ta twa prAD+b+hiH sogs dang bdun pa'i mang tshig la/ ta twa prAT+su/ ! tha yig mtha' can ag+ni mathra zhes pa'i sgra la/ de kho na nyid la dri ba/ gnas med pa la yang na'o dang / dz+ha b+ha la dza ba sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/ ! si ag+ni matra/ me srubs pa/ ag+ni madra/ si ag+ni ma thau/ au 
<p>36a.6</p>ag+ni ma thaH he ag+ni matra/ he ag+ni madra/ si ag+ni ma thaM/ sogs dang / ag+ni mad+b+h+yAM/ ag+ni mad+b+hiH ag+ni mat+su/ sogs so/ ! /tsa yig mtha' can prat+yats+ra zhes pa'i sgra la/ de yang atsa?'i sgra la rnam dbye thog ma lnga po pha rol la numra A ga ma ster bar bshad pas/ numra
<p>36a.7</p>byin/ dzasa? prat+yanra/ si ts+ra si zhes gnas pa la/ amra sa tu'i sha tsu rnams la sha tsu 'os/ nrany+ra/ yang dag par sbyor ba'i mtha' dbyi 'os/ ts+ra phyis/ tsoHkuH tsu'i ku'o/ /mtha'i tsa sde ni byings yin na dz+ha sa'i yi ge dang ming lar sa'i yi ge pha rol na yod pa dang tshig mtha' las
<p>36b</p>
<p>36b.1</p>kyang grangs mtshungs pa'i ka sde rnams su 'gyur te/ ny+ra ng+ra/ ! pra t+yang+ra/ de bzhin du bsgrubs pas/ gnyis tshig dang mang tshig la/ pra t+yany+tsau/ au pra t+yany+tsaH dzasra bod pa gsum la/ he pra t+yadra/ si he pra t+yany+tsau/ au he pra t+yany+tsaH dzasa? gnyis pa'i gcig tshig dang gnyis tshig la/ 
<p>36b.2</p>pra t+yany+tsaM/ amra pra t+yany+tsau/ au mang tshig la/ a tse ra lo po dIr+g+hash+tsaH si atsa?'i dbyi zhing ring po'ang ngo / /a ts+ra zhes pa'i sgra a yig ni shasa? sogs rnams dbyed dbyangs thog ma rnams dang / de phan dang / mo rkyen Ipra dang I yig rnams pha rol la dbyi zhing dbyangs snga ma de yang ring
<p>36b.3</p>por 'gyur te a phyis/ rgyu mtshan med na rgyu mtshan can yang med pas y+ra yang i la log /de ring por bsgyur bas/ pra tI tsaH shasa? de bzhin du/ pra tI tsA/ TA pra t+yag+b+h+yAM/ pra t+yag+b+hiH sogs dang / bdun pa'i mang tshig la/ pra t+ya k+Shu/ ! tir+Yats+ra/ zhes pa la'ang rnam dbye thog
<p>36b.4</p>ma lnga pra t+yats+ra dang 'dra zhing shasa? sogs dbyangs thog ma can rnams la cho ga mi 'dra ba yod de/ ! tir+Yang+ra/ si tir+Yany+tsau/ au tir+Yany+tsaH dzasra he tir+Yang+ra/ si tir+Yany+tsaM amra tir+Yany+tsau/ au zhes dang / shasa?l/ ti rash+tsA da yaH ti rash+tsa la sogs pa'o/ /ti r+Yats+ra la sogs pa
<p>36b.5</p>rnams ni shas sogs rnam dbye dbyangs thog ma can rnams dang / de phan dang / mo rkyen Ipra dang dud 'gro rgyags po I yig rnams pha rol la tir+rash+tsa la sogs pa rnams su 'gyur la de yang tshig phrad kyis sgrub pa ste/ tir+Yats+ra ti rash+ts+ra tu bsgyur bas/ ti rash+tsaH lhag ma rnams la/ ti
<p>36b.6</p>rash+tsA/ TA tir+Yag+b+h+yAM/ tir+Yag+b+hiH ti rash+tse/ nge tir+Yak+Shu/ supra sogs so/ ! /de bzhin du u dats+ra zhes pa'i sgra la'ang thog ma lnga de rnams dang 'dra la shasra sogs la ti rash+ts+ra la sogs pa 'os u dats+ra/ u dIts+ra ru bsgyur nas sgrub pa sogs byas pas/ ! shasa? u dang+ra/ si u
<p>36b.7</p>dany+tsau/ au u dany+tsaH dzasra he u dang+ra/ si u dany+tsaM/ amra u dany+tsau/ au u dI tsaH shasa? u dI tsA/ TA u dag+b+h+yAM/ a dag+b+hiH adI tse/ nge u dak+Shu supra sogs so/ ! /de bzhin du samyats+ra la yang shas sogs dbyangs thog ma can la sa mIts+ra ru sgyur ba sogs byas pas/ !yang dag pa/ samyang / si 
<p>37a</p>
<p>37a.1</p>samyany+tsau/ au samyany+tsaH dzasra he sa myang+ra / si samyany+tsaM/ amra samyany+tsau/ au samI tsaH shasra samI tsA/ TA samyag+b+h+yAM/ samI tse/ nge samyak+Shu/ supra sogs so/ ! /ta yig mtha' can ma rutra ces pa'i sgra la/ gnas med pa la yang na'o dang / dbyangs kyis dman pa/ 
<p>37a.2</p>dz+ha b+ha la dza ba sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/ ! ma rutra/ si ma rudra/ si ma ru tau/ au ma ru taH dzasra ma ru taM/ amra ma ru tau/ au ma ru taH shasra ma ru tA/ TA ma rud+b+h+yAM/ ma rud+b+hiH ma rut+su sogs so/ ! /de bzhin du ag+ni tsitra sogs mang po dag des 'gre'o/ ! /ta mtha' u yig rjes
<p>37a.3</p>'brel can las ma ha tu zhes pa la u phyis/ ma hatra/ ces gnas pa la rnam dbye rnams byin pas/ dang po'i gcig tshig la/ br-i to numra/ u r-itra dag las numra'o/ /rtags u yig dang r+r-itra rjes 'brel me gsog pa/ can rnams las/ skyes pa'i rtags kyi skabs su rnam dbye thog ma
<p>37a.4</p>lnga po dang d+hi rnams dang / shi pha rol la yang numra A ga ma 'gyur te/ numra byin/ n+sam+ma ha to d+hau dIr+g+ha shau tsa/ nra sra apra ma hatra kyi d+hi ma yin pa la ring po ste shi la'ang ngo / /nra yig dang sra yig gi mtha' dang apra dang ma hatra kyi sgra rnams phyis u pa d+hA'i dbyangs rnams ni d+hi bor
<p>37a.5</p>ba'i rnam dbye thog ma lnga dang shi pha rol la'ang ring por 'gyur te/ u pa d+hA ring po/ yang dag par sbyor ba'i mtha' phyis/ ! si ma ha nra/ chen po/ gnyis tshig dang mang tshig la/ ma hAn+tau/ au ma hAn+taH dzasra bod tshig la/ he ma ha nra/ si gnyis pa gsum la/ ma hAn+taM/ amra ma hAn+tau/ au 
<p>37a.6</p>ma ha taH shasra gsum pa'i gcig tshig la/ ma ha tA/ TA gnyis tshig dang mang tshig la/ dz+ha b+ha la dza ba 'os/ tra dra/ ma ha D+b+h+yAM/ ma ha D+b+hiH de bzhin du/ ma ha te/ nge ma ha d+b+h+yAM/ ma ha d+b+h+yaH ma ha taH ngasi ma hat+su sogs so/ ! /ta mtha' u rjes 'brel na b+ha batra ces pa'i sgra las/ 
<p>37a.7</p>dang po'i gcig tshig la/ a twa so sau/ a tu dang sa'i si la'o/ /rkyen a tu'i mtha' dang sa yig mtha' can gyi u pa d+hA ni d+hi ma yin pa'i si pha rol la ring por 'gyur te/ ! dngos po/ b+ha bAnra/ si gnyis tshig dang mang tshig la/ b+ha ban+tau/ au b+ha ban+taHdzasra de bzhin du bsgrubs pas/ 
<p>37b</p>
<p>37b.1</p>b+ha ban+taM/ amra b+ha ban+tau/ au b+ha ba taH TA b+ha bad+b+h+yAM/ b+ha bad+b+hiH b+ha bat+su sogs so/ ! /ta yig mtha' r-ita rjes 'brel can b+ha ba tr-i zhes pa'i sgra la'ang r-i phyis/ si la ring por mi 'gyur gzhan thams cad sngon ma dang 'dra ste/ ! b+ha banra/ si b+ha ban+tau/ au b+ha ban+taH dzasa? 
<p>37b.2</p>he b+ha banra/ si b+ha ban+taM/ amra b+ha ban+tau/ au b+ha ba taH shasa? b+ha pa tA/ TA b+ha bad+b+h+yAM/ b+ha bad+b+hiH b+ha bat+su sogs so/ ! /de bzhin du ta mtha' r-i yig rjes 'brel can pa tsa tr-i zhes pa'i sgra la'ang cho ga thams cad b+ha ba tr-i dang 'dra pas/ ! pa tsanra/ si dngos po byed/ pa tsan+taM/ au pa tsan+taH dzasa? 
<p>37b.3</p>he pa tsanra/ si pa tsan+taM/ amra patsan+tau/ au pa tsa taH shasra pa tsa tA/ TA pa tsad+b+h+yAM/ pa tsad+b+hiH pa tsat+su sogs so/ ! sha yig mtha' can bishra zhes pa'i sgra la/ tsha sha Sha sogs kyis sha Sha/ /Sha'i Da'os/ Sh+ra D+ra ru bsgyur ba sogs kyis 'tshed pa/ bsgrubs pas/ ! biT+ra/ si biD+ra/ si 
<p>37b.4</p>bi shau/ au bi shaH dzasra he biT+ra/ si he biD+ra/ si bi shaM/ amra bi shau/ au bi shaH shasra bi shA/ TA biD+b+h+yAM/ biD+b+hiH biT+su sogs so/ ! /Sha yig mtha' can ShaSh+ra zhes pa'i sgra las grangs kyi don la mang tshig kho na las mi 'jug cing / de yang rang bzhin gyi rtags g.yog/ gsum pa
<p>37b.5</p>zhes zer te/ dang po'i mang tshig la dzasra shasra dag 'jig gos dzasa? phyis/ Sha'i Da'os/ Sh+ra D+ra ru bsgyur bas/ ! ShaD+ra/ ShaT+ra/ de bzhin du bsgrubs pas/ he ShaT+ra/ dzasra he ShaD+ra/ dzasra ShaT+ra/ shasra ShaD+ra/ shasra ShaD+b+hiH ShaD+b+h+yaH ShaD+b+h+yaH zhes dang drug pa'i mang tshig la/ Sha Na zhes
<p>37b.6</p>pas nuT+ra/ nAM la 'os ring por bsgyur bas/ ShAD+ra nra Amra zhes gnas pa laD+NaH Da'i Na'o/ /g+ngas dang drug/ dzasa? dzasa? 'brel ba'i Da yig ni nAmra pha rol la Na yig tu 'gyur te/ D+raN+ra/ nra yang N+ra/ ShAN+NAM/ Amra bdun pa'i mang tshig la/ ShaT+su/ sapra skabs la lar tshig
<p>37b.7</p>mtha' ma yin pa la'ang tshigs mtha'i cho ga rnams bya bar bshad do/ ! /Sha yig mtha' can do Sha zhes pa'i sgra la/ dang po'i gcig tshig la/ doShAM raH doSh+ra rnams kyi r+ra'o/ /doSh+ra/ sa dzuSh+ra/ g.yog nang zan lta bu/ A shiSh+ra/ snying nye ba/ ha biSh+ra/ sreg rdzas/ la sogs pa rnams kyi
<p>38a</p>
<p>38a.1</p>mtha'i Sha yig ni ra sa'i yi ge pha rol tu byung ba dang tshig mtha' las kyang r+ra yig tu 'gyur te/ ! doH si gnyis tshig dang mang tshig la/ do Shau/ au do ShaH bod tshig la/ he doH si gnyis pa'i gcig tshig dang gnyis tshig la/ do ShaM/ amra do Shau/ au mang tshig
<p>38a.2</p>la/ shasa? sogs rnam dbye dbyangs thog ma can rnams pha rol la nra yig mtha' can du sgyur ba dang mi sgyur ba Sh+ra mtha' lag pa/ nyid kyi cho ga 'dam kha can du bshad pas/ do Sh+NaH shasra dzasra do ShaH shasra de bzhin du gsum pa sogs la/ do Sh+NA/ TA doShA/ TA dor+b+h+yAM/ dor+b+hiH ngo Sh+Ne/ nge ngo She/ nge 
<p>38a.3</p>dor+Shu sogs so/ /de bzhin du sa dzuSh+ra zhes pa'i sgra la yang gzhan cho ga thams cad de dang 'dra ba la/ sa dzuSh+ra dang A shiSh+ra'i u pa d+hA'i dbyangs ni ra sa'i yi ge pha rol dang tshig mtha' las kyang ring por 'gyur bar bshad pas/ ! sa dzuH si sa dzuShau/ au su dzu ShaH dzasa? he sa dzUH si sa dzu
<p>38a.4</p>ShaM/ amra sa dzu Shau/ au sa dzu ShaH shasa? sa dzu ShA/ TA sa dzUr+b+h+yAM/ sa dzUr+b+hiH sa dzu She/ nge sa dzAr+Shu sogs so/ ! /sa yig mtha' can puM sa'i sgra las dang po'i gcig tshig la/ puM so a sung / puMsra'i a sung ngo / /g.yog nang zan lta bu rgyun du nye bar gnas pa'i don/ puMsra'i mtha' ni
<p>38a.5</p>rnam dbye thog ma lnga po pha rol la a sung du 'gyur te/ sra a sung+ra du sgyur/ ng+ra yig mtha' kho na 'gyur ba'i don/ u yig u r-itra dag la numra 'os don/ swa re maH dbyangs la ma'o/ /rjes su nga ro ni dbyangs pha rol la mra yig tu 'gyur te/ pu masra si zhes gnas pa la/ u r-itra tsha 
<p>38a.6</p>ces pa'i numra byin/ nra sra apra ma hatra sogs kyis ring po dang / yang dag par sbyor ba'i mtha' phyis pas/ ! pu mAnra/ si de bzhin du bsgrubs pas/ gnyis tshig dang mang tshig la/ pu mAM sau/ pu mAM saH dzasra bod tshig la/ he pu manra/ si he pu mAM sau/ au he pu mAM saH 
<p>38a.7</p>gnyis pa gsum la/ pu mAM saM/ asa? pumAM sau/ au puMsaH shasa? gsum pa'i gcig tshig la/ puM sA/ TA/ skyes bu/ gnyis tshig dang mang tshig la/ yang dag pa'i mtha' phyis pas/ puM b+h+yAM/ puM b+hiH de bzhin du/ puM se/ nge puM b+h+yAM/ puM b+h+yaH sogs dang bdun pa'i mang tshig la/ a saM b+ha
<p>38b</p>
<p>38b.1</p>be puM saHkak+sau/ mi 'byung ba la puM sa?'i su la kakra'o/ /mi 'byung ba zhes pa skyes bu ni rang nyid gcig po yin pas bdun pa'i mang tshig supra mi thob la de la rigs dang brtson pa skyed pa'i don du supra pha rol la kakra A ga ma ster bar rig byed kyi lugs tshig phrad du bsgrub pa ste/ yang
<p>38b.2</p>na kakra byin pas/ puMsa? kra su zhes gnas pa la/ skorA d+yosh+tsa/ sa? kra dag gi sngon ma'o/ /yang dag par sbyor ba sra yig dang kra yig gnyis 'dzom pa la ni gang sngon na yod pa de dbyi bar bya ste/ sngon ma'i sra phyis/ ku i la sogs kyis sra Sh+ra/ kra Sh+ra yang dag par sbyor bak+Sha / 
<p>38b.3</p>puM k+Shu/ yang na kakra ma byin pas/ puM su/ puMs+su ste gzugs gsum mo/ ! sra yig mtha' can bi dwasra zhes pa'i sgra la rnam dbye thog ma lnga bod tshig dang bcas pa gong ma rnams dang 'dra bas/ ! bi dwAnra/ si bi dwAMsau/ au bidwAMsaH dzasra he bi dwanra/ si bidwAM saM/ amra bidwAM sau/ au shasa?
<p>38b.4</p>la/ ba sorba uH bsra kyi ba u'o/ /bsra kyi ba yig ni shasra sogs rnam dbye dbyangs dang po can rnams dang / de phan dang / mo rkyen Ipra dang I yig rnams pha rol la u ru 'gyur te/ ba duShaH mkhas pa/ gsum pa'i gcig tshig la/ bi du ShA/ gnyis tshig dang mang tshig
<p>38b.5</p>la/ bsra rnams kyi ra sa la'os/ sra dra/ bi dwad+b+h+yAM/ bi dwad+b+hiH de bzhin du bsgrubs pas/ bi du She/ bi dwad+b+hiH bi dwat+su sogs so/ ! /sra yig mtha' can su ba tsasra zhes pa'i shasa? sgra la/ a tu dang sa'i si la'os/ ring por bsgyur ba dang / b+ha yig thog
<p>38b.6</p>ma can rnams la/ sa rnam bcad dang / a las ha ba la'os/ de ur bsgyur ba sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/ ! su btsAH legs pa'i ngag /su ba tsa sau/ au su ba tsa saH dzasra he su ba tsaH si su ba tsa saM/ amra su ba tsa sau/ au su ba tsa saH shasra su ba tsa sA/ TA su ba tso b+h+yAM/ su ba tso
<p>38b.7</p>b+hiH su ba tsa s+su/ supra sogs so/ ! /de bzhin du/ tsan+d+ra zla ba masra zhes pa'i sgra la'ang cho ga thams cad de dang 'dra'o/ ! /sa yig mtha' can u sha nasra zhes pa'i sgra la khyad par yod de/ dang po'i gcig tshig la/ u sha na sAM/ u sha nas rnams kyi'o/ /u shi nasra/ pu ru
<p>39a</p>
<p>39a.1</p>daM shasra/ a ne hasra rnams las pha rol gyi d+hi ma yin pa'i si ni DA zhes par 'gyur te/ si DA/ Dita la Ti phyis pas/ ! u sha nA/ si gnyis tshig dang mang tshig la/ u sha na sau/ au u sha na saH dzasra/ bod tshig la u sha nasra kyi na mtha' dang
<p>39a.2</p>a mtha' dang sa mtha' gsum du bshad pa ltar/ he u sha nanra/ si/ he u sha ni/ si he u sha naH si he u sha na sau/ au he u sha na saH pa sangs/ gnyis pa sogs la/ u sha na saM/ amra u sha na sau/ au u sha na saH shasra u sha na sA/ TA u sha no b+h+yAM/ u sha no b+hiH 
<p>39a.3</p>u sha nas+su supra sogs so/ ! /sa yig mtha' can a dasra zhes pa'i sgra la'ang mi 'dra ba yod de/ dang po'i gcig tshig la/ dzasra t+yadra sogs kyi si sogs la Ti a 'os Ti a ra bsgyur bas/ a da si zhes gnas pa la/ sau saH si la sa'o/ /a dasra kyi da ni si pha rol
<p>39a.4</p>la sa yig tu 'gyur te/ da sa/ se rau/ si'i au'o/ a dasra las pha rol gyi si ni au zhes par 'gyur te/ si au/ o dang au la au/ ! /a sau/ 'di gnyis tshig la/ a da au zhes gnas pa la/ da'i ma 'os/ dam/ au dang au la au/ mA dUH ma las u
<p>39a.5</p>dag go/ /a dasra kyi da 'gyur ba'i ma'i srog gi dbyangs ni thung ngu yin na u thung dang ring po yin na U ring du 'gyur te/ au/ U/ a mU/ mang tshig la/ si sarba sogs la dzasra Ir bsgyur/ a i la e 'os/ a me zhes gnas pa la/ e rI ba hu twe/ mang po nyid la e'i
<p>39a.6</p>I'o/ /a dasra la mang tshig byin pa'i e ni i nyid du 'gyur te/ a mI/ dzasra/ de bzhin du bsgrubs pas/ gnyis pa gsum la/ au amuM/ amra a mU/ au a mUnra/ shasa? gsum pa'i gcig tshig la/ ma la u dang / bud med ma yin pa la TA nA'os/ a mu nA/ TA gnyis
<p>39a.7</p>tshig la/ sngon la b+ha la A 'os Ar+ra bsgyur/ de nas/ ma las u 'os bsgrubs pas/ a mU b+h+yAM/ mang tshig la/ b+hisra b+hisra ru bsgyur/ b+hasra mang po nyid la e ru bsgyur/ mang po nyid la e'i I 'os/ a mI b+hiH bzhi pa gsum la/ a muSh+mai/ nge a mU b+h+yAM/ 
<p>39b</p>
<p>39b.1</p>a mI b+h+yaH lnga pa gsum la/ a muSh+mAtra/ nga si a mU b+h+yAM/ a mI b+h+yaH drug pa'i gcig tshig la/ a mu Sh+ya/ ngasa? gnyis tshig la/ sngon la osra la'os/ a e/ e ay+ra/ de nas/ ma la u 'os bsgrubs pas/ a mu yoH osa? mang tshig la/ a mI ShAM/ Amra bdun pa
<p>39b.2</p>gsum la/ a mu Sh+minra/ ngi a mu yoH osra a mI Shu/ supra ! a dasra kyi lus 'gyur gzhan ni/ a da saHkaHs+yA di bats+tsa/ mtshungs pa la a dasra las ka ste si sogs bzhin no/ /a dasra kyi sgra las mtshungs pa'am spyi'i sgra la 'jug pa la/ ga rkyen du 'gyur la de la yang si
<p>39b.3</p>sogs kyi cho ga rnams 'jug ste/ Ti a/ dra mra/ mra la u byas pas/ a mu ka zhes 'grub pa la sarba sogs kyi bya ba rnams byas pas/ ! a mu kaH si a mu kau/ au a mu ke/ dzasra a mu kaM/ amra a mu kau/ au a mu kAnra/ shasra a mu ke na/ TA a mu kA b+h+yAM/ a mu
<p>39b.4</p>kaiH b+hisa? a mu ka smai/ nge a mu kA b+h+yAM/ a mu de b+h+yaH a mu ka smAtra/ nga si a mu kA b+h+yAM/ a mu ke b+h+yaH a mu ka s+ya/ ngasa? a mu ka yoH osra che ga mo/ a mu ke ShAM/ a mu ka sminra/ a mu ka yoH a mu ke Shu/ i ti swar swa sti byA ka ra Na s+ya sU trAd+d+ha san+tAHpul+liM gAHsa mAp+tAH zhes
<p>39b.5</p>pa brda sprod pa dbyangs can gyi mdo las ha sa'i mtha' las skyes pa'i rtags rnams rdzogs so// ! //de nas ha sa'i mtha' las bud med kyi rtags rnams bshad par bya ste/ de la ha yig mtha' can u pa nahra'i sgra las/ dang po'i gcig tshig la/ ha no d+haHnahra'i d+ha'o/ /nahra'i
<p>39b.6</p>ha yig ni ra sa'i yi ge pha rol dang / tshig mtha' las kyang d+ha yig tu 'gyur te/ hra d+h+ra/ gnas med pa sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/ ! u pa natra/ si u pa nadra/ si gnyis tshig dang mang tshig la/ u pa na hau/ au u pa na haH dzasa? bod tshig la/ he u pa natra/ si he u pa nadra/ 
<p>39b.7</p>gnyis pa gsum la/ u pa na haM/ amra u pa na hau/ au u pa na haH shasa? gsum pa gsum la/ u pa na hA/ TA upa nye bar 'ching ste lham sgrog /nad+b+h+yAM/ u pa nad+b+hiH bzhi pa gsum la/ u pa na he/ nge u pa na d+b+h+yAM/ u pa na d+b+h+yaH lnga pa gsum la/ u pa na haH nga si u pa na hauH 
<p>40a</p>
<p>40a.1</p>u pa na d+b+h+yAMH drug pa gsum la/ u pa na haH ngasra u pa na hoH osra u pa na hAM Amra bdun pa gsum la/ u pa na hi/ ngi u pa na hauH osra u pa na t+su/ ! ba yig mtha' can dibra ces pa'i sgra las/ dang po'i gcig tshig la/ dibra au sau/ dibra kyi si la au/ 
<p>40a.2</p>dibra kyi bra yig ni si pha rol la au yig tu 'gyur te/ ! d+yauH si gnyis tshig dang mang tshig la/ di bau/ au di baH dzasra bod tshig gsum la/ he d+yauH si he di bau/ au he di baH dzasra gnyis pa'i gcig tshig la/ /bA mi/ amra la A yang na'o/ /dibra kyi bra yig ni rnam dbyed
<p>40a.3</p>a mra pha rol la A yig tu yang na 'gyur te/ amra d+yaM/ 'od gsal/ di baM/ a mra gnyis tshig dang mang tshig la/ dibau/ au di baH shasa? gsum pa'i gcig tshig la/ dibA/ TA gnyis tshig dang mang tshig la/ ur se/ ras la u 'o/ /di bra kyi yig nir sa'i yi ge pha rol la u yig tu
<p>40a.4</p>'gyur te/ d+yub+h+yAM/ d+yu b+hiH de bzhin du bsgrubs pas/ di be/ nge d+yu b+h+yAM/ d+yu b+h+yaH d+yu Shu sogs so/ ! /ra yig mtha' can tsa tur+ra gyi sgra la/ /de yang grangs kyi skabs mang tshig bdun po kho na las mi 'jug pas/ dang po'i mang tshig la/ tri tsa tu roHs+t+ri yAM ti sr-i tsa ta sr-I batra/ tri tsa
<p>40a.5</p>tur+ra dag gi bud med la ti sr-i tsa ta sr-i r-I bzhin no/ /tr-i dang tsa tur+ra gyi sgra dag ni bud med du brjod pa la rim pa bzhin/ ti sr-i dang tsa ta sr-i zhes par 'gyur zhing mtha'i r-i yig de yang r-I yig bzhin du ste ar+ra du mi bsgyur ba r+ra yig tu 'gyur te/ ! tsa ta sraH dzasra de bzhin du bsgrubs pas/ 
<p>40a.6</p>gnyis pa gsum bzhi pa lnga pa rnams kyi mang tshig la/ tsa ta sraH shasra tsa ta sr-i b+hiH tsa ta sr-i b+h+yaH tsa ta sr-i b+h+yaH drug pa'i mang tshig la/ sdeb sbyor las nAM la ring por sgyur ba dang mi sgyur ba 'dam kha can du bshad pas/ tsa ta sr-i NAM/ bzhi/ tsa ta srI NAM/ bdun pa'i mang tshig la/ tsa ta
<p>40a.7</p>sr-i Shu/ ! r+ra yig mtha' can gir+ra zhes pa'i sgra la dang po'i gcig tshig la/ y+borbi ha se/ ra ba dag la i u dag gi ha sa la'o/ /r+ra yig dang bra yig dag gi u pa d+hA'i dbyings kyi i yig dang u yig dag ni ha sa'i yi ge pha rol la ring por 'gyur te/ /i ring por bsgyur bas/ ! 
<p>40b</p>
<p>40b.1</p>gIH si gnyis tshig dang mang tshig la/ gi rau/ au gi raH dzasa? bod tshig la/ he gIH si gnyis pa gsum la/ gi raM/ amra gi rau/ au gi raH shasa? gsum pa'i gcig tshig la/ gi rA/ TA gnyis tshig dang mang tshig la/ r+ra bdag la i u dag gi ha sa la'os/ 
<p>40b.2</p>smra ba/ gIr+b+h+yAM/ gIr+b+hiH sogs dang bdun pa'i mang tshig la/ gIr+Shu/ ! de bzhin du pur+ra d+hur+ra sogs kyang de kho na dang 'dra'o/ ! /d+ha yig mtha' can sa mid+h+ra zhes pa'i sgra la/ gnas med pa dang / dbyangs kyis dman pa sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/ ! sa mitra/ si 
<p>40b.3</p>sa midra/ si sa mi d+hau/ au sa mi d+haH dzasra he sa mitra/ si sa mi d+haM/ amra gang ba/ gnya' brag gam sa gzhi/ sa mi d+hau/ au sa mi d+haH shasra sa mi d+hA/ TA sa mi d+b+h+yAM/ si mid+b+hiH sa mit+su/ sogs so/ ! /b+h+ra yig mtha' can ka kub+h+ra zhes pa'i sgra la'ang gnas yam shing / 
<p>40b.4</p>med pa sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/ ! ka kupra/ si ka kupra/ si ka ku ba b+hau/ au ka ku b+haH dzasa? he ka kupra/ si he ka kupra/ si ka ku b+haM/ amra ka ku b+hau/ au ka ku b+haH shasra ka ku b+hA/ ka ku b+b+h+yAM/ ka ku b+b+hiH ka ku t+su sogs so/ ! /da yig mtha' can t+yadra la sogs
<p>40b.5</p>pa la t+yadra sogs kyi si sogs la Ti a/ yul phyogs bud med la a la Apra byin nas t+yA zhes grub pa la/ mo rtags sarba sogs kyi cho gas bsgrubs pas/ ! s+yA/ t+ye/ t+yAH t+yAM/ t+ye/ t+yAH t+ya yA/ t+yA b+h+yAM/ t+yA b+h+riH t+ya s+yai/ t+yA b+h+yAM/ t+yA b+h+yaH t+ya s+yAH t+ya yoH osra t+yA sAM/ 
<p>40b.6</p>t+ya s+yaM/ ngi t+ya yoH osra t+yA su/ supra ! de bzhin du/ tadra la/ sA/ te/ tAH sogs dang / ! e tadra la/ e ShA/ e te/ e tAH sogs dang / ! yadra de si au dzasra amra au shasra TA la/ yA/ ya/ nga yAH sogs so/ nga si ! /mra yig mtha' can kimra zhes
<p>40b.7</p>pa'i sgra la yang de rnams dang 'dra bar bsgrubs pas/ ! kA/ si ci de si au dzasra ke/ au kAH dzasa? kAM/ amra ke/ au 'di si au dzasra kAH shasra sogs so/ ! mra yig mtha' can i damra gyi sgra la dang po'i gang si au dzasra gcig tshig la/ i yaM s+t+ri yAM/ bud med la i yamra
<p>41a</p>
<p>41a.1</p>mo/ /i damra zhes pa'i sgra ni bud med du brjod pa la si dang lhan cig par i yaM zhes par 'gyur te/ ! i yaM/ si/ gnyis tshig sogs la t+yadra sogs kyis Tia dang / da'i ma/ bud med la a la Apra byin pas/ i mA zhes grub pa la mo rtags
<p>41a.2</p>t+yadra sogs kyi cho gas bsgrubs pas/ i me/ au i mAH dzasra i mAM/ amra i me/ au i mAH shasra a na yA/ TA A b+h+yAM/ A b+hiH a s+yai/ nge A b+h+yAM/ A b+h+yaH a s+yAH nga si A b+h+yAM/ A b+h+yaH a s+yAH ngasra a na yoH osra A sAM/ Amra a s+yAM/ ngi a na yoH osra A su/ supra 
<p>41a.3</p>! tsa yig mtha' can twats+ra zhes pa'i sgra la/ tsu'i ku dang / gnas med pa sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/ ! si twakra/ pags pa/ twagra/ si twa tsau/ au twa tsaH dzasra he twagra/ si twa tsa/ amra twa tsau/ au twa tsa/ shasra twa tsA/ TA twa g+b+h+yAM/ twa g+b+hiH sogs dang bdun pa'i mang tshig la/ 
<p>41a.4</p>twa k+Shu/ ! de bzhin du rits+ra dang bAts+ra sogs kyang 'di kho na dang 'dra ba nyid do/ ! /pa yig mtha' can apra ces pa'i sgra la mang tshig kho na las mi 'jug pas/ dang po'i mang tshig la/ sa? nra apra sogs kyis ring por bsgyur bas/ ! A paH bod tshig la/ he A paH dzasa? 
<p>41a.5</p>gnyis pa'i mang tshig /rig byed gyi tshig rkang / drag/ la/ a paH shasa? gsum pa'i mang tshig la/ b+hi da pAM/ apra rnams kyi b+ha la dra'o/ /apra la sogs pa rnams kyi pra yig ni b+ha yig pha rol la dra yig tu 'gyur te/ ad+b+hiH de chu dzasra bzhin du bzhi pa lnga pa drug pa bdun pa
<p>41a.6</p>rnams kyi mang tshig la/ ad+b+h+yaH ad+b+h+yaH a pAM/ Amra ap+su/ ! sha yig mtha' can dishra zhes pa'i sgra las/ dang po'i gcig tshig la/ di shAM kaH dishra rnams kyi ka'o/ /dishra/ dr-ishra/ spr-ishra mr-ishra/ sa dr-i shra rnams kyi mtha' ni ra sa'i yi ge pha rol na yod pa dang tshig mtha'
<p>41a.7</p>las kyang ka yig tu 'gyur te/ shra kra/ gnas med pa dang / dz+h+ra b+h+ra la dza ba sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/ ! phyogs dikra/ si digra si di shau/ au di shaH dzasra he dikra si he digra/ si phyogs/ lta ba/ reg pa/ na rdzu/ mnyam par lta ba/ di shaM/ amra di shau/ au di shaH shasra dishA/ TA dig+b+h+yAM/ dig+b+hiH 
<p>41b</p>
<p>41b.1</p>sogs dang bdun pa'i mang tshig la/ dik+Shu/ supra ! Sha yig mtha' can twiSh+ra zhes pa'i sgra la/ Sha'i Da'o dang gnas med pa sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/ ! twiD+ra/ si twiT+ra/ si twiShau/ au twi ShaH dzasra he twiD+ra/ si he twi T+ra/ si twi ShaM/ amra twa Shau/ au twi ShaH shasra twi ShA/ TA 
<p>41b.2</p>twiD+b+h+yAM/ twiD+b+hiH sogs dang bdun pa'i mang tshig la/ twi k+Shu/ sumra ! Sha yig mtha' can A shiSh+ra zhes pa'i sgra las/ si la ra nyid dang lhag ma ra sa'i yi ge rnams la/ doSh+ra rnams kyi ra 'os r+ra dang / Sha'i Da'os D+rar sgyur ba 'dam kha can du byas/ ra'i
<p>41b.3</p>phyogs la/ sa dzuSh+ra sogs kyis ring por bsgyur bas/ ! A shIH si A shiShau/ au A shi ShaH dzasra he A shIH si A shi ShaM amra A shi Shau/ au A shi ShaH shasra A shi ShA/ TA A shIr+b+h+yAM/ A shrID+b+h+yAM/ A shIr+b+h+yAM/ A shIr+b+hiH sogs dang bdun pa'i mang tshig la/ A
<p>41b.4</p>shIr+Shu/ A shiT+su/ ! sa yig mtha' can a dasra zhes pa'i sgra las/ mdza' ba'am snying nye ba/ si la da sa da/ si au/ lhag ma rnams la t+yadra sogs kyis Ti a/ bud med la a la Apra/ da'i ma/ ma la u sogs dang / mo rtags sarba sogs kyi cho gas bsgrubs pas/ 
<p>41b.5</p>dang po gsum la/ ! /a sau/ 'di a mU/ au amUH dzasra gnyis pa gsum la/ a mUM/ amra amU/ au a mUH shasra gsum pa gsum la/ a mu yA/ TA a mU b+h+yAM/ a mU b+hiH bzhi pa gsum la/ a mu Sh+yai/ nge a mU b+h+yaH lnga pa gsum la/ a
<p>41b.6</p>mu Sh+yAH nga si a mU b+h+yAM/ si a mU b+h+yaH drug pa gsum la/ a mu Sh+yAH ngasra a mu yoH osra a mU ShAM/ Amra bdun pa gsum la/ a mu Sh+yAM/ ngi a mu yoH osra a mU Shu/ supra i ti swa ra swa sti byA ka ra Na s+ya sU trAd+d+ha sAn+ta s+t+rA+e ling+gAt+sa mAp+tAH zhes pa brda sprod pa dbyangs can gyi mdo
<p>41b.7</p>las ha sa'i mtha' las bud med kyi rtags rnams rdzogs so// //de nas ha sa'i mtha' can ma ning gi rtags rnams rab tu bstan par bya ste/ de la ra yig mtha' can bAr+ra zhes pa'i sgra las/ ma ning la si amra 'jig pa dang / au I/ dzasra shasra shi sogs dang / 
<p>42a</p>
<p>42a.1</p>ya mra min pa zhes numra mi ster/ dbyangs kyi dman pa sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/ ! bAH bA rI/ bA ri/ he bAH bAH bA rI/ bA ri/ bA rA/ bAr+b+h+yAM/ bAr+b+hiH bAr+Shu/ sogs so/ ! /ra yig mtha' can tsa tur+ra gyi sgra las/ de yang grangs kyi
<p>42a.2</p>don la mang tshig kho na las mi 'jug cing / tsa tur+ra gyi shi la Amra A ga ma ster ba sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/ ! si au dzasa? si amra au shasa? TA tsa twA ri/ dzasa? he tsa twA ri/ dzasa? tsa twA ri/ shasa? tsa tur+b+hiH tsa tur+b+h+yaH tsa tur+b+h+yaH tsa tu r+NAM/ amra tsa tu r+Shu/ supra !
