<p>42a.3</p>na yig mtha' can a hanra zhes pa'i sgra la/ dang po'i gcig tshig la/ ah+naHsaHa han gyi sa'o/ /a han gyi na yig ni ra sa'i yi ge pha rol tu byung ba dang / bzhi/ tshig mtha' las kyang sra yig tu 'gyur te/ si amra 'jig nra sra/ ! a haH si gnyis tshig la/ 
<p>42a.4</p>au I/ I ngi dag la yang na'os/ u pa d+hA'i a dbyi ba dang mi dbyi ba yang na bar byas pas/ a h+ni/ a a ha nI/ au mang tshig la/ dzasa? shi/ nra'i u pa d+hA'os/ ring por bsgyur bas/ a hA ni/ de bzhin du gnyis pa nyi ma gsum la yang / a
<p>42a.5</p>haH amra a h+nI/ au a ha nI/ au a hA ni/ shasa? gsum pa'i gcig tshig la/ u pa d+hA'i a phyis pas/ a h+nA/ gnyis tshig dang mang tshig la/ a han gyi sa'os/ nra sa?/ sra r+ra dag gi rnam bcad/ a las ha ba la u/ u la o/ a ho b+h+yAM/ a ho b+hiH 
<p>42a.6</p>de bzhin du bzhi pa gsum la/ ah+ne/ nge a ho b+h+yAM/ a ho b+h+yaH lnga pa gsum la/ a h+naH nga si a ho b+h+yAM/ TA a ho b+h+yaH drug pa gsum la/ a h+naH ngasra a h+naH osra ah+nAM/ Amra bdun pa gsum la/ a h+ni/ ngi a ha ni/ ngi a h+noH osra a has+su/ supra ! nra
<p>42a.7</p>yig mtha' can brah+manra zhes pa'i sgra las/ dang po'i gcig tshig la/ na lo paH na dbyi'o/ /brah+manra la sogs pa'i nra yig ni ra sa'i yi ge pha rol dang tshig mtha' las kyang dbyi bar bya ste/ na phyis/ ma ning la si amra 'jig ! tshangs pa/ brah+ma/ si gnyis tshig dang mang
<p>42b</p>
<p>42b.1</p>tshig la/ brah+ma NI/ au brah+mA Ni/ dzasra slar yang / brah+ma/ amra brahra NI/ au brah+mA Ni/ shasa? bod tshig la na mi dbyi bas/ he brah+manra/ si gsum pa gsum la/ brah+ma NA/ TA brah+mab+h+yAM/ brah+mab+hiH bzhi pa gsum la/ brah+ma Ne/ nge brah+ma b+h+yAM/ brah+mab+h+yaH lnga
<p>42b.2</p>pa gsum la/ brah+maNaH nga si brah+mab+h+yAM/ brah+ma b+h+yaH drug pa gsum la/ brah+maNaH ngasra brah+maNoH osra brah+maNAM/ Amra bdun pa gsum la/ brah+maNi/ ngi brah+maNoH osra brah+masu/ supra ! de bzhin du/ tsa rmanra/ karmanra/ barmanra/ sharmanra la sogs pa yang cho ga thams
<p>42b.3</p>cad 'di dang 'dra'o/ ! /nAn+ta da dan+tA tshan+da si ngi sh+yorbA lo pa/ na mtha' atra ngi shi dag gi yang na dbyi ba sdeb sbyor la'o/ /ma ning gi rtags na dang a yig gi mtha' la ngi shi pha rol la/ sdeb sbyor dang rig byed bags pa/ las/ go cha'am gso ba/ ngo mtshar ram skyid pa/ las A ga ma'i na
<p>42b.4</p>ngi shi dang bcas pa dbyi ba dang glo bur ba ma yin pas na mi dbyi bar ngi shi dag dbyi ba dang / spyir btang gi cho ga 'dam kha can du bya ste/ brah+manra la ngi byin pas brah+ma Ni zhes grub pa la rtags mtha'i na mi dbyi bar ngi dbyi ba dang mi dbyi ba yang na bar byas pas/ brah+ma Ni/ brah+manra zhes pa
<p>42b.5</p>lta bu dang / de bzhin du shi la/ sarba dang b+hU ta la dzasa? dang / shasa?/ nge shi/ numra byin pas/ sarbA Ni/ b+hU tA ni zhes pa la/ A ga ma'i nra shi dang bcas pa dbyi ba dang mi dbyi bar yang na bar byas rtags mtha' thung ngur mi 'gyur bas/ sarbA/ dzasa? sarbA Ni/ dzasa? tshangs pa la/ b+hU
<p>42b.6</p>tA/ shasa? b+hU tA ni/ shasa? lta bu'o/ ! /da yig mtha' can t+yad ces pa'i sgra la/ si am 'jig pas Ti ar+ra mi 'gyur la/ rnam dbye gzhan rnams la Ti a ru bsgyur ba sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/ ! t+yadra/ t+yatra/ t+ye/ t+yA ni/ t+yadra/ t+yatra/ t+ye/ au thams cad rnams/ t+yA ni/ shasa? t+ye nA/ TA 
<p>42b.7</p>'byung po rnams la/ t+yA b+h+yAM/ t+yaiH b+hisra t+yasmai/ de t+yA b+h+yAM/ t+ye b+h+yaH t+yA b+h+yAM/ t+ye b+h+yaH t+yas+ya/ ngasra t+ya yoH osra t+ye ShAM/ Amra t+ya sminra/ ngi t+ya yoH omra t+ye Shu/ supra ! de bzhin du bsgrub pas/ tadra/ si tatra/ si nge si si au dzasa? amra amra te/ au tA ni/ dzasa? sogs dang / ! 
<p>43a</p>
<p>43a.1</p>e tadra/ si e tatra/ si e te/ au e tA ni/ dzasa? sogs dang / ! yadra/ gang si yatra si ye/ au yA ni/ dzasa? sogs so/ ! /de ltar du ma yig mtha' can kimra gyi sgra la yang / ! tsi/ kimra/ si ke/ au kA ne/ shasra sogs dang / ! ma yig mtha'
<p>43a.2</p>can i damra la'ang / ! i daM/ si i me/ au i mA ni/ dzasa? i daM/ amra i me/ au i mA ni/ shasra a ne na/ TA A b+h+yAM/ e b+hiH asmai/ nge A b+h+yAM/ e b+h+yaH sogs skyes pa'i skabs bzhin no/ ! /tsa yig mtha' can pra t+yats+ra zhes pa'i sgra la/ si/ amra 'jig / 
<p>43a.3</p>gnas med pa la yang na'o dang / nub au gnyis la/ atsa'i dbyi zhing ring po/ shi la numra/ dz+ha b+ha la dza ba sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/ ! pra t+yakra/ si pri t+yagra/ si pra tI tsI/ o pra t+yany+tsi/ dzasa? pra t+yakra/ amra pra t+yagra/ amra pra tI tsI/ o pra t+yany+tsi/ shasa? pra tI tsA/ TA bra t+ya g+b+h+yAM/ 
<p>43a.4</p>pra t+ya g+b+hiH pra tI tse/ nge pra t+ya k+Shu/ supra sogs so/ ! /tra yig mtha' can dza gatra cas pa'i sgra la'ang gnas med pa sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/ ! nub/ dza gatra/ si dza gadra/ si dza gtI/ au dza gan+ti/ dzasra gnyis pa'ang de dang 'dra/ gsum pa sogs la/ dza ga tA/ dza gad+b+h+yAM/ dza gad+b+hiH 
<p>43a.5</p>dza ga te/ nge dza gat+su/ supra sogs so/ ! /de bzhin du ta yig mtha' can ma hatra kyi sgra la'ang / ! ma hadra/ si ma hatra/ si ma hatI/ au 'gro ba/ ma han+ti/ dzasra gnyis pa gsum yang de dang 'dra/ gsum pa sogs la/ ma hatA/ TA ma had+b+h+yAM/ ma had+b+hiH TA ma ha te
<p>43a.6</p>sogs so/ ! /sa yig mtha' can pa yasra zhes pa'i sgra la'ang / pa yaH si pa ya sI/ au pa yAM si/ dzasra chen po/ gnyis pa gsum yang de dang 'dra/ gsum pa sogs la/ pa ya sA/ TA pa yo b+h+yAM/ pa yo b+hiH pa ya se/ nge pa yas+su sogs so/ ! /de bzhin du/ te
<p>43a.7</p>dzasa?/ gzi brjid/ ba tsasra/ smra ba'am ngag/ la sogs pa yang chu'am 'o ma/ 'di kho na dang 'dra'o/ ! /Sha yig mtha' can ha biSha zhes pa'i sgra la yang / ha sa dang po can rnams la/ doSh+ra rnams kyi ra 'os Sh+ra r+ra ru bsgyur ba sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/ ! sreg rdzas/ ha biH si 
<p>43b</p>
<p>43b.1</p>ha biShI/ o he bIM Shi/ dzasra gnyis pa gsum la yang / ha biH ha bi ShI/ ha biM Shi/ gsum pa sogs la/ ha bi ShA/ ha bi r+b+h+yAM/ ha bi r+b+hiH ha bi She/ nge ha bar+Shu sogs so/ ! /sa yig mtha' can a dasra kyi sgra la/ si amra 'jig pas/ Ti amra mi 'gyur/ lhag ma rnams
<p>43b.2</p>la Ti a dang / da ma/ ma la u sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/ dang po gsum la/ ! 'di a daH si a mu nI/ au a mU ni/ dzasra slar yang gnyis pa gsum la/ a daH amra/ a mu ni/ au a mU ni/ shasra/ gsum pa gsum la/ a mu nA/ TA a mU b+h+yAM/ a mI b+hiH bzhi pa gsum la/ a mu Sh+yai/ 
<p>43b.3</p>a mU b+h+yAM/ a mI b+h+yaH lnga pa gsum la/ a mu Sh+ya te/ a mU b+h+yAM/ a mI b+h+yaH drug pa gsum la/ a mu Sh+ya/ ngasra/ a mu yoH osra/ a mI ShAM/ Amra/ bdun pa gsum la/ a mu Sh+min/ a mu yoH a mI Shu/ i ti swa ra swa sti byA ka ra Na s+ya sU trAd+d+ha sAn+ta na puM sa ka ling+ga sa mAp+tAH zhes pa brda sprod pa dbyangs can kyi mdo las ha sa'i mtha'
<p>43b.4</p>las ma ning gi rtags rnams rdzogs so// //de nas brjod pa'i rtags yuSh+madra asmadra gnyis kyi cho ga rnams bshad par bya ste/ de yang rtags 'di gnyis ni yul pho mo ma ning gsum ka la 'jug cing / gzugs dang cho ga sogs pho mo ma ning gi dbye ba med pas
<p>43b.5</p>brjod pa'i rtags zhes bya ste/ ! dang po'i gcig tshig la/ twa ma haM si nA/ si yis twaM a haM ngo / /yuSh+madra a smadra dag ni rnam dbye dang po'i si pha rol la rim pa bzhin rtags dang rnam dbye lhan cig par twaM dang a haM zhes par 'gyur te/ twaM/ si a haM/ si gnyis tshig la/ yu
<p>43b.6</p>bA bau dwi ba tsa ne/ gnyis tshig la yu ba A ba dag go/ /yuSh+madra dang a smadra dag ni gnyis tshig pha rol la rim pa bzhin yu ba A ba zhes par 'gyur te/ yu ba/ a/ A ba/ au zhes gnas pa la/ A mo/ au A mra'o/ khyod/ nga'am bdag/ yuSh+madra dang a smadra dag
<p>43b.7</p>las pha rol gyi rnam dbye au gnyis ni Amra zhes par 'gyur te/ au yu bAM/ khyod dag /A bAM/ au bdag dag/ mang tshig la/ yU yaM ba yaM dza sA/ dzasra kyis yU yaM ba yaM mo/ yuSh+madra a smadra dag ni dzasra pha rol la rtags dang rnam dbye lhan cig bar yU yaM dang ba yaM zhes par 'gyur
<p>44a</p>
<p>44a.1</p>te/ yU yaM/ ba yaM/ ! gnyis pa'i gcig tshig la/ twan+ma de ka twe/ gcig nyis la twadra madra dag go /yuSh+madra a smadra dag ni rnam dbye gcig tshig rnams pha rol la rim pa bzhin twag mad ces par 'gyur te/ twad/ samra/ mad/ amra/ zhes
<p>44a.2</p>gnas pa la/ A m+s+h+hau/ khyed rnams/ bdag rnams/ amra sa b+hi la A'o/ /yuSh+madra a smadra dag gi Ti ni rnam dbye amra dang sa yig dang po can dang b+hisra rnams pha rol la A yig tu 'gyur te/ twi amra mAM/ amra gnyis tshig gong dang 'dra bas/ yu bAM/ A bAM/ mang tshig
<p>44a.3</p>la t+yad sogs kyi si sogs la Ti a/ shasa? la 'os ring po/ sha so naH shasra kyi na'o/ /yuSh+mad asmad las pha rol gyi shas ni nA ru 'gyur te/ yuSh+mAnra/ shasa? khyad rnams la/ a smanra/ shasra nged rnams la/ ! gsum khyod la/ bdag la/ pa'i gcig tshig la/ gcig khyed dag la/ nged dag la/ nyid la
<p>44a.4</p>zhes pas/ twadra/ A/ madra/ A zhes gnas pa la/ t+yadra sogs kyi si sogs la Ti a/ e TA d+yoH TA ngi dag la e'o/ /yuSh+madra asmadra dag gi TI ni TI dang ngi dag pha rol la e yig tu 'gyur te/ slar yang Ti de e/ e ay+ra ru bsgyur bas/ twa yA/ TA ma yA/ 
<p>44a.5</p>gnyis tshig la/ yu bA b+h+yAM/ A bA b+h+yAM/ mang tshig la/ t+yadra sogs kyi si sogs la Ti a dang / amra sa b+hi la A'os/ ring por bsgyur bas/ yuSh+mA b+hiH ! bzhi pa'i gcig tshig la/ gcig nyid la zhes pas/ twadra/ nge / madra/ khyos kyis/ nged kyis/ 
<p>44a.6</p>TA nge zhes gnas pa la/ khyed dag gis/ nged dag gis/ tu b+h+yAM mra h+yaM da yA/ de yis tu b+h+yaM ma h+yaM ngo / /yuSh+madra dang asmadra dag ni rnam dbye nge pha rol la rim pa bzhin rtags khyed rnams kyis/ dad rnams kyis/ dang rnam dbye lhan cig par tu b+h+yaM dang ma h+yaM zhes par 'gyur te/ tub+h+yaM/ nge ma h+yaM/ nge gnyis
<p>44a.7</p>tshig la/ yu bA b+h+yAM/ khyed dag gi ched du/ nged dag gi ched du/ mang tshig la/ b+h+yasra sh+b+h+yaM/ b+h+yasra sh+b+h+yaM mo/ /yuSh+madra asmadra dag las pha rol gyi rnam dbye bzhi pa'i b+h+yasra ni sh+b+h+yaM zhes par 'gyur zhing sha yig ni b+h+yasra yongs rdzogs sgyur ba dang b+ha yig thog ma'i khyod kyi ched du/ bdag gi ched du/ 
<p>44b</p>
<p>44b.1</p>bya ba rnams 'gog pa'i don te/ t+yadra sogs kyi si sogs la Ti a/ b+h+yasra/ sh+b+h+yaM/ sha phyis pas/ yuSh+ma b+h+yaM/ asma b+h+yaM/ ! lnga pa'i gcig tshig la/ gcig nyid la zhes pas/ twadra/ madra/ ces bsgyur ba la/ t+yadra sogs kyi si sogs la Ti ar bsgyur bas
<p>44b.2</p>twa/ nga si/ ma/ nga si zhes gnas pa la/ nga si b+h+ya sosh+tuH nga si b+h+yasra dag gi sh+tu'o/ yum Sh+ma da dang khyed rnams kyi ched da/ ded rnams kyi ched du/ a smad dag la pha rol gyi rnam dbyed lnga pa'i sid dang b+h+ya dag na g+tu zhes par 'gyur zhing u brjod don dang sha yig ni thams cad 'gyur
<p>44b.3</p>pa'i don te/ twa tA/ gnyis tshig la/ yu bA b+h+yAM/ A bA b+h+yAMH mang tshig la/ b+hasra sh+tur bsgyur ba/ yuSh+matra/ ! drug pa'i gcig tshig la/ gcig nyid la zhes pas/ twadra/ ngasa?/ madra/ ngasa?/ zhes gnas pa la/ ta ba ma ma nga sA/ ngasra kyis ta
<p>44b.4</p>pa ma ma'o/ khyed las/ nged las/ yuSh+madra dang asmadra dag ni rnam dbye ngas pha rol khyed rnams las/ nged rnams las/ la rim pa bzhin rtags dang rnam dbye bcas pa ta ba dang ma ma zhes par 'gyur te/ ta ba/ ngasa?/ ma ma/ ngasra gnyis tshig la/ yu
<p>44b.5</p>ba yoH osa? A ba yoH osa? mang tshig la/ Ti a dang / sarba sogs kyi suT+ra byin pas/ yuSh+ma/ sAM/ asma/ sAM/ zhes gnas pa la/ sA mA kaM/ sAM A kaM ngo / /yuSh+masradra asmasradra dag las pha rol gyi suT+ra dang bcas khyod kyi/ bdag gi/ pa'i Amra ni A kaM zhes
<p>44b.6</p>khyod dag gi/ nged dag gi/ par 'gyur te/ yuSh+mA kaM/ asmA kaM/ ! bdun pa'i gcig tshig la/ gcig nyid la zhes dang / TA ngi zhes pas/ twa yi/ ngi ma yi/ ji gnyis tshig la/ yu ba yoH osra A ba yoH osra mang tshig la/ Ti a/ amra sa b+hi la 'os/ 
<p>44b.7</p>de ring por bsgyur bas/ yuSh+mA su/ khyed rnams la/ nged rnams la/ zhes pa de rnams ni yuSh+madra dag gi sgrub  khyod la/ bdag la/ tshul dngos yin pa/ da khyed dag la/ nged dag la/ ni de las slar yang gzhan du 'gyur ba'i cho ga dang
<p>45a</p>
<p>45a.1</p>gzugs rnams ni/ yuSh+mad sma doHShaSh+ThI tsa tuR+thI dwi tI ya b+hi ste me ban+nau bsna sau/ yuSh+madra asmadra dag la drug pa bzhi pa gnyis pa rnams kyi/ te/ me/ bamra/ nau/ bas/ nasra dag go /yuSh+madra asmadra dag la rnam dbye drug pa bzhi pa gnyis pa rnams kyis
<p>45a.2</p>bsgrubs pa'i/ twAM mAM sogs ni rim pa ltar gcig tshig rnams te me zhes pa dang gnyis tshig rnams/ bamra/ nau/ zhes pa dang / mang tshig rnams/ bsra/ nas/ zhes pa rnams su 'gyur la/ de yang drug pa sogs dngos su bstan pa yin zhing sdeb sbyor sogs
<p>45a.3</p>kyi dgos pa dang 'dod na ni dang po'i twaM a haM nas bdun pa'i yuSh+mA su asma su'i bar thams cad la sgyur du rung ba ni nges pa ste/ dper brjod tshig bcad du brjod na/ swA mI te saH ngasra sa mA ya taHswA mI me sAM bra taM ga taH/ /na ma ste b+ha ga ban+b+hU yo de hi mo nge mok+Sha ma bya yaM/ khyod
<p>45a.4</p>kyi rje de legs par byon gyur tam/ /bdag gi rje bo yang ni da lta byon/ /bcom ldan khyed la gus pas phyag 'tshal lo/ /mi zad thar pa bdag la stsal du gsol/ /swA mI baM sa dza hA sauts+cer+d+r-i Sh+T+wA nau dA na yA tsa nAM/ /rA dzA baM dA s+ya te dA naM dz+nyA naM nau ma d+hu sU da naH/ /gang rgyangs mtho
<p>45a.5</p>de rje bo khyed dag gi/ /sbyin pa'i khrom 'khrugs 'chos pa bdag gis mthong / /rgyal pos khyed dag la ni sbyin pa byin/ /nged dag la yang ye shes sbrang rtsi dgras/ osa?/ de bo ba ma ba tA dwiSh+Nurna ra kAt+nau dza nArda naH/ /b+h+yAM swa mI bo ba ya b+h+h+yAM bAM rA dzA swA mI nau sau dza narda naH/ / 
<p>45a.6</p>khyab 'jug lha yi 'jug pas khyed dag la/ /skye 'gro'i mchod pas nged dag dmyal las sgrol/ /stobs ldan rgyal po khyed cag rnams kyi rje/ /'gro ba'i mchod de nged cag rnams kyi rje/ /au/ na mo bo b+h+ya sra brah+ma bi dz+nye b+h+yo dz+nyA naM nau b+h+yasra di ya tAM d+ha naM/ Amra/ sA naM dA t+paHpra pa sh+yA maHAmra pash+yA
<p>45a.7</p>mo naH shasa? su duH khe na/ /'dud do rnam mkhyen tshangs pa khyod rnams la/ /ye shes nor sbyin bdag cag rnams la stsol/ /dus kun dga' bar khyed rnams rab tu mthong / /bde dang sdug bsngal bdag cag rnams la mthong / b+h+yasra /tA mA mA/ shasra amra gyi twA mA dag go/ / 
<p>45b</p>
<p>45b.1</p>yuSh+madra dang asmadra rnam dbye gnyis pa dang lhan gcig pa'i gzags twaM dang mAM ni 'dod cing dgos pa yod na rim pa bzhin twA dang mA dag tu 'gyur te/ pa sh+yA mi twA ma dA lI D+haM pa sh+yA mA ma da b+he da kaM /khyed la bltas na myos byed kun nas len/ /nged cag la ni myos byed 'jigs
<p>45b.2</p>par mthong / nAdau/ dang po la ma yin no/ /tshig gi dang po na yod pa'i yuSh+madra dang asmadra rnam dbye dang bcas pa rnams ni te me la sogs par 'gyur ba amra ma yin te/ amra dper na/ ta ba ye sha tra bo rA dzan+ma ngasa? ma te s+ya te sha tra paH/ ta ba mi trA Ni yA ni s+surma ma
<p>45b.3</p>mi trA Ni tA n+ya pi/ /ji ltar rgyal po khyod kyi dgra bo rnams/ /de rnams bdag cag gi yang nges par dgra/ /nges par khyed kyi gnyen bshes gang yin pa/ /de rnams bdag cag gi yang gnyen bshes so/ ngasa? /ru dro bi shwe shwa ro de bo yuSh+mAkaM kU la de ba tA/ ngasa? /sa e ba ngasa? 
<p>45b.4</p>b+ha ga ban+nA tho asmA kaM pA pa nA sha naH/ /drag po sna tshogs dbang phyug lha/ /khyed cag rnams kyi rigs kyi lha/ /de 'dir mgon po bcom ldan 'das/ /bdag cag rnams kyi sdig pa 'joms/ /zhes so/ /de bAsmA n+pAhi nr-i ha re Amra biSh+No\u0f85smA trak+Sha sarba dA/ saM b+ho da
<p>45b.5</p>na pa dA da gre na saM b+ha ba ti ba sAd yaH/ /tshig gi thog ma kun tu bod pa la/ /bas la sogs par 'gyur ba ma yin te/ /kye lha mi yi seng+gas bdag skyongs shig /dus kun bdag rnams srungs shig khyab 'jug kye/ /tshig gi dang po bod tshig ma yin na
<p>45b.6</p>bod tshig dang 'brel pa yin kyang bas sogs su 'gyur te/ pA tuM bo nr-i sid+ha su na kha lAM ga la ko Ta yaH/ hi ra N+ya ka shi porbak+ShaHk+She tA sr-ik+ka rmA ru NaH/ /skyongs shig khyed rnams mi yi seng+ge yis/ /sen mo'i gshol gyi rtse mos 'drob skyong bu/ /gser can gyi ni lto ba'i
<p>45b.7</p>ngos bral ba'i/ /khrag gi 'dam rdzab 'char ka'i dmar po 'dzin/ /tsA di b+hi sh+tsa/ tsa la sogs pa rnams kyis kyang ngo / /ca la sogs pa ste/ tsa/ bA/ a ha/ e ba/ e baM rnams dang sbyor ba la yang te la sogs par 'gyur ba ma yin te/ ta ba tsa ma ma tsa mai trI
<p>46a</p>
<p>46a.1</p>tsan+d+ra le khe ba bar+b+ha te/ /khrod dang bdag gi byams 'dris ni/ /zla ba yar gyi ngo ltar 'phel/ /i ti swa ra swasti byA ka ra Na s+ya sU trAd+YuSh+ma da sma dwi d+ha yas+sa mAp+tAH zhes pa brda sprod pa dbyangs can gyi mdo las yuSh+madra a smadra kyi cho ga rnams rdzogs
<p>46a.2</p>so// //de nas mi zad pa'i sde rnams brjod par bya ste/ tsA dirni pA taH tsa la sogs pa ni pA ta'o/ /ming gcig gis don du ma ston pa tsa la sogs pa rnams la mi zad pa'am ni pA ta ste nges tshig ces zer la tsa la sogs pa ni/ tsa/ bA/ yang na'am 'dra ba/ a ha/ 
<p>46a.3</p>e ba/ e baM/ nU naM/ nges pa/ pr-i thakra/ bi nA/ nA nA/ swa sti/ a sti/ do ShA/ nak+ta/ mr-iShA/ mith+yA/ mi thasa?/ a tha/ a tho/ h+yasa?/ shwasa?/ uts+tsaisra/ nI tsaisa?/ swar+ra/ an+tar+ra/ pra ta ra/ pu nar+ra/ dang ngam yang kyang / tshig gi kha skong smra ba/ 
<p>46a.4</p>'di 'am ces nges pa/ bzhin rnams mtshungs pa/ so so'am tha dad/ spangs pa/ sna tshogs/ bde legs/ yod pa/ mtshan mo'am mun nag/ brdzun/ gsang ba'am 'dres pa/ de nas bkra shis/ bar mtshams med dam phyis nas/ song nyin/ mtho ba/ dma' ba/ mtho ris/ bar mtshams/ zhogs pa/ slar ram bskyar ba/ b+hU yasra/ a ho/ 
<p>46a.5</p>switra/ utra/ sa ha/ r-i te/ an+ta re Na/ an+tar+ra/ na masra/ a laM/ kr-i taM/ a/ mA/ no/ nA bzhi dgag tshig dang / i Shatra/ ki la/ kha lu/ bai/ hi/ A rAtra/ b+h+r-i shaM/ r-i taM/ sA kaM/ sA r+d+haM/ sadra/ tadra ces pa la sogs pa'i mang po/ ngo mtshar/ 
<p>46a.6</p>rnam rtog/ mtho ba'am de ring / bcas/ spangs pa/ bar stongs/ 'dud pa'am phyag/ rgyan/ byed pa/ tshogs rnams ni pA ta zhes brjod par chung ngu / gtam/ tshig rgyan/ spangs pa/ rgyu/ thag ring thung gnyis ka la 'jug/ phul byung / bden pa/ thams cad dam mthun pa/ bya'o/ ! /gzhan yang rnam dbye'i don can gyi
<p>46a.7</p>rkyen sbyar ba dang rtags rnam dbye dang bcas pa gzugs 'gyur ba'i ni pA ta yang yod de/ tasminra zhes pa ta tra/ de la/ ya sminra zhes pa/ ya tra/ gang la kasminra zhes pa/ ku tra dang / ci la/ ku ha dang / ci la/ kwa/ ci la/ yang ta sminra zhes sogs dus dang 'brel pa la/ ta dA/ de la/ 
<p>46b</p>
<p>46b.1</p>ya dA/ e ka dA/ a n+ya dA/ ka dA/ sogs dang / rnam dbye gsum pa rab tu byed pa ston byed/ ta na zhes pa/ ta thA/ de bzhin du/ ya thA/ ka thaM/ it+thaM/ sogs so/ ! /rnams dbye lnga pa'i don la tasmAtra zhes pa/ ta taH de bzhin du/ ya taH ku taH 
<p>46b.2</p>gang la/ gcig la/ gzhan la/ ci la/ a taH i taH sogs dang / ! rnam dbye thams cad kyi don la tasa? 'jug /des/ cing de yang gtso gang gis/ ci yis/ 'dis/ bo kho na dang gcig pu'i don la 'jug pa shas che la rkyen de de las/ sbyar ba'ang ni gang las/ ci las/ 
<p>46b.3</p>pA ta ste/ sarba sminra zhes pa sarba taH zhes 'di las/ pa lta bu dang / ! gzhan yang / purba sminra zhes pa/ purba sminra zhes pa/ pu rastAtra/ a d+ha ra sminra zhes pa/ a d+hastAtra/ pa ra sminra zhes pa/ pa re Na/ sogs dang / ! dak+Shi Na dang i ta ra la/ a hi zhes pa'i rkyen sbyar na
<p>46b.4</p>yang ni pA ta ste/ dak+Shi thams cad las/ NA hi ba sa n+ti tsaN+Da laH/ ! kimraH sA mA n+ye tsi dA diH kimra las spyi la sngon nam shar/ tsitra la sogs pa'o/ 'og la/ /kimra gyi sgra las spyi'i pha rol la/ don brjod pa la rnam dbye thams cad kyi don la tsitra la sogs pa'i rkyen 'jug
<p>46b.5</p>cing rkyen de dag gi mtha' gdol pa rnams lho phyogs thag ring ba na gnas/ can yang ni pA ta ste/ ka dA tsitra/ kash+tsitra/ kash+tsanra/ kwa tsitra/ kwa tsa na/ ku tra tsitra/ ku ha tsitra/ ku ha tsitra/ sogs so/ /de'i g.yog 'khor dang tshogs 'dus pa'i don la sAtra 'gyur zhing de'i mtha' yang
<p>46b.6</p>ni pA ta ste/ rA dza sAtra/ b+hasma sAtra/ na ra sAtra/ smra ba'i tshig la 'di zhes tshad bzung ba dang / mang po'i nang nas gcig bzung ba'i don la/ U rI/ u ra ri/ u ra rI zhes pa rnams 'jug cing de yang ni pA ta'o/ ! /dus kyi don/ sa d+ya/ sa pa ti/ a d+ya/ de dag/ 
<p>46b.7</p>rgyal po'i g.yog 'khor/ thal ba'i phung po/ mi thams cad/ de ni/ a d+hu nA/ da lta/ i d+ha nA/ da lta/ sAM pra taM/ purbe d+yuH sang pa re d+yuH gzhes dgus sogs/ ya di/ dus gang la/ yar+hi/ ta di/ de'i dus su/ tar+hi/ de ma thag/ A shu/ mgyogs po/ shI
<p>47a</p>
<p>47a.1</p>g+h+raM/ dz+ha Ti ti/ drur+Na sogs kyang ni pA ta'o/ ! /pra di ru pa sargaH pra la sogs pa nyer bsgyur ro/ /pra/ pa rA/ a pa/ samra/ a nu/ a ba/ rjes su/ a ba/ ni ra/ dur/ bi/ kun/ Ad/ ni/ a d+hi/ a bi/ yang / shin tu/ a ti/ phul byung / su/ 
<p>47a.2</p>utra/ a b+hi/ pra ti/ mgyogs po/ pa ri/ /u pa sogs 'di rnams la nyer bsgyur zhes bya ste de rnams rab/ mchog/ bral ba'am gnod pa/ rdzogs pa kun tu yang dag/ kun tu nges pa/ nges pa 'gag pa/ ngan pa dka' ba/ rnam/ brapa/ log/ par/ nges pa/ bral ba/ lhag par/ kyang / ngang / bzang / mdzes/ bde/ rab/ legs/ shin tu/ 
<p>47a.3</p>shin tu/ mngon par/ so so/ tha dang / yongs su/ nye bar phan pa/ dang phyogs mtshungs A bi yang ngo / /prag+d+hA toH byings la thog ma'o/ /nyer bsgyur rnams byings la thog mar sbyor ba shas che'o/ /ta da bya yaM/ de rnams mi zad pa'o/ /gong du bsten pa'i tsa la sogs pa
<p>47a.4</p>nas pra la sogs pa'i bar de rnams la ni pA ta 'am mi zad pa zhes zer ro/ ! /k+tAd+yan+taM tsa/ k+t+wA la sog pa'i mtha' rnams kyang ngo / /'og nas 'byung ba'i rkyen k+t+wA dang tu munra la sogs pa mang po zhig gi mtha' can yang mi zad pa ste/ kr-i twA/ kartuM/ sogs so/ /a bya yA
<p>47a.5</p>dwi b+hak+terlukra/ mi zad pa las rnam dbye rnams 'jig go/ /rig byed dang tshig phrad kyi sgrub pa 'ga' zhig yod srid kyi gzhan du mi zad pa'i rtags las pha rol gyi rnam dbye thams cad 'jig go/ /smras pa/ sa dr-i shaM tri Shu ling+ge Shu sarbA byas nas/ byed pa'i don du'am byed pa la/ su
<p>47a.6</p>tsa bi b+hak+ti Shu/ /ba tsa ne Shu tsa sarbe Shu yan+na bye ti ta da byaM yaM/ /rtags gsum la ni mnyam par mtshungs/ /rnam dbye thams cad la yang ngo / /tshig rnams thams cad la yang ste/ /dbyer med gang de mi zad pa'o/ /de ltar rtags gsum la dbye ba med pas mnyam par
<p>47a.7</p>'jug pa dang / don zad pa med pa'am/ gang las kyang 'gyur ba med pas/ mi zad pa'am nges tshig ces bya'o/ /i ti swa ra swa sti byA ka ra Na s+ya sU trA da bya ya se na sa mAp+tAH zhes pa brda sprod pa dbyangs can gyi mdo las mi tsad pa'i sde rnams rdzogs so// //de nas
<p>47b</p>
<p>47b.1</p>bud med du sgrub pa'i rkyen rnams bshad par bya ste/ gong du bud med la a la Apra'o zhes bshad pa ltar/ Apra byin pas/ ! ma yA/ med+hA/ shrad+d+hA/ d+ha rA/ mA lA/ sogs so/ ! a dzA de sh+tsApra/ a dza sogs las kyang Apra'o/ a dza sogs ni/ 
<p>47b.2</p>a dza/ e Da ka/ ko ki la/ shu dra/ ga Ni ka rnams te/ 'di rnams la'ang Apra 'gyur nor can ma'am sgyu ma can ma/ dad can ma/ 'dzin ma/ phreng rgyud mkhan ma/ zhing 'di rnams Apra mtha' can ni dus rtag tu mo rtags kho na la 'jug pa'i dgos pa ste/ 
<p>47b.3</p>ri/ lug/ khu byug/ byis pa/ dmangs/ a dzA/ e Da kA/ ko ki lA/ bA lA/ shudrA/ ga Ni kA/ ! gA pya taH kApra la atra kyi i'o/ /ka n+ya kA sogs ma yin pa'i de phan gyi rkyen ka dngos su gnas pa dang bcas pa'i mo rkyen Apra pha rol la u pa d+hA'i
<p>47b.4</p>atra ni i yig tu 'gyur te/ kA ra ka/ la/ ram/ ma mo/ khu byug mo/ bu mo'am bu mo lo bcu drug ma la 'jug/ dmangs mo/ smad 'tshong ma/ Apra/ kA ri kA/ de bzhin du/ pA Thi kA/ pA tsi kA/ sogs mtha' las so/ /ka n+ya kA sogs ni ir mi 'gyur bar de kha la gnas
<p>47b.5</p>so/ /nye bsgyur a ba dang a pi gnyis kyi a dgos pa yod na dbyi ba dang ha sa'i mtha' la mo rkyen Apra 'jug par drang byed mkhan ma'am tshig le'ur byas pa/ klog pa mo/ 'tshed pa mo/ srong b+ha gu ris bshad pas/ a ba gA h+yaM/ bu mo/ a pi d+hA naM zhes pa la/ ba gA h+yaM/ bi d+hA
<p>47b.6</p>naM zhes pa lta bu dang / ha sa'i mtha' la/ pAts+ra/ bA tsA/ ni shra/ ni shA/ dishra/ di shA/ ! hra swo bA/ thung ngu yang na'o/ /kau kA sogs ma yin pa'i sngon ma'i dbyangs ring po rnams ni ka dang bcas pa'i mo kun tu 'gro/ nor yang / rkyen Apra dang kun tu 'gro/ nor yang / 
<p>47b.7</p>ta rA sogs pha rol la yang na thung ngur 'gyur te/ ngag ma'am smra bam/ g.yog mo/ phyogs ma/ be Ni kA/ lan char can ma/ be NI kA/ rgyun can ma ste chu bo/ na dI kA/ shre ya si ta rA/ dge legs can ma/ shre ya sI ta rA/ ! nu Ni A+opra/ na r-i asro la A+opra'o/ /rtags
<p>48a</p>
<p>48a.1</p>na yig dang r-i yig mtha' can dang rkyen aN gyi mtha' can rnams la mo rkyen Ipra 'gyur te/ daN+Dinu/ zhes pa la/ daN+Di nI/ de bzhin du/ dan+ti nI/ daN+Di nI/ ka rinra/ ka ri NI/ mA linra/ mA li nI/ rA dzanra la Ipra/ rA dzanra gyi u pa d+hA'i
<p>48a.2</p>a dbyi bar bshad pas/ rA dz+nyI/ shwanra/ yu banra/ ma g+ha banra rnams la Ipra shwa la sogs pa'i yang ngo zhes pas ba ur bsgyur bas/ dbyug pa can ma/ shu nI/ yU nI/ se ldan ma/ glang chen ma/ ma g+ha nI/ sogs  phreng ldan mo/ dang r-i mtha' la/ kar+t+r-i zhes pa la
<p>48a.3</p>Ipra/ kar+t+rI/ de bzhin  rgyal mo/ du/ ha r+t+rI/ sogs dang / yang r-i yig mtha' can yin kyang ma tr-i/ swa sr-i sogs la ni mo rkyen mi 'jug ste gdod khyi mo/ lang tsho ma/ ma nas mo rtags su/ brgya byin ma/ grub pas so/ /a Na gyi mtha' la au pa ga ba zhes pa
<p>48a.4</p>la/ Ipra/ byed pa mo/ ! ya s+ya lo paH i a dag rkun chung mo/ gi dbyi'o/ /rtags mtha'i i dang a dag /ma/ smyug po/ ni rkyen dbyangs dang ya yig pha rol la dbyi bar bya ste a phyis pas/ au pa ga bI/ sogs so/ /Sh+T+b+r-itaH Sh+ra T+ra u r-itra las so/ /Sha yig dang T+ra yig dang
<p>48a.5</p>u yig dang ritra rjes 'brel can rnams las mo rkyen Ipra 'gyur te/ dper brjod rim pa ltar/ ba rA kI/ Sha ku ru za rI/ Ta go ma tI/ u b+ha ba n+tI/ r-i pa tsa n+tI/ r-i pa Tha n+tI/ r-i ! na dA deH nad la  nye ba'i ba lang gi be'u mo/ na da la sogs pa rnams las kyang
<p>48a.6</p>mo rkyen Ipra 'gyur te/ na dI/ gau rI/ gau ta mI/ tsa tuR+thI/ pany+tsa mI/ pi ban+tI/ mdzes ma/ sgra ngan du spyod ma/ chu'i nang chan/ skal ldan ma/ g.yes ma/ klog ma/ zhes so/ ! /in+d+rA de rA NIpra tsa/ in+d+ra sogs las A nIpra yang ngo / /in+d+ra la sogs pa rnams las
<p>48a.7</p>mo rkyen A nIpra 'gyur rgyun can ma sta chu bo/ dkar mo/ bzhi pa ma/ lnga pa ma/ 'thung ma/ te/ in+d+rA NI/ dbang mo/ b+ha pA nI/ skal ldan ma/ ru drA NI/ drag mo/ sogs so/ ! /mnyam par bsre ba'i don dang 'brel ba'i Ipra pha rol la rtags mtha' yon tan du 'gyur bar bshad
<p>48b</p>
<p>48b.1</p>pas dper na/ be dA nAM tra ya NAM/ zhes pa la gsal byed rnam dbye dang bcas pa phyis Ipra byin yon tan byas pas/ tra yI/ go pA li ka sogs ma yin pa'i pho dang ldan pa la yang mo rkyen Ipra 'jug par bshad de/ ga Na kI/ sogs so/ /go
<p>48b.2</p>pA la ka sogs la rig byed rnams gsum rnams/ ni Apra sbyar bas/ go pA li kA/ zhes sogs mang po yod do/ ! /dzA te ra rig byed gsum ye pa d+hAtra/ u pa d+hA ya ma yin pa las rigs la'o/ /u pa d+hA ya yig ma yin dmangs rigs kyi chung ma/ rtsis mkhan gyi chung ma/ 
<p>48b.3</p>pa las rigs dang 'brel ba'i bud med brjod pa la mo rkyen ba lang skyong ba'i chung ma'am phyugs rdzi ma/ Ipra 'gyur te/ me ShI/ ma hi ShI/ shU ka rI/ haM sI/ kU k+ku TI/ brAh+ma NI/ sogs mtha' yas so/ ! /u pa d+hA ya yig yin na Apra sbyar bas/ k+Sha tri yA/ 
<p>48b.4</p>bai sh+yA sogs so/ ! /na tshod dang po brjod pa dang 'brel ba'i atra mtha' can las mo rkyen Ipra 'gyur bar  'brugamo/ ma he mo/ phag mo/ ngang mo/ khyim bya mo/ bram ze mo/ bshad de/ ku mA rI/ kal b+hI sogs so/ /na tshod dang po brjod pa rgyal rigs mo/ 
<p>48b.5</p>rje rigs mo/ dang 'brel ba'i Ipra mtha' can las mo rkyen Ipra mi 'gyur bas/ Ipra byis pas/ br-id+d+hA/ s+tha bi rA sogs dang / atra mtha' can ma yin na Ipra mi 'gyur bas/ shi shuH sogs so/ /swaM gAM bA/ gzhon nu ma/ lo brgyad ma/ mdzes ma'am bu mo chung ngu / rang lus la yang na'o/ / 
<p>48b.6</p>rang gi lus dang 'brel bar brjod pa la su mU kha sogs la rgan mo/ gnas brtan ma 'am ches rgan mo/ Ipra 'gyur zhing pad+ma ba da na sogs la Idra/ gzhon nu ma/ mi 'gyur yang Apra 'gyur te/ su mU khI/ bzhin mdzes ma/ mr-i gA k+ShI/ ta n+wang+gI/ sogs mtha' yas so/ /yang
<p>48b.7</p>pad+ma ba da na sogs la/ pad+ma ba da nA/ pad+ma'i rkang pa ma/ ka ma lan ya nA/ pad+ma'i mig can ma/ ga l+yA Na ko DA/ gi sha la ya ka rA/ bu mo lo bcu gcig ma'am chu shing sngon po 'dra ba'i lag ldan ma/ mr-i NA la b+hu dzA/ ku ba 'dra ba'i sa'i 'khril shing ring po zhig ste de dang 'dra ba'i la gang ring po ma/ ri dgas mig can ma/ lus phra ma/ su
<p>49a</p>
<p>49a.1</p>ha stA sogs mang po yod do/ ! /kr-ita sogs kyi rkyen k+ti ma yin pa'i i yig rnams kyi mtha' la mo rkyen Ipra yang na 'gyur bar bshad de/ ang+gu lI/ ang+gu liH d+hulI/ d+hu liH a dzI/ a dziH 
<p>49a.2</p>sogs so/ /k+ti'i lag mdzes ma/ rkyen can la Ipra mi 'gyur bas/ kr-i tiH b+hu tiH sogs so/ ! /ai tsa ma n+wA deH ma nu sogs kyi ai yang ngo / /ma nu la mdzub mo/ /sogs pa la mi rkyen Ipra 'gyur zhing Ipra pha
<p>49a.3</p>rol la ma nu sogs kyi mtha'i dbyangs rnams ai yig tu 'gyur ba dang yang na byed pa mo/ 'byor pa mo/ au ru 'gyur te/ ma nu la/ Ipra/ ma nA yI/ ma nA bI/ de bzhin du/ pr-i ShA ka pa zhes pa la/ pri ShA ka pA yI/ pr-i ShA ka pA bI/ 
<p>49a.4</p>sogs so/ ! /pa t+n+ya da yaH pat+n+ya la sogs pa las so/ /pat+n+ya la sogs pa las mo rkyen Ipra 'gyur zhing de yang ni pA taste/ pat+n+ya sogs tshangs pa'i bu ma nu'i chung ma/ la Ipra sbyar bas/ pat+nI/ an+ta rbat+nI/ dbang phyug gi glang ste khyu mchog spre'u/ sa
<p>49a.5</p>khI/ a sa khI/ ar+d+ha dza ra tI/ yu ba tI/ a shi shwI/ rnams so/ pra tI tsA da yaH shab+dA ni pA t+yan+te/ pra tI tsI la sogs pa'i sgra ni ni pA ta'i mtha'o/ /pra tI tsI la sogs pa rnams bud med/ mtha' yas pa'i nang nas nye ba mo/ ni bud med du
<p>49a.6</p>grogs mo/ grogs min mo/ cung zad rgas ba/ lang tsho ba/ phrug gu med de mo gsham/ brjod pa la khrapra kyi mtha' can ni pA ta ste/ pra tI tsI/ u dI tsI/ prA tsI/ a bA tsI/ sogs so/ ! /dA ra zhes pa'i sgra ni yul bud med la 'jug pa yin kyang
<p>49a.7</p>rtags pho rtags kho na yin pas mo rkyen mi 'jug cing rnam dbye rnams kyi yang mang tshig kho na las mi 'jug la cho ga yang pho rtags nub/ byang / shar/ shar lho/ kyi skabs ltar bsgrub pa ste/ bud med rnams/ dA rAH dzasra/ bud med rnam sa la/ dA
<p>49b</p>
<p>49b.1</p>rAnra/ shasa?/ dA raiH b+hisa? dA re b+h+yaH bud med rnams las/ dA rA NAM/ Amra dA re Shu/ supra/ ! /baurgu NAtra/ u las yon tan la yang na'o/ /u yig mtha' can las yon tan brjod pa'i don dang 'brel pa la mo rkyen Ipra yang
<p>49b.2</p>bud med rnams kyis/ bud med rnams kyi ched du/ bud med rnams kyi/ bud med rnams la/ na 'gyur te/ pa T+wI/ pa TuH mr-i dwI/ mr-i duH ta n+wI/ ta nuH r-i dzI/ r-i dzuH 'jam mnyen ma/ sogs so/ ! /u ta UH utra las U'o/ /utra
<p>49b.3</p>mtha' las mo rkyen Upra yang na 'gyur te/ pang+gaH pang+gUH bA mo ruH bA mo rUH/ ! yU nastiH yu  mkhas ma/ 'jam mnyen ma/ lus phra ma/ 'jam klas ma/ ban las ti'o/ /yu ban las ti'o/ /yu ban gyi sgra las mo rkyen ti 'gyur te/ yu ba tiH 
<p>49b.4</p>de ltar mo rtags su grub pa 'di rnams la tshig gong mo/ brla mdzes ma/ tu bsgrub pa'i phyir si sogs rnams ster ba'i cho ga rnams gong bud med kyi rtags tshig tu sgrub pa'i skabs su bshad pa ltar ro/ /i ti swa ra swaste byA ka ra Na lang tsho ma/ 
<p>49b.5</p>s+ya sU trAt+s+ti yaHpra t+ya yAs+sa mAp+tAH zhes pa brda sprod pa dbyangs can gyi mdo las bud med kyi rkyen rnams rdzogs so// ! //de nas rnam dbye rnams kyi don dang 'jug pa'i yul rgyas par ston pa byed pa can kyi le'u'i don rnams bshad
<p>49b.6</p>par bya ste/ li gAraR+thepra tha mA/ rtags kyi don la dang po'o/ /byings las ming du bsgrub pa'i rkyen byin pas byings las yongs su 'gyur ba/ don dang ldan pa'i sgra'i gzugs de la ming ngam/ rtags sam/ sgra zhes bya ste/ rtags de'i
<p>49b.7</p>ngo bo'am don tsam brjod pa'i tshig tu bsgrub pa'i don la rnam dbye dang po gsum 'jug cing / rtags la sogs pa ste bod tshig la yang rnam dbye'i ngo bo ni dang po nyid de/ dper na/ tshangs pa de yod pa'o/ /tat+sang+b+rah+ma/ si/ legs par byed pa legs pa ji tsam/ san+ti
<p>50a</p>
<p>50a.1</p>san+taH ki yan+taH si/ zhes dang / tshigs bcad du brjod na/ ra bi ra bi rA dza te rA dza ro ShAt+ku mA rI ro rU ya te/ /bo b+hU dz+ya te b+hu baM b+hU pA laH prA gAstAM rA ma lak+Sh+ma Nau/ si/ nyi ma bzhin du gsal byed rgyal po ste/ /khros nas ngu
<p>50a.2</p>bar byed do gzhon nu ma/ /sa la longs spyod byed de sa skyong ba/ /sngon dus byung ngo dga' byed mtshan si/ ldan dag /si/ ku mA rAH she ra te swai raM ro rU yan+te tsa nA ra kAH dzasa?/ o/ /ye gI yan+te tsa gI ta dz+nyAH me mr-i yan+ti ru dzA dzi tAH dzasa?/ rang dgar
<p>50a.3</p>nyal bar byed do gzhon nu rnams/ /ngu bar byed do dmyal ba pa rnams kyang / /glu shes rnams ni glu yang len par byed/ /gang yang dzasra/ rgyal ba min rnams 'chi byed nad/ ! /A man+t+re tsa/ bod dzasa?/ dzasa?/ pa la'ang ngo / /mngon du phyogs pa'i don gyi
<p>50a.4</p>bod pa'i tshig la'ang rnam dbye dang po gsum 'gyur te/ dper na/ twAM sa mud+d+ha ra go bin+da pra sI da pa ra me shwa ra/ si/ /ku mA rau swai ra mA sA thA k+Sha ma d+h+waM b+ho ta pa swi naH dzasa?/ khyed la rjes su gzungs shig khyab 'jug kye/ /rab bsil stsol cig mchog gi dbang phyug kye/ / 
<p>50a.5</p>rang 'dod gdan la 'dug cig gzhon nu kye/ /bzod par mdzod cig dka' thub can rnams si/ kye/ ! b+ho saH b+ha gosra/ a g+hosra/ zhes pa'i sgra 'di rnams ni bod pa'i don can tshig phrad can te/ k+Sha ma swa
<p>50a.6</p>b+ho du rA rA d+h+ya b+ha go stu b+h+yaM na mastu te/ /A d+h+wA Sh+wa b+ho ma hA prA dz+nya b+hA ta yA g+ho swa g+ha sma raM/ /bzod par mdzod cig dka' bas skyob pa kye/ /skal ldan khyed la phyag 'tshal bstod par bgyi/ /bshad par mdzod cig shes rab chen po kye/ / 
<p>50a.7</p>bdag b+hosra/ b+ha gosra gi sdig pa choms shig sprug med b+hosra/ kye/ ! /she ShAH a b+hosra/ kaR+Ye kar+t+raM sA d+ha na yordA na pA tre bi sh+le ShA ba d+hau saM ban+d+hA d+hA ra b+ha ba yoH lhag ma rnams/ bya ba'i las/ byed pa pos bsgrubs pa'i thabs/ sbyin pa'i snod/ bye zhing lhung ba/ 'brel ba
<p>50b</p>
<p>50b.1</p>rten du gyur pa'i dngos ngo dag la'o/ /rnam dbye lhag ma gnyis pa la sogs pa rnams ni rim pa ltar bya ba'i las la sogs pa de rnams kyi don la 'jug go/ /smras pa/ karta karma tsa ka ra NaM saM pra dA ta thai ba tsa/ /a pA dA nA d+hi ka ra Na mi t+yA hu kA ra kA ni ShaT+ra/ /byed
<p>50b.2</p>pa po dang las dang byed pa dang / /yang dag rab tu sbyin dang de bzhin 'di/ /nges par sbyin dang lhag par byed pa dang / /byed can drug po 'dir ni bshad par bya/ /de yang rnam dbye bdun las drug pa ni 'brel ba'i don ston byed yin pas byed can du mi 'gro la/ byed can
<p>50b.3</p>drug ni/ /byed po ngo bo tsam brjod pa'i don la dang po/ bya ba'i las kyi don la gnyis pa/ byed pa'i don la gsum pa/ yang dag par rab tu sbyin pa ste de'i ched du yod nges dang 'grub nges pa'i don la bzhi pa/ nges par kun sbyin pa ste de la byung ba'am 'byung bzhin pa'am
<p>50b.4</p>'byung du nges pa'i don la lnga pa/ lhag par byed pa ste chos de la bya ba byed pa'i rtsa ba'i gzhir phya gyur pa'i don la bdun pa rnams 'jug la/ dang po song nas/ ! /gnyis pa las kyi don la yang dbye ba bzhi ste/ bskyed pa'i las dang / 'ong ba'i las dang / 'du byed pa'i las dang / 
<p>50b.5</p>rnam par 'gyur ba'i las dang bzhi ru yod pa las/ las de la zhugs ni zhugs/ zin ni ma zin/ rjes su 'grub ni 'grub nges pa de bskyed pa'i las/ las gang zin cig grub pa de 'ong ba'i las/ sa bon 'debs pa sogs rgyu bsgrub pa dang / de las 'phel ba dang / 
<p>50b.6</p>yon tan dang / skyon dag par byed pa sogs 'du byed pa'i las dang / dus snga ma'i gnas skabs kyi du mtshan nyid btang nas slar gnas skabs gzhan gyi mtshan nyid len pa ni rnam par 'gyur ba'i las te/ rim pa bzhin dper brjod na/ ka TaM amra ka ro ti kA ru ko rU amra paM pa sh+ya ti tsak+Shu
<p>50b.7</p>ShAH /amra/ rA dz+yaM prAb+no ti d+harmiSh+Tha so maM amra su no ti so ma pAH bskyed pa'i las/ rtswa la lhas ma byed do rtswa las mkhan/ /'ong ba'i las/ gzugs la blta bar byas so mig can rnams/ /'du byed pa'i las kyi dpe/ rgyal srid rab tu thob po chos ldan pa/ /rnam par 'gyur ba'i las kyi dpe'o/ /zhi ba bcad
<p>51a</p>
<p>51a.1</p>par byas te zhi ba 'thung / ! /a b+hi taHdang / sarba taHgnyis dang sbyor ba dang / d+hikra tse dang sbyor ba dang / u paR+Yu pa sogs lan gnyis dang gsum du zlos pa dang sbyor ba dang / de las gzhan du yang rnam dbye gnyis pa 'jug pa mthong ste/ a b+he
<p>51a.2</p>to grA maM na dI ba ha ti/ sarba to grA maM ta ra bo dr-i sh+yan+te/ d+hig+de ba dat+taM/ u paR+Yu pa ri pu ro hi taM yA tsa kAHsan+ti/ a d+he\u0f85 d+ho grA amra maM ni d+hiH a d+h+ya d+hi grA amra maM tiR+thaM/ a d+h+ya d+hi byA d+haM amra ga ts+tshan+ti mr-i gAH sa ma yA grA maM amra sha tru ha taH ni ka ShA grA maM amra pha laM prAp+taM/ grong la chu bo mngon pa 'phrogs so/ 
<p>51a.3</p>grong la ljon shing rnams thams cad du mthong ngo / lhas byin la nyes skyon no/ mdun na 'don la slong ba po rnams steng nas steng du 'gyel bar byed do/ grong la 'khris nas 'khris su nor/ grong la rtsa nas rtsa ru babs stegs so/ rngon pa la nye ba nye bar ri dwags rnams 'gro bar byed do/ grong gi nye kor la dgra bsad do/ pra ti grA amra maM
<p>51a.4</p>ya dz+wA naH/ ! kA lA d+h+wa naurnai ran+taR+Ye/ dus dang lam bar mtshams med pa la'o/ /zla ba rer chag med 'di ltar byed ces pa lta bu dus bar mtshams med pa dang 'di nas rgyang grags gcig ri yin zhes pa lta bu lam bar mtshams med pa ste don de gnyis la so so'i grong la lha mchod do/ 
<p>51a.5</p>yang rnam dbye gnyis pa 'jug ste/ mA sa ma d+hI te/ kro shaM parba taH de las gzhan du gnyis pa mi 'jug ste/ mA sa s+ya dwi ra d+hI te/ kro sha s+yai ka de sho parba taH/ ! karta ri pra d+hA no kr-i yA shrA ye sA d+ha ne tsa/ byed pa po gtso bos bya ba nus pa'i sgrub byed la'o/ byed pa
<p>51a.6</p>po gtso bo nyid dang des bya ba byed pa amra zla bar klog go/ rgyang grags la ri bo/ la lhag par phan 'dogs nus par sgrub sla bar zla ba gnyis klog go/ rgyang grags kyi yul gcig ri bo/ byad pa'i don la'ang rnam dbye gsum pa 'jug ste/ dper na/ b+hin+naH sha reN+TA rA meN+TA rA ba No lo ka rA ba NaH/ / 
<p>51a.7</p>ka rA graN+TA bi dIr+No\u0f85 pi ba na raiR+Yu d+h+ya te pu naH/ /'bod grogs 'jig rten du ru 'jug phyed pa/ /byed pa po gtso bo nyid/ dga' byed kyis ni mda' yis phug ste bsad/ bya ba nus pa'i sgrub byed/ slar yang spre'u rnams kyis g.yul bskyed de/ byed pa po gtso bo nyid/ lag pa'i sen mos kyang ni
<p>51b</p>
<p>51b.1</p>gshog par byed/ ! /rnam dbye bzhi pa'i 'jug yul ni/ sbyin pa'i snod la yang dag par sbyin pa byin pa'i byed pa can la rnam dbye bzhi pa 'jug ste/ be da be+e nge bi gAM da dA ti/ tshA trA ya nge ka n+yAM da dA ti/ ! rnam dbye lnga pa'i 'jug yul ni/ de las de 'byung zhes pa lta bu'i 'byung
<p>51b.2</p>bya ba nus pa'i sgrub byed/ khungs la 'jug par ma phyazad/ bye ba dang lhung ba zhes pa/ bya ba ni sngar 'byar ba'am 'dus pa slar zhig pa dang gyes pa lta rig byed rig pa la ba lang sbyin par byed/ bstan bcos pa la bu mo ster bar byed/ bu dang / lhung ba ni g.yo ba las lhung ba dang mi g.yo ba las lhung
<p>51b.3</p>ba la sogs pa'i don gyi byed pa can la rnam dbye lnga pa 'jug ste/ d+hA ba to nga si[ \u0f85] shwa da pa tata/ b+hU b+h+ri to \u0f85ba ta ra ti gang+gA/ ! rnam dbye drug pa'i 'jug yul ni/ 'di ni 'brel pa gtso bor ston pas byed can la mi gtogs la/ gtso bor 'brel pa dang bdag po'i
<p>51b.4</p>don la 'jug cing / 'brel tshig la yang gtso g.yo bzhin pa las lhur ba/ bang rgyug pa'i rta las lhung ngo / mi g.yo ba las lhung ba/ sa 'dzin las 'bab par 'gyur gang gA/ phal gnyis las 'brel yul gtso bo la drug pa 'jug pa shas che la 'brel po phal pa ni 'brel yul de'i khyad par 'byed byed nus
<p>51b.5</p>pa can yin kyang gtso bo phal pa la tshur mi 'brel bas drug pa 'jug pa shas chung ngo / /dper na/ rA dz+haH ngasra sa pu ru Sho dz+nye yaH osra pi tro re tat+p+ra pU dza naM/ /gu rU NAM Amra ba tsa naM pa th+yaM ka bI nAM Amra ra sa ba dwa tsaH /rgyal bo'i skyes bu bcas pa shes bya ste/ /'dir ni rab tu mchod pa pha mes kyi/ /bla
<p>51b.6</p>ma kyi gsung ni lam pas te/ /dbyangs mkhan rnams kyi ro dang ldan pa'i tshig ! /rnam dbye bdun pa'i 'jug yul ni/ gnas dang 'gyur ba'i don sogs la bdun pa 'jug pa las/ gnas la lhag par gnas pa'i don la'ang dbye ba drug ste/ nye bar 'dus pa dang / nye ba can dang / mngon par
<p>51b.7</p>khyab pa dang / yul can dang / lugs srol can dang / nye bar ston pa rnams la bdun pa 'jug ste dper brjod rim pa ltar/ ka Ti ngi she te ku mA ro\u0f85so ba Te ngi gA paHsu she ra te/ /ti supra le Shu bi d+ya te tai laM hri ngi di brah+ma mr-i tam+ba raM/ /gzhon nu 'di dag rtswa lhas la nyal
<p>52a</p>
<p>52a.1</p>bar byed/ /til 'bru rnams la til mar yod pa ste/ /snying la tshangs pa mchog gi bdud rtsi'o/ /yud+d+he ngi san+na h+ya te d+hI ro\u0f85ng+gu l+ya gre ngi ka ri Na sha taM/ /dpa' bo g.yul du go cha gyon par byed/ /glang chen brgya ni sor mo'i rtse la'o/ ! /'gyur ba'i
<p>52a.2</p>don zhes pa ni/ yongs su nye ba can/ mngon par khyab pa/ grub pa'i bya ba zhig la yongs yul can/ su ma grub pa'i bya ba gzhan zhig  ngi yong thang ba'i don  ngi la bdun pa 'jug ste/ b+haR+Sha lugs srol/ ti  ngi de ba tsau ra A yA taH nye bar bstan pa/ ta t+yaM ngi shu mA li ni ngi pa ti to\u0f85rA
<p>52a.3</p>tiH/ ! dus dang 'brel ba la yang bdun pa 'jug ste/ ba san+te ko ki lA swa raM ka ro ta/ ! da ni 'phros don rnams bshad par bya ste/ bi nA sa ha na ma r-i te nir+d+ha ra Na swA myA di b+hish+tsa/ mi byed pa dang / lhan lha char la rkun po 'ong ngo / cig pa dang / phyag 'od 'phreng can shar ba la dgra rdol lo/ 
<p>52a.4</p>'tshal ba dang / bor ba dang / logs su bkar ba dang / dpyid dus su khu byug sgra 'byin no/ rje bo la sogs pa rnams las so/ /mi byed pa la sogs pa rnams dang sbyor ba'i don la rnam dbye gnyis pa la sogs pa rnams 'jug ste/ de yang / mi byed pa la sogs pa rnams dang
<p>52a.5</p>sbyor ba la gnyis pa/ lhan cig pa sogs la gsum pa/ phyag 'tshal ba sogs la bzhi pa/ bor ba sogs la lnga pa/ logs su bkar ba sogs la drug pa/ rje bo dang sbyor ba sogs la drug pa dang bdun pa gnyis ka 'jug ste/ dper brjod rim pa ltar/ bi nA pA
<p>52a.6</p>paM amra sarba pha la ti/ an+ta re NA k+Sha NI kiny+dzi bi te na/ an+ta rA twAM mAM ha riH zhes pa la sogs pa tshig las gzung bar bya'o/ ! /lhan cig pa sogs ni/ ha sa/ sa dr-i sha/ sA kaM/ sAr+d+ha/ sa ma rnams dang sbyor ba la gsum pa ste/ sa ha shi Sh+ye Na TA gu ruH sa dr-i shastsaitro
<p>52a.7</p>sdig pa mi byed pa las 'bras bu thams cad 'byung ngo // mig dag dang bral ba la gson pa la ci/ khyod nyid dang bdag nyid 'phrog byed spangs pa/ mai tre Na/ nA sA kaM na ya nA b+h+yAM sh+la b+h+yA lhan cig/ mnyam pa'am 'dra ba/ mnyam du 'grogs pa/ mnyam pa/ k+Sha NA dan+taH mdzes pa'i so ni mig dang mnyam mo// bla ma dang slob ma lhan cig/ nag zla dang sa ga zla ba 'dra/ sAr+d+ha
<p>52b</p>
<p>52b.1</p>d+ha ni b+hir+b+h+r-i taHsA d+huH sa maM tsan+d+re No TA di ta gu ruH/ ! phyag 'tshal ba sogs ni/ na maH swa sti/ swA hA/ swa d+hAH a laM/ ba ShaTu rnams dang sbyor ba la bzhi pa 'jug ste/ na mo bud+d+hA ya/ nge na mo gu ra be/ nga swa stI rA dz+nye/ nge so mA ya swA hAH pi tri b+h+yaH swa d+hAH a
<p>52b.2</p>b+hisra/ nor can rnams dang logs pa po mnyam du bzung po/ /bla ma dang zla ba mnyam du shar ro/ /a lam+mal+lo ma l+lA ya/ nge pa Sha Din+d+rA ya/ nge ! bor ba sogs ni/ r-i taHdang  sangs rgyas phyag 'tshal lo/ /bla ma la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bde legs su gyur cig rgyal po la/ /zla ba la mchod do/ /pha mes rnams legs par tshim mo/ / 
<p>52b.3</p>a n+ya dag dang sbyor bar byed pa la lnga pa 'jug ste/ r-i to dz+nyA nAn+na muk+toH nga si/ nus so gyad la gyad/ dbang po la bstod do/ /a n+yo gr-i hA dwi hA raH nga si bor ba'am spangs pa/ ! bkar ba sogs ni/ mang po nas nges par bzung ba ste de la yang / bya ba dang / yon tan dang / rigs
<p>52b.4</p>gzhan/ kyi nang nas bkar ba'i dbye bas gsum yod la/ /ye shes spangs pa las grol ba med/ khyim las gzhan du glas so/ /don de rnams dang sbyor ba la drug pa 'jug ste/ kri yA ba rA NAM b+ha ga ba dA rA d+hA kaH shreSh+ThaH yon tan nas bkar ba/ Amra ga bAM kr-iSh+NA sam+pan+na k+ShI rA/ te
<p>52b.5</p>ShAM k+She tri ya shU ra ta maH ! rje bo sogs dang sbyor ba la ni drug pa dang bdun pa 'dam kha can te/ Amra/ ga bAM swA mI ga bA ma d+hi pa tiH supra go Shu swA mI go pa tiH bya ba'i nang nas bkar ba/ Amra/ bcom ldan 'das mchod pa ni bya ba kun las gtso bo'o/ /ba rnams las nag mo 'o ma phun sum tshogs pa'o/ / 
<p>52b.6</p>rigs las bkar ba/ de rnams las rgyal rigs mchog tu dpa'o/ ! 'phros don thor bu ba ni/ kar+t+r-i kAr+Ya yo rak+tA Amra ba lang rnams kyis mnga' bdag go/ dau kr-i tai ShaSh+Thi/ k+ta la sogs pa ma yin pa'i kr-ita kyi byed po dang las dag la drug pa'o/ /k+ta la sogs pa ma yin pa'i
<p>52b.7</p>kr-ita sogs kyi rkyen byed pa po dang las kyi don can dang sbyor ba la rnam dbye drug pa 'jug ste/ byed pa'o/ /byA sa ngasra su kr-i tiH rgyal bas byas pa'o/ /b+hA ra ta ngas+ya shra ba NaM/ b+hAr ta la thos pa byed/ sma ra tau tsa kaR+Ye ShaSh+Thi/ dran pa'i las la'ang drug pa'o/ /dran pa'i las dang 'brel pa'i don la
<p>53a</p>
<p>53a.1</p>drug pa 'jug cing / gnyis pa'ang 'jug ste/ mA tuHsma ra ti/ rgyu dang sbyor ba la gsum pa dang lnga pa yang 'jug par bshad de/ a ni t+yaHshab+daHkr-i ta ka twe no/ a ni t+yaHshab+daHkr-i ta ka twAtra/ nga si/ ! b+ha ya he tau tsa pany+tsa mI/ 
<p>53a.2</p>'jigs pa'i rgyu la'ang lnga pa'o/ /'jigs pa'i rgyu dang sbyor ba'i don la ngasa? ma dran no/ amra/ 'ang lnga pa 'jug ste/ tsaurA dI b+he ti/ byA g+h+rAt+t+ra s+ya ti/ biR+Yat+pA tAts+tsa ki taH ! /ShaMSh+Thi he tu pra yo ge/ rgyu dang rab tu spyor mi rtag pa'i sgra ni byas pa las so/ ba la drug pa'o/ /rgyu
<p>53a.3</p>dang rab tu sbyor ba'i don la drug pa 'jug ste/ ka s+ya he toH i yaM ka n+yA/ it+thaM b+hA be+e tr-i tI ya/ 'di 'drar yod  nga si/ TA/ chos rkun las 'jigs so/ nga si stag las skrag go/ nga si/ thog babs pa las lus 'phar ro/ pa la gsum pa'o/ /'di dang 'di 'dra'o zhes pa lta bu 'dra ba'i
<p>53a.4</p>don brjod pa la rnam dbye gsum pa 'gyur te/ ngasa?/ bu mo 'di gang la ster rgyu yin/ shaSh+yiM pu tre Na pa sh+ya ti/ saM sA ra ma sA ra Na pa sh+ya ti/ ! ye nAM ga bi kA raH gang gi lus kyi rnam 'gyur la'o/ /gang la'ang lus kyi rnam 'gyur gyi mtshan nyid brjod pa'i don la gsum
<p>53a.5</p>pa 'gyur te/ ak+Sha NA kA NaH ba de na khany+dzaH kar+Ne Na pa d+hi raH ! dza ni  bu dang 'dra bar slob ma la lha/ 'khor ba chu shing dang 'dra bar lta'am 'khor ba la snying po med par lta/ gartuHpra kr-i tiH skyed par byed pa'i rang bzhin la'o/ /rgyu gang gi 'bras bu skyed par byed pa'i rgyu de la
<p>53a.6</p>skyed par byed pa'i TA/ mig zhar ba/ rkang pa 'theng po/ TA/ rna ba 'on pa/ rang bzhin zhes bya la de'i don la rnam dbye lnga pa 'gyur te/ yasmrat+p+ra dzA dzA yan+te tang+b+rah+me ti/ ! A dA ngi yo ge pany+tsa mI/ AdA la sogs pa sbyor ba la lnga pa'o/ /nyer bsgyur Ad la sogs pa mtshams 'dzin pa'i
<p>53a.7</p>don du sbyor ba la rnam dbye lnga pa 'jug ste/ A pa Ta li pu trAng+b+r-i Sh+To de baH/ nga si/ ba Ta yi pu tra tshun lha char 'bebs so/ ! /de'i don la  nga si/ gang la skye rgu rnams skyed par byed pa de ni tshangs pa 'di'o/ /bzhi pa 'jug nga /ra bshad de/ de yang de'i don zhes pa don shin tu bzang ba sgrub na myur du
<p>53b</p>
<p>53b.1</p>'grub nges pa zhig la zer te/ dper na/ saM ya mA ya shrU taM d+han+te na ro d+harmA tsho ya saM ya maM/ /d+harmaMmo k+Shu ngeya me d+hA bI d+ha naM dA nA la b+huk+ta ya/ /sdom brtson ched du thos pa 'dzin par byed/ /mi dag sdom brtson chos kyi ched du ste/ /blo dang ldan pa thar ba'i ched du chos/ /sbyin
<p>53b.2</p>pa'i ched dang zas kyi ched du nor/ ! /krud+d+h+yAdi yo gtsa/ nge / 'khrugs pa la ngi/ sogs pa'i sbyor ba ngi/ la'ang ngo / nge / sems 'khrugs pa dang khros pa la sogs pa'i don dang sbyor ba la'ang rnam dbye bzhi pa 'jug ste/ krU rA nge ya krud+d+h+ya te/ mi trA ya dru h+ya ti/ gu Na ba te
<p>53b.3</p>a sU ya te/ ! kyapra phyis pa la'ang rnam dbye lnga pa 'jug par bshad pas/ harmyAt+p+re te/ zhes te khang bzang gi steng du 'dzegs nas phyogs su lta ba'i don no/ /de bzhin du/ A sa nAt+p+re k+Sha ti/ zhes te khyos pa las 'khrug go/ nge/ grogs bshes la 'khu bar byed/ nge/ 
<p>53b.4</p>yon tan ldan pa la bsngags pa mi byed do/ gdan la 'dug nas lta ba'i don/ ! /dgos kyapra/ nga si/ khang bzang las lta bar byed do/ pa las byung ba'i las la sbyor ba la'ang bdun pa 'jug gdan las lha'o/ kyapra/ nga si/ par bshad de/ dper na/ tsarma Ni ngi dwi pi ni han+ti yo r+han+ti kuny+dza raM/ bA le
<p>53b.5</p>Shu supra tsa ma rI han+ti sim+ni puSh+ka la kA ha taH/ /lpags pa'i ched du stag ni gsod par byed/ /mche ba dag gi ched du glang chen gsod/ /rnga ma rnams la g.yag ni gsod par byed/ /gla rtsi'i ched du gsod do dri ldan pa/ ! /de'i nang na yod pa la yang bdun pa 'jug ste/ ta rke ngi tsa tu raH ! ShaSh+ThI
<p>53b.6</p>sap+ta myau tsA nA da re/ ngi/ supra ma gus pa la drug pa dang bdun pa dag go/ /ma gus pa ste ngag la mi nyan pa'i don la rnam dbye drug pa dang bdun pa gang rung 'jug ste/ ba hU nAM kro sha tAM ga tash+tso raH amra ba hu Sh+wa sA d+hu Shu supra ba dat+s+wa supra pi swa ya mAR+Yo ya tog ge pa'i nang na dpyod ldan yod/ ti sA d+hu
<p>53b.7</p>marga Na/ supra ba hu Shu sU d+hu Shu ni bA ra yat+s+wa supra pi swa ya ma nAR+Yo yAt+ya sA d+hu mArge Na/ legs pa mang po rnams kyis 'gog par byed kyang mi shes pa rang nyid lam mi bde ba la 'gro'o/ /Amra/ mang po rnams kyi ca co rnams las rkun ma gros sa/ supra/ ngan pa mang po rnams kyis smras kyang mkhas pa rang nyid lam bde ba la song ngo / /mA tA pi tro osra
<p>54a</p>
<p>54a.1</p>ru toH pra bra dza ti pu traH/ ! a n+yok+ta pra tha maH gzhan las bshad pa'i dang po'o/ /don tsam dang byed po ngo bo tsam ma yin kyang kun bshad dang kr-ita sogs kyi sbyor ba gzhan la yang dang po 'jug pa yod de/ g+ho TaH si kri ya te/ paTaH si/ kAR+YaH ! tshan+da
<p>54a.2</p>si s+yA diH sdeb sbyor las ni si sogs thams cad du'o/ /rig byed dang sdeb sbyor las ni ngo bo tsam dang las lta bu don re re la'ang rnam dbye thams cad 'jug pa dang / gcig tshig la bum pa'i bya ba byed/ gos kyi las ka byed/ mang tshig la gcig tshig
<p>54a.3</p>dang gnyis tshig sbyor ba dang / gnyis tshig la gcig tshig dang mang tshig sbyor ba sogs gcig tu ma nges pa sna tshogs yod de/ da d+hi dzu ho ti/ da d+h+nA dzu ho ti/ pu man+tu brAh+ma Naspa tiH pa tiH zhes mang tshig gi don la
<p>54a.4</p>gcig tshig byung ba lta bu'o/ /i ti swa ra swasti byA ka ra Na l+ya sUtAt+kA ra ka pra kri yA sa mAp+tAH/ zhes pa brda sprod pa dbyangs can kyi mdo las byed pa can gyi rab tu byed pa rnams rdzogs so// si/ zho sbyin sreg byed/ TA/ bram ze'i bdag po rnams gtsang sbra byed do// si/ //de nas tshig sdud kyi
<p>54a.5</p>cho ga rnams bshad par bya ste/ de yang rnam dbye sogs rab tu bkram pa'i tshig gi sbyor ba rnams nyung ngur bsdus te brjod pa ni tshig sdud ces bya'o/ ! /sa mA sash+tsA n+waye nA maM/ ming rnams kyi phan tshun bsdu ba yang ngo / /don 'gal ba ma yin pa'i ming tshig tu grub pa gnyis sam
<p>54a.6</p>gsum la sogs pa bsgrigs pa'i phrad dang rnam dbye sogs bsdus pas tshig phan tshun ma 'brel ba rnams gcig tu 'brel zhing tshig spyor kyi don thams cad ma tshang ba med par rdzogs shing tshig nyung la don rgyas pa brjod bde ba de ni tshig sdud kyi dgos pa yin no/ /yang
<p>54a.7</p>chu'i me zhes sam de ni dka' thub can gyi chung ma zhes pa lta bu don 'gal ba rnams la ni tshig sdud kyi bya ba mi 'jug go ! /sa tsa Sha D+wi d+haH de yang drug tu dbye'o/ /tshig sdud de la yang dbye ba drug tu yod de/ mi zad par gyur pa dang / de'i skyes bu dang / zlas dbye
<p>54b</p>
<p>54b.1</p>dang / 'bru mang po dang / las 'dzin dang / phyogs gnyis pa'i bsdu ba rnams yin la/ de rnams las kyang / tshig snga phyi gnyis las snga ma gtso bor gyur pa mi zad pa'i bsdu ba/ tshig phyi ma'i don gtso bor gyur pa phyogs gnyis pa dang de'i skyes bu'i bsdu ba/ tshig
<p>54b.2</p>snga phyi'i brjod bya la gtso phal med pa zlas dbye dang / las 'dzin kyi bsdu ba/ dngos su brjod pa'i tshig de gtso bor mi 'gyur bar de dang 'brel ba'i don gzhan zhig gtso bor gyur pa 'bru mang po'i bsdu ba yin zhing / tshig sdud de rnams kyi nang nas gtso bor gyur pa stobs
<p>54b.3</p>dang ldan pa ni zlas dbye dang las 'dzin gnyis yin no/ /de ltar tshig sdud drug las dang po mi zad par gyur pa'i bsdu ba ni/ s+t+rI'i sgra la rnam dbye gnyis pa'i amra sbyar/ de'i rjes su a d+hi kr-i t+ya b+ha ba ti zhes pa bris pas/ s+t+ri ya ma d+hi kr-i t+ya b+ha ba ti/ zhes pa 'di
<p>54b.4</p>la tshig spyor ram ngag ste/ bA kya'am/ bi gra haHzer la tshig sdud byed pa'i gzhi yin no/ ! /pUrba\u0f85bya ye\u0f85bya yI b+ha ba/ mi zad pa snga ma ni mi zad par gyur pa'o/ /mi zad pa'i rtags gcig sngon na yod pa de la mi zad pa'i bsdu ba zhes bya zhing tshig sbyor gyi bud med bya ba lhag por yod pa'o/ / 
<p>54b.5</p>skabs mi zad pa'i rtags de dbus mthar yod kyang bsdu ba byed tshe sngon du 'jog pa ni tshig phrad nges tshig gi sgrub pa zhes bya ste/ a d+hi sngon du bzhag /a d+hi s+t+rI yamra kr-i t+ya b+ha ba ti zhes pa byung ste a d+hi sngon du bzhag pas mi zad pa'i bsdu ba yin la/ ! sa mA sa pra t+ya ya yoH 
<p>54b.6</p>bsdu ba dang rkyen dag la'o/ /tshig sdud kyi bya ba la 'jug pa dang de phan kyi rkyen sogs la rnam dbye'i rkyen rnams dang tshig gi phrad rjes 'brel la sogs pa rnams dbyi bar bya ste/ rnam dbye rjes 'brel dang bcas pa phyis pas/ a d+hi s+t+rI zhes gnas pa la de ltar rnam dbye
<p>54b.7</p>rjes 'brel dang bcas pa phyis pas tshig sdud kyi ming thogs shing / de la yang tshig tu bsgrub pa'i phyir si la sogs pa'i rnam dbye rnams ster dgos te mtshon byed du si byin/ ! /sa na puM sa kaM/ de ni ma ning ngo / /mi zad pa sngon na yod cing mi zad pa'i bsdu ba byas pa de ni
<p>55a</p>
<p>55a.1</p>rnam pa kun tu ma ning gi rtags su 'gyur te/ ma ning la thung ngu 'os/ thung ngur bsgyur bas/ a d+hi s+t+ri/ si/ ! a bya yi b+hA bAtra /mi zad par gyur pa las so/ /mi zad pa'i bsdu ba byas pa'i mi zad par gyur pa de las pha rol gyi rnam dbye thams cad 'jig cing rnam 'gyur
<p>55a.2</p>sogs bya ba gang yang med pas si 'jig /de'i rjes su don gsal bar byed pa'i tshig gr-i ha kAR+YaM zhes pa bzhag pas/ a d+hi st-i gr-i ha kAR+YaM/ tshig sbyor dang cho ga rnams de bzhin du byas pas/ rA ya ma ti krAn+taM/ zhes pa'i don la/ a ti ri ku laM/ nau nA pa ma ti krAn+taM/ 
<p>55a.3</p>zhes pa'i don la/ a ti nu dza laM/ ! ya thA sA dr-i sh+ye/ mtshungs pa ma yin pa la ya thA'o/ /dngos po du bud med khyim gyi bya ba las lhag por yod do/ ma bya ba mi mtshungs kyang rai/ amra/ ches cher 'byor pa dang ldan pa/ ches cher 'byor pa dang ldan pa'i rigs/ amra/ gru shin tu non pa/ 
<p>55a.4</p>tshig gcig tu sbyor gru shin tu lci bas chur nub la khad/ ba mi 'gal ba'i don ston par byed pa la mi zad pa'i nang tshan ya thA zhes pa'i sgra 'jug ste/ shak+ti ma na ti kra mya ka ro ti/ zhes pa'i tshig sbyor la rnam dbye rjes 'brel dang bcas pa phyis a na ti dang don gcig pa'i ya thA sngon du
<p>55a.5</p>bzhag pas/ ya thA shak+ti/ ! de bzhin du/ kum+b+ha s+ya sa mI pe zhes pa la rnam dbye rjes 'brel dang bcas pa phyis sa mI pa'i don nyer bsgyur nus pa dang ci 'tsham par rim pas gyis shig /u pa sngon du bzhag /u pa kum+b+ha/ si zhes gnas pa la/ ! A to\u0f85ma nA taH atra
<p>55a.6</p>las Atra ma yin pa'i nus pa ji lta ba/ bum pa'i 'khris sa'o/ amra'o/ /tshig sdud byas pas mi zad par gyur pa las spyir btang rnam dbye thams cad 'jig par bshad kyang de'i dmigs bsal atra mtha' can la Atra ma yin pa ste rnam dbye lnga pa'i nga si ma gtogs rnam dbye
<p>55a.7</p>thams cad amra du 'gyur te/ si amra/ amra shasra zhes pas a phyis mra nga ro/ /don gsal byed rim par sbyar bas/ u pa kum+b+haM brta te/ nye ba'i bum pa 'dug go/ de bzhin du rnam dbye gnyis pa la/ u pa kum+b+haM pa sh+yaH nye ba'i bum pa ltos/ ! bA TA d+yoH TA ngi dag
<p>55b</p>
<p>55b.1</p>yang na'o/ /mi zad par gyur pa'i atra mtha' las pha rol gyi rnam dbye TA ngi dag ni amra du yang na 'gyur te/ gsum pa la/ u pa kum+b+haM kr-i taM/ u pa kum+b+haM de hi/ bzhi pa la/ u pa kum+b+hi de hi/ lnga pa la A ta ma yin pa zhes pas amra du mi 'gyur/ u pa kum+b+hA
<p>55b.2</p>dA na ya/ drug pa la/ u pa kum+b+haM de sha/ bdun pa la/ u pa kum+b+haM ni d+he hi/ u pa kum+b+he ni d+he hi/ ! a ba d+ha ra NArde yA ba ti/ logs nye ba'i bum pas khyed do/ /su bkar ba'i don nye ba'i bum pa'i ched du byin cig/ la yA batra yang ngo / amra /mang po'i nang nas ji ltar 'os pa'i
<p>55b.3</p>nye ba'i bum pa las long zhig/ rigs nye ba'i bum pa'i 'jog sa'o/ gcig logs su bkar ba'i don brjod pa dang 'brel ba'i yA batra ces pa'i sgra yang mi zad pa'i bsdu bar 'gyur te/ yA dzasa? ban+t+ya man+t+ra Ni dzasa? ta ban+to dzasa? brAh+ma NA Amra nAM A man+t+ra ya swe ti/ zhes pa'i tshig sbyor
<p>55b.4</p>la rnam dbye rjes 'brel dang bcas pa phyis/ yA pa da man+t+ra/ zhes pa la si de amra/ don gsal byed A m+t+ra ya swe ti sbyar bas/ yA ba da man+t+ra mA man+t+ra ya swe ti/ de bzhin du/ mak+Shi kA nA snod rnams ji tsam pa'i bram ze de tsam rnams 'dir bos shig/ ma b+ha baH zhes pa la
<p>55b.5</p>rnam dbye phyis/ a b+ha ba'i don nyer bsgyur nir+ra sngon du bzhag pas/ nirma k+Shi kaM brta te/ ! gnyis pa de'i skyes bu'i bsdu ba ni/ snod rnams ji tsam pa'i 'dir bos shig /a mA dau tat+pu ru ShaH amra sha sbrang rnams mi 'byung ngo / la sogs pa de'i skyes bu'i 'o/ AT si/ rnam dbye
<p>55b.6</p>dang po gsum la de'i skyes bu'i tshig sdud mi 'jug cing amra sogs sha sbrang rnams mi 'byung ngo / te rnam dbye gnyis pa'i amra nas bdun pa'i supra kyi bar gyi rnam dbye rnams gang rung zhig tshig snga ma'i mtha' na  nge  yod pa pha rol tshig gzhan dang sbyor ba la rnam dbye sogs phyis pa de ni
<p>55b.7</p>de'i skyes bu'i bsdu ba zhes bya ste/ dper na/ gra  amra maM prap+taH grong la thob bo/ /zhes pa'i tshig sbyor la rnam dbye phyis pas/ gra ma prap+taH grong la thib po/ /de bzhin du/ dA tre TA Na ts+tshin+naM/ zor bas gcod/ dA tra ts+tshin+naM/ yU pA nge ya dA ru/ ka ba'i ched kyi shing / yU pa dA ru/ b+h+yasra br-i ke b+h+yo b+ha
<p>56a</p>
<p>56a.1</p>yaM/ pr-i ka b+ha yaM/ rA dz+haHpu ru Sha/ rA dza pu ru ShaH a k+SheShu shauN+DaH ak+Sha shauN+DaH/ ! skabs la lar amra la sogs pa'i mtha' can gyi tshig de bsdu ba byas nas slar phyi mar spo ba yang yod de/ ag+nau ngi A hi taH zhes pa la rnam dbye phyis snga phyi brjes
<p>56a.2</p>pas/ A hi tAg+niH spyang gi las 'jigs so/ /ngas/ rgyal po'i skyes bu 'am rgyal bu'i mi sna/ supra/ sho ka cho lo mkhan/ de bzhin du/ purbaM amra b+hU taH b+hU ta parbaH ! yang bsdu ba'i skabs 'dir tshig gcig tu byed pa'i tshe tshig snga ma na Nar 'gyur me la 'bul ba'i sreg rdzas/ ba'i rgyu mtshan can las pha rol
<p>56a.3</p>me la 'bul ba'i sreg rdzas/ gyi tshig phyi ma na Nar 'gyur ba yang yod de/ sha rA NAM ba naM/ Amra/ zhes pa la/ sha ra ba NaM/ de bzhin du/ amra  sngon nas byung ba'am sngon nas yod pa/ A mrA NAM amra ba naM/ A mrA pa NaM/ ! pA na s+ya bAH pA na'i yang na'o/ /tshig gcig tu bsdus pa'i snga ma na Nar 'gyur ba'i
<p>56a.4</p>rgyu mtshan can las pha rol gyi pA na'i na yig ni Na yig tu yang na 'gyur Amra/ te/ mda'i nags/ su rA yAHbA naM/ zhes pa la/ su rA pA Ni/ su rA pA naM/ ! na nyi/ nanya/ Ama? Amra'i nags/ la'o/ /dgag pa'i sgra nanya sngon du 'jog pa de yang de'i skyes bu'i bsdu ba zhes bya'o/ ! /nA/ 
<p>56a.5</p>na a'o/ /tshig sdud kyi bya ba la 'jug pa na nA ka sogs ma yin pa'i dgag pa'i sgra nanya ni a yig tu 'gyur te/ btung ba bcud dang ldan pa ste chang / na brAh+ma NaH zhes pa la/ a brAh+ma Na/ de bzhin du/ d+harmaM bi ru d+d+haH zhes pa la/ a d+harmaM/ gra ha Na s+yA b+ha baH a gra ha NaM/ 
<p>56a.6</p>sogs so/ ! /a na swa re/ dbyangs la ana'o/ / tshig sdud la dgag pa'i nanya sngon du 'jog pa'i tshig de'i thog ma'i yi ge de dbyangs yin na nany+ra ni/ zam zem yin pa/ anra zhes par 'gyur te/ a shwA da n+yaH zhes  chos 'joms pa la a n+ya kyi don nany+ra  gza' 'dzin mi 'byung / sngon du
<p>56a.7</p>bzhag /de anra du bsgyur bas/ a na shwa/ rta ma yin nam rta las gzhan/ ! gsum pa zlas dbye'i bsdu ba ni/ tsAr+the dwan+d+wa dang gi don la zlas dbye'o/ /las gnyis la bya ba gcig 'jug pa la phan nga si/ rta las gzhan/ tshun mi 'gal ba lta bu'i dang gi don gyi bsdu ba ni zlas dbye'i
<p>56b</p>
<p>56b.1</p>bsdu ba ste/ de la yang spyir bsdu ba dang / bral ba dang gi don dang / sbyor ba dang bral ba dang gi don dang / gcig gcig sbyor ba dang gi don dang / kun tu sdud pa dang gi don dang bzhir dbye ba las/ byed po gcig gi bla ma'i bstod pa dang dbang phyug gi bstod pa dus gcig tu
<p>56b.2</p>'don zhes pa lta bu dus gcig tu sgrub mi nus pa 'du ba dang bral ba dang / byed po gcig gi grong nas bsod snyoms bslangs nas 'ong ba dang ba lang 'tsho zhing 'ong ba lta bu las su bya ba de gnyis phyogs gcig na yod srid kyang sbyor bas bya ba de gcig tu sgrub mi nus pa sbyor ba dang bral ba ste
<p>56b.3</p>don de gnyis la ni bya byed stong pas zlas dbye'i bsdu ba mi 'jug la/ gcig gcig sbyor ba dang kun tu sdud pa ste phyi ma gnyis ni bya byed gang yang nus pa'i phyir zlas dbye'i tshig sdud 'jug pa'i yul yin no/ ! /yang zlas dbye la gtso bo dang dbyangs nyung ba dang i yig dang u yig dang r-i yig
<p>56b.4</p>gi mtha' can dag dang por 'jog pa tshig phrad kyi sgrub par bshad pas/ de yang bsdu bar bya ba'i yul gyi tshig rnams las don gtso phal yod na gtso bo dang / dbyangs mang nyung yod na nyung ba dang / i yig dang u yig dang r-i yig gi mtha' can yin pa sogs ni sngon du 'jog pa tshig
<p>56b.5</p>phrad kyi sgrub pa ste/ dper na/ rA dzA tsa pu ru Sha si sh+tsa/ zhes pa'i tshig spyor la rnam dbye phrad dang bcas pa phyis pas/ rA dza pu ru Shau/ de bzhin du/ pa Tush+tsa gup+tash+tsa/ pa Tu gup+tau/ ag+ni sh+tsa mA ru tash+tsa/ ag+ni mA tu tau/ b+ho k+tA tsa b+ho kyash+tsa/ b+hak+t+r-i b+ho kyau/ s+t+rI tsi
<p>56b.6</p>pu ru Shash+tsa/ si s+t+rI bu ru Shau/ rgyal po dang skyes bu yang / si/ d+ha bash+tsa kha dI rash+tsi/ d+ha ba kha dI rau/ ! /yang zlas dbye'i bsdu bal tshig /gtso bo sngon ma/ rgyal po skyes bu dag/ mkhas pa dang sbas pa yang / yu yig thog ma/ mkhas pa sbas pa dag /me dang rlung yang / a thog ma/ me rlung dag /longs spyod pa po dang longs spyod yang / r-i thog ma/ longs spyod longs su spyod pa po/ 
<p>56b.7</p>bud med dang skyes pa yang / I thog ma/ skyes pa bud med dag /shug pa dang seng ldeng yang / dbyangs nyung ba thog ma/ shug pa seng ldeng dag /dang po de lta'i ming yin na ring por 'gyur bar bshad de/ in+d+ra sh+tsa si br-i haspa ti sh+tsa/ si dbang po dang phur bu yang / zhes pa la rnam dbye sogs phyis lha'i ming sngon ma ring po/ in+d+rA br-i ha spa
<p>57a</p>
<p>57a.1</p>tiH ! yang asni la sogs pa'i pha rol gyi so ma la sogs pa'i sa yig dang sha yig ni Sha yig tu 'gyur bar bshad de/ ag+hish+tsa si so mash+tsa/ si zhes pa'i don la rnam dbye sogs phyis sngon ma ring po sa Shar bsgyur bas/ ag+nI Sho mau/ de rnams ni gcig
<p>57a.2</p>gcig sbyor ba ste de dang dbang po phur ba dag /de 'brel can du sbyor ba yin pas rnam dbye rnams kyi gnyis tshig 'jug pa shas che'o/ ! /yang kun tu sdud pa las me lha dang zla ba yang / gcig dang ldan par 'byung ba la yang na'o zhes bshad pas/ kun sdud kyi skabs me lha zla ba dag /'dir gcig gi don
<p>57a.3</p>dang ldan pa yin pas gcig tshig kho na sbyor ba dang dngos po mang po yod pas mang tshig sbyor ba yang na bar bya ste/ sha shA dzasa? sh+tsa ku dzasra shAsh+tsa pA la shAsh+tsa dzasa?/ zhes pa'i tshig sbyor la rnam dbye sogs phyis/ mthar gcig tshig dang mang tshig yang na bar byas pas/ sha sha
<p>57a.4</p>ku sha pA la shAH dzasa?/ ! yang a n+ya la sogs pa'i tshig dang por yod na de la sa ka A ga ma ster bar bshad pas/ a n+ya si ri bong dang ku sha dang pA lang sha dang / sh+tsa a n+ya sh+tsa dzasa? zhes pa'i tshig sbyor la/ rnam dbye sogs phyis sngon ma'i mthar sa byin pas/ a n+yoHn+yaM/ de bzhin ri bong rtswa ku sha shing pA la sha rnams/ 
<p>57a.5</p>du/ pa rash+tsa si pa rash+tsa/ si/ pa raspa sagra raM/ si  ! bzhi pa phyogs gnyis pa'i bsdu ba ni/ e ka twe dI gu dwan+d+wau/ phyogs gzhan dang gzhan yang / gnyis pa dang zlas dbye la gcig nyid do/ /'chad 'gyur phyogs gnyis pa'i bsdu ba dang sngar bshad pa'i zlas gzhan dang gzhan/ dbye'i bsdu ba'i phyogs
<p>57a.6</p>gcig la pha rol dang pa rol/ rnam dbye rnams kyi gcig tshig nyid 'jug pa shas che zhing / bsdu ba de gnyis kyi mtha' yang mang po zhig ma ning gi rtags su 'gyur ro/ ! /saM khyu purbo dwi gu/ grangs thog ma can ni phyogs gnyis pa'o/ /gang la'ang grangs kyi sgra dang 'bral ba las grangs
<p>57a.7</p>kyi sgra de thog mar 'jog cing rnam dbye phrad sogs dbyi ba ni phyogs gnyis pa'i bsdu ba zhes bya'o/ ! /sa mA ha re atra Ipra dwi guH phyogs gnyis pa la mnyam du 'dus pa'i ata la I pa'o/ /phyogs gnyis pa'i tshig sdud kyi skabs 'dir mnyam du 'dus pa'i don can gyi
<p>57b</p>
<p>57b.1</p>bsdu ba'i mtha' ata yin na de mo rtags su byed na Ipra 'gyur te/ da shA nAM grA Amra mA NAM Amra sa mA hAraH zhes pa'i tshig sbyor la rnam dbye rjes 'brel bcas pa phyis/ mthar I sbyar bas/ da sha grA mI/ de bzhin du/ pany+tsAg+na yaH sa ma hri ta/ I/ pany+tsA nAM ga pAM sa mA hA raH pany+tsa guH tra
<p>57b.2</p>yA NAM pa Amra lA Amra nAM sa mA hA raH zhes pa la rnam dbye sogs phyis/ tri pha la zhes pa AT/ grong sde bcu rnams mnyam du 'dus pa'o/ /'di mo rtags su byed na I mi 'jug par Apra ster grong bcu 'dus pa/ /te/ tri pha lA/ dzas/ dzas/ me rnams lnga rnams 'dus pa/ me lnga 'dus pa/ ba lang rnams lnga rnams 'dus pa'o/ ba lang lnga 'dus pa/ 
<p>57b.3</p>'bras bu rnams gsum rnams gcig tu tshogs pa/ ! lnga pa 'bru mang po'i bsdu ba ni/ ba hu br-i hI ra n+yAr+tha/ gzhan gyi don la 'bru mang po'o/ /tshig dngos su brjod pa de'i don gtso bor mi ston par de dang 'brel 'bras bu gsum/ pa'i don gzhan zhig gtso bor ston pa ni 'bru mang po'i bsdu ba zhes bya la/ de
<p>57b.4</p>la yang de ma yin pa'i yon tan can dang / de'i yon tan can gnyis su yod de/ dper brjod rim pa ltar/ ba hu d+ha naM se ya s+ya/ zhes pa'i tshig sbyor la rnam dbye rjes 'brel dang bcas pa phyis pas/ ba hu d+ha naH de bzhin du/ aste d+ha naM ya s+ya/ asti d+ha naH la m+bau kar+Nau ya s+ya/ 
<p>57b.5</p>lam+ba kar+No/ ! 'bru mang po'i bsdu ba la khyad par can gyi tshig ste rnam dbye bdun nga 'i mtha' can ni tshig phrad las sngon du si gang gi nor mang po/ 'jog par bshad de/ bi she Sha NaM au lo hi te nge ak+Shi NI ya s+ya/ de ma yin pa'i yon tan/ nor mang po can/ gang gi nor yod pa/ de ma yin pa'i yon tan/ nor yod pa/ au/ au/ gang gi rna ba ring po dag / 
<p>57b.6</p>de'i yon tan can/ rna ba ring po dag/ zhes pa'i don la/ lo hi tAk+ShiH de bzhin du/ gr-i he ngi ku sha laM si ya s+ya/ gr-i he ku sha laH ! nen+d+wA di b+h+yash+tsa/ in+du la sogs pa dag khyad par du dmar ba'i mig gang gi/ au numra/ las kyang ma yin no/ /in+du la sogs pa rnams dang / tsakra pA Ni la sogs pa dag
<p>57b.7</p>las kyang bdun pa'i mtha' can thog mar 'jog pa ma  mig dmar pa/ khyim dge ba gang gi/ si/ khyim dge ba/ yin te/ si/ in+duHshe Sha re ngi ya s+ya/ gang gi gtsug na zla ba/ in+du she Sha raH btsug na zla ba/ sogs dang / de bzhin du/ gang gi lag na 'khor lo/ tsakraM si pA Nau nga ya s+ya/ tsakra pA NiH lag na 'khor lo/ 
<p>58a</p>
<p>58a.1</p>sogs so/ ! /pra dzA me d+ha yo ra suka?/ pra dzA me d+ha dag la a suka'o/ /'bru mang po'i bsdu ba las pra dzA dang me d+ha dag la a suka? A ga ma ster te/ su pra dzAHya s+ya/ dzas  zhes pa'i tshig sbyor la rnam dbye rjes 'brang bcas pa phyis/ mthar a suka? byin/ kra
<p>58a.2</p>gnas don u brjod don/ i a zhes pas rtags mtha'i a phyis/ si byin/ de yang phyis/ a tu sogs kyis u pa d+hA ring pos rnam bcad/ su pra dzAH de bzhin du/ bzang po'i skyes bu gang gi /durme d+hAHya s+ya/ durme d+hAH/ ! d+harmA danra/ darma las anra'o/ /'bru mang po'i bsdu ba
<p>58a.3</p>las d+harma'i sgra la anra rkyen du 'gyur te/ su d+harmo ya si s+ya zhes pa la/ su d+harmA/ ! an+yAr+the/ gzhan gyi don la'o/ /'bru mang po'i bsdu ba las  skye rgu bzang po rnams/ gzhan gyi don te sngar mo  blo gros ngan pa gang gi/ dzas/ a sukrasi/ blo gros ngan pa/ rtags su grub pa'i A I rnams spyir btang la thung
<p>58a.4</p>ngur 'gyur te/ rU pa ba tI b+hA si R+YA si ya s+ya/ zhes legs pa'i chos gang gi/ pa'i  legs pa'i chos/ an si na'i u pa d+hA ring po/ tshig sbyor la/ rnam dbye sogs phyis/ A pa mtha' thung ngur bsgyur/ ! puM ba dwA/ skyes pa bzhin yang na'o/ /'bru mang po'i bsdu ba las spyir btang mo rtags
<p>58a.5</p>rnams thung ngur 'gyur gzugs ldan chung ma gang gi/ bar bshad kyang de'i dmigs bsal tshig dang po Ipra mtha' ni thung rur mi 'gyur ba dang / yang na sngar skyes pa'i rtags kyi skabs bzhin Ipra nyid dbye ba gcig tu ma nges pa sna tshogs yod de/ rU pa ba tI b+hAR+YaH rU pa bad+d+hAR+YaH ka l+yA
<p>58a.6</p>NI si pri yA si ya s+ya/ ka l+yA NI pri yaH ! goH go yi'o/ /'bru mang po'i bsdu ba las kyang go'i sgra ni thung ngur 'gyur te/ dzas/ pany+tsa ga bo dzas ya s+ya/ pany+tsa guH ! 'bru mang po'i bsdu ba las grangs dang su dang byA g+h+ra sngon ma las pha rol gyi tshig gi mtha' gzugs ldan chung ma/ atra yin na dbyi
<p>58a.7</p>bar mdza' mo dge ba can ma gang gi/ mdza' mo dge ba can ma/ bshad de/ rkang pa stong phrag gang gi/ sa ha sraM si pA dAHya s+ya/ zhes pa'i tshig sbyor ba lang lnga po gang gi/ ba lang lnga/ la/ rnam dbye sogs phyis/ grangs sngon ma can las pha rol gyi mtha'i a phyis/ sa ha sra pAtra/ rkang pa stong phrag/de bzhin du/ 
<p>58b</p>
<p>58b.1</p>sho b+ha au nau pA dau au ya s+ya/ zhes pa'i don la/ su pAtra/ byA g+h+rau au i ba pA dau ya s+ya/ byA g+h+ra pAtra/ dwau pA dwau ya s+ya/ dI pAtra/ yang dI pAtra/ ces pa la rnam dbye gnyis pa'i shasra nas bzung dbyangs thog ma can rnams pha rol la u pa d+hA thung ngur 'gyur bar bshad pas/ dwi
<p>58b.2</p>gang gi rkang pa mdzes pa dag/ pa daHshas/ dwi pa T+ra dA sogs/ rkang mdzes/ gang gi rkang pa stag dang 'dra bo/ au/ so/ ! /stag rkang  au  au  rkang gnyis dag gang gi/ rkang gnyis da ni gong du bstan pa'i tshig sdud de rnams la nye bar mkho ba'i rkyen rnams bshad par bya ste/ TA Da kAH Ta a Da ka rnams so/ /tshig sdud
<p>58b.3</p>rnams kyi mthar Ta la rkang gnyis rnams la/ rkang gnyis kyis/ sogs pa rkyen bzhi po 'di rnams 'jug ste/ de yang / Ta kA rastat+bu ru Sho dz+nye yo\u0f85kA ro dwan+d+wa e ba tsa/ Da kA rasta dwa hu brI hau ka kA roHsarba to ma taH/ Ta yig de yi skyes bur shes bya ste/ /a yi yi ge 'di yang zlas dbye la/ / 
<p>58b.4</p>'bru mang po la Da yi yi ge nyid/ /ka yig kun la mnyam par 'jug pa'o/ /de ltar rkyen bzhi po de rnams bsdu ba de rnams bye kyi mtha' la 'jug ste/ ! rkyen dang po Ta  si  yig gi dpe ni/ a tsin+t+ya ma si hi mA si ya s+ya/ zhes pa'i tshig spyor la rnam dbye sogs phyis pas/ a tsin+d+ya
<p>58b.5</p>ma hi manra/ zhes gnas pa la/ rkyen Ta byin/ T+ra rjes 'brel/ na'i yang na 'os Ti phyis/ si byin pas/ a tsin+t+yam hi maH de bzhin du/ ah+naH ngas  sA yaM/ zhes pa la/ gang gi mchod pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ rnam dbye sogs phyis/ la lar amra la sogs pa'i mtha'
<p>58b.6</p>can pha rol tu spo bar bshad pas/ a hanra rjes su spos/ Ta byin/ ! no bA/ na'i yang na'o/ /na mtha' can gyi Ti ni ya dang mchod pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ nyin mo dang mtshan mo/ dbyangs rkyen pha rol la dbye zhing skabs la lar yang na u pa d+hA dbyi bar bya ste/ Ti dang u pa d+hA dbyi ba yang na
<p>58b.7</p>par byas pas/ sA yAt+na buH nyinamatshan/ sA yA haH de bzhin du bsgrubs pas/ at+naH nga si a pa raM/ si/ nyin mo las gzhan no/ a pa rAh+naH a pa rAhaH nyin mo'i gung / ah+naH nga si/ mad+h+yaM/ si/ ma d+h+yA h+naH nyin gung / ma d+h+yAhaH yang la lar snga phyi mi brje ba yang yod de/ ka bI amra nAM rA sa dzA/ si/ snyan ngag mkhan gyi rgyal po/ / 
<p>59a</p>
<p>59a.1</p>zhes pa la/ rnam dbye sogs phyis/ snga phyi mi bsgyur Ta byin pas/ ka bI rA dzaH si/ skabs 'di'i rkyen Ta la ni Ta 'gro ba'i cho ga mtha' gcig tu 'jug pa ni ma yin no/ /mo rtags su byed na Ipra byin pas/ ka bi rA dzI/ ! rkyen gnyis pa a yig gi dpe
<p>59a.2</p>ni/ rA dz+nyA pUH si/ zhes pa'i tshig sbyor la rnam dbye sogs phyis/ rkyen a byin pas/ rA dza pu raH snyan ngag mkhan gyi rgyal po/ de bzhin du/ bAk+tsa si ma nash+tsa si/ bAd+ma na saH dak+Shi Na suT s+yAM di shi ngi pan+thA/ dak+Shi NA pa thaH a ha si sh+tsa rA trish+tsa/ a ho rA tri/ ! snyan ngag mkhan gyi rgyal mo/ rkyen gsum pa Da'i dpe ni/ au dwau
<p>59a.3</p>rgyal po'i grong khyer/ tsa tra yash+tsa/ dzas/ zhes pa'i tshig sbyor la rnam dbye sogs phyis/ rkyen Da byin/ rgyal po'i grong khyer/ Di ta la Ti phyis pas/ dI traH ngag dang yid kyang ngo / /ngag yid/ yAT/ suT/ yul lho phyogs kyi lam/ lho phyogs kyi lam/ si  nyin mo dang mtshan mo yang ngo / /nyin mtshan/ de bzhin du/ /pany+tsa ShAH ba ha au 
<p>59a.4</p>po rA dzA no ya s+yAM gnyis dang gsum yang / na gaR+YAM/ ma hu rA dzA na ga rI/ ! rkyen bzhi pa ka yig gi dpe ni/ ba ha baHkartA ro yas+ya/ zhes gnyis gsum/ pa'i tshig sbyor la rnam dbye sogs phyis/ rkyen ka byin pas/ ba hu kar+t+r-i ko yA gaH ! da ni las 'dzin kyi lnga dang drug yang / dzas/ dzas/ 
<p>59a.5</p>bsdu ba dzas  rnams bshad par bya  jiyAT/ gang la rgyal po mang po rnams kyi grong khyer/ rgyal po mang po'i grong khyer/ ste/ karma d+ha ra dzasa? dzasa? gang gi bya ba'i las mang po/ yastu l+yAr+the/ mnyam pa'i don la las 'dzin pa'o/ /tshig snga phyi'i don mchod sbyin gyi bya ba mang po byed/ dngos po gcig la mnyam par 'jug pa'i don la las
<p>59a.6</p>'dzin gyi bsdu ba zhes bya ste/ nI laM tsa ta dut+pa laM tsa si zhes pa'i tshig sbyor la rnam dbye sogs phyis pas/ nI lot+pa laM/ de bzhin du/ rAk+ta tsA sau si la tA tsa/ si rAk+ta la tA/ pu si maMsh+tsAsau si ko ki si lash+tsa/ puMsko ki laH zhes pa ste pusra'i yang dag par sbyor ba'i mtha' mi dbyi ba ni/ 
<p>59a.7</p>puMsa?'i sa kha sa'i yi ge pha rol ut+pa la yang de sngon po yang ngo / la mi dbyi bar bshad pas so/ ! /de nas nyer ut+pal sngon po/ mkho'i cho ga ci rigs pa dmar po yang 'di 'khril shing yang / 'khril shing dmar po/ /pho yang de khu byug yang ngo / mthun mong du bshad par bya ste/ nAsnash+tsa kr-i tA sa mA saH ming
<p>59b</p>
<p>59b.1</p>dang kr-ita las kyang bsdu ba'o/ /pra la sogs pa nyer bsgyur dang ming kr-ita kyi rkyen can dang ti sogs kyi rkyen can rnams lhan cig par sbyor ba las kyang de'i skyes bu'i bsdu ba 'jug ste/ pra kar+She Na pA daH zhes pa'i tshig sbyor la rnam dbye phrad dang bcas phyis pas/ pra bA daH de bzhin
<p>59b.2</p>du/ kum+b+haM si ka ro tI ti/ zhes pa'i don la/ kum+b+ha ka raH sa hA deHsA diH sa ha la sogs pa rnams sa la sogs pa'o/ /tshig sdud kyi cho ga la 'jug na sa ha la sogs pa rnams ni phul du byung ba'i smra ba/ sa la sogs pa rnams su 'gyur te/ sa ha bu tre Ni brtan te/ zhes smra ba rab bam smra ba phul du byung / 
<p>59b.3</p>pa'i tshig sbyor si bum pa byed pa po 'di/ la rnam dbye sogs bum pa byed pa po ste rdza mkhan/ phyis/ sa ha sa ru bsgyur bas/ sa pu traH/ ! yang ha sa/ saM/ ti rasra rnams ni atsa'i sgra pha rol la rim pa bzhin/ sa d+h+ri/ ma si/ ti ri rnams su 'gyur bar bu dang lhan cig /bshad pas/ sa ha
<p>59b.4</p>ats+ra zhes pa la sa ha sa d+h+ri ru bsgyur/ a tsa dang mtshams sbyar/ si numra/ s+t+ra'i sh+tsu sogs dang / yang dang lhan cig/ dag par sbyor ba'i mtha' phyis/ tsu'i ku sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/ sad+h+ya ng+ra/ de bzhin du/ saM ats+ra/ zhes pa la/ sa myang+ra/ ti rasra/ atsa zhes
<p>59b.5</p>pa la/ ti r+Yang+ra/ sogs so/ ! / koHkatra/ ku'i katu'o/ /de'i skyes bu'i bsdu ba la dman pa dang nyung ngu'i don brjod pa la ku'i sgra ni katra dang ka pa dang kA rnams su 'gyur te/ ku uSh+Na zhes pa'i grogs mchog/ don la/ ka duSh+NaM/ ka poSh+NaM/ koSh+NaM/ si numra/ yang dag pa/ de bzhin du/ 
<p>59b.6</p>ku la ba NaM/ dud 'gro rgyags po/ zhes pa'i don la/ kang+la ba NaM/ ka ba la ba NaM/ kA la ba NaM/ ! pu ru She bA/ skyes bu la yang na'o/ /skyes bu'i sgra dang sbyor ba'i ku'i sgra ni rang sar gnas pa dang katra sogs su bsgyur ba yang na bar bya drod chung ba/ ste/ drod chung ba/ ku pu ru ShaH kat+pu ru ShaH 
<p>59b.7</p>ka pa pu ru ShaH skyes bu ngan pa/ ka pa pu ru ShaH skyes bu ngan pa/ kA pu ru ShaH/ ! ShaSh+ra las tshwa lhad can nam tshwa ngan pa/ pha rol gyi dan+tani da tr-i ru 'gyur la/ da tr-i de dang da sha dang rkyen d+hA rnams pha rol la ShaSh+ra kyi Sha yang ur 'gyur zhing pha rol gyi ta sde rnams kyang Ta sder 'gyur bar bshad de/ skyes bu ngan pa/ so rnams drug rnams gang gi/ Sha Ta dzasa? 
<p>60a</p>
<p>60a.1</p>dan+tAHyas+ya/ zhes pa'i tshig sbyor la rnam dbye sogs phyis/ dan+ta da tr-i ru bsgyur/ Sh+ra u da Dar bsgyur/ si numra byin pas/ Sho Na na/ de bzhin du/ ShaT/ da shaH Sho Da shaH ShaSh+ra la rkyen d+hA byin/ Sho D+hA/ Sho D+D+hA/ br-i ha tAM be dA nAM pa ti/ zhes pa'i tshig
<p>60a.2</p>sbyor la rnam dbye sogs phyis/ dzas tasrar bsgyur bas/ br-i haspa tiH ! yang / ma hAM si tsA si sau i shwa rash+tsa/ si zhes pa'i don la rnam dbye sogs phyis/ bsdu pa so drug pa/ las ma hatra kyi Ti A ru bsgyur bar bshad pas/ Ti A/ drug rnams/ Amra Amra rig byed rnams kyi bdag mapa chen po ste phur bu/ 
<p>60a.3</p>ma he shwa raH/ ! yang / d+yo'i sgra ni tshig sdud las d+yA rig byed bdag po ste phur bu/ chen po yang 'di dbang phyug yang ngo / /bA zhes par bsgyur bar bshad pas/ d+yau tsa si b+hU mi si sh+tsa/ zhes pa'i don la/ d+yA bA b+hA mI/ ! a luk+k+wa tsita/ 'ga' zhig tu dbyi ba ma yin no/ /tshig sdud dang de phan dang kr-ita sogs gang
<p>60a.4</p>dbang phyug chen po/ du'ang dgos pa yod cing 'dod na rnam dbye la sogs pa dbyi ba yin la/ kun tu byed pa'i tshogs la sogs pa skabs 'ga' si si nam mkha' dang sa gzhi yang ngo / gnam sa dag/ zhig tu dgos pa med na rnam dbye sogs mi dbyi ba yang yod de/ kr-i tsh+rAn+muk+taH sto kAn+muk+taH 
<p>60a.5</p>nga si ap+su yo niH u ra si lo ma/ hr-i di spr-i ka/ ka N+Thi kA laH bA tso yuk+tiH di sho daN+DaH pa sh+ya to ha raH sogs dang gzhan yang 'di 'dra'i rigs rnams rnam dbye mi dbyi yang de'i skyes bu'i bsdu ba'i nang du gtogs so/ ! /yang tshig sdud la shA ka pAr+thi ba dkar tshegs las grol/ nga si  tshegs chung ngu las grol/ 
<p>60a.6</p>supa  chu'i skye gnas/ ngi brang la spu/ snying dga' ba/ mgrin nag ste lha drag po/ ngas ngag gi sbyor ba/ ngas yul phyogs kyi dpya khral/ lha bzhin du rku ba/ la sogs pa'i tshig dbus ma dbyi bar bshad de/ shA kaH si/ pri yaHsi pAr+thi baH zhes pa'i tshig sbyor la/ shA ka pAr+thi baH de bzhin du/ de baH si/ pU dza ko si brAh+ma NaH de ba brAh+ma
<p>60a.7</p>NaH sogs so/ ! /'chad 'gyur 'di nas brtsams/ du hi tA pu tau zhes pa'i bar gcig gcig sbyor ba'i zlas dbye'i bsdu ba ste/ de yang / A desh+tsa dwen+d+we/ zlas dbye las dang po  ldum bu ni mthun pa'i sa gzhi las byung / ldum bu ni mthun pa'i sa las byung / lha mchod bram ze/ / 
<p>60b</p>
<p>60b.1</p>gcig gcig sbyor ba'i zlas dbye'i tshig sdud las skabs la lar tshig dang po de dbyi ba yang yod de/ mA tA tsa pi tA tsa/ zhes pa'i tshig sbyor la rnam dbye sogs phyis/ tshig dang po ma tr-i yang phyis pas/ pi ta Rau/ de bzhin du/ shwa shush+tsa shwa sush+tsa/ shwa su rau/ du hi tI  si  tsa phutrash+tsa/ si 
<p>60b.2</p>pu trau/ ! yang zlas dbye'i bsdu ba la skabs 'ga' zhig tu tshig dang po r-itra mtha' can yin na A ru bsgyur  si  si  ma dang pha yang ngo / bar bshad de/ gong gi ma tA tsa pi tA tsa zhes pa la yang na/ ma tA pi ta rau/ de pha ma dag/ sgyug mo dang gyos po yang / si  si  gyos sgyug dag/ tsha bo dang bu dag kyang / bzhin du/ 
<p>60b.3</p>bu tsha bo dag/ du hi tA pu trau/ sogs so/ /zlas dbye'i bsdu ba byas pa'i mtha' 'a/ sarba sogs la byed cho ga rang lugs dang spyir btang a thung mtha' can gyi sgrub pa yang na bar bshad de/ pha ma dag/ bar+NA sh+tsA shra mAsh+tsa si i ta rA+etsa/ dzasa?/ zhes pa la rnam dbye sogs phyis mthar sarba rang lugs dang spyir
<p>60b.4</p>bu tsha bo dag/ btang a thung mtha' can lugs yang na bar byas pas/ bar+NA shra me ta re/ dzas/ bar+NA shra me ta rAH dzasa?/ 'bru mang po'i bsdu ba la don tha dad du byed pa'i tshig dbus ma de dbyi bar bshad rigs rnams dang spyod par gnas pa rnams las gzhan rnams kyang / de/ ku mu da s+ya  ngas  gan+d+ha i ba gan+d+ho  si  ya s+ya/ ngas/ 
<p>60b.5</p>zhes pa'i tshig sbyor la rnam dbye sogs phyis/ tshig dbus ma i ba yang phyis/ rigs spyod par gnas pa las gzhan rnams/ nye ba'i tshig gan+d+ha sogs kyi mtha' ir bsgyur bar bshad pas mtha' ir bsgyur bas/ ku mu da gan+d+hiH de bzhin du/ haM sa s+ya ga ngas  ma na si mi ba ga  ku mu da'i dri dang 'dra ba'i dri gang gi/ 
<p>60b.6</p>ma naM ya si s+ya/ ha sa ga ma nA/ si/ ! /dikra saM khye saM dz+nyA yI/ phyogs dang grangs kyi ming can la'o/ /las 'dzin gyi bsdu ba la phyogs dang ming gi sgra dang por yod la/ de dang sbyor rgyu'i pha rol gyi tshig kyang gzhi ku mu gi 'dri/ mthun pa'i don can ngang pa'i 'gros dang ldan pa'i 'gros gang gi/ la tshig sbyor
<p>60b.7</p>sogs mi ngang pa'i 'gros ma/ Apra/ dgos par thog ma nas tshig sdud kho na byas chog la/ don mnyam du 'jug pa can yin kyang phyogs dang grangs kyi sgra thog ma can ma yin pa/ phyogs dang grangs yin kyang mnyam par 'jug pa'i don can ma yin pa dag la ni thog mar tshig sbyor byas nas de
<p>61a</p>
<p>61a.1</p>slar tshig sdud kyi cho gas bsdu dgos te/ phyogs dang grangs thog ma don mnyam du 'jug pa tshig sbyor mi dgos pa'i dpe ni/ dak+Sha NAg+niH sap+ta grA mAH sogs so/ /i ti swa ra swaste byA ka ra Na s+ya sU trAt+sa yA sa mAp+tAH/ zhes pa brda sprod pa
<p>61a.2</p>dbyangs can gyi mdo las tshig sdud kyi rab tu byed pa rnams rdzogs so// ! //da ni ming las ming de dang 'brel pa'i ming gzhan sgrub pa de phan gyi rkyen rnams bshad par  lho phyogs kyi'o/ grong bdun/ bya ste/ ! a ba t+ye aN+ra/ bu brgyud la aN+ra'o/ /ming las ming de dang 'brel pa'i bu brgyud kyi don la
<p>61a.3</p>aN rkyen du 'gyur te/ u pa goH u bat+yaM/ si zhes pa'i don la/ bsdu ba dang rkyen dag la 'os/ rnam dbye rjes 'brel bcas pa phyis/ aN+ra byin pas/ u pa gu/ aN zhes gnas pa la/ ! A di swa ra s+yany+Ni ti tsa br-id+d+hiH dbyangs dang po'i ny+raN+ra 'gro ba la'ang 'phel ba'o/ /
