<p>61a.4</p>dang po'i dbyangs de phan dang rkyen dang ba lang rdzi'i bu/ gzhan yang ste/ ny+ra yig dang N+ra yig 'gro ba dag pha rol la 'phel bar 'gyur te/ dang po dbyangs u yig 'phel pa au ru bsgyur/ rkyen gyi Na yig de'i don yin pas phyis/ ! bo\u0f85bya swa re/ dbyangs la u dang o'i abra'o 
<p>61a.5</p>mtha'i u yig dang o yig dag ni rkyen dbyangs dang ya pha rol la apra ces par 'gyur te/ u apra tu bsgyur bas/ au pa ga baH tshig sbyor de bzhin byas pas/ bA shiSh+ThaH gau ta maH aN/ ! r-i u ra Ni/ aN+ra la r-i ur+ra'o/ /rkyen anra pha rol la mtha'i r-i yig ni ur+ra du
<p>61a.6</p>'gyur te/ ShaN+NAM mA tr-I NAM a ba t+yaM/ si zhes pa'i don la rnam dbye sogs phyis aN+ra r-i ur+ra du bsgyur bas/ ShAN+mA tu raH ba lang rdzi'i bu/ aN zhes pa  aN/ i a dag gi dbyi'o ma rtags mtha'i a phyis/ si  gnas 'jog gi bu/ go'u ta ma'i bu/ ste Sha Nar bsgyur ba ni la lar dz+ha sa'i yi ge pha rol la nya ma'i yi ger 'gyur
<p>61a.7</p>bar bshad pas so/ /Amra/ Amra/ ma rnams kyi drug rnams kyi bu/ /tshig sbyor de bzhin du byas pas/ ma gnyis kyi bu/ dwai mA tu raH ma drug gi bu ste gzhon nu gdong drug/ trai ma tu raH ma gsum gyi bu/ ! drang srong ma yin pa la atra la i ny+ra'o/ /ming a yig mtha' can las drang srong ma yin pa la
<p>61b</p>
<p>61b.1</p>de'i bu brgyud kyi don la iny+ra 'gyur te/ de ba dat+ta s+ya  ngas  a pa t+yaM/ si zhes pa'i don la/ nam dbye sogs phyis/ iny+ra/ ny+ra 'phel pa'i don/ i a dag gi dbyi 'os rtags mtha'i a phyis pas/ dai ba dat+tiH iny+ra/ lhas byin gyi bu/ de bzhin du/ shrai d+ha riH ! N+yA ya na Ne yaN+NA yA garga na
<p>61b.2</p>DA tris+t+ri pi tr-i Sh+wa srA desh+tsa/ garga/ naDa/ a tri/ ltas byin gyi bu/ bud med kyi pi tr-i swa sr-i la sogs pa rnams la N+ya/ A ya naN+ya/ e yaN+ra/ NI ya yang ngo / /garga la sogs pa rnams la N+ya dang / lhas byin gyi bu/ na Da la sogs dpal 'dzin gyi bu/ pa rnams la A ya na Na dang
<p>61b.3</p>a tri la sogs pa rnams la e yaN dang / bud med kyi rtags pi tr-i swa sr-i la sogs pa rnams la NI ya rnams bu brgyud brjod pa'i rkyen du 'gyur te/ garga s+ya a pa t+yaM/ zhes pa'i don la rnam dbye sogs phyis/ rkyen N+ya byin/ Na 'phel ba'i don/ i a dag gi dbyi
<p>61b.4</p>'os/ a phyis pas/ gArgyaH tshig sbyor sogs de bzhin du byas pas/ bAt+s+yaM sogs dang / nADA ya naH tsA rA ya NaH A mu ShA ya NaHsogs dang / ngasra  garga'i bu/ A tre yaH gAng+ge yaH kA me yaH mA he yaH sogs dang / bud med kyi pi hr-i swa sr-i la/ pi tuH swa  ngas  
<p>61b.5</p>su ra ba t+yaM/ zhes pa'i don la/ pai tr-i swa srI yaH tshig sbyor de bzhin bibu'i bu/ drang srong na Da'i bu/ drang srong spyod pa'i bu/ drang srong che ge mo'i bu/ byas pas/ mA tr-i swa srI yaH rgyun shes kyi bu/ spre'u'i bu/ sa'i bu ste mig dmar/ sogs so/ ! /yang / 'ga'  pha'i sring mo'i bu/ 
<p>61b.6</p>zhig tu mo rtags las rkyen aN 'jug par pha'i sring mo'i bu'am a ne'i bu/ yang bshad de/ b+hU mI a ba t+yaM/ zhes pa'i don la/ b+hau maH aN !lug+ba ma'i srong mo'i bu ste sru mo'i bu/ hu twe kwa tsita/ mang po nyid la 'ga' zhig tu 'jig go/ /rnam dbye mang tshig nyid pha rol la skabs
<p>61b.7</p>'ga' zhig tu bu brgyud la sogs pa'i rkyen rnams 'jig ste/ gArgya/ dzasa?/ gna'i bu rnams/ gargAH sa'i bu ste mig dmar/ A tre yaH dzasa?/ a tra yaH rgyun shes kyi bu rnams/ bai de ha/ dza sa/ rgyal po lus 'phags kyi bu rnams/ bi de hAH ! de ba te da mar+the/ lha dang 'di'i don la'o/ / 
<p>62a</p>
<p>62a.1</p>mchod pa lta bu lha'i don dang 'di zhes pa'i don la aN 'gyur te/ in+d+ro de ba tAM ya  Am  s+ya ha  ngas  bi/ zhes pa'i don la rnam dbye sogs phyis aN+ra byin pas/ ain+d+raM ha bi/ de bzhin du/ so myo de ba tAM ya s+ya/ sau myaM sogs lha'i don dang / ! 'di'i don la dper na/ 
<p>62a.2</p>de ba dat+tAr+tha mi si daM/ zhes pa'i don la/ dai ba dat+taM/ zhes pa ste lhas byin gyi don du bzhag si lha dbang po'i sreg rdzas gang gi /pa'i zas dang gos la sogs pa'i don no/ ! /kwa tsid+d+wa dbang po'i ched kyi sreg rdzas/ yoH lha zla ba'i ched du gang gi/ si aN si la lar gnyis ka la'o/ /rkyen 'phel
<p>62a.3</p>'di lhas byin gyi don du/ ba'i rgyu mtshan can pha rol la lhas byin gyi don du/ skabs la lar ming sngon ma dang phyi ma gnyis ka'i thog ma'i dbyangs 'phel bar byed pa yang yod de/ Ag+hi mA ru ta karmA/ ! yang dngos po'i don la'ang aN sogs 'jug par bshad pas/ su hr-id dang su b+ha ga la dngos po'i
<p>62a.4</p>don du aN+ra dang N+ya byin/ so so'i tshig gnyis ka'i dbyangs thog ma 'phel ba byas pas/ sauhA rdaM/ sau b+hA gyaM/ ! Ni to bA/ N+ra 'gro ba las yang na'o/ /mi la rlung gis las byed/ gong du brjod pa dang 'chad 'gyur gyi rkyen N+ra yig rjes 'brel 'gro ba 'phel ba'i rgyu mtshan can rnams las kyang
<p>62a.5</p>skabs 'gar 'phel ba sogs Na 'gro ba'i cho ga rnams byed pa dang mi byed pa 'dam kha can du byed mdza' bshes/ skal bzang pa sogs yang na bar byed pa'ang yod de/ a dzo si gaiR+Ya s+ya/ zhes pa'i don la rnam dbye sogs phyis/ aN+ra 'phel ba yang na bar byas pas/ A dza ga
<p>62a.6</p>baM/ a dza ga baM/ de bzhin du/ ku mu da s+ya ngas  gan+d+ha  i  mi ba gan+d+ho ya  si  s+ya/ zhes pa'i don la/ N+ya kau mu da gan+d+h+yA/ 'phel ba 'dam kha'i dpe/ ku mu da gan+d+h+yA/ shwA su ra s+yA yaM/ shwA su N+ya r+Ya grA maH nor dang sa gzhi ldan pa gang gi zhes pa ste dbang phyug chen po'i ming / biSh+No ri ngas daM 'phel ba'i dpe/ ngas si/ 'phel ba'i dpe/ baiSh+Na baM/ dbang phyug chen po'am dbang phyug gi gzhu la yang 'jug go/ 
<p>62a.7</p>ku mu da'i dri dang 'dra ba'i dri gang gi/ ngas  si  go ri daM/ ba lang 'di/ ga byaM/ 'phel ba mi byed pa'i dpe/Ta/ ku la s+ya ngas  ku mu da'i dri dang ldan pa'i dri yod pa me'i bu/ ngas i damra si gyos po'i 'di/ 'phel ba'i dpe/ 'di gyos po'i khyim/ i daM/ si  'di'i rigs/ ku l+yaM/ N+ya/ 'phel ba mi byed pa'i dpe/ khyab 'jug gi 'di/ amra yuSh+madra/ NI ya/ khyod kyi'o/ /twa
<p>62b</p>
<p>62b.1</p>dI yaM/ a smadra/ NI ya/ ma dI yaM/ ! tsa tu rash+tsa lo paH tsa tur+ra gyi tsa dbyi'o/ /tsa tudra gyi sgra'i tsa yig ni de phan gyi rkyen ya dang dbyangs rkyen pha rol la dbyi bar bya ste/ tsa tur+ra/ N+ya/ tuR+YaM/ tsa tur+ra/ NI ya/ tu rI yaH ! a n+ya su dkra/ a n+ya kyi dkra'o/ /a n+ya kyi sgra la de phan
<p>62b.2</p>si  'phel ba mi byed pa'i dpe/ nga'am bdag go /gyi rkyen dbyangs pha rol las dkra A ga ma 'gyur te/ a n+ya la/ NI ya/ dkra A ga ma byin pas/ a n+ya dI yaM/ dkra A ga pa a n+ya kho na la ster bzhi bo rnams/ gyi gzhan la ni bzhi bo rnams/ ma yin te/ ar+b+ha dza ra ta/ NI ya/ ar+d+ha dza ra tI yaM/ ! 
<p>62b.3</p>kA ra kA kri ya yuk+te/ byed po dang bya ba'i sbyor ba la'o/ /byed pa po dang bya ba dang byed pa sbyor ba dang / byed pa dang las sbyor ba dang / byed po gzhan gyi phyir/ las dang bya ba gsum sbyor ba dang / byed po las dang byed pa gsum sbyor ba dang / byed po las dang bya byed phyed rgas pa ste dar yol/ 
<p>62b.4</p>bzhi sbyor ba ste/ dbye ba drug po de rnams la aN+ra sogs sngar bshad pa'i rkyen de rnams 'jug ste/ kud+ku me TA na rAk+taM ba s+t+raM/ zhes pa'i don la/ kaung+ku maM/ ma thu rA yAH A ga taH mA aN  thu raH si  grA me b+ha baH grA myaH d+hU raM ba ha tI ti/ d+hau re yaH d+hU R+YaH ! ke ne ye kAHka
<p>62b.5</p>I na i ya i ka rnams so/ /rkyen ka dang I na dang i ya dang i ka ste bzhi po 'di rnams 'byung ba la gur gum gyis btsos pa'i gos/ sogs pa'i don la a N+ra  gur gum gyis btsos pa/ yAT+ra  nga si  bcom brlag nas 'ongs so/ grong na yod/ 'jug N+ya  cing / 'phang lo 'dren pa po ste shing rta 'dren pa'i glang / N+ya rkyen de rnams la'ang N+ra
<p>62b.6</p>'gro ba'i ming btags te 'phel bar byed pa dang mi byed pa yang na bar byed de/ kar+Na Ti b+ha baH zhes pa'i don la rkyen ka 'phel ba yang na bar byas pas/ kAr+Na Ta kaH kar+Na Ta kaH sogs dang / ! grA mA nga si  dA ga ta si  sta tra dzA si to bA/ zhes pa'i don la rkyen I na grA mI NaH yang na N+ya sbyar bas grA myaH 
<p>62b.7</p>de bzhin du/ sa d+h+r+yats+ra/ I na/ sad+h+rI tsI naH mthun pa'i grogs/ sa myats+ra/ I na/ yul kar+Na Tar skyes ba'am 'ongs pa/ sa mI tsI naH dngos po bzang po'am mdog dbyibs legs po/ yul kar+Na Ta pa/ tiR+Yats+ra/ In/ grong sde las 'ongs shing der skyes pa nyid do/ /ti rash+tsi naH dud 'gro rnams 'ongs so/ /grong sde las 'ongs shing der skyes pa nyid do/ / 
<p>63a</p>
<p>63a.1</p>sogs dang / ! ya lo pash+tsa/ ya dbyi ba'ang ngo / kan+ya sogs rtags mang po'i u pa d+hA'i ya yig ni de phan sogs rkyen mang po pha rol la dbyi ba'ang yod de/ ga n+ya yAHdza taH zhes pa'i don la/ I na byin/ ya phyis pas/ ka nI naH de bzhin du/ puSh+ye
<p>63a.2</p>Na yuk+taH pau ShaH aN  pau ShI/ aN A pa/ yang na I na phyin pas/ pau ShI NaH pu r+No mA saH zhes pa'i don la/ pau r+Na mA sI sogs dang / ! rkyen I ya'i dpe ni/ k+Sha tra la I ya/ k+Sha trI  nga si  yaT+ra  si  bu mo las skyes pa sten la bu/ ya yang na aN byin pas k+Sha traH de  bu mo las skyes pa sten la bu/ bzhin du/ shu
<p>63a.3</p>skar ma rgyal dang 'dus pa ste rgyal zla/ rgyal gyis nya ba/ krI yaM/ shau kraH aN in+d+rI yaM/ I ya/ ain+d+raH rgyal gyis nya ba/ zla ba nya gang ba ste tshes bco lnga/ ! rkyen i ka'i dpe ni/ tshes bco lnga/ A k+Shi kaH shAb+di kaH bai di kaH sogs so/ ! 'dugs ldan nam dpa' bos bskor ba ste rgyal rigs/ 'dugs ldan nam dpa' bos bskor ba ste rgyal rigs/ t+ya ta no/ /t+ya dang tan dag
<p>63a.4</p>go/ /'byung ba la sogs I ya khu ba 'dus pa/ dbang po'i tshogs/ pa'i don la ki ma la sogs pa rnams la t+ya dang a d+ya la sogs  rab tu gsal ba'i mig /sgra'i nang nas/ rig byed kyi khongs nas/ rtog ge'i nang na yod pa/ pa rnams la tan rkyen du 'gyur te/ ku tra t+yaH ku ta s+t+yaH ta tra t+yaH sogs dang / a d+ya sogs la/ a d+ya ta naH 
<p>63a.5</p>sa dA ta naH h+ya stanaH ! swA R+the\u0f85pi/ rang gi don la yang ngo / /sems can rang rang gi dngos po brjod pa ni rang gi don te de brjod pa la sngar bshad pa'i rkyen de rnams ci rigs pa 'jug ste/ de ba dat+ta e ba/ zhes pa'i don la/ mi yang rung ba/ der de la/ dai ba dat+ta kaH de bzhin du/ de ring byung ba/ 
<p>63a.6</p>rtag tu byung ba/ kha sang byung ba/ tsa twA ro bar+Na e ba/ tsa turbar+N+yaM/ tso ra e ba/ tsau raH/ ! a NI na yaR+YuSh+ma dosta kA diH aN+ra dang I na dag las yuSh+madra asmadra dag gi ta ba ka la sogs pa'o/ /'di ni lhas byin no'am lhas byin nyid/ /rkyen aN+ra dang I na pha rol la lhas byin nyid/ yuSh+madra ni ta ba ka dang /
<p>63a.7</p>yuSh+ma ka gang rung dang / asmadra ni rigs bzhi bo 'di/ ! chos rkun nyid/ ma ma ka dang asma ka gang rung du 'gyur te/ tAbakaHIN+ra khyod nyid/ yauSh+ma kaH aN+ra  mA ma kaH aN+ra  bdag nyid/ Asma kaH aN+ra  tA ba kI naH I na  khyod nyid/ yauSh+ma kI naH I na  mA ma kI naH I na  bdag nyid/ Asma kI naH/ In/ ! 
<p>63b</p>
<p>63b.1</p>bat+tu l+ye/ mnyam pa la bta'o/ /phan tshun mnyam pa'am 'dra ba'i don la rkyen batra 'gyur te/ tsan+d+ra Na  TA  sa dr-i shaM mu khaM/ zhes pa'i don la/ tsan+d+ra ban+mu  batra  khaM/ de bzhin du/ g+ha Ta ba du  batra  da raM/ ! b+hA be ta twa yaN+ra/ dngos po la ta twa yaN+ra'o/ /dngos po dang mtshan nyid brjod pa'i don la
<p>63b.2</p>rkyen ta dang twa dang yaN+ra rnams 'gyur la rkyen de gsum la yang ta rkyen gyi mtha' can rnams rtag tu mo rtags zla ba dang mtshungs pa'i gdong / dang twa dang yaN+ra zla ba dang 'dra ba'i gdong / gyi mtha' rnams bum pa dang 'dra ba'i lto ba/ ma ning gi rtags te/ brAh+ma Na s+ya  ngasra  b+ha ba zhes pa'i don la/ brAh+ma Na tA/ brAh+ma Na twaM/ brAh+ma N+yaM/ ! 
<p>63b.3</p>mnyam par tshogs pa'i don la ta 'gyur zhing rtags de la yang yon tan thob par bshad de/ tra yA/ NAM sa mA hA raH zhes pa'i don la/ tre tA/ de bzhin du/ dza nA nAM sa mA hA raM/ si dza na tA/ si ! /las kyi don la'ang bram ze nyid dam bram ze'i mtshan nyid/ yaN 'jug par bshad de/ bram ze nyid dam bram ze'i mtshan nyid/ 
<p>63b.4</p>brAh+ma Na s+ya karmaM/ si zhes pa'i don la/ brAh+maN+yaM/ de bzhin du/ rAdz+nyaH ngas/ i da karmaM/ rA dz+yaM/ gsum tshogs ga rA dza n+yaM/ na'i yang na 'os gsung sogs pa/ Ti dbyi ba dang Amra  skye bo tshogs pa'am 'dus pa/ mi dbyi ba yang na bar byas pa'o/ ! /lo hi tA der+Di di manra/ lo hi ta la sogs pa la i manra te Ditra'o/ / 
<p>63b.5</p>ngasa?  bram ze'i las  lo hi ta la sogs pa la dngos bram ze'i las/ po dang mtshan nyid kyi ngas  si  rgyal bo'i las 'di/ don la rkyen i man 'gyur zhing rkyen de la yang Ditra ces bya ste dgos pa ni Ti dbyi ba'i don te/ lo hi ta s+ya b+ha baH zhes pa'i don/ lo hi ti mA/ si/ de bzhin du/ a Nor+b+ha baH ngas si a Ni mA/ si 
<p>63b.6</p>! r-i ra i ma Ni/ r-i'i ra i man la'o/ /rkyen i manra pha rol la rtags kyi dang po'i r-i yig ni ra srog ldan du 'gyur te/ pr-i thor+b+ha baH zhes pa'i don la/ pra thi mA/ de  dmar pa'i mtshan nyid dam dmar po nyid/ ngas  si  bzhin du/ dr-i  dmar bo nyid/ D+ni/ i man/ dra  phra mo'i mtshan nyid dam phra mo nyid/ 
<p>63b.7</p>D+hi mA/ si  mr-i du/ i man/ mra di mA/ si  'jam pa'i mtshan nyid dam 'jam pa nyid/ ! ba hu las dbyi zhing ba hu'i rgya che ba'i mtshan nyid dam rgya che ba nyid/ rgya che ba'i mtshan nyid dam rgya che ba nyid/ ngas yang b+hU'o/ /ba hu las pha rol gyi rkyen i man gyi i dbyi zhing i man brtan pa'i mtshan nyid dam brtan pa nyid/ 
<p>64a</p>
<p>64a.1</p>sogs pha rol ba hu'ang b+hU zhes par 'gyur te/ ba hor+b+ha baH si/ zhes pa'i don la/ ba hu/ i manra zhes gnas pa la/ i phyis/ ba hu yang b+hU ru bsgyur bas/ b+hU mA/ si ! as+t+ya r+the ma tupa?/ yod pa'i don la ma tupa?'o/ /ming las yod pa'i don la ma tupa?
<p>64a.2</p>'gyur te/ go a s+ya asti i ti/ zhes pa'i don la/ ma tupra mang po'i mtshan nyid dam mang po nyid/ pa rjes 'brel/ u yig /u r-ita dag las numra mos numra gyi don/ a tu dang sa'i si mang ba'i mtshan nyid dam mang po nyid/ la 'os ring por bsgyur bas/ go mAn/ yang na de'i mthar I ka sbyar
<p>64a.3</p>bas/ go ma tI/ de bzhin du/ shrI mAnra/ shrI ma tI/ sogs so/ ! /a i kau ma tAr+the/ ma tu'i don la a dang i ka dag go/ /ming las ma tu'i don te yod pa'i don brjod pa la rkyen a dang i ka dag kyang 'gyur te/ bai dza yan+ti bi  ba lang yod ba'am ba lang can/ d+ya ti ya s+ya/ 
<p>64a.4</p>ba lang yod pa'am ba lang can/ zhes pa'i don la/ dpal yod pa'am dpal ldan/ bai dza yan+taH a/ de bzhin du/ mA yi kaH ika?/ sogs so/ ! /mAn+to pa d+hA dwa tI nau/ ma dang a mtha' u pa d+hA las ba tu in dag go/ /ming ma yig dang a yig gi mtha' can do shal yod pa gang gi/ dang ma dang a u pa d+hA na yod pa
<p>64a.5</p>las kyang yod pa'i don la rkyen ba tu dang inra dag 'gyur te/ do shal can/ go bid+ya te ya s+ya/ sanga?  sgyu ma can nam nor can/ zhes pa'i don la/ ba tu/ u numra gyi don/ b+ha ga bAnra/ btu  de bzhin du/ d+ha nI/ k+ShA trI/ inra si/ daN+DI/ inra si  kA mI/ inra si da mI/ sha mI/ anra si  sogs a mtha'
<p>64a.6</p>dang / dr-i Sha dwa tI sogs a u pa d+hA na yod pa dang / kim+bAn sogs  si  skal ba yod pa gang la/ ma yig mtha' can dang / lak+Sh+mI bAnra sogs ma u pa d+hA skal ldan nam bcom ldan nam legs ldan/ inra can/ rgyal rigs can/ dpyad pa can/ 'dod pa can/ inra si  zhi dul can/ na yod pa'i dpe mdo tsam mo/ ! / 
<p>64a.7</p>ta Di dA di ba tu Ipra/ sa gzhi yod pa'am sa gzhi can/ b+h+yash+tsa/ ta Ditra dpal ldan pa'am phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan pa/ la sogs pa rnams las kyang yod pa'i don la rkyen ba tu dang inra dag 'gyur te/ ta Di twAnra/ ba tu numra/ si dbang ldan/ rlung ldan/ ma
<p>64b</p>
<p>64b.1</p>ru twAn/ ! e tat+kiM yat+tad+b+h+yaH e tad/ kim/ yad/ tad rnams las so/ /e tatra la sogs pa 'di rnams las tshad ston pa'i don la rkyen ba tu 'gyur te/ yadra dang tadra la rkyen ba tu byin/ ! ya t+ta do rA/ yadra tadra dag gi A'o/ /rkyen ba tu pha rol la yadra dang tadra dag gi Ti ni
<p>64b.2</p>ba tu  numra  si  A ru 'gyur te/ Ti A/ si/ numra byin pas/ yA bAnra/ tA bAnra/ ! ki maHkir+Yash+tsa/ kimra ni ki ste ya yang ngo / /rkyen ba tu pha rol la kim gyi sgra ni ki ru 'gyur zhing ba tu'i ba de yang ya yig tu 'gyur te/ ki yAnra/ ! A i sh+tsaita do bA/ e tatra kyi A dang i yang na'o/ / 
<p>64b.3</p>rkyen ba tu pha rol la e tatra kyi Ti U ru 'gyur zhing yang na e tata yongs  gang tsam  de tsam/ rdzogs i ru 'gyur la rkyen gyi ba yang yar 'gyur te/ e tA bAnra/ i yAn/ ! tun+dA de ri laH tun+da sogs la i la'o/ /tun+da la  ji tsam/ sogs pa rnams la yod pa'i don la 'don la rkyen i la 'gyur te
<p>64b.4</p>tun+di laH u da ri laHsogs so/ ! /aun+na t+ye dan+tA du raH dan+ta las ring ba la u ra'o/ /dan+ta las ring ba'am sbom pa'i don can dang ldan pa  si numra  de tsam/ si numra la rkyen ur 'gyur te/ un+nAHdan+tAHas+ya/ zhes pa'i don la/ dan+tu ur raHsi/ ! shrad+d+hA derUH shrad+d+ha la sogs pa la
<p>64b.5</p>ste ba can/ lu'o/ /lto ba can/ shrad+d+hA la sogs pa rnams la yod pa'i don la lu rkyen du 'gyur te/ shrad+d+hA luH si ni drA luH kr-i pA luH sogs so/ ! /asa? kyi mtha' can dang mA yA dang me d+hA dang srakra rnams dzas dzasa? si ring po yod pa'am so sbom po yod pa'am so mthon po yod pa can/ las yod pa'i don la rkyen binra 'gyur
<p>64b.6</p>bi t+ya te yas+ya bcas tshig sbyor/ bar bshad de/ ta paswI/ mA yA bI/ si numra/ me d+hA bI/ si numra  sra g+pI/ si numra/ dad can/ gnyid can/ brtse ba can nam brtse ldan/ ! bA tsog+mi niH bA tsa las g+mi ni'o/ /bAts+ra las yod pa'i don la g+mi ni rkyen du 'gyur te/ bAts+ra la/ g+mi ni/ rkyen gyi na'i i dang gra rjes 'brel/ tsu'i
<p>64b.7</p>ku dang / tsa pa'i a ba dza ba as ta pasra binra si numra dka' thub can nam sdom ldan/ sgyu ma can/ blo gros can/ 'phreng ldan nam 'phreng ba can/ sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/ sma ba can/ bAg+mI/ /A lA Tau kut+si ta b+hA ShI NI/ smad pa brjod pa la A la AT+ra dag go /pAtsa las smad pa'i tshig brjod pa'i don la rkyen A la dang AT+ra
<p>65a</p>
<p>65a.1</p>dag 'gyur te/ bA tsA laH bA tsA TaH ! I Sha da pa ri sa mAp+tau kalpa de sh+ya de shI yaH cung zad yongs su ma rdzogs pa la/ kalpa/ de sh+ya/ de shI ya rnams so/ /don gang la'ang phal cher yongs su rdzogs kyang cung zad ma tshang bas lhag ma can gyi don la rkyen/ kalpa dang / de
<p>65a.2</p>sh+ya dang / de shI ya rnams 'gyur te/ I ShaT+ra smra ba ngan pa te rdzun chen po/ a pa ri sa mAp+taHsarba dz+nyaH zhes pa'i don la/ sarba dz+nya kalpaH de bzhin du/ pa Tu de sh+yaH ka bi de shI yaH sogs so/ ! /prA shaM sa yAM rU paH kha bsgyur ba la rU pa'o/ /mi mkhas pa mkhas par rdzu ba dang / mi shes kyang shes
<p>65a.3</p>zer ba lta bu kha bsgyur ba'i don la rkyen rU pa 'gyur te/ prA shastau bai yA ka ra NaH zhes pa'i don la/ be cung zad yongs su ma rdzogs pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa/ cung zad ma rdzogs pa'i snyan ngag mkhan/ cung zad ma rdzogs pa'i snyan ngag mkhan/ ! yA ka ra Na rU paH kut+pa yaM pA shaH smra ba ngan pa la pA sha'o/ /smra ba ngan pa brjod pa'i don la rkyen pA sha
<p>65a.4</p>'gyur te/ kuSh+pe to bai yA ka ra NaH zhes pa'i don la/ bai yA ka ra Na rdzus ma'i brda sprod mkhan pa/ pA shaH de bzhin du/ kut+si to be yA ka ra No pa huH ba hu pA shaH/ ! b+hU ta purbe tsa raT+ra/ sngon dus shes pa la tsa raT+ra'o/ /gang yang sngon gyi dus su shes pa'i don
<p>65a.5</p>la rkyen tsa raT+ra 'gyur te/ pUrbaM brda sprod mkhan po rdzun du smra ba'am ngan par smra ba/ dr-iSh+Ti bi d+ya te ya s+ya/ dr-iSh+Ti tsa raH/ ! prA tsuR+Ya pi kA ra pra d+hA n+yA di Shu ma yaT+ra/ spyi bungs brda sprod mkhan po tshig ngan smra ba mang po/ dang rnam 'gyur dang gtso bo rnams la ma yaTa'o/ /ston mo byed rgyu'i zas spungs pa lta bu'i
<p>65a.6</p>spyi bungs dang / bzo bo'i las kyi rnam 'gyur dang / gzhan la ma bltos par  sngon dus shes shing mthong ba gang gi/ rang dbang du byed pa gtso bo'i don rnams la rkyen ma yaT+ra 'gyur te/ an+na prA tsu ra ba sminra ya dz+nye zhes pa'i don la/ an+na ma yo ya dz+nya/ de bzhin du/ mr-i to bi ka ra g+ha TaH mr-in+ma
<p>65a.7</p>ma yaT+ra si yo g+ha TaH s+t+rI pra d+hA n+ya ma s+yastI ti/ khyi gyi gtso bo bud med 'di yod pa'o/ /s+t+rI ma yo dzAl+maH ma yaT+ra si pUr+Ne na a mr-i ta tsan+d+raH nya gang ba'i zla bas bdud rtsi sbre/ a mr-i ta ma yash+tsan+d+raH/ ! brda sprod mchod sbyin gyi zas spyi spung sa 'di/ shes nas ma yaTa? si rig byed kyang klog ngas pa sa'i rnam 'gyur bum pa byed/ 
<p>65b</p>
<p>65b.1</p>lta bu'i don la rkyen aN+ra 'gyur bar bshad de/ byA ka ra NaM a d+hI te be+e ta be+e ti bA/ zhes pa'i don la aN byin pas/ byA ka ra Na/ aN+ra zhes gnas pa la/ ! na san+d+hi y+boR+YaT+ra tsa/ mtshams sbyor kyi y+ra bra dag la ma yin te iT+ra uT+ra dag go/ /rkyen 'phel ba'i rgyu
<p>65b.2</p>mtshan can pha rol las 'phel ba byed rgyu'i yi ge dang po de mtshams sbyar brda sprod bklags shing rig byed kyang rig pa/ ba'i y+ra yig dang bra yig yin na thog mar 'phel ba mi byed par/ yi ge thog ma de dang y+ra bra so sor phye nas y+ra yin na iT+ra A ga ma dang bra yin na uT treA ga ma byin te/ de nas
<p>65b.3</p>'phel ba so so'i thob ltar bya ste/ byu kyi bra dang ya phye ba'i bar du iT+ra byin/ de nas 'phel ba sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/ bai yA ka ra NaH de bzhin du/ swa shwaHtaM be+e de ti/ zhes pa'i don la/ sau ba shwaH/ ! i to dzA tA r+the/ skyes pa'i don la i ta'o/ /ngo tsha skyes pa lta bu
<p>65b.4</p>skyes pa'i don la rkyen i ta 'gyur te/ ladz+dzitaH tri pi taH k+Shu dataH sogs so/ ! /ta ra ta me ya swiSh+ThAHpra kaR+She/ khyad par brda sprod bklags shing rig byed kyang rig pa/ rta mchog der rig go /du 'phags pa la ta ra ta ma I ya rta mchog der rig go /su/ iSh+Tha rnams so/ /gang las khyad par du 'phags
<p>65b.5</p>pa'i phul du byung ba'i don la rkyen ta ra dang ta ma dang I ngo tsha skyes/ tshim pa skyes/ bkres rngab skyes/ ya su dang iSh+Tha rnams 'gyur zhing I ya su dang iSh+Tha gnyis la Ditra bzhin du Ti dbyi bar bya ste/ a ti sha ye na kr-iSh+TaH zhes pa'i don la/ kr-iSh+Na taraH de bzhin du/ 
<p>65b.6</p>a ti sha ye na shuklaH shukla ta maH a ti sha ye na la g+huH la g+hI yAn/ I ya su si numra/ la g+hiSh+ThaH pA pI yAnra/ pA piSh+ThaH lag+hI ya sI/ Ipra pA pA ya sI/ Ipra ! gurbA de riSh+The me ya su ga rA diSh+D+ya lo pash+tsa/ iSh+Tha/ i manra/ shin tu nag pa'am nag po phul du byung ba/ I ya su rnams la gu ru shin tu nag pa'am dkar po phul du byung ba/ 
<p>65b.7</p>la sogs pa'i Ti dbyi ba yang ma  shin tu yang ba'am shin tu nyung ba/ shin tu sdig ldan nam che cher sdig ldan/ yin zhing  ches yang ba ma/ gar+ra  ches sdig can ma/ sogs su'o/ /rkyen iSh+Tha dang i manra dang I ya su rnams pha rol la gu ru la sogs pa rnams kyi ni Ti dbyi ba yang ma yin zhing gu ru sogs gar+ra sogs su
<p>66a</p>
<p>66a.1</p>'gyur te/ a ti sha ye na gu ruH zhes pa'i don la/ ga rI yAnra/ si numra/ ga riSh+ThaH gu rur+b+hA baH ga ri mA/ gu ru sogs ni/ pri ya/ I ya su/ pre yAnra/ sinumra  pri ya/ iSh+Tha/ priSh+ThaH pri ma/ i man/ pre mA/ si numra/ de bzhin du/ s+thU la s+tha
<p>66a.2</p>ba zhes par bsgyur bas/ s+tha bI yAnA/ s+tha biSh+ThaH s+tha bim/ phul du byung ba'i dga' ba'am snying nye shos/ skal ba dang ldan pa'i bla ma'am legs pa dang ldan pa'i bla ma/ ! i lo po dz+yA sha b+d+rA dI ya saH dz+yA kyi sgra las phul du byung ba'i dga' ba'am snying nye shos/ I yasra kyi I dbyi'o/ /br-id+d+ha  dga' ba dang ldan pa/ zhes pa'i sgra dz+yA zhes par
<p>66a.3</p>bsgyur ba'i pha rol gyi I yasra shin chu sbom po'am shin tu thul che ba/ sinumra/ sbom po can/ kyi I yig ni dbyi bar bya ste/ a ti sha ye na br-id+d+haH zhes pa'i don la/ gu ru sogs kyi mdos br-id+d+ha dz+yA zhes par bsgyur/ mdo 'dis I yasra kyi I phyis pas/ dz+yA yAnra/ iSh+Tha la/ dz+yeSh+ThaH ! yang a ti
<p>66a.4</p>sha ye na dIr+g+haH zhes par bsgyur bas/ drAr+g+hI yAnra/ drAr+g+hiSh+ThaH a  ches shin tu rgas pa/ ti sha ye na pra shaH zhes pa'i don la/ pra sha shra zhes par bsgyur bas/ shre yAnra/ shreSh+ThaH sogs so/ ! /ba ho riSh+The ches cher rgas pa'am shin tu rgas pa/ che shin tu rgas pa/ yiH 
<p>66a.5</p>che cher ring ba'am shin tu ring ba/ ba hu'i iSh+Tha la yi'o/ ches cher ring ba'am shin tu ring ba/ /rkyen iSh+Tha pha rol la ba shin tu ring ba/ hu'i shin tu gtso che ba'am gtso bo phul du byung ba/ sgra ni b+hU zhes par 'gyur zhing iSh+Tha'i i yang yi zhes par 'gyur te/ a  shin tu gtso che ba'am gtso bo phul du byung ba/ ti sha ye na ba huH zhes pa'i don la/ b+hU yiSh+ThaH/ ! 
<p>66a.6</p>kimra dang / mi zad pa dang kun bshad kyis bsgrubs pa'i tshig mtha' rnams la rkyen tar dang ta ma dag sbyor ba'i mthar Amra A ga ma ster bar bshad de/ kimra la ta ma sbyar de'i mthar Amra A ga ma byin pas/ kiM ta mAM/ de bzhin du/ ku  mang ba'i phul du byung ba'am shin tu mang ba/ tasta rAM/ 
<p>66a.7</p>pa ra mA Na baH mchog tu phra ba de rnams chung ngu nyid do/ /ku tasta mI te ShAM A ram+b+ha ka twaM/ uts+tsai sta rAM gA yan+ti/ skad gsang mthon por smra bar byed dam skad chen pos glu len/ uts+tsai sta mAM gA yan+ti/ shin tu 'tshed par byed/ ba tsa ti ta rAM/ ches klog par byed/ pa Tha ti Amra ta mAM/ ! pa ri mA Ne dag+h+nA da yaH tshad la dag+h+na la sogs tamra Amra 
<p>66b</p>
<p>66b.1</p>pa'o/ /gang la'ang che chung mtho dma' sogs kyi tshad brjod pa'i don la/ da g+h+na dang mA tra dang / dwa yasra rnams 'gyur te/ dzA si nu pa ri mA NaM dza laM/ si zhes pa'i don la/ dzA nu dag+h+naM/ si de bzhin du/ pu ru Sha mA traM br-ik+ShaH shi ro dwa ya saM si daN+DaH kim dang yatra dang tatra rnams la
<p>66b.2</p>gnyis sam mang po'i nang nas gcig bkar ba'i don la rkyen Da ta ra dang Da ta ma 'jug par bshad de/ kimra la/ Da ta ra/ Di ta ya chu bo pus mo nub tsam/ Ti phyis Da de'i don/ pus nub tsam/ ka ta ro b+ha ba taH kA skyes bu dang mnyam pa'i shing / mgo bo'i tshad dang mnyam pa'i shing / N+wa/ de bzhin du Da ta ma sbyar bas/ ka
<p>66b.3</p>ta mo b+ha ba tAM tAn+t+ri kaH si yatra dang tatra la Da ta ra sbyar bas/ b+hab toR+Ya ta rastArki kasta ta ra ung+g+r-i NA tu sogs so/ ! /saM khyA ya bi she ShA a ba d+hA ra Ner+d+wi tri b+h+yAM tI yaH grangs kyi bye brag si khyed gnyis las ka Na'i bu gang yin/ logs su bkol ba la dwi dang tri dag las tI ya'o/ /gnyis po zhes pa lta
<p>66b.4</p>si/ Al+lA rnams ni d+hi pha rol la Apra kyi mtha' can de thung ngur bsgyur bar bshad pas/ khyed rnams las sngags rgyun dam khan po su yin/ khyed dag gang zhig rtog ge mkhan po de smra ba mchog tu 'dzin po'o/ /Da tar  bu grangs kyi bye brag gis logs su bkar ba'i don la dwi dang tri dag la rkyen tI ya 'gyur zhing tI ya pha rol la tri'i ra i dang bcas pa ni slar yang dag par 'gyur ba ste r-i yig tu 'gyur te/ dwi tI yaH 
<p>66b.5</p>tr-i tI yaH sogs so/ ! /ShaT tsa tu ros+thaH ShaSh+ra tsa tur+ra dag la tha'o/ /grangs kyi bye brag gis logs su bkar ba'i don la ShaSh+ra dang tsa tur+ra dag la rkyen tha 'gyur te/ ShaSh+ThaH tsa tuR+thaH/ ! ka ti ka ti pA yA b+h+yAM thaH ka ti dang ka ti pA ya dag las kyang tha'o/ /grangs dngos  gnyis po'am gnyis po/ 
<p>66b.6</p>gsum po'am gsum pa/ ma yin kyang grangs kyi don can yin pas ka ti dang ka ti pA ya dag las kyang logs su bkar ba'i don la rkyen tha 'gyur te/ ga ti thaH ka ti pA ya thaH drug po'am drug pa/ bzhi pa'am bzhi po/ ! pany+tsa dermaH pany+tsanra la sogs pa rnams la ma'o/ /pany+tsanra la sogs pa rnams la
<p>66b.7</p>logs su bkar ba'am rdzogs pa'i don la rkyen ma 'gyur te/ lnga po'am lnga pa/ pany+tsa maH sap+ta maH bdun po'am bdun pa/ aSh+Ta maH brgyad po'am brgyad pa/ na ba  ji tsam  ji tsam byung / maH dgu pa'am dgu po/ ! e kA da shA der+DaH e ka da shanra la sogs pa rnams la Da'o/ /e ka da shanra la sogs pa rnams la
<p>67a</p>
<p>67a.1</p>logs su bkar ba'am rdzogs pa'i don la rkyen Da 'gyur te/ Dita la Ti phyis pas/ e ka da shaH/ ! dwi t+r+yaSh+TA nAM dwA tra yo\u0f85Sh+TAH dwi tri aSh+Tanra rnams kyi dwA tra yo aSh+TA rnams so/ /dwi dang tri dang aSh+Tanra rnams kyi ni da sha dang sbyor ba la rim pa bzhin dwA tra yo
<p>67a.2</p>aSh+TA rnams su 'gyur te/ dwi sogs dwA sogs su bsgyur de'i mthar da shanra la Da sbyar bas/ dwA da shaH tra yo da shaH bcu gcig pa/ tsa turda shaH aSh+TAd shaH na ba da shaH ! biM sha t+yA derbA ta maT+ra/ biM sha ti sogs la ta maT+ra yang na'o/ /biM sha ti sogs la logs su bkar ba'am rdzogs pa'i don
<p>67a.3</p>la rkyen ta maT+ra 'gyur zhing Da yang 'gyur la Da pha rol la biM sha ti sogs kyi ti dbyi zhing de nas Dita bcu gnyis pa/ gcu gsum pa/ bcu bzhi ba/ bco brgyad pa/ bcu dgu pa/ la Ti phyis pas/ biM sha ti ta maH bo shaH ti sha ti ta maH tiM shaH/ ! sha tA de rni t+yaM/ sha ta sogs la rtag tu'o/ /sha ta la
<p>67a.4</p>sogs pa rnams la logs su bkar ba dang rdzogs pa'i don la ta maTu kho na rtag tu 'jug ste/ sha tata maH sa ha sra tamaH lak+Sha tamaH ko Ti tamaH sogs te grangs med nyi shu tham pa'am nyi shu pa/ kyi sum cu tham pa'am sum bcu pa/ bar ro/ ! /saM khyA yAHpra kA re d+hA/ grangs rnams kyi rab tu
<p>67a.5</p>byed pa la d+hA'o/ /gnyis tshan lta bu grangs kyi rab tu byed pa'i don la rkyen d+hA 'gyur te/ dwi d+hA/ brgya tham pa/ stong phrag/ trid+hA/ 'bum phrag /bye ba phrag /sogs so/ ! /gu No\u0f85Na bA/ yon tan la aN yang ngo / /gzhan la sbyin pa gtong ba sogs kyi don dang 'brel pa'i tshan par
<p>67a.6</p>bcad pa'i don du byin pa'i rkyen d+hA pha rol la dbyangs dang po de yon tan du 'gyur zhing dbyangs dang po de yon tan du 'gyur zhing dbyangs nyis tshan/ dang po de yon tan byas gsum tshan/ pa na nges par rkyen bzhi tshan/ aN+ra yang ster dgos te/ dwi la d+hA/ yon tan byas/ dwe d+hA/ de la aN+ra sbyar bas/ dwai d+haM/ de bzhin du/ trai d+haM/ 
<p>67a.7</p>bzhi tshan/ tsA tur+d+haM/ sogs so/ ! /kr-i yA yA A pr-it+tau kr-i twasra/ bya ba'i ched du kun nas 'jug pa la kr-i twasra so/ /zas dus yang yang byed pa lta bu lan mang du bskyar ba'i bya ba'i ched du kun nas 'jug pa'i don la rkyen kr-i twasra 'gyur te/ pany+tsa nyis tshan/ i a sogs si amra/ gsum tshan/ 
<p>67b</p>
<p>67b.1</p>bAraM b+huMk+te/ zhes pa'i don la/ pany+tsa kr-i twaH de bzhin du/ ShaT+k+r-i twaH sogs so/ ! /dwi tri b+h+yAM suH dwi tri dag la su'o/ /dwi dang tri dag la bya ba'i ched du kun nas 'jug pa'i don la rkyen su 'gyur te/ u brjod don sra rnam bcad byas pas/ dwiH triHzhes grub pa uk+taHdang
<p>67b.2</p>lan lnga pa/ sbyar bas/ dwi ruk+taH tri ru k+taH lan lnga za/ ! ba hwA deHshasra/ lan drug za/ ba hu sogs la shasa?'o/ /ba hu'i sgra las bya ba'i ched du kun nas 'jug pa dang gzhan yang bskyar ba dang rjes su 'jug pa'i don rnams la rkyen shasra 'gyur te/ ba hu bA rAn+tI ti/ zhes pa'i don la/ ba hu shaH/ ! 
<p>67b.3</p>tayAya Tau saM khyu yaM/ lan gnyis smra/ lan gsum smra/ grangs kyi don du ta ya a yaT+ra dag go /dngos po gang la'ang grangs de dang ldan pa'i ched du rkyen ta ya dang a yaT+ra dag 'gyur zhing a yaT la ni Di t+pa bzhin du Ti yang dbyi ste/ dI ta si yaM/ 'di lan mang ba'am mang ba'i mtshan nyid can/ 
<p>67b.4</p>sogs so/ /de dag mo rtags su brjod na Ipra spyor bas/ dwi ta yI pad+hU/ dwa yI/ tri ta yI/ ! dzaM g+ha la sogs pa rnams la rkyen i na/ a la/ i ka rnams 'jug pa bshad de/ dzaM g+he naH dzaM g+hA laH dzaM g+hi gnyis pa'am gnyis pa can/ gsum pa'am gsum pa can/ kaH dza bA laH 
<p>67b.5</p>dza bi kaH dze+e g+ha kA re NaH dze+e g+ha ka rA laH dza g+ha ka ri kaH bu mo gnyis pa ma/ i a sogs/ gnyis pa ma/ sogs so/ ! /s+t+rI puM b+h+yAM nany+ra sna Nau/ s+t+rI puM dag la nany+ra snaN+ra dag go/ /s+t+rI dang puM gyi sgra dag la ngo bo brla 'am legs brla/i a sogs kyi phyis/ pa'i don la rim pa bzhin rkyen nany+ra  bzlas pa'am smra ba/ 
<p>67b.6</p>bzlas pa'am smra ba/ dang snaN+ra brla mdzes/ dag 'gyur te/ brla mdzes s+t+rai NaM/ pau snaM/ ! sha ShA ni pA t+yA ka t+yA da yaM/ lhag ma tshig phrad rnams ka ti la sogs pa'o/ /tshig phrad rnams ni ka til sogs pa mtha' yas te 'dir ni mtshon byed tsam yin la lhag ma rnams ni 'jig rten du grags pa ltar gzhan las
<p>67b.7</p>shes par bya ste/ ka tiH ji tsam/ bud med mdzes ma/ puM gyi nga ro tshig phrad kyi phyis pa'o/ /skyes pa dpa' bo/ sogs so/ /i ti swa ra swasti byA kA ra Na s+ya sU trAt+tad+d+hi ta pra kri yA sa mAstuH/ zhes pa brda sprod pa dbyangs can gyi mdo las de phan gyi rab tu bya ba rnams rdzogs so// ! //de nas byings
<p>68a</p>
<p>68a.1</p>las tshig tu bsgrub pa kun bshad kyi rab tu bya ba rnams brjod par bya ste/ ! d+hA toH byings las so/ /rnam dbye sde tshan gnyis las phyi ma 'chad 'gyur ti la sogs pa 'di rnams byings kyi mthar sbyor bar shes par bya'o/ ! /b+h+wAdiH b+hU la sogs
<p>68a.2</p>pa'o/ /byings ni b+hU yod pa la'o zhes pa la sogs pa rnams la byings zhes bya'o/ ! /sa tsa tri bi d+haH de yang dbye ba gsum mo/ /byings de la yang bdag don gyi tshig can dang gzhan don gyi tshig can dang gnyis ka'i tshig can te dbye ba gsum du yod do/ ! /A nu rAt+ta ngitaH a nu dAt+ta ngita
<p>68a.3</p>dag gi Atra'o/ /byings gang la'ang a nu dAt+ta ste dbyangs skad gdangs dma' bar 'gro ba rnams dang dra 'gro ba rnams ni Atra ces pa At+ma ne pa da ste bdag don kyi byings zhes zer ro/ ! /nyit+s+wa ri te tash+tsa u b+he/ nyitra dang swa ri ta'i gnyis ka'o/ /byings gang la'ang ny+ra 'gro ba dang swa ri ta ste sgra
<p>68a.4</p>skad gdangs 'bring por 'don pa 'gro ba rnams bdag don dang gzhan don gnyis ka'i tshig can gyi byings zhes zer la/ gzhan yang byings gang la'ang bdag don dang 'brel pa'i sgrub 'bras ston pa bdag don gyi tshig can dang / gzhan gyi don dang 'brel ba'i sgrub 'bras ston pa gzhan don
<p>68a.5</p>gyi tshig can dang / de dang de'i don gyi byed pa'i tshig 'jug pa ni de dang de'i tshig can zhes bya'o/ ! /pa ra to\u0f85n+yata/ gzhan las gzhan no/ /gong du brjod pa'i bdag don dang gnyis ka'i don can gyi mtshan nyid chang ba de las gzhan pa'i byings rnams ni gzhan don gyi tshig can gyi byings
<p>68a.6</p>zhes bya'o/ ! /na ba pa rasmai pa dA ni/ dgu rnams pa rasmai pa da'o/ /rnam dbye ti sogs brgya dang brgyad cu po la sde tshan bcu ru yod la/ sde tshan re re la'ang dgu tshan gnyis gnyis su yod pa las/ dang po dgu ni pa rasmai pa da ste gzhan don gyi tshig can gyi rnam dbye zhes bya'o/ ! /pa rA
<p>68a.7</p>N+yAt+ma ne pa dA naM/ pha rol rnams At+ma ne pa da'o/ /pa rasmai pa da las pha rol te phyi ma dgu ni At+ma ne pa da zhes bdag don gyi tshig can gyi rnam dbye zhes zer ro/ ! /brta ma ne tib+ha san+ti sib+thas+tha ming+basma sta yA ta yan+te sa yA the d+h+wa ye ba he ma heH da ltar ba la tipra/ tasra/ an+te/ sipra/ thasra/ 
<p>68b</p>
<p>68b.1</p>tha/ mipra/ bsra/ masra/ ! te/ A te/ an+te/ se/ A the/ d+h+we/ e/ ba he/ ma he'o/ /rnams dbye sde tshan bcu las 'jug bzhin pa dang bya ba shes par nus pa'i da ltar ba'i don la tipra la sogs pa bco brgyad po 'di rnams 'gyur te/ pA Ni pa'i lugs la laT+ra zhes zer ro/ ! / 
<p>68b.2</p>nAm+ni tsa yuSh+ma di tsAsma di tsA b+hA gaiHpra tha ma ma d+h+ye mot+ta mA/ dang po dbus ma phyi ma rnams ming dang yu Sh+mad/ asmadra rnams kyi dbye bas so/ /ti sogs rnam dbye dgu chan re re la'ang skyes bu dang po gsum dang dbus ma gsum dang phyi ma gsum ste gsum tshan gsum du yod pa las byings gang la'ang byings
<p>68b.3</p>de dang sbyor rgyu'i nye ba'i tshig dang por 'jog rgyu de yuSh+madra dang a smadra dag ma yin pa'i ming spyir bya ba yin na rnam dbye dgu tshan so so'i skyes bu dang po gsum 'jug cing / nye ba'i tshig de yuSh+madra yin na skyes bu dbus ma gsum dang asmadra yin na skyes bu phyi ma gsum 'jug go ! /karta ri baM tsa/ byed po
<p>68b.4</p>la paM yang ngo / /spyir byed pa dang sbyor ba'i bya ba'i don la paM ste pa rasmai pa da rnams 'jug pa shas che zhing dngos po dang las kyi bya ba'i don la At+ma ne pa da rnams 'jug pa spyir btang ngo / /de yang b+hU yod pa la'o zhes pa'i byings la brta ma na'i skyes bu dang po'i gcig tshig tipra byin pas/ b+hU/ 
<p>68b.5</p>tipra ces gnas pa la/ ! /abra karta ri/ byed pa po la apra'o/ /byings b+hU la sogs pa rnams la rnam dbye tipra sogs nas bzung dipra sogs kyi bar sde tshan bzhi po pha rol la byed pa po'i don du apra bi kA ra Na rkyen du 'gyur te/ apra bi kA ra Na byin/ ! gu NoH yon tan
<p>68b.6</p>no/ /rnam dbye dang rkyen yon tan 'byung ba'i rgyu mtshan can pha rol la byings kyi mtha' yon tan du 'gyur ro/ ! /a bit+tA dirdita/ pitra dang tA sogs ma yin pa ni ngitra'o/ /rnam dbye ba yig 'gro ba rnams dang 'og nas 'byung ba'i tA tA rau sogs ma yin pa'i rkyen rnams la ni nga
<p>68b.7</p>'gro ba'i ming can zhes zer te dgos pa ni byings la yon tan mi byed pa'i don no/ ! /kri t+ya d+yu si/ usra ma yin pa'i kitra ngitra la'o/ /'og nas 'byung ba'i rnam dbye usra ma yin pa'i kra 'gro ba'i ming can dang dra 'gro ba'i ming can rnams pha rol la byings la yon tan 'byung ba ma
<p>69a</p>
<p>69a.1</p>yin no/ /des na 'dir apra bi kA ra Na pra 'gro ba yin pas/ byings la yon tan/ pra de'i don/ o abra sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/ b+ha ba ti/ gnyis tshig la/ b+ha ba taH mang tshig la'ang b+hA b+ha bar bsgrub tshul sogs gong ltar byas pas/ 
<p>69a.2</p>b+ha ba/ an+ti zhes gnas pa la/ ! /a de/ ata kyi a dang e'o/ /byings kyi mtha'i atra ni rkyen a yig dang e yig pha rol la dbyi bar bya ste/ byings mtha'i a phyis yod/ pas/ b+ha ban+ti/ dag yod/ de bzhin du skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ b+ha ba si/ b+ha ba thaH 
<p>69a.3</p>b+ha ba tha/ skyes bu phyi ma'i gcig tshig la/ b+ha ba/ mipra ces gnas pa la/ ! /ba mo rA/ ba ma dag la A'o/ /rnam dbye ti sogs ba yig dang ma yig thog ma can pha rol la byings mtha'i a rnams yod/ thung ni A yig ring por 'gyur te/ b+ha bA mi/ de bzhin yod/du gnyis  dag yod 
<p>69a.4</p>rnams yod/ tshig dang mang tshig la/ b+ha bA baH b+ha bA maH gong du bshad pa ltar de rnams nye ba'i tshig dang sbyor tshul ni/ ming dang skyes bu dang po gsum rim bzhin sbyar bas/ si  sa rA dza d+hA rmi ko b+ha ba ti/ au tau rA dza  au  nau d+hArmi kau au b+ha ba taH te rA dzA no d+hArmi yod kA b+ha ban+ti/ an+ti/ yuSh+madra dang
<p>69a.5</p>skyes bu dbus ma rnams sbyar ba'i dpe ni/ ngag yod/ rnams yod/ twaM sA si d+hur+b+ha ba si/ sipra yu bAM sA d+hu b+ha ba thaH thasra yU yAM sA d+hu b+ha ba tha/ tha  skyes bu phyi ma a smad dang sbyor ba'i dpe ni/ de rgyal po chos dang ldan par yod/ si  si  tipra/ de dag rgyal po dag chos ldan dag yod/ tasa? dzasa? dzasa? a ha simAt+ma  dzasa? de rnams rgyal po rnams chos ldan rnams yod/ 
<p>69a.6</p>bid+d+hA bA mi/ mipa / A bA au  mAt+ma bi dau b+ha bA baH bsra  ba ya mAt+ma bi daHsi  si  khyod legs par yod/ o  khyod dag legs par yod pa dag/ khyed rnams legs pa rnams yod/ b+ha bA maH masa?  sogs so/ ! /a bya ba d+hA nAts+tsa pu ru Sha bi she ShaH bar ma chad pa las kyang skyes bu'i bye brag go /nga ni bdag nyid rig par yod/ ming dang yuSh+madra dang asmad
<p>69a.7</p>si  nged dag bdag nyid rig bdag yod/ au gsum re re la dzas skyes dzas  bu dang po dang dbus ma dang phyi ma gsum sbyor tshul gong du bshad nged rnams bdag nyid rig pa rnams yod/ pa ltar yin la/ ming dang yuSh+madra asmad gsum ga sgrigs pa dang gnyis sgrigs sogs bar ma chad pa las kyang de gsum gtso phal
<p>69b</p>
<p>69b.1</p>gyi skyes bu gsum po la'ang gtso phal bye brag yod la/ de yang gsum ga sgrigs pa la asmadra gtso bas skyes bu phyi ma dang / gnyis sgrigs pa la'ang asmad yod na de gtso bas phyi ma dang / asmadra med pa'i gnyis sgrigs la yuSh+madra gtso che bas skyes bu dbus ma 'jug ste/ 
<p>69b.2</p>sa tsa twaM tsa sA d+hu b+ha ba thaH zhes pa asmadra med na yuSh+ma da gtso che bas skyes bu dbus ma'i gnyis tshig thasra byung ba lta bu'o/ ! /bi d+hi saM b+ha ba na yoHyA t+yA tAMyu s+yAs+yA tAM yA ta yAM yA ba yA me te yA tA mI ra nI tha sI yA thA mI d+h+wa mI ye ba hI ma hi/ cho ga 'byung ba'i gnas dag las/ yAtra/ 
<p>69b.3</p>de dang khyod kyi legs par yod/ yA tAmra/ yusa?/ yAsra/ yA tAM/ yA ta/ yAM/ yA ba/ yA ma/ ! I ta/ I yA tAM/ I ranra/ I thasra/ I yA thAM/ I d+hAM/ I ya/ I ba hi/ I ma hi rnams so/ /cho ga zhes pa bya ba'i don la nye bar ston pa dang 'byung ba'i gnas te rtogs pas
<p>69b.4</p>shes pa'i bya ba'i don la rnam dbye yAtra la sogs pa 'di rnams 'jug ste/ pA Ni pa'i lugs la ling zer ro/ /de yang gong bzhin/ b+hU b+ha bar bsgrub pa la/ pa rasmai pa da'i skyes bu dang po'i gcig tshig yAtra sbyar/ b+ha ba/ yAtra ces gnas pa la/ ! /yA/ a la ya'i'o/ / 
<p>69b.5</p>byings a yig mtha' las pha rol gyi rnam dbye'i yA yig ni I ru 'gyur te/ yA I/ a i la er bsgyur bas/ b+ha be+etra/ de bzhin du gnyis tshig la/ b+ha be tAM/ mang tshig la/ b+ha ba/ yusa? zhes gnas pa la/ ! /yusra iT+ra/ yusra la iTu'o/ /a yig mtha' las pha rol gyi
<p>69b.6</p>yus la iT+ra A ga ma 'gyur te/ iT+ra byin/ T+ra gnas don/ a i la e/ b+ha be+e yuH skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ b+ha be+eH b+ha be+e tAM/ b+ha be ta/ skyes bu phyi ma'i gcig tshig la/ b+ha ba/ yAM zhes gnas pa la/ ! yA mi yaM/ yAmra i yaM mo/ /a
<p>69b.7</p>yig mtha' las pha rol gyi rnam dbye yAM ni i yaM du 'gyur te/ b+ha be+e yaM/ gnyis tshig dang mang tshig la/ b+ha be+e ba/ b+ha be+e ma/ de rnams nye ba'i tshig dang sbyar ba'i dpe ni/ shi Sh+yo gu ru shu shruSha ko b+ha be+eta/ atra slob mas bla ma bsten pa'i bya ba byed/ ces pa cho ga 'byung ba'i dpe dang / 
<p>70a</p>
<p>70a.1</p>b+ha be+e da sau be+e da pA ra go brAh+ma Na twA di ti saM b+hA ba naM/ zhes pa 'byung ba'i gnas kyi dpe'o/ ! /a shIH bre ra Na yoHtup+tA man+tu hi taM tA ni bA ba bA map+tA mA tA man+tAMswA thAM d+h+wA mai bA ba hai bA ma haipra/ shis byed dang byed du 'jug pa dag la tupra/ tAM an+tu/ hi taM ta/ A nipra/ A bapra/ A mapra/ ! tAM
<p>70a.2</p>A tAM/ an+t+wam/ yAta 'di ltar khyod rig byed kyi pha rol tu son na bram ze'o/ /swa A thAmra/ d+h+wAm/ aipra/ A ba haipra/ A ma haipra rnams so/ /ma thob pa thob par byed pa sogs bkra shis pa'i don dang 'dod pa dang mthun par bskul ba sogs byed du 'jug pa'i don la tupra la sogs pa 'di rnams
<p>70a.3</p>'gyur zhing / pA Ni pa'i lugs la loT+ra zer ro/ /de yang b+hU b+ha bar bsgrub tshul gong ltar la/ skyes bu dang po'i gcig tshig la/ b+ha ba/ tupra ces gnas pa la/ shis byed kyi don la skyes bu dang po'i gcig tshig tupra dang skyes bu dbus ma'i gcig tshig hi gnyis ni tA tang zhes
<p>70a.4</p>par bsgyur ba dang mi bsgyur ba 'dam kha can du bshad pas/ b+ha ba tu/ b+ha ba tAtra/ gnyis tshig dang mang tshig la/ b+ha ba tAM/ a b+ha ban+tu/ skyes bu dbus ma'i gcig tshig la/ b+ha ba/ hi zhes gnas pa la/ ! /a taH atra las so/ /a yig mtha' las pha rol gyi hi ni
<p>70a.5</p>dbyi bar bya ste/ hi dbyi ba dang shes byed kyi don la tA tang du bsgyur ba yang na bar byas pas/ b+ha ba/ b+ha ba tAtra/ gnyis tshig dang mang tshig la/ b+ha ba taM/ b+ha ba ta/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ b+ha bA ni/ b+ha bA ba/ b+ha bA ma/ de rnams nye ba'i tshig dang sbyar ba'i dpe ni/ 
<p>70a.6</p>A yuSh+mAn+b+ha ba tu/ shis byed kyi dpe/ A yuSh+mAn+b+ha ba tAtra/ a d+h+ya ya nA yo ra d+ya to b+ha ba sau mya/ ! a na d+ya ne A dI te dip+tA man+si pAM tAM mib+bam ta nA tA maM ta thA sA thAM d+h+wa mi ba hi ma hi/ de ring ma yin pa'i 'das pa la/ dipra/ tAmra/ anra/ sipra/ tamra/ ta/ a mipra/ ba ma/ ! tanra/ A
<p>70a.7</p>tAmra/ an+ta/ khyod tshe dang ldan par gyur cig/ klog cing 'don pa de nyid mdzod cig dge ba'o/ byed du 'jug pa'i dpe/ thAsra/ A thAmra/ d+hAM/ i/ ba hi/ ma hi rnams so/ /de ring ma yin pa'i 'das pa ste dus 'das pa yin pa la 'das nas yun ring ma song ba'i don la dipra la sogs pa'i rnam dbye 'di rnams 'gyur
<p>70b</p>
<p>70b.1</p>te/ pA Ni pa'i lugs la'ang zer ro/ /rnam dbye de rnams kyi dipra dang sipra dang mipra rnams kyi pra yig yon tan gyi don dang i yig brjod pa'i don/ tan gyi na yig dgos pa dang bcas pa'i rjes 'brel yin no/ /b+hU b+ha bar bsgrub tshul sngar ltar byas pas/ b+ha ba/ dipra ces gnas
<p>70b.2</p>pa la/ ! dI bA dA baT+ra/ dipra sogs la aT+ra'o/ /rnam dbye dipra sogs pha rol la de rnams sbyor rgyu'i byings de la aT+ra A ga ma ster bar bya ste/ aT+ra byin gnas med pa la yang na'os/ da nyid dang ta 'dam kha can du byas pas/ a b+ha batra/ a b+ha badra/ de bzhin du bsgrubs pas/ 
<p>70b.3</p>gnyis tshig dang mang tshig la/ a b+ha ba tAM/ a b+ha banra/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ a b+ha baH a b+ha ba taM/ a b+ha ba ta/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ a b+ha baM/ a b+ha bA ba/ a b+ha bA ma/ de rnams nye ba'i tshig dang sbyar ba'i dpe ni/ h+yo\u0f85b+ha ba tatwat+pu
<p>70b.4</p>traH sogs so/ /de nas brta ma na la sogs pa de rnams kyi At+ma ne pa da rnams byings dang sbyor tshul ni/ e d+ha 'phel ba la'o zhes pa'i byings la/ brta ma na'i At+ma ne pa da'i skyes bu dang po'i gcig tshig ste/ byings mtha'i a brjod don/ byed pa po kha sang byung ngo khyod kyi bu/ 
<p>70b.5</p>la zhes pas/ apra bi kA ra Na byin/ e d+ha te/ gnyis tshig sogs kun la apra bi kA ra Na sbyar ba'i e d+ha zhes pa'i bar gong bzhin bsgrubs pas/ e d+ha/ A te zhes gnas pa la/ ! /A dA tha i/ Atra A tha'i i'o/ /a yig mtha' las pha rol gyi Atra dang A tha ste ta
<p>70b.6</p>dang tha yig dag dang 'brel ba'i A ni i ru 'gyur te/ e d+he te/ mang tshig la/ e d+han+te/ de bzhin du skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ e d+ha se/ e d+he the/ e d+ha d+h+we/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ e d+he/ e d+hA ba he/ e d+hA ma he/ de rnams nye ba'i
<p>70b.7</p>tshig dang sbyar ba'i dpe ni/ d+harmA de d+ha te o da rA dz+yaM/ chos kyi mtho gyur da lta rgyal po/ ! /cho ga dang 'byung ba'i don gyi At+ma ne pa da rnams sbyor ba'i dpe ni apra bi kA ra Na ster ba sogs gong ltar bsgrubs pas/ skyes bu dang po gsum la/ e d+he ta/ e d+he yA tAM/ e d+he ran/ skyes bu dbus
<p>71a</p>
<p>71a.1</p>ma gsum la/ e d+he thaH e d+he yA tAM/ e d+he ranra/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ e d+he ya/ e d+he ba hi/ e d+he ma hi/ nye ba'i tshig dang sbyar ba'i dpe ni/ d+harma taHsA d+hu re d+he ta/ Ita/ ! shis byed dang byed du 'jug pa'i don gyi At+ma ne
<p>71a.2</p>pa da rnams sbyor tshul ni/ e d+har bsgrubs pa sogs gong bzhin byas pas skyes bu dang po gsum la/ e d+ha tAM/ e d+he tAM/ e d+han+tAM/ dbus ma gsum la/ e d+ha swa/ e d+he thAM/ chos dang ldan pa las legs pa 'phel lo/ e d+ha d+h+wAM/ phyi ma gsum la/ e d+hai/ 
<p>71a.3</p>e d+hA ba hai/ e d+hA ma hai/ ! de ring ma yin pa'i 'das pa'i don gyi At+ma ne pa da sbyor tshul ni/ e d+ha/ tanra zhes gnas pa la/ dipra sogs la aT+ra 'os A ga ma byin/ ! swa rA deH dbyangs thog ma las so/ /rnams dbye dipra la sogs pa pha
<p>71a.4</p>rol la de sbyor yul gyi byings de'i thog ma dbyangs rkyang pa yin na dbyangs de la slar yang aT+ra A ga ma ster bar bya ste/ slar yang aT+ra byin rim bzhin mtshams sbyar bas/ ai d+ha ta/ gnyis tshig dang mang tshig la/ ai d+he tAM/ ai d+han+ta/ dbus ma gsum la/ 
<p>71a.5</p>ai d+ha thAH ai d+he thAM/ ai d+ha d+h+waM/ phyi ma gsum la/ ai d+he/ ai d+hA ba hi/ ai d+hA ma hi/ de bzhin du/ I k+Sha lta ba la'o zhes pa'i byings la brta ma na sogs kyi At+ma ne pa da rnams sbyar/ cho ga sngon ma rnams dang 'dra bar bsgrubs pas/ brta ma na'i skyes bu gsum
<p>71a.6</p>la rim pa bzhin/ Ik+Sha te/ Ik+She te/ Ik+Sha n+te/ Ik+Sha se/ Ik+She the/ Ik+Sha d+h+we/ Ik+She/ Ik+ShA ba he/ Ik+ShA ma he/ ! cho ga dang 'byung ba'i don gyi skyes bu gsum la/ Ik+She ta/ Ik+She yA tAM/ Ik+She ranra/ Ik+She thaH Ik+She yA thAM/ Ik+She
<p>71a.7</p>ya/ Ik+She ba hi/ Ik+She ma hi/ ! shis byed dang byed du 'jug pa'i don gyi skyes bu gsum la/ Ik+Sha tAM/ Ik+She tAM/ Ik+Shan+tAM/ Ik+Sha swa/ Ik+She thAM/ Ik+She d+h+wAM/ Ik+Shai/ Ik+ShA ba hai/ Ik+ShA ma hai/ ! de ring ma yin pa'i 'das pa'i don gyis skyes bu gsum la/ 
<p>71b</p>
<p>71b.1</p>aik+Sha ta/ aik+She tAM/ aik+Shan+ta/ aik+Sha thAH aik+She thAM/ aik+She d+h+waM/ aik+She/ aik+ShA ba hi/ aik+ShA ma hi/ sogs mtha' yas so/ ! /de nas gnyis ka'i tshig can gyi dpe ni Du pa tsaSh+ra 'tshed pa la'o zhes pa'i byings la rnam dbye rnams kyi pa rasmai pa da dang / At+ma ne pa da
<p>71b.2</p>gnyis ka 'jug ste byings kyi Du dang Sh+ra dgos pa dang bcas pa'i rjes 'brel tsa'i a swa ri taste gnyis ka'i tshig can yin pa'i don te/ rjes 'brel rnams phyis/ apra bi kA ra Na ster ba sogs cho ga thams cad b+hU dang e d+ha'i skabs dang 'dra bas/ ! brta
<p>71b.3</p>man laT+ra'i pa rasmai pa da'i skyes bu gsum la rim pa bzhin/ pa tsa ti/ pa tsa taH pa tsan+ti/ pa tsa si/ pa tsa thaH pa tsa tha/ pa tsA mi/ pa tsA ba/ pa tsA maH/ ! cho ga dang 'byung ba'i don gyi skyes bu gsum la/ pa tsetra/ pa tse tAM/ pa tse yuH/ 
<p>71b.4</p>pa tseH pa tse taM/ pa tse ta/ pa tse yaM/ pa tse ba/ pa tse ma/ ! shis byed loTa'i skyes bu gsum la/ pa tsa tu/ pa tsa tAtra/ pa tsa tAM/ pa tsan+ta/ pa tsa/ pa tsa tAtra/ pa tsa taM/ pa tsa ta/ pa tsA ni/ pa tsA ba/ pa tsA ma/ ! de ring ma yin pa ling gi
<p>71b.5</p>skyes bu gsum la/ a pa tsatra/ a pa tsa tAM/ a pa tsanra/ a pa tsaH a pa tsa taM/ a pa tsa ta/ a pa tsaM/ a pa tsA ba/ a pa tsA ma/ ! yang At+ma ne pa da rnams sbyar bas brta ma na laT+ra la/ pa tsa te/ pa tse te/ pa tsan+te/ pa tsa se/ pa tse the/ pa tsa d+h+we/ 
<p>71b.6</p>pa tse/ pa tsA ba he/ pa tsA ma he/ ! cho ga dang 'byung ba ling+ra la/ pa tse ta/ pa tse yA tAM/ pa tse ranra/ pa tse thaH pa tse yA thAM/ pa tse d+h+waM/ pa tse ya/ pa tse ba hi/ pa tse ma hi/ ! shes byed loT+ra la/ pa tsa tAM/ pa tse tAM/ pa tsan+tAM/ pa tsa swa/ pa tse thAM/ pa tsa d+h+waM/ 
<p>71b.7</p>ba tsai/ pa tsA ba hai/ pa tsA ma hai/ ! de ring ma yin pa lang+ra la/ a pa tsa ta/ a pa tse tAM/ a pa tsan+ta/ a pa tsa thAH a pa tse thAM/ a pa tsa d+h+waM/ a pa tse/ a pa tsA ba hi/ a pa tsA ma hi/ sogs te byings bdag don can la At+ma ne pa da dang gzhan
<p>72a</p>
<p>72a.1</p>don can la pa rasmai pa da dang gnyis ka'i tshig can la gnyis ka sbyor tshul rnams rigs 'gre ste shes par bya'o/ ! /de nas adra la sogs pa apra bi kA ra Na 'jig pa rnams kyi cho ga rnams bshad par bya ste/ ! a dA derlukra/ adra la sogs pa
<p>72a.2</p>rnams las 'jig go/ /byings adra la sogs pa'i sde las pha rol gyi byed pa po'i don can gyi apra bi kA ra Na ni 'jig ste/ a da za ba la'o zhes pa'i byings la brta ma na sogs kyi pa rasmai pa da rnams sbyar/ apra bi kA ra Na byin de 'jig /kha sa la dz+ha sa rnams kyi tsa pa'o
<p>72a.3</p>sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/ brta ma na laT+ra'i skyes bu gsum la/ ! at+ti/ za bar byed/ at+taH a dan+ti/ at+si/ at+thaH at+tha/ ad+mi/ a dwaH aR+maH/ ! cho ga dang 'byung ba ling gi skyes bu gsum la/ ad+yAtra/ a d+yA tAM/ ad+yuH a d+yAH a d+yA tAMH ad+yAM/ 
<p>72a.4</p>ad+yA ba/ ad+yA ma/ ! shing byed loT+ra'o skyes bu dang po gsum la/ at+tu/ at+tAtra/ at+tAM/ a dan+tu/ skyes bu dbus ma'i gcig tshig la/ adra hi zhes gnas pa la/ ! dza sAd+d+hir+heH dza sa las hi'i d+hi'o/ /byings dza sa so sor bsdu ba'i pha rol gyi rnam dbye
<p>72a.5</p>hi ni d+hi ru 'gyur te/ hi d+hi ru bsgyur ba dang / shis byed kyi don la tA tang+ra du bsgyur ba yang na bar byas pas/ ad+d+hi/ at+tAtra/ gnyis tshig dang mang tshig la/ at+taM/ at+ta/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ a dA ni/ a dA ba/ a dA ma/ ! de ring ma yin pa lang+ra la/ adra la
<p>72a.6</p>sogs pa'i pha rol gyi dipra dang sipra la aT+ra A ga ma ster bar bshad pas/ dipra sipra gnyis la aT+ra dang / dipra sogs la aT+ra 'os/ byings kyi dang por aT+ra/ dbyangs thog ma las sos aT+ra de gnyis mtshams sbyor ba sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/ A datra/ At+tAM/ 
<p>72a.7</p>A danra/ A daH At+taM/ At+ta/ A daM/ A dwa/ Ad+ma/ At+ma ne pa da'i dpe ni/ shIng+ra nyal ba la'o zhes pa'i byings la brta ma na laT+ra sogs kyi At+ma ne pa da rnams sbyar/ byings mtha'i nga At+ma ne pa da'i don/ apra 'jig ! shI ngaH/ shing gi'o/ /rnam dbye At+ma ne
<p>72b</p>
<p>72b.1</p>pa da rnams pha rol la byings shIng+ra gi I yig ni rtag tu yon tan du 'gyur te/ brta ma na'i skyes bu dang po'i gcig tshig dang gnyis tshig la/ she te/ sha yA te/ mang tshig la/ she/ an+te zhes gnas pa la/ ! shI ngo\u0f85n+to ruT+ra/ shI las an+ta la ruT+ra'o/ /byings shIng
<p>72b.2</p>las pha rol gyi rnam dbye At+ma ne pa da'i an+ta rnams la ruT+ra A ga ma 'gyur te/ ruT+ra byin/ T+ra gnas don/ u brjod don/ /A to\u0f85to da na taH atu ma yin pa la Atra kyi at+ma a ta'o/ /byings atra mtha' ma yin pa las pha rol gyi Atra te rnam dbye at+ma ne pa da'i an+ta rnams ni
<p>72b.3</p>a ta zhes par 'gyur te/ an+te/ a te ru bsgyur bas/ she ra te/ de bzhin tu bsgrubs pas/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ sha She/ sha yA the/ she d+h+we/ phyi ma gsum la/ sha ye/ she ba he/ she ma he/ cho ga de bzhin du byas pas cho ga dang 'byung gnas ling+ra gi skyes
<p>72b.4</p>bu gsum la/ sha yI ta/ sha yI yA tAM/ sha yI ranra/ sha yI thaH sha yI yA thAM/ sha yI d+h+waM/ sha yI ya/ sha yI ba hi/ sha yI ma hi/ shis byed loT+ra la/ she tAM/ sha yA tAM/ she ran+tAM/ she Sh+wa/ sha yA thaM/ she d+h+waM/ sha yai/ sha yA ba hai/ sha yA ma hai/ ! de ring ma yin pa
<p>72b.5</p>lang la/ a she ta/ a sha yA tAM/ a she ra ta/ a she thAH a sha yA thAM/ a she d+hAM/ a sha yi/ a she ba hi/ a she ma hi/ ! de nas gnyis ka'i tshig can gyi dpe ni/ brAny+ra gsal bar brjod pa la'o zhes pa'i byings la brta ma na laT+ra sogs kyi rnam dbye gnyis ka sbyor/ 
<p>72b.6</p>byings mtha'i nya yig gnyis ka'i tshig can gyi don/ apra 'jig ste/ de la dang po brta ma na'i pa rasmai pa da'i skyes bu dang po'i gcig tshig la/ /brA tipra zhes gnas pa la/ ! a bA dA dzI pi tit+s+mi/ ta sa ma pra 'gro ba las apra sngon ma la I'o/ /byings brU la rnam dbye ti
<p>72b.7</p>sogs ta yig dang sa yig dang ma yig dang po can bra lku yig 'gro ba'i ming can rnams pha rol las apra sngon du byung ba'i yul la I rkyen du 'gyur zhing / byings de la'ang yon tan thob ste/ A+o sbyar yon tan byas pas/ bra bI ti/ gnyis tshig la/ brU taH mang tshig la/ brU/ 
<p>73a</p>
<p>73a.1</p>an+ti/ zhes gnas pa la/ ! nA na pyorbaH apra med pa la U'i w+ra ma yin no/ /apra bi kA ra Na phyis pa'i yul las byings mtha'i U yig ni dbyangs dang po can pha rol la wa yig tu 'gyur ba ma yin te/ byings kyi I U sogs kyi uw+ra ru bsgyur pas/ 
<p>73a.2</p>bru ban+ti/ de rnams dang 'dra bar bsgrubs pas/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ pra bI Shi/ brU thaH brU tha/ phyi ma gsum la/ bra bI mi/ brU baH brU maH ! de bzhin du At+ma ne pa da rnams la/ brU te/ bru bA te/ bru ba te/ brU She/ bru bA the/ brU d+d+h+we/ bru be+e/ brU bA he/ 
<p>73a.3</p>brU ma he/ ! brUnya'i lus 'gyur gzhan ni/ bru ba A hash+tsa pany+tsa naM/ brU'i Aha ste lnga po rnams kyang ngo / /ti sogs rnam dbye dang po lnga pha rol la byings brU ni Ahra zhes par 'gyur zhing tipra sogs lnga po yang rim ata ma yin pa la Ata kyi an+ta ata 'os an+te a ter bsgyur/ bzhin/ 
<p>73a.4</p>Napra/ a tusra/ usra/ thabra/ a thus rnams su 'gyur te/ skyes bu dang po'i gcig tshig la/ tipra/ Napra/ pra rjes 'brel/ Na yig byings la 'phel ba byed pa'i don/ brU/ A hra ru bsgyur bas/ A ha/ gnyis tshig la/ tasra/ a tus su bsgyur bas/ A ha tuH mang
<p>73a.5</p>tshig la an+ti usra su bsgyur bas/ A huH skyes bu dbus ma'i gcig tshig la/ sipra thapra tu bsgyur bas/ Ahra/ tha pra ces gnas pa la/ ! ta the/ tha la ta'o/ /rnam dbye tha yig dang po can pha rol la brU 'gyur ba'i Ahra'i hra yig ni ta yig tu 'gyur te/ hra trar bsgyur
<p>73a.6</p>bas/ At+tha/ gnyis tshig la/ thasra/ a thus su bsgyur bas/ A ha thuH rnams so/ ! /gong ma rnams dang 'dra bar bsgrubs pas chog 'byung ling+ra gi pa rasmai pa da rnams la/ brU yAtra/ brU yA tAM/ brU yuH brU yAH brU yA tAM/ brU yA ta/ brU yAM/ brU yA ba/ brU yA ma/ 
<p>73a.7</p>At+ma ne pa da rnams la/ bru bI ta/ bru bI yA tAM/ bru bI ranra/ bru bI thaH bru bI yA thAM/ bru bI d+h+waM/ bru bI ya/ bru bI ba hi/ bru bI ma hi/ shis byed loT+ra'i pa rasmai pa da rnams la/ bra bI tu/ brU tAtra/ brU tAM/ bru ban+tu/ brU hi/ brU tAtra/ brU taM/ brU ta/ bra bA
<p>73b</p>
<p>73b.1</p>ni/ bra bA ba/ bra bA ma/ ! At+ma ne+e pa da rnams la/ brU tAM bru bA tAM/ bru ba tAM/ brU Sh+wa/ bru bA thAM/ brU d+h+waM/ bra bai/ bra bA ba hai/ bra bA ma hai/ ! /de ring ma yin pa lang gi pa rasmai pa da rnams la/ a bra bItra/ a byu tAM/ a bru banra/ a bra bIH a brU tAM/ a brU ta/ a bra baM/ 
<p>73b.2</p>a brU ba/ a brU ma/ ! At+ma ne+e pa da rnams la/ a brU ta/ a bru bA tAM/ a bru ba ta/ a brU thAH a bru bA thAM/ a brU d+h+waM/ a bru bi/ a brU ba hi/ a brU ma hi/ de rnams ni apra bi kA ra Na 'jig pa rnams kyi cho ga dper mtshon tsam brjod pa yin la/ byings hu sogs
<p>73b.3</p>la ni apra bi kA ra Na 'jig par ma zad khyad par gzhan yang yod de/ hwa der+d+wish+tsa/ hu la sogs pa'i gnyis kyang ngo / /rnam dbye tipra la sogs pa pha rol la yod cing apra bi kA ra Na 'jig pa las byings hu la sogs pa rnams ni gnyis su 'gyur ro/ ! /sa swa
<p>73b.4</p>rA dir+d+wi ra dIH dbyangs bcas dang po gnyis te gnyis pa ma yin no/ /byings gnyis su 'gyur ba de yang byings kyi dang po'i yi ge dbyangs bcas gnyis su 'gyur la yi ge gnyis pa sogs gzhan rnams ni gnyis su 'gyur ba ma yin no/ /ku hosh+tsuH 
<p>73b.5</p>ku dang ha'i tsu'o/ /byings gnyis brjod pa'i dang po'i yi ge de ka sde yin na/ rim pa ltar tsa sder 'gyur zhing ha yin na dz+ha yig tu 'gyur ro/ ! /dz+ha pA mAM dza ba tsa pAH dz+ha pa rnams kyi dza ba dang tsa pa'o/ /byings gnyis brjod pa'i dang po'i yi ge de dz+ha pa so sor bsdu ba yin na dza ba so sor
<p>73b.6</p>bsdu ba rnams dang tsa pa so sor bsdu ba rnams su 'gyur la de yang dz+ha pa'i nang nas dz+ha D+ha d+ha g+ha b+ha rnams rim pa bzhin dza Da da ga ba rnams dang / kha pha tsha Tha tha rnams rang sde'i tsa Ta ta ka pa rnams su 'gyur ro/ /de ltar na hu sbyin pa dang mchod pa dag la'o
<p>73b.7</p>zhes pa'i byings la/ brta ma na'i pa rasmai pa da'i skyes bu dang po'i gcig tshig tipra/ apra 'jig /byings gnyis brjod/ ha dz+ha/ de yang dzar bsgyur ba sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/ dzu ho ti/ de bzhin du 'og ma rnams kyang bsgrubs pas gnyis tshig la/ dzu hu taH/ 
<p>74a</p>
<p>74a.1</p>mang tshig la/ /dzu hu an+ti zhes gnas pa la/ ! dwe/ gnyis las so/ /byings gnyis brjod pa las pha rol gyi an+ta ni a ta zhes par 'gyur te/ dzu hwa ti/ dbus ma gsum la/ dzu ho Shi/ dzu hu thaH dzu hu tha/ phyi ma'i gcig tshig la/ dzu ho
<p>74a.2</p>mi/ gnyis tshig dang mang tshig la/ ! orba morbA lo paH ba ma dag la u yang na dbyi'o/ /byings mtha'i gdod ma'i u dang rkyen kyi u ni rnam dbyi ba dang ma dag pha rol la yang na dbyi bar bya ste/ u dbyi ba dang mi dbye ba 'dam ka can du byas pas/ dzu hu baH dzu hwaH 
<p>74a.3</p>dzu hu maH dzu h+maH/ ! de bzhin du chog 'byung ling la/ dzu hu yAtra/ dzu hu yA tAM/ dzu hu yuHsogs so/ ! shis byed loT+ra'i skyes bu dang po gsum la/ dzu ho tu/ dzu hu tAtra/ dzu hu tAM/ dzu hwa tu/ ! skyes bu dbus ma'i gcig tshig la/ he d+hiH hi'i d+hi'o/ / 
<p>74a.4</p>byings hu las pha rol gyi hi ni d+hi zhes par 'gyur te/ dzu hu d+hi/ dzu hu tAtra/ gnyis tshig dang mang tshig la/ dzu hu haM/ dzu hu ta/ phyi ma gsum la/ dzu ha bA ni/ dzu ha bA ba/ dzu ha bA ma/ ! de ring ma yin pa lang gi skyes bu dang po'i gcig tshig dang gnyis tshig la/ a dzu
<p>74a.5</p>hotra/ a dzu hu tAM/ mang tshig la/ ! a na us/ anra gyi usra so/ /byings gnyis su brjod pa'i pha rol gyi rnam dbye anra gyi usra su 'gyur zhing byings las yon tan kyang 'byung ste/ a dzu ha buH dbus ma gsum la/ a dzu hoH a dzu hu taM/ a dzu hu ta/ phyi ma
<p>74a.6</p>gsum la/ a dzu ha baM/ a dzu hu ba/ a dzu hwa/ a dzu hu ma/ a dzu h+ma/ sogs so/ ! byings gnyis brjod pa At+ma ne pa da'i dpe tsam brjod na/ o hAng 'gro ba la'o zhes pa'i byings la brta ma na laT+ra'i At+ma ne pa da'i skyes bu dang po'i gcig tshig te sbyar/ byings kyi o
<p>74a.7</p>bya ba'i don dang nga At+ma ne'i don gnyis brjod/ ha dz+har bsgyur ba sogs kyis/ dzA hA te zhes gnas pa la/ ! hra swaH thung ngu'o/ /byings gnyis brjod pa'i dang po de'i dbyangs ring po yin na thung ngur 'gyur te/ dzA'i a thung ngur bsgyur/ /b+h+r-i nyAM lu ki/ 'jig pa la b+h+r-iny+ra
<p>74b</p>
<p>74b.1</p>rnams kyi'o/ /apra bi kA ra Na sogs rkyen 'jig pa la byings Du b+h+r-inya 'dzin pa dang rgyas pa o hAng+ra 'gro ba/ mAdra mchod pa rnams kyi dang po'i a ni i ru 'gyur te/ a ir bsgyur/ ! dwe stau lo po nya nu brta te I kA rash+tsa/ gnyis nyid las mi gnas pa rjes su 'jug pa la I yig
<p>74b.2</p>kyang ngo / /byings gnyis brjod pa apra sogs mi snang ba rjes su 'jug pa las byings de'i mtha' A yig yin na rnam dbye dbyangs thog ma can ng+ra 'gro ba'i ming can rnams la A dbyi zhing / gsal byed thog ma can ng+ra 'gro ba'i ming can rnams la A de I yig tu yang 'gyur te/ A
<p>74b.3</p>Ir bsgyur bas/ dzi hI te/ de bzhin du bsgrubs pas/ gnyis tshig dang mang tshig la/ dzi hI te/ dzi ha te/ dbus ma gsum la/ dzi hI She/ dzi hA the/ dzi hI d+h+we/ phyi ma gsum la/ dzi he/ dzi hI ba he/ dzi hI ma he/ ! chog 'byung ling+ra la/ dzi hI
<p>74b.4</p>ta/ dzi hI yA tAM/ dzi hI ranra/ sogs dang / ! shis byed loT la/ dzi hI tAM/ dzi hA tAM/ dzi ha tAM/ dzi hI Sh+wa/ dzi hA thAM/ dzi hI d+h+waM/ dzi hai/ dzi hA ba hai/ dzi hA ma hai/ ! de ring ma yin pa lang la/ a dzi hI ta/ a dzi hA tAM/ a dzi ha ta/ a dzi hI thaH a dzi
<p>74b.5</p>hA thAM/ a dzi hI d+h+waM/ a dzi hi/ a dzi hI ba hi/ a dzi hI ma hi/ ! byings gnyis brjod pa gnyis ka'i tshig can gyi dpe ni/ o hA kra gtong ba la'o/ /zhes pa'i byings la rjes 'brel rnams phyis rnam dbye bdag don dang gzhan don gnyis ka sbyor ba las/ dang po pa rasmai pa
<p>74b.6</p>da rnams sbyar cho ga sngon ma ltar byas pas/ ! brta ma na la/ dza hA ti/ dza tI taH dza hi ti/ dza hA se/ dza hA thaH dza hA+e shaM/ dza hA mi/ dza hI baH dza hI maH/ ! chog 'byung ling la/ dza hA'i A yig yA pha rol la dbyi bar bshad pas/ A phyis nas yA la drangs pas/ 
<p>74b.7</p>dza h+yatra/ dza h+yA tAM/ dza h+yuHsogs so/ ! /shis byed loTa?'i skyes bu dang po gsum la/ dza hA tu/ dza hI tAtra/ dza tI t+t+waM/ dza ha tu/ skyes bu dbus ma'i gcig tshig la/ ! Irba hau/ hi la i dang I yang na'o/ /rnam dbye hi pha rol la o hA kra'i mtha'i A ni i ru bsgyur ba
<p>75a</p>
<p>75a.1</p>dang I ru bsgyur ba yang na bar bya ste/ dza hi hi/ dza hI hi/ dza hI tAtra/ gnyis tshig dang mang tshig la/ dza hI taM/ dza hI ta/ phyi ma gsum la/ dza hA ni/ dza hA ba/ dza hA ma/ ! de ring ma yin pa lang gi skyes bu dang po'i gcig tshig dang gnyis tshig la/ a
<p>75a.2</p>dza hAtra/ a dza hI tAM/ mang tshig la anra usra su bsgyur bas a dza hA/ usra zhes gnas pa la/ ! u s+yA lo paH usra la A dbyi'o/ /rnam dbye anra bsgyur ba'i usra pha rol la byings o hAka'i mtha'i A ni dbyi bar bya ste A phyis pas/ a dza huH skyes bu dbus ma dang phyi ma la/ 
<p>75a.3</p>a dza hAH a dza hI taM/ a dza hI ta/ a dza haM/ a dza hI ba/ a dza hI ma/ sogs dang de rnams kyi At+ma ne pa da rnams kyang rigs 'gre ste shes par bya'o/ ! /de bzhin du che dAny+ra sbyin pa la'o zhes pa'i byings la yang thog mar pa rasmai pa da rnams sbyor te/ byings kyi Du yig Du 'gro ba'i don/ 
<p>75a.4</p>ny+ra gnyis ka'i tshig can gyi don/ apra 'jig /gnyis brjod pa sogs kyis bsgrubs pas brta ma na'i skyes bu dang po'i gcig tshig la/ da hA ti/ gnyis tshig la/ da hA/ tasra zhes gnas pa la/ ! dA deH dA la sogs pa'i 'o/ /rnam dbye ng+ra 'gro ba'i ming can rnams pha rol
<p>75a.5</p>la byings Du dAny+ra la sogs pa gnyis brjod pa'i mtha'i A yig ni dbyi bar bya ste A phyis pas/ dat+ta/ mang tshig la/ da da ti/ de bzhin du bsgrubs pas dbus ma gsum la/ da dA si/ dat+thaH dat+tha/ da dA mi/ da dwaH dad+maH/ ! chog 'byung ling la/ da t+yAtra/ da t+yA tAM/ da d+yuH 
<p>75a.6</p>da d+yAH da d+yA taM/ da d+yA ta/ da d+yAM/ da d+yA pa/ da d+yA ma/ ! shis byed loT+ra la/ da dA tu/ dat+tAtra/ dat+tAM/ da da tu/ skyes bu dbus ma'i gcig tshig la/ da dA/ hi zhes gnas pa la/ ! dAM hau/ dA rnams kyi hi la'o/ /byings dA la sogs pa rnams kyi rnam dbye hi pha rol la
<p>75a.7</p>byings gnyis brjod pa'i dang po dbyi zhing mtha'i A yig kyang e ru 'gyur te/ de hi/ dat+tAtra/ gnyis tshig dang mang tshig la/ dat+tAM/ dat+ta/ phyi ma gsum la/ da dA ni/ da dA pa/ da dA ma/ ! de ring ma yin pa lang+ra la/ a da dAtra/ a dat+tAM/ a da duH a da dAH a dat+taM/ 
<p>75b</p>
<p>75b.1</p>a dat+ta/ a da dAM/ a da dwa/ a dad+ma/ de bzhin du/ At+ma ne pa da rnams sbyor ba las brta ma na laT+ra la/ dat+te/ da dA te/ da da te/ dat+se/ da dA the/ dad+d+h+we/ da de/ da dwa he/ dad+ma he/ ! chog 'byung ling la/ da dI ta/ da dI yA tAM/ da dI ranra/ sogs so/ /shis
<p>75b.2</p>byed loT la/ dat+tAM/ da dA tAM/ da da tAM/ dat+s+wa/ da dA thAM/ d+had+d+hAM/ da dai/ da dA ba hai/ da dA ma hai/ ! de ring ma yin pa lang la/ a dat+ta/ a da dA tAM/ a da da ta/a dat+thAH a da dAthAM/ a dad+d+h+waM/ a da di/ a da dwa hi/ a dad+ma hi/ de bzhin du Du d+hAnya 'dzin pa dang rgyas pa la'o
<p>75b.3</p>zhes pa'i byings kyang gnyis ka'i tshig can yin pa las/ thog mar pa rasmai pa da rnams sbyor ba la/ cho ga snga ma rnams dang 'dra bar bsgrubs pas brta ma na'i skyes bu dang po'i gcig tshig la/ da d+hA ti/ gnyis tshig la/ dad+hA/ tasra zhes gnas pa la/ ! burba s+ya ngi ti dz+ha se d+haH nga 'gro ba
<p>75b.4</p>dz+ha sa sngon ma la d+ha'o/ /rnam dbye nga yig 'gro ba'i ming can dz+has so sor bsdu ba'i yi ge sngon ma can pha rol la byings Du d+hAnya sogs gnyis brjod pa'i da yig ni d+ha yig tu 'gyur te/ da slar yang d+har log /dA la sog pa'i 'os byings mtha'i A dbyi ba sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/ d+hat+taH 
<p>75b.5</p>mang tshig la/ dad+ha ti/ de bzhin du bsgrubs pas/ dad+hA si/ d+hat+thaH d+hat+tha/ da d+hA mi/ dad+h+waH dad+h+maH/ ! chog 'byung ling la/ dad+h+yAta/ dad+h+yA tAM/ dad+h+yuH sogs dang / shis byed loT la/ da d+hA tu/ d+hat+tAtra/ d+hat+tAM/ dad+ha tu/ d+he hi/ d+hat+tAtra/ d+hat+taM/ d+hat+ta/ 
<p>75b.6</p>da d+ha ni/ da d+hA ba/ da d+hA ma/ ! de ring ma yin pa lang la/ a da d+hAtra/ a d+hat+taM/ a da d+huH a dad+hAH a d+hat+taM/ a d+hat+ta/ a dad+hAM/ a dad+h+wa/ a dad+h+ma/ ! de nas At+ma ne pa da rnams las brta mne pa da rnams las brta ma na laT la/ d+hat+te/ da d+hA te/ da d+ha te/ d+hat+se/ 
<p>75b.7</p>da d+hA thai/ d+had+d+h+we/ da d+he/ da d+h+wa he/ dad+h+ma he/ ! chog 'byung ling la/ da d+hI ta/ da d+hI yA tAM/ da d+hI ran sogs dang / ! shis byed loT la/ d+hat+tAM/ da d+hA tAM/ d+hat+s+wa/ da d+hA thAM/ d+had+d+h+waM/ da d+hai/ da d+hA ba hai/ da d+hA ma hai/ ! de ring ma yin pa lang+ra la/ a d+hat+ta/ a
<p>76a</p>
<p>76a.1</p>da d+hA tAM/ a da d+ha ta/ a d+had+thAH a da d+hA thAM/ a d+had+d+h+waM/ a da d+hi/ a da d+h+wa hi/ a dad+h+ma hi/ sogs te/ de rnams kyi rigs 'gre ded de shes par bya'o/ ! /da ni byings dibra la sogs pa apra kyi yul la ya bi kA ra Na 'jug pa rnams kyi bya ba rnams
<p>76a.2</p>brjod par bya ste/ de yang de bu ste ba dang / mngon par 'dod pa dang / tha snyad dang / sdug gu'am 'du 'god dang / gsal ba dang / bstod pa dang / rmi lam dang / mdzes pa dang / dga' ba dang / myos pa dang / 'gro ba rnams la'o/ /zhes pa'i byings la brta ma na sogs kyi
<p>76a.3</p>pa rasmai pa da rnams sbyor te/ brta ma na'i skyes bu dang po'i gcig tshig la/ dipra/ tipra ces gnas pa la/ ! di bA der+YaH dipra la sogs pa la ya'o/ /byings dipra la sogs pa'i sde tshan rnams la byed pa po'i don gyi apra bi kA ra Na 'i yul la ya bi kA ra Na 'jug ste ya bi kA ra Na sbyar/ 
<p>76a.4</p>i u sogs kyi mdos ring por bsgyur bas/ dI bya taH dI byan+ti/ de bzhin du bsgrubs pas gnyis tshig dang mang tshig la/ dI bya taH dI byan+ti/ skyes bu dbus ma dang phyi ma la/ dI bya si/ dI bya thaH dI bya tha/ dI byA mi/ dI byA baH dI byA maH ! de bzhin du bsgrubs pas chog
<p>76a.5</p>'byung ling+ra la/ dI byetra/ dI bye tAM/ dI bye yuH dI byeH dI bye tAM/ dI bye ta/ dI bye yaM/ dI bye ba/ dI bye ma/ ! shis byed loT+ra la/ dI bya tu/ dI bya tAtra/ dI bya tAM/ dI byan+tu/ di bya/ di bya tAtra/ dI bya tAM/ dI bya ta/ dI byA ni/ dI byA ba/ dI byA ma/ ! de ring ma yin pa lang la/ 
<p>76a.6</p>a dI byatra/ a dI bya tAM/ a dI byanra/ a dI byaH a dI bya taM/ a dI bya ta/ a dI byAM/ a dI byA ba/ a dI byA ma sogs so/ ! de nas Shuny+ra la sogs pa nu bi kA ra Na 'jug pa rnams kyi bya ba'i dpe tsam brjod par bya ste/ Shuny+ra gcod cing brdung ba la'o zhes pa'i byings la brta ma na
<p>76a.7</p>sogs kyi bdag don dang gzhan don gnyis ka sbyor te/ dang po pa rasmai pa da rnams las brta ma na laT+ra'i skyes bu dang po'i gcig tshig tipra sbyar byings mtha'i ny+ra gnyis ka'i tshig can gyi don/ Shu/ tibra ces gnas pa la/ ! Ad+yaHSh+NaHsnaH dang po'i Sha Na ni sa na'o/ /byings kyi
<p>76b</p>
<p>76b.1</p>dang bo'i Sha yig dang Na yig ni rim pa ltar sa yig dang na yig tu 'gyur te/ Sha sar bsgyur/ ! swA dernuH su la sogs pa la nu'o/ /Shu sur bsgyur bas byings su la sogs pa rnams la rnam dbye laT+ra sogs sde tshan dang po bzhi pha rol la byed pa po'i don gyi apra kyi yul la nu bi kA ra Na 'jug ste nu
<p>76b.2</p>bi kA ra Na byin/ ! nU pa/ nu dang u'i pa la'o/ /rkyen nu bi kA ra Na dang u bi kA ra Na gnyis kyi mtha'i dbyangs ni rnam dbye ba 'gro ba'i ming can rnams pha rol la yon tan du 'gyur te/ yon tan byas pas/ su no te/ ! prA d+yash+tsa ta thA tau su na mAM/ pra la sogs pa rnams las su dang namra
<p>76b.3</p>rnams kyi de bzhin yang ngo / /pra la sogs pa nyer bsgyur sa Sha dang na Nar 'gyur ba'i rgyu mtshan can sngon ma las byings su la sogs pa dang namra la sogs pa sngar Sha dang Na yig sa dang nar bsgyur ba rnams slar yang de bzhin nyid de Sha dang Na dag tu 'gyur te/ nyer bsgyur a b+hi sngon du gzhag /sa de slar
<p>76b.4</p>yang Shar bsgyur bas/ a b+hi Shu No ti/ gong ma rnams dang 'dra bar bsgrubs pas gnyis tshig dang mang tshig la/ su nu taH su n+wan+ti/ dbus ma rnams la/ su no She/ su nu thaH su nu tha/ skyes bu phyi ma'i gcig tshig la/ su no mi/ gnyis tshig dang mang tshig la/ 
<p>76b.5</p>ba ma dag la zhes pas u dbye ba mngon par gcod cing rdung bar byed/ dang mi dbyi ba yang na bar byas pas/ su n+waH su nu baH sun+maH su nu maH/ ! chog 'byung ling la/ su nu yAT+ra/ su nu yA tAM/ su nu yuH sogs dang / ! shis byed loT+ra'i skyes bu dang po gsum la/ su no tu/ su nu
<p>76b.6</p>tAtra/ su nu tAM/ su n+wan+tu/ skyes bu dbus ma'i gcig tshig la/ ! orbA heH u la sa ti'i yang na'o/ /yi ge brtsegs pa ma yin pa'i rkyen u yig las pha rol gyi hi ni yang na 'jig ste/ hi 'jig pa dang shis byed la tA tang+ra du bsgyur ba yang na bar byas pas/ su nu/ 
<p>76b.7</p>su nu tAtra/ yi ge brtsegs pa yin na hi mi 'jig pas/ dper na byings ta k+Shu dang twa k+Shu lta bu la/ nu bi kA ra Na sbyar bas/ ta k+Sh+Nu hi/ twa k+Sh+Nu hi zhes pa lta bu'o/ /gnyis tshig dang mang tshig la/ su nu tAM/su nu ta/ phyi ma gsum la/ su na bA ni/ su na bA ba/ su na bA ma/ ! 
<p>77a</p>
<p>77a.1</p>de ring ma yin pa lang la/ a su notra/ a su nu tAM/ a su n+wanra/ a su noH a su nu taM/ a su nu ta/ a su na baM/ a su nu ba/ a su nu ma/ ! de nas At+ma ne pa da rnams las brta ma na laT+ra la/ su nu te/ su n+wA te/ su n+wa te/ su nu She/ su
<p>77a.2</p>n+wA the/ su nu d+h+we/ su n+we/ su n+wa he/ su nu ba he/ su n+ma he/ su nu ma he/ ! chog 'byung ling+ra la/ su n+wI ta/ su n+wI yA tAM/ su n+wI ranra sogs dang / shis byed loT+ra la/ su nu tAM/ su n+wA tAM/ su n+wa tAM/ su nu Sh+wa/ su n+wA thAM/ su nu d+h+waM/ su na bai/ su na bA ba hai/ su
<p>77a.3</p>na bA ma hai/ de ring ma yin pa lang+ra la/ a su nu ta/ a su n+wA tAM/ a su n+wa ta/ a su nu thAH a su n+wA thAM/ a su nu d+h+waM/ a su n+wi/ a su n+wa hi/ a su nu ba hi/ a sun+ma hi/ a su nu ma hi sogs so/ ! /da ni ru d+ha la sogs pa na mra bi kAsra Na 'jug pa rnams kyi cho ga
<p>77a.4</p>mdo tsam brjod par bya ste/ de yang ru d+hir+ra sgrib pa'o zhes pa'i byings la/ brta ma na sogs bdag don dang gzhan don gnyis ka sbyo ra te/ de la dang po rasmai pa da rnams las brta ma na'i skyes bu dang po'i gcig tshig /tipra sbyar byings kyi ir+ra dgos pa dang bcas pa'i rjes 'brel yin pas
<p>77a.5</p>phyis/ rud+h+ra/ tipra/ ces gnas pa la/ ! ru d+hA de rnamra/ ru d+h+ra la sogs pa rnams la namra mo/ /byings ru d+h+ra la sogs pa'i sde tshan rnams la rnam dbye brta ma na sogs sde tshan dang po bzhi pha rol la byed po po'i don gyi apra kyi yul la namra bi kA ra Na 'jug ste/ namra
<p>77a.6</p>sbyar rkyen gyi ma gnas kyi don te/ ru dang d+ha'i bar du sbyar/ de'i don gyi ma phyis/ ! ta thor+d+haH ta dang tha'i d+ha'o/ /byings mtha' dz+ha b+ha so sor bsdu ba'i pha rol kyi rkyen dang rnam dbye'i ta yig dang tha yig dag ni d+ha yig tu 'gyur te/ ta d+ha/ dz+ha b+ha la dza ba 'os byings kyi d+ha da/ Sha ra r-i
<p>77a.7</p>sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/ ru Nad+d+hi/ gnyis tshig la'ang / namra sbyor ba sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/ ru nadra/ d+hasra/ zhes gnas pa la/ ! na ma so\u0f85s+ya/ namra asra kyi a'o/ /ng+ra 'gro ba'i ming can pha rol la namra bi kA ra Na'i na'i dbyangs a dang byings a
<p>77b</p>
<p>77b.1</p>su zhes pa'i a yig ni dbyi bar bya ste/ na'i a phyis/ na'i yang dz+ha sa la 'os nga ror bsgyur bas/ ruMd+d+haH mang tshig la/ ruM d+han+ti/ de rnams dang 'dra bar bsgrubs pas/ skyes bu dbus ma dang phyi ma la/ ru Nat+si/ ruMd+d+hAH ruMd+d+ha/ ruM Nad+h+maM/ ruM d+h+waH ruM d+h+maH/ ! 
<p>77b.2</p>chog 'byung ling+ra la/ ruM d+h+yA tAM/ ruM d+h+yA tAM/ ruM d+h+yuHsogs dang / shis byed loT+ra'i skyes bu dang po gsum la/ ru Nad+d+hu/ ruM d+d+hAtra/ ruM d+d+hAM/ ruM d+han+tu/ skyes bu dbus ma'i gcig tshig la/ ! dz+ha sAd+d+hir+hiH dz+ha sa las hi'i d+hi'o/ /byings dz+ha sa so sor bsdu ba'i mtha'
<p>77b.3</p>can gyi pha rol gyi hi ni d+hi ru 'gyur te/ ruM d+d+hi/ ruM d+d+hAtra/ gnyis tshig dang mang tshig la/ ruMd+d+haM/ ruMd+d+ha/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ ru Na d+hA ni/ ru Na d+hA pa/ ru Na d+hA ma/ de ring ma yin pa lang gi skyes bu dang po'i gcig tshig la/ ! di s+yo r+ha sAtra/ ha sa las di
<p>77b.4</p>si dag gi'o/ /ha sa so sor bsdu ba'i yi ge dbyangs med mtha' las pha rol gyi rnam dbye de ring ma yin pa yang gi dipra dang sipra dag ni dbyi bar bya ste/ dipra phyis/ gnas med pa la yang na 'os d+hang+ra dang tra yang na bar byas pas/ a ru Natra/ a ru Nadra/ gnyis tshig dang mang
<p>77b.5</p>tshig la/ a ruM d+d+hAM/ a ruM d+han/ skyes bu dbus ma'i gcig tshig la/ ! daHsaH da'i sa'o/ /gsal byed mtha' las pha rol gyi sipra phyis pa las mtha'i da yig ni sa yig tu yang na 'gyur te/ sipra phyis/ gnas med pa la yang na 'os d+ha dra dang ta yang na bar byas pa'i
<p>77b.6</p>da'i phyogs la da de slar yang na bar bsgyur bas/ a ru Natra/ a ru NaH a ru Nadra/ gnyis tshig dang mang tshig la/ a ruM d+d+haM/ a ruM d+d+ha/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ a ru Na d+haM/ a ruM d+h+wa/ a ruM d+h+ma/ de nas At+ma nai pa de rnams sbyor ba las/ brta ma na
<p>77b.7</p>laT+ra la/ ruM d+he/ ruM d+hA te/ ruM d+ha te/ ruM t+se/ ruM d+hA the/ ruM d+h+we/ ruM d+he/ ruM d+h+wa he/ ruMd+h+ma he/ cho ga 'byung ling+ra la/ ruM d+hI ta/ ruM d+hI yA tAM/ ruM d+hI ranra sogs dang / shis byed loT+ra la/ ruMd+d+hAM/ ru d+hA tAM/ ru d+ha tAM/ ruMt+s+wa/ ruM d+hA thAM/ ruM d+d+hAM/ ru Na
<p>78a</p>
<p>78a.1</p>b+hai/ ru Na d+hA ba hai/ ru Na d+hA ma hai/ de ring ma yin pa lang+ra la/ a ruMd+d+ha/ a ruM d+hA tAM/ a ruM d+ha ta/ a ruMd+d+hAH a ruM d+hAM thAM/ a ruM d+d+h+waM/ a ruM d+hi/ a ruM d+h+wa hi/ a ruMd+h+ma hi/ sogs so/ ! de nas upra bi kA ra Na 'jug pa rnams kyi cho ga rnams
<p>78a.2</p>brjod par bya ste/ de yang ta nu yang ba la'o zhes pa'i byings la rnam dbye bdag don dang gzhan don gnyis ka 'jug pa la/ dang po pa rasmai pa da rnams las brta ma na'i skyes bu dang po'i gcig tshig la/ tanra/ tipra ces gnas pa la/ ! ta nA de rupra/ tanra/ 
<p>78a.3</p>sogs la upra'o/ /byings ta nu la sogs pa'i sde tshan rnams la brta ma na sogs rnam dbye sde tshan dang po bzhi pha rol la byed pa po'i don gyi apra kyi yul la upra bi kA ra Na 'gyur te/ upra sbyar/ pra yig byings la yon tan 'byung ba'i don yin pas phyis/ rnam dbye pa 'gro ba
<p>78a.4</p>rnams la nu dang u'i pa la 'os yon tan byas pas/ ta no ti/ de bzhin du bsgrubs pas gnyis tshig dang mang tshig la/ ta nu taH ta n+wan+ti/ skyes bu dbus ma dang phyi ma la/ ta no Shi/ ta nu thaH ta nu tha/ ta no mi/ ta nu baH ta n+waH ta nu maH 
<p>78a.5</p>tan+maH chog 'byung ling la/ ta nu yAtra/ ta nu yA tAM/ ta nu yuHsogs so/ ! shis byed loT+ra la/ ta no tu/ ta nu tAtra/ ta nu tAM/ ta n+wan+tu/ ta nu/ ta nu tAtra/ ta nu taM/ ta nu ta/ ta na bA ni/ ta na bA ba/ ta na bA ma/ ! de ring ma yin pa lang+ra la/ 
<p>78a.6</p>a ta notra/ a ta nu tAM/ a ta n+wanra/ a ta noH/ /a ta nu taM/ a ta nu ta/ a ta na baM/ a ta n+wa/ a ta nu ba/ a tan+ma/ a ta nu ma/ sogs te At+ma ne pa da rnams kyang des rigs 'gre la Shuny+ra'i skabs dang yang 'dra'o/ ! de bzhin du Du kr-iny+ra byed pa la'o
<p>78a.7</p>zhes pa'i byings la'ang rnam dbye bdag don dang gzhan don gnyis ka 'jug pa la/ dang po pa rasmai pa da rnams las/ brta ma na'i skyes bu dang po'i gcig tshig la/ kr-i tipra ces gnas pa la/ tanra sogs kyis upra/ pra 'gro ba sogs kyi byings la yon tan 'byung bas
<p>78b</p>
<p>78b.1</p>r-i ar+ra/ slar yang nu dang u'i pra la'os yon tan byas pas/ ka ro ti/ gnyis tshig la/ upra sbyor ba sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/ ka ru/ tasra zhes gnas pa la/ ! di t+ya duH ng+ra 'gro ba la atra u'o/ /rnam dbye ng+ra 'gro ba'i ming can rnams pha rol la Du kr-iny+ra'i ka'i
<p>78b.2</p>srog gi atra ni u ru 'gyur te/ a ur+ra bsgyur bas/ ku ru taH de bzhin du mang tshig la/ kurban+ti/ de rnams dang 'dra bar bsgrubs pas/ dbus ma gsum la/ ka ro Shi/ ku ru thaH/ ku ru tha/ skyes bu phyi ma'i gcig tshig la/ ka ro mi/ gnyis tshig dang mang
<p>78b.3</p>tshig la/ ba yig dang ma yig pha rol la Dukr-iny+ra'i u yig rtag tu dbyi bar bshad pas/ yang na bar mi byed par u phyis pas/ kurbaH kurmaH chog 'byung ling+ra la/ ku ru yAtra ces gnas pa la/ ! kr-i nyo ye kr-inya'i ya la'o/ /byings krinya'i ru'i u ni ya yig
<p>78b.4</p>dang po can pha rol la dbyi bar bya ste/ u phyis pas/ kuR+YAtra/ de bzhin du/ kaR+YA tAM/ kuR+YuH sogs so/ ! shis byed loT+ra la/ ka ro tu/ ku ru tAtra/ ku ru tAM/ kurban+tu/ ku ru/ ku ru tAtra/ ku ru taM/ ku ru ta/ ka ra bA Ni/ ka ra bA ba/ ka ra bA ma/ ! / 
<p>78b.5</p>de ring ma yin pa lang+ra la/ a ka rotra/ a ku ru tAM/ a kurbanra/ a ka roH a ku ru taM/ a ku ru ta/ a ka ra baM/ a kurba/ a kurma/ ! At+ma ne pa da rnams las brta ma na laT+ra la/ ku ru te/ kurbA te/ kurba te/ ku ru She/ kurbA the/ ku ru d+h+we/ kurbe/ kurba he/ 
<p>78b.6</p>kurma he/ chog 'byung ling+ra la/ kurbI ta/ kurbI yA tAM/ kurbI ranra sogs dang / ! shis byed loT+ra la/ ku ru tAM/ kurba tAM/ kurba tAM/ ku ru Sh+wa/ kurbA thAM/ ku ru d+h+waM/ ka ra bai/ ka ra bA ba hai/ ka ra bA ma hai/ ! de ring ma yin pa lang
<p>78b.7</p>la/ a ku ru ta/ a kurbA tAM/ a kurba ta/ a ku ru thaH a kurbA thAM/ a ku ru d+h+waM/ a kurbi/ a kurba hi/ a kurma hi sogs so/ ! de nas a bi kA ra Na 'jug pa'i cho ga rnams bshad par bya ste/ tud gdung ba la'o zhes pa'i byings la rnam dbye pa rasmai pa
<p>79a</p>
<p>79a.1</p>da dang At+ma ne pa da gnyis ka 'jug ste/ byings mtha'i a de'i don/ ! tu dA de raH tud sogs la a'o/ /byings tud la sogs pa'i sde tshan rnams las rnam dbye brta ma na sogs sde tshan dang po bzhi pha rol la byed pa po'i don gyi apra kyi yul la a bi
<p>79a.2</p>kA ra Na 'gyur te/ a sbyor ba sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/ pa rasmai ba da rnams la/ tu da ti/ tu detra/ tu da tu/ a tu da tu sogs dang / At+ma ne pa da rnams la/ tu da te/ tu de ta/ tu da tAM/ a tu da ta/ sogs te bsgrub tshul cho ga thams cad b+hU dang e d+ha'i
<p>79a.3</p>skabs dang khyad par med do/ ! / de nas nA bi kA ra Na 'jug pa'i bya ba rnams brjod par bya ste/ Du laTa? krIny+ra ling+ra  rdzas  loT+ra  'tshong  lang+ra ba la'o zhes pa'i byings la rnam dbye bdag don dang laT+ra gzhan ling+ra don loT+ra gnyis ka lang+ra 'jug la/ de yang dang po pa rasmai pa da rnams las/ 
<p>79a.4</p>brta ma na laT+ra'i skyes bu dang po'i gcig tshig la/ krItripra ces gnas pa la/ ! nAk+r+yAdeH krI sogs la nA'o/ /byings krI la sogs pa'i sde tshan rnams las rnam dbye brta ma na sogs sde tshan dang po bzhi pha rol la byed pa po'i don gyi apra kyi yul la nA bi kA ra Na 'jug ste/ 
<p>79a.5</p>nA sbyar/ Sha ra r-i sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/ krI NA ti/ gnyis tshig la/ krINA/ tasra zhes gnas pa la/ ! I ha se/ ha sa la I'o/ /nA bi kA ra Na'i A yig ni rnam dbye ng+ra 'gro ba'i ming can ha sa so sor bsdu ba'i yi ge dang po can pha rol la I yig tu 'gyur te/ 
<p>79a.6</p>krI NI taH mang tshig /krI NA an+ti zhes gnas pa la/ ! nA taH nA'i At+ya'o/ /nA bi kA ra Na'i A yig ni rnam dbye nga 'gro ba'i ming can dbyangs dang po pha rol la dbyi bar bya ste/ A phyis pas/ krI Nan+ti/ de bzhin du dbus ma gsum la/ krI NA si/ krI NI thaH krI NI tha/ phyi ma gsum la/ krI NA mi/ krI NI baH 
<p>79a.7</p>krI NI maH/ cho ga 'byung ling+ra la/ krI NI yAtra/ krI NI yA tAM/ krI NI yuHsogs dang / ! shis byed loT+ra la/ krI NA tu/ krI NI tAtra/ krI NI tAM/ krI Nan+tu/ krI NI hi/ krI NI tAtra/ krI NI tAM/ 
<p>79b</p>
<p>79b.1</p>krI NI ta/ krI NA ni/ krI NA ba/ krI NA ma/ ! de ring ma yin pa lang+ra la/ a krI NAtra/ a krI NI tAM/ a krI Nanra/ a krI NAH a krI NI taM/ a krI NI ta/ a krI NAM/ a krI NI ba/ a krI NI ma/ ! At+ma ne pa da rnams las brta ma na laT+ra
<p>79b.2</p>la/ krI NI te/ krI NA te/ krI Na te/ krI NI She/ krI NA the/ krI NI d+h+we/ krI Ne/ krI NI ba he/ krI NI ma he/ ! chog 'byung ling+ra la/ krI NI ta/ krI NI yA tAM/ krI NI ranra sogs dang / ! shis byed loT+ra la/ krI NI ta/ krI NI yA tAM/ krI
<p>79b.3</p>Na tAM/ krI NI Sh+wa/ krI NA thAM/ krI NI d+h+wAM/ krI Nai/ krI NA ba hai/ krI NA ma hai/ ! de ring ma yin pa lang+ra la/ a krI Ni ta/ a krI NA tAM/ a krI Na ta/ a krI NI thaH a krI NA thAM/ a krI NI d+h+waM/ a krI Ni/ a krI NI ba hi/ ! 
<p>79b.4</p>de bzhin du grahra nye bar len pa la'o zhes pa'i byings la rasmai pa dang rnams sbyor ba las/ ! gra hAM k+ngi ti tsa/ gra ha rnams kyi kra ng+ra 'gro ba la'ang ngo / /byings grahra/ dz+yA/ byeny+ra/ d+h+weny+ra/ byad+h+ra/ bapra/ bsra/ bats+ra/ pratsh+ra/ b+h+ras+dza/ brA la sogs pa rnams kyi kra
<p>79b.5</p>yig dang ng+ra yig 'gro ba'i ming can pha rol la saM pra sa ra Na ste slar yang dag par bsgyur bar bya la/ de yang ya yig ni i yig /bra yig ni u yig /r+ra yig ni r-i yig /l+ra yig ni l-i yig rnams su 'gyur te/ nA bi kA ra Na sbyar/ gra ha'i ra yig dbyangs bcas r-i
<p>79b.6</p>yig tu bsgyur bas/ gr-i h+NA zhes pa la brta ma na sogs sbyor ba'i cho ga rnams shis byed loT+ra'o skyes bu dbus ma'i gcig tshig hi ma gtogs gong du bshad pa'i krIny+ra'i skabs dang 'dra bas/ gr-ih+NA ti/ gr-i h+NI yAtra/ gr-ih+NA tu/ gr-ih+NI tAtra/ a gr-i h+NAtra/ sogs dang hi la/ 
<p>79b.7</p>gra ha/ hi zhes gnas pa la/ ! ha sA dA na hau/ ha sa las hi la A na'o/ /krIny+ra la sogs pa'i sde'i nang tshan gyi gra ha la sogs pa rnams kyi byings mtha' ha sa so sor bsdu ba la hi pha rol las byed laT+ra pa ling+ra po'i loT+ra don gyi loT+ra nA bi lang+ra kA ra Na'i yul la A na bi
<p>80a</p>
<p>80a.1</p>kA ra Na 'gyur te/ A na sbyar/ atra ces pas hi yang phyis pas/ gr-i hA Na sogs so/ ! de bzhin du paSh+ra rgyas pa la'o zhes pa'i byings la'ang cho ga thams cad de dang 'dra bar bsgrubs pas/ puSh+NA ti/ puSh+NI yAtra/ puSh+NA tu/ puShA Na/ a puSh+NA tra
