<p>80a.2</p>sogs so/ ! muSh+ra brku ba la'o zhes pa'i byings la'ang / muSh+NA ti/ muSh+NI yA ta/ muSh+NA tu/ mu ShA Na/ a muSh+NAtra sogs so/ ! de ltar apra bi kA ra Na nas gzung A na bi kA ra Na'i bar gyi rkyen de thams cad byed  laT+ra  pa po'i ling+ra  rab tu loT+ra  bya ba'i hi  don lang+ra  la
<p>80a.3</p>sbyor ba yin la/ rnam dbye sde chan bzhi po de rnams la byings thams cad pa'i rnam dbye zhes bya zhing / lhag ma 'chad 'gyur rnam dbye sde tshan drug po rnams la byings phyed pa'i rnam dbye zhes bya ste/ pA Ni pa'i lugs so/ /i ti swa ra swa sti byA ka ra Na s+ya sU
<p>80a.4</p>trAt+karta ri pra kri ya sa mAp+tAH/ zhes pa brda sprod pa dbyangs can gyi mdo las byed pa po'i rab tu byed pa rnams rdzogs so// ! //de nas dngos po dang las kyi rab tu byed pa rnams bshad par bya ste/ ! Ad+b+hubi karma Ni/ dngos po dang las la Atra'o/ /byings
<p>80a.5</p>las dang bcas pa rnams la las kyi don dang las med pa rnams la dngos po'i don du rnam dbye At+ma ne pa da rnams 'jug cing dngos po'i don la de rnams kyi gcig tshig kho na 'jug la/ nyer bsgyur gyi stobs kyis bsgyur ba la ni der ma nges so/ /de yang byings las bcas dang las
<p>80a.6</p>med kyi dbye ba ni/ byings des byed pa'i tshig gi don kho na brjod pa ni las med pa dang / las dang byed tshig gnyis ka'i don brjod pa de las dang bcas pa'i byings zhes grags pa las/ byings las med pa ni b+hU dang / e d+ha dang / Asra dang / shIdra la sogs pa ste/ 
<p>80a.7</p>ji skad du/ ladz+dzA sat+tAs+thi ti dzA ga ra Ni br-id+d+hi k+Sha ya b+ha ya dzI bi ta ma raM/ sha ya na kri DA ru tsi dIp+t+yaR+thaM d+hA tu ga NaM ta ma karma ka mA huH/ ngo tsha yod pa gnas pa mel tshe dang / /'phel ba zad pa 'jig pa 'tsho ba dang / /nyal dang rtsed mo 'od dang 'bar ba'i don/ /byings kyi tshogs rnams
<p>80b</p>
<p>80b.1</p>las med par bshad do/ /zhes pa ste ngo tsha sogs don bcu gnyis po de rnams kyi don can kyi byings rnams la ni las med pa zhes bya zhing / de rnams las gzhan pa rnams las dang bcas pa'o /dngos po'i mtshan nyid ni/ ji skad du/ san+mA traM b+hA ba ling+gaM s+yA da spr-iSh+Ta ya ts+tsha
<p>80b.2</p>kA ra kaiH/ d+ha twAR+thaHke ba laM shud+d+he b+ha ba i t+ya b+hi d+hI ya te/ yod tsam dngos po'i rtags su 'gyur/ /gang yang byed can rnams ma reg /byings don rkyang pa dag pa ni/ /de la dngos por mngon par brjod/ /ces te byed can drug pa gang dang yang ma sbyar ba/ dngos po yod pa
<p>80b.3</p>tsam ston pa ni dngos po'i don zhes bya'o/ ! yastsa tuR+Shu/ bzhi po la yakra'o/ /byings las rnam dbye brta ma na sogs sde tshan dang po bzhi po pha rol la dngos po dang las kyi don la yakra rkyen du 'gyur te/ ka yig byings la yon tan 'gog pa'i don yin pas dbyi ba sogs kyis
<p>80b.4</p>bsgrubs pas/ b+hU ya te b+ha ba tA/ e d+h+ya te d+hArmi kaH shIng+ra gi yakra pha rol la I a yang+ra du bsgyur bar bshad pas/ I a yang+ra/ ng+ra dang ya'i a rjes 'brel yin pas phyis pas/ shay+Ya te shru dre Na/ yang skabs la lar byings las
<p>80b.5</p>med pa la'ang las can ltar bsgrub khyod yin/ chos dang ldan pa 'phel/ nye ba'i gdan la gnas/ pa yang yod la/ de yang nyer bsgyur sngon du byung na ni nyer bsgyur gyi dbang gis las med las can dang las can las med du bsgyur ba dang / gcig tshig nyal bar byed do dmangs rigs/ kho na 'jug pa la gnyis
<p>80b.6</p>tshig mang tshig thams cad sbyor ba sogs sna tshogs yod de/ byings las nyer bsgyur stobs che bas nyer bsgyur gyis bsgyur 'gro bas dper na/ hA ra 'phrog pa la 'jug kyang nyer bsgyur gyis bsgyur bas/ bi hA ra/ A hA ra/ saM hA ra/ pra ti hA ra sogs byings kyi don gzhan
<p>80b.7</p>du 'gyur 'go ba lta bu ste/ nyer bsgyur gyi dbang gis/ su kha ma nu b+hU ya te swA mi nA/ rje bos bde ba rjes su myong bar byed/ zhes pa lta bu'o/ /las bcas la las kyi don du yakra sbyar ba'i dpe ni/ ka TaH gnas pa/ zas/ khongs su sdud pa/ 'joms pa/ kri ya te kA ru ke Na/ rtswa'i lhas ma'i las byed/ 
<p>81a</p>
<p>81a.1</p>twaM du khI kri ya se/ rA gau ba rA gaiH su khya haM kri ye/ ! a ya ki/ a yakra la'o/ /byings mtha'i r-itra ni rkyen a dang yakra pha rol la ring+ra da du 'gyur te/ ng+ra yig bar mtshams gcod pa'i don te 'og nas 'byung ba'i ya la'o zhes pa sogs 'gog pa'i don yin
<p>81a.2</p>pas dbyi ba sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/ khyed dka' bas byed do/ /chags pa dag las chags pa bral bas nged bde bar byed do/ /pas/ mr-ing+ra sog gtong ba la'o zhes pa'i byings la/ mri ya te/ ! dr-i 'gro ba la'o zhes pa'i byings la/ hr-iny+ra 'phrog pa la'o zhes pa'i byings la/ hri
<p>81a.3</p>ya te d+ha na taska re Na/ ! r-Itra ir+ra r-I ta i r+ra/ r-Ita e r+ra'o/ rkyen ya yig pha rol la byings mtha' r-I tra ni i r+ra na du 'gyur te/ tr-I mchod pa dang rkyal ba la'o zhes pa'i dbyings la yakA/ r-I ta i ru du sgyur sa/ tir+ra ya te zhes gnas bram ze sbyin pa long / pa la/ ! ye/ ya la'o/ / 
<p>81a.4</p>'phrog par byed do nor chom rkun gyis/ rkyen ya pha rol la dbyangs sngon ma de ring por 'gyur te/ i ring por bsgyur bas/ tIR+Ya te/ de bzhin du/ tsiny+ra gsog pa la'o zhes pa'i byings la/ iSh+Ti kA sh+tsI ya te/ hu sbyin pa dang za ba la'o zhes pa'i byings la/ hU ya te ag+niM bah+nau/ ! 
<p>81a.5</p>dA de riH dA sogs kyi i'o/ /byings Du dAny+ra la sogs pa'i A yig ni rkyen kra dang ng+ra 'gro ba'i ming can pha rol la i ru 'gyur te/ Du dAny+ra sbyin pa la'o zhes pa'i byings la yakra/ so phag rnams gsog par byed/ A i/ ya la 'os ring por bsgyur bas/ dI ya te/ me la zas sbyin sreg byed/ 
<p>81a.6</p>be da bi de A do dI ya tAM d+ha naM/ de bzhin du/ Du d+hAny+ra 'dzin pa dang gso ba la'o zhes pa'i byings la/ ni d+hI ya te d+hA n+yaM b+hU mau/ mAng+ra tshad 'jal ba la'o zhes pa'i byings la/ mI ya te/ ! san+d+h+ya k+Sha rA NA mA/ mtshams sbyor gyi yi ge rnams kyi A'o/ /sbyin par byed/ byings mtha'i
<p>81a.7</p>rig byed rig pa la nor byin cig /mtshams sbyor gyi yi ge rnams ni dngos po dang las kyi don gyi At+ma ne pa da rnams pha rol la A yig /gter du spos shig 'bru rnams/ tu 'gyur te/ kai gai raisgra la'o tshad 'jal bar byed/ zhes pa'i byings gsum la yakra/ ai A ru bsgyur de nas dA sogs kyis A de slar
<p>81b</p>
<p>81b.1</p>yang i/ ya la'os ring por bsgyur bas/ kI ya te/ gI ya te/ de bzhin du/ sho phra mor byed pa la'o zhes pa'i byings la/ shI ya te/ o hAkra gtong ba la'o zhes pa'i byings la/ hI ya te/ pA btung ba la'o zhes pa'i byings la/ pI ya te/ Sh+ThA 'gro ba
<p>81b.2</p>las ldog pa la'o zhes pa'i byings la/ yakra/ dang smra bar byed/ po'i Sha Na ni sa na 'os Sha sa/ rgyu mtshan med na rgyu mtshan can yang med do zhes phra mor byed/ pas Tha thar bsgyur ba sogs kyis/ s+thI ya te/ ! gtong bar byed dam bdor bar byed/ ta no ternA bA/ tanra gyi 'thung bar byed/ na'i A
<p>81b.3</p>yang na'o/ /byings ta nu'i na yig ni rkyen ka 'gro ba pha rol la A yig tu yang na 'gyur te/ ta nu yang ba la'o zhes pa'i byings la/ ta n+ya te/ tA ya te/ ! gu Norta siM yo gA d+yoH r-i'i yang dag par sbyor  gnas so/ /ba sogs la yon tan no/ /byings r-i 'gro ba la sogs pa ni yakra sogs
<p>81b.4</p>dngos po dang las kyi don yang dag par sbyor ba sogs la yon tan du 'gyur te/ r-i 'gro ba la'o zhes pa'i byings la yakra/ yon tan yang bar byed dam phra mor byed/ byas pas/ aR+Ya te/ de bzhin du sm-i sems pa la'o zhes pa'i byings la/ smaR+Ya te/ las kyi don la yang byed pa dang bcas
<p>81b.5</p>pa'i las dang las dngos rkyang gi dbye ba yang yod de/ ji skad du/ yat+karma gu Na saM yo gAt+kar+t+r-i twe na saM yo gAt+kart-i twe na bi bak+Sh+ya te sa karma kartA/ kri ya mA NaM tu yat+karma swa ya me ba pra sid+d+h+ya ti/ su ka raiHswairgu NaiR+Ya smAt+karma karte ti ta dwi sems par byed dam dran par byed/ duH/ yon tan yang
<p>81b.6</p>dag par ni ldan pa yi/ /ji ltar las nyid byed pa po yang ste/ /byed por bcas pa'i las su rnam par 'dod/ /las gang byed pas 'jug par ldan pa ste/ rang gi stobs shugs kyi ni gang la yang / /de nyid rab tu grub par byed pa ni/ /bde blag byed pa rang gi yon tan rnams/ / 
<p>81b.7</p>las de byed po nyid dang lhan cig rig /ces pa ste gang bya ba'i las kyi dngos po de byed pa pos rtsol ba chen po mi dgos par bde blag tu 'grub pa de ni byed pa po dang bcas pa'i las zhes zer te/ dper na/ 'bras chad tshos te rang shugs kyi/ e da naHpa ts+ya te swa ya me ba/ dum bur byed do shing rang shugs kyi/ b+hi d+ya te
<p>82a</p>
<p>82a.1</p>kaSh+ThaM swa ya me ba/ lU ya te ke dA raHswa ya me pa/ zhes pa lta bu ste byings pats+ra 'tshed pa/ b+hi dir+ra gnyis su byed pa/ lUny+ra gcod pa rnams la yakra sbyar nas bsgrubs pa'o/ /yang don gcig la las kyi tshig gnyis sbyor dgos pa yang yod la/ de
<p>82a.2</p>yang NI/ ngu hi/ yAtsi/ ru d+hi/ ru tsi/ prats+chi/ b+hik+Shi/ tsiny+ra sogs la las kyi tshig gnyis sbyor ba ste/ NIny+ra thob pa la'o zhes pa'i byings la rkyen yakra sbyar/ de la las kyi tshig gnyis sbyar bas/ na ga raM nI ya te nA ga ri kairba ne tsaraH de bzhin du/ 
<p>82a.3</p>bru yA tsw-i slong ba la'o zhes pa'i byings la/ b+ho dza naM yA ts+ya te ya dza ma no yA tsa ke na/ prats+tsha shes par 'dod pa la'o zhes pa'i byings la/ prits+ch+ya te pan+thA naM pa thi ke na/ shi Sh+ye NA tsar+Yasta twaM pr-its+tsh+yate/ de ltar las kyi tshig gnyis sbyor ba la byed pa dang 'brel pa de las grong khyer du thob bo grong khyer bas nags spyod/ 
<p>82a.4</p>gtso phal gnyis las gtso bo yin no/ /i lto zas slong bar byed do slong ston gyi sar slong mo pas/ ti swa ra swasti byA ka ra Na su sru tAd+d+ha ba karma grahra sogs kyi slar yang dag par bsgyur ba'o/ /'dri bar byed do lam rnams lam zhugs kyis 'grul ba la/ slob mas slob dpon la de kho na nyid 'dri bar byed do/ /pra kri ya sa mAb+hAH/ zhes pa brda sprod pa dbyangs can
<p>82a.5</p>gyi mdo las dngos po dang las kyi rab tu byed pa rnams rdzogs so// ! //de nas pa ro\u0f85k+Sha la sogs pa rnam dbye sde tshan phyi ma drug gi cho ga rnams rab tu brjod par bya ste/ de la dang po pa ro\u0f85k+Sha ni/ pa ro\u0f85k+Sha Na pa tu sus+tha pa thus Nab+ba mA yA ta yi re sa yA the d+h+wa ye ba he ma he/ lkog tu gyur pa la/ 
<p>82a.6</p>Napra/ a tusra/ usra/ thapra/ a thusra/ a/ Napra/ pa/ ma/ ! e/ A te/ i re/ se/ A the/ b+h+we/ e/ ba he/ ma he'o/ /byings las lkog tu gyur pa'i dus brjod pa'i byed pa'i don la Napra la sogs pa rnam dbye bco brgyad po 'di rnams 'gyur zhing / 
<p>82a.7</p>lkog tu gyur pa'i dus de la'ang 'das ma 'ongs gnyis su yod pa las 'das pa la 'jug la 'das pa de yang 'das nas yun ring lon pa'i dus la 'jug pa shas che'o/ /rnam dbye 'di rnams la pA be+e pa'i lugs la/ liT+ra zhes zer ro/ ! /dwish+tsa/ gnyis kyang ngo / /Napra la
<p>82b</p>
<p>82b.1</p>sogs pa rnam dbye bco brgyad po pha rol la de rnams sbyor gzhi'i byings de gnyis su'ang 'gyur te/ b+hU la/ lkog gyur liTa'i skyes bu dang po'i gcig tshig Napra sbyar gnyis brjod pas/ b+hUb+hU/ Napra ces gnas pa la/ ! Ab+h+wor+N+wa dau/ Napra sogs la b+hU a dag gi A'o/ /rnam dbye Napra
<p>82b.2</p>la sogs pa pha rol la byings gnyis brjod pa'i dang po de b+hU'i U dang a yin na A yig tu 'gyur te/ b+hU'i U A/ thung ngu 'os/ de thung ngur bsgyur dz+ha pa sogs kyis b+ha ba/ ! b+hu bo bukra/ b+hU la bukra'o/ /Napra la sogs pa'i rnam dbye rnams pha rol las byings b+hU la buka? A ga
<p>82b.3</p>ma 'gyur te/ pukra byin kra gnas don u brjod don yin pas dbyi ba sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/ ba b+hU ba/ de bzhin du bsgrubs pas gnyis tshig dang mang tshig la/ ba b+hU ba tuH ba b+hU buH skyes bu dbus ma'i gcig tshig la/ ba b+hU pra  thapra zhes gnas pa la/ ! 
<p>82b.4</p>krA deR+Na deH kr-i sogs las Na sogs la'o/ /byings kr-i/ sr-i/ b+h+r-i/ pr-i/ dru/ s+t+ru/ shru/ sru rnams ma yin pa'i byings rnams las pha rol gyi Napra sogs rnam dbye ba sa so sor bsdu ba'i yi ge dang po can rnams la iT+ra A ga ma ster bar bya ste/ iT+ra byin pas/ ba b+hU bi tha/ 
<p>82b.5</p>gnyis tshig dang mang tshig la/ ba b+hU ba thuH ba b+hU ba/ de rnams dang 'dra bar bsgrubs pas skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ ba b+hU ba/ ba b+hU bi ba/ ba b+hU bi ma/ de bzhin du Du pa tsaSh+ra 'tshed pa la'o zhes pa'i byings la bdag don dang gzhan don gnyis ka 'jug pa las/ dang po pa
<p>82b.6</p>rasmai pa da'i skyes bu dang po'i gcig tshig la/ pats+ra/ Napra/ ces pa la/ gnyis kyang ngos byings gnyis brjod/ sngon ma'i ha sa dang po lhag po'os ts+ra gong ma phyis/ ! atra u pa d+hA yAH u pa d+hA'i atra'o/ /byings kyi u pa d+hA'i a yig ni ny+ra yig dang N+ra yig 'gro ba'i ming
<p>82b.7</p>can pha rol la 'phel bar 'gyur te/ 'phel ba byas pas/ pa pA tsa/ /gnyis tshig la/ pa pats+ra a tusra/ zhes gnas pa la/ ! NA diHkitra/ Na la sogs pa ka 'gro ba'o/ /rnam dbye Napra la sogs pa pra 'gro ba rnams ma yin pa rnams la ni ka 'gro ba'i ming can zhes zer ro/ ! / 
<p>83a</p>
<p>83a.1</p>lo paHpa tsI ki t+ye tsA s+ya/ pats+ra rnams kyi ka 'gro ba la dbyi ste a'i yang e'o/ /byings pats+ra la sogs pa rnams kyi gnyis brjod pa'i dang po bsgyur ba ma yin pa'i gdod ma'i a yig yin na yi ge dang po de dbyi zhing a yig phyi ma de yang e yig tu 'gyur te/ pa
<p>83a.2</p>gong ma phyis phyi ma'i a er bsgyur bas/ pe tsa tuH de bzhin du mang tshig la/ pe tsuH skyes bu dbus ma'i gcig tshig la/ ! peT+ra thapra/ thapra la iT+ra yang na'o/ /byings iT+ra mi 'jug pa rnams kyi pha rol las kyang rnam dbye thapra la iT+ra yang na 'gyur zhing / iT+ra dang bcas pa'i thapra de
<p>83a.3</p>yang ka 'gro ba'i ming can du yang na bar bya ste/ iT+ra yang na bar byas/ iT+ra'i phyogs la'ang ka 'gro ba'i cho ga dang mi 'gro ba'i cho ga 'dam kha can du byas pas/ pa pa tsi tha/ pe tsi tha/ pa pak+tha/ gnyis tshig dang mang tshig la/ pe tsa thuH pe tsa/ skyes bu phyi ma'i
<p>83a.4</p>gcig tshig Napra la Na 'gro ba'i cho ga yang na bar bshad pas 'phel ba byed pa dang mi byed pa 'dam kha can du byas pas/ pa pA tsa/ pa pa tsa/ gnyis tshig dang mang tshig la/ pe tsi ba/ pe tsi ma/ ! At+ma ne pa da rnams la yang cho ga de rnams dang 'dra bar bsgrubs pas/ 
<p>83a.5</p>pe tse/ pe tsA te/ pe tsi re/ pe tsi She/ pe tsA the/ pe tsi d+h+we/ pe tse/ pe tsi ba he/ pe tsi ma he/ byings che kr-iny+ra byed pa la'ang bdag don dang gzhan don gnyis ka 'jug pa las dang po pa rasmai pa da'i skyes bu dang po'i gcig tshig la/ ! raHr-i a'o/ /byings
<p>83a.6</p>gnyis brjod pa'i dang po'i dbyangs de r-i yig yin na a yig tu 'gyur te byings gnyis brjod/ r-i a/ ku ha sogs kyis ka tsar bsgyur bas/ tsa kr-i/ Napra/ ces gnas pa la/ ! d+hA tornA minaH byings kyi nA mi'i'o/ /byings kyi mtha' nA mi'i yi ge ni nya yig dang Na yig
<p>83a.7</p>'go ba'i ming can pha rol la 'phel bar 'gyur te/ 'phel ba byas pas/ tsa kA ra/ gnyis tshig dang mang tshig la/ tsa kra tuH tsa kruH/ de bzhin du bsgrubs pas skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ tsa kar+tha/ tsa kra thuH tsa kra/ phyi ma gsum la/ tsa kA ra/ tsa
<p>83b</p>
<p>83b.1</p>ka ra/ tsa kr-i ba/ tsa kro ma/ cho ga de rnams dang 'dra bar bsgrubs pas At+ma rgo pa da'i skyes bu dang po gsum dang dbus ma'i gcig tshig dang gnyis tshig la/ tsa kre/ tsa krA te/ tsa kri re/ tsa kr-i She/ tsa krA the/ mang tshig la/ tsa kr-i/ d+h+re/ zhes gnas pa la/ ! na mi
<p>83b.2</p>no\u0f85 tsa tur+NAM d+ho D+haH bzhi po rnams ma yin pa'i d+ha'i nA mi las D+ha'o/ /byings thams cad pa'i rnam dbye bzhi po ma yin pa las rnam dbye'i d+ha yig ni byings mtha' nA mi'i pha rol la D+ha yig tu 'gyur te/ d+ha D+har bsgyur bas/ tsakr-i D+h+we/ phyi ma gsum la/ tsa kre/ tsa kr-i ba he/ 
<p>83b.3</p>tsa kr-i ma he/ nye ba'i tshig dang sbyar ba'i dpe ni/ rA mo rA dz+yaM tsa kA ra/ ! de bzhin du/ a su 'byung ba la'o zhes pa la pa rasmai pa da rnams sbyor ba las byings gnyis brjod/ sngon ma'i ha sa dang po lhag po 'os sa gong ma phyis/ 'dra ba'i yi ge 'dus pa sogs kyis bsgrubs
<p>83b.4</p>pas/ A sa/ A sa tuH A suH A si tha/ A s+tha/ dga' byed kyi rgyal srid sngo na byas so/ /A sa thuH A sa/ A sa/ A si ba/ A si ma/ ! kA sA di pra t+ya yAn+t+ra dAM kra s+b+hUpa raH kr-i asra b+hU rkyen mtha' can pha rol las kA sa la sogs pa rnams la Amra'o/ /byings kr-i asra
<p>83b.5</p>b+hU rnams Napra sogs kyi rkyen mtha' can dang sbyor ba las kA sa la sogs pa rnams kyi mthar Amra rkyen du 'gyur te/ kA sr-i ngan du smra ba la'o zhes pa'i byings la rkyen Amra/ de la kr-i/ asra/ b+hU rnams Napra sogs kyi mtha' can dang sbyar bas/ kA sAM tsakre / kA sA mA
<p>83b.6</p>se/ kA sAM ba b+hU ba/ de bzhin du/ ! tsa kA mr-i snang byed la'o zhes pa'i byings la/ tsa kA sAM tsa kA ra/ tsa kA sA mA sa/ tsa kA sAM ba b+hU ba/ /dza gr-i gnyid zad pa la'o zhes pa la/ Amra byings mtha'i yon tan byas pas/ dza ga rAM tsa kA ra/ dza ga rA mA sa/ dza ga
<p>83b.7</p>rAM ba b+hU ba sogs dang / ! ed+ha 'phel ba la/ e d+hAM tsa kre/ e d+hA mA se/ e d+hAM ba b+hU be+e/ ! ka la cha shas la'o zhes pa la/ tsu ra la sogs la nyi 'os rkyen nyi'i mtha' can la/ Amra sogs sbyar yon tan byas pas/ ka la yAM tsa kA ra/ ka la yA mA sa/ ka la
<p>84a</p>
<p>84a.1</p>yAM ba b+hU ba sogs dang At+ma ne pa da rnams la/ ka la yAM tsa kre/ ka la yA mA se/ ka la yAM ba b+hU be+e sogs so/ ! bid shes pa la'o zhes pa la/ A mi bi derna gu NaH Amra la bid kyi yon tan ma yin no/ /Amra pha rol la byings bid la yon tan 'byung ba ma yin te/ 
<p>84a.2</p>yon tan mi byed/ bi dAM tsa kA ra/ bi dA mA se/ bi dAM ba b+hU ba sogs so/ ! Ik+Sha lta ba dang mtshan ma la'o zhes pa la/ Ik+ShAM tsa kre/ Ik+Shu mA se/ Ik+ShAM ba b+hU ba/ Uhra rnam par brtags pa la/ U hAM tsa kre/ U hA mA se/ U hAM ba b+hU be sogs so/ ! iha rtsed mo la'o zhes pa
<p>84a.3</p>la/ i hAM tsa kre/ i hA mA se/ i hAM ba b+hU be+e sogs so/ /de nas rkyen sa dang bcas pa'i Amra gyi bya ba rnams bshad par bya ste/ ! its+tsha yA mAt+ma naHsaH bdag gi 'dod pa lo sa'o/ byings la bdag nyid kyi 'dod pa'i don la sa rkyen du 'gyur te/ Du kr-inya byed pa la sbyar ba la/ 
<p>84a.4</p>kr-i  sa/ ! r-i tra ir+ra/ r-itra ir+ra'o/ /byings mtha'i r-i yig ni kra yig dang ng+ra yig 'gro ba'i ming can pha rol la ir+ra du 'gyur te/ r-i ir+ra du bsgyur bas/ kir+ra sa/ zhes pa la/ ! sAtra dwish+tsa/ sa las kyang gnyis so/ /bdag gi 'dod pa'i don gyi sa pha rol las
<p>84a.5</p>kyang byings gnyis su 'gyur te/ gnyis brjod/ kir+ra kir+ra/ sa zhes gnas pa la/ ! purba ha sA diHshe ShaH sngon ma'i ha sa dang po lhag po'o/ /byings gnyis brjod pa'i sngon ma'i ha sa dang po de lhag po ste gnas la ha sa gzhan rnams dbyi bar bya ste/ r+ra gong ma phyis/ ku
<p>84a.6</p>dang ha'i tsu 'os ka tsa/ ir+ra sogs kyis ring po/ /ku i la zhes pas sa Shar bsgyur bas/ tsi kIR+Sha zhes gnas pa la/ kAsra zhes pas Amra sbyor ba sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/ tsi kIR+ShAM tsa kA ra/ tsi kIr+ShA mA sa/ tsi kI r+ShAM ba b+hU ba sogs so/ /cho ga de bzhin du byas pas/ 
<p>84a.7</p>b+hudzra skyong ba la ste zas g.yo ba la'ang ngo zhes pa la/ bu b+huk+ShAM tsa kA ra/ bu b+huk+ShA mA sa/ bu b+huk+ShAM ba b+hU ba sogs so/ ! nAm+no ya I tsA s+ya/ ming la ya ste a'i yang I'o/ /bdag gi 'dod pas byed do sngon byas so/ /ming las bdag gi 'dod pa'i don la ya rkyen du 'gyur zhing ya pha rol la ming
<p>84b</p>
<p>84b.1</p>mtha'i a yang I ru 'gyur la Amra sogs kyang sbyar bar bya ste/ pu tra la/ ya ming mtha'i a I de la Amra sogs sbyar bas/ pu trI yAM tsa kA ra/ pu trI yA mA sa/ pu trI yAM ba b+hU ba sogs so/ ! /Du ba tsaSh+ra 'tshed pa la/ bdag gi 'dod pa lo sa 'os/ rkyen sa/ gnyis
<p>84b.2</p>brjod/ sngon ma'i ha sa dang po lhag po'os/ ts+ra gong ma phyis/ pa pats+ra/ sa zhes gnas pa la/ ! yaHse/ sa la a I'o/ /rkyen sa pha rol la byings gnyis brjod pa'i dang po'i sngon byung ba'i bu/ a yig ni i yig tu 'gyur te/ a i/ tsu'i ku dang ku i la zhes
<p>84b.3</p>pas/ pi k+Sha zhes 'grub pa la Amra sogs sbyar bas pi pak+ShAM tsa kA ra/ pi bak+ShA mA sa/ pi bak+ShAM ba b+hU ba sogs so/ ! /par+Na rigs brjod pa la'o zhes pa la/ tsu ra sogs kyis nyi/ kA sa zhes pas Amra i la yon tan sogs kyis/ bar+Na yAM tsa kA ra/ bar+Na yA mA sa/ bar+Na
<p>84b.4</p>yAM ba b+hU ba sogs so/ ! /de bzhin du ba d+ha 'ching ba la'o zhes pa la nyi Amra sbyor ba sogs kyis/ ba d+ha yAM tsakre/ ba d+ha yA mA se/ ba d+ha yAM ba b+hU be+e sogs dang yang ba d+ha la bdag gi 'dod pa'i don gyis sbyar/ gnyis brjod pa sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/ bi b+hat+sAM tsakre/ 
<p>84b.5</p>bi b+hat+sA mA se/ bi b+hat+sAM ba b+hU ba sogs so/ ! /byings b+hI hu b+h+r-I hrI rnams kyi rkyen Amra sogs pha rol la gnyis su brjod pa dang / byings de rnams nyid la Napra sogs sbyor ba 'dam ka can du bshad de/ nyi b+hI 'jig pa la Amra sogs sbyar nas gnyis su brjod pa dang / byings
<p>84b.6</p>nyid la Napra sogs sbyor ba yang na bar byas pas/ Amra sbyar ba'i phyogs la/ bi b+ha yAM tsa kA ra/ bi b+ha yA mA sa/ bi b+ha yAM ba b+hU ba sogs dang Amra sogs ma sbyar ba'i phyogs la/ bi b+hA ya/ bi b+h+ya tuH bib+h+yuH bi b+ha yi tha/ bi b+he tha/ bi b+h+ya thuH bi b+h+ya/ 
<p>84b.7</p>bi b+hA ya/ bi b+ha ya/ bi b+h+yi ba/ bi bye ma/ de bzhin du hu sbyin pa dang za ba la'o zhes pa la/ Amra sogs sbyar ba'i phyogs la/ dzu ha bAM tsa kA ra/ dzu ha bA mA sa/ dzu ha bAM ba b+hU ba sogs dang / Amra ma sbyar ba'i phyogs la/ dzu hA ba/ dzu hu ba tuH nu sogs kyis apra ru bsgyur ba'o/ / 
<p>85a</p>
<p>85a.1</p>dzu hu buH/ dzu ho tha/ dzu ha bi tha/ dzu hu ba thuH dzu hu ba/ dzu hA ba/ dzu ha ba/ dzu hu bi ba/ dzu hu bi ma/ Dub+h+r-inya 'dzin pa dang gsog pa la'o zhes pa la/ Amra sogs sbyar ba'i phyogs la/ bi b+ha rAM tsa kA ra/ bi b+ha rA mA sa/ bi b+ha rAM ba
<p>85a.2</p>b+hU ba sogs dang Amra sogs ma sbyar ba'i phyogs la/ ba b+hA ra/ ba d+h+ra tuH ba b+h+ruH ba b+ha n+tha/ ba b+h+ra thuH ba b+h+ra/ ba b+hA ra/ ba b+ha ra/ ba b+h+r-i ba/ ba b+h+r-i ma/ hrI ngo tsha ba la'o zhes pa la Amra sogs sbyar ba'i phyogs la/ dzi ha yA+oM tsa kA ra/ dzi ha yA mA sa/ dzi ha yAM ba b+hu
<p>85a.3</p>ba sogs dang / Amra sogs ma sbyar ba'i phyogs la/ dzi hA ya/ dzi hri ya tuH dzi hri yuH/ dzi hra yi tha/ dzi hri tha/ dzi hri ya thuH dzi hri ya/ dzi hA ya/ dzi hra ya/ dzi hri yi ba/ dzi hri yi ma/ de rnams ni byings b+hI la sngon ma'i ha sa dang po lhag po 'o sar phyis/ sogs pa bzhi
<p>85a.4</p>po'i bsgrub tshul lo/ ! /dzi rgyal ba la'o zhes pa'i byings la/ Napra sogs pa rasmai pa da'i skyes bu dang po'i gcig tshig Napra sbyar/ dzi Napra/ ces gnas pa la/ ! sa pa ro\u0f85k+Sha yo dzergiH sa dang lkog tu gyur pa dag las dzi'i gi'o/ /rkyen sa yig dang lkog gyur gyi
<p>85a.5</p>rnam dbye rnams pha rol la byings dzi ni gi zhes par 'gyur te/ dzi gi gnyis brjod/ ku ha sogs kyis ga gong ma slar yang dzar bsgyur/ 'phel ba sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/ dzi gA ya/ de bzhin du lhag ma rnams la/ dzi gya tuH dzi gyuH/ dzi ga yi tha/ dzi ge tha/ 
<p>85a.6</p>dzi gya thuH dzi gya/ dzi gA ya/ dzi ga ya/ dzi gyi ba/ dzi gyi ma/ sems dran pa nyams pa dang mi bden pa'i rdzun tshig dang dus yun thung ngu rnams kyi don la'ang Napra la sogs pa rnams 'jug par bshad de/ bi sngon ma'i la pa nga ro 'don pa la'o zhes pa la Napra sogs
<p>85a.7</p>sbyar cho ga snga ma rnams dang 'dra bar bsgrubs pas/ bi la lA ba/ bi le pa tuH bi le puH bi la la pi tha/ bi le pi tha/ bi la lap+tha/ bi le pa thuH bi le pa/ bi la lA pa/ bi la la pa/ bi le bi ba/ bi le bi ma/ nye ba'i tshig dang sbyar ba'i dpe ni/ susto\u0f85haM
<p>85b</p>
<p>85b.1</p>ki la bi la lA pa/ de bzhin du gam+li 'gro ba la'o zhes pa la/ Napra/ gnyis brjod pa sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/ dza gA ma/ ! ga mAM swa re / gamra rnams kyi dbyangs la'o/ /byings gamra/ hanra/ dzanra/ khanra/ g+hasra rnams kyi u pa d+hA ni kra ng+ra 'gro ba'i
<p>85b.2</p>bdag nyid nyal bas ca co sgra 'byin no/ ming can dbyangs dang po can pha rol la dbyi bar bya ste/ gnyis tshig dang mang tshig la/ dzag+ma tuH dzag+muH de bzhin du bsgrubs pas/ dza ga mi tha/ dzag+mi tha/ dza gaM tha/ dzag+ma thuH dzag+ma/ dza gA ma/ dza ga ma/ dzag+mi ba/ dzag+mi ma/ 
<p>85b.3</p>nye ba'i tshig dang sbyar bas/ dza gA mA ga s+t+yo dak+ShI Na de shaM/ ! hanra 'tshe ba dang 'gro ba la'o zhes pa la/ Napra/ hanra gyi na la g+ha 'os/ ha g+ha gnyis brjod/ sngon ma'i ha sa sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/ dza g+hA na/ de bzhin du lhag ma rnams la/ dza g+h+na tuH dza g+h+nuH/ 
<p>85b.4</p>dza g+ha ni tha/ dza g+h+ni tha/ dza g+haM tha/ yul lho phyogs la ri byi 'gro bar byed do/ dza g+h+na thuH dza g+hA/ dza g+hA na/ dza g+ha na/ dza g+h+ni ba/ dza g+h+ni ma/ nye ba'i tshig dang sbyar ba'i dpe ni/ mu rA dzA ga nA kadz+dza la lo pa lo lo lag+mI mu khAM b+ho dza bi lA pa b+h+r-ing+gaH/ dza ga tra pa trA Na ta nu tra b+hu to dza g+hA na kaM saM ka li
<p>85b.5</p>bA sa de baH/ gcod byed lha min yan lag ma yi mig sman byi/ /dpal mo'i gdong gi pad tshal rnam rol bung ba ni/ /'gro ba'i skyabs dang skyob pa phra bar 'jug pa can/ /kang+sa nges par bcom pa nor lha'i bu 'di'o/ /dza nI skye ba la'o zhes pa bdag don gyi
<p>85b.6</p>tshig can yin pas At+ma na pa da rnams 'jug pa la/ byings mtha'i I dgos pa dang bcas pa'i rjes 'brel/ gnyis brjod/ sngon ma'i ha sa dang po lhag po 'os nra gong ma phyis/ u pa d+hA yang phyis/ sa tu'i sha tsu'os/ nra ny+ra dzra ny+ra 'dus pa dz+ny+ra sogs
<p>85b.7</p>kyis bsgrubs pas/ dza dz+nye/ dza dz+nyA te/ dza dz+nyi re/ dza dz+nyi She/ dza dz+nyA the/ dza dz+nyi d+h+we/ dza dz+nye/ dza dz+nyi ba he/ dza dz+nyi ma he/ dza dz+nye dza gadz+dza/ nArdAnAtra/ 'gro bas mchod pa las 'gro ba rnams skyes so/ /kha na bto ba la'o zhes pa la pa rasmai pa da rnams sbyor ba las/ byings mtha'i
<p>86a</p>
<p>86a.1</p>a brjod don/ gnyis brjod/ sngon ma'i ha sa dang po lhag po/ ku ha zhes pas/ kha tsha/ kha pa sogs kyis tsha tsar bsgyur ba sogs kyis/ tsa khA na/ tsa kh+na tuH tsa kh+nuH tsa kha ni tha/ tsa kh+ni tha/ tsa khaM tha/ tsa kh+na thuH tsa kh+na/ tsa khA na/ tsa kha na/ 
<p>86a.2</p>tsa kh+ni ba/ tsa kh+ni ma/ kU baM tsa khA na pUrta kr-i/ ! g+hasl-i za ba la'o zhes pa la pa rasmai pa da rnams sbyor ba las/ gnyis brjod pa sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/ skyes bu dang po'i gcig tshig la/ dza g+hA sa/ gnyis tshig la de dang 'dra ba la u pa d+hA phyis/ kha sa zhes pas g+h+ra
<p>86a.3</p>g+ha krar bsgyur bas/ khron pa 'dru'o khron pa mkhan gyis/ dza krasra/ a tusra zhes gnas pa la/ ! g+ha sA de saHShaHg+ha sa sogs kyi sa'i Sha'o/ /byings g+hasra la sogs pa rnams kyi mtha'i sra yig ni Sh+ra du yig tu 'gyur te/ sra Sh+ra/ kra Sh+ra 'dus pa k+Sha sogs kyis/ dzak+Sha tuHdzak+ShuH 
<p>86a.4</p>de bzhin du lhag ma rnams la/ dzak+Shi tha/ dza g+ha si tha/ dza g+has+tha/ dzak+Sha thuH dzak+Sha/ dza g+hA sa/ dza g+ha sa/ dzak+Shi ba/ dzak+Shi ma/ ! Du dAny+ra sbyin pa la'o zhes pa la/ Napra gnyis brjod thung ngu'o sa thung ngur bsgyur bas/ da dA/ Napra ces gnas pa la/ ! A to
<p>86a.5</p>Nap+Dau/ Atra las Napra Dau'o/ /byings A ring mtha' las pha rol gyi Napra na D+ro ru 'gyur te/ Napra Dau Dita la Ti phyis/ Da de'i don/ da dau/ gnyis tshig la/ da dA/ a tu sa zhes gnas pa la/ ! A to\u0f85na pi/ Atra kyi apra med pa la'o/ /byings A ring mtha'
<p>86a.6</p>can apra bi kA ra Na'i rkyen med pa ni kra ng+ra 'gro ba'i ming can dbyangs dang po can pha rol la dbyi bar bya ste/ A phyis pas da da tuH de bzhin du bsgrubs pas lhag ma rnams la/ da duH/ da daM tha/ da de tha/ da dA tha/ da da thuH/ da da/ da dau/ da di ba/ da di ma/ de
<p>86a.7</p>bzhin du pA btung ba la'o zhes pa la/ pa pau/ pa pa tuH pa puH pa pi tha/ pa pe tha/ pa pA tha/ pa pa thuH pa pa/ pa pau/ pa pi ba/ pa pi ma/ ! Sh+ThA 'gro ba las ldog pa la'o zhes pa la/ Napra/ gnyis brjod/ thung ngu 'os/ thung ngur bsgyur bas/ 
<p>86b</p>
<p>86b.1</p>s+tha s+thA/ Napra ces gnas pa la/ ! na sha sAt+kha paH sha sa'i ma yin te kha pa'o/ /byings gnyis su brjod pa'i ha sa dang po de lhag por gnas par bshad pa las gnyis brjod pa'i dang po'i yi ge de sha sa so sor bsdu ba'i yi ge yin na kha pa so sor bsdu ba'i yi ge pha rol la
<p>86b.2</p>sha sa'i yi ge de lhag mar gnas pa ma yin pas/ kha pa'i yi ge de lhag mar gnas te/ sa phyis/ kha sa sogs kyis/ tha ta/ Napra/ Dau/ Ti phyis pas/ tas+thau/ de bzhin du lhag ma rnams la/ tas+tha tuH tas+thuH/ tas+thi tha/ tas+the tha/ tas+thA tha/ tas+tha thuH 
<p>86b.3</p>ta s+tha/ tas+thau/ tas+thi ba/ tas+thi ma/ de bzhin du yA thob par byed pa la'o zhes pa la/ Napra sogs sbyar bas/ ya yau/ ya ya tuH ya yuH/ ya yi tha/ ya ye tha/ ya yA tha/ ya ya thuH ya ya/ ya yau/ ya yi ba/ ya yi ma/ byings bzhi po de rnams
<p>86b.4</p>nye ba'i tshig dang sbyar ba'i dpe ni/ da dau dA naM dA dA tA pa pau pe yaM mu dA pu naH/ tas+thau prI tasta dAs+thA ne d+ha naM hi twA pa naM ya yau/ sbyin pa po de sbyin pa ster bar byed/ /slar yang dga' bas btung ba 'thung bar byed/ /gnas der mchod pa'i phyir du des bsdad la/ /nor rnams spangs
<p>86b.5</p>nas nags su thob par gyur/ ! Sh+NA dag par byed pa la'o zhes pa la Napra sogs sbyar/ dang po'i Sha Na'i sa na'os/ Sh+ra sa? Na yang nar log/ gnyis brjod thung ngu 'os/ thung ngu / 'di kha sa min pas sha sa'i yi ge mi dbyi sngon ma'i ha sa dang po lhag po'o sogs kyis
<p>86b.6</p>bsgrubs pas/ sa snau/ sa sna tuH sa snuH/ sa sni tha/ sa sne tha/ sa snA tha/ sa sna thuH/ sa sna/ sa snau/ sa sni ba/ sa sni ma/ ! Sh+Tu nya bstod pa la Napra sogs sbyar/ gnyis brjod/ sha sa'i sogs kyis sra dbyi ba sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/ tuSh+TA ba/ 
<p>86b.7</p>tuSh+Tu ba tuH tuSh+Tu buH/ tuSh+Tu bi tha/ tuSh+Ta bi tha/ tuSh+To tha/ tuSh+Tu ba thuH tuSh+Tu ba/ tuSh+TA ba/ tuSh+Ta ba/ tuSh+Tu bi ba/ tuSh+Tu bi ma/ ! ya dza lha mchod pa dang 'tshog 'du dang byed pa dang sbyin pa rnams la'o zhes pa'i byings la bdag don dang gzhan don gnyis ka 'jug
<p>87a</p>
<p>87a.1</p>pa la/ dang po pa rasmai pa da'i skyes bu dang po'i gcig tshig Napra sbyar gnyis kyang ngos gnyis brjod/ sngon ma'i ha sa dang po lhag po'os/ dzra gong ma phyis pas/ ya yadzra/ Napra ces gnas pa la/ ! Na bA dau pUrba s+ya/ Napra sogs la dang po'i 'o/ /Napra
<p>87a.2</p>la sogs pa pha rol la byings yadza la sogs pa dang gra ha la sogs pa rnams gnyis brjod pa'i dang po de saM pra sA ra Na ste slar yang dag par bsgyur bar 'gyur te/ ya dbyangs bcas ir+ra bsgyur bas/ i yA dza/ gnyis tshig la'ang de bzhin du bsgyur bsra/ i yadzra/ a tusra zhes
<p>87a.3</p>gnas pa la/ ya dzAM ya ba ra NaM y+b+r-itaHsaM pra mA ra NaM ki ti/ ka 'gro ba la ya dza rnams kyi ya ba ra rnams i u r-itra rnams su slar yang dag par bsgyur ba'o/ /Napra la sogs pa kra 'gro ba'i ming can pha rol la byings/ yadzra/ bats+ra/ swapra/ beny+ra/ byeny+ra/ hwa ny+ra/ bapra/ 
<p>87a.4</p>badra/ bsra rnams kyi ya ba ra rnams ni gnyis brjod pa'i dang por ma zad gnyis pa'ang rim pa ltar i u r-i rnams su 'gyur la/ de la saM pra sA ra Na ste slar yang dag par bsgyur ba zhes bya zhing / spyir slar yang dag par bsgyur ba de yang ra sogs gsal byed kho na
<p>87a.5</p>mi 'gyur bar dbyangs bcas bsgyur ba yin la/ dbyangs de yang thung ngu yin na i sogs thung ngu dang ring po yin na ring por bsgyur bar bya ba yin te/ ya phyi ma yang i/ 'dra ba'i yi ge 'dus pa sogs kyis/ I dza tuH de gnyis dang 'dra bar bsgrubs pas/ I
<p>87a.6</p>dzuH/ I dzi tha/ i ya dzi tha/ i yaSh+Tha/ I dza thuH I dza/ i yA dza/ i ya dza/ I dzi ba/ I dzi ma/ de bzhin du bsgrubs pas At+ma ne pa da rnams la/ I dze/ I dzA te/ I dzi re/ I dzi She/ I dzA the/ I dzi d+h+we/ I dze/ I dzi ba he/ I dzi
<p>87a.7</p>ma he/ ! bats+ra yongs su brjod pa la yang pa rasmai pa da rnams sbyor ba las cho ga de dang 'dra bar bsgrubs pas/ u bA tsa/ U tsa tuH U tsuH u ba tsi tha/ U tsi tha/ u bas+tha/ U tsa thuH U tsa/ u bA tsa/ u ba tsa/ U tsi ba/ U
<p>87b</p>
<p>87b.1</p>tsi ma/ ! brUnya gsal bar brjod pa la'o zhes pa la bdag don dang gzhan don gnyis ka sbyor ba las/ ! brUnyo ba tsi/ brUny+ra'i btsa'o/ /byings brUnya ni lkog gyur gyi rnam dbye dang gzhan yang apra bi kA ra Na med pa'i rkyen mang po la ba tsa zhes par 'gyur te/ brU btsa?r bsgyur bas pa
<p>87b.2</p>rasmai pa da dgu po bsgrubs gzugs snga ma dang 'dra bas/ u bA tsa/ U tsa tuH sogs dang At+ma ne pa da rnams la/ u tse/ U tsA te/ U tsi re/ U tsi She/ U tsA the/ U tsi d+h+we/ U tse/ U tsi ba he/ U tsi ma he/ ! de bzhin du nyi Sh+wa pa nyal ba la'o zhes pa
<p>87b.3</p>la'ang pa rasmai pa da rnams sbyar bas/ su Sh+wA pa/ su Shu pa tuH su Shu puH/ su Sh+wa pi tha/ su Shu pi tha/ su Sh+wap+tha/ su pa Shu thuH su Shu pa/ su Sh+wA pa/ su Sh+wa pa/ su Shupi ba/ su Shu pi ma/ nye ba'i tshig dang sbyar ba'i dpe ni/ su Sh+wA pa su khaM sa kha/ ! a shUng+ra
<p>87b.4</p>khyab par byed pa la'o zhes pa'i byings la At+ma ne pa da rnams sbyor te byings mtha'i da de'i don u brjod don/ e sbyar bas/ ashra e zhes gnas pa la/ ! nu ga shAM/ ashra rnams la nuka?'o/ /byings a shUng gi rjes 'brel phyis pa'i ashra bde bar nyol zhig grogs ngo / la sogs pa
<p>87b.5</p>rnams la lgog gyur gyi rnam dbye rnams pha rol las byings gnyis brjod pa'i dang po de la nuka? A ga ma ster bar bya ste/ gnyis kyang ngos gnyis brjod/ sngon ma'i ha sa dang po lhag po'os/ /shra gong ma phyis/ Napra sogs la b+hU a dag gi A 'os/ a gong ma ring por
<p>87b.6</p>bsgyur de la nuka? A ga ma byin/ kra gnas don/ u brjod don/ nyer bsgyur bi dang Ang sngon du bzhag de mtshams sbyor ba sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/ byA na she/ de bzhin du bsgrubs pas lhag ma rnams la/ byA na shA te/ byA na shi re/ byA na shi She/ byA na shA the/ 
<p>87b.7</p>byA na shi d+h+we/ byA na she/ byA na shi ba he/ byA na shi ma he/ nye ba'i tshig dang sbyar ba'i dpe ni/ byA na she bi shwaM b+ha ga bAnra/ sna tshogs rnams la khyab byed bcom ldan no/ /any+dzu gsal ba dang mig sman dang mdzes pa dang 'gro ba rnams la'o zhes pa la bdag don dang gzhan don gnyis ka 'jug
<p>88a</p>
<p>88a.1</p>pa la/ nuka? ster ba sogs cho ga thams cad snga ma dang 'dra bar bsgrubs pas/ pa rasmai pa da rnams la/ A naM dza/ A naM dza tuH A naM dzuH A naM dzi tha/ A naM dza thuH A naM dza/ A naM dza/ A naM dzi ba/ A naM dzi ma/ At+ma ne pa da rnams la/ A naM dze/ 
<p>88a.2</p>A naM dzA te/ A naM dzi re/ A naM dzi She/ A naM dzA the/ A naM dzi d+h+we/ A naM dze/ A naM dzi ba he/ A naM dzi ma te/ nye ba'i tshig dang sbyar ba'i dpe ni/ A naM dzAk+Shi NI kadz+dza le na kA tsitra/ kha cig mig sman gyis mig la byugs so/ ! de bzhin du ar+ts+ra mchod pa byed pa la'ang bdag don dang gzhan don gnyis ka 'jug /byings
<p>88a.3</p>mtha'i a de'i don/ nuka? ster ba sogs kyis bsgrubs pas pa rasmai pa da rnams la/ A nartsa/ A nartsa tuH A nartsuH/ A nartsi tha/ A nar+ts+tha/ kha cig mig sman gyis mig la byugs so/ /A nartsa thuH A nartsa/ A nartsa/ A nartsi ba/ A nartsi ma/ At+ma ne pa da rnams la/ A
<p>88a.4</p>nartse/ A nartsA te/ A nartsi re/ A nartsi She/ A nartsA the/ A nartsi d+h+we/ A nartse/ A nartsi ba he/ A nartsi ma he/ ! tsinya gsog pa la'o zhes pa la pa rasmai pa da rnams sbyor ba las/ rkyen sa dang lkog gyur gyi rnam dbye pha rol la byings tsiny+ra ni yang na ki ru bsgyur bar
<p>88a.5</p>bshad de/ ki dang tsi 'dam kha can du byas ki ru bsgyur ba'i phyogs la nyer bsgyur nir+ra sngon du bzhag /de nas 'phel ba yon tan iy+ra sogs so so'i thob ltar bsgrubs pas/ nish+tsi kA ya/ nish+tsi kya tuH nish+tsi kyuH nish+tsi ka yi tha/ nish+tsi ke tha/ nish+tsi kya thuH nish+tsi
<p>88a.6</p>kya/ nish+tsi kA ya/ nish+tsi ka ya/ nish+tsi kyi ba/ nish+tsi kyi ma/ ki ru ma bsgyur ba'i phyogs la/ tsi tsA ya/ tsi ts+ya tuH sogs dang / nye ba'i tshig dang sbyar ba'i dpe ni/ nish+tsi kA ya tsi raM rA dzA/ graha nye bar len pa la'ang pa rasmai pa da rnams sbyor ba las/ gnyis
<p>88a.7</p>brjod/ ku ha dag gi tsu/ ka 'gro ba sogs kyi saM pra sA ra Nar bsgyur ba sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/ dza grA ha/ dza gr-i ha tuH dza gr-i huH dza gr-i hi tha/ dza gra hi tha/ dza gr-i ha thuH ring du gnas par gyur cig rgyal po/ dza gr-i ha/ dza grA ha/ dza gra ha/ dza gr-i hi ba/ dza gr-i hi na/ 
<p>88b</p>
<p>88b.1</p>byeny+ra gnon pa la'o zhes pa la bdag don dang gzhan don gnyis ka 'jug pa las/ nyer bsgyur sam sngon du bzhag /N+ra dang pra 'gro ba rnams la/ Napra sogs la dang po'i 'os/ gnyis brjod pa'i dang po saM pra sA ra Na dang / ka 'gro ba'i ming can rnams la/ ka 'gro ba sogs
<p>88b.2</p>kyis gnyis ka saM pra sA ra Nar bsgyur ba sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/ pa rasmai pa da rnams la/ saM bi byA ya/ saM bi bya tuH saM bi byuH/ saM bi bya yi tha/ saM bi byi tha/ saM bi bye tha/ saM bi bya thuH saM bi bya/ saM bi byA ya/ saM bi bya ya/ saM bi byi ba/ saM bi byi ma/ At+ma ne pa
<p>88b.3</p>da rnams la/ saM bi bye/ saM bi byA te/ saM bi byi re/ saM bi byi She/ saM bi byA the/ saM bi byi d+h+we/ saM bi bye/ saM bi byi ba he/ saM bi byi ma he/ nye ba'i tshig dang sbyar ba'i dpe ni/ saM bi byA ya swA dz+nyA naM su dz+nyaH ! be+eny+ra thags 'thag pa la'o zhes pa la pa rasmai pa da rnams sbyor ba las
<p>88b.4</p>skyes bu dang po'i gcig tshig la/ be/ Napra ces gnas pa la/ ! be nyo ba ya na pi/ apra med pa la beny+ra'i ba y+ra'o/ /byings beny+ra ni apra bi kA ra Na med pa'i rkyen pha rol la bay+ra zhes par 'gyur te/ legs par shes pas gnon par byed do rang mi shes pa rnams/ be bay+ra ru bsgyur gnyis brjod/ sngon
<p>88b.5</p>ma'i ha sa dang po lhag po'os/ y+ra gong ma phyis/ Napra sogs la dang po'i 'os pa u/ u pa d+hA 'phel ba sogs kyis/ u bA ya/ gnyis tshig la gzhan de dang 'dra ba las ka 'gro ba sogs kyis ba gnyis ka ur bsgyur bas/ U ya tuH/ de bzhin du lhag ma rnams la/ U yuH/ 
<p>88b.6</p>u ba yi tha/ u yi tha/ U ya thuH U ya/ u bA ya/ u ba ya/ U yi ba/ U yi ma/ ! bya d+ha rdung ba la'o zhes pa la'ang pa rasmai pa da rnams sbyor ba las rkyen kyi thob kyi ya dang po dang gnyis ka ir+ra bsgyur ba sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/ bi byA d+ha/ bi bi d+ha tuH bi bi d+huH/ bi
<p>88b.7</p>bi b+hi tha/ bi bya b+hi tha/ bi bi d+ha thuH bi byA d+ha/ bi bya d+ha/ bi bi d+hi ba/ bi bi d+hi ma/ ! prats+tsh+ra shes par 'dod pa la'o zhes pa la'ang ba rasmai pa da rnams sbyor ba las/ prats+tsh+ra/ Napra ces gnas pa la/ ! saM yo gAn+na ki twa/ yang dag par sbyor ba'i mtha' las
<p>89a</p>
<p>89a.1</p>kitra ma yin no/ /yang dag par sbyor ba ste byings mtha' yi ge brtsegs pa las pha rol gyi lkog gyur gyi rkyen rnams ni ka 'gro ba'i ming can ma yin zhing / slar yang dag par bsgyur ba dang / 'phel ba dang / yon tan sogs kyi khyad par yang med de gnyis brjod
<p>89a.2</p>sngon ma'i ha sa dang po lhag po sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/ pa prats+tsha/ pa prats+tsha tuH pa prats+tshaH pa prats+tshi tha/ pa praSh+Tha/ pa prats+tsha thuH pa prats+tsha/ pa prats+tsha/ pa prits+tshi ba/ pa prats+tshi ma/ skan+d+hir+ra/ lUny+ra/ muSh+ra/ hr-iny+ra rnams la mtho 'tsham pa dang / yang yang gi don la
<p>89a.3</p>lkog gyur gyi rnam dbye Napra ni shis byed loT+ra'i skyes bu dbus ma'i gcig tshig hir bsgyur nas gcig tshig mtha' can du byed par tshig phrad kyi bsgrub par bshad de/ byings skaM d+hir+ra 'gro ba dang mya ngan/ lAny+ra gcod pa/ muSh+ra brku ba/ hr-iny+ra 'phrog pa rnams la/ Napra de hi ru bsgyur
<p>89a.4</p>skaM d+hi ra dang / hrinya gnyis la apra bi kA ra Na/ lUny+ra la nA bi kA ra Na/ muSh+ra la A na bi kA ra Na rnams sbyor ba sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/ skan+d+ha/ lU nI hi/ mu ShA Na/ ha ra zhes pa rnams 'grub ste/ nye ba'i tshig dang sbyar ba'i dpe ni ji skad du/ pU rI ma ba skan+d+ha lU nI hi nan+da
<p>89a.5</p>naM mu ShA Na rat+nA ni ha rA ma rAM ga nAH/ bi gr-i h+ya tsa kre Na mu tsi dwi ShA bA shI ya it+tha mash+tsA s+th+ya ma harni shaM di baH/ grong khyer mya ngan med bcom dga' ba'i tshal rnams bcad/ /rin chen rnams brkus 'chi med yan lag ma rnams phrogs/ /rnam 'khrugs 'khor los 'thor ba'i 'tshe bas khyab
<p>89a.6</p>par ni/ /ngal ba med par gnod byed 'di 'dra gnas pa min/ /de ltar Napra la sogs pa 'di rnams gtso bor lkog tu gyur pa'i dus 'das nas yun ring song ba la 'jug pa shas che zhing gzhan yang don sna tshogs pa la 'jug go/ /i ti swa ra swasti byA ka ra Na s+ya sU trAt+pa ro\u0f85k+Sha pa kri ya sa
<p>89a.7</p>mAp+tAH zhes pa brda sprod pa dbyangs can gyi mdo las lkog gyur gyi rab tu byed pa rnams rdzogs so// //de nas smon pa'i don gyi rnam dbye rnams kyi cho ga rnams bshad par bya ste/ A shi Shi yA d+yAstAM yA sus+yA s+yA staM yAsta yA saM yA swa yAsma sISh+Ta sI yAstAM sI raM sISh+Thas+sI
<p>89b</p>
<p>89b.1</p>yA s+thAMsI d+h+waM sI ya sI ba hi sI ma hi/ smon par byed pa la/ yAtra/ yA stAM/ yA susra/ yAsra/ yAstaM/ yAsta/ yA saM/ yA swa/ yAsma/ ! sISh+Ta/ sI ya stAM/ sI ranra/ sISh+ThAsra/ sI yAs+thAM/ sI d+h+waM/ sI ya/ sI ba hi/ sI ma hi rnams so/ /byings las smon par byed pa'i
<p>89b.2</p>don gyi bya ba brjod pa la yAta la sogs pa 'di rnams 'jug cing rnam dbye 'di rnams kyi'ang dang po dgu pa rasmai pa da ste ka 'gro ba'i ming can dang / phyi ma dgu At+ma ne pa da ste pa 'gro ba'i ming can zhes tha snyad byed la/ pANi pa'i lugs la smon pa'i ling zhes zer ro/ /de ltar na byings b+hU yod pa
<p>89b.3</p>la pa rasmai pa da rnams sbyar bas/ b+hU yAtra/ b+hU yAstAM/ b+hU yA suH/ b+hU yAH/ b+hU yAstaM/ b+hU yAsta/ b+hU yA saM/ b+hU yA swa/ b+hU yAsma/ nye ba'i tshig dang sbyar ba'i dpe ni/ saHshrI mAnra b+hU yAtra/ de bzhin du dzI ba srog 'tsho ba la'o zhes pa la pa rasmai pa da rnams sbyar bas/ ! dzI
<p>89b.4</p>byAtra/ dzI byAstAM/ dzI byA suH/ sogs te nye ba'i tshig dang sbyar ba'i dpe ni/ sha taM sha ra de dzI byAd+b+ha banra/ ! byings bats+ra smra ba la pa rasmai pa da rnams sbyar/ krang+ra 'gro ba sogs de dpal dang ldan par gyur cig/ kyis saM pra sA ra Nar bsgyur bas/ uts+yAtra/ uts+yA suH 
<p>89b.5</p>sogs so/ ! byings Du dAny+ra sbyin pa la'ang pa rasmai pa da rnams sbyor ba las/ dA yAtra ces khyod ston brgya 'tsho bar shog /gnas pa la/! dA de re/ dA la sogs pa'i e'o/ /byings dA la sogs pa rnams kyi A ni smon pa'i don gyi rnam dbye yAtra sogs pa rasmai pa da rnams pha rol las
<p>89b.6</p>e ru 'gyur te/ A er+ra bsgyur bas/ de yAtra/ de bzhin du/ de yAstAM/ de yA suHsogs so/ de dang 'dra bar bsgrubs pas/ Du d+hAny+ra 'dzin pa la/ d+he yAtra/ d+he yAstAM/ d+he yA suHsogs dang / pA btung ba la/ pe yAtra/ pe yAstAM/ pe yA suH 
<p>89b.7</p>sogs so/ ! gai sgra la'o zhes pa la'ang / yAtra sogs sbyar/ mtshams sbyor gyi yi ge rnams kyi A 'os/ ai/ A/ dA sogs kyi A de er bsgyur bas/ ge yAtra/ ge yA stAM/ ge yA suHsogs so/ /Sh+ThA 'gro ba las ldog pa la/ s+the yAtra/ s+the
<p>90a</p>
<p>90a.1</p>yA suHsogs so/ ! /mA mchod pa la'o zhes pa dang mAng+ra mchod pa la'o zhes pa gnyis byings don gcig cing sngon ma la pa rasmai pa da dang phyi ma la At+ma ne pa da rnams 'jug pa'i gnyis ka'i tshig can du byas pas/ me yAtra/ me yAstAM/ me yA suH 
<p>90a.2</p>sogs dang / mA sISh+Ta/ mA sI yAstAM/ mA sI ranra sogs so/ ! /o hAkra gtong ba la'ang pa rasmai pa da rnams sbyar bas/ he yAtra/ he yAstAM/ he yA suHsogs dang / ! nyer bsgyur a ba sngon ma'i so phra mor byed pa la/ a ba se yAtra/ a ba se yAstAM/ a ba se
<p>90a.3</p>yA suH/ sogs so/ ! Sho mtha'i las la'o zhes pa la'ang dang po'i Sha Na'i sa na dang / mtshams sbyor gyi yi ge rnams kyi A 'os/ o A dA sogs kyi de e nyer bsgyur a ba sngon du bzhag pas/ a ba se yAtra/ a ba se yAstAM/ a ba se yA suHsogs so/ ! /Du kr-inra
<p>90a.4</p>byed pa la'o zhes pa la bdag don dang gzhan don gnyis ka 'jug pa las dang po pa rasmai pa da rnams las/ kr-i/ yAtra ces gnas pa la/ yA dA dau/ yAtra la sogs pa la'o/ /yAtra la sogs pa pha rol la byings mtha'i r-i yig ni ring+ra du 'gyur la nga yig ni bar mtshams bzung
<p>90a.5</p>ba'i don te/ r-i ring du bsgyur nga phyis pas/ kri yAtra/ de bzhin du/ kri yAstAM/ kri yA suHsogs dang / At+ma ne pa da rnams la/ kr-i sISh+Ta zhes gnas pa la/ ! /uHr-i gyi'o/ /byings mtha'i r-i ni se dang sI iT+ra med pa pha rol la yon tan du 'gyur ba ma yin te/ spyir
<p>90a.6</p>btang ba 'gro ba la yon tan thob kyang mdo 'dis yon tan mi byed/ ku i la sogs kyis sa Shar bsgyur bas/ kr-i ShISh+Ta/ de bzhin du/ kr-i ShI yAstAM/ kr-i ShI ranra sogs so/ ! tsiny+ra gsogs pa la'o zhes pa 'ang gnyis ka'i tshig can yin pa las gzhan don can rnams la ya
<p>90a.7</p>la'os byings mtha' ring po dang / bdag don can rnams la pa 'gro ba sogs kyi yon tan byas pas/ tsI yAtra/ tsI yAstAM/ tsI yA suHsogs dang / tse ShISh+Ta/ tse ShI yAstAM/ tse ShI ranra sogs so/ /de bzhin du Sh+Tuny+ra bstod pa la'ang pa rasmai pa da dang At+ma ne pa da gnyis ka sbyor
<p>90b</p>
<p>90b.1</p>ba las/ stU yAtra/ stU yAstAM/ stU yA suHsogs dang / sto ShISh+Ta/ stoShI yAstAM/ stoShI ranra sogs so/ /i ti swa ra swasti byA ka ra Na s+ya sU drA dA shi She pra t+yA ya sa mAp+tAH/ zhes pa brda sprod pa dbyangs can gyi mdo las smon par byed pa'i rkyen rnams rdzogs so// ! //de nas de ring ma
<p>90b.2</p>yin pa'i 'byung 'gyur gyi rnam dbye rnams kyi cho ga rnams bshad par bya ste/ shwasta ne tA tA rau tA rastA si tAs+tha tAs+tha tAsmi tAswastAsmastA tA rau tA rastA se tA sA the tA he tAsba he tAsma he/ de ring ma yin pa las/ tA rA+au/ tA rasra/ tA si/ tAs+thasra/ tAs+tha/ tAsmi/ tAsbasra/ tAsmasra/ ! tA/ 
<p>90b.3</p>tA rau/ tA rasra/ tA se/ tA sA the/ tA d+h+we/ tA he/ tAsba he/ tAsma he rnams so/ /byings las de ring ma yin pa'i 'byung 'gyur gyi don la tA la sogs pa'i rnam dbye 'di rnams 'jug la 'byung 'gyur de yang dus ring po ma yin pa'i nye bar 'byung ba la 'jug pa shas che ste/ pA Ni pa'i
<p>90b.4</p>lugs la luT+ra zhes zer ro/ ! /si sa tA sI s+ya pA miT+ra/ si sa tA sI s+yapra rnams la iT+ra'o/ /rkyen si dang 'dod pa'i don gyi sa dang / rnam dbye tA sogs dang / smon pa'i don gyi sISh+Ta sogs dang / rkyen s+yapra rnams la iT A ga ma ster bar bya ste/ b+hU yod pa la tA sogs
<p>90b.5</p>sbyar/ iT+ra A ga ma byin/ yon tan sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/ b+ha bi tA/ b+ha bi tA rau/ b+ha bi tA raHsogs te/ nye ba'i tshig dang sbyar ba'i dpe ni/ shwo b+ha bi tA rA dz+ya b+hA raHku mA ra s+ya/ Du ba tsaSh+ra 'tshed pa la tA sbyar bas/ pats+ra tA zhes gnas pa la/ nai ka swa rA nu dAt+tAtra/ 
<p>90b.6</p>dbyangs gcig pa la a nu dAt+ta las ma yin no/ /byings dbyangs gcig pa dbyangs de yang a nu dAt+ta ste skad gsangs dma' bar 'don pa las pha rol kyi rnam dbye gzhon nu nang bar rgyal srid la 'jog pa/ra 'gyur ro/ tA la sogs pa la iT+ra A ga ma ster ba ma yin te/ iT+ra mi 'jug /tsu'i ku'os
<p>90b.7</p>tsa kar bsgyur bas/ bak+tA/ de bzhin du/ pastA rau/ pak+tA raHsogs so/ /Du dAny+ra sbyin pa la'o zhes pa la/ dA tA/ dAtArau/ dA tA raHsogs dang / bA btung ba la/ pA tA/ pA tA rau/ pA tA raHsogs so/ /tsiny+ra gsog pa la'o zhes pa la pra 'gro ba sogs kyis byings
<p>91a</p>
<p>91a.1</p>la yon tan byas pas/ tse tA/ tse tA rau/ tse tA raHsogs dang / de bzhin du NIny+ra thob pa la/ ne+e tA/ ne+e tA rau/ ne+e tA raHsogs dang / hu sbyin pa la/ ho tA/ ho tA Rau/ ho tA raHsogs dang / Du kr-iny+ra byed pa la/ kartA/ kartA rau/ kartA raH 
<p>91a.2</p>sogs dang / hr-iny+ra 'phrog pa la/ hartA/ hartA rau/ hartA raHsogs so/ /yA thob pa la/ yA tA/ yA tA rau/ /yA tA raHsogs dang / gam+l-i 'gro ba la/ gaM tA/ gaM tA rau/ shaM tA raHsogs so/ /i ti swa ra swasti byA ka ra Na s+ya sU trAts+tsh+wasta ne pra t+yA ya pra kri ya sa mAp+tAH/ zhes
<p>91a.3</p>pa brda sprod pa dbyangs can gyi mdo las de ring ma yin pa'i 'byung 'gyur gyi don gyi rkyen gyi rab tu byed pa rnams rdzogs so// ! //de nas 'byung 'gyur dus ring ba'i don gyi rnam dbye rnams kyi bya ba rnams brjod par bya ste/ ! t+yA dau b+ha biSh+ya tis+yapra/ ti sogs la 'byung
<p>91a.4</p>'gyur la s+yapra'o/ /byings la 'byung 'gyur kyi don brjod pa las rnam dbye ti la sogs pa bco brgyad po la s+yapra bar rkyen du 'gyur la 'byung 'gyur de yang ma 'ongs pa dus ring po la 'jug pa shas che zhing s+yapra kyi pra yig ni byings la yon tan 'byung ba'i don te/ pA Ni pa'i lugs la
<p>91a.5</p>l+r-iT+ra zer ro/ /des na byings b+hU yod pa la ti sogs s+yapra dang bcas pa sbyar/ si sa tA sI s+yapra rnams la iT+ra 'os/ iT+ra A ga ma byin/ byings yon tan ku i la sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/ b+ha bi Sh+ya ti/ b+ha bi Sh+yataH b+ha bi Sh+yan+ti/ b+ha bi Sh+ya si/ b+ha bi Sh+ya thaH b+ha bi Sh+ya tha/ 
<p>91a.6</p>b+ha bi Sh+yA mi/ b+ha bi Sh+yA baH b+ha bi Sh+yA maH ! yadzra lha mchod pa la/ s+ya ti sogs sbyar/ tsha sha Sha ra dza sogs kyis dza Shar bsgyur bas/ yaSh+ra/ s+ya ti zhes gnas pa la/ ! Sha D+he kaHse/ sa la Sha D+ha dag gi ka'o/ /'byung 'gyur gyi rkyen gyi sa yig pha rol la byings
<p>91a.7</p>mtha'i Sha yig dang D+ha yig dag ni kA yig tu 'gyur te/ Sh+rakra/ ku i la sogs kyis sraSh+ra/ yak+Sh+ya ti/ de bzhin du/yak+Sh+ya taH yak+Sh+yan+ti sogs so/ ! hanra 'tshe ba la/ s+ya ti sogs sbyar bas/ hanra s+ya ti zhes gnas pa la/ ! ha nr-i taHs+yapra/ hanra r-itra las s+yapra
<p>91b</p>
<p>91b.1</p>la'o/ /byings hanra dang gamra dang r-itra mtha' can rnams las pha rol gyi s+yapra la iT+ra A ga ma ster bar bya ste/ iT+ra byin pas/ ha ni Sh+ya ti/ de bzhin du bsgrubs pas/ ha niSh+ya taH ha ni Sh+yan+ti sogs so/ ! de bzhin du Du kr-iny+ra byed pa la'ang iT+ra byin/ yon tan byas pas/ ka
<p>91b.2</p>ri Sh+ya ti/ ka ri Sh+ya taH ka ri Sh+yan+ti sogs dang / ! ga m+l-i 'gro ba la/ gami Sh+ya ti/ ga mi Sh+ya taH ga miSh+ya n+ti sogs so/ ! bsra 'dug gnas la'o zhes pa la/ bsra s+ya ti zhes gnas pa la/ ! sa sto\u0f85na pi/ apra med pa la sa'i sra latra'o/ /apra bi kA ra Na med pa'i rkyen sa
<p>91b.3</p>yig pha rol la byings mtha'i sra yig ni ta yig tu 'gyur te/ sra trar bsgyur bas/ ba t+s+ya ti/ de bzhin du bsgrubs pas/ bat+s+ya taH bat+s+yan+ti sogs so/ ! /dahra thal bar byed pa la/ s+ya ti sbyar/ da sngon ma'i g+h+ra 'os/ hrag+h+ra/ dz+ha b+ha'i mtha' sogs kyis dra d+h+ra/ kha sa sogs
<p>91b.4</p>kyis g+h+rakra/ ku i la zhes pas sa Shar+ra bsgyur ba sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/ d+hak+Sh+ya ti/ de dang 'dra bar bsgrubs pas/ d+hak+Sh+ya taH d+hak+Sh+yan+ti sogs dang / ! duhra rab tu 'gengs pa la'o zhes pa la'ang de bzhin du bsgrubs pas/ d+hukra s+ya ti zhes gnas pa la/ ! u pa d+hA la g+hoH 
<p>91b.5</p>u pa d+hA thung ngu'i 'o/ /byings kyi u pa d+hA nA mi'i yi ge thung ngu rnams ni krang+ra 'gro ba ma yin pa pha rol las yon tan du 'gyur te/ u or bsgyur bas/ d+hok+Sh+ya ti/ d+hok+Sh+ya taH d+hok+Sh+yan+ti sogs so/ ! de bzhin du b+hi dir+ra rnam par 'joms pa la bdag don dang gzhan don gnyis ka
<p>91b.6</p>'jug pa las/ yon tan sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/ b+het+s+ya ti/ b+het+s+ya taH b+het+s+yan+ti sogs dang / b+het+s+ya te/ b+het+s+ya te/ b+het+s+yan+te sogs so/ ! ts+tshi dar+ri gnyis su byed pa la/ ts+tshet+s+ya ti/ ts+tshet+s+ya taH ts+tshe t+s+yan+ti sogs dang / ts+tshet+s+ya te/ ts+tshet+s+ye te/ ts+tshet+s+ya n+te sogs so/ ! tuSh+ra
<p>91b.7</p>dga' ba la'o zhes pa la/ tok+Sh+ya ti/ sa la ShaD+ha dag gi ka 'os Sh+ra ka ra/ to k+Sh+ya taH tok+Sh+yan+ti sogs so/ ! tudra gdung ba la/ tot+s+ya ti/ tot+s+ya taH a ta kyi A dang e'o/ /tot+s+yan+ti sogs so/ ! ed+h+ra 'phel ba la/ At+ma ne pa da rnams sbyar/ iT+ra byin pas/ e d+hi Sh+ya te/ e d+hi Sh+ye te/ e d+hi
<p>92a</p>
<p>92a.1</p>Sh+yan+te sogs so/ ! /shIng+ra nyal ba iT+ra yon tan sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/ sha yi Sh+ya te/ sha yi Sh+ye te/ sha yi Sh+yan+te sogs so/ /o hAkra gtong ba la/ hA s+ya ti/ hA s+ya taH hA s+yan+ti sogs so/ ! /Du dAny+ra sbyin pa la/ dA s+ya ti/ dA s+ya taH dA s+yan+ti sogs dang / rwa
<p>92a.2</p>s+ya te/ dA s+ye te/ dA s+yan+te sogs so/ ! /Sh+Tuny+ra bstod pa la'ang / sto Sh+ya ti/ sto Sh+ya taH sto Sh+yan+ti sogs dang / sto Sh+ya te/ sto Sh+ye te/ sto Sh+yan+te sogs so/ ! b+hudzra skyong ba la'o zhes pa la'ang bdag don dang gzhan don gnyis ka 'jug ste/ byings mtha'i a swa ri ta ste de'i don/ tsu'i ku'os/ 
<p>92a.3</p>dzra grar bsgyur ba sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/ b+hok+Sh+ya ti/ b+ho k+Sh+ya taH b+ho k+Sh+yan+ti sogs dang / b+hok+Sh+ya te/ b+hok+Sh+ye te/ b+hok+Sh+yan+te sogs so/ /i ti swa ra swasti byA ka ra Na s+ya sU trAd+b+ha bi Sh+yan+tipra t+yA ya s+ya pra kri ya sa mAp+tAH zhes pa brda sprod pa dbyangs can gyi mdo las 'byung 'gyur gyi rkyen gyi rab tu byed pa rnams
<p>92a.4</p>rdzogs so// ! //de nas bya ba shor ba'am ma 'dzom pa'i don gyi rnam dbye rnams kyi cho ga rnams bshad par bya ste/ ! s+yapa kri yA ti kra me/ bya ba shor ba la s+yapra'o/ /bya ba shor ba ste dus la ma khel ba'am rgyu tshogs ma 'dzom pa dang / bya ba ma rdzogs par 'phro lus pa dang / bya ba
<p>92a.5</p>zin ma thag pa'i grub zin gsar ba rnams kyi bya ba'i don la rnam dbye dipra la sogs pa bco brgyad po 'jug cing bar rkyen s+yapra kyang sbyin par bya ste/ pA Ni pa'i lugs la l+r-ing+ra zhes zer ro/ /de lta na b+hU yod pa la/ dipra/ bar rkyen s+yaT+ra/ si sa tA sI s+yapra rnams la iT+ra bu 'os/ iT+ra
<p>92a.6</p>A ga ma yon tan sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/ a b+ha biSh+yatra/ de bzhin du lhag ma rnams la/ a b+ha biSh+ya tAM/ a b+ha bi Sh+yanra/ a b+ha bi Sh+yaH a b+ha bi Sh+ya taM/ a b+ha bi Sh+ya ta/ a b+ha bi Sh+yaM/ a b+ha bi Sh+yA ba/ a b+ha bi Sh+yA ma/ nye ba'i tshig dang sbyar ba'i dpe ni/ yA dA su br-iSh+TiHsu rA dz+yaM tsA b+ha bi Sh+yatra/ ta dA su
<p>92a.7</p>de dag tu slong mo bzang po thab par 'gyur/ b+hi k+Sha ma/ bya ba ma rdzogs pa'i dpe/ b+ha bi Sh+yatra/ ! de bzhin du b+hudzra skyong ba dang za ba la/ a b+ho k+Sh+yatra/ a b+hok+Sh+ya tAM/ a b+hok+Sh+yanra sogs so/ ! gam+l-i 'gro ba la a ga mi Sh+yatra/ a ga mi Sh+ya tAM/ a ga mi Sh+yanra sogs gang du char babs shing rgyal po bde bar gyur/ grub zin gsar ba'i dpe/ te
<p>92b</p>
<p>92b.1</p>byings de gnyis nye ba'i tshig dang sbyar ba'i dpe ni/ a b+hok+Sh+ya d+b+ha bAr+Ya d+ya ga mi Sh+yatra/ ! Du pa tsaSh+ra 'tshed pa la/ a bak+Sh+yatra/ a ba k+Sh+ya tAM/ a bak+Sh+yanra sogs dang / ! dz+wa la 'bar ba la nyer bsgyur pra sngon du bzhag pas/ prAdz+wa li Sh+yatra/ prA dz+wa li Sh+ya tAM/ pA dz+wa li Sh+yanra sogs te byings de gnyis
<p>92b.2</p>nye ba'i tshig dang sbyar ba'i dpe ni/ 'ongs so grub zin gsar ba dang zas bya bas rdzogs pa/ gang khyed ni zas la 'ongs so/ /a pak+Sh+yad+b+ha bAr+Ya d+ya g+niHprA dz+wa liSh+yatra/ ! hanra 'tshe ba la/ hanra r-i ta las s+yapa la'os/ iT+ra byin pas/ a ha ni Sh+yatra/ a ha ni Sh+ya tAM/ a ha ni Sh+yanra sogs dang / ! sha kl-i nus pa la/ a shak+Sh+yatra/ 
<p>92b.3</p>a sha k+Sh+ya tAM/ a sha k+Sh+yanra sogs te byings de gnyis nye ba'i tshig dang sbyar ba'i dpe ni/ a ha ni Sh+yad+b+ha bAr+Ya d+ya khyod kyis tshos shig gang du me rab tu 'bar ro/ shak+Sh+yatra/ sogs te rnam dbye'i ngo bo dipra sogs dang rkyen s+yapra a yig mtha' can yin pas apra bi kA ra Na sogs kyi rigs 'gre bas cho ga rnams
<p>92b.4</p>rtogs sla'o/ /i ti swa ra swasti byA ka ra Na s+ya sU trAt+k+ri yA ti kra ma s+ya pra t+yA ya pra kri ya sa mAp+tAH/ khyed rang nus pa ji tsam pa choms shig/ zhes pa brda sprod pa dbyangs can gyi mdo las bya ba shor ba'i rkyen gyi rab tu byed pa rnams rdzogs so// ! //de nas 'das pa'am sngon byung ba'i rkyen kyi rnam
<p>92b.5</p>dbye rnams bshad par bya ste/ ! b+hU te si/ byung zin pa la si'o/ /byings las 'das pa'am byung zin tsam gyi don brjod pa la dipra sogs rnam dbye bco brgyad bo 'gyur zhing bar rkyen si yang sbyin par bya la byung zin de yang 'das nas dus yun ring song ba la 'jug pa shas che ste/ ! b+hU
<p>92b.6</p>yod pa la rnam dbye dipra bar rkyen si/ i brjod don/ dipra sogs la aT byin pas/ a b+hUsra dra ces gnas pa la/ ! dA de pe/ pa la dA la sogs pa las so/ /pa ste rnam dbye pa rasmai pa da rnams pha rol la byings dA/ d+hA/ s+thA/ iN+ra/ b+hU/ pA rnams las pha rol gyi si ni
<p>92b.7</p>dbyi bar bya ste/ si phyis pas a b+hAtra/ de bzhin du gnyis tshig la/ a b+hU tAM/ mang tshig la/ a b+hUsra/ an zhes gnas pa la/ pa la dA la sogs pa las sos/ si phyis/ rnam dbye dbyangs thog ma can pha rol si phyis pa las b+hu la buka? A ga ma ster bar bshad
<p>93a</p>
<p>93a.1</p>pas/ buka? byin ka gnas don/ u brjod don/ a b+hU banra/ de rnams dang 'dra bar bsgrubs pas/ a b+hUH a b+hU tAM/ a b+hU ta/ a b+hU baM/ a b+hU ba/ a b+hU ma/ nye ba'i tshig dang sbyar ba'i dpe ni/ a b+hUng+b+r-iSh+TaMH Du dAny+ra sbyin pa
<p>93a.2</p>la'ang de bzhin du bsgrubs pas skyes bu dang po'i gcig tshig dang gnyis tshig la/ a dAtra/ a dA tAM/ mang tshig la/ a dAsra/ anra zhes gnas pa la/ si phyis/ ! s+yA bi daH si la A dang bid las so/ /rkyen si phyis pa la byings A ring mtha' can dang byings bid
<p>93a.3</p>las pha rol gyi rnam dbye an ni usra zhes par 'gyur te/ anra usra su bsgyur/ ! u s+yA lo paH us la A dbyi'o/ /anra bsgyur ba'i us pha rol la byings mtha'i A ring ni dbyi bar bya ste/ A phyis pas/ a duH lhag ma rnams la/ a dAH a dA taM/ 
<p>93a.4</p>a dA ta/ a dAM/ a dA ba/ a dA ma/ de bzhin du Du d+hAny+ra 'dzin pa la/ a d+hAtra/ a d+hA tAM/ a d+huH a d+hAH a d+hA taM/ a d+hA taH a d+hAM/ a d+hA ba/ a d+hA ma/ ! de bzhin du Sh+ThA 'gro ba las ldog pa la/ as+thAtra/ a s+thA tUM/ 
<p>93a.5</p>a s+thAH sogs so// ! iN+ra 'gro ba la/ dipra si sbyar/ si dbyi ba las iN+ra ni gA zhes par 'gyur bar bshad pas/ iN+ra gAr+ra bsgyur bas/ a gAtra/ a gA tAM/ a guH nye ba'i tshig dang sbyar ba'i dpe ni/ a re mA gAHsA d+h+wa saM mA gAM garbi ta man+di raM/ 
<p>93a.6</p>! pA btung ba la/ a pAtra/ a pA tAM/ a puHsogs so/ ! g+haT rtsed mo la'o zhes pa'i byings la At+na ne pa da rnams sbyar/ iT+ra byin pas/ a g+ha Tisra tanra zhes gnas pa la/ dgag pa'i don gyi mA sngon du bzhag/ kye 'jig sar ma 'gro khang bzang dben par ma 'gro zhig / 
<p>93a.7</p>! me TaH mA las aT+ra'i 'o/ /dgag pa'i don gyi mA sngon ma las dipra sogs kyi aT+ra ni dbyi bar bya ste/ aT+ra phyis/ ku i la sogs kyis sra Sh+ra/ Sh+Tu la Sh+Tu 'os/ tra T+rar bsgyur ba sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/ mA g+ha TiSh+Ta/ de bzhin du gnyis tshig
<p>93b</p>
<p>93b.1</p>dang mang tshig la/ mA g+ha TiShA tAM/ mA g+ha TiSha ta/ skyes bu dbus ma'i gcig tshig dang gnyis tshig la/ mA g+ha tiSh+ThAH mA g+ha Ti ShA thAM/ mang tshig la/ mA g+ha Tisra d+h+waM zhes gnas pa la/ ! d+he tsa lo po/ d+ha la'ang si dbyi'o/ /rnam dbye At+ma ne pa da
<p>93b.2</p>rnams pha rol la spyir btang si dbyi ba ma yin kyang de'i dmigs bsal rnam dbye d+ha yig pha rol la At+ma ne pa da yin na'ang si dbyi bar bya ste/ si phyis pas/ mA g+ha Ti d+h+waM/ phyi ma gsum la/ mA g+ha Ti Shi/ mA g+ha TiSh+wa hi/ mA g+ha TiSh+ma hi/ sma sngon du sbyar ba la yang
<p>93b.3</p>aT+ra dbyi bar 'dod la/ sma sbyar ba na si dang bcas pa'i dipra sogs 'das par ma zad da ltar ba dang 'byung 'gyur gyi don la'ang 'jug par bshad de/ b+hU yod pa la/ dipra/ si/ aT+ra/ sma sngon du bzhag de nas aT phyis pas/ sma b+hU ta/ ! byings
<p>93b.4</p>Du kr-iny+ral/ dipra si sbyar bas/ a kr-i sra dra ces gnas pa la/ ! Ni t+ya pe/ pa la Na 'gro ba'o/ /byings r-i yig mtha' can sogs byings mang po zhig las pa ste pa rasmai pa da rnams pha rol la si ni Na 'gro ba'i ming can zhes tha snyad byed de dgos byung zin nam 'byung bar 'gyur/ pa ni
<p>93b.5</p>byings la 'phel ba byed pa'i don te/ 'phel ba byas/ ! saHsi la'o/ /rkyen si las pha rol gyi rnams dbye dipra dang sipra la IT+ra A ga ma 'gyur te/ IT+ra byin pas/ a kAr+ShItra/ de bzhin du sipra la IT+ra dang / anra/ usra su bsgyur ba sogs kyis bsgrubs
<p>93b.6</p>pas/ lhag ma rnams la/ a kAr+Sh+TAM/ a kAr+ShuH/ a kAr+ShIH a kAr+Sh+TaM/ a kAr+Sh+Ta/ a kAr+ShaM/ a kAr+Sh+wa/ a kAr+Sh+ma/ nye ba'i tshig dang sbyar ba'i dpe ni/ nyer bsgyur nir+ra sngon du bzhag pas/ swa dz+nyA naM yo gI ni rakA r+ShItra/ ! de bzhin
<p>93b.7</p>du nyer bsgyur ba ri sngon ma'i hr-iny+ra 'tsho ba la/ paR+Ya hAr+ShItra/ paR+Ya hAr+Sh+TAM/ paR+Ya hAr+ShuH paR+Ya hAr+ShIH paR+Ya hAr+Sh+TaM/ paR+Ya hAr+Sh+Ta/ paR+Ya hAr+ShaM/ paR+Ya hAr+Sh+wa/ paR+Ya hAr+Sh+ma/ ! pa da gsal bar brjod pa la/ dipra/ rang gi ye shes rnal 'byor rnam par grol ba sgom mo/ si/ 
<p>94a</p>
<p>94a.1</p>si/ sa tA sogs kyis iT+ra byin pas/ a badra/ isra Idra ces gnas pa la/ ! i TaH I Ti/ iT+ra las IT+ra la'o/ /iT+ra las pha rol gyi si ni IT dbyi bar bya ste/ sra phyis pa la N+ra 'gro ba 'os 'phel ba byas
<p>94a.2</p>pas/ a bA dItra/ de bzhin du sipra la iT dang IT+ra'i bar gyi sra dbyi ba sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/ lhag ma rnams la/ a bA diSh+TAM/ a bA di ShuH a bA dIH a bA diSh+TaM/ a bA diSh+Ta/ a bA di ShaM/ a bA di Sh+wa/ a bA diSh+ma/ ! nyer bsgyur pra sngon ma'i
<p>94a.3</p>pra dzra rku ba la'ang de dang 'dra bar bsgrubs pas/ prA brA dzI tra/ prA brA dziSh+TAM/ prA brA dzi ShuH prA brA dzIHsogs so/ ! grahra nye bar len pa la/ cho ga gzhan rnams snga ma dang 'dra ba la byings ha yig dang ma yig dang ya yig rnams kyi mtha' dang / k+ShiN+ra/ shwasra/ dzA gr-i/ 
<p>94a.4</p>hasra rnams la si pha rol la 'phel ba mi byed par bshad pad/ 'phel ba mi byed/ a gra hItra/ a gra hiSh+TAM/ a gra hi ShuH a gra hIHsogs so/ ! Shahra yig dga' ba' la/ a sa hItra/ a sa hiSh+TAM/ a sa hi ShuH/ a sa hIHsogs dang / a sa hiSh+Ta/ a sa hi ShA tAM/ a
<p>94a.5</p>sa hi Sha ta sogs so/ ! sha ma dang dwa ma nye bar zhi ba la/ a sha mItra/ a sha miSh+TAM/ a sha mi ShuHsogs dang / a da mItra/ a da miSh+TAM/ a da mi ShuHsogs so/ ! kra mu rkang pa bskyod pa la/ a kra mItra/ a kra miSh+TAM/ a kra mi ShuHsogs so/ ! da ya 'gro ba la/ a
<p>94a.6</p>da yItra/ a da yiSh+TAM/ a da yi ShuHsog so/ ! k+Shi Na 'tshe ba la/ ak+Shi NItra/ ak+Shi Ni Sh+TAM/ ak+Shi Ni ShuHsogs so/ ! shwas srog 'dzin pa la/ a shwa sItra/ a shwa siSh+TAM/ a shwa si ShuHsogs so/ ! dzA gr-i gnyis sangs pa la/ a dzA ga rItra/ a dzA ga
<p>94a.7</p>riSh+TAM/ a dzA ga ri ShuHsogs so/ ! ha sa dgod pa la/ a ha sItra/ a ha siSh+TAM/ a ha si ShuHsogs so/ ! byings a gi/ la gi/ ma thaM/ ba gi/ ma gi/ swa gi/ ri gi/ la g+hi rnams 'gro ba la/ A gItra/ A gISh+TAM/ A gi ShuHsogs
<p>94b</p>
<p>94b.1</p>so/ a la gItra/ a la giSh+TAM/ a la gi ShuHsogs so/ ! /Du kr-iny+ra byed pa la At+ma ne pa da'i skyes bu dang po'i gcig tshig ta si aT+ra rnams sbyar bas/ a kr-isra ta zhes gnas pa la/ ! lo pohra swAtra dz+ha sa/ thung ngu las dz+ha sa la dbyi'o/ /byings iT mi 'jug pa
<p>94b.2</p>byings mtha' dbyangs thung ngu yin pa las pha rol gyi si ni rnam dbye dz+ha sa so sor bsdu ba'i yi ge dang po can pha rol la dbyi bar ste/ si phyis pas/ a kr-i ta/ de bzhin du dz+ha sa dang po rnams la/ si dbyi ba dang / dbyangs dang po rnams la saShar+ra bsgyur ba sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/ a
<p>94b.3</p>kr-i ShA tAM/ a kr-i Shata/ a kr-i thAH a kr-iShA thAM/ a kr-i D+h+waM/ a kr-iShi/ a kri Sh+wa hi/ a kr-iSh+ma hi/ ! Du dAny+ra sbyin pa la/ dA sogs kyi i 'os/ A ir+ra bsgyur de nas snga ma ltar bsgrubs pas/ a dita/ a diShA tAM/ a di Sha ta/ a di thAHsogs so/ ! 
<p>94b.4</p>de bzhin du Du d+hAny+ra 'dzin pa la/ a d+hi ta/ a d+hi ShA tAM/ a d+hi Sha ta sogs so/ ! nyer bsgyur a d+hi sngon ma'i ing kha ton byed pa la'ang At+ma ne pa da rnams sbyor ba las/ ! i ngo bA gI sau/ ing gi si la gI yang na'o/ /byings ing ni si pha rol la gI zhes par yang na
<p>94b.5</p>'gyur te/ ing gI ru bsgyur ba'i phyogs la/ a d+h+ya gISh+Ta/ a d+h+ya gI ShA tAM/ ad+h+ya gI Sha ta sogs dang gI ru ma bsgyur ba'i phyogs la/ dipra sogs kyi aT+ra'i sngon du dbyangs dang po'i aT+ra sbyor ba sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/ a d+h+yaiSh+Ta/ a d+h+yai ShA tAM/ a d+h+yai Sha
<p>94b.6</p>ta/ ad+h+yaiSh+ThAHsogs so/ /ru sgra la'o zhes pa la iT+ra 'jug cing / pa la Na 'gro ba 'os/ 'phel ba byas pas/ a rA bItra/ a rA biSh+TAM/ a rA bi ShuH/ a rA bIHsogs so/ /Du pa tsaSh+ra 'tshed pa la/ pa rasmai pa de'i skyes bu dang po'i gcig
<p>94b.7</p>tshig la/ IT+ra byin/ 'phel ba byas pas/ a bAk+ShItra/ gnyis tshig la/ a bats+ra sra tAM zhes gnas pa la/ ! dz+ha sAtra/ dz+ha sa las so/ /byings dz+ha sa so sor bsdu ba'i mtha' las pha rol gyi si ni rnam dbye dz+ha sa so sor bsdu ba'i yi ye dang po can pha rol
<p>95a</p>
<p>95a.1</p>la dbyi bar bya ste/ si phyis/ 'phel ba/ tsu'i ku sogs kyis/ a pAk+tAM/ mang tshig la anra usra su bsgrubs pas/ a pAk+ShuH de rnams dang 'dra bar bsgrubs pas/ a pAk+ShIH a pAk+taM/ a pAk+ta/ a pAk+ShaM/ a pAk+Sh+wa/ a pAk+Sh+ma/ de bzhin du At+ma ne pa da
<p>95a.2</p>rnams la/ a pak+ta/ a pak+ShA tAM/ a pak+Sha ta/ a pak+thAH a pak+ShA thAM/ a pag+d+h+waM/ a pak+Shi/ a pak+Sh+wa hi/ a pak+Sh+mahi/ ! pra tsha shes pa la/ dz+ha sa dang po rnams la si dbyi ba dang tsh+rashra Sh+ra sogs kyis tsh+ra Sh+ra de kra ku i la sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/ a prAk+ShItra/ a prASh+TAM/ a prA k+ShuH/ 
<p>95a.3</p>a prAk+ShIH a prASh+Ta/ a prAk+ShaM/ a prASh+wa/ a prASh+ma/ byings mtha' dz+ha sa'i yi ge ma yin na si mi dbyi ste e d+ha 'phel ba la si sa tA sogs kyis iT+ra byin pas/ ai d+hiSh+Ta/ ai d+hiShA tAM/ ai d+hiSha ta/ ai d+hi Sh+ThAH ai d+hiShA thAM/ ai d+hid+h+waM/ ai d+hi Shi/ ai d+hi Sh+wa hi/ ai d+hi Sh+ma hi/ 
<p>95a.4</p>! de bzhin du shIng nyal ba la/ a sha yiSh+Ta/ a sha yi ShA tAM/ a sha yi Sha ta/ a sha yiSh+ThAH a sha yi ShA thAM/ a sha yi d+h+waM sogs so/ ! ru d+hir+ra sgrib pa la pa rasmai pa da rnams sbyor ba las/ ! i ri to bA/ i ru la yang na'o/ /byings ir rjes 'brel 'gro ba la byung zin
<p>95a.5</p>gyi don bar rkyen si'i yul la nga sbyor ba dang yang na si nyid sbyor ba 'dam kha can du bya ste/ nga sbyar ba'i phyogs la/ rkyen gyi nga bar mtshams bzung ba'i don/ d+h+ra a la 'dren pa sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/ a ru d+hatra/ a ru d+ha tAM/ a ru d+hanra/ a ru d+haH a ru d+ha taM/ a ru d+ha ta/ 
<p>95a.6</p>a ru d+haM/ a ru d+hA ba/ a ru d+hA ma/ si nyid sbyin pa'i phyogs la/ ! a ni To nA mi ba taH iT+ra med pa'i nA mi las 'phel ba'o/ /byings iT+ra mi 'jug pa'i dang po'o dbyangs de nA mi'i yi ge yin na si pha rol la 'phel bar 'gyur te/ byings la 'phel ba/ si dbyi ba dang ta tha
<p>95a.7</p>d+har+ra bsgyur ba sogs so so'i cho ga thob ltar bsgrubs pas/ a raut+sItra/ a ro d+d+hAM/ a raut+suH/ a raut+sIH/ a rau d+d+haM/ a raud+d+ha/ a raut+saM/ a raut+s+wa/ a raut+s+ma/ ! de bzhin du ts+tshi dir+ra gnyis su byed pa la'ang / nga dang si yang na bar byas pas/ ats+tshai datra/ ats+tshai da tAM/ ats+tshai danra
<p>95b</p>
<p>95b.1</p>sogs dang / ats+tshait+sItra/ ats+tshait+tAM/ ats+tshet+suHsogs so/ ! di bu rtsed mo la'o zhes pa la/ iT+ra 'jug pas iT+ra byin/ byings la yon tan sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/ a de bItra/ a de bISh+TAM/ a de bi ShuH/ a de bIHsogs dang de bzhin du/ ! si bu bsnyen par byed pa la/ a sa
<p>95b.2</p>bItra/ a se biSh+TAM/ a se bi ShuHsogs so/ ! dr-i shir+ra lta ba la/ ir+ra la yang na'os par rkyen nga dang si yang na bar byed pas/ nga'i phyogs la/ a dar+shatra/ a dar+sha tAM/ a dar+shanra sogs dang / si nyid kyi phyogs la/ ! rA ro dz+ha saM dr-i shAM/ dz+ha sa la dr-i sha rnams kyi ar ni ra'o/ /byung
<p>95b.3</p>zin gyi rnam dbye'i skabs 'dir rkyen dang rnam dbye dz+ha sa'i yi ge dang po pha rol la byings dr-i sha la sogs pa rnams la yon tan byas pa'i ar ni ra zhes par 'gyur te/ byings kyi r-i ar+ra de ra ru bsgyur/ de ring por bsgyur ba sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/ a drAk+ShItra/ a drASh+TAM/ a drAk+ShuH a drAk+ShiH a drASh+TaM/ 
<p>95b.4</p>adrASh+Ta/ a drAk+ShaM/ a drAk+Sh+wa/ a drAk+Sh+ma/ de bzhin du spr-i sha reg pa la/ a sprAk+ShItra/ a sprASh+TAM/ asprAk+ShuH/ a sprASh+TaM/ asprASh+TaH/ asprAk+ShaM sogs so/ mr-i dzuSh+ra dag pa la/ nyer bsgyur bar sngon du bzhag cho ga sngon ma dang 'dra bas/ pa rA mrA k+ShItra/ pa rA mrASh+TAM/ pa rA mrAk+ShuHsogs
<p>95b.5</p>so/ ! b+hi dir+ra 'joms pa la iT mi 'jug pa rasmai pa da rnams la/ iT+ra med pa'i nA mi la 'phel ba sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/ a b+hait+sAtra/ a b+hai t+tAM/ a b+hait+suHsogs dang / At+ma ne pa da rnams la/ ! si s+yoH si sI dag la'o/ /iT+ra med pa'i rkyen si dang sISh+Ta sogs
<p>95b.6</p>pha rol la byings kyi u pa d+hA la yon tan 'byung ba ma yin te/ byings la yon tan mi byed rnam dbye dz+ha sa dang po can rnams la si dbyi ba sogs kyis/ ab+hit+ta/ a b+hit+sA tAM/ a b+hit+sa ta/ a b+hit+thAH a b+hit+sA thAM/ a b+hi d+h+wAM/ a b+hi t+si/ a b+hit+s+wa hi/ a b+hit+s+ma hi sogs so/ ! br-i tu 'jug
<p>95b.7</p>pa la At+ma ne pa da rnams sbyor ba las/ iT+ra ster ba sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/ a brtiSh+TaM/ a brti ShA tAM/ a brti Sha ta/ a birtiSh+ThAH a brtiShA thAM/ a brti d+h+wAM/ a brti Shi/ a brti Sh+wa hi/ a brtiSh+ma hi/ ! ga m+l-i dang sr-i p+l-i 'gro ba la'ang pa rasmai pa da rnams sbyor ba
<p>96a</p>
<p>96a.1</p>las/ ! lit+bu ShA deHnga / l-i 'gro ba dang pu Sha sogs la nga'o/ /byings l-i yig rjes 'brel 'gro ba rnams dang pu Sha la sogs pa rnams la byung zin gyi rkyen si'i don la nga 'gyur te/ rkyen nga sbyar/ nga yig yon tan 'gog pa'i don yin pas/ dbyi ba sogs kyis
<p>96a.2</p>bsgrubs pas/ a ga matra/ a ga ma tAM/ a ga manra/ a ga maH a ga ma taM/ a ga ma ta/ a ga maM/ a ga mA ba/ a ga mA ma/ ! de bzhin du/ sr-i p+l-i la/ a sri patra/ a sr-i pa tAM/ a sr-i panra sogs so/ ! mu ts+l-i/ grol ba la/ a mu tsatra/ a mu tsatAM/ a mu tsanra sogs
<p>96a.3</p>so/ ! buSh+ra rgyas pa la/ a pu Shatra/ a pu Sha tAM/ a pu Shanra sogs so/ ! d+yutra snang byed la/ a d+yu tatra/ a d+yutra tAM/ a d+yu tanra sogs so/ ! bats+ra yongs su brjod pa la/ rkyen nga pha rol las/ bats+ra'i dbyangs las kra A ga ma ster bar bshad pas/ tsa dang bra'i bar du sakra/ rjes
<p>96a.4</p>'brel phyis/ sra rnam bcad de ur+ra bsgyur ba sogs kyis/ a po tsatra/ a po tsa tAM/ a po tsanra sogs so/ ! du ha rab tu 'geng ba la nga dang dipra sbyar bas/ a duhra/ adra ces gnas pa la/ ! ha sha ShAM tAt+sakra/ ha sha Sha rnams kyi mtha' las sa kra'o/ /nga dang bcas pa'i dipra
<p>96a.5</p>sogs pha rol la byings ha yig dang / sha yig dang Sha yig rnams kyi mtha' can la sakra A ga ma sbyin par bya ste/ sakra byin/ ka gnas don a brjod don/ hraD+h+ra/ drad+h+ra/ D+h+rakra/ sa Shar bsgyur ba sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/ a d+hu k+Shatra/ de bzhin du/ a d+huk+Sha tAM/ a d+huk+Shanra sogs
<p>96a.6</p>so/ ! li hA ro myang ba la'ang sngon ma ltar bsgrubs pas/ a li k+Shatra/a li k+Sha tAM/ a lik+Shanra sogs so/ ! bishra 'jug pa la/ a bik+Shatra/ a bik+Sha tAM/ a bik+Shanra sogs dang / ! kr-iSh+ra 'gugs pa'am gshor gtod pa la/ a kr-ik+Shatra/ a kr-ik+Sha tAM/ a kr-ik+Shanra sogs so/ / 
<p>96a.7</p>i ti swa ra swa ste byA ka ra Na s+ya sU trA d+b+hU ta pra t+yA ya pra kri ya sa mAp+tAH/ zhes pa brda sprod pa dbyangs can gyi mdo las byung zin gyi rkyen gyi rab tu byed pa rnams rdzogs so// ! //de nas dngos po dang las kyi don sogs kyi rnam dbye 'jug tshul rnams rab tu brjod par bya ste/ sngar bshad zin gyi dngos po
<p>96b</p>
<p>96b.1</p>dang las kyi don gyi 'jug tshul dang cho ga rnams ni byings thams cad pa rnams kyi cho ga yin la/ 'dir byings phyed pa rnams kyi dngos po dang las kyi 'jug tshul te/ de yang gong byings thams cad pa'i skabs su bshad pa ltar 'dir yang At+ma ne pa da rnams 'jug pa las/ nyer bsgyur a nu
<p>96b.2</p>sngon ma'i b+hU yod pa la/ lkog gyur liTa'i At+ma ne pa da rnams sbyar/ gnyis kyang ngos gnyis brjod/ Napra sogs la b+hU a dag gi A 'os/ U A/ thung ngu'os/ de thung ngu / dz+ha ba sogs dang / b+hU la bukra'os/ pukra A ga ma/ kr-i sogs las Napra sogs la'os/ ba sa dang po
<p>96b.3</p>can la iT sbyor ba sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/ a nu ba b+hU be/ a nu ba b+hU bA te/ a nu ba b+hU bi ri/ a nu ba b+hU bi She/ a nu ba b+hU bA the/ a nu ba b+hU bi D+h+we/ a nu ba b+hU be+e/ a nu ba b+hU bi ba he/ a nu ba b+hU ba ma he/ nye ba'i tshig dang sbyar ba'i dpe ni/ su kha ma nu ba b+hU ba de ba dat+te na/ ! Du
<p>96b.4</p>pa tsaSh+ra 'tshed pa la'ang gnyis brjod/ sngon ma'i ha sa dang po lhag po dang / pats+ra rnams kyi ka 'gro ba la dbyi ste a'i yang e'o sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/ pe tse/ pe tsA te/ pe tsi re/ pe tsi She/ pe tsA the/ pe tsi d+h+we/ pe tsa/ pe tsi ba he/ pe tsi ma he/ ! de bzhin du ta nu yang ba la/ lhas byin gyis bde ba rjes su myong bar gyur cig/ te ne/ 
<p>96b.5</p>te nA te/ te ni re sogs dang / ! manra la/ me ne+e/ me nA te/ me ni re sogs so/ ! Du bAnya sbyin pa la pats+ra sogs min pas a er bsgyur ba sogs mi byed pas/ da de/ da dA te/ da dI re sogs so/ ! Sh+NA gtsang bar byed pa la/ sasne/ sasnAte/ sasni re
<p>96b.6</p>sogs te/ tshig grogs dang sbyar ba'i dpe ni/ baM pA sa ra si rA me Na yat+k+r-i taM shIta yA sa ha/ ya di dzA nA si ta twa da sasne haM sa bi lA sa yA/ pad+ma'i mtsho la dga' byed dang / /gang du shI ta lhan cig rtse/ /gtsang byed gang dang gang yin pa/ /de der ngang pa rnam par rol/ ! glai
<p>96b.7</p>dang m+lai dga' ba zad pa la'ang mtshams sbyor gyi yi ge rnams kyi/ A'os ai A/ gnyis brjod thung ngu'o sa thung ngu dang / sngon ma'i ha sa dang po lhag po kuha dag gis tsu'o sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/ dzagle/ dza glute/ dzagli re sogs dang / de bzhin du/ ! mam+le/ mam+lA te/ 
<p>97a</p>
<p>97a.1</p>mam+li re sogs so/ /byings dbyangs kyi mtha' can rnams dang han dang grahra dang dr-i sha la sogs pa rnams la dngos po dang las kyi don la/ si sa tA sI/ s+yapra rnams iT dang bcas pa rnams Na 'gro ba'i ming can du byed pa dang mi byed pa 'dam ka can du bshad de/ a nu sngon
<p>97a.2</p>ma'i b+hU la smon par byed pa'i rnam dbye sISh+Ta sogs sbyar iT+ra byin Na 'gro ba'i phyogs la 'phel ba dang / Na 'gro ba ma yin pa'i phyogs la yon tan 'dam ka can du byas pas/ a nu b+hA bi ShISh+Ta/ a nu b+hA bi ShI yA stAM/ a nu b+hA biShI ranra sogs dang / a nu b+ha bi ShISh+Ta/ a nu b+ha bi ShI yA stAM/ a nu b+ha
<p>97a.3</p>bi ShI ranra sogs te/ nye ba'i tshig dang sbyar ba'i dpe ni/ su kha ma nu b+hA bi ShISh+Ta b+ha ba tA/ ! de bzhin du shIng nyal ba la/ shA yi ShISh+Ta sogs dang sha yi ShISh+Ta sogs so/ ! Du kr-inya byed pa la/ kAri ShISh+Ta sogs dang / N+ra 'gro ba ma yin pa'i phyogs la iT+ra mi 'jug pas/ kr-i ShISh+Ta sogs so/ ! 
<p>97a.4</p>de bzhin du/ a nu sngon ma'i b+hU la de ring ma yin pa'i rnam dbye khyod kyi bde ba rjes su myong bar gyur cig /tA sogs la'ang iT+ra byin Na 'gro ba dang mi 'gro ba 'dam ka can du byas pas/ a nu b+hA bi tA/ a nu b+hA bi tA rau/ a nu b+hA bi tA ra/ a nu b+hA bi tA se sogs sam/ a nu b+ha bi tA/ a nu b+ha bi tA
<p>97a.5</p>rau/ a nu b+ha bi tA raH a nu b+ha bi tA se sogs so/ ! /'byung 'gyur gyi rnam dbye rnams la'ang yang na bar byas pas/ a nu b+hA bi Sh+ya te sogs sam/ a nu b+ha biSh+ya te sogs so/ /de bzhin du bya ba shor ba'i don gyi rnam dbye s+yapra dang bcas pa'i dipra sogs la'ang 'phel ba dang yon tan yang
<p>97a.6</p>na bar byas pas/ a n+wa b+hA bi Sh+ya ta/ a na b+hA bi Sh+ye tAM/ a n+wa b+hA biSh+ya ta sogs sam/ a n+wa b+ha bi Sh+ya ta/ a n+wa b+ha bi Sh+ya tAM/ a n+wa b+ha bi Sh+ya ta sogs te/ nye ba'i tshig dang sbyar ba'i dpe ni/ a n+wa b+hA bi Sh+ya ta twa ya ta twaM ya d+ya shro Sh+yatra/ ! byung zin gyi don gyi At+ma ne pa da'i skyes bu
<p>97a.7</p>dang po'i gcig tshig la/ ! iN+ra tan+ya karta ri/ byed pa po ma yin pa las tanra la iN+ra'o/ /byings las byed pa po'i don ma yin pa'i dngos po dang las kyi don las rnam dbye tanra la byung zin gyi rnam dbye'i rjes su zhugs shig gang du a de kho na nyid nyan pa la/ bar rkyen si'i yul la iN+ra 'gyur te/ si'i
<p>97b</p>
<p>97b.1</p>yul la iN+ra sbyar/ Na 'phel ba'i don/ a n+wa b+hA bra/ i tan zhes gnas pa la/ ! lo paH dbyi'o/ /rkyen iN+ra las pha rol gyi rnam dbye tan ni dbyi bar bya ste/ tanra phyis pas/ a n+wa b+hA bi/ gnyis tshig sogs la/ iT+ra sbyar/ 'phel ba dang yon tan 'dam kha can du
<p>97b.2</p>byas pas/ a n+wa b+hA bi ShA tAM/ a n+wa b+hA bi Shata/ a n+wa b+hA bi Sh+ThAH a n+wa b+hA bi ShA thAM/ a n+wa b+hA bi d+h+waM/ a n+wa b+hA bi Shi/ a n+wa b+hA bi Sh+wa hi/ a n+wa b+hA biSh+ma hi/ yang na yon tan byas pas/ a n+wa b+ha bi ShA tAM/ a n+wa b+ha biSha ta sogs te/ nye ba'i tshig dang sbyar ba'i dpe ni/ a n+wa b+hA bib+ha bo b+ha
<p>97b.3</p>ba tA/ de bzhin du Du kr-iny+ra byed pa la'ang Na 'gro ba'i phyogs la iT+ra dang 'phel ba Na 'gro ba ma yin pa'i phyogs la iT mi ster ba sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/ a kA ri/ a kA ri ShA tAM/ a kA ri Sha ta sogs dang / a kr-i ShA tAM/ a kr-i Sha ta/ a kr-iSh+ThAHsogs so/ ! /nor 'go bar 'byung ngo khyed la/ 
<p>97b.4</p>nyer bsgyur nir+ra dang Ang+ra sngon du bzhag na/ ni rA kA ri sogs so/ ! /de bzhin du hr-i ny+ra 'tshe ba la/ a hA ri/ a hA ri ShA tAM/ a hA ri Sha ta sogs dang / a hr-iShA tAM/ a hr-iSha ta/ a hr-iSh+ThAHsogs so/ ! /Du ba tsaSh+ra 'tshed pa la/ iT+ra mi 'jug dz+ha sa dang po can rnams
<p>97b.5</p>la si dbyi ba sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/ a pA tsi/ a pa k+ShA tAM/ a pak+Sha ta/ a pak+thaHsogs so/ ! b+hudzra skyong ba la/ At+ma ne pa da'i skyes bu dang po'i gcig tshig la/ a b+hudzra/ i tanra zhes gnas pa la/ ! u ba d+hA ya la g+hoH u pa d+hA thung ngu las so/ /rkyen
<p>97b.6</p>inra pha rol la byings kyi u pa d+hA nA mi'i yi ge thung ngu yin na 'phel ba mi byed par yon tan bya ste/ yon tan byas pas/ a b+ho di/ lhags ma rnams la'ang iT+ra mi 'jug pas/ dz+ha sa la si dbyi ba sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/ ab+huk+ShA tAM/ a b+huk+Sha ta/ a b+huk+thAHsogs so/ ! 
<p>97b.7</p>nyer bsgyur nir+ra dang Ang sngon ma'i d+h+r-i nya 'dzin pa la iT+ra sbyor ba sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/ ni rA d+hA ri/ ni rA d+hA ri ShA tAM/ ni rA d+hA ri Sha ta/ nyer bsgyur pra ti sngon ma'i pa da 'gro ba la iT+ra mi 'jug pas/ dz+has dang po rnams la si dbyi ba sogs kyis/ pra t+ya pA di/ pra t+ya pat+sA tAM/ 
<p>98a</p>
<p>98a.1</p>pra t+ya pat+sa ta/ pra t+ya pat+thAHsogs so/ ! /b+haN+ra sgra la/ a b+hA Ni/ a b+ha Ni ShA tAM/ a b+ha Ni Sha ta sogs so/ ! /bats+ra brjod pa la/ a bA tsi/ a bak+ShA tAM/ a bak+Sha ta/ a bak+thAHsogs so/ ! /graha nye bar len pa la/ Na 'gro ba'i ming can du yang na bar byed pas/ a grA hi/ a grA hi
<p>98a.2</p>ShA tAM/ a grA hi Sha ta/ a grA hiSh+ThAHsogs sam/ a gra hi ShA tAM sogs so/ ! nyer bsgyur nir+ra sngon ma'i NIny+ra 'dren pa la/ nir NA yi/ ni ra NA yiShA t+pi/ nir NA yi Sha ta/ ni ra NA yiSh+ThAHsogs so/ ! pA btung ba la byung zin gyi rnam dbye rnams sbyor ba las/ ! A to yuka /Atra las yukra'o/ /byung zin gyi
<p>98a.3</p>rnam dbye nya yi dang Na yi dang pa yig 'gro ba'i ming can pha rol las byings A yig mtha' can la yukra A ga ma ster bar bya ste/ yukra byin pas/ a pA yi/ a pA yi ShA tAM/ a pA yi Sha ta/ a pA yeSh+ThAHsogs dang / ! de bzhin du Sh+NA gtsang byed la/ a snA yi/ a snA yi ShA tAM/ a snA yi Sha ta/ a snA yi Sh+ThAHsogs
<p>98a.4</p>dang / ! nyer bsgyur ni sngon ma'i Du d+hAnya 'dzin pa la/ n+ya d+hA yi/ n+ya d+hA yi ShA tAM/ n+ya d+hA yi Sha ta/ n+ya d+hA yiSh+ThAHsogs so/ ! /pa da 'gro ba sogs la dngos po dang las kyi don du ma zad byed pa po'i don du yang si'i yul la tanra pha rol la iN+ra 'gyur bar bshad de/ nyer bsgyur utra sngon du bzhag pas/ u
<p>98a.5</p>da pA di/ u da pat+sA tAM/ u da pat+sa ta/ u da pa t+thAHsogs so/ ! /bu d+ha khongs su chud pa la/ a bo d+hi/ a b+hut+sA tAM/ a b+hu t+sata/ a b+hu t+thAHsogs so/ ! /byings dza ni dang bu d+hi dag la iT+ra dang bcas pa'i si dang iN la 'phel ba mi byed par bshad de/ a dza ni/ a dza niShA tAM/ a dza ni Sha ta/ a
<p>98a.6</p>dza niSh+ThAHsogs so/ /i ti swa ra swa sti byA ka ra Na s+ya sU trAd+b+ha ba karma s+ya pra kri yA sa mAp+tAH zhes pa brda sprod pa dbyangs can gyi mdo las dngos po dang las kyi rab tu byed pa rnams rdzogs so// ! //de nas byings byings su sgrub pa dang ming byings su sgrub par byed pa'i rkyen rnams kyi 'jug yul dang
<p>98a.7</p>cho ga rnams bshad par bya ste/ ! a ti sha ye na ha sA deR+Yang+ra dwish+tsa/ ha sa dang po las phul du byung ba la yang+ra te gnyis kyang ngo / /byings ha sa so sor bsdu ba'i yi ge dang po can la phul du byung ba dang yang yang gi don la byings byings su sgrub pa'i rkyen yang 'gyur zhing / rkyen yang pha rol la byings
<p>98b</p>
<p>98b.1</p>de'ang gnyis su 'gyur te/ b+hU la yang+ra nga At+ma na pa da sbyor ba'i don/ gnyis brjod/ dz+ha ba rnams kyi dza ba dang tsa ba 'os/ b+h+rabra/ bU b+hU ya zhes gnas pa la/ ! ya ngi/ yang+ra la'o/ /byings kyi dang po nA mi'i dbyangs ni rkyen yang pha rol la yon tan du 'gyur te/ yon tan byas pas/ bo b+hU ya/ ! sad+hA tuHde byings so/ / 
<p>98b.2</p>yang la sogs pa'i rkyen sbyar ba de la'ang byings zhes zer ro/ /des na byings de tshig tu bsgrub pa'i phyir rnam dbye rnams sbyor ba las/ apra bi ka ra Na sbyor ba sogs gong ltar bsgrubs pas/ brta ma na laT la/ bo b+hU ya te/ bo b+hU ye te/ bo b+hU yan+te sogs dang / chog 'byung ling la/ bo b+hU ye ta/ bo b+hU ye yA tAM/ bo
<p>98b.3</p>b+hU ye ran sogs dang / shis byed loT+ra la/ bo b+hU ya tAM/ bo b+hU ye tAM/ bo b+hU yan+tAM sogs dang / de ring ma yin pa lang la/ a bo b+hU ya ta/ a bo b+hU ye tAM/ a bo b+hU yan+ta sogs so/ /de bzhin du b+hudzra skyong ba la/ bo b+hu dz+ya te/ laT bo b+hu dz+ya ta/ ling bo b+hu dz+ya tAM/ a bo b+hu dz+ya ta lang sogs so/ ! b+hUSh+ra rgyan la/ bo b+hU Sh+ya te/ laT bo b+hu Sh+ye ta/ 
<p>98b.4</p>loT bo b+hU Sh+ya tAM/ lang  a bo b+hu Sh+ya ta lang sogs so/ ! muha sems nyams pa la/ mo mu h+ya te/ laT mo mu h+ye ta/ ling  mo mu h+ya tAM/ loT a mo mu h+ya ta sogs so/ lang  ! li ha ro myang ba la/ le li h+ya te/ laT le li h+ye ta/ lang  le li h+ya tAM/ loT a le li h+ya ta sogs so/ lang  ! hu sbyin pa la/ dzo hu ya te/ laT dzo hu yeta/ ling  dzo hu ya tAM/ loT/ a dzo hu ya ta lang sogs
<p>98b.5</p>so/ ! bid shes pa la/ be bi d+ya te/ laT be bi d+ye ta/ ling  be bi d+ya tAM/ loT a be bi d+ya ta yang sogs so/ ! Du pa tsaSh+pe 'tshed pa la yang gnyis brjod/ sngon ma'i ha sa dang po lhag po/ ! A taH Atra'o/ /byings gnyis brjod pa'i dang po'i dbyangs a thung ni rkyen yang pha rol la ring por 'gyur te/ pa gong ma
<p>98b.6</p>ring por bsgyur bas/ pA pa ts+ya te/ laT pA pa ts+ye ta/ ling  pA pa ts+ya tAM/ loT a pA ba ts+ya ta lang sogs so/ ! /de bzhin du paTha gsal bar brjod pa la/ pA pa Th+ya te/ laT pA ba Th+ye ta/ ling  pA baTh+ya tAM/ loT a bA Th+ya ta lang sogs so/ ! byings dbyangs dang po can la'ang / aT+ra/ a sha /Ur+Nuny+ra/ r-i sogs la yang+ra 'jug par bshad de/ ! 
<p>98b.7</p>aT+ra 'gro ba la brjod pas/ aT+ra aT+ra ya zhes gnas pa la/ ! swa rA deHpa raHdbyangs dang po'i pha rol lo/ /rkyen yang sogs pha rol la byings kyi dang po dbyangs rkyang pa yin na gnyis brjod pa'i gsal byed de yang mi dbyi zhing dbyangs dang po de las pha rol gyi dbyangs phyi ma de slar yang gnyis su 'gyur te/ a
<p>99a</p>
<p>99a.1</p>phyi ma slar yang gnyis brjod/ 'dra ba'i yi ge 'dus pa la ring po sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/ a TA T+ya te/ laT/ a TAT+yeta/ ling / yid TA T+ya tAM/ loT/ A TAT+ya ta lang sogs te/ nye ba'i tshig dang sbyar ba'i dpe ni/ a TA T+ya te d+h+r-i Sh+TaH ! de bzhin du a sha tsa ba la/ a shA sh+ya te/ laT a shA sh+ye ta/ ling a shA sh+ya tAM/ loT a shA sh+ya ta lang sogs dang / ! 
<p>99a.2</p>ri 'gro ba la/ a rA R+Yate/ laT a rAR+Ye ta/ ling a rAR+Ya tAM/ loT a rAR+Ya ta ling sogs so/ ! /nyer bsgyur pra sngon ma'i Ur+Nuny+ra 'gebs pa la/ pror+NonU ya te/ laT pror+NonU ye ta/ ling pror+NonU ya tAM/ loT praur+NonU ya ta lang sogs so/ ! gam+l-i 'gro ba la yang phul du byung ba'i ci brtol/ gnyis brjod/ sngon ma'i ha sa dang po lhag po sogs kyis/ dza ga mra/ ya zhes gnas pa la/ !
