<p>99a.3</p>nya ma dz+ha pAM nuka?/ nya ma dang dz+ha pa rnams la nuka?'o/ /byings nya ma so sor bsdu ba'i yi ge'i mtha' can dang nya ma'i mtha' can ma yin kyang dz+ha pa so sor bsdu ba'i yi ge gnyis brjod pa'i dang po la rkyen yang pha rol las nuka? A ga ma ster bar bya ste/ nuka? byin/ dzaM ga mya te/ laT dzaM ga mye ta/ ling dzaM ga mya tAM/ loT a dzaM ga mya ta lang sogs te/ 
<p>99a.4</p>nye ba'i tshig dang sbyar ba'i dpe ni/ dzaM ga mya te tu raM gaH de bzhin du b+h+ra mu g.yo ba la/ baM b+h+ra mya te/ laT baM b+h+ra mye ta/ ling baM b+h+ra mya tAM/ loT a baM b+h+ra mya ta lang sogs so/ /han 'tshe ba dang 'gro ba la/ dzaM g+ha n+ya te/ laT dzaM g+ha n+ye ta/ ling dzaM g+ha n+ya tAM/ loT a dzaM g+ha n+ya ta lang sogs so/ /yang na han 'tshe ba'i don brjod pa la yang pha rol la g+h+nI zhes par sgyur
<p>99a.5</p>bar bshad pas/ g+h+nI ru bsgyur ba'i rta 'gros phul du byung ba/ phyogs la/ dze g+h+nI ya te/ laT dze g+h+nI ye ta/ ling dzeg+h+nI ya tAM/ loT a dzeg+h+nI ya ta lang sogs so/ ! /dzapra dang dzalpa lhag par smra ba la/ dzaM dza pya te/ laT dzaM dza pye te/ ling dzaM dza pya tAM/ loT a dzaM dza pya ta lang sogs so/ ! /dzaM dza l+p+ya te/ laT dzaM dza l+p+ye ta/ ling dzaM dzal+p+ya tAM/ loT a dzaM dzal+p+ya ta lang sogs so/ ! /da ha thal bar byed
<p>99a.6</p>pa la/ daM da h+ya te/ laT daM da h+ye ta/ ling daM da h+ya tAM/ loT a daM da h+ya ta lang sogs so/ ! /ya b+ha 'khrig pa la/ yaM ya b+h+ya te/ laT yaM ya b+h+ye ta/ ling yaM ya b+h+ya tAM/ loT a yaM ya b+h+ya ta lang sogs so/ ! /daM sha snun pa la yang / ! no lo paHna ni dbyi'o/ /byings kyi u pa d+hA'i na yig ni rkyen ha sa dang po kra yig dang nga yig 'gro ba'i ming can pha rol
<p>99a.7</p>la dbyi bar bya ste/ u pa d+hA'i na phyis/ nya ma dang dz+ha pa rnams la nuka?'os/ nuka? A ga ma ster ba sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/ daM da sh+ya te/ laT daM da sh+ye ta/ ling daM da sh+ya tAM/ loT a daM da sh+ya ta lang sogs te/ nye ba'i tshig dang sbyar ba'i dpe ni/ daM da sh+ya te ma sha kaH sha sbrang gis rmugs pa/ ! de bzhin du b+haM dzu 'joms pa la/ baM b+ha dz+ya te/ laT baM b+ha dz+ye
<p>99b</p>
<p>99b.1</p>ta/ ling baM b+ha dz+ya tAM/ loT a baM b+ha dz+ya ta lang sogs te/ baM b+ha dz+ya te brto dan+tI ta raM/ ! nr-i tI lus bskyod pa la yang sbyar/ gnyis brjod/ sngon ma'i ha sa dang po lhag po/ nr-i nr-i tra ya zhes gnas pa la/ ! rI gr-i du paHd+hA s+ya/ r-ita u pa d+hA'i rIkra'o/ /byings r-itra u pa d+hA can gnyis brjod
<p>99b.2</p>pa'i thog ma de la yang pha rol las rIkra A ga so ldan myos pas shing 'joms par byed/ ma ster bar bya ste/ rIkra A ga ma byin/ r-i a'os r-i ar+ra bsgyur ba sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/ na rI nr-i t+ya te/ laT na rI nr-i t+ye te/ ling na rI nr-i t+ya tAM/ loT a na rI nr-i t+ya ta lang sogs te/ na rI nr-it+ya te na TaH ! de bzhin du
<p>99b.3</p>br-i tu 'jug pa la/ laT ba rI br-i t+ya te/ ling ba rI br-i t+ya ta/ loT ba rI br-i t+ya tAM/ a ba rI br-i t+ya ta sogs te/ lang ba rI br-i t+ya te bArtA su tsin+ta/ ! byings pa da/ sraM sra/ d+h+waM sa/ baMts+ra/ b+h+raMshra/ kashra/ pa ta/ skaMdra rnams la yang pha rol las gnyis brjod pa'i thog ma de la nIkra A ga ma ster bar gar mkhan lhag par gar sgyur ro/ bshad de/ 
<p>99b.4</p>dgag pa'i na dang nyer bsgyur u pa sngon ma'i pa da 'gro ba la/ no pa pa nI pa d+ye ta/ ling no pa pa nI sems dga' ba'i gtam la 'jug/ 'gro ba la'o/ 'og tu ltung ba la'o/ pa d+ye ta/ no brdeg pa la'o/ /'gro ba la'o/ /pa pa nI pa d+ya tAM/ loT no pA pa nI pa d+ya ta/ lang ! de bzhin du sraMs dang d+h+waMs 'og tu ltung ba la/ laT/ sa nI sra s+ya te/ si nI
<p>99b.5</p>sra s+ye ta/ ling sa nI sra s+ya tAM/ loT a sa nI sra s+ya ta lang sogs dang / ! da nI d+h+waM s+ya te/ laT nye bar yang ma 'gro zhig /da nAM d+h+waM s+ye ta/ ling da nI d+h+waM s+ya tAM/ loT a da nI d+h+waM s+ya ta lang sogs so/ ! baM tsu 'gro ba la/ ba nI baM ts+ya te/ laT ba nI baM ts+ye ta/ ling ba nI baM ts+ya tAM/ loT a ba nI baM ts+ya ta lang sogs so/ ! b+h+raM sha 'og tu ltung ba la/ ba
<p>99b.6</p>nI b+h+raM sh+ya te/ laT ba nI b+h+raM sh+ye ta/ ling ba nI b+h+raM sh+ya tAM/ loT a ba nI b+h+raM sh+ya ta lang sogs so/ ! /ka sha brdeg pa la/ tsa nI ka sh+ya te/ laT tsa nI ka sh+ye ta/ ling tsa nI ka sh+ya tAM/ loT a tsa nI ka sh+ya ta/ lang ! skaM dir 'gro ba la/ tsa nI ska d+ya te/ laT tsa nI ska d+ye ta/ ling tsa nI ska d+ya tAM/ loT/ a tsa nI ska d+ya ta sogs so/ lang / ! /tsar g.yo ba la yang
<p>99b.7</p>sbyar/ gnyis brjod/ sngon ma'i ha sa dang bo lhag po sogs kyis/ tsa tsar+ra/ ya zhes gnas pa la/ tsa ra pa lo ruts+tsA s+ya/ tsa ra pa la dag gi a'i yang uta'o/ /byings tsa ra dang pha la dag gi yang pha rol las byings gnyis brjod pa'i dang po la nuka? A ga ma 'gyur zhing mtha' ma'i a yig kyang u yig tu 'gyur te/ nuka?
<p>100a</p>
<p>100a.1</p>byin/ a ur bsgyur bas/ tsaM tsuR+Ya te/ laT/ tsaM tsurla ta/ ling / rtsa tsur+Ya t+t+waM/ loT/ a tsaM tsur+Ya ta lang sogs dang / ! de bzhin du pha la rdzogs pa la/ paM phu l+ya te/ laT/ paM phu l+ye ta/ ling / paM phu l+ye tAM/ laT/ a paM phu l+ya ta sogs so/ ! /DU kr-i byed pa la yang sbyar bas/ kr-i ya zhes
<p>100a.2</p>gnas pas/ ! r-i to riH r-i ta kyi ri'o/ /byings r-i yig mtha' can ni yang pha rol la ri ru 'gyur te/ r-i ri gnyis brjod sngon ma'i ha sa dang po lhag po/ ku ha dag gi tsu/ yang la 'os yon tan/ ya la'os phyi ma ring por bsgyur bas/ tse krI ya te/ laT/ tse krI ye ta/ ling / tse krI ya tAM/ loT/ 
<p>100a.3</p>a tse krI ya ta lang sogs te/ a ti sha ye na ka ro tI ti zhes pa'i don la/ tse krI ya te/ ! de bzhin du hr-i ny+ra 'phrog pa la/ dze hrI ya te/ laT/ dze hrI ye ta/ ling / dze hrI ya tAM/ loT/ a dze hrI ya ta sogs dang / pr-inywa mchog gyur la/ be brI ya te/ laT/ be+e brI ya ta/ ling / be+e brI ya tAM/ loT/ a be brI ya lang ta sogs te/ a ti
<p>100a.4</p>sha ye na br-i no tI ti zhes pa'i don la/ be+e dzrI ya te/ ! 'di phul du byung bar byed do/ mr-ing srog gtong ba la/ me mrI ya te/ laT/ me mrI ye ta/ ling / me mrI ya tAM/ loT/ a mi mri ya ta lang sogs te/ a ti sha ye na mri ya te zhes pa'i don la/ me mrI ya te/ Du hra ny+ra sbyin pa la yang / dA sogs kyi i 'os A i
<p>100a.5</p>gnyis brjod/ 'di yang phul du byung ba'am shin tu gang ba'o/ /yang la 'os yon tan/ ya la 'os phyi ma ring por bsgyur bas/ de dI ya te/ laT/ de dI ye ta/ ling / de dI ya tAM/ loT/ a de dI ya ta/ lang / ! de bzhin du shin tu shi ba'o/ /pA btung ba la/ pe pI ya te/ laT/ pe pI ye ta/ ling / pe pI ya tAM/ loT/ a pe pI ya ta lang
<p>100a.6</p>sogs so/ /i ti swa ra swa sti byA ka ra Na s+ya sU trA r+ya d+ma t+yA ya bra kri ya sa mAp+tAH/ zhes pa brda sprod pa dbyangs can gyi mdo las yadra rkyen gyi rab tu byed pa rnams rdzogs so // ! //de nas yang rkyen 'jig pa rnams kyi bya ba rnams bshad par bya ste/ ! bA n+ya tra lu ga nu brta te/ gzhan
<p>100a.7</p>la 'jig pra yang na rjes su 'jug go /kr-itra sogs kyi rkyen ukra dang sbyor ba ma yin pa'i gzhan la yang na yadra 'jig pra'i cho ga rjes su 'jug go ! /a na bi tsa ha sA tra/ a pra med pa'i ha sa las kyang ngo / /yang 'jig pa'i cho ga de byings gang la'ang a pra bi kA ra Na med pa byings mtha' ha
<p>100b</p>
<p>100b.1</p>sa'i mtha' can yin pa de las 'jug ste/ b+hudzra skyong ba la yang gnyis brjod/ dz+ha pa sogs kyi b+ha ba/ sngon ma'i ha sa dang po lhag po/ yang la 'os yon tan/ yang 'jig /yang 'jig pa la byings thams cad pa'i rnam dbye par smi pa da rnams 'jug pa las/ brta ma na'i
<p>100b.2</p>skyes bu dang po'i gcig tshig tipra sbyar bas/ bob+hu dzra/ ti pra ces gnas pa la/ ! dweHswa re pi to pa d+hA yA gu naH gnyis las byings pa 'gro ba la u d+hA'i yon tan no/ yang rkyen 'jig pa'i byings gnyis brjod pa las rnam dbye dang rkyen gsal byed dang po can rnams dang dbyangs dang
<p>100b.3</p>po can pa 'gro ba'i ming can rnams pha rol la u pa d+hA yon tan du 'gyur la/ yang 'jig pa las rnam dbye ta yig dang sa yig pa 'gro ba'i ming can rnams pha rol la bar rkyen I yang na ster bshad de/ I rkyen yang na bar byas/ I sbyar ba'i phyogs la yon tan mi byed/ 
<p>100b.4</p>ma sbyar ba'i phyogs la/ gnyis las byings pa 'gro ba sogs kyi yon tan byas pas/ bo b+hu dzI ti/ bo b+ho k+ti/ gnyis tshig dang mang tshig la/ bo b+ho k+taH bo b+hu dza ti/ skyes bu dbus ma'i gcig tshig la I yang na bar byas pas/ bo b+hu dzI Shi/ bo b+ho k+Shi sogs so/ ! Du pa tsaSha 'tshed
<p>100b.5</p>pra la'ang gzhan de dang 'dra ba la/ Atra la 'os pa gang ma ring por bsgyur ba sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/ brta ma ne laT+ral/ pAb tsI ti/ pApak+ti/ pA pak+taH pA pa tsa ti/ pA ba tsI Shi/ bA bak+Shi/ pA bak+thaH pA bak+tha/ pA ba tsI mi/ pA pats+mi/ pA ba tsaH pA pa ts+maH/ ! chog
<p>100b.6</p>'byung ling la/ bA pa ts+yA tu/ bA ba ts+yA tAM/ pA pa ts+yAHsogs dang / ! shis byed loT la/ pA pa tsI tu/ pA pak+tu/ pA pak+tAtra/ pA pa k+tAM/ pA pa tsa tu/ pA pag+d+hi/ pa pak+tA tra/ bA pak+taM/ bA bak+ta/ bA ba tsA ni/ pA pa tsA ba/ pA pa tsA ma/ de ring ma yin pa lang la/ a pA pa tsI tra/ 
<p>100b.7</p>a pA pakra/ a pA pak+taM/ a pA pa tsuM a ba' ba tsIH a bA ba tsIH a pA pakra/ a pA bak+taM/ a pA bak+ta/ a pA pa tsaM/ a bA pa tswa/ a bA bats+ma/ ! de bzhin du padra gsal bar bar brjod pa las/ brta ma na laT+ra rnams la/ bA ba dI ti/ bA ba rti/ bA bat+taiH bA ba da ti/ bA ba dI Shi/ bA bat+si/ 
<p>101a</p>
<p>101a.1</p>bA bat+thaH/ bA bat+tha/ bA ba dI mi/ bA ba d+mi/ bA ba dwaH bA bad+maH/ ! chog 'bying ling la/ bA bad+yA tra/ bA bad+yA tAM/ bA ba d+yuHsogs so/ ! /shis byed loT+ra la/ bA ba dI tu/ bA bat+tu/ bA bat+tAtra/ bA bat+tAM/ bA ba dA tu/ bA bad+d+hi/ bA bat+tA tra/ bA bat+tAM/ bA bat+ta/ bA ba dA ni/ 
<p>101a.2</p>bA ba dA ba/ bA ba dA ma/ ! de ring ma yin pa lang la/ a bA ba dItra/ a bA batra/ a bA bat+taM/ a bA ba duH a bA na dIH a bA batra/ a ba' bat+taM/ a bA ba daM/ a bA ba dwa/ a bA pad+ma sogs te/ a ti sha ye na ba tI ti/ zhes pa'i don la/ bA ba dI ti/ ! nyer
<p>101a.3</p>bsgyur sam sngon ma'i g+haT+ra rtsed mo las/ brta ma laT+ra la/ saM dzA g+ha TI ti/ saM dzA g+ha T+Ti/ saM dzAg+ha T+TaH saM dzAg+haT ti/ so dzA g+ha TI Shi/ saM dzAg+haTI/ saM dzA g+ha T+ThaH saM dzAg+haT+Tha/ saM dzA g+ha TI mi/ saM dzA g+ha D+mi/ saM dzA g+ha T+waH sa dzA g+ha D+maH/ ! shin tu skyen par smra bar byed/ shin tu skyen par smra bar byed/ 
<p>101a.4</p>chog 'byung ling la/ saM dzA g+ha n+yAtra/ saM dzA g+ha T+yA tAM/ saM dzA g+ha T+yAHsogs so/ ! /shis byed loT+ra la/ saM dzA g+ha Ta tu/ saM dzA g+ha T+Tu/ saM dzA g+ha T+TAtraM/ saM dzA g+haT+TA/ saM dzA g+ha Ta tu/ saM dzA g+ha D+D+hi/ saM dzA g+ha T+TA tra/ saM dzAg+ha T+TaM/ saM dzA g+ha T+Ta/ saM dzA g+ha TAni/ saM dzA g+ha TA ba/ 
<p>101a.5</p>saM dzA g+ha TA ma/ de ring ma yin pa lang la/ sa ma dzA g+ha TItu/ sa ma dzA g+haTA/ sa ma dzA g+haTAM/ sa ma dzA g+ha TuH/ sa ma dzA g+haTIH sa ma dzA g+haT+ra/ sa ma dzA g+haT+TaM/ sa ma dzA g+haT+Ta/ sa ma dzA g+ha TaM/ sa ma dzA g+haTA/ sa ma dzA g+haD+ma sogs te/ a ti sha ye na g+ha Ta te zhes pa'i don
<p>101a.6</p>la/ saM dzA g+ha TI ti/ ! nyer bsgyur sraM sngon ma'i b+hu yod pa las kyang brta ma na l+raT la/ saM bo b+ha bI ti/ saM bo b+ho ti/ saM bo b+hU taH saM bo b+hu ba ti/ saM bo bIShi/ saM bo b+ho Shi/ saM bo b+hU thaH saM bo b+hU tha/ saM bo b+ha bI mi/ saM bo b+ho mi/ saM bo b+hU baH saM bo phul du byung ba'i
<p>101a.7</p>rtsed mo byed/ b+hU maH/ ! chog 'byung ling la/ saM bo b+hU yA tA/ saM bo b+hU yA tA/ saM bo b+hU yuHsogs so/ ! /shis byed loT+ra la/ saM bo b+ha bI tu/ saM bo b+ho tu/ saM bo b+hU tAtra/ saM bo b+hUtA/ saM bo b+hu ba tu/ saM bo byu hi/ saM bob+hU tAtra/ saM bo b+hU taM/ saM bo b+h+yu ta/ saM bo b+ha bA ni/ 
<p>101b</p>
<p>101b.1</p>saM bo b+ha bA ba/ saM bo b+ha bA ma/ ! de ring ma yin pa lang la/ sa ma bo b+ha bIta/ sa ma bo b+hotu/ sa ma bo b+hU tAM/ sa ma bo b+ha buH/ sa ma bo b+ha bIH sa ma bo b+hoH sa ma bo b+hU taM/ sa ma bo b+hU ta/ sa ma bo b+ha baM/ sa ma bo b+hU ba/ sa ma bo b+hU ma/ ! Dukr-iny+ra byed pa la yadra/ gnyis
<p>101b.2</p>brjod/ kr-i kr-i ya zhes gnas pa la/ yang 'jig /byings r-i yig mtha' can dang r-i yig u pa d+hA can la yang 'jig pa las gnyis brjod pa'i dang po de la/ rukra A ga ma dang rikra A ga ma dang rI A ga ma gsum po gang rung zhig ster bar bshad pas/ A ga ma gsum po byin/ kra
<p>101b.3</p>gnas don/ ru'i u brjod don yin pa'i phyis/ ku ha dag gi tsi/ r-i a ru bsgyur bas/ tsa r+k+r-i/ tsa ri kr-i/ tsa rI kr-i zhes grub pa las rnam dbye rnams chog sngon ma bzhin sbyor ba las/ brta ma na laT+ra la/ tsa rkarI ti/ tsa ri ka rI ti/ tsa rI ka rI ti/ tsa rka rti/ tsa rI ka rti/ tsa rI ka rti/ tsa kr-itaH tsa rI kr-itaH tsa rI kr-itaH tsa r+k+ra ti/ 
<p>101b.4</p>tsa ri kra ti/ tsa rI kra ti/ tsa rka rIti/ tsirka rI Shi/ tsa ri ka rI Shi/ tsa rI ka rI Shi/ tsa rka r+Shi/ tsa ri kar+Shi/ tsa rI kar+Shi/ tsa r+k+r-i thaH tsa ri kr-i thaH tsa rI kr-i thaH/ tsa r+k+r-i tha/ tsa ri kr-i tha/ tsa rI kr-i tha/ tsarka rI mi/ tsa ri ka rI mi/ tsa rI kA rI mi/ 
<p>101b.5</p>tsa rka rmi/ tsa ri karmi/ tsa rI karmi/ tsar+k+r-ibaH tsa ri kr-ibaH tsa rI kr-i baH tsar+k+r-i maH tsa ri kr-i maH tsa rI kr-i maH/ ! chog 'byung ling la/ tsar+k+r-i yAtra/ tsa ri kr-i yAta/ tsa rI kr-i yAtra sogs dang / ! shis byed loT+ra la/ tsarka rItu/ tsa ri ka rI tu/ tsa rI ka rI tu/ tsarka rtu/ tsa ri kartu/ 
<p>101b.6</p>tsa rI kartu/ tsar+k+r-itAtra/ tsa ri kr-i tAtra/ tsa rI kr-i tA tra/ tsa r+k+r-i tAM/ tsa ri kr-i tAM/ tsa rI kr-i tAM/ tsar+k+ra tu/ tsa ri kra tu/ tsa rI kra tu sogs dang / ! de ring ma yin pa lang la/ a tsa rka rItra/ atsa ri la rItra/ a tsa ri ka rItra/ a tsarkaH a tsa ri kaH a tsa rI kaH a tsar+k+r-i tAM/ a tsa rI kr-i tAM/ 
<p>101b.7</p>a tsa rI kr-i tAM a tsar+k+ruH a tsa ri kruH a tsa rI kruHsogs/ ! /cho ga de bzhin du byas pas br-i tu 'jug pas/ brta ma na laT+ra la/ bar+b+r-i tI ti/ ba ri br-i tI ti/ ba rI br-i tI ti/ barba r+t+ti/ ba ri bar+t+ti/ ba rI bar+t+ti/ bar+b+r-it+taH ba ri br-it+taH ba rI br-it+taH bar+b+r-i ta ti/ ba ri br-i ta ti/ ba rI
<p>102a</p>
<p>102a.1</p>br-i ta ti/ barba rtIShi/ ba ri brtIShi/ ba rI brtIShi/ barba r+t+si/ ba ri bar+t+si/ ba rI ba r+t+si/ bar+b+r-i t+thaH ba ri br-it+thaH ba rI br-i t+thaH ba r+b+r-i t+tha/ ba ri br-it+tha/ ba rI br-it+tha/ bar+b+r-itI mi/ ba ri br-i tI mi/ ba rI br-i tI mi/ barba r+t+mi/ ba ri bar+t+mi/ ba rI bar+t+mi/ bar+b+r-i tI mi/ ba ri br-i tI mi/ ba rI br-i tI mi/ barba r+t+mi/ ba ri bar+t+mi/ ba rI bar+t+mi/ bar+b+r-i twaH ba ri br-i twaH ba rI br-i twaH bar+b+r-it+maH 
<p>102a.2</p>pa ri br-it+maH ba rI br-it+maH/ ! chog 'byung ling la/ bar+b+r-i t+yAtra/ ba ri br-i t+yAtra/ ba rI br-i t+yAtra sogs so/ /shis byed loT+ra la/ bar+b+r-i tI tu/ ba ri br-i tI tu/ ba rI br-i tI tu/ barba r+t+tu/ ba ri bar+t+tu/ ba rI ba r+t+tu/ ba r+b+r-i tAtra/ ba ri br-i tAtra/ ba rI br-i tAtra sogs dang / de ring ma yin pa
<p>102a.3</p>lang la/ a bar+b+r-i tItra/ a ba ri br-i tItra/ a ba rI br-i tItra/ a bar+b+r-i tra/ a ba ri br-itra/ a ba rI br-itra/ a ba r+b+r-i t+tAM/ a ba ri br-it+tAM/ a ba rIbr-it+tAM/ a bar+b+r-i tuH a ba ri br-i tuH/ a ba rI br-i tuHsogs so/ a ti swa ra swa sti byA ka ra Na s+ya sU trA d+yang+lu gan+ta pra kri ya sa mAp+tAH/ 
<p>102a.4</p>zhes pa brda sprod pa dbyangs can gyi mdo las yang 'jig pa'i mtha'i rab tu byed pa rnams rdzogs so// ! //de nas byed pa'i don sogs byings byings su sgrub pa dang / ming byings su sgrub pa'i rkyen rnams kyi bya ba rnams bshad par byas ste/ de la rkyen dang po yang 'jug tshul no/ ! 
<p>102a.5</p>kartu yang+ra/ byed po la yang+ra ngo / /ngan pa la bzang por rlom pa sogs nye ba'i nga rgyal kun tu spyod pa'i byed pa po'i don la ming dang byings las byings su sgrub pa'i rkyen yang+ra 'gyur te/ she na zhes pa'i la byings su sgrub pa'i rkyen yang+ra sbyar/ ya la 'os ming mtha' ring po de nas apra bi kA
<p>102a.6</p>ra na sbyor ba sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/ she na i ba A tsa ra tI ti kA kaH zhes pa'i don la/ she na ya te kA kaH de bzhin du paN+Di tA ya te mUrlaHsogs so/ /rkyen yang+ra pha rol la ming mtha'i sa dbyi bar bshad de/ ap+sa ras la yang+ra sra phyis ya la'os ring por bsgyur bas/ ap+sa
<p>102a.7</p>rA ya chu byung mar rlom ste gzugs ngan ma/ te ku rU pA/ de bzhin du/ rgya khra dang 'dra bar rlom ste bya rog go /odzA ya te shugs can du rlom ste stobs ngan/ mkhas par rlom ste blun po/ khany+dzA/ byol por rlom ste gong po/ ya te phang+guHpa yasra sogs kyi mtha'i sra yig ni yang+ra pha rol la dbyi ba dang mi dbyi ba 'dam
<p>102b</p>
<p>102b.1</p>ka can du bshad pas pa yA ya tre ta kraM/ pa ya s+ya te ta kraM sogs so/ /rkyen gnyis pa ya'i 'jug tshul ni/ A tsA re u pa mA nAtra yaH nye bar 'jal ba'i kun tu spyod pa la ya'o/ /ming las nye bar 'jal ba'i rlom sems kyi kun tu spyod pa'i don la ya rkyen du 'gyur zhing ya pha rol
<p>102b.2</p>la ming mtha'i a yang I ru 'o mar rlom ste dar ba'o/ 'gyur te/ pu tra zhes pa'i ming la ya sbyar a yIr bsgyur bas/ pu trI ya zhes 'grub pa la/ brta man sogs pa ra smai pa da rnams sbyor ba las/ a pra bi kA ra Na sbyor ba sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/ pu tra mi ba A tsa ra ti shi mu ba d+h+yA
<p>102b.3</p>ya zhes pa'i don la/ putrI ya ti shi Sh+ya mu pa d+h+yA ya sogs te de bzhin du/ bik+ShuHpra sAd i ba ku T+yaM bi k+ShuHpra sA dI ya ti ku T+yaM sogs so/ ! /rkyen gsum pa sa'i 'jug tshul ni/ its+tshA yA mAt+ma naHsaH bdag nyid 'dod pa la sa'o/ /byings la bdag nyid 'dod pa'i don las rkyen 'gyur te/ ! 
<p>102b.4</p>mkhan pos slob ma bu dang 'dra bar kun nas spyod par byed/ b+hU yod pa las/ sa las gnyis kyang ngos/ slong mo bas khang chung khang bzang du rlom mo/ gnyis brjod/ thung ngu 'os de thung ngu / dz+ha ba sogs kyi b+ha ba bu b+hU Sha zhes gnas pa la/ brta ma na sogs pa ra smai pa da rnams sbyar/ ! buHse/ u
<p>102b.5</p>r-i'i sa la'o/ /gong du 'dod pa'i don gyi rkyen sa la iTu A ga ma ster+ra bar bshad kyang / de'i dmigs bsal byings u yig dang r-i yig mtha' can dang gra ha dang gu ha sogs kyi pha rol gyis la iTu A ga ma ster ba ma yin te/ iTA mi 'jug ! /nA ni Ti se/ sa iTu med pa la ma yin no/ / 
<p>102b.6</p>rkyen sa iT A ga ma med pa pha rol la byings la yon tan 'byung ba ma yin te/ yon tan mi byed pas/ bu b+hU Sha ti/ laT bu b+hU ShaTu/ ling  bu b+hU Sha tu/ loT bu b+hU Sha tAtra/ lang  a bu b+hU Shatra sogs so/ ! /de bzhin du tsiny+ra gsog pa las/ tsiny+ra'i tsa ka ru bsgyur ba dang mi bsgyur ba 'dam ka can
<p>102b.7</p>du byed pas/ gnyis brjod/ tsi ki sa'am/ tsi tsis zhes gnas pa la/ ! se dIr+g+haH sa la ring po'o/ /'dod pa'i don gyi rkyen sa pha rol la byings thung ngu yin na ring por 'gyur te/ i ring por bsgyur bas/ tsi kISha ti/ laT tsi tsI Sha ti/ ling  tsi kI She ta/ ling  tsa tsI Shetra/ ling  tsi kI Sha tu/ loT tsi
<p>103a</p>
<p>103a.1</p>tsI Sha tu/ a tsi kI Shatra/ lang  a tsi tsI Shatra sogs so/ /dzi rgyal ba las/ 'dod pa'i don gyi rkyen sa dang lkog gyur gyi rnam dbye rnams pha rol la byings dzi ni gi ru 'gyur bar bshad pas/ dzi gir bsgyur ba sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/ dzi gISha ti/ dzi gI Shetra/ dzi gI Shatu/ 
<p>103a.2</p>dzi gI Sha tAtra/ a dzi gI Shatra sogs so/ ! /de bzhin du yu 'dren pa la/ yu yu Sha ti/ laT yu yU Sh+rata/ ling  yu yUSha tu/ loT yu yU Sha tAtra/ lang  a yu yU Shatra sogs dang / ! /hu sbyin pa la/ dzu hU Sha ti/ laT dzu hU She tra/ dzu hU Sha tu/ loT dzu hU Sha tAtra/ a dzu hU
<p>103a.3</p>Shata sogs/ ! ru sgra la/ ru rU Sha ti/ laT ru rU She tra/ ling  ru rU Sha tu/ loT ru rISha tA tra/ a ru rU Shatra/ lang  a ru rU Shatra sogs so// ! Du ba tsaSh+ra 'tshed pa la/ sa gnyis brjod/ sngon ma'i ha sa dang po lhag po'os ts+ra phyis pas/ pa pa ts+ra/ sa zhes gnas pa la/ ! yaHse/ 
<p>103a.4</p>sa la a i'o/ /rkyen sa pha rol byings gnyis brjod pa'i thog ma de a yig yin na i yig tu 'gyur te/ a ir bsgyur bas/ bi pak+Sha tu/ laT pi pak+Shetra/ ling  pi pak+Sha tu/ loT pi pak+ShatA tra/ lang  a pi pak+Shatra sogs dang / de bzhin du pA btung ba la/ phi pA sa ti/ laT pi bA
<p>103a.5</p>setra/ ling  pi pA sa tu/ loT pi pA sa tA tra/ lang  a pi pA satra sogs so/ ! t+yadza lang tsho yol ba la/ ti t+ya k+Sha ti/ laT ti t+yak+She tra/ ling  ti t+yak+Shatu/ loT ti t+yak+ShatA tra/ lang  a ti t+yak+Shatra sogs so/ ! pr-i tsI mchod pa la/ pi pr-ik+Sha ti/ laT pi pr-ik+Shetra/ ling  pi pr-ik+Sha 
<p>103a.6</p>tu/ loT pi pr-ik+Sha tA tra/ ling  a pi pr-ik+Shata sogs so/ ! bats+ra brjod pa la/ bi bak+Sha ti/ laT bi bak+Sha tra/ ling  bi bak+Sha tu/ loT bi bak+Sha tAtra/ lang  a bi bak+Shatra sogs dang / ! grahra nye bar len pa D+ha/ sa graha sogs kyis slar yang dag par bsgyur ba sogs kyis bsgrubs
<p>103a.7</p>pas/ dzi g+h+r-ik+Shati/ laT dzi g+h+r-i k+Shetra/ ling  dzi g+h+r-ik+Sha tu/ loT dzi g+h+r-ik+Sha tAtra/ lang  a dzi g+h+r-i k+Shatra/ ! de bzhin du pratsh+ra shes par 'dod pa la/ pi pr-ik+Sha ti/ laT bi br-ik+She tra/ ling  pi pr-ik+Sha tu/ loT pi pr-ik+Sha tAtra/ lang  a pi pr-ik+Shatra sogs so/ ! /hanra 'tshe ba la/ sa gnyis brjod/ 
<p>103b</p>
<p>103b.1</p>hanra gyi g+ha/ ku ha dag gi tsur bsgyur bas/ dzi g+hanra/ sa zhes gnas pa la/ ! ha n+heHse Ni tra/ hanra las sa Na 'gro ba'o/ /hanra las pha rol gyi 'dod pa'i rkyen sa laN 'gro ba'i ming can zhes bya ba la dgos pa ni 'phel ba byed pa'i don te/ 'phel ba byas pas/ dzi g+hAMs ti/ laT/ 
<p>103b.2</p>dzi g+hAM setra/ ling / dzi g+hAM sa tu/ loT/ dzi g+hAMs tAtra/ lang / dzi g+hA satra sogs so// ! Du kr-inya byed pa la sa sbyar/ r-itra ir+ra/ r-itra ir+ra'o/ /byings mtha'i r-i yig ni rkyen sa dang ka nga 'gro ba'i ming can pha rol la ir+ra du 'gyur te/ r-i ir+ra du bsgyur/ gnyis brjod sngon ma'i ha sa dang po
<p>103b.3</p>lhag po/ ku ha dag gi tsu/ y+ra bra sogs kyis i phyi ma ring por bsgyur ba sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/ tsi kIr+Sha ti/ laT/ tsi kI r+Shatra/ ling / tsi kIr+Sha tu/ loT/ tsi kAr+Sha tA tra/ lang / i tsi kIr+Shatra sogs dang / ! de bzhin du hriny+ra 'phrog pa la/ dzi hIr+She ti/ laT/ dzi hIr+Sha tra/ ling / dzi hIr+Sha
<p>103b.4</p>tu/ loT/ dzi hIr+Sha tAtra/ lang / a dzi hIr+Sha tra sogs dang / ! trI rgyal ba la/ ti tIr+Sha ti/ laT/ tu tIr+Sha tra/ ling / ti tIr+Sha tu/ loT/ ti tIr+Sha tA tra/ lang / a ti tIr+Shatra sogs so/ ! Du kr-iny+ra byed pa la sa r-i ir gnyis brjod pa sogs kyis tsi kIr/ sa zhes gzhas pa la/ bzhi pa la
<p>103b.5</p>ya kra 'os dngos po dang las kyi don gyi rkyen yakra sbyar/ ! yataH ya'i atra'o/ rkyen ya'i atra ni apra bi kA ra Na med pa'i yul la dbyi zhing 'dod pa'i don gyi rkyen sa'i a yang dngos po dang las kyi don can pha rol la dbyi bar bya ste/ skabs 'dir sa'i a phyis pas/ tsi kI r+Sh+yate/ 
<p>103b.6</p>laT/ tsikIr+Sh+ye ta/ ling / tsi kI r+Sh+ya ta/ loT/ tsi kIr+Sh+ya tAM/ lang / a tsi kIr+Sh+yata sogs te/ nye ba'i tshig dang sbyar ba'i dpe ni/ tsi kIr+Sh+ya te de ba dat+te na sogs so/ /! de nas rkyen gsum po de rnams dang gzhan yang rkyen sna tshogs kyi 'jug tshul thun mong bshad pa ni/ Du pa tsaSha 'tshed pa la/ ha sa dang po las phul
<p>103b.7</p>du byung ba yang+ra ste gnyis kyang ngos/ yang+ra gnyis brjod Atra 'os pa gong ma'i a ring po/ pA patsA/ ya zhes pa la/ ! de ring ma yin pa'i don gyi rnam dbye tA sogs sbyar/ gzhan la 'jig go zhes pas yang+ra 'jig pa dang mi 'jig pa 'dam ka can du
<p>104a</p>
<p>104a.1</p>byas/ 'jig pa'i phyogs la/ si sa tA sogs kyi iT+ra byin pas/ pA pa ts+ya tA/ pA pa ts+ya tA rau/ pA pa ts+ya tA raHsogs sam/ pA pa tsi tA/ pA pa tsi tA rau/ pA pa tsi tA raH sogs so// ! Du dAnya sbyin pa la/ bdag nyid 'dod pa las 'os/ rkyen sa sbyor gnyis
<p>104a.2</p>brjod pas/ dA dA  sa zhes gnas pa la/ ! i s+se/ sa la isra'o/ /byings dA la sogs pa'i mtha'i dbyangs ni sa pha rol isra zhes par 'gyur zhing byings gnyis brjod pa'i dang po de yang dbyi bar bya ste/ A isra su bsgyur/ gnyis brjod pa'i sngon ma phyis/ 
<p>104a.3</p>apra med pa la sa'i sa la ta'os/ sa ta ru bsgyur ba sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/ dit+sa ti/ laT/ di t+setra/ ling / di t+satu/ loT/ di t+sa tAtra/ lang / a dit+satra sogs so//de bzhin du Du d+hAny+ra 'dzin pa la/ d+hit+sa ti/ laT/ d+hi t+satra/ ling / d+hit+sa tu/ loT/ d+hit+sa tAtra/ lang / a d+hit+satra
<p>104a.4</p>sogs dang / ! nyer bsgyur pra sngon ma'i mAng+ra gus pa la/ pra mit+sa te/ laT/ pra mit+se ta/ ling / pra mit+sa tAM/ loT/ prA mit+sa ta lang sogs so/ ! Du la b+haSh+ra thob pa la/ sa rkyen sbyar/ gnyis brjod/ kha pa sogs kyis b+ha pa/ sa la is 'os/ la'i a is ru bsgyur/ 
<p>104a.5</p>gnyis brjod pa'i sngon ma phyis/ sra kra dag gis sngon ma'os/ isra ru bsgyur ba'i sa yang dbyi ba sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/ lit+sa te/ laT/ lit+sa ta/ ling / lit+sa tAM/ loT/ a lit+sa ta lang sogs dang / ! de bzhin du ra b+ha rtsed mo la/ rib+sa te/ laT/ rip+se ta/ ling / rap+sa tAM/ loT/ a rip+sa ta las
<p>104a.6</p>sogs dang / ! ba t+li ltung ba la/ pit+sa ti/ laT/ pit+setra/ ling / pi t+sa tu/ loT/ pit+sa tAtra/ lang / a pit+satra sogs dang / ! A p+l-i khyab pa las gnyis brjod sngon ma'i ha sa dang po phyis pas/ A Apra/ sa zhes gnas pa la/ ! Ap+no te rI/ a p+noti'i I'o/ /a y+no
<p>104a.7</p>ti ste byings Apra kyi u pa d+ha'i A ni I ru 'gyur zhing byings gnyis brjod pa'i sngon ma de yang dbyi bar bya ste/ A pyi ma Ir bsgyur A sngon ma phyis pas/ I p+sa ti/ laT/ Ip+setra/ ling / Ip+sa tu/ loT/ Ip+sa tAtra/ lang / ip+satra sogs so/ ! a sha za bal/ a she ra na 
<p>104b</p>
<p>104b.1</p>yoHbA/ a sha la a nA yang na'o/ /byings a sha la 'dod pa'i don gyi rkyen sa'i yul la rkyen a nA ya yang na 'gyur te/ a nA ya sbyar pa'i phyogs la/ a sha nA ya ti/ laT a sha nA yetra/ ling  a sha nA tu/ loT a sha nA tAtra/ lang  A sha nA yatra sogs dang / ! 
<p>104b.2</p>sa sbyar ba'i phyogs la/ gnyis brjod/ dbyangs dang po'i pha rol lo zhes sha gong ma mi dbyi/ sa la isra 'os/ a phyi ma isra su bskyur/ sra kra dang gi sngon ma'os/ sra phyis/ uT sbyor ba sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/ a shi shi Sha ti/ laT/ a shi shi Shetra/ ling / 
<p>104b.3</p>a shi shi tu/ loT/ a shi shi ShatAtra/ lang / A shi shi Shatra sogs te/ a shi tu mi ts+tsha ti zhes pa'i don la/ a sha nA ya ti/ a shi shi Sha ti/ ! gu pu sbed pa la ste ngan tshig la'ang zhes sa pa la/ gub+b+h+yaH gu pa rnams las so/ byings gupra/ tidzra/ kitra/ mAnra/ ba d+hA/ dAnra/ 
<p>104b.4</p>shAnra rnams las rang gi don las rkyen du 'gyur te/ sa sbyar/ gnyis brjod pa sogs zas bza' bar 'dod/ kyis/ dzu zas bza' bar 'dod/ gup+sa ti/ laT/ dzu gup+se tra/ ling / dzu gup+sa tu/ loT/ dzu gup+sa tAtra/ lang / a dzugup+satra sogs pa rasmai pa da dang / laT/ dzu gup+sa te sogs At+ma ne pa da
<p>104b.5</p>rnams so/ de bzhin du ti dza bzod pa la/ ti tik+Sha ti/ laT/ ti tik+Shetra/ ling / ti tik+Sha tu/ loT/ ti tik+ShatAtra/ lang / a ti tik+Shata sogs dang / laT/ ti tik+She ta sogs so/ ! kitra nad sangs pa la ste the tshom la yang ngo zhes pa la/ tsi kit+sa ti/ laT/ tsikit+setra/ ling / tsi kit+sa tu/ loT/ tsi
<p>104b.6</p>kit+sa tAtra/ lang / a tsi kit+satra sogs so/ ! mA na rnam par dpyod pa la/ sa gnyis brjod/ sngon ma'i ha sa dang po lhag po/ sa la a i'os sngon ma'i a i/ man sogs kyi dbyangs dang po de sa pha rol la ring por bsgyur bar bshad pas/ i ring por bsgyur ba dang sogs kyis/ mI mAM
<p>104b.7</p>sa ti/ laT/ mI mAM setra/ ling / mI mAM sa tu/ loT/ mI mAM sa tAtra/ lang / a mI mAM satra sogs dang / ! de bzhin du/ ba d+hA smad pa la/ bI b+hat+sa ti/ laT/ bI b+hat+se tra/ ling / bI b+hat+sa tu/ loT/ bIb+hat+sa tAtra/ long / a bI b+hat+sata sogs dang / loT/ bI b+hat+sate sogs so/ ! dAn dang shAn gzi brjid la/ 
<p>105a</p>
<p>105a.1</p>dI dAM sa te/ laT/ dI dAM satra/ ling / dI dAM sa tAM/ loT/ a dI dAMs tra lang sogs dang / shI shAM sate/ laT/ shI shAM se ta/ ling / shI shAM sa tA/ loT/ a shI shAM sa ta lang sogs so/ ! /gu pu bsrung ba la'o/ /A ya'o/ /byings gu pu bsrung
<p>105a.2</p>ba/ d+hUpra/ bits+tsha/ paN+ra/ panra rnams las dngos po dang rang gi don la rkyen A ya 'gyur la/ A ya pa rol la byings gupra kyi dang po'i dbyangs de yon tan du 'gyur bar bshad de/ A ya sbyar yon tan byas pas/ go pA ya ti/ laT/ go pA yetra/ ling / go pA ya tu/ loT/ go
<p>105a.3</p>pA ya tAtra/ lang / a go pA yatra sogs so/ /de bzhin du d+hU pa ches gdungs pa la/ d+hU pA ya ti/ laT/ d+hU bA yetra/ ling / d+hU pA ya tu/ loT/ d+hU pA ya tAtra/ lang / a d+hU pA yatra sogs so/ /bi ts+tsha 'gro ba la/ bi ts+tshA ya ti/ laT/ bi ts+tshA yetra/ ling / bits+tshA ya tu/ loT/ bi ts+tshA
<p>105a.4</p>ya tAtra/ lang / a bits+tsha yatra sogs so/ ! /paN+ra dang panra 'du 'god dang bstod pa la/ pa NA ya ti sogs dang / ba nA ya ti sogs so/ ! /nA m+no ya I tsA s+ya/ ming la ya ste a'i yang I'o/ /ming la bdag nyid 'dod pa dang re smon gyi don la ming byings su bsgrub pa'i
<p>105a.5</p>rkyen ya 'gyur zhing rkyen ya pha rol la ming dang byings l+yi mtha'i dbyangs a ni I ru 'gyur te/ A t+ma naHmits+tsha te zhes pa'i don la/ pu trI ya ti/ ng+ha na mi ts+tsha ti zhes pa'i don la/ d+ha nI ya ti sogs so/ ya rkyen pha rol la ming u da ka ni a danra zhes par bsgyur bar bshad de/ 
<p>105a.6</p>u da ka mi ts+tsha ti zhes pa'i don la/ u da n+ya ti ming las 'dod pa'i la rkyen ka mya'ang 'jug par bshad de/ bdag nyid bu 'dod/ pu tra mi ts+tsha ti zhes nor 'dod la/ pa'i don la/ pi tra ka mya nota 'dod/ ti sogs so/ ! /ka ra No tsa yaH byed pa la'ang ya'o/ /byings kan+Du la
<p>105a.7</p>chu 'dod/ sogs pa rnams las byed pa'i chu 'dod/ don la'ang rkyen ya 'gyur te/ gan+Du ka ro ti zhes pa'i don la/ kan+Da ya ti sogs so/ ! /nyir+Dit+ka  bu 'dod par byed/ da Ne/ byed pa po la  bu 'dod bar byed/ nyi Da 'gro ba'o/ ming gi byings g+haT la ming gi byangs g+haT la sogs rnams la byed pa po'i ngon la rkyen nyi
<p>105b</p>
<p>105b.1</p>'gyur zhing nyi de la'ang Da 'gro ba'i ming can zhes bya'o/ ! /nyi tAM hra sA+e/ nyi nyid la thung ngu'o/ /spyir btang nya 'gro ba la 'phel ba thob kyang de'i dmigs bsal rkyen nyi la 'phel ba mi 'byung zhing byings kyi dang po'i dbyangs de ring po yin na thung ngur 'gyur te/ ! g+ha Ta la nyi/ de Da 'gro ba yin
<p>105b.2</p>pas Ti phyis/ 'phel ba mi byed/ apra bi kA ra Na sbyar yon tan sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/ g+ha Ta ya ti sogs te/ g+ha TaM ka ro ti zhes pa'i don la/ g+ha Ta ya ti de bzhin du/ ma hAn+haM ka ro ti zhes pa'i don la ma ha ya ti/ /baha thob pa la nyi/ ba ha U D+ha ru bsgyur bas/ U D+hi
<p>105b.3</p>ka ro ti zhes pa'i don la/ u D+ha ya ti/ ! pr-i thA deraH dri tha sogs kyi ra'o/ rkyen nyi pha rol la byings  bum pa byed/ dr-i tha sogs kyi dbyangs r-i ni ra ru bum pa byed/ 'gyu ra te/ br-i tha la chen po byed do/ nyi r-i rara? bsgyur bas/ pratha ya ti sogs so/ /de bzhin du dri
<p>105b.4</p>b+hA la/ thob par byed/ dra D+ha ya ti sogs so/ ! /byings la rang gis byed pa'am gzhan byed du 'jug pa'i bya ba'i don la'ang rkyen nyi 'gyur bar bshad de/ Du kr-inya? byed pa la nyi/ byings la yon tan/ apra sbyor ba sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/ ka ra ya ti sogs so/ de bzhin
<p>105b.5</p>du pAtsa ya ti dang / a ni sngon ma'i shA su rjes su stong pa la/ a nu shAs ti sogs so/ ! /hanra 'tshe ba dang 'gro ba la nyi sbyar/ ! ga no g+hatra/ han gyi g+hatra'o/ /byings han ni in rkyen med pa'i rkyen ny+ra yig dang N+ra yig 'gro bi ba'i ming can dang dbyangs dang po can pha rol la
<p>105b.6</p>g+hatra ces par 'gyur te/ han g+hatra bsgyur a pra sbyor ba sogs kyis/ g+hata ya ti sogs so/ ! /sa ng+l-i sngigs pa la/ nyi sbyar/ sa deHshatra/ sa da'i shatra'o/ /byings dran rkyen nyi pha rol la shatra ces par 'gyur te/ sadra shatra tu bsgyur/ u pa d+hA 'phel ba byas pas/ 
<p>105b.7</p>shA ta ya ti sogs so/ ! /rA to nyau bukra/ r-i atra las nyi la pukra'o/ /byings r-i dang Atra mtha' la nyi pha rol las pukra A ga ma ster bar bya ste/ Du dAny+ra sbyin pa la nyi sbyar pukra A ga ma byin pas/ dA pa ya ti sogs so/! /de bzhin du/ s+thAb ya ti sogs dang / yA
<p>106a</p>
<p>106a.1</p>thob pa la/ yA pa ya ti sogs so/ ! r-i 'gro ba la nyi/ pu kra A ga ma/ pukra pha rol la r-i la yon tan byed par bshad pas/ a r+pa ya ti sogs so/ ! /byings hrI klI rI i ngi krI dzi lI rnams la nyi pha rol la pu kra a ga ma ster bar bshad de/ ! hI ngo tsha ba
<p>106a.2</p>la nyi sbyar pi kra byin yon tan byas pas/ hre pa ya te/ ! de bzhin du klI la/ nyi pukra A ga ma byin/ klI pa i zhes gnas pa la/ e/ i A'o/ /klI nas lI'i bar gyi byings de rnams kyi i yig dag ni pukra pha rol la A ru 'gyur te/ klA pa ya ti sogs dang / ! 
<p>106a.3</p>de bzhin du rIng nyan pa la/ rA pa ya ti sogs dang / ! a d+hi sngon ma'i id klog pa la/ a d+h+yA pa ya ti sogs dang / krI na mjal ba la/ krA pa ya ti sogs dang / dzi rgyal ba la/ dzA pa ya ti sogs dang / ! lI rnam par 'khyams pa la/ nyer bsgyur ba'i sngon/ 
<p>106a.4</p>bi lA pa ya ti sogs so/ ! /pa ta sogs la nyi pha rol las pukra gi yul la yukra A ga ma ster bar bshad de/ ! pA btung ba la/ nyi sbyar yukra byin pas/ pA ya ya ti sogs so/ ! /shIng nyal ba la/ nyi sbyar yukra byin/ shing gi rtag tu yon tan nos/ i e/ 
<p>106a.5</p>mtshams sbyor gyi yi ge sogs kyis de A ru bsgyur bas/ shA ya ya ti sogs dang / ! de bzhin du sho phra mor byed pa la'ang mtshams sbyor gyi yi ge sogs kyis o A ru bsgyur bas/ shA ya ya ti sogs so/ ! /pr-Inyu dang d+hUnyu dag la nyi pha rol la nuka? A ga ma ster bar bshad de
<p>106a.6</p>nuka? byin pas/ prIN ya ti sogs dang / d+hU ya ti sogs so/ ! /dzA na sogs kyi dbyangs nyi pha rol la yang na thung ngur bsgyur bar bshad de/ ! dz+nyA khongs su tshud pa la/ nyi sbyar/ pukra lku A ga ma byin thung ngur bsgyur ba dang mi bsgyur ba 'dam ka can du byas pas/ dz+nyA pa ya ti
<p>106a.7</p>sogs sam/ dzA da ya ti sogs so/ ! /dzA na la sogs pa rnams kyi pukra dang bcas pa'i sa pha rol la is su bsgyur ba dang mi bsgyur ba 'dam ka can du bshad de/ is su ma bsgyur ba'i phyogs la/ iTu A ga ma byin pas/ dzi dz+nyA pa yi Sha te sogs dang / is su
<p>106b</p>
<p>106b.1</p>bsgyur ba'i phyogs la nyi dang iTu mi 'jug gnyis brjod pa'i sngon ma phyis/ y+ra kra sogs kyis isra'i sra yang phyis ring por bsgyur bas/ dz+hI b+sa ti sogs so/ ! /tsu rA dernyiH tsu ra sogs la nyi'o/ ! /byings tsu ra la sogs pa rnams las rang gi bya ba'i don la nyi rkyen du 'gyur te/ ! / 
<p>106b.2</p>tsur hu ba la/ nyi sbyar/ apra bi kA ra Na/ yon tan sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/ tso ra ya ti sogs so/ ! /de bzhin du pA la bsrung ba la/ pA la ya ti sogs dang / ! /tsi TI 'du shes la/ tsi ta ya ti sogs dang / tsi ti dran pa la/ i 'gro ba sogs kyi numra byin
<p>106b.3</p>pas/ tsin+ta ya ti sogs dang / ! /artsa mchod pa la/ artsa ya ti sogs dang / tsu ra sogs nyi mtha' can la/ At+ma ne bad rnams kyang 'jug par bshad pas/ tso ra ya te sogs kyang ngo / ! /nye ra da dwi tsa/ nyi dang adra las gnyis kyang ngo / /byings las 'das pa
<p>106b.4</p>tsam gyi don brjod pa la nyi mthar adra rkyen du 'gyur zhing adra dang lhan cig pa'i nyi pha rol la byings de gnyis su'ang brjod par bya la rnam dbye'ang de ring ma yin pa ladra rnams sbyor te/ tsur+ra la/ nyi/ adra/ dipra gnyis brjod/ sngon ma'i ha sa dang po lhag po/ aT sngon du sbyar bas/ a tsu
<p>106b.5</p>tsura?/ i ad ces gnas pa la/ ! nyeH nyi'i'o/ /'das pa'i don kyi skabs 'dir rkyen ka nga 'gro ba'i ming can pha rol la nyi ni dbyi bar bya ste/ nyi phyis/ ! la g+ho dAr+g+haH thung du ring po'o/ byings kyi thog ma'i dbyangs de thung du yin na rkyen ang+ra pha rol la ring por 'gyur te/ tsu
<p>106b.6</p>gong ma ring po bsgyur pas/ a tsU tsu ratra/ de bzhin du bsgrubs pas/ a tsU tsu ra taM/ a tsU tsu rana?/ a tsU tsu raHsogs so/ ! /de bzhin du bid shes pa la/ a bI bi da tra sogs dang / ! dutra yongs su 'gengs bal/ a dUdu hatra sogs so/ ! /a ngi la g+ho hra swa
<p>106b.7</p>u bad+hA ya/ ang la u pa thung ngu ni thung ngu'o/ /ang+ra dang bcas pa'i nyi pha rol la byings kyi u pa d+hA thung ngu de ni ring por mi bsgyur bar thung ngu nyid du gnas shing ang+ra pha rol la byings kyi thog ma'i a ni ir+ra 'gyur te/ ! g+haT+ra sgyu 'phrul la/ nyi ang+ra/ gnyis brjod/ a i/ 
<p>107a</p>
<p>107a.1</p>thung ngu ring po 'os/ de ring por bsgyur bas/ a dzI g+ha Tatra/ a dzi g+ha Ta taM/ a dzi g+ha Tanra sogs so/ ! /na r-itra/ rita? kyi yin no/ byings r-i ta rjes 'brel can gyi ang+ra ba d+hA ni ang+ra pha rol la thung ngur 'gyur ba'am yin te/ ! D+hau kr-i 'gro ba la/ nyi/ 
<p>107a.2</p>ang+ra/ gnyis brjod/ thung ngu 'os D+ha gong ma'i au U dz+ha pa sogs kyis D+ha Da ru bsgyur bas/ a DU D+hau katra/ aDUD+hau kataM/ a DU D+hau kanra sogs dang / ! /yAtsa slong ba la/ a ya yA tsa tra sogs so/ ! ba ha thob pa la/ ba heHk+ti/ ba ha las k+ti'o/ /rkyen
<p>107a.3</p>nyi dang bcas pa'i adra pho rol la dbyings bahra la kyi A ga ma ster bar bya ste/ k+ti byin/ kra gnas don/ ya dza sogs kyi saM pra sA ra Na ra bsgyur ha'i D+ha'os/ ha D+ha/ tabra dag gi ng+ha 'os/ ti ng+hiSha Tu sogs kyis de D+ha/ nyi Da 'gro ba'i yin pas D+ha'i i phyis/ nyo 'os nyi
<p>107a.4</p>yang phyis/ D+ha'i D+ha la dbyi'i 'os D+ha gong ma phyis/ D+ha phyi ma adra gi a la drang / nyi dang adra las gnyis kyang sogs de gnyis brjod/ dipra sogs la aT+ra/ dbyangs sogs aT+ra sogs kyi slar yang aT+ra/ mtshams sbyar bas/ auD+haD+ha/ tra ces gnas pa la/ ! 
<p>107a.5</p>a ngi pU s+ya dzaH a dra la sngon ma'i D+ha ni dza'o/ /rkyen adra pa rol byings gnyis brjod pa'i sngon ma'i D+ha ni ja ru 'gyur te/ D+ha gong ma ja ru bsgyur bas/ au dza D+hatra/ de bzhin bsgrubs pas/ au dza D+ha taM/ au dza D+hana? sogs so/ ! /nyer sgyur pra ti sngon ma'i Sh+na 'gro
<p>107a.6</p>ba las ldog pa la/ nyi/ adra/ dwa sogs kyi A i ru bsgyur ba sogs kyis bsgyur bas pas/ pra t+ya ri Sh+na ya ta sogs dang / ! pA btung ba la/ nyi/ adra/ gong dang 'dra ba la nyi 'os nyi phyis pas/ a pI pya ta sogs dang / ! kr-i pu rgyas pa la/ nyi adra/ ! kr-i
<p>107a.7</p>pha rolaH kr-i pa'i ra? la'o/ /byings kr-i pa'i ru yig ni la yig tu 'gyur te/ yon tan ra? la? ru bsgyur pas/ paT kal+p+yi ti/ kal+p+yetra/ ling kal+p+yi tu/ loT kal+p+ya tA tra/ lang ang l+p+ya tra sogs so/ ! /yang bi sngon ma'i bkr-i pu la nyi adra dang bcas pa sbyar na/ bya cI k-I pa ta/ 
<p>107b</p>
<p>107b.1</p>bya tsI kla ra taM/ bya tsI kl-i pan/ bya tsI kl-i paHsogs so/ /ati swa ra swa sti byA ka ra Na s+ya sU trA t+pA t+ya ya yu k+ta pra kraM yas mA p+tAH zhes pa brda sprod pa dbyangs can gyi mdo las rkyen dang sbyor ba'i rab tu byed pa rnams rdzogs so// ! //de nas kun nas bsgyur ba'i cho ga rnams
<p>107b.2</p>bshad par bya ste/ dri shA deH pa sh+ya diH dr-i shal sogs pa rnams kyi pa sh+yal sogs pa rnams so/ /byings dr-isha/ r-i/ srid/ dashra/ sad/ pA/ g+hA/ ng+h+nA/ s+t+na m+mA/ dA Na sogs ni a pra bi kA Na sogs phal rol la rim pa bzhin/ pash+ya /r-its+tsha/ ng+hAb/ shI ya/ sId/ pipa/ 
<p>107b.3</p>ji g+h+ra/ ng+ha ma/ tiSh+tha/ ma na/ yats+tsha rnams su 'gyur te/ ! dr-i shira? lta ba la/ tipra apra bi kA ra Na/ dri shira? pa sh+ya ru bsgyur bas/ laT pa sh+ya ri/ de bzhin tu/ ling  pa sh+yetra/ loT pa sh+ya tu/ loT pa sh+ya tAtra/ lang  a pa sh+yata? sogs dang / ! r-i 'gro bal/ r-its+tsha
<p>107b.4</p>ti/ laT r-its+tshata/ ling  r-its+tshe tu/ loT r-its+tshe tAtra/ ar+ts+tshatra lang sogs dang / ! sri 'gro ba la/ ng+hA ba ti sogs dang / ! sharl-i 'gro bal/ shI ya ti sogs dang / shI ya te sogs so/ ! Shad-I 'gro bal/ sId ti sogs dang / ! pA btung bal/ pi bti sogs
<p>107b.5</p>dang / ! g+ha dri nye ba'i len pa la/ dzig+h+ra ti sogs dang / ! ng+h+mA sgra dang mi kun nas sbyor bal/ ng+ham ri sogs dang / ! Sh+dA 'gro ba las ldog pa la/ ri Sh+dA ti sogs dang / ! m+nya goms pa la/ man ti sogs dang / ! dAnra sbyin pa la/ yats+tsha ti sogs te a pra laM kA ra Na'i mtha' can yin pas mchog rnams go
<p>107b.6</p>slo'o/ ! /gamAMtshaH gamra rnams kyi tsha'o/ /byings gamra dang / i Shu dang / ya mra rnams kyi mtha' ni tsha yig tu 'gyur te/ ! gamr-i 'gro pa la/ gats+tshati sogs dang / ! i Shu 'dod pa la/ i ts+tsha ri sogs dang / ! ya mu 'gog pa la/ ya ts+tsha ti sogs so/ ! / 
<p>107b.7</p>dz+nyA jan+yaurdzAH dz+nyA dzanra dag gi dzA'o/ /byings dz+nyA khongs su chud pa dang dza na skye bdag ni a pra bi kAr Na sogs pha rol la dzA zhes par 'gyur te/ apra kyi yul la/ di ba sogs kyi ya dang / krI sogs kyi nA 'dam ka can du byas pas/ ! dz+nyA khongs su chud pa la/ dzAya ti sogs sam/ 
<p>108a</p>
<p>108a.1</p>dzA nI te sogs so/ ! de bzhin tu dzran skye ba la'ang / dzA ya ti sogs sam/ dzA nI te sogs so/ ! shru baHshri/ shru'i shr-i'o/ /byings shru ni apra la sogs pa pha rol la sh-i zhes par 'gyur te/ shru thos pa la su sogs kyi nu bi kA ra Na shu shr-iru bsgyur bas/ shri r+Na ti sogs so/ ! /p+wAdehra swaH 
<p>108a.2</p>pU la sogs pa'i thung ngu'o/ /byings pUnya la sogs pa rnams ni apra sogs pha rol la thung ngur 'gyur te/ ! pU nya nom pa la/ nA bi kA ra Na thung ngur bsgyur bas/ pu nA ti sogs so/ /i ti swa ra swa ste byA ka ra Na su sru tA dA de sha prakri ya sa mAb+hAH zhes pa brda sprod pa dbyangs can gyi mdo las kun nas
<p>108a.3</p>bsgyur ba'i rab tu bya ba rnams rdzogs so// ! //de nas byings dang nyer bsgyur sbyor tshul sogs bshad par bya ste/ ni bi shA deHni las bi sha sogs la'o/ /nyer bsgyur ni las pha rol kyi byings bi sha sogs la rnam dbye A ne pa da rnams 'jug ste/ bi sngon ma'i bi sha 'jug pa la/ ni bi she te
<p>108a.4</p>nges par 'jug par byed sogs so// ! //bi pa rA b+haM dze/ bi pa rA dag las dzi la'o/ /nyer bsgyur bi dang pa rA dag las pha rol gyi byings dzi rgyal ba las rnam dbye At+ma ne pa da rnams 'jug ste/ bi dza ya te/ pa rA dza ya te/ nyer bsgyur pra ti/ a pa dang saM las pha rol gyi byings Sh+ShA 'gro ba las ldog pa dang / saM las pha  nges par 'dug byed
<p>108a.5</p>rol gyi dr-i shir lta ba/ gam+l-i 'gro ba shU thos pa/ pid shes pa/ pr-its+tsha shes par 'dod pa rnams la'ang rnam dbye At+ma ne pa da rnams 'jug ste/ prat+ya ba ti Sh+tha te/ saM rnam par rgyal bar byed/ mchog tu rgyal bar byed/ tiSh+Tha te/ saM pa sh+ya te/ saM gats+tsha te/ saM shr-iNu te/ saM bi t+te/ saM pr-its+tsha te/ nyer bsgyur Ang+ra D+has pha rol gyi pr-i ts+tsha
<p>108a.6</p>dang ta nu yang ba la'ang At+ma ne pa da rnams 'jug ste/ A pr-its+tsha te/ kun tu 'dri bar byed/ A ta nu te/ kun nas yang bar byed/ sogs so/ ! /A ngo donya so so kun nas gnas/ yang dag par gnas/ nA s+ya bi har Ne/ yang dag par lta bar byed/ kun tu 'gro bar byed/ yang dag par nyan par byed/ kun tu shes bar byed/ kun nas 'dri bar byed/ Ang+ra las dA la kha gdangs pa ma
<p>108a.7</p>yin pa la'o/ nyer bsgyur Ang+ra las pha rol gyi dA D+ha kha gdangs pa'i don ma yin pa la At+ma ne ba nga da rnams 'jug ste/ A da t+te kun tu sbyin par byed/ sogs dang / kha gdangs pa'i don yin na pa rasmai pa da rnams sbyor bas/ byA da dA ti tsaT bye'u tsa ta ka'i kha la sbyin par byed/ kaHmu kha/ ! krI Donyanu saM pa ri b+h+yash+tsa/ a nu saM pa ri rnams las kyang
<p>108b</p>
<p>108b.1</p>krIDa la'o/ nyer bsgyur a nu saM pa ri rnams dang ang+ra las kyang pha rol gyi krID+ra la At+ma ne pa da rnams 'jug ste/ a nu krIDa te/ saM krIDa te/ pa ri krIDa te/ A krIDa te/ ! sa ma ba pro pa bi b+h+yaHs+thAH sama? a ba pra u pa bi rnams las s+thA la'o/ /nyer bsgyur saM dang a ba dang pra dang u pa dang bi rnams las
<p>108b.2</p>pha rol gyi Sh+ShA 'gro ba las ldog pa la'ang At+ma ne pa da rnams 'jug ste/ sa tiSh+Tha te/ a ba tiSh+Tha te/ pra tiSh+Tha te/ mthun par rtse bar byed/ legs par rtse bar byed/ yongs su rtse bar byed/ kun tu rtse bar byed/ u pa tiSh+Tha te/ bi tiSh+Tha te sogs so/ ! u dwi b+h+yI ta pa/ u tra bi dag las ta pa la'o/ /nyer bsgyur utra dang bi dag las pha rol
<p>108b.3</p>gyi ta pa la'ang At+ma ne pa da rnams 'jug ste/ u t+ta pa te/ yang dag par gnas bar byed/ rab tu gnas bar byed/ bi ta pa te sogs so/ ! /A ngo ya ma ha na Ang las nye bar gnas par byed/ rnam par gnas bar byed/ ya mra ha na la'o/ /nyer bsgyur Ang las pha rol gyi ya mra dang hanra dag la'ang At+ma ne pa da
<p>108b.4</p>rnams 'jug ste/ yamra la/ A lats+tsha te/ shin tu gdung bar byed/ sogs dang / A sngon ma'i hanra 'tshe ba la/ ! lo pa sta nu datA nAM/ rnam par gdung bar byed/ a nu dAt+ta rnams dbyi ba nyid do/ /byings mtha'i a nu dAt+ta ste skad gsang dma' bar 'don pa nya ma so sor bsdu ba rnams ni dz+ha sa'i yi ge kang 'gro ba rnams pha rol la dbyi bar bya ste/ 
<p>108b.5</p>A ha te/ ag+hA te/ A g+hAte/ kun tu 'gog par byed/ A ha se/ A g+hA the/ Aha d+h+we/ A g+h+ne/ A haM pa he/ a haM ma he sogs so/ ! u tra las tsa ra la 'don pa la'o/ /nyer bsgyur utra las pha rol gyi tsa ra g.yo ba las 'don pa dang bcas pa'i don la At+ma ne pa da rnams 'jug ste/ u ts+tsha ra te sUtraM/ rnam dbye gsum
<p>108b.6</p>kun tu snun par byed/ pa'i mtha' can dang sbyor ba'i saM sngon ma'i tsa ra la'ang At+ma ne pa da rnams 'jug par bshad de/ a shwe na saM tsar tre/ rta yis kun tu spyod par byed/ rA the na saM tsa ra tre/ shing rtas kun nas spyod par byed/ byAb pa ri b+h+yaHkri yaH bi a ba pa ri rnams las krI la'o/ /nyer bsgyur bi dang a ba dang pa ri rnams las pha rol gyi spyod cing gzhung 'don par byed/ 
<p>108b.7</p>krI la At+ma ne pa da rnams 'jug ste/ bi krI NI te/ rnam par 'tshong bar byed/ a ba krI NI tre/ kun tu 'tshong bar byed/ pa ri krI NI te/ yongs su 'tshong bar byed/ sogs so/ ! /shapra khas mi len pa la'o zhes pa'i byings la'ang At+ma ne pa da rnams 'jug par bshad de/ sha pa te sogs so/ ! /dz+nyA shrA smr-i dr-i shAM sA n+ta nA mA tra/ dz+nyA shU smr-i dr-i sha
<p>109a</p>
<p>109a.1</p>rnams sa mtha' can la Atra'o/ /byings dz+hA khongs su chud pa/ shrU thos pa/ smr-i dran pa/ dra shir lta pa rnams 'dod pa'i don gyi rkyen sa'i mtha' can la'ang At+ma ne pa da rnams 'jug ste/ dzi dz+hAs te gu NaM/ shu shrUSha te swa raM/ su smU r+Sha te mi traM/ di dr-i k+Sha te dza na b+hU mI sogs so/ ! karma bya ti hA re
<p>109a.2</p>an+yata hi d+sA de rAtra/ 'tshe ba sogs las gzhan pa'i las gcig la 'jug pa la Atra'o/ /'tshe ba dang 'gro ba'i don dang byings pa Th+ra dang ha sa rnams kyi don ma yin pa'i byed pa/ yon tan shes par 'dod/ grogs dran par 'dod/ skye yul lta bar 'dod/ po dang bya ba du ma las gcig la
<p>109a.3</p>byed pa gcig gis 'jug pa'i don la At+ma ne pa da rnams 'jug ste/ bi ba dan+te ba di naH shrAd+d+ha byati b+ha ba te sogs dang / /'tshe ba sogs la At+ma ne pa da mi 'jug pas/ bya ti g+ha n+ti/ bya ti gats+tsha ti/ bya ti ha san+ti/ bya ti pa Tha ti sogs so/ nyer bsgyur sngon ma'i kra mu rkang pa bskyod pa la pa ra smai pa da rnams 'jug
<p>109a.4</p>cing u pa d+hA'ang ring por bsgyur bar bshad de/ saM krA ma ti/ rtsod par byed rtsod mkhan/ shin tu dad par byed/ ma ti sogs so/ ! /byAng+ra parlu pe b+h+yo ra maH rnam par shin tu 'tshe ba byed/ rnam par shin tu 'gro ba byed/ shin tu rnam par gnod par byed/ shin tu rnam par klog par byed/ bi Ang+ra pa ri u pa rnams las ra ma la'o/ /nyer bsgyur bi
<p>109a.5</p>dang udra dang pa ri dang a'u pa rnams las pha yang dang par gom pa 'dod par byed/ rol gyi mu rtse ba la rnam dbye/nye bar gom pa 'dor bar byed/ par smai pa da rnams 'jug ste/ bir ma ti/ A ra ma ti/ u pa ra ma ti sogs so/ ! /br-id+d+h+yaHs+ya sa yorbA/ br-itra rnams las s+ya sa dag la yang na'o/ nyer bsgyur sngon
<p>109a.6</p>ma'i byings br-i tu br-i d+hu shr-i d+hu s+yaM du ka pU rnams s+ya dang sa'i rkyen can la rnam dbye At+ma ne pa da rnams sbyor ba dang pa rasmai pa da rnams sbyor ba yang na bar bya zhing rnam par dga' bar byed/ kun nas dga' bar byed/ yongs su dga' bar byed/ nye bar dga' bar byed/ uT+ra ster mi ster 'dam ka can du bya ste/ bi brti Sh+ya ti/ bi brti Sh+ya te/ bi baR+t+s+ya ti/ 
<p>109a.7</p>bi baR+t+s+ya te sogs so/ ! /mu tsA de rmu r+m+ra/ mu tsa sogs la mu mra'o/ /byings muts+ra/ luts+ra/ bidra/ lipra/ sits+ra/ kr-itra/ khidra/ shi sha rnams la apra bi kA ra na sogs pha rol las mumra A ga ma ster bar bya ste/ muny+tsa ti/ luny+tsa ti/ bin+da ti/ lim+ba ti/ siny+tsa ti/ kr-in+ta ti/ khin+da ti/ shi sha ti sogs so/ ! /i di to mumra/ itra 'gro ba 
<p>109b</p>
<p>109b.1</p>la mumra'o/ /byings mtha' e yig rjes 'brel 'gro ba la mumra A ga ma ster bar bya ste/ mra gnas don/ u brjod don/ ! Tu Na di yongs su 'dzin pa la/ nan+da te sogs dang / bi di 'dud pa dang bstod pa la/ bin+da ti sogs dang / ! sha ki ngo zhum pa la/ shad+ka ti sogs so/ ! /sha mAM dI r+g+haH shamra rnams
<p>109b.2</p>kyi ring po'o/ /byings shamra/ damra/ tamra/ b+h+ramra/ shamra/ k+Shamra/ klamra/ maD+ra rnams kakyi u pa d+hA ni apra la sogs pa pha rol la ring por 'gyur te/ ! sha mu dang da mu nye bar zhi ba la/ dipra sogs kyi ya bi kA ra Na u ba d+ha ring por bsgyur bas/ shA mya ti/ dA mya ti sogs dang / ! de bzhin du/ ta mu ngan sems la/ tA
<p>109b.3</p>mya ti sogs dang / b+h+ra mu/ kra mu/ kla mu/ tra si/ tru Ti/ laSha/ b+hAshra/ shA sha rnams la apra bi kA ra Na dang ya bi kA ra Na yang na bar bshad de/ ! b+h+ra mu g.yo ba la/ apra dang ya 'dam ka can du byas/ ring por bsgyur bas/ b+h+rA ma ti sogs dang / b+hA mya ti sogs so/ ! /de bzhin du/ kla mu ngan sems la/ klu ma ti sogs
<p>109b.4</p>dang / klA mya ti sogs so/ ! /duSha? log par spyod pa la rkyen nyi sbyor bar bshad de/ dru Sha ya ti sogs so/ ! /y+YoHya la o'o/ /rkyen ya pha rol la byings kyi o yig ni dbyi bar bya ste/ ! /do dum bur byed pa la dipra sogs kyi ya/ o phyis pas/ d+ya ti sogs dang / ! de bzhin du/ sho phra mor byed pa la/ sh+ya ti sogs
<p>109b.5</p>dang / ! Sho mtha'i las la/ s+ya ti sogs so/ /po ru raH pu'i ri ura?'o/ /bu ste byings pa sde'i yi ge sngon na yod pa'i r-i yig ni ka nga 'go ba'i ming can pha rol la ur+ra du 'gyur te/ mr-ing srog 'dor ba la/ /'dod pa'i don kyis r-i ur+ra gnyis brjod pa sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/ mumU r+Sha ti sogs so/ /mr-ing la
<p>109b.6</p>sa rkyen dang shog gyur kyi don la pa rasmai pa da rnams 'jug par bshad pa las/ sa rkyen bstan zin la/ lkog gyur la/ ma mA ra sogs dang / de gnyis las gzhan du At+ma ne pa da rnams 'jug pas/ mri ya te sogs so/ ! /ru dA de tsa tu r+NAM hwa sA deH rud sogs las bzhi po rnams kyi ha dang bas la'o/ byings
<p>109b.7</p>rud la sogs pa las pha rol gyi rnam dbye byings thams cad pa'i ming can bzhi po rnams kyi rkyen dang rnam dbye ha yig dang ba sa'i yi ge dang po la iT+ra A ga ma ster bar bya ste/ ! ru dir+ra mchi ma 'dzag pa la adra sogs kyi apra 'jig /ha dang ba sa'i yi ge dang po can la iT+ra ster ba sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/ 
<p>110a</p>
<p>110a.1</p>ro de ti/ ru ti taHdan+ti/ ro di Sha/ ru di thaHru di tha/ ri di mi/ ru di baHru di maHsogs dang / de ring ma yin pa lang gi dipra dang sipra la ITA dang aT+ra 'dam ka can du byas pas/ a ro dI ta/ a ro dIH a ro sogs so/ /de bzhin du/ shwas srog la/ shwa si ti/ laT/ a shwa sI ta/ lang / a shwa satra
<p>110a.2</p>sogs dang / ! nyi Sh+wa pa nyal ba la/ swa pa ti/ laT/ a swa pUtra/ lang / a swa patra sogs dang / ! prAN+ra rtsed mo la/ a prA NItra/ laT/ a prANItra/ lang / a prA Natra sogs dang / ! adzak+Sha sogs dang / yang dza k+Sha sogs dang la an+ta rnams kyi pyi ba dang an u sra su bsgyur bar bsha pas/ 
<p>110a.3</p>laT/ dzak+Sha ti/ adza k+ShuH sogs so/ /de nas rnams ni rung la sogs pa ste ji skad du/ laT/ swa laT pi ti tsai ba laT shwa si ti prA Ni ti ta laT thA/ laT/ dzak+Sha taM tsai ba ri dz+nye yo ru dA diHpa ny+tsa ko ba dang / 'di dang 'dra bar swa pi ti yang ste/ /de bzhin shA si ti dang prA Ni ti/ /dzak+Shi ti yang 'di 'drar shes bya ste/ /rud ba sogs pa lnga po'i tshogs rnams so/ ! yang an+ta dang / 
<p>110a.4</p>an an+ti anra bsgyur ba'i dzak+Sha'i sogs khongs ni/ dzak+Sha dzAgr-i/ da ri drA/ shAs/ di ng+hi/ beny+tsi/ tsa kA sr-i ste byings bdun po de rnams yin la de rnams la a b+h+yasta zhes sngon gyi thub pa rnams kyi ming du btags so/ /a n+ta'i lenra dbyi ba dang / an+ta lenra dbyi ba dang / anra us bsgyur ba sogs kyi bsgrubs pas/ ! tsa kA sr-i snang byed la/ tsa kAsti/ 
<p>110a.5</p>tsakA staHtsakAs ti/ a tsa kA suHsogs dang / ! dzAgr-i gnyid sangs ngas pa la/ dzA garti/ dzAgr-i taH dzA gra ti/ a dzA ga duHsogs dang / ! da ri drA de ri drA lo pa sh+tsa di ti/ da ri drA sogs kying 'gro ba la a tra ste A tra sta A dbyi ba yang ngo / /byings dang ri drA sogs kyi An rkyen dang rnam dbyer 'gro ba'i ming can has dang po can la i ru 'gyur
<p>110a.6</p>zhing dbyangs dang po can la A da ni dbyib ra bya ste/ ! da ri drA ri dra ngan 'gro la'o zhes pa la/ da ri drA ti/ da ri drA ti/ da ri dra ti dag las so/ ! /shAs rjes su 'thor ba la/ shA sti/ she Sh+TaH shAs ti sogs dang / ! I DI sho/ i DI sho/ ADI I sha dag las so/ byings I Da dang I sha dag las pha rol gyi rnam dbyes yig dang ng+he dag
<p>110a.7</p>iT+ra A ga ma ster bar bya ste/! I Di ng+he/ I De/ I D+wa he/ ID+ma he sogs dang / ! de bzhin du/ Ishra mchog gi dbang phyug la/ I Sh+te/ I sha te/ I sha te/ I shi She/ I shA the/ I shi d+he sogs so/ /o rau/ u'i au'o/ yu sogs byings mang po
<p>110b</p>
<p>110b.1</p>zhig gi mtha' u ni rnam dbye ba 'gro ba'i ming can ta yig dang sa yig ma yig dang po can pha rol las au ru 'gyur te/ ! yu nu ru stu b+h+ya I rbA/ yu nu ru stu rnams las I r+ya yang na'o/ /byings yul sogs pa 'di rnams kyi u ni rkyen bshad ma thag pa'i tshad nyid de rnams tshang ba pha rol la au ru bsgyur ba
<p>110b.2</p>dang yang na o ru 'gyur zhing o ru bsgyur ba'i phyogs la Ir+ya A gam ste bar bya ste/ r+ya rjes 'brel/ au dang o 'dam ka can du byas pas/ ! yu spel ba la/ yau ti sogs sam/ ya bI ti sogs/ ! /de bzhin du nu ded pa la/ nau ti sogs sam/ na bI ti sogs so/ /de bzhin du nu ded pa la/ nau sogs sam/ /na bI ti sogs so/ ! /ru sgra la/ rau ti
<p>110b.3</p>sogs sam/ ra bI ti sogs so/ ! /Sh+Tuny+ra bstod pa la/ stau ti sogs sam/ sta bI ti sogs so/ /nga 'gro ba rnams la bya ba lhag po med pas/ yu taH yu ban+ti sogs so/ ! /lo pa s+t+wa nu dA t+ta ta naM/ tanra rnams kyi a nu dA t+ta dbyi ba nyid do/ /byings ta nu la sogs pa rnams kyi mtha'i
<p>110b.4</p>a nu dA t+ta ste nyams so sor bsdu ba'i yi ge rnams ni ka dra 'gro ba'i ming can dz+ha sa'i yi ge dang po pha rol la dbyings bar bya nyid de/ ! /hanra 'tshe ba la/ han+ti/ ha taH g+h+na ti sogs so/ ! /na maH na mra la'o/ /namra bi kA na Na pha rol la'ang byings kyi nya ma'i yi ge rnams dbyi bar bya ste/ ! /hi ng+sa 'tshe ba la/ ru m+d+ha
<p>110b.5</p>sogs kyi na mra sbyar ng+ra dbyi ba sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/ han sti/ hi stiHhi ng+sa n+ti sogs so/ ! /b+ha dza bsnyen pa la/ na mra bi kA ra Na sbyar bas/ b+ha na k+ti/ b+haM k+taH b+haM dza n+ti sogs so/ /a pi rany+dza daM sha ShaM dza Sh+waM dzAM/ apra la ra ny+dza daM shra Sha ny+dza Sh+wa ny+dza rnams kyi'o/ /apra bi kA pa ra Na pha rol la byings rany+dza la sogs pa 'di rnams kyi
<p>110b.6</p>u pa d+ha'i nra yig ni dbyi bar bya ste/ rany+dza la/ ra dza ti/ radza taHra dzan+ti sogs dang / ! de bzhin du/ da sha ti/ sa dza ti/ swa dza ti sogs so/ /bi don bA nAM t+yA dI nAM bA di rbA/ bing las ti pra la sogs pa dgu rnams ni Na pra la sogs par yang na'o/ / byings sa bid de shes pa las pha rol gyi rnam dbye ti pra la sogs pa dgu ni
<p>110b.7</p>yang na rim pa ltar Na pra la sogs pa dgu ru 'gyur te/ Na pra sogs su sgyur ba dang mi sgyur ba yang na bar byas pas/ bsgyur ba'i phyogs la/ be da/ bi da tu/ bi duH be da/ bi dwa/ bid+ma/ ma bsgyur ba'i phyogs la/ bet+ti/ bit+taH be t+si bit+thaH bit+tha/ bet+mi/ bet+mi/ bidwa/ 
<p>111a</p>
<p>111a.1</p>bid+ma/ chog 'byung ling la/ bi d+yAtra/ bid+yAtAM/ bi d+yuHsogs dang / shis byed loT+ra la/ bet+tu/ bit+tu ta/ bat+tatra/ bit+tAM bi dan+tu sogs dang / de ring ma yin pa lang la/ a be tra/ a bit+tAM/ a bi duH sogs so/ ! /yang bid laA t+ma ne pa da rnams kyang 'jug
<p>111a.2</p>cing de'i tshe a pra bi kA ra Na yang mi 'jig la byings mthar ruT A ga ma ster ba dang mi ster ba 'dam ka can du bshad pas/ bi dra te/ bi drA te/ bi drA te/ bi dra n+te sogs sam/ bi da te/ bi dA te/ bi da n+te sogs so/ ! /a sra yod pa la/ na mra la'os/ nga 'gro ba pha
<p>111a.3</p>rol la a sra kyi a dbyi ba sogs kyi bsgrubs pas/ brta na'i skyes bu dang po gsum la/ a sti staH sa n+ti skyes bu dbus ma'i gcig tshig la/ ! si saH si sa'o/ /rnam dbye si pra pha rol la a sra kyi sra dbyi bar bya ste/ sa phyis pas/ a si lhag ma
<p>111a.4</p>rnams la/ s+thaH s+tha/ a smi/ swaH smaH chog 'byung ling la/ s+yA tAM/ s+yuHsogs so/ /shis byed loT+ra'i skyes bu dang po gsum la/ a stu/ stA tra/ sa n+tu/ skyes bu dbus ma'i gcig tshig la/ ! dza h+ye d+hi shA d+hi/ dza hi i d+hi shA d+hi'o/ /byings
<p>111a.5</p>hanra/ a sra/ shasra rnams ni rnam dbye hi dang lhan cig pa rim pa bzhin dza hi e d+hi shA d+hi rnams su tshig phrad kyis bsgyur ste/ a sra la hi/ apra 'jig /e d+hi/ lhag ma rnams la/ staM/ sta/ a sA ni/ a sAb/ a sA ma/ de ring ma yin pa lang gi skyes bu
<p>111a.6</p>dang po gcig tshig la/ ! a ste rIT+ra/ a sti las I T+ra'o/ /byings asra las pha rol gyi rnam dbye di pra dang si pra la IT A ga ma ster bar bya ste/ I T+ra byin pas/ A sItra/ lhag rnams la si pra la Itra/ a mi pra la a mi dbyi/ nga 'gro ba rnams la
<p>111a.7</p>a dbyi bar byed kyang di pra sogs kyi aT+ra dang / dbyangs dang po'i aT+ra mtshams sbyar bas gzugs 'dra ste/ A staM/ A sanra/ A staM/ Asta/ AsaM/ Asma/ ! li hra ro kun tu myang ba la/ brta ma na'i skyes bu dang po'i gcig tshig la/ 
<p>111b</p>
<p>111b.1</p>ha'i D+ha 'os/ hra D+h+ra/ ta tha dag gi d+ha'os ta d+ha/ Sh+Tu sogs kyis d+h+ra D+h+ra/ pa 'gro ba'i yon tan byas pas/ leD+h+ra/ D+h+ri zhes gnas pa la/ ! D+hi D+ho lo po dI r+g+hash+tsa/ D+ha'i D+ha la dbyi zhing ring po yang ngo / /tshu rol gyi mtha'i D+ha yig ni D+ha yig pha rol la dbyi zhing / 
<p>111b.2</p>dbyangs sngon ma de thung ngu yin na yang ring por 'gyur te/ D+ha sngon ma phyis pas/ le D+hi/ de bzhin du bsgrubs pas/ lI D+haH li hi n+ti/ le k+Shi/ lID+haH lID+ha/ li hwa/ lih+ma/ ! chog 'byung ling la/ li h+yAtra/ li h+yAtAM/ li h+yuHsogs so/ ! /shis byed
<p>111b.3</p>loT+ra la/ le D+hu/ lI D+hAM/ li han+tu sogs dang / ! de ring ma yin pa lang la/ a leT+ra/ a lI D+ha/ alI hanra sogs so/ ! /bi A dra sngon ma'i tsa k+Sha gsal bar brjod pa la/ skor d+yo sh+tsa so ka sogs kyi yang ngo / dz+ha sa sor bsdu ba'i
<p>111b.4</p>yi ge pha rol la la byings mtha' sra yig dang kra yi ga sogs brtsegs pa yod na'ang sra ku mtha' med dbye bar bya ste/ Sha sar 'og de phyiras pa bkra yang Shar log/ Sh+Tu la sogs kyis bsgrub pas/ byA tsa Sh+Te/ byA tsa k+ShA te/ byAtsa k+Sha te/ bya tsak+She/ byA tsa k+ShA the/ byA tsa g+ng+h+we/ byA tsa k+She/
<p>111b.5</p>byA tsa k+Shahe/ bya tsa k+She he/ ! chos 'byung ling la/ byA tsa k+Shi ta/ bya tsa k+Shi ta/ byA tsa k+ShI yAtAM/ byA tsa k+ShI yA tAM/ byAtsa k+Shi ranra sogs dang / ! shis byed leT la/ byA tsa Sh+TAM/ byA tsa k+ShA tAM/ bya tsa k+Sha taM sogs so ! tsakA sr-i gnang byed la/ de ring ma yin pa lang la/ a byA tsa Sh+ta/ a bya tsa k+Sha ta/ a bya
<p>111b.6</p>tsa k+ShaH sogs so/ ! /o la s+ji ngo tshab la/ an+ya tra so dzaH gzhan du sa dzra'o/ gzhan du skabs la lar brtsegs pa'i sa yig mi dbyi bar ja ru 'gyur te/ sra dzrar bsgyur bas/ ladz+jar bsgyur bas/ la dz+ja te sogs so/ ! /tsa kA sra gnang byed la/ de ring ma yin pa la'ang gi skyes
<p>111b.7</p>bu dang po'i gcig la/ ! /di bis mya haHsi pi bA/ de pa las sa'i ta ste si pa la yang no'o/ /byings mtha'i sa yig ni rnam dbye di pra pha rol la ta yig tu 'gyur zhing si pra pha rol la'ang yang 'gyur te/ sra tra/ dpra phyis pas/ a tsa kA tra/ lhag bsam rnams la/ a tsa
<p>112a</p>
<p>112a.1</p>kAstAM/ a tsa kA suH a tsa kAH sib a tsa kAtra sogs so/ ! /Ang sngon ma'i khyA gtam gyi sbyor ba la/ laT  A khyA ti/ ling  A khyA yA tra/ loT  A khyA tu/ loT  A khyA tAtra/ lang  A khyA ta sogs so/ ! /mr-i dzu Sh+ra gtsang ba la/ mr-i dzeMr+b+r-ir+ng+hi pa ti
<p>112a.2</p>pa 'gro ba la mr-i dzi'i 'phel ba'o/ /rkyen pa 'gro ba pha rol la m-i dza'i u pa ng+hA ni 'phel bar 'gyur zhing nga 'gro ba'i ming can dbyangs dang po pha rol la 'dam ka can du bya ste/ mA r+Sh+Ti/ mr-iSh+TaH mA rdzan+ti/ mr-i dzan+ti sogs so/ ! /ni dzAM guNaH ni dza rnams kyi yon tan no/ / 
<p>112a.3</p>a pra bi kA ra Na 'jig pa las ni dza la sogs pa rnams kyi gnyis brjod pa'i dang po de yon tan du 'gyur te/ nyer bsgyur ni ra sngon ma'i Ni dzi dag byed la apra 'jeg /dzu ha sogs kyis gnyis brjod/ sngon ma'i ha sa dang po lhag po/ /ni dza sogs kyis sngon ma yon tan/ 
<p>112a.4</p>de nas pa 'gro ba rnams la yon tan byed pa sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/ nir+Ne nek+ti/ nir+Ne nik+haH ni r+Ne ni dza ti/ nir+Ne ni k+Shi sogs dang / a ba ne nik+te sogs te gnyis ka'i tshig can no/ ! /de bzhin du/ bi dzir+ra tha dad du gnas pa la/ be bek+ti/ be bik+taH be bi dza ti
<p>112a.5</p>sogs dang / ! biSh+l-i byab pa la/ pe pe Sh+rI/ bebesh+maH be pi Sha ti sogs so/ ! /bi A nga sngon ma'i pr-i srung nga dang gang ba la/ r-i prau riHpU rba s+ya/ sngon ma'i r-i pr-i dag gi i'o/ /a pra 'jig pa las byings gnyis brjod pa'i sngon ma'i r-i 'gro ba dang pr-i dag gi r-i
<p>112a.6</p>yig ni i ru 'gyur te/ ! /a pra 'jig /gnyis brjod/ r-i sngon ma i/ de nas pa 'gro ba la yon tan sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/ laT byA pi pa rti/ laT byA pi pra taH laT pyA pi pr-i ti/ ling byA pi pr-i yA tra/ loT byA pi partu/ loT byA pi pr-i tA tra sogs dang / r-i dang
<p>112a.7</p>pr-i las pha rol gyi rnam dbye dipra dang sipra la aT+ra Ag ma ster ba dang mi ster ba 'dam ka can du bshad pas/ byA pi pa ra tra/ dipa byA pi paH byA pi pa raH sipa byA pi paHsogs so/ ! /r-i 'gro ba la/ gnyis brjod/ r-i dang po i 'dra ba ma yin pa'i dbyangs pha rol
<p>112b</p>
<p>112b.1</p>la sngon pa'i i ni i y+ra zhes par bsgyur bar bshad pas/ i yarti/ i y+r-itaH i y+ra n+ti/ ling i y+r-i yAtra/ i yartu/ loT i y+r-i tAtra/ ai ya ratra/ aT dibra iyaHsogs so/ /iN+ra 'gro ba la/ e ti/ i taH yan+ti/ i yAta/ i
<p>112b.2</p>yAtAM/ iyuH/ ai tu/ i tAtra/ in+tu/ etra/ etAM/ A ya nra sogs dang / dngos po dang las kyi don la/ bzhi po la yakra 'os/ yakra byin/ ya la 'os ring por bsgyur bas/ I ya te sogs dang / lkog gyur liT la/ I
<p>112b.3</p>yA la/ I yatuH I yuHsogs so/ /i Shu 'dod pa la/ lkog gyur liT+ra rnams sbyar/ gnyis brjod/ slar yang i phyi ma gnyis brjod pa sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/ i ye Sha/ I Sha tu/ I ShuHsogs so/ /ng+hA tU nA ma nan+ta twA tra bi shwAr+b+wa twAny+tsa
<p>112b.4</p>sarbathA/ a b+hi ng+hA tu ma sha kya mi t+yal mA khyA ta khyA pa ne/ de ltar byings rnams kyang ni mtha' yas nyid/ /sna tshogs don nyid kyang ni thams cad du/ /bying rnams 'di zhes mngon gsal mi nus kyang / /kun nas bshad pa rdzogs par bshad zin to/ /i ti swa ra swa sti
<p>112b.5</p>byA kA ra Na s+ya sU trA dA khyA ta pra kri ya sa mA p+tAH/ zhes pa brda sprod pa dbyangs can gyi mdo las kun nas bshad pa'i rab tu byed pa rnams rdzogs so// //de nas byings las ming du bsgrub pakr-i ta sogs kyi cho ga rnams bshad par bya ste/ ! /kr-it+ka rtari/ byed pa po la
<p>112b.6</p>kr-i tra'o/ /'chad 'gyur tri la sogs pa'i rkyen rnams la kr-i tra rkyen zhes bya la/ rkyen de rnams gtso bor byed pa'i don la 'jug pa shas che'o/ ! /tr-i bu Nau/ tr-i buNA dag go /byings las byed pa'i don gyi ming du bsgrub pa la rkyen tr-i dang buN dag 'gyur te/ ! Du ba tsaSha 'tshed pa
<p>112b.7</p>la tra/ tsu'i ku'os kar bsgyur bas/ pak+t+r-i zhes 'grub pa las/ de ni ming du 'grub pa yin la/ slar de tshig tu bsgrub pa'i phyir si sogs rnam dbye rnams ster dgos pa las cho ga rnams gong ming ler bshad pa ltar gyis bsgrubs pas/ si bak+tA/ 'tshod par byed/ 
<p>113a</p>
<p>113a.1</p>au pak+tarau/ dzas pak+ta raHsogs dang / de bzhin du/ si hang+tA/ si kartA sogs so/ ! /kr-i taH kr-i tra la'o/ /byings las pha rol gyi kr-i tra sogs kyi rkyen pas so sor bsdu ba'i yi ge dang po can la iT+ra A gam ster bar bya ste/ si b+ha 
<p>113a.2</p>bi tA/ si eng+hitA/ sogs so/ ! /u di tau bA/ U tra 'gro ba las yang na'o/ 'phrog byed/ byed pa/ byings U ta rjes 'brel 'gro ba las pha rol gyi kr-i tra sogs kyi rkyen pas dang po can la iT+ra yang na 'gyur te/ go pi tA/ gong+hA si sogs so/ /yod par byed/ 
<p>113a.3</p>'phel bar byed/ ! sa ha ba ho ro da bar+Na s+ya/ sa hra ba hra dag gi a yig ni o tra'o/ /byings sa hra dang bahra dag gi a yig ni rkyen tr-i pha rol la o ru 'gyur te/ sahra dang bahra la tr-i/ ha'i D+h+ra/ tatha dag gi ng+ha/ srung bar byed dam/ sbed par byed/ Sh+Du Sh+Du/ D+ha'i D+ha la phyis/ 
<p>113a.4</p>a or bsgyur bas/ so D+hA/ si boD+hA si sogs so/ ! /yu bo ra nA kau /yu bu dag gi a na a ka dag go /rkyen yu dang bu dag ni rim pa ltar a na dang a ka zhes par bsgyur bar bya ste/ pats+ra la buny+ra ny+ra 'gro ba la 'phel ba/ bu a kar+ra bsgyur bas/ bA tsa ka
<p>113a.5</p>zhes 'grub pa la rnam dbye rnams sbyar  thob par byed/ bas/ pA tsa kaH si pA tsa kau /pA tsa kAHsogs so/ /de bzhin du/ pA Tha kaH si kA ka raH si b+hA ba kaH si lA ba kaH si yA pa kaH si pA pa kaH si sogs so/ ! /nA myu pa ng+hAt+kaH nA mi'i u pa ng+hA las
<p>113a.6</p>ka'o/ /byings nA mi'i yi ge u pa d+hA can la smin par byed dam 'tshod par byed/ kr-iT+ra sogs ming du sgrub pa'i rkyen ka 'gyur te/ ! klog par byed/ byed do/ /yod par byed/ gcod par byed/ sre bar byed/ dag par byed/ k+Shi pa byed du 'jug pa la/ ka kra yig yon tan 'gog pa'i don/ 
<p>113a.7</p>k+Shi paH si byed du 'jug/ au k+ShipauH k+ShipAH dzas  sogs dang / de bzhin du/ b+hidaH si 'joms par byed/ tshi daH si  dum bur byed/ sogs so/ /byings dz+nyA khongs su chud pa la 'ang rkyen ka 'jug par bshad pas/ dz+hAH si shis par byed/ dz+nyo/ sau dz+nyAH dzas sogs so/ ! /pa tsi naM
<p>113b</p>
<p>113b.1</p>di gra hA di ra yu Ni na/ pa tsi na n+di gra hA sogs la a yu Ni ni'o/ /byings pa tsi sogs dang na ni sogs dang gra hA la sogs pa rnams la rim pa bzhin rkyen a dang Ni ni rnams 'gyur te/ a pa tsaH si a be daH si a ba daH si a de baHsi a si sebaHsogs
<p>113b.2</p>dang / ! sa nan+danraH si yu ra maNaHsi bu bA ma naHsi yu kra ma NaHsi arda naHsi yu marda naHsi sogs dang / ru sgra la/ yuN/ ! ror+Yu NaH ru la yu Na'o/ /byings ru la rkyen  'tshod par byed/ rig par byed/ rjod par byed/ rtse bar byed dam lha/ bsnyen par byed/ 
<p>113b.3</p>yuN 'gyur te/ N+ra dga' bar byed/ dga' bar byed dam rtsed mo byed/ 'phel ba'i don/ 'joms par byed/ rA baNaHsi sogs dang / ! gra hra laNi ni/ N+ra 'phel ba'i don/ na'i i brjod don/ si grA hI/ de bzhin du/ bi tsA rI/ si bi bA dI/ sili bihA ri sogs so/ ! /dr-ishAdeH 
<p>113b.4</p>shaH dr-ishra sogs la sha'o/ /byings dr-ishra sogs la kr-i tra sogs kyi rkyen sha 'jug go ! /shiti tsa turbatra/ sgra sgrogs par byed/ sha 'gro ba la bzhi po bzhin no/ /rkyen sha yig rjes 'brel 'gro ba pha  'dzin par byed/ rol las  rnam dpyod/ rnam par rjod par byed/ rnam par 'phrog par byed/ 
<p>113b.5</p>byings la kun nas bsgyur ba sogs byings thams cad pa bzhi po'i cho ga rnams 'jug ste/ ! /utra sngon ma'i dr-ishir+ralta ba la dr-isha pa sh+ya ru bsgyur sha de'i don/ ut+pa sh+yaH si de bzhin du/ ! ng+ha T+ra 'thung ba la/ sha ung+ng+hayaH si ! ng+h+ma sgra dang me kun nas sbyor ba la/ 
<p>113b.6</p>ung+ng+ha maH ! pA btung ba la/ sha ut+pibaH si ! g+h+radri snom ba la/ sha udz+nyig+haH si ! go sngon ma'i hanra 'tshe ba la/ sha go g+hA+oHsi ! Sh+ThA'agro ba las ldog pa la/ shin tu lta bar byed/ sha ut+tiSh+nyaHsi sogs so/ ! /dz+wa lA der+NaH shin tu 'thung bar byed/ dz+wa la sogs la Na'o/ /byings dz+wa
<p>113b.7</p>shin tu sgra sgrogs par byed/ shin tu 'thung bar byed/ la la sogs pa rnams la rkyen  shin tu dri snom par byed/ Na 'gyur te Na 'phel ba'i ba lang gsod par byed/ don/ ! dz+wa la 'bar ba la/ shin tu gnas par byed/ na dz+wA laHsi 'bar bar byed/ ! tab gdung ba la/ Na tA paHsi gdung par byed/ ! 
<p>114a</p>
<p>114a.1</p>pa thi 'gro ba la/ Na pAn+thaHsi! karle aN+ra/ las la a N+ra'o/ /byings las las dang sbyor ba'i byed pa'i don la a N+ra 'gyur te/ sia kum+b+haM kAraH/ si gran+thaM kAraH ! Ato DaH/ Atra laDa'o/ /byings Ata mtha' can las las dang sbyor ba'i byed pa la
<p>114a.2</p>rkyen Da 'gyur te/ Da yig Ti dbyi/ 'gro byed dam lam/ ba'i don/ Da dz+nyaHsi DapaHsi DaHsogs so/ ! /nAm+wI tsa/ ming la'ang ngo / /ming sngon na yod pa'i  bum pa byed/ glegs bam byed/ /byings la'ang Da rkyen du 'gyur te/ go sngon ma'i dA sbyin pa la/ Da go draHsi de bzhin du/ ng+hAnadaH 
<p>114a.3</p>Da dwi paH si Da dwi dzaH si Da gr-i has+thaHsi shu tsi gtsang sbra  shes ba/ 'thung ba/ sbyin pa/ la'o zhes pa'i byings sngon ma'i dru 'gro ba laDa Ti phyis pas/ shuca dra zhes gnas pa la/ ! shu tsaH shu dre/ shu tsa'i dra la shu'o/ /byings shu tsa ni ming dra pha rol la ba lang sbyin/ nor sbyin/ 
<p>114a.4</p>nyis 'thung / nyis skyos/ khyim gnas/ shU zhes par 'gyur te/ shutsa shU ru bsgyur bas/ shU drAH ! ur saHlo po mum+bA/ u rasra kyi dbyi zhing mumra yang na'o/ /Da rkyen can gyi ming dang sbyor ba la u rasra kyis dbyi zhing mumra Ag ma yang na ster te/ u ra gaH u
<p>114a.5</p>raMgaH ! bi hA ya so bi ha tsa/ bi hA ya sa'i bi ha'ang ngo / /Da rkyen can  gtsang sbra song ba ste dmangs rigs so/ /gyi ming dang sbyor ba la ming gi byings bi hA ya sa ni bi ha zhes par 'gyur zhing mumra Ag ma'ang yang na ster par bya ste/ bi haMgaH si bi hagaH Dasi ! brang 'gro ste sbrul/ 
<p>114a.6</p>aTau/ aT dag go /byings las sngon na ming yod cing ming de dang 'brel ba'i las dang sbyor ba'i byed pa'i don la rkyen a dang Ta dag 'gyur te/ as+thi sngon ma'i hr-inya 'phrog pa la a yon tan byas pas/ as+thiharaH asi shwA/ nam mkha' la 'gro/ de bzhin du/ ka ba tsa
<p>114a.7</p>ha raH a si k+Sha tr-i yaH a si b+ha raM haraH khur sogs so// asi ng+hanu ng+ha raHku mAraH gzhu 'dzin no gzhon nus/ sogs dang / ! tsar g.yo ba laT/ Ta yig mo rkyen I pa 'jug pa'i don/ Ta si ku ru tsa raH yul sgra ngan du spyod/ cus pa khyer ro khyis/ TaIpra ku  go cha phrogs so rgyal rigs kyis/ / 
<p>114b</p>
<p>114b.1</p>ru tsa rwi sogs so/ ! /i kha khi/ i kha khi'o/ /ming sngon ma'i byings las rkyen i dang kha dang khi rnams 'gyur te/ stam+pa sngon ma'i kr-i ny+ra byed pa la rkyen i/ stam+ba ka ri br-i hi/ de ba sngon ma'i a blaM khyab pa la/ de bA biHsogs so/ ! /khi ti pUrbapa das+ya/ 
<p>114b.2</p>yul sgra ngan du spyod ma/ kha 'gro bal sngon ma'i tshig gi'o/ /rkyen kha yig rjes 'brel 'gro ba pha rol la sngon ma'i tshig de la mumra A ga ma ster bar bya ste/ k+Sha ma sngon ma'i kr-i la/ 'bru 'debs par byed/ kha/ tshig sngon mar mumra A ga ma mra lhas khyab bo// gnas don/ u brjod don/ 
<p>114b.3</p>rkyen gyi khra yig de'i don yon tan byas pas/ k+She maM ka raH de bzhin du/ pr-i yaM ba daH At+maM b+ha raH u daraM b+ha riHsogs so/ ! /e dzAM kha shra /e dza rnams kyi kha shra'o/ /byings e dza la sogs pa rnams la rkyen kha shra 'gyur te/ dza na sngon ma'i e dzr-i 'dar ba la/ 
<p>114b.4</p>khashra /shra yig byings thams cad pa bzhi po'i bde bar byed/ cho ga 'jug pa'i don/ dga' ba'i gtam/ bdag nyid rgyas pa/ lto ba khangs pa/ khra mumra gyi don/ tsu ra sogs kyi nyi yon tan byas pas/ dza na me dza yaH pa N+Dita sngon ma'i ma nu shes pa la kha shra /dib sogs kyis ya bi kA ra Na mumra
<p>114b.5</p>ster ba sogs kyis/ paN+Di taMm n+yaHsogs so/ ! /khyuT+ra ka ra Ne/ byed pa la khyuT+ra'o/ /byings las byed pa'i don gyi ming ngu bsgrub pa la rkyen khyuT+ra 'gyur te/ a nag+maHnag+na kri ya  skye bo rnams 'dang par byed/ ta a ne na/ zhes pa'i don la/ nag+na sngon ma'i kr-i la/ khyuT+ra/ 
<p>114b.6</p>T+ra I pra kyi don/ khra mumra gyi don/ mkhas par shes/ yu a na ra bsgyur bas/ nag+naM ka ra NaM/ de bzhin du/ a s+thu laM s+thu laM kr-i ya te zhes pa'i don la/ s+thu laM kar Ni sogs so/ ! /b+ha dzI bi NA/ b+ha dza rnams kyi bi N+ra'o/ /byings  'di gcer bu min pa gcer bur byas so/ /b+ha dzra la sogs pa rnams
<p>114b.7</p>las byed pa po'i don la rkyen bi N+ra 'gyur te/ ar+ng+ha sngon ma'i b+ha dzra nyed pa la/ gcer bur rgyas so// biN+ra N+ra 'gro ba la 'phel ba/ N+ra yig de'i don  gar po min pa gar por byas so// yin pas phyis pas/ ar+ng+ha b+hAdzra/ bi zhes gnas pa la/ ! beHbi'i'o/ /rkyen bi ni dbyi bar bya pa nyid de/ bi
<p>115a</p>
<p>115a.1</p>phyis/ si tsu'i ku sogs kyis/ ar+ng+ha b+hA ka/ de bzhin tatwa sngon ma'i bra tsha dang b+hA ra sngon ma'i bahral/ tatwa prAT/ si b+hA ra bAT  si sogs so/ ! /bA ho trausha sA dau sA+e/ shasra sogs dbyangs la bahra'i ba au'o/ /tshig sngon ma a yig mtha'
<p>115a.2</p>can las pha rol gyi bahra'i ba yig ni rnam dbye shasra sogs  phyed mar byas so/ /dbyangs dang po can pha rol la au ru 'gyur te/ b+hA ra  de kho na nyid 'dri bar byed/ khur skyed de bur bu/ bA hra la/ shas/ bA auru bsgyur bas/ b+hArauhaHsogs so/ ! /sa heHShaHsAD+hi/ saha'i sAD+h+ra la Sha'ang ngo / 
<p>115a.3</p>rkyen biN+ra pha rol la byings sa hra ni sAD+h+ra zhes par 'gyur ba'i sa yig ni Sha yig tu 'gyur te/ turA sngon ma'i sa hra lhan cig la/ pi N+ra 'phel ba/ hra D+h+ra/ bi phyis sa Sha ra bsgyur bas/ tu rA ShAT+ra/ si tu rAsAhauM sogs so/ ! /mo no ng+hAtaH byings kyi ma'i na'o/ /byings mtha'i
<p>115a.4</p>ma yig ni rkyen rab so sor bsdu ba'i yi ge pha rol dang tshig mtha' las kyang na yig tu 'gyur te/ pra sngon ma'i sha mu dang da mu nye bar zhi ba la/ biN+ra 'phel ba/ pi phyis/ ra sa la nar  lhan cig mgyogs/ bsgyur ba sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/ pra shA nra/ pra shA mau/ pra dA nra/ 
<p>115a.5</p>pra dA mau sogs so/ ! /a b+hU tang+b+ha bikr-i b+ha ste yo ge tsiH byung ba ma yin pa las kr-i b+hU a sra sbyor ba la cwi'o/ /byung nas yun ring 'das pa'i don ma yin pa'i sar byung gi don la kr-i b+hU as sbyor ba la bar rkyen tswi 'gyur ro/ ! /tswau dIr+g+ha Ish+tsA s+ya/ rab tu zhi ba'am rab tu dul/ tswi la
<p>115a.6</p>ring po ste a'i yang I'o/ /rkyen tswi pha rol la byings dang ming gi mtha'i dbyangs thung ngu ni ring por 'gyur zhing mtha' a yig yin na a de I ru yang 'gyur te/ a mi thu naM mi thu naM kr-i ya te a ne na zhes pa'i don la/ mi thu na dang ka ra Na'i bar du rkyen tswi/ ts+ra yig tswi la ring po
<p>115a.7</p>sogs kyi don/ bi'i 'os bi phyis/ a I ru bsgyur bas/ mi thu nI  mi 'khrig pa las 'khrig par byed/ ka ra NaM sogs dang / de bzhin du b+hU dang sbyor ba la/ a shuklaHshuklaHb+ha  mi 'khrig pa las 'khrig par byed/ ba ti zhes pa'i don la/ dkar po min pa dkar bor song / shuklI b+hA
<p>115b</p>
<p>115b.1</p>baHsogs dang / asra dang sbyor ba la as hA yaHsa hA yob+ha ba ti zhes pa'i don la/ sa hA yI tswi s+yAtra sogs dang / a he tuHhetuHkr-i taM zhes pa'i don las he tU kr-i ta sogs so/ ! /tswau sa lo pash+tsa/ tswi las dbyi ba'ang ngo / /gsar byung gi rkyen tswi pha rol la sngon ma'i mtha' sa
<p>115b.2</p>yig yin na dbye bar bya ste/ utra sngon ma'i ma nasra la tswi sra phyis lhan cig ma yin pa lhan cig par gyur to/ /a I ru bsgyur bas/ un+ma nI b+hA baH rgyu med pa la rgyu byas so/ /yang skabs la lar tswi'i don la rkyen DA ster bar bshad de/ duHkhA ka ro ti/ b+ha drA ka ro ti sogs so/ ! /A te 
<p>115b.3</p>ma ni pra kwa ni pra ba ni baH A tra la ma ni pra kwa ni bra kwa ni pra ba ni pra'o/ /byings Atra mtha' can la ming du sgrub pa'i rkyen ma ni pra dang kwa  skyo bar gyur to/ /ni pra dang pa ni pra rnams 'gyur te/ su sngon ma'i dA la ma ni pra pra rjes 'brel i brjod don/ sdug bsngal bar byed/ su dA manra zhes
<p>115b.4</p>'grub pa la rnam dbye sbyor ba'i cho ga gong rA dza na ltar bsgrubs pas/ su dA mA sogs so/ ! /s+thA mI/ s+thA rnams kyi I'o/ /byings s+thA gApA rnams kyi mtha'i a yig ni kwipra ma yin pa'i rkyen kra 'gro ba'i ming can pha rol la I ru 'gyur te/ su sngon ma'i s+thA dang pA la kwa ni kra pra
<p>115b.5</p>pra rjes 'brel/ na'i i brjod don/ kra yig kra 'gro ba'i khyad don/ legs pa'i sbyin pa byin/ A I ru bsgyur bas/ su s+thI bA/ si su pI bI sogs dang / dA la/ ba ni pra/ pra rjes 'brel/ na'i i brjod don/ b+hU mI sngon/ b+hU mI dA bA/ skabs la lar A yig
<p>115b.6</p>mtha' can ma yin pa la'ang ma ni pra sogs 'jug ste/ /sukarmA/ si su sharmA sogs so/ ! /kwi paHkwi pra'o/ legs par gnas/ legs par 'thung / /byings thams cad la ming du sgrub pa'i rkyen kwipra 'gyur te/ karma sngon ma'i kr-i la gzhi sbyin par byed/ kwi pra/ ! hra swas+ya di
<p>115b.7</p>ti kr-i ti tu kra /thung ngu'i kr-i ta kyi pra 'gro ba la tukra'o/ /legs pa'i las/ legs par thos/ byings mtha' thung ngu la kr-i tra sogs kyi rkyen pra yig 'gro ba'i ming can las tukra A ga ma ster bar bya ste/ tu kra A ga ma byin/ kra gnas don/ u brjod don/ karma kr-i tra/ kwi pra ces
<p>116a</p>
<p>116a.1</p>gnas pa la/ ! kwipra/ kwipra'o/ /rkyen kwi pra ni yongs rdzogs dbyi bar bya ste/ kwipra phyis pas/ karma kr-itra/ de bzhin du/ ag+niM tsitra/ si de baM stu s+t+ri sogs so/ /thung ngu ma yin na tu kra A ga ma mi 'jug pas/ so ma pAHsi sarba dr-ika sogs so/ ! 
<p>116a.2</p>yang prats+tsha la sogs pa ni kwipra pha rol la ring por bsgyur bar bshad de/ ta twa prAT+ra/ si si su shrIH si bAkra sogs so/ ! /yang  las byed/ ma gsog go/ /lha la bstod do/ rkyen kwipra pha rol can gyi nahra 'ching ba las sngon ma'i nyer bsgyur gyi mtha'  zhib 'thung / thams cad mthong / 
<p>116a.3</p>ni ring por bsgyur bar bshad de/ u pa sngon ma'i nahra la kwi pra/ de kho na nyid 'dri/ legs pa'i grogs/ ngag/ pa ring po/ kwi pra phyis/ nahra'i ng+ha'os hrang+h+ra ru bsgyur ba sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/ u pA na tra sogs so/ ! /kwi pra pha rol la ng+h+yai la sogs pa ni sa pra sA raNar
<p>116a.4</p>bsgyur zhing de yang ring po kho nar 'gyur bar bshad de/ su sngon ma'i ng+h+yai sems pa la/ kwipra/ y+raai dang bcas pa I ru bsgyur/ kwipra phyis pas/ sung+hA+eHsogs so/ ! /dr-i sheSh+Takra sa kau tso pa mA ne  nye bar 'ching ste lham sgrog /kar+Ye/ nye bar 'jal ba'i bya ba la dr-i shra la Ta kra
<p>116a.5</p>sakra dag kyang ngo / /ne bar 'jal ba'i bya ba'i don la byings dr-ishra las rkyen Takra dang sa kra dang kwipa yang 'gyur te/ a n+ya sngon ma'i dr-i shu la rkyen de blo bzang ngam legs pa'i blo/ gsum sbyar/ ! A sarbAdeH sarba sogs kyi A'o/ /rkyen Takra dang sa kra dang kwipra rnams pha rol
<p>116a.6</p>can gyi sngon ma'i sarba la sogs pa rnams kyi Ti ni A ru 'gyur te/ a n+ya gyi Ti A ru bsgyur bas/ a n+yA dr-isha lngakra a n+yA dr-i k+ShaH a n+yA dr-i kra sogs dang / de bzhin du/ Takra tAdr-i shraH tA dr-ik+ShaH kwipra tAdr-i kra sogs so/ ! /ki mi da maHkwi shrau/ /kimra i damra dag gi kI
<p>116a.7</p>I shra dag go /rkyen Takra dang sakra dang kwipra rnams pha rol can gyi sngon ma'i kimra dang i damra gyi sgra ni rim pa ltar  gzhan dang 'dra bar ltos shig/ kI dang I shra dag tu 'gyur te/ kI dr-i shaH ci 'dra bar ltos shig/ de dang 'dra bar ltos shig/ kI dr-i k+ShaH sakra kI dr-ikra kwipra /I dr-i shaHTakra  'di 'dra bar ltos shig / 
<p>116b</p>
<p>116b.1</p>I dr-i kAH sakra I dr-ikra/ kIpra ! dr-i sha rkyen Ta kra la sogs pa'i mtha' can dang sbyor ba las b+habatra la sogs pa'i rnam par gnas pa'i don la Ti A ru 'gyur bar bshad de/ b+ha bA dr-i shaH Takra b+ha bA dr-i k+ShaH sakra b+hA bA dr-i kra sogs so/ ! /Ni ni ra tI te/ 'das pa la Ni ni lo/ / 
<p>116b.2</p>byings las 'das pa'i don dang de'i ngang tshul gyi don la rkyen Ni ni 'gyur te/ ag+niSh+To ma sngon ma'i yadzra la Ni ni N+ra 'phel ba'i don/ na'i i brjod don/ ag+niSh+Tom yA dzI/ si de bzhin du/ khyod dang 'dra bar shes/ pra brA dzI/ si si uSh+ma b+ho dzI sogs so/ ! /kwi pra ba ni pra DAH 
<p>116b.3</p>kwipra ba ni pra Da rnams so/ /byings las 'das pa'i don dang ngang tshul brjod pa a rkyen kwipra dang ba nipra dang Da rnams kyang 'gyur te/ br-i tA sngon ma'i hanra la  me'i sbyin sreg mchod zin/ kwipra/ br-i tA hA sogs dang / Shuny+ra  rab tu spong ba/ zas dron mo zos/ la/ ba ni bra pra 'gro ba la tukra A
<p>116b.4</p>ga ma byin pas/ su twA sogs dang / sa ra si sngon ma'i dzan dang sarba sngon ma'i gamra dang sA ma sngon ma'i gai dang sarba sngon ma'i dz+nyA rnams laDa/ Da 'gro ba la Ti phyis pas/ sa ra si dzaH lha min 'joms te brgya byin/ si sarba gaH si sA ma gaH si sarba dz+nyaHsogs so/ ! /k+ta k+ta ba tu/ 
<p>116b.5</p>k+ta k+ta ba tu'o/ /byings 'tsho ba rgyas/ las 'das pa'i don gyi dngos po'i don gyi byab la rkyen k+ta dang / 'das pa'i byed pa po'i don la k+ta ba tu 'gyur ing / rkyen de gnyis la niSh+Tha mtsho skyes/ zhes ming 'dogs kyang thams cad du 'gro/ snyan tshig 'don/ kun mkhyen nam thams cad mkhyen pa/ byed de/ 
<p>116b.6</p>kr-i la k+ta dang k+tab tu sbyar bas/ ka TaM kr-i taHsi ka TaM kr-i ta bA na/ si de bzhin du/ A ga taHsogs so/ ! /gat+yar+thA da karma kA ts+tsha karta rik+taH las med pa las 'gro ba'i don dang byed pa po la k+ta'o/ /byings las med pa la 'gro ba'i don dang / byings las bcas rnams la
<p>116b.7</p>byed pa po'i don la rkyen k+ta 'gyur te/ sngon rtswa las byad/ rtswa lhas byas zin/ s+thitaH gnas/ tshur shog/ shAn+taH zhi bar byed/ dAn+taHsogs so/ ! /k+to bA saT+ra/ iT+ra dang bcas pa'i k+ta la yang na'o/ /dmigs bas la med pa'i iT dang bcas pa'i k+ta ni kra 'gro ba'i ming can du byed pa dang
<p>117a</p>
<p>117a.1</p>mi byed pa 'dam ka can du bya ste/ pra sngon ma'i t+yu tra la k+ta iT+ra/ yon tan yang na bar byas pas/ pra d+yo titaH pra d+yu ti taH de bzhin du/ bad la k+ta/ kra 'gro ba'i phyogs la slar yang dag par bsgyur ba dang / kra 'gro ba ma yin pa'i phyogs la rang gnas
<p>117a.2</p>byas pas/ u di taH bdi taH/ ru de taH ro di taH muShitaH mo Shi taH graM hi taH gra hi taH nu di taH rab tu gsal bar byas/ bi de taHsogs so/ ! /ke taH ka 'gro ba la'o/ /byings ra yig mtha' can dang u yig mtha' can dang / shrI
<p>117a.3</p>rnams las pha rol  smra bar byed/ mchi ma 'dzag par byed/ gyi rkyen kra  rku bar byed/ 'gro  bzung bar gyur/ ba'i  byed du 'jug /ming can la iT+ra Ag /rig bar byed/ ma 'gyur ba ma yin te/ yu taH nu taH b+hU taH smr-i taH shrI taHsogs so/ ! /A dI di taH Atra
<p>117a.4</p>I tra 'gro ba la'o/ /byings mtha' Atra dang Itra 'gro ba las kyang pha ro gyi rkyen kra 'gro ba la iT+ra 'gyur ba ma yin no/ ! /nyI tAM takra brta mA ne nya pi/ nyi itra 'gro ba la da ltar ba la takra kyang ngo / /bsres so// ded do/ /byung ngo / /dran no/ /'byor bar gyur/ byings nye dang itra rjes 'brel
<p>117a.5</p>'gro ba la da ltar ba'i don la rkyen takra 'gyur zhing eT+ra yang ster ba ma yin no/ ! /dasta s+ya no dash+tsa/ da las ta'i na ste da'i yang ngo / /byings da yig mtha' can las pha rol gyi rkyen ta yig kra 'gro ba'i ming can ni na yig tu 'gyur zhing byings mtha'i da de yang na yig tu 'gyur te/ 
<p>117a.6</p>nyi mi dA snum pa'am bsres pa la/ nyi itra 'gro ba la zhes pas/ takra /nyi de'i don Atra itra 'gro ba la 'os/ iT+ra mi 'jug byings mtha'i A de'i don/ de las zhes pas/ tan/ da'ang nar bsgyur bas/ min+naM/ de bzhin du/ pra sngon ma'i nyi Sh+wa dA lus gshar ba
