<p>117a.7</p>la/ pra swan+naH rdul nag gi gsher/ nyi k+ShI dA phye mar 'thag pa la/ k+SheN+NaH phye mar 'thag/ sogs so/ ! /a do dza g+huHkaM ti/ atra kyi kra 'gro ba la dzag+hu'o/ byings ad ni rkyen ka 'gro ba'i ming can pha rol la  bsros so// dzag+h+ra zhes par 'gyur te/ ad za ba la takra /
<p>117b</p>
<p>117b.1</p>adra dza g+h+raru bsgyur/ ta tha dag gi ng+ha ra bsgyur ba sogs gyis/ dzag+b+haM/ ! raHra las so/ /byings ra yig mtha' can kyang pha rol gyi rkyen gyi ta yig kra 'gro ba'i ming can ni na yig tu 'gyur ti/ kr-iny+ra 'tshe ba la/ takra r-i i r+ra/ yab sogs kyi ring po/ tan Sha ra r-i
<p>117b.2</p>sogs kyis/ bikIr+NaM/ de bzhin du/ dzr-IShu dang dzr-IShu lang  sha za'o/ /tsho nyams pa la/ dzIr+NaM sha rI raM/ dz+tIr+NaM sha rI raM sogs so/ ! /lwAd+yo di taH lU sogs dang o tra 'gro ba las so/ /byings lU la sogs pa dang o yig 'gro ba las kyang pha rol gyi rkyen ta yig
<p>117b.3</p>kra 'gro ba'i rnam par bcom mo/ /ming can ni na yig tu 'gyur zhing byings mtha' i thung yin  lus rgas so lang tsho nyams pa/ na ring por 'gyur te/ lU gcod pa lak+ta/ ta nar bsgyur/ lUnaH de bzhin du/ ngUnya nye bar gdung pa la/ ngUnaH yang lU'i sogs khongs k+Shi zad pa
<p>117b.4</p>dang nges par rtogs pa la'o zhes pa'i byings las pha rol gyi ta yig ni nges par rtogs pa'i don la nar bsgyur zhing zad pa'i don la ta rang du gnas par bshad de/ k+ShInaH k+ShitaH gcod par byed/ glai dang m+lai lak+ta/ mtshams sbyor gyi yi ge /gdung bar byed/ A/ lU sogs kyis ta
<p>117b.5</p>nar bsgyur bas/ glAnaH m+mAnaHsogs dang / ohA kra gtong ba la k+ta/ hInaH yang rkyen ta yig kra 'gro ba pha rol la byings o pyA yi rgas pa la'o  nges par rtogs/ zad par byed/ zhes pa ni pI zhes par 'gyur bar bshad pas/ pInaH ! dod t+ti/ ta la dA'i da'o/ /rkyen ta
<p>117b.6</p>yig kri 'gro ba'i ming mi dga' ba/ can pha rol la byings Du dAny+ra ni da dra ces par 'gyur nyams pa/ te/ dat+h+raH k+ta dat+tabAn/ k+ta btu/ ! swa rAn+to bA/ dbyangs las ta yang na'o/ /nyer bsgyur dbyangs mtha' can sngon ma'i dwa ny+ra ni rkyen rgan po'am rtsub po/ /ta yig ka 'gro ba'i ming can
<p>117b.7</p>pha rol la da dra du bsgyur ba dang dra zhes par bsgyur ba 'dam ka can du bya ste/ prad t+taD+haH rab tu byin/ pra t+taH byin/ sbyin pa byed/ a ba da tAH kun tu byin/ a bat+taHsogs so/ /yadzra la k+ta dang k+ta ba tu/ saM pra sA ra Nar bsgyur bas/ iSh+TaM/ lha mchod do/ /iSh+Ta bAn/ lha mchod par byed/ 
<p>118a</p>
<p>118a.1</p>de bzhin du Tu babra la/ up+taM/ ba ha la/ UD+haH A sngon ma'ihA ny+ral/ A hU taH saM sngon ma'i byeny+ra la/ sam+bI taH bad la/ u ditaH bats+ra la/ uk+taM/ ! bsik+Shung+ho riTu/ bsak+Shung+h+ra dag la iT+ra'o/ /byings pas dang k+Shung+ha dag las pha
<p>118a.2</p>rol gyi k+ta la iT+ra ster bar bya ste/ uShi tuH sa bon btab/ k+Shudi taH ! thob bo// g+hasA deHSha/ g+ha sra sogs kun nas drangs so// yang dag par g.yogs so// smras so// kyiSha'o/ /smras so'am brjod do// rkyen ta yig ka 'gro ba'i ming can pha rol la byings g+ha sra sogs kyi mtha'i sa
<p>118a.3</p>yig ni Sha yig tu 'gyur te/ g+haSh+TaH bkab po// sogs so// bkres so// ! trANA byA pA ni pat+yan+te/ trAN sogs ni ni bA ta yang na'o/ /rkyen k+ta pha rol la byings trai la sogs pa las ta nar bsgyur bas trAN sogs su byed pa ni pA ta dang yang na ta yig rang du gnas pa 'dam ka can du
<p>118a.4</p>bya ste/ drai srung ba la/ zas so// trANaH tAtaH de bzhin du/ hrI NaH hrI taH g+h+rA NaH g+h+rAtaH bin+naH bit+taH nun+naH nut+taH nirbAn+naH nirbAt+taH ! sam+parlu peb+h+yaHkaro ti b+hU Sha Ne suT+ra/ samra pa ri u pa rnams las kr-i la rgyan gyi don la suT+ra'o/ /nyer bsgyur samra
<p>118a.5</p>dang pa ri dang u pa rnams las pha rol gyi bsrungs so// byings kr-iny+ra la rgyan ngo cha/ snom byed de sna/ rig pa'am shes pa/ byed du 'jug gam gyis shig/ kun spangs sam myang 'das/ dang gzhan las phul du byung ba'i don la suT+ra A ga ma ster bar bya ste/ saMsgraM taH pa ri skraMtaH u bskr-itaHsogs
<p>118a.6</p>so/ ! /b+ha pe g+hanya dngos po la g+hany+ra'o/ /byings la dngos po'i don la rkyen g+hany+ra 'gyur te/ sam sngon ma'i kr-i ny+ra la g+ha ny+ra nya 'phel ba'i don/ g+h+ra khyad don/ suT+ra byin pas/ saMskAraH 'du byed dam legs byas/ ! dza nerdzA/ dzaMnra'i legs byas sam legs sbyar/ yongs su byed/ nye bar sbyor ba/ 
<p>118a.7</p>dzA'o/ /rkyen k+ta pha rol la byings dza nra'i dzA zhes par 'gyur te/ dzA taH skyes so// ! pa tserbAH pa tsa las ba'o/ /byings pa tsa las pha rol gyi rkyen k+ta ni ba zhes par 'gyur te/ pa kwaH tshos pa'am smin pa/ ! shuSheHkaH shuSha la ka'o/ /byings shuSha las pha rol gyi rkyen k+ta ni ka
<p>118b</p>
<p>118b.1</p>zhes par 'gyur te/ shuSh+kaH ! k+ShAde rmaHk+ShA sogs la ma'o/ /byings k+ShA la sogs pa las pha rol gyi rkyen k+ta ne ma zhes par 'gyur te/ k+Shai zad pa la/ k+ShA maH ! s+phA yaHs+phIH s+phA ya'i s+phI'o/ /rkyen k+ta pha rol la byings s+phA yi rgas pa la'o zhes pa ni s+phI
<p>118b.2</p>zhes par 'gyur te/ s+phItaH bskams so// ! kwa su kA nau Na be ba tra/ kwa su kA na dag Na pa e bzhin no/ /byings la kwa su dang kA na rkyen du 'gyur zhing rkyen de gnyis kyang zad byed/ don dang bya ba so kwa su ni lkog gyur gyi rnam dbye par smai pa da Na pra sogs dang 'dra la kA na ni At+ma ni ma
<p>118b.3</p>da i sogs dang  rgas so// 'dra ba nyid de bI dir gnyis su byed pa la/ kwa su ka yon tan 'gog pa'i don/ u num gyi don/ gnyis brjod pa sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/ bi b+hi dwA nra/ de bzhin du/ kr-i la tsa kr-i bA nra/ yang kr-i la kA na/ kra yon tan 'gog pa'i don/ 
<p>118b.4</p>gnyis brjod pa sogs kyis/ tsa krANaH de bzhin du ha nral/ dzag+hi bA nra/ kra su iT+ra si/ dza g+hA naH kAn/ sogs so/ ! /sha tr-i shA Shau ti bra te pa tra kri yA yAM/ byab la sha tr-i shA na dag ste tipra  'byed par byed/ de bzhin no/ /byings byas so/ / las bya ba'i don la rkyen sha tr-i dang shA na dag 'jug
<p>118b.5</p>la rkyen de gnyis kyi chog sogs  byas so// shatr-i ni brtam na'i par smai pad tipra 'tshe ba byas/ sogs dang 'dra zhing shA na ni At+ma ni pa da'i te sogs dang 'dra ba nyid de/ patsa la sha tr-i r-i nu ma gyi don/ sha khyad don/ patsa nra/ si de bzhin du/ pa Tha nra/ gai la/ gA yanra si sogs
<p>118b.6</p>so/ ! /mu gA ni nya taH An las atra la mu kra'o/ /rkyen An ste shA na pha rol la byings a yig mtha' can la mu kra A ga ma ster bar bya ste/ pa tsa/ shA na/ sha khyad don/ mu kra A ga ma byin pas/ 'tshed par byed/ pa tsa mA naH klog par byed/ de bzhin smra bar byed/ du/ pi
<p>118b.7</p>ba mA naH 'thung bar byed/ ya dza mA naH mchod par byed/ sogs so/ /yang mnal shA na/ ta nra sogs kyis u bi kA ra Na de pra ra bsgyur bas/ ma n+wA naH gus par byed/ sogs dang / ! A se rA naI/ Asra las A 'tshod par byed/ na'i I'o/ /byings Asra gnas pa las
<p>119a</p>
<p>119a.1</p>pha rol gyi rkyen A na'i A yig ni I ru 'gyur te/ A sInaH ! bA dI yoHsha tuH atra lasha tu ste Ipra la yang na'o/ /byings atra mtha' can la rkyen sha tu 'gyur zhing ming de mo rtags su byed na I pra pha rol las numra A ga ma star ba dang mi ster ba 'dam ka
<p>119a.2</p>can du bya ste/ tud la sha tu u dang shra phyis/ tud dra ces 'grub pa la  gnas par byed/ mo rkyen Ipra numra yang na bar byas pas/ tudan+tI/ tudatI sogs so/ ! /a bya yo rAn+'i t+yaM/ ata las a pra kyi a la rtag tu'o/ /byings a yig mtha' can a pra bi kA ra Na dang 'brel
<p>119a.3</p>ba'i sha tu'i rkyen can la mo rkyen I pra dang ma ning las  gdung ba/ dzas shas 'gyur ba'i i pha rol la numra rtag tu 'gyur te/ Ipra b+ha ban+tI/ ngas  b+ha  gdung bam/ ban+ti/ Ipra pa tsan+tI/ dzas patsan+ti sogs so/ /yang dibu rtsed mo dang sh+liSha dga' ba la/ dib sogs kyis ya bi kA ra Na/ shatu/ 
<p>119a.4</p>num sogs kyis/ Ipra dri byan+tI/ Ipra sh+liSh+yan+tI sogs so/ /byings dA sogs dang dzak+Sha sogs la sha tu rtag par 'jug kyang numra yod ma/ yod pa rnams/ mi ster bar  'tshed pa rnams/ bshad de/ dA lasha tud datra/ Ipra da da dI/ dzasra dad di/ de bzhin du/ dzak+Sha tra/ dzak+Sha tI/ 
<p>119a.5</p>dzasra dzak+Sha ti/ dzA grata/ si rtse bam/ dga' ba ma/ da ri dratra/ si tsa kA sata/ si si shA satra sogs so/ ! /bi derbAb suH bid sogs las bsu yang na'o/ /byings bid la sogs pa rnams las shatr-i'i yul la rkyen bsu sbyor sbyin pa/ sbyin ba ma/ sbyin pa rnams/ ba dang sha tr-i nyid sbyor  dgod pa/ dgod ba ma/ 
<p>119a.6</p>dgod ba rnams/ mel tshe byed/ ba yang na par bya ste/ dbul phongs/ 'od byed/ bstod pa byed/ bi dwAn/ bi danra/ ya ra atra b+ha ba ta dang ta tra b+ha ba tra dag mchod pa'i don la ni bA ta ste/ a trab+ha ban+to b+haT+Ta mishrA/ ta tra b+ha bang+b+hir+b+ha ga bat+pAngarba NitaM/ ! shI le tr-inra/ ngang tshul la tr-i nra'o/ /byings las ngang tshul brjod
<p>119a.7</p>pa'i don dang 'brel ba la rkyen tr-inra 'gyur te/ kr-i la tr-i nra/ yon tan nra khyad don si  rig ba can nam mkhas pa/ DA Tiphyis pas/ kartA+ai/ byed po'am byed pa'i ngang tshul/ 'dir yod pa ni rje bo gsal ba'o// der gnas ba'i bcom ldan gyi zhabs la bsngags so// de bzhin du/ ng+hartA/ si 'dzin pa'i ngang tshul/ hartA/ 'phrog pa'i ngang tshul/ 
<p>119b</p>
<p>119b.1</p>martA/ si b+hartA/ si ! i Sh+Nu snu k+nu/ i Sh+Nu snu k+nu rnams so/ /byings las ngang tshul dang 'brel ba'i don la rkyen iSh+Nu dang snu dang k+nu rnams kyang 'gyur te/ a laM ka rotI t+ye ba shI laH zhes pa'i don la/ a laM ka riSh+NuH de bzhin du/ b+ha dziSh+NuH yiSh+Nu gra siSh+NuH i Sh+Nu sa hiSh+NuH i Sh+Nusogs dang / 
<p>119b.2</p>'chi ba'i ngang tshul/ khrims 'jug/ b+hUSh+NuHsnu dziSh+NuHsnu sogs dang / gr-i ng+nuHsnu sogs so/ ! /ShA ko ka NaH ShA kau uka N+ra'o/ /byings las ngang tshul sogs kyi don la rkyen ShA 'di ltar tshul khrims kyis brgyan pa/ ka dang u dang u kaN gsal ba'i khrims/ bza' ba'i khrims/ bzod pa'i ngang tshul/ rnams kyang 'a 
<p>119b.3</p>gyur te/ ShA ka si ba rA kaH khrims yod/ rgyal ba'i ngang tshul/ Ipra ba rA kI 'dod pa'i ngang tshul/ sogs dang / bik+ShuH u sogs dang / u ka Na 'dir 'phel ba mi byed/ bi k+Shu kaH kA mu kaH u ka Na 'phel ba/ b+hA bu gaHsogs so/ ! /sA n+tA shaM sa yosh+tsa/ sa mtha' shaMs dag la u yang ngo / /'dod pa'i don gyi rkyen sa'i
<p>119b.4</p>mtha' can dang Ada? smad pa'i khrims/ sngon ma'i shaMsra dag /smad pa'i khrims/ la ngang tshul sogs kyi don  slong ba'i tshul khrims can te dge slong / ma yin pa la'ang rkyen 'dod pa'i tshul/ u 'gyur te/ yod pa'i tshul/ btsal/ bi bak+ShuH kr-il/ tsa kI r+ShuHsogs dang / A sngon ma'i shaM su bstod pa la/ yAshaM suH 
<p>119b.5</p>! na mA deH raH na ma sogs la ra'o/ /byings nam la sogs pa rnams la rkyen ra 'gyur te/ namraH hing+s+raH yashraH kamraHsogs so/ ! /g+ha sA deH k+ma raH g+has sogs lak+ma ra'o/ /byings g+has sogs las rkyen  smra 'dod/ k+mar 'gyur  byed 'dod/ te/ kra yon tan 'gog pa'i don/ kun tu bstod par 'dod/ 
<p>119b.6</p>g+ha smaraH sraM smaraHsogs so/ /tshi di b+hi di bi dAM ku raHtshi di b+hi di bi da rnams la kura'o/ / phyag 'tshal/ 'tshe ba'i ngang tshul/ grags pa'i ngang tshul/ mdzes pa'i ngang tshul/ byings tshi dir gnyis su byed pab+ti di ra 'joms pa bi da shes pa rnams las ngang tshul sogs kyi don la rkyen ku ra 'gyur te/ ka yon tan 'gog pa'i don/ tshi duraH 
<p>119b.7</p>za ba'i ngang tshul/ sbyor ba'i ngang tshul/ b+hiduraH 'jigs pa'i ngang tshul/ bi duraH shes pa'i tshul/ ! b+hA sA de r+g+hu raH b+husra sogs la g+hu ra'o/ /byings b+hAsra la sogs pa rnams la rkyen g+hu ra 'gyur te/ g+h+ra khyad par gyi don la/ b+hA suraH si 'od kyi ngang tshul/ b+haM gu raH 'joms pa'i ngang tshul/ sogs so/ ! /ya dra U  dum chung byed pa'i ngang tshul/ kaH 
<p>120a</p>
<p>120a.1</p>yang la U ka'o/ /byings phul du byung ba'i rkyen yang+ra gi mtha' can la ngang tshul sogs kyi don la rkyen Ukra 'gyur te/ yA ya dzu kaH da daM shu kaH bA ba du kaHsogs so/ ! A dr-i taHki r+d+wi sh+tsa b+hU te/ A tra r-i tra la byung zin la ki ste gnyis kyang ngo / /byings A ta dang r-itra kyi mtha' can
<p>120a.2</p>las byung zin gyi don dang 'brel ba'i ngang tshul sogs kyi don la rkyen ki 'gyur zhing byings de gnyis su'ang brjod par bya ste/ phul du byung ba'i mchod pa'i ngang tshul/ so phul du byung ba'i ngang tshul/ phul du byung ba'i skad kyi ngang tshul/ Atra mtha' la/ pa piHdadiHsogs dang / r-itra la/ tsakriH ba briH dza hriHsogs te/ ji skad du/ rA maHso
<p>120a.3</p>mamA pir+Ya dz+nye da di r+k+wa sh+tsa krir t+b+hu ta/ yA dza kAM ba bri rA dza hriHpuN+Dar ka ma hA dwi dzAnra/ dga' byed mchod sbyin la ni zhi ba 'thungs/ /ba yi sbyin pa rmad du byung ba byas/ /bka' yis mchod sbyin byed po bos te  'thungs zin pa'i tshul/ byin pa'i ngang tshul/ byas pa'i tshus/ smras pa'i tshul/ phrogs pa'i tshul/ 'ongs/ /gnyis
<p>120a.4</p>skyes chen bos pad dkar dus ston no/ ! /sA do NA da yaH uN+ral sogs pa ni rtag tu'o/ /byings la rkyen uN la sogs pa rnams ni 'das ma 'ongs da ltar ba sogs dus thams cad la rtag tu 'jug ste/ kr-i nya la/ u N+ra N+ra 'gro ba la 'phel ba byas pas/ kA ruH bA 'gro ba la/ uN+ra/ A tra la
<p>120a.5</p>yu ku A ga ma byin pas/ bA yuHsogs so/ /u Na'i sogs khongs rnams ni/ kru shasgra sgrog pa la/ tr-i/ yon tan Sh+Tu sogs kyis/ kroSh+TA/ a pra bsrung zhing skyong ba la/ rkyen mu kra ka 'gro ba la/ saM bra sA ra Nar bsgyur/ kra de'i don/ u brjod don/ mtshams sbyar byed pa po/ /bas oM zhes so/ /ang
<p>120a.6</p>bden par 'gro ba la rkyen rtag par 'gro ba ste rlung / ma ni Na/ Na 'phel ba'i don/ na'i i brjod don/ At+ma/ gr-i hi pr-i ng+hi la ma ni Na/ ! ma n+yu ce spyang / pang+h+ra ya r-i raH ma ni la u pa ng+hA'i r-i ra'o/ /rkyen ma ni pha rol las byings kyi u pa ng+hA'i r-i yig ni rar 'gyur te/ r-ir ra bsgyur bas/ bra h+ma/ bra ng+h+ma/ ng+h+r-i ny+ra 'dzin pa la rkyen ma
<p>120a.7</p>yon tan byas pas/ ng+harmaH 'chang par byed dam chos/ ! ng+h+wA de ru liH ng+hu sogs la u li'o/ /byings ng+hu bdag nyid/ sogs la u N+ra sogs kyi rkyen u le 'gyur te/ d+hU liH skyod par byed/ aM gi dang raM gi dang laMgi 'gro bal rkyen uli/ chen po dang 'phel ba dang grags shing grub pa dang tshangs ba dang tshangs pa dang srog can rnams la/ 'phel ba/ ang+gu 
<p>120b</p>
<p>120b.1</p>liH rang+guliH lang+guliH byings shas gnod pa sogs la rang bzhin gyi byab la u N+ra sogs kyi rkyen tra 'jug par bshad de/ shas+t+raH a su 'phen pa la/ as+t+raH pA srung ba la/ pA twaM/ Ni gsal ba la/ ne traH dA rdab la/ dA traM sogs so/ /Ang sngon ma'i gamra 'gro ba la rkyen Ni ni sbyar bas/ A 
<p>120b.2</p>cha shas sam yan lag /gA mI/ de bzhin du/ b+hU laNi ni/ p+hA bI sogs so/ ! /I shA de rbaraH I sha sogs la bar 'o/ /byings gnod byed de mtshon cha/ I sha la 'phen pa'i mtshon cha/ sogs snod dam 'dab ma/ pa la gsal byed de mig go /gcod byed/ uN+ra sogs kyi rkyen bar 'gyur te/ I shwa raH s+thA ba raHsogs so/ ! / 
<p>120b.3</p>rA dzA de ra nra/ rA dza sogs  tshur 'ong ba'i tshul/ a nra'o/ /bden pa'i khrims/ byings rA dzra sogs la u N+ra sogs kyi rkyen a nra 'gyur te/ rA dzA/ yu bA sogs so/ ! /i ma na trA skAH i ma nra tra a su kra'o/ /byings gang la'ang uN sogs kyi rkyenai manra dang tra dang a su ka?  dbang phyug/ brtan pa/ rnams 'gyur te/ 
<p>120b.4</p>i manra pa tsi mA/ tra/ pA traM/ a sukra/ te dzaH a sukra/ b+ho kaHsogs so/ ! /ba tsA der sra/ ba ca sogs la a sra'o/ /byings  gsal ba'am rgyal po/ lang tsho/ btsal sogs pa rnams la rkyen asra 'jug ste/ ba tsaH ma haH ta paH ! sau kar+Ye ke li maHmchog min gyi las la ke li ma'o/ /byings la mchog ma yin
<p>120b.5</p>pa'i las mchod pa/ snod/ ngan pa'i don  gzi brjid/ skyong ba/ la rkyen ke li ma 'gyur te/ b+hi dir la ke li ma/ ka yon tan 'gog pa'i don/ b+hi de li maM kaSh+ThaM/ de bzhin du/ pa tse li maM A D+ha kyaHsogs so// ! brjod pa/ mchod pa/ gdung ba/ shaM pra bi b+h+yo b+hu bo DuH shaM pra bi rnams las b+hU la Du'o/ /shaM dang pra dang pi
<p>120b.6</p>rnams las pha rol gyi b+hUl uN+ra sogs kyi rkyen Du 'gyur te/ D+ra Ti dbyi ba'i don/ shaM b+huH zhi ba thob/ pra b+huH khyab bdag /mnga' bdag /bi b+huH shing gshog ma legs pa/ cung zad btsos te gzhal/ ! yu ba ta gi b+h+yo ne pra/ yu bahra a gi rnams las ni pra'o/ /byings yu dang ba hra dang a gi rnams las uN+ra sogs kyi rkyen ni pra
<p>120b.7</p>'gyur te/ yo niH skye gnas/ bah+niH 'tshed cing 'gro ba/ ak+niH yan lag med par 'gro ba ste me/ ! i di ca di sha ki ru di b+h+yoraH i di ca di sha ki ru di rnams las ra'o/ /byings i di dbang phyug tsa di bsil ba sha ki nus pa ru di mchim 'dzag pa rnams las u N+ra la sogs pa'i rkyen ra 'gyur te/ ra sbyar/ i tra 'gro ba
<p>121a</p>
<p>121a.1</p>sogs kyi nu mra byin bas/ in+d+raH can+d+raH shaMkraH ru draH yang puSh+ra rgyas pa la rkyen pa dang la sbyar bas/ puSh+paH/ puSh+yaH pha la dang mU la rkyen a sbyar bas/ pha laM/ mU laM sogs so/ ! /u NA da yonya pa ri mi tAH u Na la sogs pa dpag tu med pa'o/ / 
<p>121a.2</p>'dir bshad pa rnams ni mtshon byed cam ste gzhan dpang po/ bsil byed de zlab/ nus pa/ drag po/ u Na la sogs pa'i rkyen ni dpag tu med pa yod do/ /me tog /de rnams ni u N+ra sogs khongs dang bcas pa 'bras bu/ rtsa ba/ mtshon byed tsam mo/ ! /tu ma ta da r+thA yaM b+ha bi Sh+ya ti/ 'byung 'gyur las de'i don la tu mra'o/ / 
<p>121a.3</p>byings las ma 'ongs pa 'byung 'gyur gyi de'i la rkyen tu ma? 'gyur ta/ b+ho k+tuM brA da ti/ pa Thi tu mi Sh+Te/ snA tu mi ha ta sogs so/ ! g+ha ny+ra b+hA be/ dngos po la g+ha ny+ra'o/ /dbyings las dngos po'i don brjod pa la rkyen g+ha ny+ra 'gyur te/ ! tsa dzoHka gau g+hi ti/ tsa dza dag gi g+ha 'gro ba la kag
<p>121a.4</p>dag go/ /byings mtha'i ca yig dang dza yig dag ni rkyen g+h+ra 'gro ba'i ming can pha rol la/ bzos nas 'gro /'dod pa ltar klog /khrus byas nas rtse'o/ /rim pa bzhin ka dang ga ru 'gyur te/ pa ts+ra la/ g+ha ny+ra/ u pa ng+hA 'phel ba ny+ra de'i don/ ts+ra kra g+h+ra yig de'i don/ bA kaHt+ya ja la/ t+yA gaH ya ja la/ yAgaHb+ha dza la/ b+hA gaH yu
<p>121a.5</p>dzi ru sbyor ba la/ yo ba/ i Na 'gro ba la/ nan+di sogs la yu 'os/ rkyen yu dang g+ha 'u 'dam ka can du byas pas/ a yanaM/ A yaH de bzhin du/ b+hUl/ b+ha ba naM/ b+hA baH dA dang pA la/ dAn/ dA ya/ g+ha nya A tra la yu kra A ga ma byin/ tshos pa'am smin pa/ byin can/ pA ni/ pA yaH mchod pa/ 'byed do// sogs
<p>121a.6</p>so/ ! /saM dz+nyA ya ma  rnal 'byor/ ka rta ri tsa byed po ma yin pa'i ming la'o/ /byings las byed po'i don ma yin pa'i dngos po dang las/ 'gro ba/ dang mid brjod pa/ bden pa'am yod pa/ la'ang rkyen g+ha ny+ra  sbyin bya/ 'gyur te/ pra ti dang A dra sngon ma'i hr-iny+ra la/ so sor bsdu ba/ bra t+yA hA  'thung bya/ g+ha nya A ta la yu kra a ga ma byin
<p>121a.7</p>raH ! swa rA da dbyangs las a'o/ /byings dbyangs kyi mtha' can las byed po'i don ma yin pa'i dngos po sogs kyi don la rkyen a 'gyur te/ saM sngon ma'i tsi ny+ra la a yin tan byas pas/ sa ny+tsa yaH sdud pa'am ba deb/ de bzhin du/ namaH thob pa/ sta ba bstod pa/ naraH 'dod pas rnam par g.yo ba ste mi/ sogs
<p>121b</p>
<p>121b.1</p>so/ ! /ma dAM/ mad rnams la'o/ /byings mad la sogs pa rnams la'ang byed po ma yin pa'i dngos po sogs kyi don la rkyen a 'gyur te/ ma dI rang ba la/ ma daH pra ma daH de bzhin du/ sha maH da maH de baH bi Sha yaH ! mU k+tau g+ha naH g+hanra las srab la'o/ /byings g+hanra las sa ba dang
<p>121b.2</p>yongs su gcog pa'i don dang 'grel ba la rkyen a 'gyur te/ da ng+he sngon ma'i hanra la a ha na g+ha nra ru bsgyur bas/ dang+hi g+hanaH de bzhin du/ sen+ng+ha bag+hanaHsogs so// ! yi rang ba/ rab tu myos pa/ zhi ba/ zhi ba/ 'di ni sna tshogs pas rtse byed de lha/ khyad par gyi 'chi dang / bar+Na bi pa r+Ya ya sh+tsa/ yi ge bsgyur ba la'ang ngo / / 
<p>121b.3</p>phul du byung ba'i don gyi yi ge phan tshul bsgyur ba la'ang rkyen a 'gyur te/ hing+sa 'tshe ba la a ha dang sra phan tshun no sra ba ste zho ga ra po/ bsgyur bas/ lan tshwa gcog go/ sing+haHsogs so/ ! /T+wi to thuH Tu 'gro ba las a thu'o/ /byings Tu yig rjes 'brel 'gro ba la dngos po sogs kyi don la rkyen a
<p>121b.4</p>thu 'gyur te/ Tu be sr-i g.yo ba dang Tu k+She pr-i lag pas 'phen pa la/ be ba thuH k+She pa thuHsogs so/ ! /D+wi das+t+ri ma kra ta t+k+r-i te/ Du 'gro ba las de 'das pa la tri ma kra'o/ /'tshe ba phul du byung ba ste seng ge /byings Du rjes 'brel 'gro ba las byings de 'das pa'i don brjod ba la rkyen tri makra 'gyur te/ Du kr-i ny+ra la/ 
<p>121b.5</p>kr-i tr-i mo g+ha TaH de bzhin du/ Du b+h+r-iny+ra la/ saM b+h+r-i tr-i mo yu ng+ng+haM/ Du pa ca Sh+ra  'dar ba/ 'phan pa/ la/ bak+h+re mi pha laM sogs so/ ! /naT+kI/ naT+ra ki dag go/ /byings las dngos po'i don la rkyen na Ta dang ki dag 'gyur te/ ya tI mchod pa la na T+ra/ yat+naH de bzhin du/ pra tsha dang bi tshu la na T+raH ! brats+tsha bits+tshoHsha ne/ 
<p>121b.6</p>bum pa byas/ prats+tsha pits+tsha dag gi na la sha'o/ /byings dmag tshogs 'khrugs so/ /bratsha dang bitsha dag gi cha yig /pas su smin no/ /ni rkyen ni pha rol la sha yig tu 'gyur te/ /prash+naH 'dri ba/ bish+naH khyab par 'gro ba ste g.yog /ya dza la na T+ra/ sa tu sogs kyi sdom brtson/ na nya/ ya dz+nyaH mched pa/ bi sngon ma'i ng+hA ny+ra 'dzin pa la ki/ 
<p>121b.7</p>a pra med pa sogs kyi A phyis/ ka rjes 'brel/ bing+hiH cho ga'am sems la 'dzin pa/ de bzhin du/ mtshams bzung ba Ang+hiH san+ng+hiH mtshams sbyor ram nyis sbrel/ na ng+hiH nges par 'dzin pa ste gtar/ ! yuT/ yuTa'o/ /byings las dngos po'i don la rkyen yuT+ra 'gyur te/ kr-i la/ ka ra NaM/ byed pa/ de bzhin du/ 
<p>122a</p>
<p>122a.1</p>ha ra NaM/ ha ba naM/ b+hU Sha NaM/ ba ha naM/ u tra sngon ma'i s+thA la yuT/ ! u das+thA des lo paH u tra las s+thA sogs kyis dbyi'o/ /nyer bsgyur utra sngon ma las byings s+thA la sogs pa'i sa yig ni rkyen yuT+ra pha rol la dbyi bar bya ste/ ut+thA ni/ de
<p>122a.2</p>bzhin du/ u tra/ 'phrog pa/ sbyin sreg /rgyan/ thob pa/ sngon ma'i staM b+ha la/ ut+ta m+b+ha naM sogs so/ ! /sA ng+ha nAM ng+hA ra yosh+tsa/ sgrub thabs dang rten dag la'ang ngo / /byings las sgrub thabs dang rten gyi don la'ang rkyen yuT+ra 'jug ste/ pa tsa la yuT+ra/ mes 'tshed/ pa tsa no nyag+niH steng gi gnas
<p>122a.3</p>pa canaHthA lI sogs so/ ! /I Sha duHsu Shu kha l+YU Ta/ I Sha duHsu rnams la khal+ra  steng gi ka ba/ yuT+ra'o/ /I Sha tra dang duHdang su rnams dang sbyor ba'i byings la rkyen khal dang yug dga' 'gyur te/ I Sha D+b+ha baHkal+ra  khal+ra  dur+b+ha baH su b+ha baHkhal+ra IShaT+ka raH khal+ra duHkaraH khal+ra 
<p>122a.4</p>gzhong bar bcos/ su ka raH yUT+ra I Sha d+yo ng+ha naH yUT dur+Ya ng+honaH su yo ng+ha naH yU  sogs so/ ! /ta byA nI yau/ ta bya A nI ya dag go/ /byings b+hU la sogs pa rnams la ma 'ongs pa'i dus brjod pa'i don la rkyen ta  cung zad yod/ sdug bsngal yod/ bde ba yod/ cung zad byed/ sdug bsngal byed/ bya dang
<p>122a.5</p>A nI ya dag 'gyur te/ bde ba byed/ cung zad 'thabs/ 'thab dka' ba/ bde bar 'thab/ b+ha bi ta byaM/ b+ha bA nI yaH A si ta byaM/ A sA nI yaM/ karta byaM/ ka rA NI ya/ gra hi ta byaM/ gra hA nI yaM sogs so/ ! /swa rA d+yaH dbyangs las ya'o/ /byings dbyangs mtha' can la rkyen ya 'gyur te/ k+She yaM/ dze yaM/ 
<p>122a.6</p>ne yaM sogs so/ /yang byings k+Shi dang dzi la ya sbyar ba'i k+Sha y+YaH zad nus/ dang  'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /gnas 'cha' bar 'gyur ro// rgyal nus/ dzay+YaHzhes  byed par 'gyur/ pa'ang nus 'dzin par 'gyur/ pa'i don tshig phrad du bshad do/ ! /pu sha kA tra/ pu sha ka las so/ /byings pa sde'i yi ge'i  zad bya/ rgyal bya/ 
<p>122a.7</p>thob bya/ mtha' can dang sha ka sogs la'ang rkyen ya 'gyur te/ la b+h+yaM/ thob pa/ ya b+h+yaM/ 'khrig pa/ dza byaM/ bzlas pa/ sha kya/ nus pa/ sa h+yaM/ dga' ba/ dang po'ang 'dod pa dang 'dzas pa/ ru c+ya sogs so/ ! /I tsA taH A tra las I'ang ngo / /byings A tra mtha' can la'ang rkyen ya 'gyur zhing ya pha rol la A ta de i
<p>122b</p>
<p>122b.1</p>yig tu'ang 'gyur te/ dA la ya A I yon tan byas pas/ de yaM/ de bzhin du/ dz+nye yaM/ pe yaM sogs so/ ! /r-i ha sA n+tA ng+g+h+ya Na/ r-i ha sa'i mtha' las g+h+yaN+ra'o/ /byings r-i yig dang ha sa'i mtha' can las dngos po sogs dang 'byung 'gyur gyi don la rkyen g+h+ya Na 'jug ste/ kA r+YaM/ bAr+YaM/ 
<p>122b.2</p>bA ng+h+yaM/ hA s+yaM/ ba tsa dang pa tsa la g+h+ra 'gro ba sogs  sbyin bya/ kyi yang tsa ka ra bsgyur  shes bya/ 'thung bya/ bas/ bAkyaM/ bA ts+yi/ pAkyaM/ pA ts+yaM sogs so/ /mchod pa'i don dang 'brel ba'i dngos po'i don la ta bya/ A nA+e ya/ kya bra g+h+ya N+ra ya rnams 'jug par bshad de/ las sgrig pa'am 'gabs
<p>122b.3</p>gsong por smra ba/ gar mo/ dr-i sha la ta bya dr-i sha sogs kyi r-i ra sha Sha/ Sh+Tu sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/ dra Sh+Ta byaM/ de smra ba'am ngag sbyor/ mchod pa/ bzhin du/ A nI ya la/ dar+shA nI yaH ya la/ dr-ish+yaH shrU thos pa la/ shro ta byaM/ shra ba NI yaM/ ma nra sha sa pa la/ maM ta byaM/ ma na nI yaHsogs
<p>122b.4</p>so/ /yang byings 'dod pa'i don gyi rkyen si'i mtha' can la'ang ta bya la sogs pa 'jug par bshad de/ bltas nas mchod/ ni di ng+h+yA si ta byaM/ bi dzi dz+nyA si ta byaM sogs so/ ! /o rA ba sh+ya ke/ bltas nas mchod/ u las lhag pa la'o/ /thos pa/ byings u yig mtha' can las lhag par shes gdang nges
<p>122b.5</p>par sogs kyi don la rkyen g+h+ya N+ra 'gyur zhing / o ta mtha' las rkyen ya la dbyangs kyi byab 'jug par  bar ma chad par bsam gtan 'dod pa/ bye brag tu shes par 'dod/ bshad de/ b+hU la/ b+hA byaM/ lU ny+ra la/ lA byaM sogs so/ /yang kr-i tra sogs kyi rkyen ta bya sogs kyi mtha' can dang sbyor ba'i
<p>122b.6</p>a ba sh+ya mra gyi mra dang / kA ma dang na ma sra dang sbyor ba'i tu mra gyi mra dag dbyi ba dang / hi ta dang ta tra gnyis dang sbyor ba'i nyer bsgyur sa mra gyi mra yig dang po tsa rkyen  los yod dam nges par yod/ nges par gcod/ yuT dang g+ha ny+ra'i mtha' can dang sbyor ba'i maM sa'i a dbyi ba dang mi dbyi ba 'dam ka
<p>122b.7</p>can du bshad de/ ji skad du/ lum+pa de ba bya maHkr-i t+ye tuM kA ma mra na so ra pi/ sa mo bA hi ta ta ta yo rmAM sa s+ya pa tsi yuT+g+ha nyoH/ kr-i tal la a ba sh+ya mra gyi mra dbyi zhing / /tu mra gyi yang ni kA ma ma na sra la/ /hi ta ta tra la sa mra gyi yang na ste/ mAM sa'i pa tsa yuT g+ha ny+ra la'o/ /zhes de dper
<p>123a</p>
<p>123a.1</p>mtshon na/ a ba sh+ya b+hA byaH b+ho k+tu kA maH shro tu ma nAH si hI taH sa hi taH saM ta taM/ sa ta traM/ mAM sa ba ca naM/ mAM spa ca naM/ mAM sa pA kaH mAM spA ka sogs so/ ! /r-i du ba ng+hA t+k+ya ba/ r-i u ba ng+hA las kya ba'o/ /byings r-i yig u pa ng+hA tsa na las dngos po dang las
<p>123a.2</p>kyi don la rkyen kya pra 'gyur te/ kr-i tI nges par bden nam yod/ longs spyod 'dod/ thos pa yid la byed/ grogs bzang po'am lhan cig pa/ de legs pa/ sha 'tshed par byed/ gcod pa la kya pra sha chos/ sbyar bas/ kr-i t+yaM/ yang Sh+Tu ny+ra sogs la'ang rkyen kya pra 'jug par bshad de/ /Sh+Tu ny+ra dang kr-i la kya pra
<p>123a.3</p>thung ngu sogs kyi pra 'gro ba tu kra byin pas/ stu t+yaM/ kr-i t+yaM sogs so/ ! /s+t+wa yAM ya dza ng+hA be/ ya dza rnams kyi dngos po la bud med la'o/ /byings ya dzu la sogs pa rnams las dngos po'i don la rkyen  gcad pa/ kya pra 'gyur zhing rtags de yang bud med kyi rtags su 'gyur ba nyid de/ pra sngon ma'i ya dza la
<p>123a.4</p>kya pra/ ya dzra sogs kyi bstod pa bya'o/ /slar yang dag par bsgyur/ bud med la Apra sbyar bas/ pre dz+yA/ de bzhin du samra sngon ma'i adzra 'gro ba la/ Apra  sa ma dz+yA/ brah+ma sngon ma'i ha nra la kya pra ta g+ha ka 'gro ba la a nu dA t+ta phyis/ thung ngu sogs kyis tu kra byin pas/ brah+ma g+ha ta sogs so/ ! / 
<p>123a.5</p>k+tiH k+ti'o/ /byings las dngos po sogs kyi don la'ang k+ti 'gyur ba'i de yang rang bzhin gyi mo rtags te/ rab tu mchod/ /b+hU tiH shung+ng+hiHbahra  U ng+hiHki  paMk+tiHpitsa  yang dag par 'gro ma/ bit+tiHsogs so/ ! /karta rik+te sh+tsa/ byed pa po la'ang k+ti'o/ /byings las byed pa po'i don la'ang tshangs 'joms/ rkyen
<p>123a.6</p>k+ti 'gyur te/ pra kr-i tiH pi ng+h-i ti sogs so/ ! /i ka? sh+ti pau ng+hA tu ni dza shaH i kra sh+ti pra dag las byings la rnam 'gyur  'byor ba/ dgab/ thob pa/ 'phreng ba/ med do/ /byings las rig pa/ dngos po sogs kyi don la rkyen ika? dang sh+tipra dag 'gyur la rkyen de gnyis pha rol las byings la rnam 'gyur
<p>123a.7</p>yang med de/ rang bzhin/ khyab par 'dzin pa/ pa tsa la/ ika? dang sh+tipa?/ sha? yig a pra bi kA ra Na'i don te/ ba tsiH 'tshed do/ /pa catiH 'ched bar byed/ sogs so/ ! /Shing+b+hi dA ma dra/ Sha 'gro ba dang b+hi dra rnams kye ang+ra ngo / /byings Sh+ra yig rjes 'brel 'gro ba rnams dang b+hi dra la sogs pa rnams las kyang rkyen ang+ra
<p>123b</p>
<p>123b.1</p>'gyur te/ A bra patsA/ A bra gr-i dzA/ b+hi dA/ A pra ts+tshi dA Abra sogs so/ /yang jar sogs la rkyen a ng+ra gi ng+ra yig med par a nyid sbyor bar bshad de/ dza rA sogs so/ ! /gu re rta sA tra/ lci ba'i ha sa las so/ /byings u pang+hA yi ge lci ba dang ldan pa'i ha sa'i mtha' can la'ang rkyen ang
<p>123b.2</p>'gyur te/ I hA/ 'chad ma/ dag ma/ 'jigs ma/ dum bur byed ma/ U hA/ I k+Sh+ra sogs so/ ! /pra t+ya yA n+tA tra/ rkyen mtha' las so/ /byings rkyen mtha' can  rgas pa/ las kyang rkyen a 'gyur zhing rtags de'ang mo rtags su bya ste/ tsi kI r+ShA/ pu trI yA sogs so/ ! /pu rba kA lek+t+wA/ sngon gyis dus la k+tA'o/ 
<p>123b.3</p>sngon byung rtsed mo byad/ ba'i 'das pa yun ring song ba dang 'das nas rtog par byed/ 'dod par byed/ yun ring ma song ba'i don la'ang rkyen k+t+wA 'gyur te/ snA twA b+huM k+te/ b+hu k+t+wA pra dza ti sogs so/ ! /a laM kha lwoHpra ti She ng+he k+t+ra/ a la kha lu dag /byed par 'dod/ bu 'dod dam/ las dgag pa la k+t+wA'o/ /mi zad pa'i nang tshan
<p>123b.4</p>a laM dang kha lu dgag pa'i don can sngon ma'i byings las kyang rkyen k+t+wA 'gyur te/ A lam+b+hU k+t+wA/ kha lU k+t+wA sogs so/ ! /k+t+wA seT+ra ki dwA/ khrus byas nas zas bza'/ bzos nas 'gro/ iT+ra dang bcas nga'i k+t+wA ka 'gro ba yang na'o/ /spyir rkyen g+t+wA ka 'gro ba yin kyang iT dang bcas pa'i k+t+wA ni ku 'gro ba'i ming can du
<p>123b.5</p>yang na par bya ste/ bi di twA/ be di twA sogs so/ ! /u di taHk+t+wA be tra/ u tra 'gro ba  mi zog /smra 'phro chod/ las k+t+wA ste iT yang na'o/ /byings utra rjes 'brel 'gro ba las kyang rkyen k+t+wA 'gyur zhing iT+ra A ga ma ster ba 'dam ka can du bya ste/ i Shu 'dod pa la/ i Shi twA/ iSh+Ta/ bsu nges par gnas
<p>123b.6</p>pa la/ u  rig go'am shes so/ /Shi twA/ u Sh+T+rA  nges par gnas/ sogs so/ ! /sa mA se kya pra/ bsdu ba la kya pra'o/ /byings las tshig sdud dang 'brel ba'i byed pa'i don la'ang rkyen kya pra 'gyur te/ saM b+h+r-i t+ya ka ro ti/ kun nas 'phel bar byed/ pra Na mya gats+tsha ti sogs so/ ! /yang kha cig tu na ny+ra sbyor ba la'ang  'dod pa nyid/ rkyen k+ta sbyor bar
<p>123b.7</p>bshad de/ a dzi twa/ a kr-i twA/ a dat+t+wA sogs te/ ji skad du/ a dzi twA shA tra bA r+sa rbA na kr-i twA bi ma laM ya shaH/ a dat+t+wA mi t+ta ma r+thi b+h+yaHka thaM dzI ban+te b+hU b+h+r-i taH/ dgra rnams kun las rgyal bar ma 'gyur bas/ /phyag btsal nas 'gro bar byed/ dri ma med pa'i grags ldan mi byed cing / don kun rig phyir sbyin
<p>124a</p>
<p>124a.1</p>pa mi gtong na/ /sa 'dzin 'tsho ba'i gtam yang med par 'gyur/ /zhes so/ /yang rkyen kyA pra pha rol las byings sngon ma de thung ngu yin pa'i bar rkyen nyi la yon tan byed par bshad de/ pa ri Na ma y+Yo b+hu k+te sogs so/ /yang dus dang 'brel pa la yang rkyen kya pra 'jug pa
<p>124a.2</p>mthong ste/ ne tre saM mI l+ya ha sa ti/ mi bra mu kha phyA ng+rAya swa pi ti sogs so/ ! /pau naHpu n+ye Na mapa daM dwi sh+tsa/ yang yang la Na ma ste tshig gnyis kyang ngo / /byings las bzang ngan sogs dbye ba ma  yongs su btud nas zas za/ yin pa'i mnyam pa'i don dang yang yang bskyar ba'i don 
<p>124a.3</p>mig rab tu btsums nas dgod/ la rkyen Na mra 'gyur  kha gdangs nas nyal/ zhing byings rkyen dang bcas pa de'ang gnyis su brjod par bya ste/ pA yaM pA yaM gats+tsha ti/ b+ho dzaM b+ho dzaM bra dza ti sogs so/ ! /ka tha mA di Shu swa r+the Na mra kri nyaH ka thaM la sogs pa rnams la kr-i na la sa rang don la Na mra'o/ / 
<p>124a.4</p>ka thi la sogs pa nye ba'i tshig tu yod pa la byings kr-inya las rang gi don la rkyenaNamra 'jug ste/ ka thaM kA raM/ i r+thaM kA raM sogs so// ! btungs shing btungs nas 'gro/ zos shing zos nas 'gro/ b+hu bo b+ha be kya pra/ b+hU las dngos po la kya pra'o/ /byings b+hU las dngos po'i don kho na brjod pa
<p>124a.5</p>la'ang rkyen kya pra 'gyur te/ brat+ma b+hU yaM ga taH ! lak+She rI muT+ra tsa/ lak+Sh+ra la I ste muT+ra gang ltar byed/ 'di ltar byed/ yang ngo / /byings lak+Sha mtshan nyid la rkyen I 'gyur zhing rkyen de la muT+ra A ga ma ster bar bya ste/ lak+Sh+mIH ! s+t+yA ya teHs+t+rI twe D+ra T+ra/ s+t+ye las bud med
<p>124a.6</p>nyid la D+ra T+ra'o/ /byings s+t+yai nya sgra  srog can du gyur pa'i 'gro ba/ dad mnyam par 'dres pa las bud med nyid brjod pa'i don la rkyen DaT 'gyur te/ Sh+T+yai laD+raT+ra/ Sha sa Ta ta/ D+ra 'gro ba la Ti phyis/ Ta 'gro ba sogs kyi mo rkyen I pra sbyar bas/ dpal lam phun sum tshogs pa'am bkra shis/ s+t+rI/ ! bar+NA t+kA raH yi ge las
<p>124a.7</p>kA ra 'o/ /yi ge so so'i mtha' las de dang de'i yi ge zhes rang bzhin brjod pa'i don la rkyen kA ra 'gyur te/ a kA raH a yig/ ka raH ka yig /tsa kA raH tsa yig /Ta kA raH Ta yig /ta kA raH ta yig /pa kA raH ba yig /sogs so/ ! /sgra ldan nam bde bar 'tsho ba ste bud med/ / 
<p>124b</p>
<p>124b.1</p>rA di po bA/ ra las i pha yang na'o/ /ra yig las de'i rang bzhin brjod pa'i don la i pha yang na 'gyur te/ re phaH ra kA raH ! lo kA ts+tshe Sha s+ya sing+ng+haH lhag ma 'jig rten las grub pa'o/ /sngon du bshad pa ltar brda sprod pa'i tshul gyi cho ga sogs nye bar mkho ba rnams bshad zin gyi/ 
<p>124b.2</p>'dir ma bshad pa'i lhag ma 'jig rten dang bstan bcos la grags shing grub pa rnams kyang de dag tu shes par bya'o/ /ra yig/ !i ti swa ra swa sti byA ka ra Na s+ya sU tr-I t+k+ra dA da yaHpra kri ya sa mA p+tAH/ zhes pa brda sprod pa dbyangs can gyi mdo las kr-i tra la sogs pa'i rab tu byab rnams
<p>124b.3</p>rdzogs so// ! //swa rU pA n+to nya nu b+hA t+yA diHshab+honya b+hA d+ya tra sAr+tha kaH /sa ma ska rI shu b+hAM tsa kre pra kri yAM tsa tu ro tsi tAM/ /thog mtha' rjes 'byor rang bzhin bzang po yis/ /'dir ni don bcas sgra la zhugs byas te/ /mtshungs par spyod ldan dge bar byed pa yis/ /rab
<p>124b.4</p>tu byab gsal ldan bshad zin to/ /a ba tA dwo ha ya grA+e baHka ma lA ka ra I shwa raH/ su rA su ran rA kA ram ng+hu pA pI ta paM ka dzaH/ /khyod la srung bar mdzod cig rta mgrin gyi/ /dbang gi mnga' sgyur phyag na pad+ma yis/ /lha dang lha min mi la phan par ni/ /sbrang rtsi 'thung
<p>124b.5</p>bas chu skyes bzhin du skyongs/ /de ltar ngag gi dbang phyug 'phags ma dbyangs can mas gnas lnga rig pa'i slob dpon chen po a nu b+hU te swa ru pA tsar+Ya ste rjes su 'byor ba rang bzhin bzang po la dngos su stsal pa'i brda sprod pa'i bstan bcos chen po dbyangs can byA ka ra Na zhes grags pa'i
<p>124b.6</p>gzhung / slob dpon chen po de nyid kyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa rab tu byab gsal ldan zhes pa dang bcas pa 'di yang / /lha dang bcas pa'i 'gro ba yongs kyi ma 'dris nga'i mdza' bshes chen po 'phags pa phyag na pad+ma nyid gdul bya'i snang dor gsum ldan rdo rje 'dzin pa'i skur bzhengs pa
<p>124b.7</p>don gyi slad du mtshan nas smos ta/ rgyal ba'i dbang po thams cad mkhyen pa chen po ngag dbang blo bzang rgya mtsho 'jigs med go cha thub bstan lang tsho'i sdes gzhung 'di la lha mthong lo tsA ba'i phyed 'gyur tsam gyi legs po zhig yod tshod du 'dug pa deng sang dpe rgyun dkon zhing phyis su bsgyur
<p>125a</p>
<p>125a.1</p>ba dang / yig sna kha shas 'dug kyang gzhung don go dka' ba dang slob dpon a nus mdzad pa'i 'grel pa'i dgongs don dang ma 'brel ba sogs 'ga' re 'dug pas/ khyod kyis paN+Di ta mched kyi gsung rgyun ltar 'di bzhin sgyur cig ces bka'i gnang
<p>125a.2</p>ba thob par brten/ rnam 'dren dam pa 'di nyid kyi gzhal du med pa'i bka' drin las 'phags yul nub phyogs ku ru k+Shetu bram ze'i rigs su 'khrungs pa gnas lnga rig pa'i ma hA paN+Di ta ba la b+ha dra dang / paN+Di ta go kU la nA tha mi shra mched kyi drung du gzhung 'grel 'di sogs brda
<p>125a.3</p>sprod pa'i rang lugs la sbyangs pas cung zad tsam shes pa bka' 'bangs kyi tha chung gtsang stod 'dar gyi nor 'dzin yangs par se'i rigs las skyes pa ngag dbang phun tshogs lhun grub bam/ tshe dbang rab brtan rdo rjer 'bod pa'i rmongs brtul snyom las pas/ 
<p>125a.4</p>me mkha' rgya mtsho la 'das lo drug cu skor bcu dang nyag sum cu rtsa brgyad bsre ba sna tshogs dbyig ces shing sbrul hor zla gsum pa'i dmar phyogs kyi dga' ba dang po'i gza' tshes dge bar mgo btsugs lo de'i hor zla dgu pa'i tshes bco lnga dkar po nam gru'i 'grub sbyor gyi dus
<p>125a.5</p>dge bar/ sde bzhi'i sgo 'phar cig car du phye ba'i phun tshogs lugs brgya'i 'dun sa chen po pho brang po ta lar bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o/ /tshul 'dir sgo gsum 'bad sogs rnam dkar 'bras/ /ji snyed mchis kun yongs su smin pa'i mthus/ /rigs kun khyab bdag don gyi thams
<p>125a.6</p>cad mkhyen/ /srid mtha'i bar du zhabs pad brtan pa dang / /sna mang brda sprod ring lugs chu gter che/ /bsrubs pa'i snying po legs bshad nyin byed 'dis/ /lnga rig bstan pa'i pad tshal cher rgyas shing / /rab rmongs blo yi mun pa sel bar shog /bdag sogs deng nas skye dang tshe rabs
<p>125a.7</p>su/ /mchog gsum ngo bo rdo rje slob dpon gyis/ /rjes bzung gsang chen zab mo'i lam zhugs te/ /zung 'jug bde ba chen po'i sa thob shog / 
<p>125b</p>
<p>126a</p>
<p>126a.1</p>@#/ /mngon brjod kyi bstan bcos 'chi ba med pa'i mdzod ces bya ba skad gnyis sbyar ba bzhugs so// / 
<p>126b</p>
<p>126b.1</p>@##/ /rgya gar skad du/ a ma ra ko Sha nA ma/ /na mo bud+d+hA ya/ ya s+ya dz+nyA na da pA sin+d+hor gA gting d+ha s+yA na g+ha gu naH/ a g+ta sdig pa'am skyon/ se ba bstan pa'am bsnyan pa se bya 
<p>126b.2</p>@##/ /bod skad du/ /'chi ba med pa'i mdzod ces bya ba/ sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gang gi gting mi rtogs pa mkhyen brtse yi/ /rgya mtsho skyon med yon tan mi zad pa/ /de ni dpal dang
<p>126b.3</p>tA ma k+Sha yo d+hI blo rA s+sa shri ye tsA mr-i tA ya tsa/ 1 ! /sa mA hr-i t+yA n+ya ta n+t+rA Ni saM k+Ship+taiH pra ti saMskr-i taiH/ /saM pUr+N+Na mu ts+ya te bar+g+ger+n+nA ma ling+gA
<p>126b.4</p>bdud rtsi'i ched du yang / /blo ldan rnams kyis bsten par bya ba yin/ /rgyud gzhan rnams ni bsdus byas nas/ /mdor bsdus legs sbyor sde rnams kyis/ /ming dang rtags ni rjes bstan pa/ /yang dag rdzogs par
<p>127a</p>
<p>127a.1</p>nu shA sa naM/ 2 ! /prA ya po rU pa b+he de na sA ha tsa rlA ts+tsa ku tra tsita/ /s+t+rI pun+na pu n+sa kaM dz+nye yan+ta dwe sha Sha bi d+heH kra tsi ta/ 3! /b+he dA khyA nA ya na dwaM dwo ne ka se Sho na sang+ka ra/ /'dres pa dang 'chol ba dang phyag dar/ / 
<p>127a.2</p>@#/ /brjod bar bya/ /phal cher gzugs kyi dbye ba dang / /la lar de khyad sgrub las dang / /kha cig lhan cig spyod las kyang / /pho mo ma ning shes par bya/ /tha dad rtags rnams ma brjod pa'i/ /dbye ba bshad pa'i ched du 'dir/ /zlas
<p>127a.3</p>kr-i to\u0f85tra b+hin+na ling+gA nA ma nuk+tA nAng+k+ra ma dr-i te/ 4 ! /tri ling+g+yA n+t+ri Sh+wi ti pa daM mi thu ne tu dwa yo ri ti/ /ni Shid+d+ha ling+gaM peShAr+thaM twan+tA thA di na pUr+b+ba b+hA ka/ 5 ! /swa ra bya ya
<p>127a.4</p>dbye byas min gcig lhag min/ /rim pa ma rtogs 'dres pa min/ /rtags gsum pa la gsum zhes tshig /gnyis la 'khrig ces rtags bkag pa/ /lhag ma'i don yin du mtha' dang / /a tha dang po snga cha min/ /lha gnas kyi spyi ming / mtho ris 'god med mi zad gnas
<p>127b</p>
<p>127b.1</p>swar+g+ga nA ka tri di ba tri da pA la yAH/ /su ra lo ko d+yo di po dwe s+t+ri yau klI be tri piSh+Ta ya/ 6 ! /a ma rA ni rdza rA de bA s+t+ri da sA bi bud+d+hAHsurAH/ /su parbA Nap+su ma na sas+t+ri di be pA di bau ka saH/ 7 ! /A di te yA di bi Sha do le khA
<p>127b.2</p>bzang dang / /bde ldan sum rtse skabs gsum gnas/ /lha yi 'jig rten rol sa mkha'/ /gnyis mo ma ning gzhi gsum pa/ /'chi med rgas med skabs gsum lha/ /rnam par sad dang bcud ldan dang / /tshigs bzang yid bzang sum rtsen dbang / /mtho ris snang byed mi sbyin bu/ /mkha' spyod legs
<p>127b.3</p>a di ti nan+da nAH/ skye med/ /A di t+yA r-i b+ha bonyaswa snA a mad+h+yA a mr-i tAn+d+ha saH/ 8 ! /bih+ni mu khAHkra tu b+hu dzo lha'i spyi ming / gIrbA NA dA na bA ra yaH/ /br-in+dA ra kA de ba tA ni pu si bA de ba tA s+t+ri yAM/ 9 ! /A di t+yA bi shwa ba sa bstu Shi tA b+hA swa rA Ni lAH/ / 
<p>127b.4</p>bris mi sbyin dga'/ /A di'i bu dang r-i yig bu/ /gnyid med mi 'chi bdud rtsi zas/ /me zhal dang ni mchod sbyin zas/ /tshig gi mda' can lha min dgra/ /tshogs bzang ba dang lha rnams nyid/ /skyes pa'am lha mo bud med la'o/ /nyi ma sna tshogs nor lha dang / /dga' ldan dang ni 'od gsal rlung / / 
<p>127b.5</p>ma hA rA dzi ka sA d+h+yAsh+tsa tu drA sh+tsa ga na de ba tAH/ 10 ! /bi d+yA d+ha ro nyap+sa ro yak+Sho rAk+Sha sa gan+d+ha r+b+ha kin+na rAH/ /pi shA tso gu h+ya kaH sid+d+ho b+hU te \u0f85mI de ba yo na yaH/ 11 ! /a su rA dai t+ya dai te  lha'i rigs kyi ya d+ha nu dzen+d+ra ri dA na pAH/ /shu kra shi Sh+yA di
<p>127b.6</p>phreng chen grub pa drag po ste/ /de rnams tshogs pa'i lha rnams so/ /rig 'dzin chu skyes gnod sbyin dang / /srin po dri za mi'am ci/ /sha za gsang ba grub pa dang / /'byung po 'di rnams lha las byung / /lha min gyi/ lha min sbyin skyes bcud mi ldan/ /gzhu skyes sbyin byung dbang po'i dgra/ /pa sangs slob ma sbyin
<p>128a</p>
<p>128a.1</p>ti shu tAH pUr+b+ba de bAHsu ra dwi ShaH/ /12@ /sarba dz+nyaHsu ga to shud+d+ho d+harma rA dzasta thA ga taH/ /sa man+ta b+ha dro b+ha ga bAn+mA ra dzil+lo ka dzi dz+dzi naH/ /Sha Da b+hi dz+nyo da sha ba lonyadwa ya pA dI bi nA ya
<p>128a.2</p>byed bu/ /sngon gyi lha dang lha la sdang / /sangs rgyas spyi'i/ ! /kun mkhyen bde gshegs sangs rgyas dang / /chos kyi rgyal po de bzhin gshegs/ /kun tu bzang po bcom ldan 'das/ /bdud 'dul rgyal ba 'jig rten 'dul/ /mngon shes drug ldan stobs bcu pa/ /gnyis med gsung ba
<p>128a.3</p>kaH/ su sta su tra shi shu bA la rnams bu'i byis pa/ /bye brag tu thub pa'i mu nIn+d+raHshrI g+ha na pA tA mu niHshAkya mu ni tu yaH/ /sa shAkya siM haHsar+b+bAr+tha sid+d+ha so d+hau da nish+tsa saH/ /gau ta mash+tsAr+k+ka ban+d+hu sh+tsa mA yA de bI su tash+tsa saH// ! //bra h+mAt+ma b+hUHsu ra dz+yeSh+ThaHpa ra meSh+ThI pi tA ma haH/ / 
<p>128a.4</p>rnam par 'dren/ /thub pa'i dbang po dpal stug dang / /ston pa thub pa nyid rnams so/ /shAkya thub dang don kun grub/ /shAkya seng+ge zas gtsang sras/ /gau ta ma dang nyi ma'i gnyen/ /lha mo sgyu 'phrul sras rnams so// !//tshangs pa bdag skyes lha las rgan/ /mchog la gnas dang mes po dang / / 
<p>128a.5</p>hi ra N+ya gar+b+ho lo ke shaHswa yaM b+hUsh+tsa tu rA Na naH/ /d+hA tAb+dza yo ni r+d+ru hi No bi riny+tsiH ka ma lA sa naH/ /sraSh+TA pra dzA sa tir+b+be d+hA bi d+hA tA bi swa sr-ig+bi d+hiH// ! //biSh+NurnA rA ya NaH kr-iSh+NA bai kuN+Tho biSh+TA ra shra bAH/ a shwad+tha thos 
<p>128a.6</p>gser gyi mngal dang 'jig rten dbang / /rang byung gdong bzhi 'dzin byed dang / /pad+ma'i skye gnas nyes can dang / /sna tshogs sgrub byed pad+ma'i gdan/ /sbyin byed skye dgu'i bdag po dang / /rig byed rnam byed sna tshogs byed// ! //khyab 'jug nag po sred med bu/ /rtul mo'i bu dang rna ba legs/ / 
<p>128b</p>
<p>128b.1</p>dA mo da ro hraM ShI ke shaHke sha bo mA d+ha baHswa b+hUH/ /dai t+yA ri puN+Da rI kA k+Sho go bin+do ga ru Da d+h+wa dzaH/ /pI tAm+ba ro \u0f85ts+yu ta sAM gI bi shwa k+se no dza nAr+d+ha naH/ /u pen+d+ra in+d+ra ba ra dzash+tsakra pA Nish+tsa tur+b+hu dzaH/ / 
<p>128b.2</p>dbang po'i dbang phyug me tog lto/ /skra can gsod dang sbrang rtsi'i bu/ /rang skyes sbyin dgra pad dkar mig /mkha' lding rgyal mtshan glang rdzir grags/ /mi 'dzag gos ser rwa gzhu can/ /sna tshogs sde dang 'gro ba 'joms/ /steng gi dbang po dbang gzhan skyes/ /lag pa bzhi pa 'khor lo'i lag / 
<p>128b.3</p>pad+ma nA b+ho ma d+hu ri purbA su de ba s+t+ri bi kra maH/ /de ba kI nan+da na sau riHshrI pa tiHpu ru Shot+ta maH/ /ba na mA lI ba li d+h+wa n+sI kaM sA rA ti ra d+ho \u0f85k+Sha dzaH/ /bi shwa b+ha raHkai Ta b+ha dzid+bi d+huHshrI bat+sa lany+tsha naH/ / 
<p>128b.4</p>pad+ma'i lte ba sbrang rtsi'i dgra/ /'dug gnas lha dang gom gsum gnon/ /lha mo dga' byed dpa' bo'i rgyud/ /dpal gyi bdag po skyes bu mchog /me tog phreng ldan stobs ldan 'joms/ 'khor ba'i dgra dang 'og dbang skyes/ /kun 'gengs lha min 'joms pa dang / /sdeb byed dpal gyi be 'us/ 
<p>128b.5</p>ba su de bo\u0f85s+ya dza na kaHsa e bA\u0f85na ka dun+du b+hiH/ /ba la b+ha draHpra lam+ba g+h+no ba la de bonyats+yu tA gra dzaH/ /re ba tI ra ma no rA maHkA ma bA lo ha lA yu d+haH/ /nI lAm+ba ro ro hi N+ye yastA lAM ko mu Sha lI ha lIH/ / 
<p>128b.6</p>mtshan/ /'di yi pha ni nor lha ste/ /rnga bo che ni a na ka/ /stobs bzangs dang ni rab 'phyang gsod/ /stobs lha mi 'dzag sngon skyes dang / /nam gru'i bdag po dga' byed dang / /'dod skyong gshol gyi mtshon cha dang / /gos sngon can dang snar ma'i bu/ /tA las mtshan dang gtun shing can/ /thong ldan
<p>129a</p>
<p>129a.1</p>sang+kaR+Sha NaHpI ra pA NiHkA lin+dI b+he da no ba luH// ! //ma da no man+ma tho mA ra prad+yun+mo mI na ke ta naH/ /kan+dar+p+yo dar+p+yo ko\u0f85naM ga kA ma pany+tsa sa raHsma raH/ /sham+ba rA rirma na si dzaHku su
<p>129a.2</p>legs 'gugs lag na gshol/ /klu 'joms dang ni stobs ldan no// ! //myos byed yid srubs bdud dang ni/ rab stobs nya yi tog can dang / /tshangs 'joms snyems byed lus med dang / /'dod pa dran pa mda' lnga pa/ /sdom pa'i dgra dang yid las skyes/ /me tog mda'
<p>129a.3</p>me Shu ra\u0f85na n+ya dzaH/ /puSh+pa d+han+wA ra ti pa tirma ka ra d+h+wa dza At+ma b+huH/ bdud kyi mngon brjod/ /pra h+ma sUr+thi shwa ke tuH s+yA da ni rud+d+ha u ShA pa tiH/ /khyab 'jug gi chung ma'i ming / lak+ShaM'i pad+mA la yA pad+mA ka ma lA shrI ha ri bri yAH/ ! / 
<p>129a.4</p>can gzhan ma skyes/ /me tog gzhu can dga' ma'i bdag /chu srin rgyal mtshan bdag las byung / /tshangs spong i dang 'gro ba'i tog /ma 'gags pa dang u Shi'i bdag/ mtshon byed de shrI dang 'dam pa'i che'o/ /pad+ma dang 'dam pa'i tshe ka ma lA chu rgyan du'o/ /dpal mo'i dpal gnas pad+mo can/ /chu rgyan dpal mo
<p>129a.5</p>khyab 'jug gi phyag mtshan gyi/ shaM kho lak+Sh+mI pa teH pAny+tsa dza nash+tsa kraM su daR+sha naH/ de yu bu ni Sha'i bdag/ tshangs spong ma 'gag sna tshogs tog/ /kau mo da kI gA nga khaD+go nan+da ka kostu b+ho ma NiH// ! //ga ru n+mAn ga
<p>129a.6</p>'phrog byed yum/! /dung can lnga skyes dpal mo'i bdag /'khor lo legs mthong can dang ni/ /kaustu b+ha sa rten par byed pa kIrti b+ha dza dang sa rengs par byed par ka ru Na shrI bsgyur ta g.yung drung ngam dga' ba 'khyil bar sngon lo tsA ba rnams kyis bsgyur bde'o/ /sa mos dbyug pa ral gri dang / /dga' byed sa rten nor bu'o//! //mkha' lding 'dab bzangs dug
<p>129b</p>
<p>129b.1</p>ru Da stA r+k+sho bai na te ya kha ge shwa raH/ /nA gAn ko biSh+Nu ra thaHsu par+N+NaHpan+na gA sa naH/ ! /sham+b+hu rI shaHpa shu pa tiHshi ba shU lI ma he shwa raH/ /I shwa ra sar+b+ba I shA na shaM ka rash+tsan+d+ra shi kha raH/ / 
<p>129b.2</p>'dzoms skar mig bu/ /'dul skyes mkha' 'gro'i dbang phyug dang / /khyab 'jug shing rta klu mthar byed/ /rkang mi 'gro za gser 'dab can// ! //bde 'byung dbang ldan phyugs bdag dang / /zhi ba mdung thogs dbang phyug che/ /dbang phyug gsod byed dbang dang ldan/ /bde byed gtsug na zla ba dang / / 
<p>129b.3</p>b+hU te shaHkhaN+Da pa ra shurgi rI sho gi ri so mr-i DaH/ /mr-i t+yUny+dza yaHkr-i ti bA sAHpi nA kI pra ma thA d+hi paH/ dbang phyug/ /u graHka par+d+hI shrI kaN+Thonya pa ti kaN+ThaHka pA la b+h+r-i taH/ /bA ma de bo ma hA de bo bi rU pAk+Sha s+t+ri 
<p>129b.4</p>'byung po'i dbang po dgra sta'i dum/ /ri dbang rir nyal tshim byed dang / /'chi ba las rgyal gzig gos can/ /skyo med gzhun dang rab 'joms bdag /drag shul ral can dpal mgrin dang / /mgul nag thong pa 'chang ba dang / /g.yon phyogs lha dang lha chen po/ /sna tshogs mig dang
<p>129b.5</p>lo tsa naH/ /kr-i pA nu re tA s+sar+b+ba dz+nyo d+hUrdza TirnI la lo hi taH/ /ha raHsma ra ha ro b+har+g+ga s+t+r+yam+ba kras+t+ri pu rA n+ta kaH/ /gaM gA d+ha ro\u0f85n+d+ha ka ri puHkra tu d+h+wan+sI br-i Sha d+h+wa dzaH/ /byo ma ke sho b+ha bo b+h+ri maH 
<p>129b.6</p>mig gsum pa/ /kun mkhyen me yi khu ba can/ /ral pa'i khur can sngon dmar can/ /'phrog byed dran 'joms 'joms byed dang / /spyan gsum grong khyer gsum mthar byed/ /gang+gA 'dzin dang long ba'i dgra /khyu mchog rgyal mtshan mchod sbyin 'joms/ /nam mkha'i skra can srid dang 'jigs/ / 
<p>130a</p>
<p>130a.1</p>s+thA Nu ru dra u mA pa tiH/ /ka par+d+do\u0f85s+ya dza TA dzU TaHpi nA go\u0f85dza gA baM d+ha nu/ /pra ma thAHs+yuHpA ri Sha dA brah+mA N+yA d+yA stu mA ta raH/ /bi b+hU tir+b+hu ti rai shwaR+Ya ma Ni mA di ka maSh+Ta d+hAH// ! //u mA
<p>130a.2</p>gnas can drag po u ma'i bdag /chus gang dag byed ral pa bcings/ /skyo med khyab dang sgra ldan gzhu/ /de yi 'khor ni rab 'joms dang / /tshangs ma la sogs ma mo rnams/ /khyab bdag khyab byed dbang phyug la/ /phra ba la sogs brgyad dang ldan// ! //dka' zlog
<p>130a.3</p>ka kA t+yA ya nI gau rI kA lI he ma ba tI shwa ra/ /shi bA b+ha bA nI ru drA NI shar+b+bA NI sar+b+ba maM ga lAH/ /a par+N+NA pAr+b+ba tI dur+g+gA mr-i DA nI tsaN+Di kAm+bi kAH// ! //bi nA ya ke bi g+h+na rA dza dwai mA tu ru ga Na d+ha pAH/ /a s+ye ka dan+ta he ram+ba lam+bo u ma'i ming
<p>130a.4</p>t+ya'i bu mo dang / /dkar mo nag mo gangs ldan ma/ /dbang mo zhi ma srid ma dang / /drag mo gsod ma kun la shis/ /ri skyes rdzong gnas lo ma med/ /tshim byed gtum mo 'gro ba'i ma// ! //log 'dren bgegs kyi rgyal po dang / /ma gnyis pa dang tshogs kyi bdag /mche ba gcig pa ha la gnas/ /lto ba
<p>130a.5</p>da ra ga dzA na nAH// ser skya ! //kArti ke yo ma hA se nas+sa ra dzan+mA Sha DA na naH/ /bar+b+ba tI naM da naHskan+daHse nA nI rag+ni b+hUrgu haH/ tshogs bdag gi ming / bA hu le yastA ra ka dzid+bi shA khaHshi khi bA ha naH/ /ShAN+mI tu raH shak+ti d+ha raHku mA raHkrony+tsa
<p>130a.6</p>'phyang dang glang po gdong // ! //gzhon nu smin drug gi bu'i ming / smin drug bu dang sde chen dang / /'dam bu'i tshal skyes gdong drug pa/ /ri skyes dga' byed skem byed dang / /sde dpon me skyes sbed byed dang / /mang po las skyes sgrol byed 'dul/ /gtsug phud can zhon sa ga skyes/ /ma drug pa dang mdung thogs dang / /gzhon nu dang ni khrung khrung
<p>130b</p>
<p>130b.1</p>dA ra NaH// ! //in+d+ro ma ru twAn+ma g+ha bA bi Do dzAH pA ka sA sa naH/ /br-id+d+hi shra bAH su nA shI raH pu tu hU taHpu raM da raH/ /dziSh+Nur+l+le khaR+Sha b+haH sha kra sha ta ma n+yurdi baspa tiH/ /sU trA mA go tra b+hid+ba dzrI bA sa bo
<p>130b.2</p>'joms// ! //dbang po lnga ldan mchod byed dang / /khyab stobs dang ni smin pa 'joms/ /rgan las nyan dang shis brjod nyan/ /gang po 'bod dang grong 'joms dang / /rgyal byed nus ldan legs bris gtso/ /mchod sbyin brgya pa mtho ris bdag /legs skyob ri 'joms rdo rje can/ /dbyig ldan
<p>130b.3</p>br-i tra hA bri ShAH/ brgya byin gyi ming / /bAsto Sh+pa tispu ra pa tirba lA rA tiHsha tsI pa tiH/ /dzam+b+ha b+he dI ha ri ha yaHswA rAT na mu tsi sU da naH/ /sang+k+ra n+da no dush+ts+ya ba na stu rA ShAT me g+ha bA ha naH/ /A khaN+Da laH 
<p>130b.4</p>'phel 'joms char 'bebs dang / /gnas kyi bdag po lha yi bdag /stobs ldan dgra dang bde sogs bdag /rmugs byed 'joms dang 'phrog byed rta/ /mtho ris rgyal po grol byed 'joms/ /yang dag rgyu dang bzod dkas rengs/ /gzhan snyems bzod dang sprin la zhon/ /kun 'joms mig stong
<p>130b.5</p>sa ha prAk+Sha r-i b+huk+ShA sta s+ya tu pri yAH/ /pu lo ma dzA sha tsIn+d+rANI nag rI twa ma ra ba tIH/ legs brjod zer/ /ha ya uts+tshaiHshra bAHsU to mA ta lir+n+nan+danaM ba naM/ /s+yAt+p+rA sA do bai dza yan+to dza yan+taHbA ka sA sa niH/ /ai rA ba te\u0f85b+h+ra mA taM ga ai rA ba NA b+h+ra mu
<p>130b.6</p>r-i yig skyes/ /de yi btsun mo spu gang skyes/ /bde sogs dang ni dbang mo'o/ /grong khyer 'chi ba med ldan te/ /rta ni mthor thos kha lo pa/ /mA ta li yin dga' byed ni/ /tshal te khang bzangs rnam rgyal byed/ /rgyal byed dang ni smin 'joms bu/ /sprin gyi glang pos srung bu/ /mtsho skyes dang ni chu 'dzin
<p>131a</p>
<p>131a.1</p>bal+la b+hAH/ /hrA di ni badzra ma s+t+rI s+yA ta ku li shaM b+hi du raM pa biH/ /sha ta ko TiHswa ruHshaM bo daM b+ho li ra sha ni r+d+wa yoH/ /byo ma yA naM bi mA nos+t+rI nA ra dA d+yA s+su raR+Sha yaH/ /s+yAt+su d+har+m+mA de ba sa b+hA pi yU Sha ma mr-i
<p>131a.2</p>@#/ /glang / /sgra sgrogs rdo rje mo ma yin/ /lag nyal 'bigs byed thog dang ni/ /rtse mo brgya ba sgra can bde/ /sgrogs zhum za byed gnyis dag go /mkha' theg mkha' gnas mo ma yin/ /lha yi drang srong me sbyin sogs/ /chos bzang lha yi mdun sa dang / /btung rnams bdud rtsi bde
<p>131a.3</p>taM su d+hAH/ /man+da ki nI bi yaM gaM gA swar+n+na dI su ra dIr+g+hi kAH/ /me ruHsu me ru he mA drI ran+ta sA nuHsu rA la yaH/ /pany+tsa te de ba ta ra bo man+dA raHpA ri dzA ta kaH/ /san+tA naHkalba br-ik+Sha sh+tsa puM si bA ha ri tsan+da naH/ / 
<p>131a.4</p>par 'thungs/ /chu bo dal 'bab mtho ris klung / /nam mkha'i gaM gA bcud rings so/ /lhun po ri rab gser gyi ri/ /rin chen brtsegs dang lha yi gnas/ /lnga po lha yi ljon shing ste/ /man+dA ra ba rgya mtsho skyes/ /legs khyab dang ni dpag bsam shing / /ha ri tsan+dan skyes pa yang / 
<p>131a.5</p>san+ta ku mA ro bai d+hA traH swarbai d+yA pa shwi nI su tauH/ /nA sa t+yA bA shwi nau da srA bA shwi ne yau tsa tA shu b+hauH/ /s+t+ri yAm+ba hu Sh+wap+sa ra saHswarbe sh+yA ur+b+ba sI mu khAH/ /hA hA hu hu sh+tsai ba mA d+yA gan+d+ha r+b+hAs+t+ri di bau ka sAM// ! pho rtags
<p>131a.6</p>tshangs pa'i gzhon nu rnam byed bu/ /mtho ris sman pa la rta'i bu/ /sna skyes tha skar skyes pa dang / /kun 'byed tha skar skyes gnyis dag /chu skyes mo ste mang po'o/ /mtho ris smad 'tshong dbang chen sogs/ /sbra ngan spangs dang dbyangs 'dems sogs/ /gnas skabs gsum na dri za'i glu 
<p>131b</p>
<p>131b.1</p>me'i mngon brjod/ ag+ni bai shwA na ro ba h+nirbI ti ho tro d+ha nany+dza yaH/ /kr-i pI Ta yo nir+dz+wa la no dzA ta be dAsta nu na pA taH/ /bar+hiHsuSh+mA kr-iSh+Na bar+t+mA sho tsiSh+ke sha u Sharbu d+haH/ /A shrA yA sho br-i haT+b+hA nuHkr-i pA nu pA ba ko\u0f85na laH/ /ro hi tA shwo bA yu
<p>131b.2</p>'khyog 'gro me dang rnyed za dang / /byin za nor las rgyal ba dang / /chu yi skye gnas 'bar ba can/ /skyes thob lus mi skyong ba dang / /shing 'phel skem byed lam nag dang / /'bar ba'i skra can snga dro sad/ /rten za 'od zer chen po dang / /chung byed smin byed 'tsho byed dang / /rta dmar rlung gi grogs po
<p>131b.3</p>sa khA shi khA bA nA shu shuk+Sha NiH/ /hi ra N+ya re ta hu ta b+hu g+ha ha no ha bya bA ha naH/ /sap+tA r+ts+tshirda mu nAHshu krash+tsi hra b+hA nu bi b+hA pa suH/ /shu tsi rap+pit+ta mor+b+ba stu bA Da bo ba Da bA na laH/ /bah+ne r+d+wa yor+dz+wA la kI lA brtsi r+he tiH 
<p>131b.4</p>dang / /gtsug phud can dang rtswa zan dang / /gser gyi thig le bsreg rdzas za/ /sreg byed mtshun gyis thob byed dang / /'od bdun nyer zhi mya ngan byed/ /sna tshogs 'od zer 'od nor can/ /dag byed chu mkhris brang skyes dang / /rgod ma skyes dang ma rta'i me/ /lha mchod gnyis so 'bar ba dang / /me lce yal
<p>131b.5</p>shi khAs+t+ri yaM/ /tri Shu spu liM go\u0f85g+ni ka NaHsaM tA paHsaM dz+wa rasas mauH// ! //d+har+m+ma rA dzAHpi tr-i pa tiHsa ma brtI pa re ta rATaH/ /kr-i tan+to ya mu nA b+h+rA tA sha ma no ya ma rAT ya maH/ /kA li
<p>131b.6</p>me 'bar ba dang / /nyal ldan 'di ni mo yin no/ /gsum rnams me stag me skar dang / /shin tu gdung ba tshang can mtshungs// ! //gshin rje'i ming / chos kyi rgyal po pha gshin bdag /mtshungs 'jug gshin gyi rgyal po dang / /mthar byed ya mun yi spun/ /zhi byed gshin rje gshin rje'i rgyal/ /grangs can dbyug
<p>132a</p>
<p>132a.1</p>daN+Da d+ha raHshrAd+d+ha de bo bai ba shwa ton+ta kaH// ! //rAk+Sha saH kau Na paHkra byAt+k+ra byA do\u0f85shra pa A sha raH/ /rA triny+tsa ro rA tri tsa raHkarbu ro ni ka ShAt+ma dzaH/ /yA tu d+ha naHpuN+ya dza no nair+R-i to yA tu
<p>132a.2</p>@#/ /'dzin mtshun gyi lha/ /nyi ma'i bu dang mthar byed do// ! //srin po ro zan sha rjen za/ /sha za khrag 'thung kun du rgyu/ /mtshan mo rgyu dang nam la spyod/ /sna tshogs mdog can gsod bdag skyes/ /'gro 'dzin bsod nams skye bo dang / /bden bral rjes
<p>132a.3</p>rak+Sha sIH// ! //pra tse tA ba ru NaHpA shI pA da sAm+ba ti rap+pa tiH/ srin po'i mngon brjod/ ! //shwa sa naHspaR+sha no ba yurmA ta ri shwA sa dA ga tiH/ /pr-i Sha da shwo gan+d+ha ba ho gan+d+ha bA hA ni lA shu gAH/ /sa mI ra mA ru ta ma rudz+dza gat+p+rA Na sa mI ra NAH/ / 
<p>132a.4</p>'jug srung ba pa// ! //mchog sems mchog sbyin zhags pa can/ /chu skyes bdag dang chu bdag go/ ! //dbugs 'byin reg ldan ma mos 'phel/ /rtag 'gro rta spre dri len dang / /dri bzhon rlung dang myur 'gro dang / /'gro byed rgyug byed yang dag rgyug /g.yo ba'i rang bzhin 'gro ba'i
<p>132a.5</p>na b+ha shwad+bA ta pa ba na pa ba chu lha'i ming / mA na pra b+hany+dza nAH/ /prA No\u0f85pA naHsa ma rlung lha'i ming / nash+tso dA na byA nau tsa bA ya baH/ /sha rI ras+thA i me ri hasta ra shI tu ra yaHs+ya daH/ /dza bo\u0f85tha shrI g+h+raM twa ri taM la g+hu k+Shi pra ma
<p>132a.6</p>srog /nam mkha'i bdag po 'gro ba pa/ /gang phyed gang ldan rab 'joms so/ /srog dang thur sel mnyam gnas dang / /gyen du rgyu dang khyab byed rlung / /'di rnams lus la gnas pa'o/ /skyong byed rgyug byed myur 'gro dang / /mgyogs 'gro shugs ldan de nas ni/ /myur mgyogs
<p>132b</p>
<p>132b.1</p>raM dru taM/ /sa twa raM tsa pa laM tU r+N+Na ma bi lam+bi ta mA shu tsaH/ /sa ta te \u0f85 nA ra tA shrAn+ta sa n+ta tA bi ra tA ni shaM/ /ni t+yA na ba ra tA dza shra ma s+ya thA ti sha yo b+ha baH/ /a ti be la b+h+ri shA t+yar+thA ti ma troT+g+hA D+haM
<p>132b.2</p>la gor skyen pa yud/ /cig car mi thogs de ma thag /skad cig mi 'gor dar tsam mo/ /kun tu rgyun du ngal med dang / /mtshams med bar med rgyun mi 'chad/ /rtag tu ltos med res 'ga' min/ /de nas phul phyin 'bad pa dang / /shin tu drag po te bor dang / /'bung bdo mthar byeng shin
<p>132b.3</p>ni r+b+ha raM/ /tI brai kAn+tA ni trAn+tA ni gA D+ha bA D+ha dr-i D+hA ni tsaH/ /klI be shI g+h+rA d+ya sa twa s+yAt+t+ri Sh+we ShAM b+he d+ya gA mi yataH// ! //ku be ra t+yam+ba ka sa kho yak+Sha rAT gu h+ya ke shwa raH/ /ma nu Sh+ye d+har+m+ma d+ha na do rA dza
<p>132b.4</p>tu gzhungs/ /nan tar nges par brtan pos kyang / /tsam med sri med nges 'bad dang / /sems med myur sogs ma ning ngo / /sems yod rnams la gsum kar 'byung // ! //lus ngan dang ni mig gsum grogs/ /gnod sbyin rgyal po gsang ba'i bdag /mi yi chos ldan nor sbyin dang / /rgyal po'i 
<p>132b.5</p>rA dzo d+ha nA d+hi paH/ kin+na re sho bai shra ba naHpau la s+t+ye na ra bA ha naH/ yak+Shai ka piM gai la bi la shrI da puN+ya dza ni shwa raH/ rnam sras kyi ming / /a s+yod+yA naM tsai tra ra thaM pu trastu na la kU ba raH/ /kai lA saH s+thA na ma la kA pUr+b+bi mA naM
<p>132b.6</p>rgyal po gter gyi bdag /mi'am ci dbang rnam thos bu/ /'od yangs tsha bo mi la zhon/ /mchod sbyin mig skya e la'i rgyud/ /dpal ster bsod nams skye bo'i dbang / /sna tshogs shing rta de yi tshal/ /bu ni dpal mos mtshan pa can/ /rtse ba'i gnas dang grong khyer ni/ / gzhal med khang / mkha' gnas me
<p>133a</p>
<p>133a.1</p>tu puSh+pa ki/ /s+yAt+kin+na raH kim+bu ru Sha stu raM ga ba da no ma yuH/ /ni d+hirnA se ba d+hi r+b+he dAHpad+ma shaM khA da yo ni d+hiH// ! //d+yo di bau dwai s+t+ri yA ba b+h+raM byo ma puSh+ka ra maM ba raM/ /na b+ho\u0f85dan+ta 
<p>133a.2</p>@#/ /tog can yin no/ /mi'am ci dang skyes bu'am ci/ /rta yi gdong can 'gro mgyogs so/ /gter dang mdzod kyi dbye ba la/ /pad can dung can la sogs gter// ! //lha rtsen rol gnas gnyis po mo/ /'gro med kun khyab rgyas byed dang / /sgra sgrogs mkha'
<p>133a.3</p>rI k+ShaM ga ga na ma nan+taM su ra bar+t+ma ra khaM/ /bi yad+biSh+Nu ba daM bA tu puM s+yA kA sha bi hA ya mIH/ /di shastu ka ku b+haH kASh+ThA A shAsh+tsa ha ri tash+tsa tAH/ nam mkha'i ming / brA ts+ya bA tsI pra tA+e ts+yastAHpUr+b+ba dak+Shi Na pash+tsi mAH/ / 
<p>133a.4</p>dang bar snang dang / /kun 'gro mtha' med lha lam gnam/ /mi g.yo ba dang khyab 'jug gnas/ /kun gsal rnam grol skyes bu'am/ /phyogs dang nyi ston gsal gnas dang / /kun khyab 'phrog byed nyid kyang ngo / /snga dro gung dang phyi dro phyogs/ /shar dang lho dang nub dang ni/ /byang gi
<p>133a.5</p>ut+ta rA di gu dI tsI s+yad+di sh+yan+tu tri Shu dik+b+ha beH/ /in+d+ro ba h+niH pi tra pa ti rnair+r-i to ba ru No ma ru taH/ /ku be ra I sha pa ta yaH pUr+b+bA dI nAM di shaM kra mAtaH// ! //ai rA ba taHpuN+Da rI ko bA ma naHku mu donyany+dza
<p>133a.6</p>phyogs ni steng yin no/ /phyogs rnams gsum pa rnams su 'gyur/ /dbang po me dang gshin rje bdag /bden bral chu dang rlung lha dang / /lus ngan dbang ldan bdag po rnams/ /shar phyogs la sogs rim bzhin gnas// ! //glang po'i ming / mtsho skyes pad dkar phyir log khrus/ /sa mos gsal byed
<p>133b</p>
<p>133b.1</p>naH/ /puSh+pa dan+taHsAr+b+ba b+hau maHsu pra tI kash+tsa dig+ga dzaH// ! //ka ri No \u0f85 b+h+ra muHka pi lA piM ga lA\u0f85nu pa mA kra mAta/ /tA mra gar+N+NI su b+ha dan+tI tsaM ga nA tsAny+dza nA ba tI/ /klI bA bya yaM twa pa di shan+di shor+m+ma d+h+ye bi di kas+t+ri yAM/ 
<p>133b.2</p>me tog so/ /sa kun la grags cha mdzes te/ /'di rnams phyogs kyi glang po'o// ! //glang mo chu 'dzin dmar ser dang / /ser skya dpe med rim pa las/ /zangs rnam dang so legs ma/ /yan lag mdzes dang gsal byed do/ /ma ning mi zad phyogs min rnams/ /phyogs dbus phyogs bral mo
<p>133b.3</p>a b+h+yan+ta raM twan+ta rA lany+tsakra bA lan+tu maN+Da laM// ! glang mo'i ming / //ab+b+ha m+me g+ho bA ri bA haH sta na yi t+nur+b+ba lA ha kaH/ /d+hA ra d+ha ro dza la d+ha rastaDi twAn+bA ri dom+bu b+h+r-i ta// ! //g+ha na dzI mU ta mu di ra dza la mug+d+hU ma yo na yaH/ / 
<p>133b.4</p>yi rtags/ /nang dang phyi rol min pa la/ /khor yug dang ni mu khyud can// ! //chu 'dzin chu 'bebs chu khur dang / /sgra sgrogs chu yi bzhon pa dang / /rgyun 'dzin rlan 'dzin glog can dang / /chu sbyin gsher 'dzin tsha zer 'joms// ! //chu rtsa dga' byed chu 'gyed dang / /du ba'i skye gnas chu skyar gnas/ / 
<p>133b.5</p>k+Sha daM bi nI me g+ha mA la tri Shu me g+ha m+ha beb+b+h+rI yaM/ sprin gyi ming / /sta ni taM gar+dz+dzi traM me g+ha ni r+g+ho She ra bi tA di tsa/ /saM pA sha ta hra da hrA di n+yai rA ba t+yaH k+Sha Na pra b+hA/ /ta Dit+sau dA ma nI bi d+yuts+tsa ny+tsa la char sprin gyi ming / tsa pa lA pi tsa/ /s+phurdza thu badzra
<p>133b.6</p>sprin gyi phreng ba zhes pa dang / /sprin skyes chu las byung ba gsum/ /'brug dang sgra chen sprin gyi sgra/ /sgra can nyid la sogs pa'o/ /bde 'thung dang ni sgra brgya pa/ /sgra 'gyed chu skyes skad cig 'od/ /glog dang rnam gsal 'khyug byed dang / /skyong byed sdod med nyid kyang ngo / /thog gi sgra dang rdo rje'i
<p>134a</p>
<p>134a.1</p>niSh+pe She ma g+ha dz+yo ti ri ram+ma daH/ /in+d+rA yu d+haM sha kra d+ha nu ta de pa r-i dzu ro hi taM/ /briSh+Ti baR+Shan+tad+bi b+hA te\u0f85ba grA hA ba gra hau sa mau/ /d+hA ra saM pA ta A sA raHshI ka ro\u0f85m+bu ka NAHsr-i tAH/ /baR+Sho/ 
<p>134a.2</p>@#/ /sgra/ /sprin gyi 'od zer chu 'dzin skyes/ /dbang po'i mtshon cha brgya byin gzhu/ /de bzhin drang 'khyog ces bya'o/ /char pa zhod dang de yi gegs/ /than chen char 'gog mnyam pa'o/ /rgyun 'bab yongs lhung drag char ro/ /char rdul chu rdul chu yi zer/ /rdo rje'i
<p>134a.3</p>char pa lastu ka ra kA me g+ha ts+tsha n+ne nya h+ni dur+d+di naM/ /an+tar+d+hA bya ba d+hA puM si twan+tar+d+hi ra pa bA ra NaM/ /a bi d+hA na ti ro d+hA na pi d+hA na ts+tsha da nA ni tsa// ! //hi mAM shu sh+tsa n+d+ra mA sh+tsan+d+ra in+duHku mu da bAM d+ha baH/ /bi d+hu su
<p>134a.4</p>dang ser ba dang / /sprin 'khrigs nyin par yul ngan no/ /mun pa 'thibs po skyes bu yi/ /mi mngon mi gsal ba dang ni/ /sgrib pa dang ni g.yogs pa dang / /mi snang ba dang khebs pa'o// ! //bsil zer sim byed ga pur dang / /dbang po ku mud gnyen byed dang / /bdud rtsi'i 'od dang
<p>134a.5</p>d+hAM shuHsu b+h+rAM shu ro Sha d+hI sho ni sA pa tiH/ /ab+dzo dzai bA tr-i kaHso mo glo mr-i gAM kaH ka lA ni d+hiH/ /dwi dza rA dzaHsha sha d+ha ro nak+Sha tre shaHkaSha pA ka raH/ zla ba'i ming / /ka lA tu Sho Da sho b+hA go bim+b+ho s+t+rI maN+Da la tri Shu/ / 
<p>134a.6</p>'od dkar can/ /rtsi yi dbang po mtshan mo'i bdag/ /'tsho byed chags byed rgya mtsho skyes/ /'grib byed cha gter ri dwags mtshan/ /gnyis skyes rgyal po ri bong 'dzin/ /rgyu skar dbang po mtshan mor byed/ /cha shas can dang bcu drug cha/ /gzugs brnyan mo min dkyil 'khor gsum/ / 
<p>134b</p>
<p>134b.1</p>b+hit+taM sha ka la khaN+De bA pu s+yar+d+ho r+d+haM sa me\u0f85d+ga ke/ /tsan+d+ri kA kau mu dI dz+yot+s+nA pra sA dastu pra shan+na tA/ /ka laM kaM kau lAny+tsha nany+tsha tsi h+naM k+Sh+ma tsa lak+Sha NaM/ /su Sha mA pa ra mA so b+hA sho b+hA kAn+ti d+yu tish+tsa
<p>134b.2</p>dum bu cha nus dum phyed dang / /phyed phyed mnyam pa'i yan lag can/ /zla 'od kun phan sim 'od do/ /rab dngas rab tu gsal ba dang / /bdag can nyams can mtshan ma can/ /rtags can mtshan nyid mtshan byed can/ /kun mdzes mchog tu mdzes pa dang / /mdzes sdug legs
<p>134b.3</p>biH// ! //a ba sh+yA yastu nI hA rastu ShA rastu hi naM hi maM/ /prA le yaM ma hi kA tsA tha hi mA nI hi ma saM ha tiH/ /shI taM gu Ne tad+ba dar+thAHsu ShI maHsi si ro dza DaH/ /tu ShA raH shI ta laHshi to hi mas+sap+tA n+ya liM ga kAH/ / 
<p>134b.4</p>dang ngo mtshar ro// ! ri byi/ /char skya khu 'phangs gangs skyes dang / /mchod bya de nas kha ba ldan/ /kha ba tshogs pa gangs yin no/ /bsil ba'i yon tan de don 'dra/ /bsil dang bser dang grang zhing 'khyags/ /lhags pa lhags ngar lhags ngar dang / /bdun po gzhan gyi
<p>134b.5</p>a ba sh+yA ya ba mo ste/ /tu ShA ra ni gangs skyes dang / /d+h+ru ba aut+hA na pA diHs+yA da gas+t+yaHkum+b+ha saM b+ha baH/ /mai trA ba ru Ni ra s+yai ba lo ShA mu drA sa d+har+m+mi NI/ /nak+Sha tra mrik+ShaM b+han+tA rA tA ra kA pyu Du bas+t+ri yAM/ /dA k+ShA ya N+ye\u0f85shwi nI d+yA di tA rA a shwa yu
<p>134b.6</p>rtags can no/ /brtan gnas dang ni rkang rten bu/ /ri bos 'phangs dang bum pa skyes/ /grogs po chu lha'i bu de bzhin/ /zil gnon rgya can chos mtshungs ma/ /rgyu skar/ mi ltung 'gro byed 'od can dang / /skar ma dkar po 'phur byed mo/ /gsal ba'i bu mo tha skar sogs/ /skar ma rta ldan
<p>135a</p>
<p>135a.1</p>ga\u0f85shwa nI/ /rA d+hA bi shA khA pu Sh+ye tu si d+h+ya ti Sh+yau shra biSh+Tha yA/ /sa mA d+ha ni Sh+ThA s+yuH proSh+Tha pa dA b+ha dra pa dAHs+t+ri yaH/ /mr-i gshIR+Sha m+m+r-i ga shi rAsta smin+ne pa gra hA ya NI/ /i lwa lA sta ts+tshi ro de she tA ra kA ni pa san+ti yAH// ! // 
<p>135a.2</p>@#/ /rgod ma can/ /sgrub byed nyid ni sa ga'o/ /rgyal ni grub pa tshim byed do/ /mon gru nor ldan dag mtshungs 'gyur/ /khrums ni ba lang rkang pa mo/ /mgo ni ri dgas mgo zhes bya/ /de la lo yi thog ma'o/ /de yi steng phyogs 'gro ldan gyi/ /skar ma rnams ni gnas pa'o// ! 
<p>135a.3</p>br-i haspa tiHsu rA tsAR+yi gIspa tir+d+hi Sha No gu ruH/ /dzI ba AM gi ra so bA tsa spa tish+tsi tra shi khaN+Di dzaH// ! //shu kro dai t+ya gu ru kA bya u shA nA b+hA rga baHka biH// ! //ang+gA ra kaHs+yAta ku dzo b+hau mo lo hi tAng+go ma hI su taH/ / 
<p>135a.4</p>lha bdag lha yi slob dpon dang / /dbyangs bdag blo ldan bla ma dang / /'tsho byed phur bu smra ba'i bdag /sna tshogs gtsug phud can gyi bu// ! //dkar po snyan dngags lha min bla/ /'od can pa sangs snyan dngags bu// ! //mig dmar sa skyes sa las byung / /lus dmar dang ni sa gzhi'i
<p>135a.5</p>phur bu// ! //rau hi Ni yo bud+ha s+so myas+sa mau sau ri sha nash+tsa rau// ! //ta mastu rA huHswar+b+hA nuHsaiM hi ke yo bi d+hun+tu daH/ /pa bsangs/ /sap+taR+Sha yo ma rI ts+ya tri mu khA sh+tsi tra shi ShaN+Di naH/ mig dmar/ rA shI nA mu da yo la g+nan+te tu me Sha br-i ShA da yaH// ! // 
<p>135a.6</p>bu// ! lhag pa'i //lhag pa zla skyes snar ma'i bu/ /spen pa'i/ nyi skyes dal 'gro mtshungs pa'o/ /sgra gcan/ /mun can sgra gcan mtho ris mdzes/ /seng ge mo'i bu zla ba 'joms/ /'od zer can sogs drang srong ni/ /bdun po sna tshogs gtsug pud can/ /khyim rnams 'char ba dus sbyor te/ /de ni lug dang glang la sogs/ / 
<p>135b</p>
<p>135b.1</p>sU raHsUR+yAR+ya mA di t+ya dwA da shAt+ma di bA ka rAH/ /b+hAska ra haska ra b+h+ra d+h+napra b+hA ka ra bi b+hA kA rAH/ /b+hA swa d+bi b+ha swat+sap+tA shwa ha ri da shwoSh+Na rasma yaH/ /bi ka r+t+ta nA rkA ma rtaN+Da mi hi bdud las rgyal zhes brtags gnyis su 'brog mis bsgyur/ rA tu Na pU Sha NaH/ 
<p>135b.2</p>nyi ma 'od 'gyed bsten bya dang / /mi sbyin skyes dang bcu gnyis bdag /nyin byed 'od byed snang byed dang / /rab tu gsal byed rnam gsal byed/ /'od ldan rnam gsal rta bdun pa/ /rta ljang can dang 'od zer can/ /rnam bsgyur mchod 'os mngal na sdug /cha 'bebs 'od 'gro gso byed dang / / 
<p>135b.3</p>nyi ma'i ming / d+yu ma Nista ra Nirmi trash+tsi tra b+hA nurbi ro tsa naH/ /bi b+hA ba su gra ha pa ti s+t+wi ShA m+pa ti ra harba tiH/ /b+hA nu r+haM saHsa ha sr-I shu sta pa naHsa baM tA ra biH/ /mA Tha ra piM ga lo daN+Da sh+tsaN+DAM shoHpA ri
<p>135b.4</p>nam mkha'i nor bu sol byed bshes/ /sna tshogs 'od dang rnam snang byed/ /'od kyi nor can gza' yi bdag /'od zer bdag po snang byed bdag /'od can 'joms byed 'od stong pa/ /gdung byed 'od 'byin 'od zer gzugs/ /gnas byed dmar ser dbyug can gyis/ /nyi ma'i 'od la
<p>135b.5</p>pA r+sh+wi kAH/ /sU ra sU to\u0f85ru No\u0f85nU tuHkA s+ya pirga ru DA gra dzaH/ /pa ri be Shastu pa ri d+hi ru pa sUr+Ya ka maN+Da le/ /ki ra No pra ma yU khAM shU ga b+hasti g+h+r-i Ni d+h+r-iSh+Na yaH/ /b+hA nuHka ro ma rI tsiHs+t+rI suM sa
<p>135b.6</p>yongs su bskol/ /nyi ma'i kha lo skya rengs dang / /brla med 'od srung khyud sngon skyes/ /yongs bskor yongs su dkris pa dang / /nye ba'i nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ro/ /'ded byed 'od byed nam mkha' 'jal/ /phyogs 'gro 'od 'gro chu 'thung phod/ /gsal ba 'od byed srin bu 'joms/ / 
<p>136a</p>
<p>136a.1</p>yor+d+di d+hi tiHtri yAMH/ /s+YuHpra b+hA ru gru tsi twi T+b+hA b+hAs+tha bi d+h+yu ti dIp+ta yaH/ /ro tsiHsho tsi ru b+he klI be brA kA sho d+yo ta A ta paH/ /koSh+NaM ka bo Sh+Na smaM doSh+Nang+ka dro Sh+Na n+t+ri Shu ta d+ba ti/ /tig+ma n+tI k+Sh+NaM kha 
<p>136a.2</p>@#/ /mo dang skyes bu gsal byed mo/ /'od dang gsal ba snang ba sgron/ /snang gsal 'od dang 'od zer dang / /'od mdangs gsal sgron ma ning ngo / /mun sel mun 'joms mtshan mo sel/ /cung dro bag dro dro tsam dang / /dro ba de ldan gsum yin no/ /tsha ba rab tsha tsha drag
<p>136a.3</p>ran+ta d+pa t+mi ga tri Sh+na ma rI kA// ! //kA lo 'di Sh+to pya \u0f72 hA pi sa ma yo pya tha ba k+Sha ti/ /pra ti ba d+he i twe ta dA d+yA stI tha ya r+d+wa yoH/ /g+ha sro di nI rA pa ru klI bde di bA sa rau/ /pra t+yu Sho\u0f85 hu rmu 
<p>136a.4</p>go/ /de bzhin smig rgyu ri dgas sred// ! //bgrang bya dus dang slar byung dang / /nye bar 'gro dang de nas ni/ /phyogs rtsa 'phel 'grib 'di gnyis me/ /de sogs tshes bdag gnyis dag go /mun bsal nyin mo bya spangs bsal/ /yang na ma ning rtse nas 'joms/ /mun dngas nyin mo
<p>136a.5</p>khaM ka l+ya mu ShaHpra t+yu ShaHpI a pi/ lo'i ming / /pra b+hA tany+tsa di nAn+te tu sA yaM san+d+h+yA pi tr-i pra sUH/ /prAh+NA pa rA h+NA ma d+h+yAh+nA s+t+ri saM d+h+ya ma tha sharba rI/ /ni shA ni shI tha nI rA tris+t+ri yA mA k+Sha Na dA k+Sha yAH/ /bi b+hA ba
<p>136a.6</p>rab sad sred/ /nam langs pa dang rab snga gsal/ /nyi ma'i mtha' dang dgongs mo dang / /thun mtshams dang ni pho skyes so/ /snga dro phyi dro nyi ma'i gung / /thun gsum de nas bya bral dang / /bsam gtan gnas dus mtshan mo dang / /thun gsum dal ster bsam pa spangs/ /snang bzlog
<p>136b</p>
<p>136b.1</p>rIta ma shwi n+yau ra dza nI yA mi nI ta mI/ /ta mi shrA tA ma shI rA tri r+dz+yau t+s+nI tsan+d+ri ka yA n+wi tA/ /A gA mi bar+t+ta mA nA ha R+Yu k+tA yAn+ni shi pak+Shi NI/ /ga Na rA traM ni sha bah+w+yaHpra do Sho rA dza nI mu khaM/ / 
<p>136b.2</p>nam dang rdul dang ni/ /thun sbyor chags dus snang med dang / /mun mtshams mun pa'i nam dang ni/ /snang mtshan zla ba dang ldan pa/ /ma 'ongs da ltar gnyis ldan pa'i/ /mtshan mo de na phyogs ldan no/ mtshan mo dang bcas nyin mo ni/ /phyogs bcas kun 'gro'i lam yin no/ /zhes 'gyur khyad byung / mtshan mo tshogs pa zhag rnams dang / /mtshan mo'i dang po nam gyi gdong / / 
<p>136b.3</p>ar+d+ha rA tra ni shI thau dwau dwau yA ma pra ha rau sha mau/ /sa parba saM d+hiH pra ti pat+pany+tsa da sh+yor+Ya dan+ta raM/ /pak+ShAn+to pany+tsa da sh+yo dwaiHpaur+N+Na mA sI tu pUr+N+Ni mA/ /ka lA hI ne pAnyanu ma tiHpur+N+Ne rA
<p>136b.4</p>nam phyed mtshan phyed gnyis dag gnyis/ /thun dang mel tshe gnyis dag mtshungs/ /tshigs dang mtshams dang tshes gcig dang / /bco lnga yi ni mthar thug pa/ /phyogs kyi mtha' ma bco lnga gnyis/ /zla ba gang ba 'jal byed rdzogs/ /cha nyams rjes 'gro gang ba dang / /mtshan phyed
<p>136b.5</p>kA ni sA ka ri/ /a mA bA s+yA twa mA ba s+yA daR+shaHsU R+Ye n+du saM ga maH/ /sA dr-iSh+T-in+duHsi nI bA lI sa naSh+Ten+du ka lA ku huH/ /u pa rA go gra ho rA hu gra ste twin+do tsa priSh+Ni tsa/ /so pa p+la bo ba ra k+tau dwA bag+n+yu t+pA ta u pA
<p>136b.6</p>mtshan mo mthong bar byed/ /gnam stong lhan cig byed dang mthong / /nyi ma zla ba lhan cig gnas/ /zla mthong zla ba gzhon nu'o/ /zla ba nyams dang cha nyams so/ /nyer 'tshe gza' ni 'jug par byed/ /nyi ma zla ba gza' yis bzung / /nyer bsgyur bya byed spangs pa'o/ /mes bsregs pa dang
<p>137a</p>
<p>137a.1</p>hi taH/ /e ka yok+t+ya puSh+pa ban+tau di bA ka ra ni shA ka rau/ /aSh+TA da sha ni me ShAstu kASh+ThA s+t+riM shat+ta tAHka lAH/ /tAstu tri shat+k+Sha Naste tu mu hUr+t+tau dwA dA shA sti yAM/ /te tu triM sha da ho rA traHpak+Sha ste
<p>137a.2</p>@#/ /rang bzhin bsgyur/ /gcig tu sbyor bas me tog ldan/ /nyin byed mtshan mo byed pa'o/ /mig 'dzums bco brgyad de yi gnas/ /de ni sum cu cha shas so/ /de yi sum cu skad cig go /de ni bcu gnyis yud tsam yin/ /de ni sum cu nyin zhag go /de rnams bco
<p>137a.3</p>da sha pany+tsa tsa/ /pak+Shau pUrbA pa rA shu klakr-iSh+Nau mA sastu tA nu b+hau/ /dwau dwau mA g+hA di mA sau s+yA dr-i tu stai ra ya nan+t+ri b+hiH/ /a ya ne dwe ga ti ru dka dak+Shi NArka s+ya bat+sa raH/ /sa ma rA trin+de be kA le bi Shu bad+bi Shu pany+tsa
<p>137a.4</p>lnga phyogs yin no/ /phyogs ni sngon ma phyi ma ste/ /de gnyis zla ba dkar nag go /mchu sogs zla ba gnyis gnyis ni/ /dus tshigs de gsum bgrod pa'o/ /nyi ma lho dang byang bgrod ni/ /lo gcig la ni gnyis yin no/ /nyin dang mtshan mo mnyam pa'i dus/ /nyin mtshan mtshungs dang dus
<p>137a.5</p>ta ta/ /puSh+pa yuk+tA paur+N+Na mA sI pau ShI mA so tsa ya tra sAH/ /nAm+nA sa pau Shau mA g+hA d+yA sh+tsai ba me kA da shA pa re/ /mArga shIR+She sa hA mArge A gra hA ya Ni kash+tsa saH/ /pau She tai Sha sa ha s+yau dwau ta pA mA g+he\u0f85tha phAlgu ne/ /s+yAt+ta pa s+yaH 
<p>137a.6</p>mnyam mo/ /me tog ldan pa'i zla ba nya/ /rgyal gyi zla ba gang yin te/ /ming ni rgyal yin mchu la sogs/ /de bzhin gzhan ni bcu gcig go /ri dwags mgo can nus ldan mgo /de ni lo yi dang po yin/ /me tog rgyal zla nus zla gnyis/ /dka' thub mchu zla de nas ni/ /'bras zla dka'
<p>137b</p>
<p>137b.1</p>phAl+su ni kaHs+yA ts+tsai tre tsai tra ko ma d+huH/ /bai shA khe mA d+ha bo rA d+ho dz+yeSh+Tha shu kraHshu tsis+t+wa yaM/ /A khAD+he shrA pa Na stu s+yAn+na b+hAHshrA ba Ni ka sh+tsa saH/ /s+Yu r+n+na b+ha s+ya prauSh+Tha pa da b+hA dra b+hA dra pa dA s+sa mAH/ /s+yA dA shwi na i Sho pyA shwo yu dzo bi
<p>137b.2</p>thub dpo zla'o/ /nag pa 'dod dus sbrang zla'o/ /sa ga sbrang dus me tog can/ /gtso bo snron zla gtsang ma dang / /chu stod zla ba gro zhun dang / /nam mkha' dang ni thos zla'o/ /sprin bzangs khyu mchog rkang pa dang / /ba lang rkang dang khrums zla mtshungs/ /tha skar ltad mo'i zla ba dang / /glu dbyangs
<p>137b.3</p>s+yAt+tu kAr+t+ti kaH/ /bA hu lordzai kAr+t+ti ko he man+taHshi shi ro\u0f85s+t+ri yA ma/ /pa san+ta puSh+pa sa ma ya su ra b+hI grISh+ma USh+ma kaH/ /ni dA g+ha uSh+No pa ga ma uSh+mA ga ma sta pa/ /s+t+ri yAM prA br-i Sha s+t+ri yAm+b+hUm+ni baR+ShA a tha sa
<p>137b.4</p>zla ba smin drug dang / /mang po 'dzin dang smin drug zla/ /dgun stod dgun smad mo ma yin/ /dpyid dang me tog ldan dus dang / /bde byed sos ka tsha dus dang / /nges par sreg dang dro ba'i dus/ /drod phebs drod 'ong tsha ba'i dus/ /dbyar ni mo yin mang po'i tshigs/ /char 'bab de nas
<p>137b.5</p>rat+s+t+ri yAM/ /Sha Da mI r-i ta baHpuM si mArgA dI nA yu gaiHkra mAta/ /sam+ba t+sa ro bat+sa ro\u0f85bdo hA ya no s+t+ri sha rat+sa mA/ /mA se na s+yA da ho rA traHpai tro baR+She Na de pa taH/ /de be yu ga sa ha sre dwe brah+maHkalbo tu tau
<p>137b.6</p>ston ka mo/ /dus tshod drug po 'di rnams pho/ /mgo sogs zung rnams rim pa las/ /lo dang bgrang bya 'gro 'ong dang / /'dor byed mo min ston dang mtshungs/ /nyin zhag dang ni zla bas 'gyur/ /pe tro lo yis lha rnams kyi/ /lha yi dus bzhi stong phrag dag /gnyis ni tshangs pa'i
<p>138a</p>
<p>138a.1</p>nr-i NAM/ /ma n+wan+ta ran+tu di byA nAM yu gA nA me ka sap+ta tiH/ /saM bar+t+taHpra la yaH kalpaHk+Sha yaHkalpAn+ta i t+ya paM// ! //as+t+rI sang+kam+bu mAn+yA smA pA ba ki lbi Sha kal+ma ShaM/ / 
<p>138a.2</p>@#/ /zhag tu 'gyur/ /de gnyis mi rnams kyi bskal pa/ /mtho ris zung rnams bdun cu gcig /'jig pa'i bskal pa pra la ya/ /nyams dang zad dang bskal pa'i mtha'i// ! //mo min reg 'phel skyes bu srung / /bya ngan 'thungs dmangs byed dag 'dzad/ / 
<p>138a.3</p>ka lu ShaM br-i dzi nai no nyag+ha maM ho du ri ta duSh+k+r-i taM/ /s+yA da d+har+m+ma ma s+t+ri yAM pu N+ya shre ya sI su kr-i taM pr-i ShaH/ /mut+p+rI tiHpra ma do haR+Sha pra mo da mo da sam+ma dAH/ /s+yA dA naM da thu rA naM daH sa r+m+ma sA ta su khA ni
<p>138a.4</p>rgod byed bzang po spangs sdig pa/ /nongs pa nyes spyod nyes byas so/ /chos ni mo min bsod nams dang / /dge ba legs byas khyu mchog go /dga' mgu rangs dang spro ba dang / /yi rangs dgyes dang mnyes pa dang / /nyams dga' sdig zad zhi ba dang / /mi dge spangs dang legs
<p>138a.5</p>tsa/ /swaHsre ya saM shi baM b+ha drang+ka l+yA Nam+maM ga la su b+haM/ /b+hA bu kam+b+ha pi kam+b+ha byaM ku sha laM k+She ma mas+t+ri yA ma/ /sas+t+rany+tsA tha tri Shu dra bye pA paM puN+yaM su khA di tsa/ /ma tal+li kA ma tsartsi kA pra kAN+Da mung+g+hA
<p>138a.6</p>sgo'o/ /dge dang bsngags 'os zhi ba dang / /bzang po phan thob bkra shis legs/ /skal pa skal thob 'dod thob dang / /ngan sel bde legs mo ma yin/ /bstod 'os de nas gsum dngos po/ /sdig dang bsod nams bde la sogs/ /shin tu bzang dang phul byung dang / /rab dang mchog
<p>138b</p>
<p>138b.1</p>tal+la dzau/ /pra sasta bA tsa kA n+ya sU n+ya ya shu b+hA ba ho bi d+hiH/ /dai ban+diSh+TaM b+hA ga d+he yaM b+hA gyaM s+t+rI ni ya tirbi d+hiH/ /he turnA kA ra NaM bI dzaM ni dA naM twA di kA ra NaH// ! //k+She tra dz+nya At+mA pu ru ShaHpra d+hA naM pra
<p>138b.2</p>dang ltad mor che/ /'di rnams mnyam pa can zhes brjod/ /skal ldan dge ba bsags rgyab can/ /lhas bskos lhas bstan skal ba dang / /mo'o sngon byas sngon gyi las/ /rgyu dang byed po sa bon dang / /gleng gzhi thog ma'i byed pa po// ! //zhing shes bdag dang skyes bu ste/ /gtso bo rang
<p>138b.3</p>kr-i tiHs+t+ri yAM/ /bi she ShaH kA li ko\u0f85bas+thA guNA sa twaM ra dza sta maH/ /dza nurdza na na dzan+mA ni dza ni rut+pat+ti ru d+b+ha baH/ /prA NI tu tset+ta no dzan+mI dzan+tu dza n+yu sha rI ri NaH/ /tsin+tan+tu tse to hr-i da yaM swAn+taM hr-in+mA na sa m+ma
<p>138b.4</p>bzhin mo yin no/ /khyad par dus can gnas skabs so/ /yon tan snying stobs rdul dang mun/ /skye ba skyed po skyes pa skye/ /nyer bskrun nye bar 'byung rnams so/ /srog can sems can skye ldan dang / /skye bo skye dgu lus can no/ /sems dang sems pa snying dang ni/ /sgrogs byed 'phrog byed
<p>138b.5</p>naH/ /bud+d+hi rma nI ShA d+hi Sha NA d+hIHpradz+nyA she mu thi ma tiH/ /pre k+Sho pa la b+d+hish+tsat+saM bit+p+ra ti ba da dz+nyap+ti tse ta nAH/ /d+hIr+d+hA ra NA ba tI me d+hA saM kalpaHkar+m+ma mA na saM/ /tsit+tA b+ho go ma naskA rash+tsar+ts+tsa saM khyA
<p>138b.6</p>yid byed yid/ /blo gros yid 'dod spobs pa can/ /blo dang shes rab nyal slong blo gros/ /yid ldan mthong dang dmigs ldan sems/ /legs rtogs go shes sems pa'o/ /mi brjed 'dzin nus dran bzang po/ /kun rtog dang ni yid kyi las/ /sems kyi longs spyod yid kyi las/ /dpyod dang
<p>139a</p>
<p>139a.1</p>bi tsa ra NaH/ /a d+h+yA hA ra sta r+k+ka U ho bi tsi kit+sA tu saM sha yaH/ /saM de ha dwA pa rau tsA tha sa mau ni r+N+Na ya nish+tsa yau/ /mi th+yA dr-i Sh+TirnA sti ka tA byA pA do dro ha tsin+ta naM/ /sa mau
<p>139a.2</p>@#/ /bgrang dang rnam par dpyod/ /lhag par dpyod dang rtog ge dang / /rtog dang the tsom som nyi dang / /nem nur dang ni yid gnyis dang / /de nas mtshungs pa gtan phebs des/ /log par lta ba med pa pa/ /gnod sems 'tshe bar sems pa dang / /mtshungs pa grub
<p>139a.3</p>sid+d+hAn+ta rAr+d+hAn+tau b+h+rAn+tir+m+mi th+yA ma tir+b+h+ra maH/ /sa bi dA gUH pra ti dz+nyA naM ni ya mA shra ba saM shra bAH/ /aM gI ka rA b+h+yu pa ga ma pra ti shra ba sa mA d+ha yaH/ /mok+Sho d+hIr+dz+nyA na ma n+ya tra bi dz+nyA naM shilpa sas+t+ra yoH/ / 
<p>139a.4</p>mtha' bzung ba'i sems/ /'khrul pa log shes nor ba'i sems/ /khas len phyogs bzung dam bca' dang / /nges pa mnyan bya yang dag thos/ /bdag gir byas dang khas blangs dang / /so sor mnyan bya ting nge 'dzin/ /thar dang blo dang shes pa gzhan/ /rnam shes bzo dang bstan bcos so/ / 
<p>139a.5</p>muk+ti kai ba l+ya nir+b+bA Na shre yo niHshre ya sA mr-i taM/ /mok+Sho\u0f85pa bar+g+go\u0f85thA dz+nyA na ma bi d+yA ham+ma tiHs+t+ri yAM/ /rU paM shap+do ra sa spaR+sha gan+d+hAsh+tsa bi Sha yA a mI/ /go tsa rA in+d+ri yAr+thAsh+tsa hr-i ShI
<p>139a.6</p>grol ba ma 'dres mya ngan 'das/ /rab bsngags nges legs 'chi med dang / /thar pa dang ni spangs pa'o/ /de nas mi shes ma rig dang / /bdag gi blo gros mo yin no/ /gzugs dang sgra dang ro dang reg /dri ste 'di rnams yul rnams so/ /spyod yul dang ni dbang don dang / /yul can
<p>139b</p>
<p>139b.1</p>kaM bi Sha yIn+d+ra yaM/ /karme n+d+ri yan+tu pA y+wA di ma no ne trA di d+hI n+d+ri yaM/ /tu ba ra sta kA ShA yo\u0f85stI ma d+hu ro la ba NaHka TuH/ /tik+to\u0f85m+lash+tsa ra sAHpuM si tad+ba t+su Sha Ta pi tri Shu/ /bi mardon+the pa ri ma lo gan+d+he dza na ma no ha re/ /
