<p>206a.2</p>@#/ /so/ /yon tan rdzas dang bya ba'i sgra/ /de bzhin de yi dbye ba rnams/ /legs byas bsod nams nor ldan dang / /blo che ba dang bsam yangs so/ /snying du sdug dang yid dga'o/ /spro ba che dang dga' ba che/ /shes can go can mngon par mkhyen/ /rnam mkhyen nges ldan bslab
<p>206a.3</p>bai dz+nyA ni kaHkr-i ta mu khaHkr-i tI ku sha la i t+ya pi/ /pU dz+yaHpra tIk+ShaHsAM sha yi kaHsaM sha yA pan+na mA na saH/ /da k+Shi NI yo dak+Shi NAr+has+t+ra tra dak+Shi N+ya i t+ya pi/ /s+yurba dA n+ya s+thU la lak+Sh+ya dA na shaiN+Do ba hu pra de/ /dzai bA
<p>206a.4</p>shes can/ /nges shes kha byang goms can dang / /dge ba zhes kyang bya ba'o/ /mchod pa dang ni rab tu sbyin/ /the tshom yid gnyis ma nges pa/ /yon gnas dang ni mchod pa'i 'os/ /de la sbyin pa'i 'os zhes bya/ /gtong phod dang ni dpal stug dang / /byin brlabs can dang rab tu ster/ /yun
<p>206a.5</p>tri kaHs+yA dA yusmAnan+ta rba Nistu shas+t+ra bita/ /pa rIk+Sha kaHkA ra Ni ko ba rastu ma mar+d+ha kaH/ /haR+Sha mA No bi kurbA NaHpra ma nA hr-iSh+Ta mA na saH/ /dur+m+ma nA bi ma lA an+tar+m+ma nAHs+yA dut+ka un+ma nAH/ /dak+Shi Ni sa
<p>206a.6</p>ring 'tsho dang tshe ldan no/ /shes nyen can dang bstan bcos rigs/ /yongs su rtog dang rgyu mtshan can/ /mchod sbyin dang ni rab tu sbyin/ /yid dga' mgu dang yid rab bde/ /yid ni dga' bar gyur pa'o/ /yid ngan sems ngan mi dga' ba/ /blo chud zos dang sems myos pa/ /g.yo med drang
<p>206b</p>
<p>206b.1</p>ra lo dA rau shu ka lo da tr-i b+hok+ta ri/ /tat+pa re pra si tA sak+tA biSh+TAr+tho d+yuk+ta ut+su kaH/ /pra tI te pra thi ta khyA taHbit+ta bi dz+nyA ta bi shru tAH/ /gu NaiHpra tI te tu kr-i ta lak+Sha NA hi ta lak+Sha Nau/ /i b+h+ya A T+yo d+ha nI swA
<p>206b.2</p>dang sgyu med pa/ /su ka la dang sbyin dang ster/ /de yi pha rol chags dang zhen/ /don 'don 'dun dang brtson 'grus dang / /shes ldan rgya chen grags pa dang / /dag ldan rnam shes rnam thar thos/ /yon tan nor ldan rten byas dang / /rang bzhin byas dang mtshan nyid can/ /nor ldan 'byor ldan yo
<p>206b.3</p>mI twI shwa raHpa ti rI shi tA/ /a d+hi b+hUrnA ya ko n+ye tA brab+huHpa ri br-i D+ho\u0f85d+hi yaH/ /a d+hi kar+d+hiHsa mr-id+d+haHs+yAt+ku Tum+ba byA pr-i tastu yaH/ /s+yA da b+h+yA gA ri ka tasmin+na pA d+hish+tsa pu mA na yaM/ /ba rang+ga rU po be to yaHsiM ha saM ha na no hi saH/ / 
<p>206b.4</p>byad can/ /bdag po dbang phyug pa ti dang / /phyug po dpon po gtso bo dang / /dpon mgo mgo 'dren rje bo'o/ /lhag par 'phel dang chen po skyes/ /nyug rum nyams pa 'og med dang / /khyim khol srung ma skyes bu'o/ /yan lag mchog ldan gzugs ldan ma/ /mdzes ldan dang ni bud med
<p>206b.5</p>nirbAR+Ya kAR+Ya kar+t+tA yaHsaM mu taHsa twa sam+ba dAH/ /a bA tsi mU konyatha ma no dza baHsa pi tr-I san+ni b+haH/ /sat+k+r-i t+yA laM kr-i tAM ka n+yAM yo da dA ti sa kUk+ta daH/ /lak+Sh+mI bA na lak+Sh+ma NaHsh+lI laHshrI mAn+s+nig+d+hastu bat+sa laH/ / 
<p>206b.6</p>do/ /nges byed bya ba byed pa dang / /gzhungs byed 'grus par byed pa'i/ /smra mi byed dang lkugs pa'o/ /yid la gcags dang pha lta bu/ /dga' bas brgyan byas bu mo dang / /gang zhig sbyin byed 'phags pa'i gnas/ /dpal ldan phun tshogs bkra shis dpal/ /mnyes gshin pa dang mthong tshor dang / / 
<p>207a</p>
<p>207a.1</p>s+yAd+da yA luHkA ru Ni kaHkr-i pA luHsu ra taHsa mAH/ /swa tan+t+ronyapA br-i taHswai rI swats+tshan+do ni ra ba gra haH/ /pa ra tan+t+raHpa rA d+hI naHpar bAn+nAtha bA na pi/ /a d+hI no ni g+h+na A yat+to swa ts+tshan+do gr-i h+ya ko pya sau/ / 
<p>207a.2</p>@#/ /brtse ba thugs rje thugs brtse dang / /shen tu dga' byed mtshungs pa'o/ /rang rgyud rang dbang bdag dbang dang / /rang dga' gzhan gyis ma bzung ba/ /gzhan rgyud gzhan dbang pha rol dbang / /rang dbang med dag bdag dbang min/ /gzhan dbang dbang med 'dzin pa can/ / 
<p>207a.3</p>kha la pUHs+yAd+ba hu ka ro dIr+g+ha sU trash+tsi ra kri yaH/ /dzAl+monyas mIk+Sha ka rI s+yat+kuN+Tho maN+Tho man+da kri yA su yaH/ /kar+m+mak+Sha monyalaM kar+m+mI NaHkr-i yA bA na kar+m+ma sU d+ya tA/ /sa kAr+m+maHkar+m+ma shI lo ya karma shU rastu kar+m+ma ThaH/ /b+har N+ya b+huk+kar+m+ma ka raH 
<p>207a.4</p>phyags ma dang ni mang pos byed/ /shin tu thogs dang yun ring byed/ /'dres mang spyod dang ci grub byed/ /dman dang ngan dang byed 'khos chung / /las nus las shogs che ba dang / /byed mkhas las pa'i ngang tshul can/ /las la dpa' dang las mgo thon/ /gso dang za ba'i las byed pa/ / 
<p>207a.5</p>kar+m+ma kA rastu tat+k+ri yaH/ /a pa snA to mr-i ta snA ta A mi ShA shI tu shauSh+ka laH/ /bu b+huk+Shi taHs+yAt+k+Shu d+hi to dzi g+hAM su ra sha nA yi taH/ /pa rAn+naHpa ra piN+DA do b+hak+Sha ko g+hasma ronyad+ma raH/ /a dz+ya naHs+yA dau da ri ko bi dzi gI ShA bi brdzi te/ /u b+hau twAt+mam+b+ha riHkuk+Shim+b+ha riH 
<p>207a.6</p>las mi de yi byed pa can/ /skye khrus dang ni shi khrus so/ /krums dang sha ya zas dang ni/ /ltogs dang bkres dang bru ba tsha/ /zas 'dod gzhan zas pha rol zas/ /lto che grod che dang ga bde/ /snyom las dang ni skyid skyur dang / /sgyid snyom dang ni 'jas po gnyis/ /bdag 'gengs lto 'gengs rang
<p>207b</p>
<p>207b.1</p>swA da ra pU ra kau /sar+b+bAn+nI nastu sar+b+bAn+na b+ho dzI gr-iSh+Na stu gar+d+ha naH/ /lub+d+ho\u0f85b+hi lA Shu ka s+t+r-iSh+Na k+sa mau lo lu pa lo lu b+hau/ /sUn+mA dastUn+ma diSh+Na s+yA da bi nI ta sa mud+ba taH/ /mat+te shoN+Dot+ka Tak+ShI bAHkA mu kaHkA mi tAnyanu kaH/ /ka mraHkA ma
<p>207b.2</p>drod 'gengs/ /kun za kun gyi 'tsho ba'o/ /'dod can rnge can zhen can dang / /mngon 'dod dang ni sred can dang / /'dra ba 'dod chen yang yang 'dod/ /myos pa dang ni ra ro ba/ /ma dul ba dang ma zhi ba/ /rgyags ba rgod pa g.yo ldan rengs/ /chags pa 'dod can sred pa can/ /rnge can 'dod ldan
<p>207b.3</p>sred pi tA b+hI kaHka ma naHkA ma no\u0f85b+hi kaH/ /bi d+he yo bi Na ya grA hI ba tsa nes+thi ta A shra baH/ /ba sh+yaHpra Ne yo ni b+h+r-i ta bi nI taHpra shri tAHsa mAH/ /d+h+r-iSh+Te d+h+r-iSh+Nak+ki yA tash+tsa pra gal+b+haHpa ti b+hAn+d+hi te/ /s+yA da d+h+r-iSh+Te tu shA lI no bi lA k+ShA bisma yon+d+ha re/ / 
<p>207b.4</p>ldan dang / /mngon 'dod sgrub can dul ba 'dzin/ /tshig la gnas dang A shra ba/ /dbang dang reng dgar byed pa'o/ /zhi ba dul ba mnyen pa mtshungs/ /spyi brtol spobs chen dpral sgo can/ /'tsher ba med dang skyengs pa med/ /'dzem med dang ni gnod ngas med/ /mtshar
<p>207b.5</p>can dang ni ngo mtshar a d+hI re kA ta ras+t+ra snau b+hI ru b+hI ru ka b+hI lu kAH/ /A shaM mu rA shaM si ta raM gr-i ha yA lur+g+ra hI ta ri/ /shra d+d+hA luHshrad+d+ha yA yuk+te pa ta yA lustu pA tu ke /ladz+dzA shI lenyapa tra piSh+NurbaM dA tu ra b+hi bA da ke / 
<p>207b.6</p>sha rA can/ /mi brtan srab pa bag tsha'o/ /'jigs can 'jigs rung ma rungs pa/ /brnab sems dang ni yid la 'dod/ /khyim chags dang ni khyim zhen no/ /dad can dad pa ldan pa dang / /ltung 'dod dang ni babs 'dod do/ /ngo tsha tshul can khrel ldan no/ /phyag byed dang ni gsong por smra/ /gsod dang
<p>208a</p>
<p>208a.1</p>rur+g+hA tu ko hiM shraHs+yAd+bar+d+hiSh+Nu stu bar+d+ha naH/ /ut+pa tiSh+NustUt+pa ti tA laM ka riSh+Nu stu maN+Da naH/ /b+hUSh+Nur+b+ha biSh+Nur+b+ha bi tA bar+t+tiSh+Nurbar+t+tiSh+Nurbar+t+ta naHsa mau/ /ni rA ka riSh+NuHk+Shib+NuHs+yat+sAn+d+ra snig+d+hastu me
<p>208a.2</p>@#/ /'joms 'dod rnam par 'tshe/ /'phel 'dod dang ni skyed 'dod do/ /'phur 'dod dang ni steng 'gro 'dod/ /rgyan 'dod dang ni rgyan cha 'dod/ /'gyur 'dod dang ni yin 'dod dang / /'khor 'dod 'jug 'dod 'dra ba'o/ /kha 'gog pa dang nyer chu 'dod/ /ngag 'jam dang ni
<p>208a.3</p>du raH/ /dz+nyA tA tu bi da ro bin+du bi kA shIr+thi ba ka swa raH/ /bi sr-i twa ro bi shr-i ma raHpra shA rI tsa bi shA ri Ni/ /ma hiSh+NuHsa ha nAHk+Shan+tA ti ti k+ShuHk+Sha mi tA k+Sha sI/ /kro d+ha nanyamaR+Sha NaH ko pI tsaN+Das+t+wa t+yan+ta ko pa naH/ /dzA
<p>208a.4</p>tshig 'jam pa/ /shes ldan rnam dpyod thig le dang / /rnam par rgyas dang rnam par gsal/ /brkyang ba bdal pa rab tu brkyangs/ /rnam brkyangs ma nags nus sron nus dang / /bzod dang rkyen thub tshugs thub bzod/ /khro ba 'tshig pa dbung ba'o/ /gtum po shin tu khro ba'o/ /gnyid
<p>208a.5</p>ga ru ko dzA ga ri tA g+hUN+Ni taHpra tsalA yi taH/ /swap+na k+Sha yA lurni drA lurni drA Na sha yi tau sa mau/ /pa rAd+mu khaHpa rA tsI naHs+yA da bA da pya d+ho mu khaH/ /de bA nany+tsa ti de ba D+ya da bi Sh+wa D+ya da bi Sh+wa gany+tsa ti/ /yaH 
<p>208a.6</p>med dang ni gnyid chag go/ /gnyid yur ba dang rab tu 'thibs/ /rmi lam gnyid log gnyid du song / /gnyid byas nyal ba dag ni mtshungs/ /pha rol kha phyogs gzhan du phyogs/ /'og tu phyogs dang kha bub dang / /lhar 'gro lha la phyogs pa'o/ /sna tshogs 'gro ba kun du 'gro/ /gang
<p>208b</p>
<p>208b.1</p>sa hAny+tsa ti sa d+h+yad+ga sa tiR+Ya rony+tsa ti/ /ba do ba dA ba do bak+tA bA gI sho bAk+pa tiH sa mau/ /bA tso yuk+tipa Tu bAg+mI bA ba du kaSh+tsa bak+ta ri/ /s+yAdz+dzalpA kastu bA tsA lo bA tsA To ba hu gar+h+ya bAka /durmu khe mu kha rA bad+d+ha mu khau
<p>208b.2</p>zhig lhan cig dus gcig go/ /dud de 'gro dang 'phred la 'gro/ /smra ba brjod pa zlos pa'o/ /ngag dbang dang ni ngag bdag mtshungs/ /gsung ldan gsal po smra mkhas so/ /gtam dang lo rgyus lab bzang dang / /smra bzang smra mang gtam mang po/ /kha ngan tshig ngan kha 'chings so/ /nus dang dga'
<p>208b.3</p>shaklaHpri yaM ba de/ /lo ha laHs+yAd s+phu Ta bAk+gar+h+ya bA dI tu kang+ba daH/ /sa mok+tA bA dak+ta tsa rau s+yA da sau s+ya swa ro\u0f85swa raH/ /ra ba naHshab+da no nAM dI bA dI nAn+dI ka raHsa mau/ /dza Do\u0f85dz+nyA e DamU kastu bak+tuM shro tu ma shik+Shi te/ /tUSh+NI shI la
<p>208b.4</p>bar smra byed pa/ /ma dag pa dang gtam mi gsal/ /'dra ba kha ngan ngan smras so/ /'bru mi gsal dang gtam mi gsal/ /dbyangs dang dbyangs min skad sgra dang / /bstod sgra bsngags pa brjod pa mtshungs/ /dig pa lkugs pa glen pa dang / /ma thos pa dang ma bslabs dang / /mi smra'i ngang tshul kha
<p>208b.5</p>stu tUSh+NI ko na glonyabA sA di gam+ba raH/ /niSh+kA shi to\u0f85ba kr-iSh+TaHs+yA da pa d+h+wa sta stu d+hik+k+l-i taH/ /A tu gar+b+honyab+hi b+hU taHs+yAd+dA pi taHshA d+hi ta sa mau/ /A tra gaM d+honyab+hi b+hU ta s+yAt+p+ra tA khyA to ni rA kr-i taH/ /bi ni kr-i to bi kr-i to tsa bi pra lab+d+hastu
<p>208b.6</p>rog pa/ /gcer bu gos med phyogs kyi gos/ /smra ba ngan dang mi gsal ba/ /bton pa dang ni phyung ba'o/ /smod pa dang ni ngan smras so/ /kha rgyal ba dang shags rgyal pa/ /lag yangs dang ni ster 'dod 'dra/ 
<p>209a</p>
<p>209a.1</p>bany+tsi taH/ /ma na ha taHpra ti ha taHpra ti bad+d+ho ha tash+tsa saH/ /a d+hi k+Ship+taHpra ti k+Ship+to bad+d+he kI li ta saM ya tau/ /a pAn+na A pat+p+rAp+taHs+yAt+kan+di shi ko b+ha ya dru taH/ /A k+ShA ri taHk+ShA ri to\u0f85b+hi shaste saM ka su konya s+thi re/ /bya
<p>209a.2</p>@#/ /tshig rdeg dang ni slar smra ba/ /'ching byed phur bu 'gog byed do/ /don med pa dang stong pa thob/ /nyam nga ba dang bag tsha ba/ /byi bshor sun 'byin k+ShA ri ta/ /g.yo ba dang ni sems mi gnas/ /mnar
<p>209a.3</p>sa nA r+t+to pak+to dwau bi hasta byA ku la lau sa mau/ /bi kla bo bi hwa laHs+yAt+ta bi ba shonyariSh+Ta duSh+Ta d+hIH/ /ka sh+yaHka shAr+ha san+nad+d+he twA ta tA pI ba d+ho d+ya te/ /dwe Sh+ye twak+Shi ga to ba d+h+yaHshIR+Sha ts+tshe d+ya i mau sa mau/ / 
<p>209a.4</p>dang gzhan gyis 'tshir ba gnyis/ /lag stong dang ni g.yo ba 'dra/ /bag tsha ba dang 'khyor ba'o/ /'chi ltas sun 'byin blo gros can/ /lcag gis gzhus dang 'brab par byed/ /lcag gzhus rta yi gsang bya dang / /zhe sdang dang ni 'khrug pa'o/ /gsad bya mgo gcod 'di dag mtshungs/ / 
<p>209a.5</p>bi Sh+yo bi She Na yo ba d+h+ye mu sha l+yo mu sa le na ya/ /shi shwi dA naHkr-iSh+Na kar+m+mAsh+tsa pa lash+tsi ku ra sa mau/ /do She ka dr-ik+Shu ro b+hA gI ni kr-i tas+t+wa nr-i dzuHsha ThaH/ /kar+N+Ne dza paHsU tsa kaHs+yAt+pi shu no durdza naHkha laH/ / 
<p>209a.6</p>dug ster dug gis gsad bya ba/ /gtun shing gtun gyis brdung ba dang / /sdig spyod dang ni nag po'i las/ /so mi bsod dang rnam g.yengs 'dra/ /skyon 'dzin pha rol nyams pa rtog /sgyu can dang ni g.yo can kyog /rna bar zlos dang phra ma dang / /phra ma dbyes dang gcugs mkhan zhes/ / 
<p>209b</p>
<p>209b.1</p>nr-i saM so g+hAt+ta kaHkrU ra pA po d+hUr+t+tastu bany+tsa kaH/ /adz+nya mu Ta ya thA dzA ta mUr+kha bai d+he ya bA li sh+yaH/ /ka daR+Ye kr-i pa na k+Shu dra kim+ba tsa na mi tam+ba tsAH/ /niHswastu durbi d+ho dI no da ri dro durga to pa saH/ /ba nI ya
<p>209b.2</p>rnam 'tshe 'joms byed khro ba sdig /ma rungs pa dang ma sgrungs pa/ /mi shes rmongs pa glen pa dang / /'thom pa mi rig mi mtshon pa/ /'chums pa cha phra ser sna can/ /zhib mo mdzangs pa sten chos pa/ /nor med sgrub ngan bkren po dang / /dbul po ngan 'gro phongs pa'o/ /slong mo sprang
<p>209b.3</p>ko ya tsa na ko mAr+g+ga No mA tsa kAr+thi no/ /a haM kA ra bA na haM yuHya su b+haM yu shu b+hA n+wi ta/ /di byo pa pA du kA de bA nr-i ga bA d+yA dza rA yu dzAH/ /swe da dzAHkr-i mi daM shA d+yAHpak+Shi sar+p+yA da yo\u0f85N+Da dzAH/ /ud+b+hi dasta
<p>209b.4</p>po lam pa dang / /slong mo pa dang don 'dod pa/ /nga rgyal can dang haM yu'o/ /dge ldan dang ni bsod nams can/ /mtho ris lha rnams brdzus skyes te/ /mi dang phyugs sogs mngal nas skye/ /'bu dang sbrang sogs drod gsher skyes/ /bya dang sbrul sogs sgong skyes so/ /shing dang sngo
<p>209b.5</p>ru gul+mA d+yA ud+b+hi dud+b+hidz+dza mud+b+hi daM/ /sund raM ru tsi raM tsA ru su Sha maM sAM d+ha so b+ha NaM/ /kAn+taM ma no ra maM ru ts+yaM ma no dz+nyaM many+dzu many+dza laM/ /ta da se tsa Na kaM tr-ip+ternA s+t+yan+to ya s+ya daR+sha nAta/ / 
<p>209b.6</p>sogs sa gzhi skyes/ /sas bskrun sas skyed sa las 'khrungs/ /shin tu mdzes dang sdug pa dang / /mdzes dang sdug dang legs pa dang / /bzang po dang ni brjid can dang / /yid 'ong snying sdug mtshar ba dang / /yid 'phrog 'jam dang mdzes pa'o/ /de ni shin tu mdzes pa ste/ / 
<p>210a</p>
<p>210a.1</p>a b+hIp+tenyab+hIp+si taM hr-i d+yaM da yi taM bal+la b+haM yaM/ /ni kr-iSh+Ta pra ti kr-iSh+TArba re pha yA p+pAnyab mA d+ha mAH/ /ku pU ya kut+si tA ba d+ya khe Ta gar+h+yA Na kAHsa mAH/ /ma lI ma sastu
<p>210a.2</p>gang gi blta bas chog mi shes/ /mdza' bo snying 'dod yid mthun dang / /yid gcugs bag phebs mdza' ba'o/ /rigs ngan dmangs rigs mtshon cha ba/ /mthar gnas sdig can gshed ma dang / /ngan pa tha shal shan pa dang / /g.yung pa dang ni rigs ngan
<p>210a.3</p>ma li naM kats+tsha raM ma la dU Shi taM/ /pU taM pa bi traM me d+h+yany+tsa bI d+h+ran+tu bi ma lAr+tha kaM /nirnik+taM sho d+hi taM mr-i Sh+Nan+niHsho d+h+ya ma na bska raM/ /A sA raM phalgu shU n+yaM tu bshI kaM tuts+tsha rik+ta kaM /klI be pra d+hA naM
<p>210a.4</p>mtshungs/ /dri can mdog nag nyams dang bgres/ /gtsang dag dri ma med pa'o/ /ye dag rang bzhin dri med don/ /bkrus dang sbyangs dang bsangs pa dang / /dag byas dri ma med par byas/ /snying po med dang 'bras stong dang / /stong pa gsob gsog ya ma brla/ /ma ning gtso bo dang
<p>210a.5</p>pra mu khaM pra be kA mu t+ta mot+ta mAH/ /mu khyaM ba yu ba re N+yAsh+tsa pra bar+ho\u0f85na ba rAr+d+h+ya bta/ /pa rAr+d+h+yA gra prA kra ha ra prA grA g+r+yI ya ma gra yaM/ /shre yaM shreSh+ThaHpuska laHs+yAtshat+ta mash+tsA ti sho b+ha ne/ /s+yu rut+ta ra pa de byA g+h+ra pung+ga baR+She b+ha kuny+dza rAH/ / 
<p>210a.6</p>po'i sgo/ /dpon dang gong ma mchog dang ni/ /gdong dang mchog dang rab che shos/ /chen po dang ni phul byung rtse/ /dang po rab mchog gong ma dang / /phul byung gya no ma shin tu mchog /bla na med dang shin tu mdzes/ /phyis kyi tshig can stag dang ni/ /skyes bu khyu mchog glang chen dang / / 
<p>210b</p>
<p>210b.1</p>siM ha sArdU la nA gA d+yAHpuM shi shreSh+ThAr+tha go tsa rAH/ /a prA g+r+YaM dwa ya hI ne dwe a pra d+hA no pa sardza ni/ /bi shaM ka TaM pr-i thu br-i hA twi shA laM pr-i thu laM ma hA ta/ /ba bro Na bi pu laM pI na pI d+h+na tus+thU la bi ba raM/ /sto kA l+ya k+Shul+la
<p>210b.2</p>seng ge sArdU la dang ni/ /glang chen la sogs skyes bu ni/ /gtso bo'i don gyi spyod yul lo/ /gong ma ma yin dman pa gnyis/ /'og ma dang ni ma rabs so/ /rgya chen yangs dang chen po dang / /gna' che rab che ma hA ste/ /chen po rgyas mthug sbom dang che/ /chung ba nyung ba cung zad dang / / 
<p>210b.3</p>kAHsAk+Sh+maM sh+lak+Sh+NaM da b+h+ra kr-i shan+ta nu/ /s+t+ri yAM mA trA trU TI puM si la ba le sha ka NA Na baH/ /pra b+hU taM pra tsU raM prA dz+ya ma da b+h+raM ba hu laM ba hu/ /pu ru haM pu ru b+hU yiSh+ThaM s+phi raM b+hU yash+tsa b+hu ri tsa/ /pa raHsha tA d+ya ste ye ShAM pa rA shAM khyA sha tA di kAta/ / 
<p>210b.4</p>phra mo bag tsam nyung shas chung / /mo ni cung zad nyung ba dang / /skyes bu phra mo zegs ma chung / /rab mang mang po dpag tu med/ /tshan can ba hu la ba hu'o/ /gang ba khengs pa mang po dang / /brtan pa mang po byur ba'o/ /brgya la sogs pa'i pha rol gyi/ /pha rol grangs kyi lhag pas brgya/ / 
<p>210b.5</p>ga Na nI yan+tu ga Ne yaM saM khyA te ga Ni ta ma tha sa maM sarbaM/ /bi shwa ka she ShaM kr-it+s+naM sa masta ni khi lA ni niHshe ShaM/ /sa ma graM sa ka la pUr+Na ma khaN+DaM s+yA da nU na kA /g+ha NaM ni ran+ta raM sAn+d+raM be la baM bi ra lan+ta nu/ /sa mI
<p>210b.6</p>bgrang bya gang zhig ga Ne yaM/ /grangs ni ga Ni taM de nas/ /'dra ba dang ni thams cad pa/ /sna tshogs ma lus zad par dang / /mtha' dag kun dang ril po dang / /rangs po yo ga ma lus pa/ /rdzogs pa cag ge gang ba dang / /dus min pa dang khengs pa'o/ /sdug po bar med phung pa'o/ /thor re ba dang
<p>211a</p>
<p>211a.1</p>pe ni ka TA san+na san+ni kr-iSh+Ta sa nI Da bta/ /sa de sA b+h+yA sa sha bi d+ha sa maR+Ya da sha pe sha bta/ /u pa kaN+ThAn+ti kA b+h+yar+N+NA b+h+ya grA a pya b+hi to\u0f85bya yaM/ /saM sak+te twa bya ba hi ta ma pa rAn+ta ra mi col le ba/ / 
<p>211a.2</p>@#/ /nye logs nye 'khor drung na mo/ /glos dang tho 'khor 'dra ba'o/ /phyogs mthun mnyam byed mtshungs par spyod/ /byed bcas mgrin mnyam mtha' gcig pa/ /'jug gcig mi bzad a bya yaM/ /yang dag chags dang 'byar ba dang / /shin tu 'thoms
<p>211a.3</p>t+ya pi/ /ne daSh+Thi man+ti ka ta maM s+yAd+dU raM bi pra kr-iSh+Ta kaM /da bI yash+tsa da biSh+Tany+tsa su dU re dIr+g+ha mA ya taM/ /brtu laM nista laM br-it+taM ban+d+hu raM tun+na tA na taM/ /Dats+tsa prAM shUn+na to da grots+tsh+ri tAstung+ge\u0f85tha bA ma ne/ /n+yad+nI tsa kharba hra
<p>211a.4</p>pa zhes pa yang / /phyogs mtha' phyogs mtshungs ring dang 'gyangs/ /shin tu ring 'gyangs ches ring dang / /ring po dang ni rgya che ba/ /zlum po ril mo zur mad sgong / /mtho dang mthon po ring mo dang / /ring dang rtse mo bsgreng dang mtho/ /de nas thung ba dma' ba dang / /mi mtho thung ngu 'phang
<p>211a.5</p>swAHs+yu ra bA grenyab na tA na taM/ /a rA laM br-i dzi naM dzi h+ma mUrmi mat+kuny+tsi taM na taM/ /A bi dwaM ku Ti laM b+hug+na be l+li taM ba kra mi t+ya pi/ /r-i dzA ba dzi h+ma pra gu No byaste twa pra gu NA ku lau/ /shA shwa tastu d+h+ru bo ni t+ya sa dA ha
<p>211a.6</p>dma' ba/ /rtse min dma' dang thung ba'o/ /yon po kyog po gcu po dang / /mi drang 'chus dang sgur ba dang / /kyog pa kyag kyog dgye dgu can/ /mi drang ba dang kyog pa'i ming / /drang po thad ka srongs pa po/ /'dres ma 'chol pa phyogs gcig min/ /rtag tu kun tu rgyun du dang / /gtan du
<p>211b</p>
<p>211b.1</p>na sa nA ta nAH/ /s+thAsnuHs+thi ra ta raHs+the yA ne ka ru pa ta yA tu yaH/ /ka la byA pi sa kU Tas+thaHs+thA ba ro dzang+ga me ta raH/ /tsa riSh+Nu dzaM ga ma tsa raM tra sa ming+gaM tsa rA tsa raM/ /tsa la na kam+ba naM kam+p+raM tsa laM lo laM tsa lA tsa laM/ /tsany+tsa lan+ta ra laM tsai
<p>211b.2</p>dang ni chags med pa/ /brtan po mi 'gyur rang bzhin gnas/ /gzugs gcig dus khyab mi 'gyur ba/ /gnas gzhan spyod pa gzhan spyod 'dod/ /bya spyod byed spyod bya byed spyod/ /g.yo dang ldeg pa 'gul ba'o/ /bskyod pa 'khyams pa yam yom dang / /ltag lteg shag shig sag
<p>211b.3</p>ba pA ri p+la ba pa ri p+la be/ /a ti rik+taHsa mA d+hi ko dr-i D+ha san+d+histu saM ha taH/ /kak+kha TaM ka Thi naM k+ShU raM ka Tho raM niSh+Thu raM dr-i D+haM/ /dza Tha raM mUr+t+ti man+mUr+t+taM pra br-id+d+haM prau D+ha me d+hi taM/ /pu rA Na pra ta na prat+na pu rA ta na tsi ran+ta nAMH/ / 
<p>211b.4</p>sig dang / /yongs su 'gul ba zhes pa'o/ /stong pa dang ni ting nge 'dzin/ /brtan po dang ni mi 'gyur ba/ /sra mkhregs mi shigs ka Tho raM/ /mi 'jigs mi phed sran dang ni/ /gong bu dang ni gor ma'o/ /'phel ba rgan po chen po dang / /rnying pa sngon skyes dang po pa/ /rnying ma dang ni yun ring ma/ / 
<p>211b.5</p>pra t+ya gro\u0f85b+hi na bo na byo na bI no nU ta no na baH/ /nUt+nash+tsa su ku mA ran+tu ko ma laM mr-i du laM mr-i du/ /an+d+ha gan+d+ha k+Sha ma nu go\u0f85nu pa daM klI ba ma bya yaM/ /pra t+ya k+ShaM s+yA dain+d+ri ya ka ma t+ya d+h+ya k+Sha man+tIn+d+ri yaM/ /e ka tA no\u0f85na
<p>211b.6</p>gsar pa so ma thog ma dang / /yag ma gzhon nu gsar pa'o/ /rab gzhon shin tu gzhon pa dang / /'jam pa dang ni mnyen dang 'bol/ /rjes 'gro phyi 'brang rjes 'jug dang / /rting 'brang ma ning mi zad pa/ /mngon sum dang ni dbang po'i yul/ /lkog tu gyur dang mngon sum min/ /gcig snga gcig sngon gcig
<p>212a</p>
<p>212a.1</p>n+ya br-it+ti re kA grai kA ya nA ba pi/ /a pye ka sarga e kA g+r+yo pye kA ya na ga to pi tsa/ /puM s+yA diHpUrba pau ra s+t+ya pra tha mA d+yA a tha s+t+ri yAM/ /an+to dza g+ha n+yaM tsa ra ma maM t+ya pAsh+tsa t+ya pash+tsi maM/ /meg+haM ni rar+tha kaM spaSh+TaM s+phu Ta pra byak+ta
<p>212a.2</p>@#/ /rtse dang / /gcig song gcig mtho gcig dang po/ /gcig rtse sngon du gcig song ba/ /skyes bu la sogs dang po dang / /thog ma dang po la sogs so/ /de nas mo dang mtha' ma dang / /phyi ma rting ma rjes ma dang / /gsham ma dang ni phyi shos so/ /don med pa dang don stong dang / /gsal dang rab
<p>212a.3</p>mu lwa NaM/ /sA d+hA ra Nan+tu sA mA N+ya me kA kI twe ka e ka kaH/ /b+hin+nAr+tha kA a n+ya ta ra e ka s+t+wo n+ye ta rA ba pi/ /uts+tsA ba tsaM nai ka b+he da muts+tsaN+Da ma bi laM bi taM/ /u tun+tu da stu mar+m+ma spr-i ga bA d+hAM tu ni rar+g+ga laM/ / 
<p>212a.4</p>gsal dri ma med/ /gzhi 'dzin dang ni spyi yin no/ /re re rkyang rkyang gcig pu'o/ /tha dad don dang gzhan dang ni/ /gcig gnas gzhan pa so so ba/ /tshig mang gcig dbyi min pa dang / /u tsaN+Da dang mi 'phyang ba/ /lugs dang tshul la reg pa dang / /'gog med pa dang mi 'gog pa/ / 
<p>212a.5</p>pra sa byaM pra ti kU laM s+yA da pa sa bya ma paSh+Thu tsa/ /bA maM sha rI raM sa byaM tu dak+Shi NaM/ /saM ka TaM nA tu sam+bA d+haHka li laM ga ha naM sa me/ /saM kIr+N+NaM saM ku lA kIr+N+NaM muN+Di taM pa ri bA pi taM/ /gran+thi taM ma bi taM dr-ib+d+haM
<p>212a.6</p>ldog pa dang ni phyir log pa/ /go bzlog dang ni phyin ci log /lus kyi g.yon ni sa byaM'o/ /a pa sa byaM g.yas phyogs so/ /shing rta dang ni sam+bArta/ /'dres pa 'chol ba 'dra ba'o/ /bsres pa 'khrugs pa 'dres pa'o/ /skra bregs pa dang bzhar ba'o/ /mnyes dang bsubs dang 'phur
<p>212b</p>
<p>212b.1</p>bis+t+r-i taM bi sr-i taM ta taM/ /an+tar+g+ga ta bi smr-i taM s+yAt+p+rap+ta pra Ni hi te sa me/ /bel+li ta preM khi tA d+hU ta ca li tA kam+pi tA d+hu te/ /nut+tan+nun+nAsta niSh+Th+yu tA bi dwa k+Ship+te ri tAHsA mAH/ /pa ri k+Ship+taM tu ni r+b+r-i taM mu
<p>212b.2</p>ba'o/ /rnam 'bab 'gro dang 'gyu ba'o/ /bar du song dang brjed pa dang / /thob pa rnyed dang mtshungs pa'o/ /ldeg pa 'khyor ba 'gul ba dang / /g.yo ldeg pa dang 'dar ba'o/ /'phul ba 'ded pa skul ba dang / /bskyed pa 'phul ba 'phen pa mtshungs/ /yongs su 'phangs dang ltogs pa'o/ /bskus pa
<p>212b.3</p>khi taM mU Shi tar+tha kaM /pra br-id+d+ha pra sr-i te n+yasta ni sr-iSh+Te gu ni tA ha te/ /ni dig+d+ho pa tsi te gU D+ha gup+te guN+Di ta ru Shi te/ /dru tA ba dIr+N+Ne ud+gUr+N+No d+ya te kA ri ta shi k+Shi te/ /g+h+rA Na g+h+rA te dig+d+ha la p+te sa mu dak+tod+d+h+r-i
<p>212b.4</p>dang ni bskus pa'i don/ /'phel dang rab tu skye ba dang / /mi 'bab pa dang mi ltung ba/ /rdeg pa dang ni snun pa'o/ /smin pa tshos pa yib dang gab/ /g.yogs pa dang ni byibs pa dang / /zhu ba zhun ma sbrengs pa dang / /'phyar dang bsgo ba slob pa'o/ /snom dang snams pa myug dang len/ /khron pa'i chu dang
<p>212b.5</p>te sa me/ /biSh+Ti taM s+yAd+ba la yi taM sam+bI taM rud+d+ha mA br-i taM/ /ru gU b+hUg+nenyatha ni shi ta k+Sh+Nu ta shA tA ni te dzi te/ /sh+yA di nA son+mu khaM pa kwaM hrI Na hrI tau tu ladz+dzi te/ /br-i te tu br-it+ta byA br-it+to saM yo dzi ta u pA hi taH/ /prA s+yad+ga
<p>212b.6</p>chu dong 'dra/ /bcings pa bsdoms pa dkris pa dang / /'gog pa dang ni bcings pa'o/ /chag pa dang ni zhig pa'o/ /de nas mtshan mo k+Shu Da shaT/ /snang mdo rnam nyams sgo tshos dang / /khrel dang ngo tsha 'dzem dog dang / /'khor ba 'jug pa 'khyil ba'o/ /yang dag 'byor pa sdeb pa dang / /thob bya 'gro
<p>213a</p>
<p>213a.1</p>myaM ma mA sA d+yaM s+yan+naM rI NaM shru taM snu taM/ /saM gU D+haHs+yAt+sad+ka li to\u0f85ba gI taHkhyA ta gar+ha NaH/ /bi bi d+haHs+yAd+ba hu bi d+ho nA nA rU paHpr-i thag+bi d+haH/ /a ba rI No d+hik+k+ri tash+tsA pya ba d+h+wastonyab tsUr+N+Ni
<p>213a.2</p>@#/ /bya bsdu ba sogs/ /'gro ba 'bab pa 'gyu dang 'jug /bsdoms nas brjod dang bsdu yig go/ /ngan pa dang ni dman par grags/ /rnam sgrub mang byed sna tshogs so/ /sna tshogs gzugs dang so sor sgrub/ /de nas smod dang skyon brjod dang / /bcom pa dang ni
<p>213a.3</p>taH/ /a NA yA sa kr-i taM phAN+NaM swa ni taM d+h+wa ni taM sa mi/ /bad+d+he san+dA ni taM mUr+N+Na mud+d+wi taM san+di taM si taM/ /niSh+pa kwaM kwa thi taM pA ke k+ShI rA dz+yA pa ya sAM shr-i taM/ /ni bA no mu ni ba h+n+yA dau nirbA ta stu ga tenyani le/ /pa kwaM pa ri Na te
<p>213a.4</p>phye mar byas/ /gsher rlan sgra byas sgrog byas mtshungs/ /'ching ba 'khyigs pa 'doms dang 'dogs/ /brtod pa dang ni dkris pa dang / /skol ba dang ni gdu ba'o/ /smin pa 'o mar 'o thug tshos/ /myang 'das thub pa'i mi la sogs/ /rlung me dang ni rlung mi 'jug /tshos pa yongs smin thul
<p>213a.5</p>gU NaM han+ne mI D+haM tu mU tri te/ /puSh+Te tu pu Shi ta so D+he k+ShAn+ta mu dwA na mung+ga te/ /dAn+tastu da mi te shAn+taHsha mi te prAr+thi tenyardi taH/ /dz+nyap+tastu dz+nya pi te ts+tshan+naM sh+tshA di te pU dzi tenyany+tsi taM/ /pUr+N+Nastu pU ri te kliSh+Ta kli shi tenyab si te si taH/ / 
<p>213a.6</p>ba'o/ /bshang ba gci ba bcags byas pa/ /rgyas pa dang ni gang ba'o/ /dus pa dang ni bzod pa'o/ /rgyas btab pa dang ab btab pa/ /nyon mongs bzod pa dul bya ste/ /zhi dul slong dang zhu ba'o/ /bsgo ba dang ni slob pa'o/ /g.yogs pa dang ni phub pa'o/ /mchod dang phul dang gang dang rdzogs/ / 
<p>213b</p>
<p>213b.1</p>pruSh+Ta p+luSh+To Shi tA dag+d+he taSh+Ta twaSh+Tau ta nU kr-i te/ /be d+hi tats+tsha dri tau bi dwai bin+na bit+tau bi tsA ri te/ /niSh+p+ra b+he bi ga tA ro kau bI lI ne bi dru ta dru tau/ /sid+d+he ni brit+ta niSh+pan+no dA ri te b+hin+na b+he di tau/ / 
<p>213b.2</p>nyon mongs dang ni sems sdug dang / /zin la khad dang bsregs dang tshig /bzhogs dang bzhur dang chung ngur byas/ /phug dang brtol dang phug pa byas/ /rnam dpyad brtag dpyad rnam par phye/ /mdangs med bkrag med mdog ngan no/ /stug po 'thug po dru ta'o/ /grub pa zin pa rdzogs pa'o/ /gses pa
<p>213b.3</p>U taM s+yu ta mu taM tse ti tri ta yan+taM tu san+ta te/ /s+yA dar+hi te na ma pyi ta ma na si ta ma pa tsA pi tArtsi tA pa tsi taM/ /ba ri ba shi te ba ri bas+yi ta mu pA shi taM tso pa tsa ri taM tsa/ /san+tA pi tastu tap+to d+hU pi ta d+hU pA yi tau tsa dU Nash+tsaH/ /hr-iSh+To mat+ta s+t+r-ip+taH 
<p>213b.4</p>phye ba dbyes pa'o/ /dog pa rnal ma ran ma gnas/ /thabs kyi rgyu rnams brkyang ba'o/ /mchod pa bkur sti rim gro dang / /bsnyen bkur dang ni ri mo byas/ /zhabs thog zhabs 'bring bkur ba'o/ /rab tu tsha dang gdung ba dang / /sems sdug sdug bsngal tsha ba dang / /yid dga' sems dga'
<p>213b.5</p>pra h+lan+naHpra mu di taHprI taHmA na shA/ /ts+tshan+naM taM lU naM kr-i tuM dA taM di taM tshi taM br-ik+taM/ /srastaM d+h+wastaM b+h+rastaM skan+naM pan+naM ts+yu taM ga li taM/ /lab+d+haM prAp+taM bin+naM b+hA bi ta mA sA di taM tsa b+hU tany+tsa/ /an+be Shi taM ga be Shi ta ma n+wiSh+TaM mArgi
<p>213b.6</p>tshims dang rangs/ /rab tu dga' dang mnyes pa'o/ /bcad pa gtubs pa bregs pa dang / /bkas pa phye ba phral ba dang / /'thub pa dang ni gcod pa'o/ /bcom pa dang ni zhig dang nyams/ /brlag pa chud zos zags dang nyams/ /thob pa rnyed pa phrad pa dang / /dngos rnyed thob pa rnyed pa'o/ /tshol ba rjes tshol lta ba
<p>214a</p>
<p>214a.1</p>taM mr-i gi taM/ /Ar+d+raM sAr+d+raM klin+naM ti mi taM sa mun+na mut+tany+tsa/ /trA taM trA NaM rak+Shi ta ma bi ta go pA yi taM gud+taM/ /a ba ga ni ta ma ba ma tA ba dz+nyA te a ba mA ti tany+tsa pa ri b+hU te/ /t+ya k+taM hI naM ni d+hu taM sa
<p>214a.2</p>@#/ /dang / /lam rtogs pa dang myul ba'o/ /sge'u gsher rlon pa rlan can dang / /bangs so thags can sge'u gsher rlon/ /skyabs dang skyob pa srung ba dang / /sbed pa sgrib pa sbas pa'o/ /brnyas pa rngan can tsho khyod dang / /khog chung dang ni yongs gcod do/ /btang ba bor ba spangs pa dang / / 
<p>214a.3</p>mudz+dz+hi d+hU ta mut+s+r-iSh+TaM ga taM/ /uk+taM b+hA Shi ta mu di taM dzalpi ta mA khyA ta ma ti hi taM la pi taM/ /bud+d+ha bu d+hi taM ma ni taM bi di taM pra ti pan+na ma ba si tA ba ga taM/ /U ri kr-i ta mu ra rI kr-i ta mA shru ta pra ti dz+nyA taM/ /paM gIr+N+NaM bi di ta saM shru ta sa
<p>214a.4</p>'phangs dang bskyur ba dor ba'o/ /smra ba brjod pa zlos pa gtam/ /grags pa lo rgyus bka' mchid do/ /go dang rtogs dang khong du chud/ /rigs dang shes dang kun chub po/ /khas blangs dam bca' byed por byas/ /khas 'che chad byas zhal gyis bzhes/ /khas blangs blangs pa'i ming yin no/ / 
<p>214a.5</p>mA hi to pa shru to pa ga taM/ /I li taM shasta pa NA yi ta pra Nu ta pa Ni ta pa ni tA ni/ /a pi gIr+N+Na bar+N+Ni tA b+hiSh+Tu te hi tA nistu tAr+thA Ni/ /b+hak+Shi ta tsarbi ta lib+ta pra t+ya ba shi ta gi li ta khA di tAs+sA taM/ /a b+h+ya ba hu tAn+nA dzag+d+ha grasta glas+t+ra si taM b+huk+te/ /k+Shi piSh+Thak+Sho
<p>214a.6</p>snyan pa bsngags pa legs par brjod/ /bstod pa brjod pa sgrogs pa dang / /ngag snyan tshig snyan bsngags pa dang / /legs brjod grags brjod yon tan brjod/ /zos pa 'chos pa myangs pa dang / /ldad pa mid pa gsol dang zas/ /shin tu g.yo dang shin tu phra/ /shin tu mchog
<p>214b</p>
<p>214b.1</p>diSh+Tha ba riSh+Tha s+tha biSh+Tha baM hiSh+ThAH/ /k+Shi pra k+Shu drA b+hIp+si ta pr-i thu pI ba ra ba hu kaR+ShAr+thAH/ /sA d+hiSh+Tha drA g+hi Sh+Tha pheSh+Tha ga rISh+Tha hra siSh+Tha br-in+diSh+ThAH/ /bA Ta byA ya ta ba hu gu ru bA ma na br-in+dA ra kA ri sha ye/ /bi she Sh+ya ni g+h+na br-in+daH// ! // 
<p>214b.2</p>tu rgya che yangs/ /myur phra mngon 'dod rgya che rgyas/ /mang po shin tu mthar thug don/ /sgrub pa phul phyin byed phul phyin/ /mang ba'i phul phyin lce phul phyin/ /thung ba'i phul byung tshogs phul phyin/ /sgrub khyab mang lci thung ba dang / /tshogs pa rnams ni phul phyin no/ / 
<p>214b.3</p>bye brag gzhan dbang gi sde tshan no// ! //pra kr-i ti pra t+ya yAr+thA d+yaiHsaM kAr+N+Na ling+ga mun+na yeta/ /kar+m+ma kri yA tad+sA t+ye ga myA s+yu ra pa rasba rAH/ /sA ka l+yA saM ga bany+tsa ne pA ra ya Na pa rA ya Ne/ /ya dr-its+tshA swai ri tA he tu shU n+yA twA s+yA bi la k+Sha NaM/ /sha ma thastu
<p>214b.4</p>rang bzhin rkyen las sogs don gyis/ /'dres pa'i rtags rnams shes par bya/ /las dang bya ba de dag tu/ /'gro ba'o phan tshun min pa rnams/ /tshogs pa zla yi tshig la ni/ /pha rol 'gro dang pha rol brten/ /dbang du byed dang rang dbang byed/ /rgyu stong gnas dang mtshan nyid bral/ /zhi dang dul
<p>214b.5</p>sha maHshAn+tirdAn+ti stu da ma tho da maH/ /a ba dA NaM kar+m+ma br-it+taM kA mya dA Na pra bA ra NaM/ /ba sha kri yA sam+ba da naM mU la kar+m+ma tu kAr+m+ma NaM/ /bi d+hu ba NaM bi d+hu na naM tar+pa NaM prI Na nA ba naM/ /paR+YAp+tiHs+yAt+pa ri trA NaM hasta bA ra Na mi t+ya pi/ / 
<p>214b.6</p>dang des pa'o/ /bzod dang nus dang thub pa'o/ /rtogs brjod sngar gyi las 'jug go/ /'dod pa sbyin pa rab mchog go/ /dbang byed dbang du sdud pa dang / /rtsa ba'i las dang las su bya/ /g.yo ba dang ni 'dar bar byed/ /ngoms pa dang ni tshim pa'o/ /chog pa yongs bsrungs lag pa 'gebs/ / 
<p>215a</p>
<p>215a.1</p>se ba NaM sI ba NaM s+yu birbe da raHspu Ta naM b+hi dA/ /A kro shA na ma b+hi ShaM gaHse bo dwo be da nA na nA/ /sa mUr+ts+tsha na ma b+hi byap+ti p+ti R+YAts+nyA b+hi k+ShAr+Tha nA\u0f85r+d+ha nA/ /bar+d+ha naM ts+tshe da ne\u0f85tha dwe A nan+da na
<p>215a.2</p>@#/ /'tshem pa tshem bu sbyor ba dang / /'dra ba gcod pa gtum pa'o/ /khro ba dang ni mngon par khro/ /tshor ba myong ba nyams su myong / /brgyal ba mngon par khyab pa dang / /slong ba bsod snyoms 'dod don slong / /gcod pa dang ni gse ba'o/ /de nas gnyis po dri rmad
<p>215a.3</p>sa b+hA dza ne/ /A pr-its+tsha Na ma thAm+nA yaHsaM pra dA yaHk+Sha ye k+Shi yA/ /gra he grA ho ba shaHkAn+tau rak+Sh+Nus+t+rA Ne ra NaHkwa Ne/ rgyu dang mi gsal smra'o/ /bya d+ho be d+hi pa tsA pA ke ha bo hu tau ba ro br-i tau/ /o ShaHp+lo She na yo nA
<p>215a.4</p>dang / /khams bde mi bde 'dri ba'o/ /de nas man ngag sdom pa'o/ /zad pa dang ni rdzogs pa'o/ /len pa dang ni blangs pa'o/ /mdangs can dang ni 'tsher ba'o/ /bsrung ba dang ni skyabs pa'o/ /'bugs pa 'bigs pa tshos pa smin/ /'bad pa dang ni sbron pa'o/ /mchog dang rab dang sreg
<p>215a.5</p>ye dz+yA ni rdzIr+N+Nau b+h+ra mo b+h+ra mau/ /s+phA ti r+b+r-id+d+hau pra thA khyA tau spr-iSh+TiHpr-ik+tau sra baHsrA be/ /mr-i d+hA sa mr-i d+h+wo s+pha ra NaM s+phu ra Ne pra mi tau pra mA/ /pra sU ti pra sa re sh+ts+yo te prA g+hA raHkla ma thaHkla me/ /ut+kaR+Sho\u0f85
<p>215a.6</p>dang tshig /mdun ma gros dang rgas 'khogs pa/ /nor 'khrul rgyas dang 'phel ba'o/ /rab tu grags dang grags pa'o/ /reg pa dang ni 'byar ba'o/ /'bab ltung 'phel ba yang dag 'phel/ /'phro dang spro ba tshad ma tsha/ /rab skyes 'bung dang ltung dang ltung / /ngal ba dang ni du ba pa'o/ /shin tu ba dang
<p>215b</p>
<p>215b.1</p>ti sa ye san+d+hiHsh+le ShA bi Sha ya A sha ye/ /k+Shi pA yAM k+She pa NaM gIr+N+Nirgi rau gu ra Na mung+Ya me/ /un+nA ya un+na ye shrA yaHshra ya ne dza ya nA dza yaH/ /ni gA do ni ga de mA do ma de ud+be ga ud+b+h+ra me/ /bi ma da naM pa ri ma lonyab+h+yu pa pat+te ra
<p>215b.2</p>phul du phyin/ /'byar ba dang ni 'khyud pa'o/ /yul brten pa dang 'phen dang 'phul/ /ri dang ri bo rnam 'tshe gnod/ /'degs pa bstod pa reg rten no/ /rgyal dang rgyal brjod dbyangs rgyags khengs/ /gyen du bskyod dang steng du bskyod/ /rnam par nyed dang yongs su nyed/ /mngon par skyed dang
<p>215b.3</p>Nu gra haH/ /ni gra hasta dwi rud+d+haHs+yA da b+hi yo ga s+t+wa b+hi gra haH/ /muSh+Ti ban+d+hastu saM gra ho Dim+be Da ma ra bi p+la bau/ /ban+d+ha naM pra si tish+tsA raHspaR+shaHspraSh+To pa tap+ta ri/ /ni kA ro bi pra kA raHs+yA da kA ra s+t+wing+ga ing+gi taM/ / 
<p>215b.4</p>rjes su 'dzin/ /mi 'dzin de dang 'gal ba'o/ /mngon par sbyor dang mngon par 'dzin/ /khu tshur bcings dang yang dag bzung / /chom po jag pa srang pa'o/ /'brel pa skyes dang spyod pa'o/ /nad pa reg bya rlung nad dang / /gnod byed nyes pa byed pa'o/ /dgongs pa dang ni don len dang / / 
<p>215b.5</p>pa ri NA mo bi kA ro dwe sarme tsa kr-i ti bi kri ye/ /a pa hA ras+t+wa pa tsa yaHsa mA hA raHsa mu tsa yaH/ /pra t+yA hA ra u pA dA na bi hA rastu pa ri kra maH/ /a b+hi hA ro\u0f85b+hi gra ha naM nir+hA ro\u0f85b+h+yu kaR+Sha
<p>215b.6</p>yongs su 'bab dang rnam 'gyur gnyis/ /sar me byed dang rnam par brje/ /'phrog pa dang ni ba sogs pa dang / /mnyam par bsdu dang kun tu sogs/ /so sor sdud dang nye bar len/ /spyod lam bzhi snod skor ba'i rim/ /mngon par bsdus dang mngon par len/ /bsdu ba dang ni mngon
<p>216a</p>
<p>216a.1</p>NaM/ /a nu hA ronyanu kA raHs+yA dar+tha s+yA pa ga me bya yaH/ /pra bA ha tu pra br-it+ti s+yAt+p+ra ba ho ga ma naM ba hiH/ /bi yA mo bi ya mo yA mo ya maHsaM yA ma saM ya mau/ /hin+sA kar+m+mA b+hi tsA ra s+yA dzA ga R+YAdzA ga rA dwa
<p>216a.2</p>@#/ /par 'dren/ /rjes su 'gyed dang rjes su sgrub/ /de nas song zin mi zad pa/ /'jug pa dang ni rab tu 'bab/ /'byung dang 'jug dang 'gyu ba'o/ /mtshe ma zung ma 'khrugs ma dang / /sbyar don zung dang bubs dag go/ /rnam 'tshe'i las dang mngon spyod do/ /gnyid med gnyid
<p>216a.3</p>yaH/ /bi g+h+no\u0f85n+ta rA yaHpra t+yu haHs+yA dU pa g+h+no\u0f85n+ti kA shra yo/ /nirbi she u pa b+ho gaHs+yAt+pa ri saR+YaHpa ri kri yA/ /bi d+hu raM tu pra bi sh+le Sho\u0f85b+hi prA yash+tshan+da A sha yaH/ /sa k+She pa NaM sa ma sa naM paR+YA ba s+thA bi
<p>216a.4</p>chags gnyid yin no/ /bgegs dang bar chad grub pa'i bgegs/ /'byung po nyer 'dus mchod cing 'dug /nges par 'dug dang nye bar spyod/ /rjes su byed dang yongs su byed/ /lhan cig mi gnas spangs te 'gag /dgongs can 'dun pa nges don min/ /mdor bsdus pa dang bsdu ba'o/ /mi mthun
<p>216a.5</p>ro d+ha ni/ /pa ri saR+Ya pa rI sA raHs+yA dA s+yA twA sa nAs+thi tiH/ /bistA ro bi gra ho byA shaHsa tsa shab+da s+ya bi sta ra/ /s+yAn+marda naM sam+bA ha naM bi nA shaHs+yA da daR+sha naM/ /saM sta baHs+yAt+pa ri tsa yaHpra sa rastu bi sarba naM/ /nI bA pa
<p>216a.6</p>dang 'gal ba'o/ /yongs su brkyang dang brkyang ba'o/ /'gro 'jug stan dang gnas yin no/ /rgya che yangs pa cher yangs so/ /de yang sgra yis rgyas pa'o/ /byug pa dang ni bsku byug go/ /nyams pa dang ni mthong ba med/ /shes pa dang ni yongs su 'dris/ /khyed pa dang ni rnam par khyed/ /nges tshig dang ni
<p>216b</p>
<p>216b.1</p>kastu pra yA maHs+yAtshan+ni d+hiHsan+ni kaR+Sha Na/ /la bonyab+hi lA bo la ba ne niSh+pA baHpa ba ne pa baH/ /prastA baHs+yA da ba sa raHsU tra beSh+Ta naM/ /pra dza naHs+yA du pa sa raHpra sa raHpra Na yaHsa mau/ /d+hI shak+tirniSh+k+ra monyas+t+rI tu saM kra mo dur+g+ga sany+tsa raH/ /pra
<p>216b.2</p>rab tu nges/ /nye 'khor nye logs dag dang ni/ /rnga ba 'breg pa 'bal ba'o/ /nges 'byed 'phyar dang 'khrab pa'o/ /gnas skabs dang ni skabs yin no/ /thags spun son pa snal ma dkri/ /she sbyor 'khrig dang tshogs pa mtshungs/ /blo nus dang ni chu srol lo/ /mo min zam pa bgrod dka' zam/ /'khrug
<p>216b.3</p>t+yut+k+ra maHpra yo gAr+thaHpra kra maHs+yA du pra kra maH/ /s+yA da s+yA dA na mud+g+hA ta A raM b+haHsam+b+h+ra mas+t+wa rA/ /pra ti ban+d+haHpra tiSh+Tam+b+honyab nA yastu ni pA ta naM/ /u pa lam+b+has+t+wa nu b+ha baHsa mA lam+b+ho be le pa naM/ /bi pra lam+b+ho bi pra yo go bi mam+b+ha s+t+wa ti sar+dz+dza naM/ /bi shrA bstu
<p>216b.4</p>phyir 'jug dang rab sbyor don/ /khom pa dang ni mgo 'ju ba/ /'ju ba rtsom pa A raM b+ha/ /tam tam tur tur bar chad gegs/ /'og min 'og tu lta ba'o/ /sngon shes slar yang 'phel ba'o/ /bsku byug dang ni byug pa'o/ /rjes chags dang ni sbyor ba'o/ /sbyin ster rnam grags rab tu
<p>216b.5</p>pra bi khyA ti ra be k+ShA pra ti dzA ga raH/ /ni pA Tha ni pa Thau pA The te ma ste mau sa mund ne/ /A dI na bA shra bau kle she me la ke saM ga saM ga mau/ /saM bI k+Sha NaM bi tsa ya naM mAr+g+ga NaM mr-i ga NA mr-i gaH/ /pa ri ram+b+haHpa ri Sh+waM gaHsaM sh+le Sha u pa gU ha naM/ / 
<p>216b.6</p>grags/ /mel tse ba dang so pa'o/ /des klog nges brjod 'don pa'o/ /bangs dang gsher bangs rlon pa'o/ /kun nas dman dang zag nyon mongs/ /tshogs pa 'dus pa 'phungs pa'o/ /lta ba 'tshol ba myul 'tshol lta/ /yongs 'khyud yongs 'byar yang dag reg /nyer 'dzin nyer
<p>217a</p>
<p>217a.1</p>nirbar+N+Na naM tu naM d+h+yA naM daR+sha nA lo ka ni k+Sha NaM/ /pra t+yA khyA naM ni ra sa naM pra t+yA de sho ni rA kri tiH/ /u pa sA yo bi shA yash+tsa par+YA ya sha ya nAr+tha kau /ar+t+ta naM tsa dz+ha tI yA tsa hr-i NI yA tsa g+h+r-i tor+tha ke /s+yAd+b+ya t+yA so bi par+YA so bya t+ya yash+tsa bi paR+Ya ye/ /par+YA yonyati kra mastasmin+na
<p>217a.2</p>lta rtog dang gzir/ /snang bar byed dang lta ba'o/ /phyir rgol zlog pa 'gog dang 'gegs/ /rnam grangs ming gzhan ming rim don/ /skyug bro btsog pa skyug bro don/ /bzlog pa phyir bzlog rnam bzlog log /'gongs pa 'phyangs
<p>217a.3</p>ti pA ta u pa t+ya yaH/ /pre Sha Na yat+sa mA hU ya ta tra s+yat+p+ra ti shA sa naM/ /sa saM stA baHkra tu Shu yAstu sti b+hU mi r+d+wi dzan+ma naM/ /ni d+hA ya tak+Sh+ya te ya tra kASh+The kASh+ThaM sa ud+g+ha na/ /stam+bag+h+na stustam+ba g+ha naHsa stam+bo ye na ni ha n+ya
<p>217a.4</p>pa rgal dang 'phar/ /pre Sha Na ni gang bos nas/ /de la slar yang bsgo ba'o/ /mchod sbyin dang ni mchod pa dang / /bstod pa'i sa gzhi gnyis skyes rnams/ /shing stan shing stegs gang la ni/ /shing stan shing ni ud+g+ha na/ /sdong po 'joms dang sdong 'joms so/ /de sdong gang gis nges
<p>217a.5</p>te/ /A bi d+ho bi d+h+ya te ye na ta tra bi shwa ka sa me ni g+haH/ /ut+kA rAsh+tsa ni kA rash+tsa dwau d+hA n+yot+k+Shi pa nAr+tha kau /ni gA rong+gA ra bi k+Sha bod+g+rA hAstu ga ra NA di Shu/ /A rA t+ya ba ra ti bi ra ta ya u pa rA me bAs+t+ri yAn+tu neSh+Ta baH/ /niSh+Th+yu
<p>217a.6</p>'joms pa/ /kun brdol mtho ba gang de la/ /sna tshogs can mnyam ni g+ha'o/ /byur bu dang ni phung po dang / /so ba steng du 'dren pa'i don/ /sgrigs pa dang ni gyen bzlog dang / /gsus pa sgregs pa la sogs so/ /nyer 'gro bar ti bi rta ya/ /u pa ra me mo min no/ /glo lu dang ni lud pa lu/ /glo 'khogs
<p>217b</p>
<p>217b.1</p>tirniSh+The ba na niSh+ThI ba na mi t+ya b+hin+nA ni/ /dza ne be dzU tiHsa ti s+t+wa ba sA naM s+yA da tha dz+wa ro dzUr+t+tiH/ /u da dzastu pa shu pre ra Na ma ka ra Ni ri t+yA da yaHshA pA/ /go trAn+te b+h+ya sta s+yab+dan+da mi t+yau pa ga ba kA di kaM /A pU pi kaM shASh+ku li ka me ba mA d+ya ma tse ta
<p>217b.2</p>dang ni lud pa 'og /'khogs pa zhes pa tha dad min/ /skyugs skyu pa ti rig byed do/ /de nas rims dang tshad pa dang / /u da dza na phyugs bskul ba/ /bya min zhes sogs smod mo'o/ /rigs mthar de yi lo tshigs la/ /au pa ga pa kA la sogs/ /bems po sems med rigs med dang / /de bzhin sems
<p>217b.3</p>sAM/ /mA na bA nAM tu mA Na byaM sa hA yA NAM sa hA ya tA/ /ha l+yA ha lA naM brA h+ma N+ya bA Da bye tu dwi dzan+ma naM/ /dwai paR+Shu kA nAM pr-iSh+ThA NAM pAr+sh+waM pr-iSh+Th+ya ma nu kra mAta/ /kha lA nAM kha li nI kha l+yA pra tha mA nu Sh+ya kaM nr-i NAM/ / 
<p>217b.4</p>med la sogs pa/ /byis pa dang ni bu tsha ba'o/ /lhan cig 'gro dang dus gcig 'gro/ /thong gshol can dang gshol tshigs so/ /bram ze smra po gnyis skyes rnams/ /gnyis po rtsib logs rgyab rnams kyi/ /pAr+sh+waM pr-iSh+Th+ya go rims bzhin/ /g.yul sa g.yul thang g.yul kha'o/ /de nas mi tshoms mi rnams kyi/ / 
<p>217b.5</p>grA ma tA dza na tA d+hU mya bA sh+'+ya gA l+ya pr-i thak+p+r-i thaka /a pi shA ha shra kA rI Sha bAr+m+ma NA tharba NA di kaM /saM kIr+N+Na bar+g+gaH// ! //nA nAr+thaHke pi kAn+tA di brge Sh+we bA tra kIr+t+ti tAH/ /b+hU ri pra yo gA ye ye Shu par+YA ye Sh+wa pi
<p>217b.6</p>grong tshoms skye tshoms du ba mnom/ /zhag tshoms ga N+ya so so'o/ /stong tshogs dang ni lci me tshogs/ /go cha'i tshogs dang rig byed sogs/ /'dres ma'i sde tshan no// ! //'dis ni sna tshogs don gyi sder/ /byed po rnams la dang po gsum/ /de yi 'jug yul rnams la bzhi/ /sbyar bas rtogs par bya ba'o/ /sna tshogs don la ka mtha' sogs/ /sde tshan gyis ni 'dir grags so/ /mang po la sbyor gang gang la/ /rnam grangs la sbyor
<p>218a</p>
<p>218a.1</p>te Shu te/ /A ka she tri di be nA ko lo kastu b+hu ba ne dza ne/ /pa d+ye ya sha si tsa sh+lo kaHsha re khaD+ge tsa sa ya kaH/ /dzaM bu kau kroSh+Du ba ru Nau pr-i thu kau tsi pi TAr+g+b+ha kau /A lo kau daR+sha no d+yo tau b+he rI pa Ta ha mA na kau /ut+saM ga tsi h+na yo raM kaHka laM
<p>218a.2</p>@#/ /de dang de/ /nA ka nam mkha' skabs gsum la/ /lo ka sa gzhi skye bo la/ /sh+lo ka rkang bcad grags pa la/ /mda' dang ral gri sA ya ka /ce spyang chu bdag dzam bu ka /sna nyeg byis pa pr-i thu ka /mthong 'od dag la A lo ka /rnga chen rnga rings mA na ka /phang pa rtags dag aM ka'o/ /rtags
<p>218a.3</p>ko\u0f85dkA pa bA da yoH/ /tak+Sha ko nA ga bar+d+hakyo rarkaHs+pha Ti ka sU r+ya yoH/ /mA ru te be d+ha si brad+h+ne puM na pho shi kaHkaM shi ronyam+bu noH/ /s+yAt+pu lA kastuts+tshad+hA n+yai saM k+She pe b+hak+ta sik+tha ke /u lU ke ka ri NaHputs+tsha mU lo pAn+te tsa se tsa kaH/ /ka maN+Da lau tsa ka ra
<p>218a.4</p>mtshan ngan smra ka laM ka /klu dang shing 'jog tak+Sha ka /arka shel dang nyi ma la'o/ /kaHni rlung dang tshangs nyi ma/ /kaM ni mgo dang chu dag la/ /pu lA ka ni spun stong dang / /bsdus dang zan gyi snyigs ma la'o/ /pe tsa ka ni 'jug pa dang / /glang po'i mjug ma'i mtha' nye la'o/ /spyi blugs ser ba ka ra ka / 
<p>218a.5</p>kaHsu ga te tsa bi nA ya kaH/ /kiSh+ku haste bi taste tsa shU ka kI Te tsa br-ish+tsa kaH/ /pra ti kU le pra tI kas+t+ri Sh+we ka de she tu pu s+ya yaM/ /s+yAd+b+hU ti kan+tu b+hU nim+be ka tr-i Ne b+hUs+t+r-i Ne pi tsa/ /dz+yot+s+ni kA yany+tsa g+ho pe tsa ko shA ta kya tha kaT+pha le/ / 
<p>218a.6</p>bde gshegs log 'dren nA ya ka /kiSh+ku khru dang mtho la'o/ /shU ka srin bu sdig sbrul lo/ /pra ti ku ni mi mthun phyogs/ /gsum yin phyogs gcig pho 'di yin/ /b+hU ti kaM ni tik+ta dang / /rA ma ga pu ra li ga dur/ /zla ba'i 'od zer dag dang ni/ /gong bu sgrag can ko shArkya/ /de nas kaT+pal seng ldeng
<p>218b</p>
<p>218b.1</p>si ti tsa kha di re so ma balkaHs+yA da tha sih+la ke/ /ti la kalke tsa pi N+ya ko bA h+lI kaM rA ma The pi tsa/ /ma hen+d+ra dbang chen/ gug+gu lU lU ka byA la grA hi Shu kau shi ka /ruk+tA pa saM kA swA taM kaHswalpe pi k+Shul+la kas+t+ri Shu/ /dzai ba tri kaHsa shAM ke pi khu re pya shwa s+ya brta kaH/ /byA g+h+re pi puN+Da rI ko nA ya
<p>218b.2</p>dkar/ /zla ba'i shun pa de nas ni/ /sih+la 'ba' cha pi N+ya ka /bAh+lI kaM ni shing kun kyang / /mchod dbang gu gul 'ug pa dang / /sbrul 'dzin rnams la kau shi ka/ /nang tsha 'jig pa a taM ka /nyung chung k+Shul+la ka gsum mo/ /yun ring 'tsho ba ri bong mtshan/ /rta rmig zlum po brta ka /puN+Da rI ka gzigs pad dkar/ / 
<p>218b.3</p>bA n+yA ma pi dA bya kaH/ /shA lA br-i kAHka pi kroSh+Ta shwa naHswa r+Ne pi gai ri ka /pI DAr+the pi bya li kaM s+yA da lI kaM twa pr-i yenyanr-i te/ /shI lA n+wa yA ba nu ke dwe shalke sha ka la balka le/ /sASh+Te sha te su bar+NA nAM he m+n+Yu ro b+hU Sha Ne pa le/ / 
<p>218b.4</p>smad pa mi ni yang 'od can/ /shA lA br-i ka spre'u dang / /ce spyang dang ni khyi yin no/ /btsag dang gser la gai ri ka /bya li ka ni gzir ba'i don/ /a lI ka ni mi mdza' bsnun/ /ngang tshul rjes 'gro a nu ka /shalke dum bu shing shun la/ /gser srang brgya rtsa brgyad dang ni/ /gser dang brang gi rgyan dang srang / /tha
<p>218b.5</p>dI nA re pi tsaniSh+kos+t+r-I kalko\u0f85s+t+rI sa ma lai na soH/ /dam+b+he bya tha pi nA ko\u0f85s+t+ri shU la shaM ka ra d+ha n+wa noH/ /d+he nu kA tu ka re N+wAny+tsa me g+ha dzA le tsa kA li kA /kA ri kA pA ta nAM br-it+t+yoHkar+N+Ni kA kar+N+Na b+hU Sha Ne/ /ka ri ha stAM gu lau pad+ma
<p>218b.6</p>thong Ti ka'i ming / snyad la yang niSh+ko'o/ /mo min kalka dri ma dang / /sdig sems khengs pa rnams la yang / /de nas bi nA ka zhes pa/ /mo min mdud dang bde byed gzhu/ /ba bzhon glang mo d+he nu kA/ /char sprin u ma kA li kA/ /zug rngu 'grel pa kA ri kA/ /kar+Ni kA ni rna rgyan dang / /glang mo lag pa'i sor gdub dang / 
<p>219a</p>
<p>219a.1</p>bI dza ko Sh+yAM tri ShUt+ta re/ /br-in+dA kau rU pi mu khyA be ke mu khyA n+ya ke ba lAH/ /s+yAd+dAm+b+hi ke kauk+ku Ti ko yash+tsA dU re ri tek+Sha NaH/ /lA lA Ti kaHpra b+hor+b+hA ba daR+ShI kAr+YA k+Sha mash+tsa yaH/ /b+h+rU b+h+r-in+ni tam+ba ba la ya tsakre Shu ka
<p>219a.2</p>@#/ /pad+mo'i sa bon ze 'bru'o/ /br-in+dA ra ka gzugs ldan gtso/ /e ka gtso bo gzhan ma 'dres/ /kok+ku Ti ka tshul 'chos dang / /gnya' shing gang tsam du lta ba'i dge slong bzang bo dang / /gang yang ring du mi lta ba/ /lA lA Ti ka gtso sems mthong / /'ga' zhig mi nus pa la yang / /mo min ka Ta ka ni ri/ /mtho ba gdu bu
<p>219a.3</p>Ta konyas+t+ri yaM/ /sU tsa gre duSh+Ta sa twe tsa ro ma hAR+She tsa kaN+Da kaH/ /kAn+tAH// ! //ma yU khas+t+wiT+ka ra dz+wA la swa li bA Nau shi lI mU khau/ /shaM kho ni d+hau la lA TAs+th+ni kam+bau nas+t+rIn+d+ri yenyapi khaM/ /g+h+r-i Ni dz+wa le a pi shi khe/ /khAn+taH/ /shai
<p>219a.4</p>'khor lo la'o/ /khab rtse gdug pa'i sems can dang / /spu zing byed pa kaN+Da kaH/ /ka'i mtha' can rnams so// //mar me srin 'bar ma yU kha/ /shi li mu kha bung ba mda'/ /shaM kha gter dpral rus dung la/ /kham ni bar snang mo dbang la'ang / /'od dang 'bar ba'ang shi khe'o/ /kha'i mtha' 'o/ /ri
<p>219a.5</p>la br-ik+Shau na gA ba gau/ /A shu gau bA yu bi shi khau sha rArka bi ha gAHkha gAH/ /pa taM gau pak+Shi sU r+Yau tsa yU gaH kra mu ka br-ind yoH/ /pa sha bo pi mr-i gA be gaH pra bA ha dza ba yo ra pi/ /pa ra gaH kau su me re Nau snA nI yA dau ra dzas+ya pi/ /ga dze pi nA ga mA
<p>219a.6</p>shing 'gro med a go'o/ /A shu go ni rlung dang mda'/ /mda' nyi 'dab chags kha gA'o/ /pa taM ga ni bya nyi ma/ /yU ga kra mu mu ba zer tshogs pa dag /phyugs dang ri dgas mr-i ga'o/ /be ga len dang rgyug pa la'o/ /ba ra ga ni me tog ze/ /khrus tshal dang ni rdul la yang / /glang po klu dang drang srong gi /gtum po
<p>219b</p>
<p>219b.1</p>tang+gA ba pAM gasti la ke pi tsa/ /sargaHswa b+hA ba nirmok+Sha nish+tsa yA d+h+yA ya sr-iSh+Ti Shu/ /yo gaHsan+na ha no pA ya d+h+yA na saM ga ti yuk+ti Shu/ /b+ho ga su khes+t+yA di b+hU tA ba hesh+tsa pha Na kA ya yoH/ /tsAta ke ha ri Ne puM pi sA
<p>219b.2</p>rnams la mA tang+ga/ /yag zur dpyal thig a pAM ga /sarga rang bzhin nges grol dang / /nges pa le'u skyed rnams la/ /yo ga go gyon pa dang thabs/ /bsam gtan sbyor ba rigs rnams la/ /b+ho ga bde dang bud med sogs/ /sbyor ba sprul gdengs lus dag la/ /sA raM ga ni khug rta dang / /ri dgas
<p>219b.3</p>raM gaHsha ba le triShu/ /ka yau tsa bla ba gaHsha pe twa b+hi Sh+wang+ga pa ra b+ha be/ /yA nA d+yang+ge yu ga puM si yu gaM yug+me kr-i tA di Shu/ /swarge Shu pa shu bAg+badzra dig ne tra g+h+r-i Ni b+hU dza le/ /lak+Sh+ya dr-iSh+T+yA s+t+ri yAM puM si gau liM gaM tsi h+na se
<p>219b.4</p>skyes bu khra bo rnams/ /spre'u sbal ba bla ba gaH/ /a b+hi Sh+waM ga mna' dang smod/ /shing rta'i lus sogs yu ga'o/ /yu gaM rdzogs ldan dus sogs la'o/ /mtho ris phyugs dang dag dang ni/ /rdo rje phyogs dang mig dang ni/ /'od zer sa dang chu rnams la/ /mtshan nyid blta zhing pho mo gau/ /ling+ga mtshan ma pho
<p>219b.5</p>pha shoH/ /shr-iM gaM prA d+hA n+ya sA n+wosh+tsa ba raM gaM mUr+d+ha gu h+ya yoH/ /b+ha gaHshrI kA ma mA hAt+m+ya bIr+Ya yat+nArka kIr+t+ti Shu/ /pa ri g+haH pa ri g+hA tenyas+t+re pyo g+ho br-in+donyam+b+ha sAM ra ye/ /mU khye pU dzA bi d+hA bar+g+ho\u0f85 
<p>219b.6</p>yi rtags/ /shriM ga gtso bo ri rtse'i ngos/ /mgo dang gsang gnas pa raM ga /b+ha ga dpal dang 'dod pa dang / /bdag nyid che dang brtson 'grus dang / /bdun pa nyi ma grags rnams la/ /ga mtha' rnams so/ /pa ri g+ha ni yongs 'joms mtshon/ /a g+he tshogs dang chu yi rgyun/ /rin dang mchod byed ar+g+ha'o/ /a
<p>220a</p>
<p>220a.1</p>ho duHkha bya sa ne Sh+wa g+haM/ /tri Sh+waSh+Tenyalpe la g+huHkA tsAHshi kya mr-id+b+he da dr-i gru dzaH/ /bi par+YA se bista re pi pra pany+tsa pA ba ke shu tsiH/ /mA s+ya mA t+ye tsA t+yU pa d+he puM si me d+h+ye si te tri Shu/ /a b+hi Sh+waM ga spr-i
<p>220a.2</p>@#/ /g+haM sdig sdug nyon mongs la/ /'dod dang nyung la la g+hu'o/ /g+ha mtha' rnams so/ /kA tsa dra ba'i thag pa dang / /mching bu dang ni ling thog go/ /phyir log rgya chen pra pany+tsa/ /shu ci me dang zla ba dang / /shin tu gnon pa dag dang ni/ /skyes bu rnam dag dkar po gsum/ /mngon 'khyud dang ni
<p>220a.3</p>hA yAny+tsa ga b+hastau tsa ru tsiHs+t+ri yAm/ /ke ki tAr+k+Sh+yA ba hi b+hu dzau dan+ta bi prAN+Da dzA dwi dzAH/ /a dzA biSh+Nu ha rats+tsha gA goSh+Tha d+h+wa ni ba hA bra dzAH/ /d+har+m+ma ra dzau dzi na ya mau kuny+dzo dan+te pi nas+t+ri yAM/ /ba la dze k+She tra pUr+d+wA re ba la dzA balgu daR+sha nA/ / 
<p>220a.4</p>'dod pa dang / /'od la ru tsi bud med do/ /tsa mtha' rnams so/ /a hi b+hu dza rma bya khyung sbrul za/ /dwi dza bram ze'i sgo nga so/ /a dzA khyab 'jug dbang phyug ra/ /'brog lhas lam dang tshogs bra dzA/ /chos rgyal rgyal ba gshin rje'o/ /kuny+dza so dang phug pa'o/ /ba la dza ni zhing grong sgo/ /ba la dzA ni legs par mthong / / 
<p>220a.5</p>sa me k+Sh+mAM she ra Ne pyA dziHpra dzA s+yAt+san+ta to dza ne/ /ab+dzau shaM kha sha shAM kau tsa swa ke ni t+ya ni dzaM tri Shu/ /puM s+yAt+ma ni pra bI Ne Shu k+She tra dz+nyau bA ts+ya liM ga kaH/ /saM dz+nyA s+yAts+tse ta nA nA ma hastA d+yash+tsAr+the sU tsa nA/ /nyAn+taH/ /kA ke b+ha gaN+Dau ka ra Tau ga
<p>220a.6</p>sa mnyam g.yul la A dzi'o/ /pra dzA bu rgyud skye dgu'o/ /ab+dza dung dang ri dgas mtshan/ /ni dzaM bdag po rtag pa gsum/ /dza mtha'o/ /skyes bu bdag dang legs rtogs pa/ /k+She tra dz+nyA'o brjod bya'i rtags/ /saM dz+nyA 'du shes ming dang ni/ /lag sogs don byed brda la'o/ /nya'i mtha'o/ /bya rog glang 'gram kar
<p>220b</p>
<p>220b.1</p>dza gaN+DaHka Ti ka Tau/ /shi bi piSh+Tastu kha la tau duSh+tsar+m+ma ni ma he shwa re/ /de ba shilpi n+ya pi twaSh+TA diSh+TaM dai be bi na dwa yoH/ /ra se ka TuHka T+wa kAr+Ye tri Shu mat+sa ra tIk+Sh+Na yoH/ /riSh+TaM k+She mA shu b+hA b+hA be Sh+wa riSh+Te tu shu b+hA shu b+he/ /mA yA nish+tsa la yan+t+re Shu ke ta bA nr-i ta rA shi Shu/ 
<p>220b.2</p>Ta/ /glang po'i 'gram dang rked ka To/ /shi bi piSh+Ta nyams pa dang / /pags pa ngan dang dbang phyug che/ /lha yi bzo ni twaSh+Ta'o/ /diSh+TaM skal ba gnyis 'dus la/ /ro bro ka TuHka Tu ni/ /don med gsum mo ser sna rno/ /riSh+TaM bde dang mi dge med/ /a riSh+Te ni dge mi dge /sgyu ma mi g.yo 'khrul 'khor dang / /g.yo sgyu mi bden phung ba
<p>220b.3</p>a yo g+ha ne shai la shrid+ge sI rAM ge kU Ta mas+t+ri yAM/ /sUk+Sh+mai lA yAM tru Tis+t+rI s+yAt+kA le\u0f85lpe saM sha phe pa sA/ /ar+t+YurkaR+ShA shra yaHko T+yo mU le lag+na ka tse dza TA/ /byuSh+Ti pha le sa mr-id+d+hau tsa dr-iSh+Tir+dz+nyA nek+Shi daR+sha ne/ /iSh+Tir+YA gets+tsha yoHsraMSh+TaM nish+tsa te ba hu
<p>220b.4</p>dang / /lcags tho ri yi rtse mo dang / /thong gshol rnams la kU Ta'o/ mo ma yin/ /tru tri sug smel dus dang ni/ /nyung du the tshom rnams la'o/ /bgrod dka'i gnas la ko Ti'o/ /rtsa ba dus sbyor skra dza TA/ /byuSh+Ti 'bras bu phun tshogs la'o/ /dr-iSh+Ti ye shes mthong ba mig /iSh+Ti mchod sbyin 'dod pa'o/ /sr-iSh+TaM nges dang
<p>220b.5</p>ni tri Shu/ /kaSh+Te tu kr-its+tsh+ra ga ha ne dak+ShA man+dA ga de Shu tu/ /pa Tur+d+wau bA ts+ya ling+gau tsa nI la kaN+ThaHshi be pi tsA/ /puM si koSh+Tho\u0f85n+t+ra dza Tha raM ku shU lo\u0f85n+tar+g+r-i haM ta thA/ /niSh+ThA niSh+pat+ti nA shAn+tAHkoSh+Thot+kaR+She s+thi to di shi/ /tr-i Shu dz+yeSh+Tho\u0f85ti
<p>220b.6</p>mang po gsum/ /kASh+Te dka' las nags thibs po/ /mkhas dang mi dman nad med la'o/ /pa Tu gnyis te brjod bya'i rtags/ /Ta mtha'o/ /nI la kaN+Tharma bya zhi/ /pho'o koSh+Tha rgyu ma dang / /gsus pa bru dong khang ba'i nang / /niSh+ThA byas zin chud zos mtha'/ /kASh+Tha dga' gnas phyogs la'o/ /dz+yeSh+Tha rgan dang
<p>221a</p>
<p>221a.1</p>shas+t+ya pi ka niSh+Tho\u0f85ti yu bAlpa yoH/ /daN+Do\u0f85s+t+rI la gu De pi s+yAd+gu Do go lek+Shu pA ka yoH/ /sar+p+ya mAM pAt+pa sU byA Do b+hU go bA tsas+t+wi DA i lAH/ /ri rab la nye ba'i yul gyi ming zer/ /k+She DA baM sha sha lA kA pi nA DI kA le pi ShaT+k+Sha Ne/ /kAN+Do\u0f85s+t+rI
<p>221a.2</p>@#/ /phul byung la/ /ka niSh+Tha ni chung dang nyung / /Tha mtha'o/ /daN Da khral dang dbyug pa'o/ /gu Da rtog pa bur shing btsos/ /byA Da sbrul dang sha zan phyugs/ /i Da sa phyugs ngag zla bu/ k+She DA smyug skas spa yi skas/ /nA DA dus dang skad cig drug /kAN+Da dbyug pa
<p>221a.3</p>daN+Da pA NArba bar+g+gA ba sa ra bA ri Shu/ /s+yAd+b+hAN+Da ma shwA b+hA ra Ne\u0f85man+t+re mU la lba ni g+d+ha ne/ /br-i sha pra ti dz+nya yorbA D+haM pra gA D+ha b+h+r-i sha kr-its+tsh+ra yoH/ /shak+ta s+thU lau tri Shu dr-i D+hau b+h+yU D+hau bi n+yasta saM ha tau/ /b+h+ru No\u0f85r+b+ha kes+t+rai Na gar+b+he bA No ba li
<p>221a.4</p>mda' dang ni/ /rta dang sde tshan gnas skabs chu/ /b+hAN+Da rta yi rgyan dang ni/ /sngags min rtsa ba tshangs pa'i nor/ /Da mtha'o/ /b+hA D+haM nges dang dam 'cha' la/ /phul byung dka' las pra gA D+ha/ /dr-i D+ha nus dang sbom po la/ /byU D+ha bkod dang tshogs pa la/ /D+ha mtha'o/ /b+h+ru Na byis dang ngan gsher can/ /bA Na stobs
<p>221a.5</p>su te sha re/ /ka No ti sUk+Sh+me d+hA n+yAM she saM g+hA te pra ma the gaNaH/ /pa Nod+yu tA di ShUt+s+r-iSh+Te b+h+r-i tau mu l+ye d+ha na pi tsa/ /maur+b+h+yAM dra byA shrI te satwa shukla san+d+h+yA di ke gu NaH/ /nir+b+yA pA ra s+thi tau kA la bi she Shot+sa ba yoHk+Sha
<p>221a.6</p>ldan bu dang mda'/ /ka Na shin tu phra dang zegs/ /tshogs dang 'joms byed ga Na'o/ /pa Na sho sogs rgyal byas gla/ /rin dang nor la yang de'o/ /yon tan dang ni dngos skyed dang / /rten dang snying stobs dkar po dang / /mtshams la sogs pa gu Na'o/ /byar med gnas dang dus bye brag /spro ba
<p>221b</p>
<p>221b.1</p>Na/ /bar+No dwi dzA dau shuklA dau stu tau bar+NaM tu tsAk+Sha re/ /grA ma NIrnA pi te puM si shreSh+The grA sA d+hi pe tri Shu/ /Ur+N+NA me ShA di lo mni s+yA dA bar+t+te tsAn+ta ra b+h+ru bau/ /ha ri NI s+yAn+m+r-i gI he ma
<p>221b.2</p>dag lak+ShaNa'o/ /bar+Na gnyis skyes la sogs dang / /dkar po la sogs kha dog bstod/ /bar+Na yi ge la yang ngo / /grA ma NI ni 'dreg mkhan dang / /skyes gsum mchog bdag rnams la'o/ /Ur+NA lug sogs bal dang ni/ /smin ma'i mtshams kyi 'khyil pa la'o/ /ha ri NI ni ri dgas mo/ /gser
<p>221b.3</p>pra ti mA ha ri tA tsa sA/ /tri Shu pAN+Do tsa ha ri NaHs+thUNA stam+b+he pi besh+ma NI/ /tr-iSh+Ne spr-i hA pi pA se dwe dzu gup+sA ka ru Ne g+h+r-i Ne/ /ba Nik+pa the pi bi pa NiHsu rA pra t+yak+tsa bA ru NI/ /ka re Nu ri b+h+yAM s+t+rI ne b+he dra bi NaM tu ba laM d+ha naM/ /sha ra NaM gr-i ha rak+Shi troH 
<p>221b.4</p>gyi gzugs brnyan ser po la/ /gsum rnams skya bo ha riN/ /lcags dang khyim gyi ka ba la/ /tr-iSh+Na 'dod pa skom pa la/ /smod pa snying rje g+h+r-i Ne'o/ /tshong 'dus lam ni bi pa Ni/ /chang dang nub phyogs bA ru NI/ /ka re Nu ni glang mo glang / /dra bi NaM ni stobs dang nor/ /sha ra NaM ni khyim dang
<p>221b.5</p>shrI par+N+NaM ka ma le pi tsa/ /bi ShA b+hi ma ra lo he Shu tIk+Sh+Na klI baM kha re tri Shu/ /pra ma NaM he tu mar+YA dA shAs+t+re yan+tA pra mAtr-i Shu/ /ka ra NaM sA d+ha ka ta maM k+She tra gA tren+d+ri ye Sh+wa pi/ /prA N+yut+pA de saM sa ra Na ma sam+bA d+ha tsa mU
<p>221b.6</p>skyabs/ /shrI par+Na ni pad+ma bum/ /tik+Sh+Na dug dang g.yul la'o/ /lcags rno ma ning kha re gsum/ /pra ma NaM ni gtan tshigs dang / /yul lugs bstan bcos sdom brtson tshad/ /ka ra NaM ni sgrub nus dang / /zhing dang lus dbang rnams la yang / /saM pa ra Na srog chags skye/ /dpung tshogs rgyu dang
<p>222a</p>
<p>222a.1</p>ga tau/ /g+haN+TA pa the\u0f85tha bAn+tAn+ne sa mud+d+ha ra Na mun+na ye/ /a tas+t+ri Shu bi ShA NaM s+yAt+pa shu shr-ing+ge b+hadan+ta yoH/ /pra ba NaM kra ma nim+nor+b+yAM pra hwe nA tu tsa tuSh+pa the/ /saM kIr+N+No ni tsi tA shud+d+ha bi ri NaM shU n+ya mU Sha raM/ / 
<p>222a.2</p>@#/ /grong khyer btsan/ /sa mud+b+ha ra Na skyug dang 'khyer/ /khral 'bab lam gyi mtha' la'o/ /'di ni gsum ste bi ShA Na/ /phyugs kyi rwa dang btsun pa la'o/ /pra ba Na ni rim gyis gzhol/ /dga' dang bzhi mdo rnams la'o/ /saM kIr+Na ni dag ma dag /stong pa tsha sgo i ri NaM/ / 
<p>222a.3</p>de ba sUr+Yau bi ba shwan+tau sa ra swan+tau na dAr+N+Na bau/ /pak+Shi tAr+k+Shau ga run+man+tau sha kun+tau b+hA sa pak+Shi Nau/ /ag+n+yut+pA tau d+hU ma ke tU dzI mU tau me g+ha par+b+ba tau/ /hastau ru pA Ni nak+Sha tre ma ru tau pa ba nA ma rau/ /yan+tA hastI pa ke sU te b+har+t+tA d+hA ta ri poSh+Ta ri/ /yA
<p>222a.4</p>Na mtha'o/ /bi ba shwan+tau nyi ma lha/ /swa ra swan+tau gtsang bo mtsho/ /ga run+man+tau 'dab chags khyung / /'od dang bya la sha kun+tau/ /me skyes du ba ke tu'o/ /dzI mU tau ni sprin dang ri/ /hastau lag pa rgyu skar me bzhi la'o/ /rlung dang 'chi med ma ru tau/ /yan+tA glang chen kha lo sgyur/ /b+har+t+tA 'dzin dang gso ba la/ /gru
<p>222a.5</p>na pA tre shi shau po taHpre taHprA N+yaM ta re mr-i te/ /gra ta b+he de d+h+wa dza ke tuHpAr+thi be ta na ye su taH/ /s+thA pa tiH kA ru b+he de tsa b+hU b+h+r-id+b+hU mi d+ha re nr-i pe/ /mUr+d+hA b+hi Shik+to b+hU pe pi r-i tuH s+t+rI ku su me pi tsa/ /biSh+Na ba pya dzi tA t+yak+to sU tas+t+waSh+Ta ri
<p>222a.6</p>dang byis pa po ta'o/ /pre ta srog chags mtha' ma ro/ /ke tu rgyal mtshan gza'i bye brag /su ta bu dang rgyal po la'o/ /shing mkhan bye brag s+thA pa ti/ /sa 'dzin ri dang rgyal po la'o/ /spyi bor dbang bskur rgyal rigs la'ang / /r-i tu bud med me tog dus/ /khyab 'jug ma pham t+yak+to'o/ /sU ta bzo
<p>222b</p>
<p>222b.1</p>sA ra thau/ /byak+taHprA dz+nye pi dr-iSh+TAn+tA bu b+he shAs+t+ra ni daR+sha ne/ /k+Shat+tA s+yAt+sA ra thau dwAHs+the k+Sha tri yA yAny+tsa shU dra dze/ /br-it+tAn+ta s+yAt+p+ra ka ra Ne pra kA re kar+t+s+n+ya bAr+t+ta yoH/ /A nar+t+ta sa ma re nr-i t+ya s+thA na nI br-id+pi she Sha yoH/ /kr-i tAn+to
<p>222b.2</p>bo'i kha lo sgyur/ /byak+ta mkhas dang gsal ba'o/ /dpe dang bstan bcos dr-iSh+TAn+ta/ /k+Shat+tA kha lo sgyur ba dang / /sgo skyong rgyal rigs dmangs 'dres bu/ /br-it+tAn+ta ni rab byed dang / /bye brag tshogs pa gtam rnams la'o/ /A nar+t+ta ni g.yul dang ni/ /gar gnas skyes mtha'i bye brag la/ /kr-i
<p>222b.3</p>ya ma sid+d+hAn+ta dai bA ku sha la kar+m+ma su/ /sh+leSh+mA di ra sa rak+tA di ma hA b+hU tA ni taM gu NaH/ /in+d+ri yA N+yasma bi kr-i ti shap+ta yo n+yas+thi d+hA ta baH/ /ka k+ShAn+ta re pi sud+d+hAn+tA nr-i pa s+yA sarba go tsa re/ /kA su pA mar+th+ya
<p>222b.4</p>tAn+ta ni gshin rje dang / /grub mtha' dbang thang mi dge'i las/ /bad kan la sogs ro dang ni/ /khrag sogs 'byung ba chen po dang / /de yi yon tan dbang po rnams/ /rdo yi rnam 'gyur sgra'i skye gnas/ /d+hA tu yin te khams zhes so/ /kak+ShAn+ta re btsun mo'i 'khor/ /mi dbang kun gyi spyod
<p>222b.5</p>yoHshak+tirmUr+t+tiHkA Thi n+ya kA ya yoH/ /bistA ra bal+l+yoHpra ta tirba sa ti rA tri besh+ma noH/ /k+Sha yArtsa yo ra pa tsi tiHsA tirdA nA ba sA na yoH/ /ar+t+ti pI DA d+ha nuHko T+yordzA tiHsA mA n+ya dzan+ma noH/ /pra tsA ra s+yan+da yo rI ti rI ti Dim+ba pra bA sa
<p>222b.6</p>yul min/ /mtshon dang nus pa shak+ti'o/ /mUrti sra dang lus la'o/ /yangs pa 'khri shing pra ta ti/ /ba sa ti ni mtshan mo khyim/ /zad mchod a pa tsi ti'o/ /sA ti sbyin dang gnas dag lo/ /a rti zug rngu gzhu yi mchog /dzA ti spyi dang skye ba dag /rab skyod bskyod pa I ti'o/ /rI ti mchod dang gnas dag
<p>223a</p>
<p>223a.1</p>yoH/ /u da yo\u0f85d+hi ga me prAp+ti s+t+re tA twak+ni tra ye yu ge /pi nA b+he de pim ha tI b+hU tar+b+hasma ni sam+pa ti/ /na dI na gar+YornA ga nAM b+ho ga ba t+ya tha saM ga re/ /saM ge sa b+hA yAM sa mi tiHk+Sha ya bA sA ba pi k+Shi tiH/ /ra be ra rtsish+tsa
<p>223a.2</p>@#/ /go/ /shar dang thob pa prAp+ti'o/ /s+t+re tA me gsum gsum ldan dus/ /pi wang dbye ba ma ha tI/ /b+hU ti thal ba phun sum tshogs/ /gtsang po klu yi grong khyer rnams/ /b+ho ga ba ti de nas g.yul/ /grogs dang 'phong sa sa mi ti/ /zad dang gnas la k+Shi ti'o/ /nyi ma'i 'od zer
<p>223a.3</p>shas+t+rany+tsa bah+ni dz+wA lA tsa he ta yaH/ /dza ga tI dza ga ti ts+tshan+di bi she She pi k+Shi tA ba pi/ /paMk+tish+tsan+do pi da sha maM s+yAt+p+ra b+hA be pi tsA ya tiH/ /pat+tir+g+ga tau tsa mU le pi bak+Sha tiHpak+Sha b+he da yoH/ /pra kr-i tir+Yo ni liM ge tsa kau shi kyA d+yAsh+tsa br-it+ta yaH/ /si ka tAHs+yurbA lu
<p>223a.4</p>mtshon cha dang / /me lce 'bar la he ti'o/ /dza ga tI ni 'gro ba dang / /sdeb sbyor bye brag sa gzhi la'ang / /paMk+ti gral dang yig bcu'i sdeb/ /'od dang chags pa A ya ti/ /bat+ti 'gro dang rkang thang ngo / /rtsa ba gshog dbye pak+Sha ti/ /pra kr-i ti ni skye gnas rtags/ /gar gyis 'tsho ba br-it+ti'o/ /si ka tA ni bye gyo dum/ / 
<p>223a.5</p>kA pi be de shra ba si tsa shru tiH/ /ba ni tA dza ni tA t+ya r+thA nu rA gA yAM tsa yo Shi ti/ /gup+tiH k+Shi ti byu dA se pi d+h+r-i tir+d+hA ra Na d+her+Ya yoH/ /pr-i ha tI k+Shu dra bAr+t+ta kI ts+tshan+do b+he de ma ha t+ya pi/ /bA si tAs+t+rI ka ra N+yosh+tsa bAr+t+tA br-it+tau dza na shru tau/ /bAr+t+taM phalgu n+ya ro ge tu tri Sh+wap+su tsa g+h+r-i tA
<p>223a.6</p>rig byed thos pa shru ti'o/ /ba ni tA dang dza ni ta/ /ma dang rjes chags bud med la/ /gup+ti dong 'bru bug bcas gru/ /d+h+r-i ti 'dzin dang blo gros so/ /br-i ha tI ni bum sman dang / /sdeb sbyor dbye ba chen po la'ang / /bud med glang mo bA si tA/ /bAr+t+tA 'tsho ba skye bo'i gtam/ /bAr+t+taM nad med snying po med/ /zhun mar mar
<p>223b</p>
<p>223b.1</p>mr-i te/ /kal d+hau taM rU pya he m+norni mit+taM he tu lak+Sha NoH/ /shru taM shAs+t+rA ba d+h+r-i ta yoR+Yu ga par+YAp+ta yoHkr-i taM/ /a t+yA hi taM ma hA b+hI tiHkarma dzI bA na pe k+Shi tsa/ /yuk+tek+Sh+mA dA br-i te b+hU taM prA N+ya tI te sa me tri Shu/ /br-it+taM pa d+ye tsa ri tre tri
<p>223b.2</p>ni a mr-i ta/ /ka la d+hau taM dngul dang gser/ /ni mit+ta naM mtshan nyid rgyu/ /shru taM bstan bcos thos pa 'dzin/ /kr-i taM rdzogs ldan yongs su thob/ /a t+yA hi taM 'jigs chen dang / /'tsho ba la ni ltos pa'i las/ /rigs pas sogs dus b+hU taM/ /srog chags 'das dus 'dra ba gsum/ /br-it+taM tshigs bcad spyod pa
<p>223b.3</p>Sh+wa tI ta dr-i D+ha ni sta le/ /ma ha drA dz+yaM tsA ba gI taM dza n+ye s+yAng+gar+hi te tri Shu/ /shwe taM ru pye pi ra dza taM hA re rU pya si te tri Shu/ /tri Sh+wa to dza ga ding+ge pi rak+tan+nI l+yA di rA gi tsa/ /a ba dA taHsi te pI te shud+d+he
<p>223b.4</p>gsum/ /'das dus brtan pa zlum po la/ /a ba gI taM rgyal srid dang / /skye bos smod dang chen po la/ /shwe taM dngul dang dkar po la/ /ra dza taM ni do shal dang / /dngul dang dkar po rnams la gsum/ /dza gad 'gro dang 'khor ba la/ /rak+ta sngo sogs chags pa la/ /a ba dA ta dkar po dang / /ser po dang
<p>223b.5</p>bad+hArdzu nau si tau/ /yuk+te\u0f85b+hi saMskr-i te\u0f85maR+Shi N+ya b+hI nI to\u0f85tha saMskr-i taM/ /kr-i tri me lak+Sha No pi te pya nan+to na ba d+hA ba pi/ /khyA te hr-iSh+Te pra tI to\u0f85b+hi dzA tastu ku la dze bu d+he/ /bi bik+tau pU ta bi dza Nau
<p>223b.6</p>ni dag pa'o/ /lhag lus dkar po si ta'o/ /rigs dang mngon par legs sbyar dang / /nus pa a b+hi ni to'o/ /de nas legs sbyar zin pa dang / /mtshan nyid u pa te yang ngo / /a nan+ta ni mtha' yas dga'/ /grags dang yid 'ong pra tI ta/ /a b+hi dzA ta rigs skyes blo/ /bi bik+tau ni dag dang dben/ /mUr+ts+tshi
<p>224a</p>
<p>224a.1</p>mUr+ts+tshi tau mU D+ha sots+tsh+wa yau/ /dwau tsAm+bu pa ru Shau shuk+tau shI ti d+ha ba la me tsa kau /sa t+ye sA d+hau bid+ya mA ne bra shastenyab+h+yar+hi te tsa sata/ /pur skr-i taHpU dzi tenyarA t+ya b+hi yuk+tenyagra taHkr-i te/ /ni bA tA bA shra ya bA taushras+t+rA b+he d+yaM tsa
<p>224a.2</p>@#/ /tau ni rmongs dang mtho/ /gnyis dag skyur rtsub shuk+tau'o/ /shI ti dkar dang dkar nag 'dres/ /legs dang yod dang dge ba dang / /phan byed bden pa rnams la sa ta/ /pur skr-i ta mchod pa dang / /dgra dang mngon par rigs pa dang / /mngon du bya ba rnams la'o/ /ni bA ta ni rlung med gnas/ / 
<p>224a.3</p>bar+m+ma ya tra/ /dzA ton+na dwa prAd+bad+d+hAHs+yu ru ts+tsh+ri tA ut+thi tAs+t+wa mI/ /br-id+d+hi mat+p+ro d+ya to t+pan+nA A dr-i tau sA dA rArtsi tau/ /ar+tho\u0f85b+he d+hi ya rai bstu pra yo dza na ni br-it+ti Shu/ /ni dA nA ga ma yostIr+tha mr-i Shi dzuSh+Ta dza le gu rau/ /sa mar+thas+t+ri
<p>224a.4</p>mtshon gyis mi chod go cha la'ang / /dzA ti skyes dang 'tsho ba thob/ /uts+tsh+ri tA dang ut+thitA/ /mtho dang shar phyogs skye ba rnams/ /A dr-i tau ni gus dang mchod/ /ta mtha'o/ /ar+tha brjod bya dang ni nor/ /dngos po dgos pa ltogs pa la/ /tIr+tha gleng gzhi lung dang ni/ /drang srong mu stegs lci ba'o/ /sa mar+tha
<p>224a.5</p>Shu shak+tiSh+Thi sam+bad+d+hAr+the hi te pi tsa/ /da sha mI s+tho k+ShI Na rA ga br-id+d+ho bI thi pa da bya pi/ /As+thA nI yat+na yo rAs+thA pras+thonyas+t+rI pA nu mA na yoH/ /a b+hi prA ya ba shauts+tshan+dA bab+dau dzI mU ta bat+sa roH/ /a ba bA dau tu nin+dA dz+nya dA ya dau su ta bAn+d+ha
<p>224a.6</p>gsum nus pa dang / /'dod pa 'brel don phan pa la'ang / /da sha mI s+tho chags nyams rgan/ /bI thi lam dang rtsig pa la/ /As+thA gnas dang 'bad pa dag /pras+tha ri sul dang ni be/ /tha mtha'o/ /dgongs can dbang byed ts+tshan+da'o/ /a bdo char sprin be'u la'o/ /a ba bA dau smod dang bka'/ /dA ya dau ni bu dang
<p>224b</p>
<p>224b.1</p>bau/ /pA dA rasmyaM g+h+r-i tur+YAM shash+tsan+d+rAg+nyarkAsta mo nu dAH/ /nirbA do dza na bA de pi shA do dzam+bA ya shaSh+pa yoH/ /sA rA be ru di ti trA tar+YA kra n+do dA ruNe ra Ne/ /s+yAt+p+ra sA donyanu ro d+he pi sU dAHs+yAd+b+yany+dza ne pi tsa/ /goSh+ThA d+h+yak+She pi go bin+do haR+She pyA mo da ban+ma daH/ /pra d+hA n+ye ra dza ling+ge tsa
<p>224b.2</p>gnyen/ /pA da 'od zer zhabs bzhi cha/ /ta mo nu da me nyi zla/ /ni rbA da ni skye bos smod/ /shA do 'dam dang myu gu'o/ /sgra bcas du skad skyob pa rnams/ /A kran+da'o drag pa'i g.yul/ /pra sA da ni dad pa'o/ /sU da za ster spags la yang / /ru dpon brdzi go bin+da/ /dga' dang chang la ma da na/ /gtso bo dang ni rgyal po'i
<p>224b.3</p>br-i ShAd+ge ka ku do\u0f85s+t+ri yAM/ /s+t+ri sam+bid+dz+nyA na saM b+hA ShA kri ya kA rA dza na ma suH/ /d+harme ra ha s+yu pa ni ShAt+s+yA tri to bat+sa re sha rata/ /pa daM byA ba si taM trA Na s+thA na lak+ShaM hri bstu Shu/ /goSh+pa daM se bi te mA ne pra taSh+ThA kr-i t+ya mA s+yA
<p>224b.4</p>rtags/ /khyu mchog nog rnams ka ku dan/ /saM bid mo'o mkhyen pa dang / /phebs smra bya byed g.yul ming rnams/ /chos dben u pa ni ShA da/ /ston ka lo ni sha ra dang / /pa daM so no ma skyob pa dang / /gnas dang phun tshogs rkang pa dngos/ /goSh+pa daM ni zhabs thog sred/ /rab gnas thob pa A
<p>224b.5</p>daM/ /tri Sh+wiSh+Ta ma d+hu rau swA dU mr-i du tsA tIk+Sh+Na ko ma lau/ /mU D+hA lpA pa Tu nir+b+hA gyA man+daHs+yur+d+wo tusha rA dau/ /pra t+ya grA pra ti b+hau bi dwat+su pra gal+b+hau bi sha ra dau/ /byA mo ba D+hash+tsa n+ya gro d+hA but+se d+ha kA ya un+na ta/ /paR+Ya hA rash+tsa mAr+g+gash+tsa bI
<p>224b.6</p>s+yA daM/ /yid 'ong sbrang rtsi swA dU'o/ /mr-i du rno dang 'jam pa dag /rmongs dang nyung dang mi gsal dang / /skal ba ngan rnams man+da'o/ /sha rA dau ni rtse mo gnyen/ /bi shA ra dau spobs can mkhas/ /da mtha'o/ /'dom dang shing la n+ya gro d+ha/ /ut+se d+hani lus dang mtho/ /len byed lam ni bI ba d+hau/ /bi
<p>225a</p>
<p>225a.1</p>ba d+hau bi ba d+hau tsa tau/ /pa ri d+hir+Ya dz+nyi ya ta roHshA khA ya mu pa sUR+Ya ke /ban+d+ha kaM bya sa naM tse taH pI DA d+hiSh+ThA na mA d+ha yaH/ /s+yuHsa mar+tha na nI bA ka ni yA mash+tsa sa mA d+ha yaH/ /do Shot+pA do\u0f85nu ban+d+ha s+yAt+p+ra kr-i t+yA di Sh+wa na swa
<p>225a.2</p>ba d+hau yang de bzhin no/ /pa ri d+hi ni mchod sbyin gyi/ /stod phur shA khA nye 'khor ro/ /rteng ba nyes dang sems nad dang / /byin gyis brlab pa a d+hi'o/ /mnyam don sa bon dag dang ni/ /nges pa rnams la sa mA d+hi/ /nyes skye u nu ban da dang / /rang bzhin la sogs
<p>225a.3</p>re/ /mu khyA nu pA yi ni si shau pra kri ta s+yA nu bar+t+ta ne/ /bi d+hurbiSh+No tsan+d+ra ma shi pa rits+tshe de bi le ba d+hiH/ /bi d+hirbi d+hA ne dai be yi pra Ni d+hiHprAr+tha ne tsa re/ /bud+d+ha br-i d+d+hau paN+Di te pi skan+d+haHsa mu da ye pi tsa/ /de she ba da
<p>225a.4</p>dbyangs med dang / /gtso bo rjes su 'gro ba dang / /byis pa rang bzhin rjes 'gro'o/ /bi d+hu khyab 'jug zla ba'o/ /yongs gcod khung bu a ba d+hi/ /bi d+hi sgrub dang sngon gyi las/ /pra Ni d+hi ni don gnyer spyod slong mo zer/ /bud+d+ha rgan dang mkhas pa la/ /skan d+ha yang dag tshogs pa'o/ /ab+d+hau gtsang po
<p>225a.5</p>bi she d+hi\u0f85b+d+hau sin+d+hurnA sa ri ti s+t+rI yAm/ /bi d+hA bi d+hau pra ka re tsa sA d+hu ram+me pi tsa tri Shu/ /ba d+hUrdzA yAstu ShAs+t+rI tsa su d+hA le po\u0f85mr-i taM sbu hI/ /saM d+hA pra ti dz+nyA yar+YA dA shrad+hA saM pra t+ya yaHspr-i hA/ /ma d+hu ma d+ye puSh+pa ra se k+Shau dre\u0f85n+d+han+tu ta ma s+ya pi/ / 
<p>225a.6</p>yul bye brag /sin d+hu cha phran la 'o mo/ /bi d+hA bi d+hi rnam pa'o/ /sA d+hu dga' dang legs pa la/ /ba d+hU bud med mna' ma chung / /su d+hA byug pa bdud rtsi sngon/ /saM d+hA dam 'cha' yul chos so/ /shrad+hA blo dang 'dod pa'o/ /ma d+hu chang dang me tog bcud/ /sbrang rtsi'o an+d+ha long ba mun/ / 
<p>225b</p>
<p>225b.1</p>a tas+t+ri Shu mamun+nad+d+ho paN+Di taM ma n+ya garbi tau/ /brah+ma ban+d+hu ra d+hi k+She pe nirde she\u0f85thA ba lam+bi taH/ /a bi dU ro pya baSh+Tab+d+ho pra sid+d+hau khyA ta b+hU Shi tau/ /sUr+Ya ba h+nI tsi tra b+hA nu sa ha sra rasmi de bA ka rau/ /b+hU tAt+mA nau d+hA tr-i de ho mUr+kha nI tso pr-i thag+dza nau/ /grA ba
<p>225b.2</p>'di nas gsum yin sa mun+na d+hau/ /mkhas pa'i nga rgyal khengs pa'o/ /brah+ma ban d+hu g.yo nges bstan/ /brten dang ring min a baSh+Tab+d+hau/ /pra sid d+hau ni grags dang rgyan/ /d+ha mtha'o/ /tsi tra b+hA nu nyi ma me/ /'od stong can dang nyin mor byed/ /b+hU tAt+mA nau gso byed lus/ /pr-i thag+dza na rmongs dang dman/ /grA bA
<p>225b.3</p>Nau shai la pA ShA nau sa ra pak+Shi pa tri Nau/ /ta ru shai lau shi kha ri Nau shi khi Nau ba h+ni bar+hi Nau/ /pra ti yat+nA bu b+hau lip+so pa gra hA pa tha sA di nau/ /dwau sA ra thi ha yA ro hau bA dzi nau shwai Shu pak+Shi NaH/ /ku le pya b+hi dza no dzam+ma b+hU mA ba pya tha hA ya nAH/ /baR+ShA rtsi brI hi b+he
<p>225b.4</p>Nau ni ri dang rdo/ /bya dang mda' la pa tri Nau/ /shi kha ri Nau shing dang brag /me dang rma bya shi khi Nau/ /pra ti yat+nau brnab sems dang / /nyer 'dzin de nas sA di nau/ /kha lo sgyur dang rta pa'o/ /bA dzi nau rta mda' dang bya/ /a b+hi dza na ri dgas la yang / /skye ba dang ni skye ba'i sa/ /de nas hA ya na zhes pa/ /lo dang 'od zer
<p>225b.5</p>dAsh+tsa tsan+d+rA g+n+yarka bi ro tsa nAH/ /ke she bi br-i dzi no bi shwa kar+m+mArka su ra shilpi noH/ /At+ma yat+no d+h+r-i tirbud+d+hiHswa b+hA bo brah+ma baR+Sh+ma tsa/ /shakro g+hA ta ka mat+te b+ho baR+Shu kAb+do g+ha nA g+ha nAH/ /a b+hi mA no\u0f85r+thA di dar+p+ye dz+nyA ne pra Na
<p>225b.6</p>'bru'i bye brag /bi ro tsa na zla me nyi/ /skra 'khyil br-i dza na yin no/ /bi shwa kar+m+mAn nyi ma dang / /lha yi bzo bo dag yin no/ /A t+man 'bad pa 'dzin dang blo/ /rang bzhin tshangs pa lus la yang / /brgya byin gsod byed glang myos dang / /char sprin g+ha nA g+hanA'o/ /a b+hi mA na nor sogs kyi/ /dregs pa shes
<p>226a</p>
<p>226a.1</p>ya hiM sa moH/ /g+ha no me g+he mUr+t+ti gu Ne tri Shu mUr+t+te ni ran+ta re/ /i naHsUr+Ye pra b+hau tA dzA mr-i gAd+kek+Sha tri ye nr-i pe/ /bA Ni n+yo nar+t+ta kI mat+te shra ban+t+yA ma pi bA hi nI/ /hrA di n+yau badzra ta Di to ban+dA yA
<p>226a.2</p>@#/ /pa yid gcugs 'tshe/ /g+ha na sprin dang lus yon tan/ /mkhregs dang bar med la'o gsum/ /i na 'od dang nyi ma la'o/ /rI dzan ri dgas mtshan ma dang / /rgyal rigs mi yi bdag po la'o/ /gar mkhan myos ma pA Ni n+yau/ /chu dang dmag ni bA hi nI/ /gnam lcags glog la hrA di nI/ / 
<p>226a.3</p>ma pi kA mi nI/ /twag+de ha yo ra pi ta nuHsU nA\u0f85d+ho dzi hwi kA pa tsa/ /kra tu bistA ra yo ras+t+rI bi tA naM tri Shu tuts+tsha ke /man+de\u0f85tha ke ta naM kr-i t+yai ke tA bu pa ni man+t+ra Ne/ /be da ta twaM ta po bra h+ma bra h+mA bi praHpra dzA pa tiH/ /ut+sA
<p>226a.4</p>shing dang bud med kA mi nI/ /pags pa lus dag tu nu'o/ /sU nA 'og tu lce 'phyang ba/ /bi tA naM ni mchod sbyin dang / /rgya chen mo min spun stong dman/ /de nas ke ta naM byas zin/ /rgyal mtshan dang ni nye bar 'bod/ /rig byed de nyid dka' thub tshangs/ /tshangs pa bram ze skye dgu'i bdag /spro ba
<p>226a.5</p>ha ne tsa hin+sA dau sU tsa Ne pi tsa gan+d+ha naM/ /byany+dza naM lAny+tsha naM sh+ma shru niSh+ThAnA ba ya be Sh+wa pi/ /A tany+tsa naM pra tI bA pa dza ba nA pyA ya nAr+thArkaH/ /s+yAt+kau lI naM lo ka bA de yud+d+he pa shwa hi pa k+Shi NAM/ /s+yA dur+YA naM niHsa ra Ne ba na b+he de pra yo dza ne/ /a ba kA she s+thi
<p>226a.6</p>dang ni 'tshe sogs dang / /phra ma la yang gan d+ha naM/ /byany+dza naM ni rtags mtshan dang / /smar tsho dam cha shas rnams/ /A tany+tsa naM bskrun chu dang / /bang dang rang nyid don la'o/ /kau li naM ni skye bos smod/ /phyugs sbrul bya rnams 'khrug pa la'o/ /ud yA naM ni grong phyi rim/ /nags dbye skye tshal rab dgos la'o/ /s+thA naM dben gnas gnas
<p>226b</p>
<p>226b.1</p>tau s+thA naM krI DA ba pi de ba naM/ /ut+thA na pau ru She tan+t+re san+ni biSh+Tod+game pi tsa/ /byut+thA naM pra ti ro d+he tsa bi ro d+hA tsa ra Ne pi tsa/ /mA ra Ne mr-i ta saM skA re ga tau dra bye r+tha dA pa ne/ /nirbar+t+ta no pa ka ra NA nu bra dz+yA su tsa sA d+ha naM/ /nir+YA ta naM bai ra shud+d+ho dA
<p>226b.2</p>dag la'o/ /rtsed mo sogs la'ang de ba naM/ /ut+thA naM ni skyes mthu can/ /dmag dang sdud nas langs pa la/ /byut+thA naM ting 'dzin zad/ /'gal bar spyod pa rnams la'o/ /'chi dang ro bsregs 'gro ba dang / /rdzas dang sbyin pa slar 'ong dang / /phan byed rjes 'gro sA d+ha naM/ /nir yA ta naM dgra sha bla na/ / 
<p>226b.3</p>ne n+yA sAr+pa Ne pi tsa/ /bya sa naM bi pa di b+h+r-i she do She kA ma dza ko pa dze/ /pak+Sh+mA k+Shi lo mni kiny+dza lke taM twA d+yaM she pye nI ya si/ /ti thi b+ha de k+Sha Ne parba bar+t+ma ne trats+tsha de\u0f85d+h+wa ni/ /a kAr+Yo gu h+ye ko pI naM me thu naM saM ga tau ra te/ / 
<p>226b.4</p>sbyin dang bcol ba gtad pa'o/ /bya sa naM ni phun tshogs min/ /nyams pa 'dod skyes khro skyes skyon/ /pak+Sh+mAn mig rdzi ge sar dang / /snal ma'i cha shas pra mo la/ /chos dbye skad cig parban no/ /bar+t+man mig dang pags pa lam/ /don med gsang ba ko pI naM/ /me thu naM ni 'dus ngang dga'/ /pra d+hA naM pa ra mAt+mA d+hIHpradz+nyA naM bud+d+hi tsi h+na yoH/ / 
<p>226b.5</p>pra sU naM buSh+pa pha la yorni d+ha naM ku la nA sha yoH/ /kran+da naM ro da nA hwA ne paR+Sh+ma de ha pra mA Na yoH/ /gr-i ha de ha twiT+p+ra b+hA bA d+hA mA n+ya tha tsa tuSh+pa the/ /saM ni be sha tsa saM s+thA naM lak+Sh+ma tsi h+na pra
<p>226b.6</p>prad+hA naM ni mchog bdag blo/ /pradz+nyA naM ni blo dang rtags/ /pra sU naM ni me tog 'bras/ /ni d+ha naM ni rigs dang nyams/ /kran+da naM ni du dang 'bod/ /baR+Sh+man lus dang tshad dag la'o/ /khyim dang lus 'od mthu rnams la/ /d+hA mA n+ya 'o de nas ni/ /bzhi mdo sdod dbyibs saM s+thA naM/ /phun tshogs
<p>227a</p>
<p>227a.1</p>d+hA na yoH/ /Ats+tshA da ne saM pi d+hA na ma pa rA Na mi t+yu b+he/ /A rA d+ha naM sA d+ha ne s+yA de bA bab+tau to Sha Ne pi tsa/ /a d+hiSh+ThA naM tsa kra pu ra pra b+hA bA s+yA sa ni Sh+wa pi/ /rat+naM swa dzA ti shreSh+The pi ba ne sha li la kA na ne/ /ta li naM be ra le sto ke bA ts+ya ling+gan+ta
<p>227a.2</p>@#/ /rtags dag pra d+hA naM/ /Ats+tshA da ne 'gebs sgrib nya/ /ArA d+hA naM sgrub pa dang / /thob dang tshim pa la yang ngo / /a d+hiSh+ThA naM 'khor lo dang / /mthu dang gnas rnams la yang ngo / /rat+naM rang rigs rin chen mchog /ba ne chu dang nags khrod do/ /ta li naM ni 'thor dang nyung / /brjod bya'i
<p>227a.3</p>thot+ta re/ /sa mA nAHsat+pa mai ke s+yuHpi shu nau kha la sU tsa ko /hI no n+yu nA bU na gar+h+yau be gi shu ro ta ra shwi nau/ /a b+hi pan+nonya pa rA dwonya bi gra sta byA ba hu tA ba pi/ /ka lA po b+hU Sha Ne bar+he tU NI re saM ha te pi
<p>227a.4</p>rtags can de bzhin phyi/ /sa mA na ni mtshungs dang gcig /pi shu na ni tha shal dbye na/ /hI no ma gang dman tha shal/ /ta ra shwi no shugs can dpa'/ /a b+hi pan+no nyes byas dang / /dgra dbang song dang don med byas/ /na mtha' rnams so/ /ka lA pa ni rgyan dang ni/ /rma bya'i mdongs dang
<p>227a.5</p>tsa/ /pa ri ts+tsha de pa rI bA paHpar+Yu p+tau sha li la s+thi tau/ /go d+hurgoSh+Tha pa tI go po ha ro biSh+N+ya r+b+r-i ShA ka pI/ /bASh+pA bUSh+mA shru ka shaM pU twaM na mA ts+tshA da naM dwa yaM/ /talpaM shay+YA Tu dA re Shu staM be pi bi Ta po\u0f85s+t+ri yaM/ /prap+ta rU paHswarU po\u0f85
<p>227a.6</p>tshogs pa la/ /pa rI bA pa yongs 'gebs dang / /par+Yup+to ni chu dang gnas/ /go ba ba 'jo ba lang bdag /ka pi seng+ge khyab 'jug glang / /bASh+pA rlangs pa mig chu'o/ /shi pU zas dang gos la gnyis/ /talpaM khang steng chung ma mal/ /pi Ta po ni tshang tshing ngo / /prAp+ta rU paHswa rU pa/ /a
<p>227b</p>
<p>227b.1</p>b+hi rU po bud+d+ha ma na dz+nya yoH/ /b+he d+ya liM gA a mI kUrmI bI nA b+he dash+tsa kats+tsha bI/ /an+ta rA b+ha ba sat+t+we\u0f85shwe gan+d+ho rbo di bya gA na ne/ /kam+burnA ba la ye shaM khe dwi dzi hwau sar+p+pa sU tsa kau /pUr+b+bA\u0f85n+ya liM gaHprA gA ha puM ba hu twe
<p>227b.2</p>b+hi rU pa mkhas yid 'ong / /rtags 'di rnams kyi dbye ba ni/ /rus sbal mo dang dbyangs can ma'i/ /pi wang kats+tsha pI yin no/ /pa mtha'o/ /rta dang bar do'i sems can dang / /lha yi klu mkhan gan+d+ha rba/ /kam+bu rgyan mangs dang la'o/ /sbrul dang phra ma dwi dzi hwa/ /pUrba gzhan gyi rtags can te/ /dang po
<p>227b.3</p>pi pUr+b+ba dzA na/ /kum+b+ho g+ha Te b+he mUr+d+hAM shau Di m+b+hau tu shi shu bA li shau/ /stam+b+ho s+thU nA dza DI b+hA bo saM b+hU pra h+ma tri lo tsa nau/ /kuk+Shi b+h+ru Nar+b+ha kA gar+b+hA sram+b+ha pra ye pi tsa/ s+yAd+b+her+YAM Dun+du b+hiHpuM si s+yA dak+She dun+du b+hiHs+t+ri yAM/ /s+yAn+ma hA ra
<p>227b.4</p>mang tshig sngon las skyes/ /ba mtha'o/ /kum+b+ha bum pa glang chen mgo /Dim+b+ha byis pa phra ma'o/ /stam+b+ha ka ba rangs byed la/ /saM b+hU tshangs dang spyan gsum pa/ /gar+b+ha mngal dang mngal nang byis/ /bi sram+b+ha ni yid ches mthun/ /rnga ni dun du b+hi skyes so/ /cho lo dun du b+hi ste mo/ /tshon chen ma ni
<p>227b.5</p>dza nakla'i klI baM ku sum+b+haM ka ra ke pu mAn/ /k+Sha tri ye pi tsa nA b+hi tsa nA b+hirnA su ra b+hirga be tsas+t+ri yAM/ /sa b+hA saM sa di sa b+h+ye ShaM tri Sh+wa d+h+yak+She pi bal+la b+haH/ /ki ra Na pra gra hau rismA ka pi b+he ko p+la baM ga mau/ /its+tsha dbang zer mo no b+ha bau kA mau r+Yau d+yo gau
<p>227b.6</p>ku sum+b+haM/ /spyi blugs la ni skyes bu'o/ /rgyal rigs lte ba nA b+hi skyes/ /su ra b+hi ni ba lang mo/ /sa b+hA tshogs dang yid ches chos/ /gsum bdag yid ches bal+la b+ha/ /b+ha mtha'o/ /rasmi 'od dang rta yi srab/ /bla mchod 'gro ba ga mo sbal pa spre'u/ /'dod dang yid skyes kA mo'o/ /pa rA kra ma gzhan gnon
<p>228a</p>
