<p>228a.1</p>pa rA kra mau/ /d+har+m+mAHpu N+ya ya man+yA ya swa b+hA bA tsA ra so ma pAH/ /u pA ya pUrba A ram+b+ha u ba d+hA tsA pyu pa kra maH/ /ba Ni ka pa thaHpu raM be do ni ga mA nA ga ro ba Ni ka /nai ga mau dwau ba le rA mo nI
<p>228a.2</p>@#/ /dpa'/ /d+har+m+mA bsod nams gshin rje rigs/ /rang bzhin spyod dang zla ba'i ltung / /thabs dang sngon ma rtsom pa dang / /go rims u pa kra ma'o/ /tshong lam grong khyer rig byed la/ /ni ga ma'o grong khyer gyi/ /tshong lam ni ga ma ste gnyis/ /rA ma stobs ldan dang ni
<p>228a.3</p>la tsA ru si te tri Shu/ /shab+hA di pUrbo br-in+de pi grA maHkrAn+tau tsa bi kra maH/ /gul+mo rugs b+h+ya she nAsh+tsa lA miHswa sr-i ku la s+t+ri yoH/ /k+Shi ti k+ShAn+yoHk+Sha mA yuk+te k+Sha maM shak+te hi te tri Shu/ /tri Shu s+yA mau ha rit+k+r-iSh+Nau sh+yA mA s+yA ts+tshA ri bA
<p>228a.4</p>sngo/ /mdzes dang dkar po gsum yin no/ /sgra sogs sngon sbyor tshogs grA ma/ /rnam par gnon pa bi kra ma/ /gul+ma nad dang zhib dmag /yA mi bu mo rigs ldan mo/ /k+Sha ma rigs dang bzod pas/ /nus dang phan pa la ste gsum/ /s+yA ma gsum yin 'phrog khyed nag /sh+'+ya ma
<p>228a.5</p>ni shA/ /lA lA maM puts+tsha puN+DA shwa b+hU Sha prA d+hA n+ya ke tu Shu/ /sU k+Sh+ma ma d+h+yAt+ma mA pyA di pra d+hA ne pra tha maM tri Shu/ /bA mau balgu pra tI bau dwA ba d+ha mau n+yU na kut+si tau/ /dzA+er+N+Nany+tsa pa ri b+hu k+tany+tsa yA ta yA ma mi daM dwa yaM/ /tu
<p>228a.6</p>rlung dang mtshan mo'o/ /lA lA maM ni mjug ma dang / /mdongs dang rta rgyan gtso bo tog /k+Sha lhag pa yi bdag kyang ngo / /dang po gtso bo pra tha ma/ /gsum/ bA ma kyog po pra tI pa/ gnyis/ /a ba d+ha ma ma gang smad/ /rgas pa dang ni yongs su spyod/ /yA ta yA ma 'di gnyis so/ /ma mtha'o/ /myur
<p>228b</p>
<p>228b.1</p>rad+ga ga ru Dau tA rakyau ni la yA ya tsa pau k+Sha yo/ /shwa shur+Yo de ba ra sh+yA lo b+h+rA tr-i byau d+h+rA tr-i dza dwi Shau/ /paR+Ya n+yau ra sa dab+den+d+ra s+yAR+YaH swA mi bai sh+ya yoH/ /ti Sh+yaHpu Sh+ye ka li yu ge paR+Ya yo\u0f85ba sa re kra mai/ /pra t+ya yo\u0f85d+hI na sha pa tha dz+nyA na baM shwA
<p>228b.2</p>'gro 'dab bzangs tAr+k+Sh+yau'o/ /gnas dang nyams pa k+Sha ya'o/ /skud po gnyid mo shwa shuR+Ya/ /spun skyes dgra ni b+hA tr-i byau/ /paR+Ya n+yau ni 'brug sprin dbang / /aR+Ya bdag bo rje rigs so/ /ti Sh+ya rgyal dang rtsod ldan dus/ /paR+YA ya ni gnas skabs rim/ /pra t+ya ni gzhan dbang dang / /mna' dang shes pa yid chos dang / / 
<p>228b.3</p>sa he tu Shu/ /ran+b+h+ra shap+de thA nu sha yo dIr+g+ha dwe ShA nu tA pa yoH/ /s+thU lots+tsa yas+t+wa sA ka l+ye nA gA nAM ma d+h+ya me ga te/ /sa ma yAHsha pa thA tsA ra kA la sid+d+hAn+ta sam+bi daH/ /bya sa nA d+ya shu b+haM dai baM bi pa di t+ya na yAs+t+ra yaH/ /a t+ya yo\u0f85ti kra
<p>228b.4</p>rgyu dang bug sgra la'o/ /de nas a nu sha ya ni/ /yun ring zhe sdang rjes su gdung / /s+thU lots+tsa ya ma tshang dang / /glang chen 'bring du spyod pa'o/ /sa ma ya ni mna' dang sbyod/ /dus dang grub mtha' yang dag rig /gnod sogs mi dge sngon las dang / /phun sum tshogs min a na ya/ /a t+yo ni 'khyog pa dag/ / 
<p>228b.5</p>me kr-its+tsh+ra do She daN+De bya thA pa di/ /yud+d+hA ya t+yoHsam+pa bA yAHpU dz+yastu shwa shu ro pi tsa/ /pash+tsa da bas+thA pi ba laM sa ma bA pash+tsa san+na yau/ /saM g+hA te sa ni be she tsa saM s+t+yA yaHpra Na yAs+t+wa ma'i/ /bi shram+b+ha yAts+nyA pre mA No\u0f85bi ro
<p>228b.6</p>sdug dang nyes pa chad las la/ /de nas gnod dang 'thab mo dang / /bu rgyud sam+parA ya'o/ /pU dz+ya mchod 'os gyos po la'ang / /san+na yau ni dpung rnams kyi/ /phyir sdod rgyab na gnas rnams so/ /tshogs dang 'jug rtsol saM s+t+yA ya/ /pra Na ya ni 'di rnams te/ /yid ches slong mo yid gcugs rnams/ / 
<p>229a</p>
<p>229a.1</p>d+he\u0f85pi sa muts+tsh+ra yaH/ /bi Sha yo ya s+ya yodz+nyA tasta tra shap+dA di ke Sh+wa bi/ /nir+YA se pi ka ShA yonyas+t+rI sa b+hA yAny+tsa pra ti shra yaH/ /prA yo b+hU m+n+yan+ta ga me ne ma n+yu dai n+ye kra tau kru d+hi/ /ra ha s+yo pas+thA yorgu h+yaM sa t+yaM sha pa tha ta th+ya yoH/ /bIr+YAM
<p>229a.2</p>@#/ /sa muts+tsh+ra ya 'gal med kyang / /bi Sha ya ni shes bya yi/ /gang gi de la sgra sogs rnams/ /dur kha bska ba ka ShA ya/ /'du khang pra ti shra ya'o/ /prA yo phal cher mthar 'byin dang / /ma n+yu mchod sbyin khro ba la/ /gsang dang nyer gnas gu h+yaM'o/ /sa t+yaM dag tshang bden pa'o/ /bIr+YaM
<p>229a.3</p>ba la pra b+hA bo tsa dra byam+b+ha bye gu NA shra ye/ /d+hiSh+T+yaM s+thA ne gr-i he b+heg+nau b+hA gyaM kar+m+ma shu b+hA shu b+haM/ /ka se/ gro ma la 'jug pa yod kyang 'dir rta/ ru he mno gAM ge yaM bi sha l+yA dan+ta kA pi tsa/ /br-i ShA ka pA yI shrI gaur+Ya ra b+hi khyA nA ma so b+ha yoH/ /A ram+b+ho niSh+k+r-i tiHshik+ShA pU dza naM
<p>229a.4</p>dpa' stobs nus mthu'o/ /dra byaM skal ba yon tan gnas/ /d+hiSh+T+yaM gnas khang glang po me/ /b+hA gyaM las dang dge mi dge rta dang gser ni gAM ge yaM/ /bi sha l+yA ni so ldan la'ang / /br-i Sh+Tha ka yA dpal gau rI/ /a b+hi khyA ni ming dang mdzes/ /rtsom dang nges byed slob pa dang / /mchod
<p>229a.5</p>saM pra d+hA ra NaM/ /u pA yaHkar+m+ma tseSh+TA tsa tsa kit+sA tsa na bkri yAH/ /tshA yA sUr+ya pri yA kAn+tiHpra ti bim+ba nA ta paH/ /kak+Sh+yA pra koSh+ThI harmA deHkAts+yam+ma d+h+ye b+ha ban+d+ha ne/ /kr-i t+yA kri yA de ba ta yos+t+ri Shu b+he d+ye d+ha nA di b+hiH/ / 
<p>229a.6</p>dang bsgrub bya bgros pa zer thabs las sems/ /gso dpyad dgu la kri yA'o/ /tshA ya nyi ma'i chung ma mdzes/ /gzugs brnyan cha ba med rnams la'o/ /ka k+Sh+yA re mig bsil khang sogs/ /rked rgyan glang chen dbus su 'ching / /kr-i t+yA bya ba lha dag gsum/ /dbye ba nor la sogs rnams kyis/ / 
<p>229b</p>
<p>229b.1</p>dza n+ya s+yAdz+dza na bA de pi dza g+ha n+yony+n+tonya me pi tsa/ /gar+h+yA d+hI nau tsa bak+ta byau ka l+yau sadz+dza ni rA ma yau/ /At+ma bA na nu pe tor+thAdar+th+yau pu N+yaM tu tsArba pi/ /rU pyaHpra shastu rU pe pi ba dA n+yo balgu bA ga pi/ /n+yA y+YA bi ma d+h+yaHso myaM tu sun+da re sho ma de ba tai/ / 
<p>229b.2</p>dza n+ya skye bos smod pa'o/ /dza g+ha n+yo ni mtha' yang bya/ /ngan pa gzhan dbang bak+ta byau/ /ka l+yau nad med yon tan can/ /bdag ldan nor bral ar+th+yo'o/ /pu N+ya yid du 'ong ba la'ang / /rU pya dga' dang gzugs la'o/ /ba dA n+yo ni ngag mnyen pa/ /ma d+h+ya bar ma rigs pa la/ /so myaM gdu bu zla ba lha/ /bai
<p>229b.3</p>sar+b+ba dz+nya b+hi Sha dzau bai d+yA bAt+ma kA mash+tsa hrits+tsha yau/ /pha la ka l+yA Na yor+b+ha byaM yo gya saM pra ti ke tri Shu/ /ni ba hA ba sa rau bA rau saM sta rau pra sta rA d+h+wa rau/ /gu ru gISh+pa ti pi trA d+yau dwA pa rau yu ga saM sha yau/ /pra kA ro b+he dA sA dr-i sh+ye A kA rA biM gi
<p>229b.4</p>d+yA kun mkhyen sman pa la/ /bdag dang 'dod pa hr-its+tsha yau/ /b+ha bya dge dang 'bras bu la/ /yo gya shin tu rigs pa la/ /ya mtha'o/ /tshogs dang re mos bA ra'o/ /saM sta rau ni mchod sbyin lam/ /gu ru phur bu pha la sogs/ /dwA pa rau ni dus the tshom/ /pra kA ra ni dbye ba dpe/ /A kA ra ni lus
<p>229b.5</p>ta kr-itI/ /kiM shA rU d+hA n+ya shA ke Shu ma ru d+ha n+wa d+ha rau/ /a dra yo dru ma shai lArkAHs+t+rI sta nAb+d+ho pa yo d+ha rau/ /d+h+wan+tA ri dA Na bA pr-i tA bA li hastAM sha baHka rAH/ /pra da rA b+hang+ga nA rI rug+bA NA a srAHka tsA a pi/ /a dzA ta shr-ing+ge gauHkA le pya
<p>229b.6</p>tshul byad/ /kiM shA ru ni gra ma mda'/ snye ma// ma ru mya ngam thang dang ri/ /a dra shing dang ri nyi ma/ /pa yo d+ha ra nu ma sprin/ /d+h+wan+tA ri ni lha min 'khor/ /dpya sdud lag pa 'od ka rA/ /pra da ra ni 'joms byed dang / /bud med rked nad dang ni mda'/ /a pra skra dang zur yin no/ /rwa med ba lang dus
<p>230a</p>
<p>230a.1</p>sma shrurbA tU ba rau/ /su bar+Ne bi rAHpa ri ka raHka pa ri bA ra yoH/ /muk+tA shud+d+hau tA raHs+yAt+sA ro bA yau pa tri Shu/ /karbu re\u0f85tha pra ti dz+nyA dzi sam+bi dA pat+su saM ga raH/ /be da b+he de gup+ti bA de man+t+ro mi tro ra bA ba pi/ / 
<p>230a.2</p>@#/ /dang ni/ /smar med pa tU pa rau/ /rA ni nor te gser la yang / /ba rig ra skyil krung 'khor/ /mu tig dag pa tA ra yin/ /khra bo rlung gsum karbu ra/ /de nas dam 'cha' g.yul dang ni/ /rig pa gnon pa saM gar/ /rig byed bye ba dag dang ni/ /gab tshig gsang sngags man+t+ra'o/ /mi tra nyi ma la
<p>230a.3</p>mu khe khu yU pa khaN+De pi swa ru rgu h+ye pya bskaraH/ /A Dam+ba ra stUr+Ya ra be ga dzen+d+rAneny+tsa gardzi te/ /a pi hA ro\u0f85b+hi yo ge tsa tsaur+Ye san+na ha ni pi tsa/ /s+yAdz+dzad+ga me pa rI bA raHkhaD+ga ko She pa rits+tsha de/ /bista rau bi Ta pI dar+b+ha muSh+TiHpI
<p>230a.4</p>yang ngo / /srog shing du ma bu swa ru'o/ /tha shal dang ni bskar/ /A Dam+ba ra sil snyan dang / /nyi ma glang chen dbang po'i sgra/ /a pi hA ra mngon sbyor dang / /chom rkun go cha gyon pa la'ang / /ba ri bA ra dgab yang dang / /ral gri'i shubs dang gos la'o/ /bista ro ni tshang tshing dang / /ku sha'i
<p>230a.5</p>ThA d+ya mA sa naM/ /dwA ri dwAHs+the pra tI hA raHprA ti har+Ya pya nan+ta re/ /bi pu l+ye na ku le biSh+Nau ba b+h+ruHs+yAt+ping+ga le tri Shu/ /sA ro ba les+thi raM shi ba n+yAy+Ye klI baM ba re tri Shu/ /du ro da rod+yu ta ka re pa Ni d+yU te du ro darAM/ /ma
<p>230a.6</p>changs pa khri sogs stan/ /sgo srung sgor gnas pra tI hAr/ /prA ti hAr+Ya mtha' yas so/ /chen po ne'u le khyab 'jug dang / /ba b+h+ru yin te skya bo gsum/ /sA ra dbung gnas cha shas dang / /rigs pa ma ning mchog gsum mo/ /du ro da ro sho byed dang / /sho rgyal du ra da raM'o/ /g.yul
<p>230b</p>
<p>230b.1</p>hA ra N+ye durga pa the kAn+tA raHpun+na buM sa kaM /mat+sa ro\u0f85 n+ya shu b+ha dwe She tat+bat+k+r-i pa Na yo s+t+ri Shu/ /de bAd+d+h+r-i te ba raHshreSh+The tri Shu klI baM ma nA k+p+ri ye/ /baM shAM ku re ka rI ro\u0f85s+t+ra'i ta ru b+he de g+ha tre tsa nA/ /nA tsa mU dza ga ma ha sta
<p>230b.2</p>chen bgrod dka' lam dang ni/ /skyes bu ma ning kAn+tA ra/ /mat+sa ro ni gzhan dge la/ /zhe sdang de bzhin ser sna gsum/ /ba ra lha yis spel ba dang / /mchog gsum ma ni cung zad dga'/ /baM shAM ku re smyug ma'i myug /mo min shing dbye bum pa'o/ /dmag dpung dang ni dmag
<p>230b.3</p>sU tre pra ti sha ronyas+t+ri yAM/ /ya mA ni len+d+ra tsan+d+rA rka biSh+Nu siM hAM shu bA dzi Shu/ /shu kA hi ke Shu b+hi ke Shu ha rid+nA ka bi le tri Shu/ /sharka rA karba rAM she bi yA trA s+yAng+yA pa ne ga tau/ /i rA b+hu bAk+su rAp+su s+yAn+tan+d+rI ni drA pra mI la
<p>230b.4</p>gi gzhis/ /lag skud pra ti sha ra'o/ /gshin rje rlung dang dbang po dang / /zla nyi khyab 'jug seng ge'o/ /rta dang ne tso sbrul spre'u/ /sbal pa rnams la ha ri pho/ /skya bo la ni rtags gsum mo/ /sharka rA ni gyo du ma mo/ /yA t+yA ltad mo 'gro ba'o/ /i rA sa dang ngag chang chu/ /tan+d+rI gnyid dang
<p>230b.5</p>yoH/ /d+hA trI s+yA du pa mAtA pi k+Shi ti ra pyA ma la kya pi/ /k+Shu drA byang+gA na TI bai sh+ya sa da g+hA kaN+Da kA ri kA/ /tri Shu krU re\u0f85d+ha me\u0f85 lpe pi k+Shu traM mA tra pa ri ts+tsha de/ /alpe tsa ba ri mA Ne sau mA traM kAr+t+s+n+ye\u0f85pa d+hA ra Ne/ /A le khyAsh+tsar+Ya yosh+tsi traM ka la
<p>230b.6</p>rmugs pa'o/ /d+hA trI nye ba'i ma ma dang / /sa dang skyu ru ra la yang / /k+Shu drA yon po gar mkhan ma/ /smad 'tshong dang ni sbrang rtsi la/ /kaN+Da kA ri ka'o gsum/ /thang na smod nyung k+Shu dra'o/ /mA tra yo byad nyung dang tshad/ /mA traM kun dang nges bzung la/ /tsa traM kun bris ngo mtshar can/ /ka la traM ni chung
<p>231a</p>
<p>231a.1</p>traM shro Ni b+hAr+Ya yoH/ /yo gya b+hA dza na yoHpA traM pa traM bA ha Na pak+Sha yoH/ /nirde sha gran+tha yoHshAs+t+raM shas+t+ra mA yu d+ha lo ha yoH/ /s+yAdz+dza TAM shu ka yorne traM k+Shi traM bat+nI sha rI ra yoH/ /mukhA gre kro Da ha la yoHpo traM go trany+tsa nAm+ni tsa/ /sat+t+ra
<p>231a.2</p>@#/ /dbyi mgo zer/ /ma chu/ /rigs dang snod ni pA traM ngo / /pa traM bzhon pa 'dab ma'o/ /shAs+t+raM nges bstan dang ni gzhung / /shas+t+ra mtshon dang lpags dag la'o/ /rtsa phran gos mig ne traM'o/ /k+She traM chung ma lus dag go/ /phag sna gos bshol pa traM'o/ /go traM rigs dang ming la yang / /saM
<p>231a.3</p>mAts+tsha da ne yadz+nyA sa dA dA ne ba ne pi tsa/ /a dzi raM bi Sha ye kA ye s+yam+ba raM byom+ni bA sa si/ /tsakraM rASh+T+re pyak+Sha ran+tu mok+She pi k+ShI ra map+su tsa/ /su bar+N+Ne pi b+hU ri tsan+d+rau dwau dwA ra ma tre pi go pu raM/ /gu hA dam+b+hau ga
<p>231a.4</p>draM gos dang mchod sbyin dang / /rtag tu sbyin dang nags tshal lo/ /a dzi raM ni yul dang dbus/ /am+ba raM ni nam mkha' gos/ /tsakraM pha rol dmag dang yul/ /ak+Sha ra ni grol ba'o/ /k+ShI ra chu dang 'o ma la'o/ /gser kyang b+hU ri tsan+d+ro gnyis/ /sgo srung dang ni ba glang khyim/ /phug dang nga rgyal
<p>231a.5</p>hwa re dwe ra hon+ti ka mu pa hwa re/ /pu ro\u0f85d+hi ka mu par+Ya grA N+ya gA re na ga re pu raM/ /man+di raM tsA tha rASh+T+re\u0f85s+t+ri bi Sha ye s+yA du sa dra be/ /da ro\u0f85s+t+ri yAM b+ha ye shwa b+h+re badzro\u0f85s+t+rI hI ra ke pa bau/ /tan+t+raM d+hA n+ya sid+d+hAn+te sU tra bA ye pa
<p>231a.6</p>ga hwa re/ /dben gnas u pa hwa re'o/ /sngon lhag steng mdun a grA'o/ /khyim dang grong khyer pu raM ngo / /'du ba de nas yul 'khor ni/ /mo min yul dang bar du gcod/ /da ro mo min 'jigs dang dong / /badzra mo min pha lam thog /tan+t+raM gtso bo grub mtha' dang / /thag 'thags
<p>231b</p>
<p>231b.1</p>ri ts+tsha da/ /au shI raM tsA ma ra daN+De pyau shI raM sha ya nA sa naM/ /puSh+ka raM ka ri hastA gre bA d+ya b+hAN+Da mu khe dza le/ /byom+ni khaD+ga pha le pad+me tIr+tho Sha d+hi bi she Sha yoH/ /an+ta ra ma ba kA shA ba d+hi pa ri d+hA nAn+tar+d+wi b+he da
<p>231b.2</p>dang ni yongs 'gegs la'o/ /rnga yab dbyug pa au shI raM/ /mal stan la yang au shI raM/ /puska raM ni glang chen sna/ /rnga dang snod kha chu dang ni/ /nam mkha' ral gri rtsed mo'i chas/ /pad+ma chu 'gram sman bye brag /an+ta raM ni mthang dang ni/ /sham thabs mtshams dang thibs po dang / / 
<p>231b.3</p>tA dar+th+ye/ /tshi drAt+mI ya bi nA ba hi ra ba sha ra ma d+h+ye\u0f85n+ta rAt+ma ni tsa/ /muste tsa pi Tha raM rA dza ka se ru N+ya pi nA ga raM/ /shArba raM twan+d+ha ta ma saM g+hA tu ke b+he d+ya ling+ga kaM /gau ro\u0f85ru Ne si te pI te bra Na shing ba ka ta kI r+Ya pya ru ska ra/ /dza Tha
<p>231b.4</p>dbye ba de don bu ga dang / /bar gyim gtogs phyi gnas skabs/ /dbu ma bar gyi bdag nyid dang / /li ga dur ni gla sgang zer pi Tha raM/ /mon lug sga ni nA ga raM/ /shA barba raM ni mun stug dang / /'joms byed dbye ba rtags med do/ /gau ra dmar dang dkar dang ser/ /a ruska ra rma byed do/ /dza Tha
<p>231b.5</p>raHka Thi ne pi s+yA da d+ha stA da pi tsA d+ha raH/ /a nA ku le pi tsai kA gro bya gro byA shak+ta Aku le/ /u par+Yu dI ts+ya shreSh+The Sh+wa pyut+ta raHs+yAt+t+wa nut+ta raH/ /e ShAM bi par+Ya ye shreSh+The dU rAmAt+mot+ta mAH pa rAH/ /swA du pri yau tu ma d+hu rau krU rau
<p>231b.6</p>ra ni sra dang gsus/ /a d+hastA ni mchu 'og gzhi/ /'dres med gcig ni a dra'o/ /bya dra kun chags bag ma'o/ /steng byang mchog rnams ut+ta ra/ /a nut+ta re de rnams kyi/ /rnam par log dang gtso bo la/ /ring dang pha rol mchog pa rA/ /zhim dang dga' ba ma d+hu ra/ /krU
<p>232a</p>
<p>232a.1</p>ka Thi na ni rda yau/ /u dA ro dA tr-i ma hA to ri ta ras+t+wa n+ya nI tsa yoH/ /mnad swa ts+tshan+da yoHswai raHshu b+h+ra mud+dIp+ta shukla yoH/ /tsU Da ki rI TaM keshAsh+tsa saM ya tA mo la yas+t+ra yaH/ /dru ma pra b+he da mA taM ga kAN+Da
<p>232a.2</p>@#/ /ra mkhregs dang brtse ba med/ /u dA ra ni sbyin byed che/ /i ta ra ni gzhan dang dman/ /dman dang rang 'dod swai ra'o/ /shu b+h+ra snang gsal dkar po'o/ /ra mtha'o/ /gtsug phud cod pan skra dang ni/ /saM ya tA rnams mau la'o gsum/ /shing gi rab dbye glang po dang / / 
<p>232a.3</p>puSh+pA Ni pI la baH/ /kr-i tAn+tA ne ha soHkA lash+tsa tur+the pi yu ge kaliH/ /s+yAt+ku raM ge pi ka ma laHprA bA re tsa pi kam+ba laH/ /ka ro pa hA ra yoHpu si ba liHprA N+yaM ga dze\u0f85s+t+ri yAM/ /s+tho l+ya sA mar+th+ya sai n+ye Shu ba laM nA kA ka shI ri NoH/ /bA
<p>232a.4</p>mda' dang me tog pI lu'o/ /mthar byed dus dag kA la'o/ /dus bzhi'i tha ma ka li'o/ /ri dgas bye brag ka ma la/ /gos dang snam bu kam+ba la/ /rgyal sdud ba li skyes bu'o/ /srog chags lus las skyes pa mo/ /stobs dang nus pa dmag dpung rnams/ /ba laM skyes bu bya rog thogs/ /bA
<p>232a.5</p>tU laHpuM si bA t+yA yA ma yaM bA tA sa he tri Shu/ /b+he d+ya ling+gaHsha The byA laHpuM si shwA pa da sarba yoH/ /ma lo\u0f85s+t+rI pA pa biT+kiT+TA n+yas+t+ri shU laM ru gA yu d+haM/ /shaM kA ba pi dwa yoHkI laHpA li ra g+r+yang+ka paMk+ti Shu/ phreng ba/ /ka lA shilpe kA la
<p>232a.6</p>tU la ni rlung tshubs dang / /rlung nad can no rtags gsum mo/ /byA la g.yo sgyu rtags bye brag /skyes bu gzig dang sbrul la'o/ /ma la mo min sdig pa dang / /dri tshan dang ni dri ma'o/ /tri shU la ni zug rngu mtshon/ /phur bu me lce kI la'o/ /pA li zur rtags sna shal rnams/ /ka lA bzo dang dus kyi
<p>232b</p>
<p>232b.1</p>b+he de pyA li sa khyA ba lI a pi/ /ab+d+h+yam+bu bi kr-i tau be lA kAl mar+YA da yo ra pi/ /ba hu lA kr-it+ti kA gA bau ba hu lo \u0f85 g+niHnyasi tau tri Shu/ /lI lA bi lA sa kri ya yo ru pa lAHsharka rA a pi/ /sho Ni te \u0f85m+b+ha saM kI lA laM mU la mA d+yeshi phA b+ha yoH/ /dzA
<p>232b.2</p>dbye/ /A li dbang po phreng ba gral/ /bi la chu mtsho'i rnam 'gyur dang / /dus dang tshul lugs rnams la'o/ /ba hu la ni smin drug dang / /ba lang me dang nag po gsum/ /lI lA sgeg dang bya ba la/ /rdo dang gyo dum u pa lA/ /khrag dang chu la kI lA laM/ /mU la dang po rtsa ba'i don/ /dzA
<p>232b.3</p>la sa mU ha A nA yo ga bAk+Sha k+ShA ra me tog 'ga' re dang lhan cig pas zer kA ba pi/ /shI la swa b+hA ba sad+b+r-i te sa bye he tu kr-i te pha laM/ /tsha dirne tra ru dzoHklI baM sa mU he pa Ta lan+na nA/ /a d+haHswa rU pa yo ras+t+rI ta laM s+yAts+tsA mi she pa laM/ /aurbA mtsho'i me zer na le
<p>232b.4</p>laM tshogs pa nya dol dang / /dra sgo dang ni dra ba la'o/ /shI la rang bzhin tshul khrims so/ /'bru dang rgyu byas pha laM'o/ /steng g.yogs dang ni mig nad dang / /ma ning tshogs pa pa Ta laM/ /'og dang mthil ni ta laM'o/ /sha dang zang zing pa laM'o/ /sa mtsho'i me zer
<p>232b.5</p>sa pi pA tA laM tse laM bas+t+re\u0f85d+ha me tri Shu/ /ku kU laM shaM ku b+hiHkIr+N+Ne swa b+h+re nA tu tu ShA na le/ /nir+N+NI te ke ba la mi ti tri ling+gaM twe ka kr-it+s+na yoH/ /par+YAp+ti k+She ma pu N+ya ku sha laM shik+Sha te tri Shu/ /pra bA la byi ru/ mAM ku re
<p>232b.6</p>chu 'og ni pA tA la/ /tsa laM gos dang tshangs me gsum/ /ku ku laM ni phur bu rtsang / /bkram pa dong dang phub ma'i me/ /nges par byas pa ke ba la/ /rtags gsum gcig dang ma lus pa/ /yongs su thob dang bde ba dang / /bsod nams bslab pa ku sha laM/ /gsum mo myu gu pra nA la/ / 
<p>233a</p>
<p>233a.1</p>pyas+t+rI tri Shu s+thU laM dza De pi tsa/ /ka rA lo dan+tu ro tud+ge tsA ro dak+She tsa pe sha laH/ /mUr+khe\u0f85r+b+ha ke pi bA laHs+yAl+lo lash+tsa la sa tr-iSh+Na yo/ /de bau dA bau ba NA ra N+ya ba h+nI dzan+ma hA rau b+ha bau/ /man+t+rI sa hA ya sa tsi bau pa
<p>233a.2</p>@#/ /mo min gsum po s+thU laM glen/ /ka rA la ni dma' dang mtho/ /mdzes dang mkhas pa pe sha la/ /rmongs dang byis pa bA la ste/ /lo la sred dang g.yo ba la/ /la mtha'o/ /de bau dA bau nags 'brog me/ /skye dang dbang phyug b+ha ba'o/ /blon po lhan cig sa tsi'o/ / 
<p>233a.3</p>ti shA khaM na rA d+ha bA/ /a ba yaHshai la me ShArkA A dz+nyA hwA nA d+hA rA ha bAH/ /b+hA baHsa twa swa b+hA bA b+hi prA ya tseSh+TAt+ma dzan+ma pu/ /s+yA dut+pA de pha le puSh+pe pra sa bo gar+b+ha mo tsa ne/ /a bi shwA se\u0f85pa h+na be pi
<p>233a.4</p>bdag po grogs mi d+ha bA'o/ /a bi ri bo lug nyi ma/ /bka' bsgo 'bod dang mchod sbyin rnams/ /A ha bA 'o b+hA ba ni/ /sems can rang bzhin dgongs pa dang / /sems dang bdag skye rnams la'o/ /skye ba 'bras bu me tog dang / /mngal nas btsas pa pra sa ba/ /yid mi ches dang ngan pa
<p>233a.5</p>ni kr-i tA ba pi ni hU baH/ /ut+se kA maR+Sha yo rits+tshA pra sa re ma ha ut+sa baH/ /a nu b+hA baHpra b+hA be tsa sa tAny+tsa mati nish+tsa ye/ /s+yAdz+dzan+ma he tuHpra b+ha baHs+thA naM d+yo pa lab+d+ha ye/ /d+h+ru bo b+ha b+he de klI be tu nish+tsi te shA shwa te
<p>233a.6</p>dang / /nyes byas rnams kyang ni hU ba/ /mthor 'gro spro dang 'dod pa brkyang / /mchod pa rnams la ut+sa ba/ /a nu b+hA ba rtogs pa dang / /dgongs pa blo gros nges pa la/ /pra b+ha ba ni skye dgu dang / /gnas dang don thob 'byung gnas so/ /d+h+ru ba rgyu skar dbye ba dang / /ma ning nges dang rtag
<p>233b</p>
<p>233b.1</p>tri Shu/ /swa dz+nyA tA bAt+ma ni swaM tri Sh+wA mI yA swonyas+t+ri yAn+d+ha ne/ /s+t+rI ka TI ba s+t+ra ban+d+he pi nI bI pa ri pa Ne pi tsa/ /shi bA gau rI phe ra be pi dwaM dwaM ka la ha yug+ma yoH/ /dra byAsna bya ba sA ye pi sa twa mas+t+rI tu dzan+tu
<p>233b.2</p>pa gsum/ /swa ni gnyen dang bdag dang ni/ /swAM ni gsum ste bdag dang ni/ /swa ni mo min nor yin no/ /nI bI bud med rked gos mdud/ /tshong pa'i zong rnams la yang ngo / /shi bA dkar mo ce spyang ngo / /dwaM dwaM 'thab mo zur rang bzhin/ /dra bya zad dang rdzas la'o/ /sa twa mo min
<p>233b.3</p>Shu/ /klI baM na buM sa kaM shaN+De bA ts+ya liM ga ma bi kra me/ /dwau bi shau bai sh+ya ma nu dzau dwau tsa rA bya ma rta b+hi ma rauspa shau/ /dwau rA shI puny+dza me ShA d+yau dwau baM shau ku la maska rau/ /ra haHpra kA shau bI kA shau nirbe shau
<p>233b.4</p>b+h+ri sems can no/ /klI baM ma ning za ma ste/ /brjod bya'i rtags can rnam par gnas/ /la mtha'o/ /gnyis/ bi shau rje rigs mi dag go /gnyis/ bang chen mngon spyod pa shau/ /gnyis/ rA shI phung po lug sogs khyim/ /baM shau rigs dang 'od ma'o/ /dben dang gsal ba bI kA sho/ /sa dang
<p>233b.5</p>ti gla zer b+ho ga yauH/ /kr-i tAn+te puM si kI nA shaHk+Shu dra kaR+Sha ka yo s+t+ri Shu/ /pa de lak+Sh+me ni met+te\u0f85pa de shaHs+yAt+ku sha map+su tsa/ /da shA bas+thA ne ka bi d+hA pyA sha tr-iSh+NA pi tsA ya tA/ /ba shAs+t+rI ka ra NI pa sh+yA dr-i ka dz+nyA ne dz+nyA ta ri tri Shu/ / 
<p>233b.6</p>longs spyod rang be sho /mthar byed skyes bu kI nA sha /ser sna dang ni mkhregs pa gsum/ /a pa de sha gnas mtshan rtags/ /ku sha rtswa dang chu la yang / /da sha gnas skabs rnam mang po/ /a sha sred pa ring po'o/ /ba shA glang mo dbang du byed/ /dr-i sha blo dang mig yin gsum/ /karka
<p>234a</p>
<p>234a.1</p>s+yAt+karka saHbrtag dpyad med par kun la 'jug pa/ sA ha si kaHka Tho rA ma sr-i Nab pi/ 'jungs pa/ pra kA sho\u0f85ti pra sid+d+he pi si shA ba dz+nye pi bA li shaH/ /su ra mat+s+yA ba ni mi Shau pu ru ShA bAt+ma mA na bo/ /kA ka mat+s+yA khe gau d+h+waM k+Shau kak+Shau tsa tr-i Na bI ru d+hau/ /a b+hI Shu pra gra he
<p>234a.2</p>@#/ /sha ni dpa' rtul dang / /sra ba dang ni gyong ba'o/ /pra kA sha ni rab gsal grags/ /byis dang blun po bA li shaH/ /sha mtha'o/ /lha dang nya la ni mi Sha/ /pu ru ba ni bdag dang me/ /d+h+wAM k+Sha bya rog nya mkha' 'gro/ /kak+Sho rtsa dang 'khri shing ngo / /a b+hI Shu ni srab 'od
<p>234a.3</p>rasmau pre ShaHpre Sha Namarda ne/ /pa k+ShaHsa hA ye pyuSh+NI ShaHshi ro beSh+Ta ki rI Ta yoH/ /shu kra le mU Shi ke shreSh+The su kr-i te br-i Sha b+he br-i ShaH/ /ko Shonyas+t+rI kuT+ma le pad+ma'i nang khaD+ga pi d+hA ne\u0f85r+thau g+ha di bya yoH/ /d+YU
<p>234a.4</p>zer/ /pre Sha 'gyed dang nyed pa'o/ /pak+Sha phyogs dang lhan cig la/ /uSh+NI kha ni gtsug tor dang / /thod dang cod pa na dag la'o/ /rlig pa bye ba mchog dang ni/ /legs byas khyu mchog br-i Sha'o/ /ko Sha mo min grol med dang / /ral gri'i shubs dang do na tshogs mnan/ /ak+Sha
<p>234a.5</p>te\u0f85 k+She shA ri pha la ke pyA kaR+Sho\u0f85thA k+Sha min+d+ri ye/ /nA d+YU tAng+ge kaR+She srang gi bzhi cha tsakre bya ba hA re ka li dru me/ /kaR+ShUr+b+bak+t+rA ka rI ShAg+niHkaR+ShUHku l+yA b+hi d+hA yi nI/ /sum+b+hA be tat+k+ri ye yAny+tsa pau ru ShaM bi Sha map+su tsa/ /u pA dA ne
<p>234a.6</p>sho dang sho ye stan/ /'gugs pa la'o de nas ni/ /ak+Sha dbang po sho lus 'dren/ 'khor lo chos lus rtsod pa'i shing / /kaR+ShU bzhin dang lci ba'i me/ /kaR+ShU 'gram dang brjod bya'o/ /skyes dngos bya ba pu ru ShaM/ /bi ShaM dug dang chu la yang / /sha dang nyer len A mi
<p>234b</p>
<p>234b.1</p>byA mi ShaM s+yAd pa rA d+he pi kilba ShaM/ /s+yAd+p+r-i Sh+Tau lo ka d+hA twaM she bat+sa re baR+Sha mas+t+ri yAM/ /prek+ShA nr-it+te k+Sha NaM pradz+nyA b+hik+Sha se bAr+tha b+h-i tiH/ /twiT sho b+hA pi tri Shu pa ren+yak+Sha kAr+t+s+n+ye ni kr-iSh+Ta yoH/ /pra t+ya k+She\u0f85d+hi kri te\u0f85d+h+ya k+Sho ru k+Sha s+t+wa pre m+N+ya tsik+ka
<p>234b.2</p>ShaM/ /gnod byed sdig pa kilpi ShaM/ /char dang 'jig rten khams cha dang / /lo rnams baR+Sha mo min no/ /prek+ShA gar lta shes rab bo/ /b+hi k+Sha zhabs thog slong dang gla/ /twi Sha mdzes dang 'od gsum gzhan/ /n+ya k+Sha nyes dang mtha' dag go/ /mngon sum bka' lung a d+h+yak+Sha/ /ru k+Sha mi mthun pa dang
<p>234b.3</p>Ne/ /rabi shwa tats+tsha dau haM so sUR+Ya bah+nI bi b+hA ba sU/ /bat+sau bar+Nu ka baR+Shau dwau sA raM gash+tsa di bau ka saH/ /shr-iM gA rA dau bi bIr+Ye gu Ne rA ge dra be rasaH/ /buM s+yut+taM sA ba taM sau dau kar+N+Na pU re pi shi kha re/ / 
<p>234b.4</p>rtsub/ /Sha mtha'o/ /nyi ma dang skya haM sa'o/ /nyi ma me 'od ba sU'o/ /bat+sau be'u lo dag gnyis/ /khug rta mtho ris di bau kas/ /sgeg pa la sogs nyams dang ni/ /dug dang thig le yon tan chags/ /khu ba rnams la ra sa'o/ /a ba taM sa ut+taM sA/ /gnyis te rna ba'i gong rgyan thod/ /lha yi bye
<p>234b.5</p>de ba b+he denyan li rasmau pa sU rat+na d+ha ne ba su/ /baSh+Nau tsa be d+haHs+t+rI twA shIr+hi tA sha sA hi daMSh+T+ra yoH/ /lA la se prAr+tha naut+su kye hiM sA tsar+YA de karma tsa/ /pra sU ra shwA pi b+hu d+yA bau ro da sau ro da shI tsa te/ /dz+wA lA b+hA sorna pu
<p>234b.6</p>brag rlung dang ni/ /'od zer rnams la ba sU'o/ /nor dang rin chen ba su'o/ /khyab 'jug kyang ni be d+ha sa/ /mo nyid A shI sa nyid ni/ /phan sems sbrul gyi mche ba'o/ /lA la sa ni slong dang sred/ /hiM sA chom rkun sogs kyi las/ /pra sU ma dang rgod ma'o/ /sa dang nam mkha' ro da s+ya/ /'od zer kyang ngo
<p>235a</p>
<p>235a.1</p>s+yar+ts+tsi dz+yo tir+b+ha d+yo ta dr-iSh+Ti Shu/ /pA bA ba rA d+ha yo rA gaHkha ga bA l+yA di no rba yaH/ /te dzaHpu rI Sha yorbar+ts+tsorma hastUs ba te dza soH/ /ra dzo gu Ne pi s+t+rI puSh+pe rA hau d+h+wan+te gu Ne ta maH/ / 
<p>235a.2</p>@#/ /b+hA sa ni/ /'bar ba dang ni ma ning ngo / /a rtsis ni 'od snang mig /sdig dang nyes pa A gsa'o/ /mkha' 'gro na mnyam ya bas so/ /'od dang bshad lam brtsas/ /chen po spro ba te dza sa/ /ra dza sa yon tan bud med rdul/ /ta mas sgra gcan mun yon tan/ 
<p>235a.3</p>ts+tshan+daHpa d+yenyab+hi lA She tsa ta paHkr-its+tsh+rA di kar+m+ma tsa/ /sa ho ba laM sa mA rge na b+haHkhaM shrA ba No na b+hAH/ /o kaHsa da mA shra yash+tso kAHpa yaHk+ShI raM pa yom+bu tsaH/ /o dzo dIp+tau ba le shro ta in+d+ri ye nim+na gA ra ye/ /te
<p>235a.4</p>ts+tshan+das tshigs bcad mngon zhen no/ /ta pas dka' thub sogs kyi las/ /sa has stobs sa hA sa mgo zla/ /gro zhun na b+hA sa mkha' na b+has/ /o ka sa khyim dang rten o kA sa/ /pa yas 'o ma pa yas chu/ /o dzas mdangs 'od stobs la'o/ /shro tas dbang po gtsang po khyim/ /te dzas
<p>235a.5</p>dzaHpra b+hA be dIp+tau ba le shu kre pya tas+t+riShu/ /bi dwAn bi daMsh+tsa bI b+hat+so hiM sro pya ti sha ye twa mI/ /br-id+d+ha pra sha s+ya yor+dz+ye yA na ka nI yAM stu yu bA lpa yoH/ /ba rI yAM stu ru ba ra yoHsA d+hI yan+sA d+hu ba Ta yoH/ /da le pi bar+haM ni rban+d+ho pa rA gA rkA da yo gra
<p>235a.6</p>nus mthu sgron ma dang / /stobs dang khu ba rnams la'o/ /bi dwA na ni rig pa'o/ /bIb+hat+sa ni rnam 'tshe'o/ /dz+ye yan+sa ni 'phel dang shis/ /ka nI yaM sa na tshod gzhon/ /ba rI yaM sa brla dang mchog /sA d+hI yan+sa legs shin tu/ /sa mtha'o/ /'dom ma rma bya'i mdongs bar+ha/ /byis gdon gza' sogs 
<p>235b</p>
<p>235b.1</p>hAH/ /dwAr+YA pI De kwA tha ra se ni r+Ya ho nA ga daM ta ke /tu lA sU tre\u0f85shwA di ra smau pra grA haHpra grA ho pa tsi/ /pat+nI pa ri dza nA dA na mU la shA pAHpa ri grahAH/ /dA ri Sh+wa pi gr-i hAHsro N+yA ma pyA ro ho bar s+t+ri yAH/ /byU ho br-in+de pya hi r+b+r-i tre
<p>235b.2</p>gra ha'o/ /sgo khyud nang dang sman bskol ba/ /niR+YU ha'o glang chen po/ /srag thag rta la sogs pa'i srab/ /pra grA ha dang bra gra ha'o/ /chung ma 'khor bcas len pa rtsa/ /mna' rnams pa ri gra hA'o/ /bud med khyim bdag 'dzin pa'o/ /chu so dang ni bud med mchog /A ro ha'o byU ha tshogs/ /A hI sprul dang
<p>235b.3</p>lha pyag+nIn+d+warkA stA mo pa hAH/ /pa ri ts+tsha de nr-i pA r+he\u0f85r+the pa ri ba r+ho\u0f85bya yAHpa re/ /A dI Sha da r+the\u0f85b+hi byA btau sI mA r+the d+hA tu yo ga dze/ /A pra gr-i h+yaHsmr-i tau bA kye pyA stu s+yAt+ko pa pI Da yoH/ /pA pa kut+se Sha dar+the ku
<p>235b.4</p>min la/ /ta mo pa hA me nyi zla/ /yongs gcod mi dbang yo byad ni/ /pa ri brto mi zad phyir/ /ha mtha'o/ /cung zad don dang mngon khyab dang / /khams dang mtshams sbyor las skyes Ang / /dran pa dang ni ngag la yang / /A ni mtshams mi sbyor ba'o/ /A ni khro ba zug rngu dang / /sdig dang ngan pa nyung du ku/ /d+hing
<p>235b.5</p>d+hid+ni b+hAt+sa na nin+da yoH/ /tsA n+wA tsa ye sa ma hA re ta re ta ra sa muts+tsa ye/ /swa s+t+yA shiHk+She ma pu N+yA dau pra kaR+She laM g+ha ne pya ti/ /swit+p+rash+ne pi tarke tsa tu s+yAd+b+he de\u0f85ba d+hA ra Ne/ /sa kr-it+sa dai ka bA re tsA pyA rA d+dU ni
<p>235b.6</p>sdigs tshig smod pa dag /rtsa ni zhar byung bsdu ba dang / /re re ba dang kun las btus/ /swa sti shis pa bde legs dang / /bsod nams la sogs shin tu dga'/ /mchongs pa la yang a ti'o/ /swita dri ba rnam rtog go/ /tu ni dbye ba dmigs 'dzin pa/ /sa kr-ita lhan du lhan cig pa/ /A rA da rid
<p>236a</p>
<p>236a.1</p>ra sa mI pa yoH/ /pra tI ts+yA tsa ra me pa sh+tsA du tA pyar+tha bi kalpa yoH/ /pu naHsa dar+tha yoHsha shwat+sA k+ShA t+p+ra t+ya k+Sha tu l+ya yoH/ /khe dA nu kam+pA saM to Sha basmi yA man+t+ra ne ba ta/ /han+ta haR+She nya nu kam+pA/ / 
<p>236a.2</p>@#/ /dang sa gcig dag /nub phyogs phyi ma pa sh+tsA da'o/ /u tA'i don ni brtag dpyad dag /yang dang rtag tu'i don sha shwata/ /sA k+ShA ta mngon sum mtshungs pa dag /sems can rjes su brtse ba dang / /nye bar tshim dang ngo mtshar dang / /snyan gsan 'bebs pa ba ta'o/ /han+ta
<p>236a.3</p>yAM bA kyA ram+b+ha bi ShA da yoH/ /pra ti pra ti ni d+hau bIp+sA lak+Sha NA dau pra yo ga taH/ /i ti he tu pra ka ra Na pra kA shA di sa mAp+ti Shu/ /pra ts+yAM pu rastAt+p+ra tha me pu rAr+the\u0f85gra ta i t+ya pi/ /yA
<p>236a.4</p>dga' dang rjes brtse dang / /ngag rtsom pa dang 'o brgyal ba/ /pra ti mtshon byed khyab 'gro 'dod/ /mtshan nyid la sogs rab sbyor las/ /i ti rgyu mtshan gnas skabs dang / /gsal byed sogs dang rdzogs rnams la/ /pu ra stA ta ni shar phyogs dang / /dang po sngon don bdun zhes pa'ang / /ji
<p>236a.5</p>bat+tA bats+tsa sA ka l+ye nya ba d+hau mA na ba d+ha ra Ne/ /mang+ga lA nan+ta rA ram+b+ha prash+na kA r+t+s+n+ye Sh+wa tho a thaH/ /br-i thA ni ra r+tha kA bi d+h+yau rnA nA ne ko b+ha yAr+tha yoH/ /nu prits+tshA yAM bi kalpi tsa pash+tsAt+sa dr-i sh+ya yo ra nu/ /pra sh+na ba
<p>236a.6</p>snyed de snyed sA ka l+ya/ /bar mtshams tshad dang dmigs 'dzin no/ /bkra shis rgyun mi chad dang rtsom/ /'dri dang mtha' dag a tha'o/ /de nas br-i tha don med dang / /bya min la'o nA nA ni/ /du ma dang ni gnyi ga'i don/ /nu ni dri ba rnam rtog dang / /phyi ma 'dra dag a nu'o/ /'dri ba dmigs 'dzin
<p>236b</p>
<p>236b.1</p>d+hA ra NA nu dz+nyA \u0f85nu na yA man+d+ra Ne na nu/ /gar+hA sa muts+tsa ya prash+na shaM kA sam+b+hA ba nA swa pi/ /u pa mA yAM bi kalbe sA mi twar+d+he dzu gup+sa ne/ /a mas ha sa mI pe tsa kam+WA ri ni tsa mUr+d+h+ni tsa/ /i bat+the mar+tha yo re baMnu naM ta rke\u0f85tha ni sh+tsa ye/ / 
<p>236b.2</p>rjes dang bsgo/ /yid gcugs 'bod pa na nu'o/ /smod dang kun btus 'dri ba dang / /dgos pa 'byung 'gyur ba a pi'o/ /nyer 'jal 'dam kha bA yin no/ /sA mi phyed dang smod pa la/ /a mA lhan cig sa gcig nye ba dang / /kaM ni chu dang spyi bo la/ /dpe dang 'di yi don e waM/ /nu naM rtog dang don nges la'o/ / 
<p>236b.3</p>tUSh+NI mar+the su khe dzo ShaM kiM pr-its+tshA yAM dzu gu gup+sa ne/ /nA ma pra kA sh+ya sam+b+hA n+ya kro d+ho pa ga mu gut+sa ne/ /a laM b+hU Sha Na par+YA p+ti yongs su rdzogs pa/ shak+ti nus pa/ bA ra Na bA tsa kaM/ /huM bi ta rke pa ri prash+ne sa ma yAn+ti ka ma d+h+yo yoH/ /pu na ra pra tha ma b+he de ni rnish+tsa ya ni She d+ha yoH/ / 
<p>236b.4</p>mi smra'i don bde dzo Sha'o/ /kiM ni dri dang smod pa la/ /nA ma ston byed 'byung ba dang / /khro dang khas len ngan pa'o/ /a laM rgyan dang rnam grangs thob/ /mdung thung dang ni chog tshig la/ /hUM ni rnam rtog yongs su 'dri/ /sa ma ya ni nye dang dbus/ /pu nar dang po ma yin dbye/ /nir ni nges dang dgag pa
<p>236b.5</p>s+yAt+p+ra ban+d+he tsi rA tI te na ka TA gA mi ke pu rA/ /u rar+pU rI tso da rI tsa bi stA renyad+gi kr-i tau tra yaM/ /swa rge pa ro tsA lo ke swarbA r+t+tA sam+b+hA bya yoH ki la/ /ni She d+ha bA kyA laM ka ra dzi dz+nyA shA nu na ye kha lu/ /sa mI nye ba/ po b+ha ya taH/ shA+e
<p>236b.6</p>la/ /pra ban+d+ha ni dus ring 'das/ /nye 'khor 'byung 'gyur sngon ma ring / /u ra pU ri bi da rI/ /chu zheng khas len byas dag gsum/ /mtho ris pha rol 'jig rten spar/ /gtam dang 'byung ba dag ki la/ /dgag pa tshig gi rgyan dang ni/ /shes 'dod gtsugs pa kha lu'o/ /sa gcig gnyi ga myur ba'o/ / 
<p>237a</p>
<p>237a.1</p>g+h+ra sA ka l+yA b+hi mu khe\u0f85b+hi taH/ /nA ma pra kA sh+ye yoHprA dur+m+mi tho\u0f85n+yo n+yaM ra ha s+ya pi/ /ti ran+tar+d+h+wau tir+Ya gar+the hA bi ShA da shu gar+t+ti Shu/ /a ha he t+yad+b+hu te khe de hi he tA ba ba d+hA ra Ne/ /ya ne kArba bar+g+gaH// //tsi rA
<p>237a.2</p>@#/ /mtha' dag mngon gyur a b+hi ta/ /ming dang gsal byed prA du ra/ /mi tho phan tshun dben pa'ang / /ti ra sgrib dang dud 'gro'i don/ /hA ni sdug bsngal mya ngan la/ /a ha ha ni rmad byung skyo/ /hi ni rgyu mtshan dmigs 'dzin no/ /don sna tshogs kyi sde tshan no// //rgyun
<p>237a.3</p>ya tsi ra rA trA ya tsi ra s+yA d+yAsh+tsi rAr+tha kAH/ /mu huHpu naHpu naHsha shwa da b+hIk+Sh+Na ma sa kr-itsha mAH/ /srAg+d+ha gi t+yany+dza sA h+nA ya sa ya di drAM mak+Shu tsa dra te/ /ba la bat+suSh+Thu ki/ /mu ta swa t+ya tI ba tsa nir+b+ha re/ /pr-i
<p>237a.4</p>ring yun ring ring po dang / /dus ring po la sogs pa'i don/ /yang dang slar dang slad dang ni/ /rtag tu yang yang gcig min mtshungs/ /mgyogs myur skyon dang yud tsam dang / /de ma thag dang me sdod myur/ /shin tu nan tar ha las dang // //su dang a ti shin tu'i don/ khyad 'phags la'o/ /so
<p>237a.5</p>thag+bi nAn+ta re Na rte tu hi ru ka nA nA tsa brdza ne/ /yat+tad+ya tasta to he tA ba sA ka l+ye tu kiny+tsi ta/ /ka dA tsidz+dzA tu sArban+tu sA kaM sa traM sa maM sa ha/ /A nu ku l+yAr+tha kaM prA d+h+weM byar+tha ke tu br-i thA mu d+hA/ /A ho u tA ho ki mu tA bi
<p>237a.6</p>so re re mthar byas dang / /tu hi rug dang nA nA bor/ /yad tad gang las de las rgyu/ /thams cad ma yin kiny+tsi ta/ /ka dA tsi ta ni ni ma zhig go/ /lhan cig dus gcig mnyam mtshungs ldan/ /mthun phyogs don dang mthun pa'o/ /don med byar med don med do/ /rtog pa rnam rtog brtag pa dang / /'dam
<p>237b</p>
<p>237b.1</p>kalpe kiM ki mU ta tsa/ /tu hi tsasma ha bai pA da pU ra Ne pU dza ne swa ti/ /di bA h+nI t+ya tha do Sha tsa nak+tany+tsu ra dza nA bi ti/ /ter+Ya gar+the 'khyog po/ sA tse ta ro pya tha saM b+ho d+ha nAr+tha kAH/ /s+yuH Sh+T+yA T+pA DaM ga he hai b+hoHsa ma yA
<p>237b.2</p>kha ci zhig rnam par rtog /tu hi tsasma ha dang bai/ /tshig gi kha skong don yin no/ /su dang a ti mchod pa'i bya/ /nyin mo thun dang de nas ni/ /nyis mtshan nam zhes bya ba'o/ /dud 'gro'i don dang sA tsi phyugs/ /de nas bod pa'i don yin no/ /s+yuHs+yA Ta dang pA DaM ga /he hai b+hoHrnams bod pa'o/ /lhan
<p>237b.3</p>ni ka ShA hi ru ka /a ta rti te tu sa ha sA s+yAt+pu raHpu ra to\u0f85gra taH/ /swA hA de ba ha birdA ne shrau Sha Ta bau Sha Ta ba Sha Ta su d+hA/ /kiny+tsi dI Shan+ma nA galpa pre t+yA su tra b+ha bAn+ta re/ /bad+d+hA ya thA ta the bai baM sA mye\u0f85ho
<p>237b.4</p>cig sa gcig nye 'khor ro/ /ma brtags pa dang ma dpyad dang / /sngon ma snga ma mdun ma'o/ /swA hA lha la bsreg rdzas sbyin/ /shrau Sha Ta dang bauSha Ta dang / /ba Shad rnams ni bdud rtsi sbyin/ /cung zad bag tsam nyung chung du/ /yi dgas bar do srid pa bar/ /'dra dang ji ltar de ltar dang / /de lta bu dang mnyam pa'o/ / 
<p>237b.5</p>hI tsa bisma ye/ /mau ne tu tUSh+NIM tU Sh+NI kA sa d+yaHsa pa di tat+k+Sha Ne/ /diSh+T+yA sha mu pa dzo pany+tset+YA naM de\u0f85thAn+ta ran+ta rA/ /an+ta re Na tsa ma d+h+ye s+yuHpra sa h+yaM tu ha ThAr+tha kaM/ yuk+te dwe sAM pra taM s+thA ne\u0f85b+hIk+Sh+NaM sha shwa da nA ra te/ /a b+hA be+e na
<p>237b.6</p>a ho nyI dang ngo mtshar ro/ /smra bcad mi smra tUSh+TI ka/ /sa d+yaHcig car de ma thag /bde dang dgyes pa mnyes dang dga'/ /de nas bar dang dkyil dang ni/ /nang dang dbus ma zhes pa'o/ /mthu dang stobs kyi don yin no/ /zung dang phrugs dang da ltar gnas/ /slar dang yang yang rtag tu'o/ /med dgag na hi
<p>238a</p>
<p>238a.1</p>h+ya no nA pi mAsma mA laM tsa bA ra Ne/ /pa k+ShA n+ta re tse d+yA di tsa ta twe twa dwAny+dza sA dwa yaM/ /prA kA sh+ye pra du rA biHs+yA do me baM pa ra mam+ma te/ /sa man+ta tastu pa ri taHsar+b+ba to bi Sh+wa ga t+ya pi/ /a kA mA nu ma tau kA ma ma
<p>238a.2</p>@#/ /a dang ni/ /dgag sa med dgag chog tshig go /phyogs phyi ma dang tsed sogs tsa/ /de kho na nyid gnyis med dang / /rab ston rab gsal rnam pa yin/ /oM dang e baM mchog tu 'dod/ /mtha' dag yongs su thams cad kun/ /mi 'dod khas len kA maM 'o/ /bsting tshig khas len
<p>238a.3</p>sU yo pa ga me\u0f85 stu tsa/ /na nu tsa s+yA t+bi ro d+hok+tau kats+tsit+kA ma pra be da ne/ /niHSha maM duHkha maM gar+h+ye ya thA swaM tu ya thA yo thaM/ /mr-i Sha mi th+ya tsa bi ta the ya thAr+than+tu ya tha ta thaM/ /s+yu re ba tu pu na rbai tse t+ya ba d+hA ra Na ba tsa kAH/ / 
<p>238a.4</p>a ru tsa/ /'gal dang mi mthun par smra ba/ /ka ta tsita myong bar 'dod pa'o/ /sdug pa ma rungs ngan ba dang / /rang nyid ji lta ji bzhin ltar/ /shes bzhin brdzun dang mi bden pa/ /ji lta'i don dang ji bzhin ltar/ /s+yuHdang e ba tu pu naH/ /bai dang tsa dang i ti ni/ /dmigs kyi dbye ba'i tshig yin no/ / 
<p>238a.5</p>prA ga tI tAr+tha kaM nU na ma ba sh+yaM ni sh+tsa ye dwa yaM/ /sam+bat+ba R+She\u0f85ba re twarbA gA me ba swa ya mAt+ma nA/ /alpe nI tsair+m+ma ha t+yu ts+tsaiHpra yo b+hU m+n+ya dru te sha naiH/ /sa dA ne t+ye ba hirbA h+ye sma ti te\u0f85sta ma daR+sha ne/ /a sti sa twe ru Sho k+tA bUM uM prash+ne\u0f85nu prAg ni 'das pa'i don yin no/ / 
<p>238a.6</p>nU na los kyang nges pa gnyis/ /lo dang lo'o phyi ma gting / /a ma de bzhin rang dang bdag /nyung dang dma' ba che dang mtho/ /mang po phal cher 'gro dang bul/ /rtag tu rgyun du phyi dang phyi/ /'das dang mi mthong mi mngon no/ /yod dang bdog go khro tshig UM/ /u ni dri
<p>238b</p>
<p>238b.1</p>na ye twa pi/ /huM tarke s+yA du du ShA rA tre ra ba sA ne na mon tau/ /pu na rar+the\u0f85ng+gaM nin+dA yAM duSh+Thu saSh+Thu pra shan+sa ne/ /sA yaM sA ye pra ge prA taHpra b+hA te ni ka ShAn+ti ke/ pa rut+pa rA r+Ye+e Sha mo\u0f85b+de pUrbe pUrba tare ya ti/ /a d+yA trA h+n+ya tha
<p>238b.2</p>dang mnyes gshin tshig /huM ni rtog ge u Sha ni/ /nam gyi cha smad phyag dang 'dud/ /bod pa yang don aM ga'o/ /smod dang ngan smra bstod shis tshig /dgongs mo nyi ma nam langs snga/ /sa gcig pa dang kan+ti ke/ /na ning bzhi ni da lo deng / /son ma dang ni ches sngon ma/ /'dir ni de ring nyi ma'o/ /de nas
<p>238b.3</p>pUrbe h+nI t+yA bau pUrbot+ta rA pa rA ta/ /ta thA d+ha rA n+yA n+ya ta re ta rAt+pUrbe h+ya rA da yaH/ /u b+ha ya d+Yu sh+tsob+ha yed+YuHpa re twa h+ni pa re d+ya bi/ /h+yo ga te\u0f85nA ga te\u0f85h+ni shwaHpa ra shwaH shwaH pa ri ha ni/ ta dA ta dA nIM cig car/ yu ga pa de dus gcig tshe/ 
<p>238b.4</p>sngon ma'i thun la sogs/ /sngon ma phyi ma gzhan dang ni/ /de bzhin du ni gzhan dang gzhan/ /sngon ma'i nyi ma la sogs pa/ /nyi ma gnyis pa gnangs nyin mo/ /phyi dro'i thun ni pa re d+ya/ /kha rtsang 'das pa ma 'ongs pa/ /nyi thun dang ni gnangs nang par/ /phyi thun de thun de yi tshe/ / 
<p>238b.5</p>ka dA sarba dA sa dA/ /e tar+hi saM pra tI dA nI ma d+hu nA saM pra daM ta thA/ /dig+de sha kA le pU r+b+bA dau prA gu dak+p+ra t+ya gA da yaH/ /a bya ya bar+g+gaH// //sa ling+ga shA s+t+rai san+nA di kr-it+ta d+d+hi ta sa mA sa dzeH/ /a
<p>238b.6</p>dus kun du dang rtag tu dang / /da lta dang ni da ltar dang / /da dang da lta de bzhin du/ /khyogs dang yul dang dus yin no/ /shar la sogs pa sngon ma dang / /phyi ma dang ni gzhan la sogs/ /mi zad pa'i sde tshan no// //rtags kyi bstan bcos dang bcas san sogs dang / /kr-ita dang de phan tshig sdud las skyes pa/ /ma bshad
<p>239a</p>
<p>239a.1</p>nuk+teHsaM gra ho ling+gaM saM kIr+N+Na ba di hon+na yeta/ /ling+ga she Sha bi d+hi byA pI bi she Shai d+ya bA d+hi taH/ /s+t+ri yA mI dU d+bi rA mai kA ts+sa yo ni prA Ni nA ma tsa/ /nA ma bi d+yu n+ni shA
<p>239a.2</p>@#/ /rnams kyis yang dag bsdus so rtags/ /spe lam 'dra bar 'dir ni rtogs par bya/ /gal te khyad par rnams kyis ma bkag na/ /rtags kyi lhag ma'i cho ga khyab byed yin/ /bud med I dang U dang ni/ /ngal bso dbyangs gcig las med dang / /skye gnas ldan pa'i srog chags ming / /ming dang glog dang
<p>239a.3</p>bal+lI bA NI di g+b+hU na di d+ha yAM/ /a nan+tai r+d+wi gu re kAr+tho na sa pA tra yu gA di b+hiH/ /ta la pr-in+de ye ni ka d+ya tra bai rA mai thu ni kA di bun/ /s+t+rI b+hA bA dA ba niHk+ti na N+wu la ts+k+ya po yu dza di ny+ni
<p>239a.4</p>mtshan mo dang / /'khril shing mda' dang phyogs dang sa/ /gtsang po blo gros rnams ni mo/ /ad mtha' ba gnyis don gcig pa/ /snod dang dus sogs ma gtogs pa/ /ta la 'tshogs pa ya dang i ni kad+ya tra/ /dgra dang 'khrig pa sogs la bu na'o/ /bud med dngos po sogs la a nik+tin/ /N+wu la a tsa kyas a yu tsa ang i
<p>239a.5</p>shA/ /u NA di Shu ni rU rI sh+tsa ng+YA bU dan+taM tsa laM s+thi raM/ /tat+k+rI DA yAM pra ha ra NaM tset+mau Sh+TA pAl+la bA Na di gra /g+ha nyo nyaHsA kri yAHs+yA ny+tse d+dA N+Da pA tA di phAlgu nI/ /s+yai naM pA tA tsa mr-i ga pa tai laM pA ta swa d+he ti
<p>239a.6</p>nya ni shA/ /U Na sogs rnams la ni dang U dang I/ /dI As Ud mtha' g.yo dang brtan pa la/ /gal te rtse ba'i mtshon cha de yin na/ /khu tshur thal lcag Na ni mo yi rkyen/ /g+ha nya las nya de gal te 'di'i bya ba/ /chad pa ltung ba la sogs sbo zla dang / /khra dang ltung ba dang ni ri dgas dang / /mar khu 'khrungs pa bdud
<p>239b</p>
<p>239b.1</p>dig/ /s+t+rI s+yA t+kA tsit+m+r-i NA l+yA di bi bak+ShAnya pa tsa ye ya di/ /laM kA shehA li kATI kA rgyas grel/ /d+hA ta kI pany+dzi kAnyaT gre bo/ kI /sid+h+ra kA shA lhan gyi bye brag/ /shA ri g+kA ti k+kA pra sngon byung ba/ /tsi kolgo pi pI li kA/ / 
<p>239b.2</p>rtsi mo yin no/ /gal te ma grin pa brjod 'dod yin pa na/ /pad rtsal sogs 'ga' zhig bud med 'gyur/ /laM kA she phA li kA TI kA d+hA rgyas 'grel ta skyu ru ra dang ma ma kI/ /pany+dze kA dang laM ka aT kI/ /dka' 'grel/ /si d+h+ra'i shing dang smra byed bye'u dang / /skyigs bu sbrang rtsi 'bar ba srog ma dang / ulka 'bar ba'am skar mda' 'am sgron me ta la/ 
<p>239b.3</p>tin+du kI chung ngu / ka Ni kA b+haM sman ging / /gi su rud+gA sU khab/ /tsi mA tra ya:/ pi ts+tshA bi sman gyi bye brag/ /tin+dU kA ki N+ya kA sh+tsU r+n+nasA NI dru sman dar sman ta/ sA tiHkan+thAta thA\u0f85 sa n+dI nA b+hI rA sa b+hA pi tsa/ /lcags kyi sil khrol/ dz+hal+la rI tsa r+b+bA rdza rba kha gcig pa rI pA ho rA dus sbyor phyed laT+bA tsa si ng+h+ma lA/ /lA k+Sh+ya li k+ShA tsa
<p>239b.4</p>tin+ngu ka'i shing zham mo bcom chos legs/ /phra ma dang ni ma dang lo ma dang / /sman gyi bye brag mjug sgro/ 'bras bu rgol ba phub dang ni/ /phye ma dang ni sha na'i gos/ /shin tu dga' dang bem dug dang / /de bzhin stan lte rgyal po'i 'khor/ /'khar ba ri mo du sbyor dang / /dus sbyor dang / /nya rul tshos dang sro ma'i
<p>239b.5</p>gaM/ /lag rgya chu hub gcig Du ShA gr-i d+ha shI ca ma sIm sI/ /puMste sa b+he dA nu tsa rAHsa paR+YA yAHsu rA su rAD+ha/ /sAr+g+ga yA gA dri me g+hA b+ng+hi dru kA lA pi sha rA ra yaH/ /ka ra gaN+Da Sh+Thau do rdan+ta kan+Tha ke sha na kha stanAH/ /ah+nA hAn+tAH 
<p>239b.6</p>khrus/ /chang snod snag tsha gr-i d+ha sI/ /skyes bu nyid la lha dang lha min rnams/ /rnam grangs bcas rnams khyad par bcas pa rnams/ /mtho ris mchod sbyin ra dang srin dang mtsho/ /shid dus ral gri mdal dang dgra bo rnams/ /lag pa 'gram ba mchu dpung pa so/ /mgrin bskra dang sen mi ma nu ma rnam/ /ah+nA a+ta'i 
<p>240a</p>
<p>240a.1</p>k+Sh+we seng ge sgra/ Da b+he dA ra trAn+taHprA ga saM khyakAH/ /shrI pi Sh+DAd+yA sh+tsani r+YA sA u a zer/ san+nan+tA\u0f85 bA d+hi tAH/ grom ka se ru dza tu pastU dngos po hi twA ru ru bi rA ma kAH/ kaSha Na b+ha ma ro pA n+tA ya ng+ya/ 
<p>240a.2</p>@#/ /mthang can dug bye brag /rA tra mtha' can sngon du grangs med rnams/ /dpal snod la sogs thang chu'i rigs rnams dang / /as dang an mtha' 'gog byed med pa rnams/ /ka se ru dang dza tu bstu rnams/ /ma gtogs tu dang ru yis rdzogs pa rnams/ /ka Sha Na b+ha mar mtha' nye ba/ /'di rnams/ /ka Sha Na b+ha mar mtha' nye nga / /'di rnams
<p>240a.3</p>dan+tA a mI a tha/ /pa tha na ya saT pAn+tA go tA khyu sh+tsa ra NA hwa yAH/ /nA m+n+ya kar+t+ta ri b+hA be+e tsa g+hanyadza pra nang+Na g+hA thu tsa/ /l+yuHkar+t+ta rI ma ni dz+b+ha pe ko g+hoHkiHprA di to\u0f85n+ya taH/ dwen+d+we nya shwa ba Da bA ba
<p>240a.4</p>gal te a ta mtha' yin de nas/ pa Tha na ya saT mtha' nye rnams/ /rigs su grags rnams spyod pas bod pa rnams/ /ming la byed pa min dang dngos po la'ang / /g+ha nya a tsa a pa nang Na dang g+ha a thu tsa/ /dngos por i ma ni tsa ka byed por l+yuH/ /pra sogs las dang gzhan las g+hu las/ zlas dbyer a shwa pa Da bA yin
<p>240a.5</p>shwa ba Da bA na sa mA hr-i te/ /kAn+taHsUr+Yen+du par+YA ya pUrbo\u0f85yaHpUrba ko \u0f85pi tsa/ /baT zas/ kash+tsA nu bA kash+tsa ral+la la ba'am ri dgas/ kash+tsa 'gro ba'i gnas/ ku Tung+ga kaH/ /pu kho 'dong / n+yUM khaHldog/ sa kha sbyor rkyen/ mung+gaHsh+tsa bi mi ngan/ sbyang po/ Ta paT+Ta d+ha TAHkha TaH/ dum bu/ dge ba ring po ras sogs/ koT+TA ra g+haT+Ta zo chun/ haT+TA sh+tsa tshong 'dus/ piN+Di rdog po/ 
<p>240a.6</p>cing / /kun sdud min na a shwa ba Da ba'o/ /nyi ma zla ba'i rnam grangs sngon ma can/ /ka mtha' a yang sngon ma can yang ngo / mi thung rjes brjod la ba dang / /tsa Ta gdang a nu bA ka dang / /khyim dang mda' ltod rig byed dang / /thum po sdug can dar sra rtsa/ /rdzong dang khron pa snyan ngag mkhan/ /changs pa rigs
<p>240b</p>
<p>240b.1</p>phon pa/ goN+DA pi lto ba/ tsiN+Da bta/ btags pa/ /ga DuHka raN+Do la gu Do dong ba/ ba raN+Da sh+tsa bcings pa ki No g+hu NaH/ /dr-i pags pa ti sI man+ta ha ri to ro man+tha ng+gI tha bung+bu dAH/ sman bye brag/ kA sa mardo\u0f85rda ni kun+daHme tog/ phe nastU pau sa zan/ pU ba kau /A ta paHk+Sha tri ye nA b+hiHka Na ya k+Shu ra ke da raH/ /pU ra khu
<p>240b.2</p>dan mngal stag sba/ /za ma tog dang dbyug pa dang / /lo ma bsdams pa shing srin bu/ /chu rkyal skra mtshams ljang gu dang / /skyugs ltar sgregs pa chu bur dang / /'khri shing 'gro slong bzod dang ni/ /sbu ba mchod rten gting tshig dang / /nyi 'od rgyal rigs lte ba dang / /mda' dang spu gri gse ba dang / /chu 'phel
<p>240b.3</p>ra pra tsu krA sh+tsa go la rdog por byas/ hing+gu la pung+ga lAH/ /betA la b+hal+la mtshon/ mal+lA sh+tsa pu ro DA sho\u0f85tha paT+Ti saH/ mtshon cha/ /kul+mA Sho ra b+ha sa sh+tsai ba sha kA zan zangs/ TA haHkhrus zangs/ pa taM gra haH/ /dwi hI nye\u0f85n+ya tsa khA ra N+ya par+N+Na shwa b+h+ra hi mo da kaM /shI toSh+Na mAM sa ru d+hi ra mu khA k+Shi nor dang dpung / dra bi NaM ba la/ /ha la he ma
<p>240b.4</p>rmig pa skyur mo dang / /byi phrug mtshal dang gang zag dang / /ro langs gyad dang sta ri dang / /mchod sbyin de nas paT+Ti sha/ /rtsa ba mo dga' ba de bzhin du/ /shing rta bshad pa so sor 'dod/ /gnyis dman la'o gzhan yang mkha'/ /dgon pa 'dab ma dong dang ni/ /kha ba chu dang grang dro dang / /sha khrag kha mig khu ba dang / /stobs dang shol dang
<p>240b.5</p>shu lwa lo ha su kha duHkha shub+hA shub+haM/ /dza la puSh+pA Ni la ba Na byany+dza nA n+ya nu le pa naM/ /ko T+yAHsha tA di saM khya\u0f85n+yA bA la k+Sha ni yu tany+tsa tata/ /d+w+yats+ka ma si sus n+nan+ta ya da nAn+ta ma kar+t+ta ri/ /trAn+taM sa lo pa d+haM shi Sh+TaM ra traM prA ka saM khyA yA \u0f85 n+wi
<p>240b.6</p>gser zangs lcags/ /bde sdug dge dang mi dge dang / /chu dang me tog rnams dang ni/ /lan tshwa rlung yab byan rjes byug pa/ /bye ba brgyal sogs pa'i grangs/ /gzhan yang 'bum dang sa ya dang / /a tsa gnyis pa as i us an mtha'/ /gang zhig byed po ming la a na'i mtha'/ /tra mtha' sa la nye sngon lhag ma dang / /thog mar grangs dang ldan
<p>241a</p>
<p>241a.1</p>taM/ /pA trA d+ya dan+tai re kA r+tho d+d+wi gu rla k+ShA nu sA ra taH/ /dwaM dwai ka twA byA yI b+hA bo pa thAHsaM khyA nya bya yat+pa raH/ /Sha Sh+Th+yA sh+tshA yA ba hu nAM tse dwi ts+tshA yaM saM ha to sa b+hA/ /shA lAr+thA pi pa rA rA dza ma nu Sh+yA r+thA da rA dza
<p>241a.2</p>@#/ /pa'i rA tra dang / /snod la sogs pa a ta mtha' rnams kyi don/ /gcig pa'i ba gnyis mtshon bya'i rjes 'brang nas/ /zlas dbye'i gcig nyid mi zad gyur pa dag /mi zad grangs las pha rol pa tha'o/ /gal te ming ni drug pa las tshA ya/ /tshogs pa dang ni 'dus pa'i bits+tsh+wa ya/ /khang don pha rol mi ma yin gyi don/ /rA dza min pa'i rgyal po las kyang
<p>241a.3</p>kA ta/ /dA shI sa b+haM nr-i pa sa b+haM rak+ShaHsa b+ha mi mA di shaH/ /u pa dz+nyo pa kra mAM tats+tsa ta dA di twa pra kA sha ne/ /ko pa dz+nyA ko pa kra mA di kan+tho shI na ra nA ma su/ /b+hA b+he na Na ke tsid+b+h+yo \u0f85 n+ye sa mU he b+hA ba karma NoH/ / 
<p>241a.4</p>ste/ /'bangs kyi mdun sa mi bdag mdun sa dang / /srung ba'i mdun sa 'di rnams phyogs tsam mo/ /nye bar shes dang nye bar bgrod pa'i mtha'/ /de ni dang por rab tu gsal ba rang / /tshangs pa shes dang tshangs pa'i go rims sogs/ /u shI na ra'i ming can la kan+tha/ /na Na ka tsi ta las gzhan dngos po dang / /tshogs pa dang ni dngos po la sa dag / 
<p>241a.5</p>a dan+ta pra t+ya yAHpuN+ya su di nA b+h+yAM twa haHpar/ /kri yA\u0f85bya yA nAM b+he da kA n+ye ka twA+e\u0f85p+Yu k+thatoT ke/ /tso tsaM pits+tshaM gr-i ta s+thU naM ti rI TaM marma yo dza ne/ /rA dza sU yaM bA dza pe yaM ga rkyang ng+ya pa tshegs bcad/ /d+ya kr-i tau ka beH/ / 
<p>241a.6</p>la/ /a ta mtha'i rkyen rnams bsod nams nyi ma bzang / dag las pha tu ni a haH'o/ /bya ba mi zad rnams kyi dbye ba rnams/ /gcig nyid kyang ngo rig bye gar gyi bye brag/ /ta la'i 'bras bu dang ni rma bya'i mdongs/ /thong la kA rATo yod pas brtag /khyim gyi ka ba thod thod la ki rI Ta yod pas brtag dang srog gi gnad/ /dpag tshad dang ni rgyal po'i sbyin dang / /bA dza mchod pa po yaM tshigs bcad rkang ldan dang / 
<p>241b</p>
<p>241b.1</p>mA Ni kya b+hA Sh+ya sin+dU ra tsI ra tsI ba ra pany+dza raM/ /lo kA ya taM ha ri tA laM bi da la s+thal thil ming bAh+la baM// //pun+na pun+sa ka yoHshe Sho \u0f85 ar+d+hA/[ \u0f85 ]r+d+wa r+ts+tsa/ r+d+hA rig bye dra grangs/ rtsa pi N+ya ka kaN+Da kAH/ /mod la du ko daN+Da ka tshong pa'i stong pa ri ka/ stad+ka sdeb sbyor ram ras ring po/ shA Ta kaHkarba To\u0f85 rdo 'jog/ rbu
<p>241b.2</p>snyan ngag mkhan byas nor bu dang ni skad/ /li khri gos dang chos gos dang ni gur/ /'jig rten rgyang pan dang ni ba bla dang / /bdug rdzas ster ma dang ni gur gum mo// //skyes bu ma ning dag la'o lhag ma yi/ /phyad mchod 'ba' cha dang ni tsher ma dang / /zas kyi bye brag rgyun chags mthun bral dang / /gos dang brgya grong de bzhin shar
<p>241b.3</p>daH/ /pa ta ko d+Yo ga tsa ra ka ta mA lA mA la na DaH/ mdze nang la'ang / /kuSh+Tha muN+Da shI d+hu bsta 'bru sogs phye mar byas/ k+Sh+we Di taM k+She ma kuT+Ti 'og gi zhal ba/ maM/ /saM ga ma sha ta mA yon tan nAr+m+ma sam+ba lA bya ya tAN+Da baM/ /ka bi yaM kar+m+ma kar+p+yA sa pA ra bA raM yu gan+d+ha raM/ / 
<p>241b.4</p>dang ni/ /ltung ba dang ni nyer sbyor sman dpyad dang / /ta mA lA dang grong mtha' ldum ra dang / /ru rta mgo bo'i chang dang bas ta dang / /seng sgra dang ni bde dang bum pa dang / /yang dag 'grogs dang brgya tshad mig nad dang / /rgyags dang mi zad pa dang gar stabs so/ /kha yi sgye dang las dang ras bal dang / /pha rol tshu rol dang ni gnya' shing
<p>241b.5</p>yU paM/ yU yaM rang zer/ pra grI ba pA tri be yU sran phye/ Shany+tsa sran sogs khu ba/ ma sa tsi k+ka sngo gro nas bye sau/ /tsik+ka sau/ /ar+d+ha r+ts+tsa rig byed grangs/ dau g+h+r-i tA dI nAM pu s+t+wA d+yaM bai di kaM d+h+ru baM/ /tan+no k+ta mi ha lo ke pi tats+tsa das+t+ya stu she Sha bta// //s+t+rI puM sa yo ra pa t+yan+ta dwi tsa tuH ShaT+pA
<p>241b.6</p>'dzin/ /mchod sdong pra grI rab mgrin ba dang lhung bzed dang / /ga'u zla ba dang ni chang gi snod/ /phyed mchod la sogs dang ni mar la sogs/ /skyes pa nyid phyir gang zhig nges par rig /de 'dir bshad pa min pa 'jig rten na/ /gal te yod na'ang lhag ma bzhin du gyis// //bud med skyes pa dag la'o bu rgyud mtha'/ /gnyis
<p>242a</p>
<p>242a.1</p>do ra gAH/ /dzA ti b+he dAHpu mA khyA sh+tsa s+t+rI yo gaiH sa ha mal+la kaH/ /mu ni rba rA Ta kaH swA tirba r+N+Na ko dzA Ta li r+m+ma nuH/ /mU ShA sr-i bya shing rta mo/ pA TI 'bras bu karkan+d+hu yaSh+TiHsA TI ka TI ku TI/ khang chung / /s+t+r+wi na puM na sa
<p>242a.2</p>@#/ /bzhi drug gi rkang ldan brang 'gro rnams/ /rigs kyi bye brag skyes par kun tu bshad/ /bud med ldan pa rnams kyis lhan cig gyad/ /thung pa lte ba dang ni sa ri dang / /kha dog can dang ral pa can dang thun/ /gser skong bya yi bye brag khrag 'dzin dang / /mchod sdong gos dang rked pa phu lu'o/ /bud med ma ning dag la'o kha
<p>242a.3</p>ka yo rba \u0fb7\u0f71 ba bkri ya yoH Sh+ya \u0f85\u0f90 tsi tsa\u0f85ts+tsa bu nya/ /au tsi t+ya mau tsi tI mai trAM bu \u0f85\u0fa4\u0fb2 \u0f71gu da hr-i taH/ /Sha Sh+th+ya n+ta prA k+pa dAHpe nAts+tshA ya sA lA su rANi shAH/ /s+yu rbA nri se naM shwa ni shaM go shA la mi ta re tsa di kra/ /A ba n+no t+ta ra
<p>242a.4</p>cig tu/ /dngos po bya ba dag laSha nya dang pu nya/ /rigs dang mi rigs dang ni byams pa dang / /mi byams bu nya dang por dper brjod pa/ /drug pa'i mtha' yi tshig rnams snga ma can/ /dmag dang grib ma ra ba chang mtshan mo/ /yang na'o dmag gi mi dang sang dgongs dang / /ba lang rab gzhan la'ang phyogs yin no/ /ab an mtha' can tshig
<p>242a.5</p>pa do dwi gush+tsA puM si na sh+tsa lu pa/ /dik+t+ri kha T+wAM tri kha T+wI tsa tri tak+Sha pi mA na sAta// //tri Shu pA trI pu Ta 'khar snod/ bA TI pe TI ku ba la dA Di mau/ /pa ra ling+ga swa pra d+hA ne dwa dwe tat+pu ru She pi ta ta/ /ar+tha n+tAHprA d+ya laM prA p+tA pan+na
<p>242a.6</p>rnams phyi ma can/ /ba gnyis pa dang skyes min na yang dbyi/ /phyogs dang khri gsum khri gsum gsum 'jog kyang // //gsum rnams snod dang phur ma dang ni khur/ /sgrom dang ut+pal dang se 'bru'o/ /pha rol rtags ni rang gtso zlas dbye dang / /de yi skyes bu yang de don gyi mtha'/ /pra sogs a laM thob dang rnyed pa dang / /snga
<p>242b</p>
<p>242b.1</p>pUrbAHpa ro pa gAH/ /tad+d+hi tAr+the dwi guHsaM khyA sarba nA ma ta dan+ta kAH/ /ba hu brI hi ra ding+nA man mun+ne yaM ta du dA hr-i taM/ /gu Na dra bya kri yA yo go pA d+hi b+hiHpa ra gA mi naH/ /kr-i taHka r+t+tar+YaM saM dz+nyA yAM kr-i t+yAHkar+t+ta ri
<p>242b.2</p>ma can dang pha rol nye bar 'gro/ /de yan don dang po gnyis pa dang grangs/ /sarba nA ma de yi mtha' can rnams/ /phyogs kyi ming min 'bru mang po nyid de/ /de yi dper brjod rnams na grang bar bya/ /yon tan rdzas dang bya ba la sbyor ba'i/ /sngon ma can rnams pha rol 'gro ba can/ /ming med byed pa po la kr-ita rnams te/ /las dang byed pa po la
<p>242b.3</p>kar+m+ma Ni/ /a nA d+yan+tAsta na rak+tAd+yar+the nA nAr+tha b+he de kAH/ /ShaT saM dz+nya kASh+Ti Shu sa mA yuSh+ma dasmat+ti nga bya yaM/ /pa raM bi ro d+he se Shan+tu dz+nye yaM shiSh+Ta pra yo ga taH/ /lid+ga saM gra ha bar+g+gaH/ /pad+ma
<p>242b.4</p>kr-id+ya rnams/ /des btsos la sogs don la aN sogs mtha'/ /sna tshogs don gyi dbye ba can rnams so/ /drug gi ming can rnams ni gsum dang mnyam/ /yuSh+mad a smad ting dang mi zad pa/ /'gal ba la ni phyi ma'o lhag ma rnams/ /mchog gi sbyor ba las ni shes par bya/ /rtags bsdus pa'i sde tshan no// //pad+ma rnams ni
<p>242b.5</p>ni bo d+ha ya t+yar+k+kaHkA byA ni ku ru te ka bi/ /tat+sau ra b+han+na b+ha swan+taHsan+ta stan+ban+ti tang+gu NA naH/ /sa mAp+ta mi da ma ma ra siM ha kr-itan+nA ma laM ng+gA nu shA sa naM// //bud+d+hA pu N+yA nu b+hA be na de ba tA nAM ma te ba tsa/ /yo yo\u0f85r+thaHsa ma b+hi prA
<p>242b.6</p>nyi mas rgyas/ /snyan ngag rnams ni mkhas ba yis/ /de yi dri bzang rlung gis 'ded/ /de bzhin mkhas pas de yon tan/ /'chi med seng+ges byas pa'i ming dang rtags rjes su bstan pa 'di rdzogs so// //sangs rgyas bsod nams mthu dag dang / /lha rnams kyis ni bsam pa yis/ /khyed kyi 'dod don gang yin
<p>243a</p>
<p>243a.1</p>taHsarbo \u0f85r+tho \u0f85d+ya sa mr-i d+h+ya tAm/ /nA nA ka bI nAM ya di nA ma ko ShAHsaM t+ye ba kA byA r+thA be daM pra ban+d+hA/ /ta thA bi sUk+te \u0f85ma ra saM ha nAm+naHka be ra tI ba pra sr-i taM ma no naH// //ye d+har+m+ma he tu pra b+ha bA he tun+te ShAn+ta thA ga to
<p>243a.2</p>@#/ /pa'i/ /don de de ring grub gyur cig /sna tshogs snyan ngag rnams kyi ming gi mdzod/ /snyan ngag don rig rnams kyis rab sbyar ba/ /de ltar 'chi med seng ges legs par bshad/ /snyan ngag pa rnams yid la dga' ba spel/ /gang rnams chos rnams rgyu las byung ba dang / /de yi rgyu dang de 'gog
<p>243a.3</p>h+ya ba data/ /te ShA ny+tsa yo ni ro d+hA e baM bA dI ma hA shra ma NaH// //paN+Di ta chen po kIr+t+ti tsan+d+ra'i zhal snga nas/ yar lung pa grags pa rgyal mtshan gyis bal yul yam bu'i grong khyer du bsgyur ba'o/ / 
<p>243a.4</p>gang yin pa/ /de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyis bka' stsal te/ /de skad gsung ba'i tshul can dge sbyong che// //shu b+haM ma stus rba dza ga tAM/ slad nas 'gos lots+tsha ba dge slong shrI d+harma pA la b+ha dra zhes bgyi bas/ /rgya dpe dang 'gyur rnying la gtugs te/ don
<p>243a.5</p>la ci nus dpyad de 'gyur bde bar bgyis pa'o/ /sna tshogs dngos po rnams kyi mngon brjod pa/ /rin chen 'byung gnas la 'gran bstan bcos 'di/ /sngon gyi paN+Di ta dang lo tsA bas/ /gangs can skad du bsgyur ba'i rjes su yang / /ma dag
<p>243a.6</p>dka' ba rnams/ /gtsug lag dbang po bgyis te ci nus bcos/ /slad nas 'jig rten mig mchog rnams kyis kyang / /'grel dang bstun nas byi dor rnam dag zhu/ /sarba mang+ga lo// // 
<p>243b</p>
<p>244a</p>
<p>244b</p>
<p>244b.1</p>@#/ /rgya gar skad du/ a ma ra ko ShaTI kA kA ma d+he nu nA ma/ bod skad du/ 'chi ba med pa'i mdzod kyi rgya cher 'grel pa 'dod 'jo'i ba mo zhes bya ba/ bcom ldan 'das gsung gi dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sa mchog chen po brnyes las 'khrungs/ /bdud rtsi rdzu 'phrul
<p>244b.2</p>yal 'dab ldan/ /thams cad mkhyen pa'i dpag bsam shing / /khyed la me tog 'bras bur shog /gang gA'i chu bo rab 'bab bzhin/ /gang gi thugs rje lam gsum gshegs/ /dpal gyi rgya mtsho bdud rtsi'i gter/ /srid pa'i zla phyed bdag phyag 'tshal/ /srid pa'i mtsho chen de
<p>244b.3</p>las sgrol byed chos kyi gru/ /snying rje'i dpag bsam ljon pa'i shing las grub gyur pa/ /rab tu dang sems dad pa'i skyo ba rab bskyod de/ /pha rol phyin nas mngon 'dod rin chen thob par shog /bung bas me tog rtsi blangs thigs pa rab bsags ltar/ /gang zhig blo gros bzang po'i btung ba
<p>244b.4</p>'jo zhing ster/ /snyan dngags mkhan dbang yid 'ong gtsug gi me tog bzhin/ /dpal ldan 'chi med gsung pa de nyid gcig pu rgyal/ /mtha' yas rgyud kyi mngon brjod chu gter rin chen gang / /snyan dngags mgrin pa'i do shal bang mdzod rnam bkod rnams/ /dpal ldan tsaN+Da go mis
<p>244b.5</p>sbyar ba'ang phul byung mod/ /des na rab tu bsgrub pa'i cho ga bdag gis brtsam/ /de nas gzhan la phan pa rjes su ston pas sdig pa rab tu zhi ba dang / /bsod nams phun sum tshogs pa bsag pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang po la mchod par brjod pa ni/ gang gi zhes pa la sogs
<p>244b.6</p>pa ste/ mkhyen pa ni yul gyi dngos po mtha' dag yongs su mkhyen pa'o/ /brtse ba ni sdug bsngal las yang dag par 'don par bzhed pa'o/ /de gnyis ni rgya mtsho dang 'dra bas rgya mtsho ste/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de'i mkhyen pa dang brtse ba ni rgya mtsho'o/ /'dir rgya mtsho'i sgras gting
<p>244b.7</p>med pa la sogs pa'i yon tan mtshungs pa nye bar 'jal ba'o/ /mkhyen pa dang brtse bas byas pa de ni gting med pa la sogs pa can zhes pa ste/ byed pa po la mang po'o zhes pa'i bsdu ba'o/ /bya ba ni ma 'ongs pa'i don can yin pa'i phyir 'dir dgos pa med do/ /mkhyen pa dang brtse ba dag ni rgya
<p>245a</p>
<p>245a.1</p>mtsho'o zhes bshad pa ni byed pa po sgrub pa ste/ de'i tshig mi mngon pa'am yang na drug pa 'brel pa'i bsdu ba'o/ /mkhyen pa dang brtse ba dag ni rgya mtsho lta bur gyur pa ste/ rgya mtsho ni gzhi yangs pa'o/ /rgya mtsho ni brtan zhing yangs pa'o zhes lha rnams la rab tu grags so/ / 
<p>245a.2</p>gting med pa ni gzhan gyis mi rtogs pa ste/ gang gi mkhyen pa dang brtse ba'i rgya mtsho'i pha rol zab mo yongs su dpyod mi nus pa'o/ /gang gi phyir bcom ldan 'das de'i mkhyen pa dang brtse ba shes bya'i dkyil 'khor mtha' dag la khyab pas/ gang yang sdug bsngal gyi rgya mtsho gting mtha' med
<p>245a.3</p>pa skyabs med pa'i 'gro ba rnams kyis mngon par khyab cing gang ba de dag gang gis mthar thug par sgrol nus pa de lta bur gyur pa gang yin pa de ni sdig med de/ 'dod chags la sogs pa'i nyes pa rnams spangs pa'o/ /yon tan ni byams pa dang bzod pa dang nye bar zhi ba la sogs pa ste/ 
<p>245a.4</p>gu Na bod pa la'o zhes pa ata mtha' can gyi byings tsur sogs kyi lhag ma yin te/ tshogs dang bcas pa yongs su ma rdzogs par br-ita byas pas so/ /bod pa dang goms pa dang bsngags pa'i don rnams la zhes pas e ra tsa'o/ /kye blo ldan khyed cag rnams kyis de bstan par bya ba nyid yin
<p>245a.5</p>no zhes rtogs par bya'o/ /khyad par du 'phags pa don dam pa grub pa'i phyir du brtse ba dang blos pha rol tu son pa tshol bar byed pa dang mchog gi snying rje la sogs pa yon tan chen po de lta bu ni gzhan la phan pa dang bde ba yang dag par sgrub pa la zad pa mi mnga' zhing bsnyel ba mi mnga' bas na
<p>245a.6</p>mi zad pa'o/ /yang na 'khor bar gnas pa nyid na yang 'di la rga shi mi mnga' bas mi zad pa'o/ /gting med pa ni rgya mtsho'i mthil la mi reg pa nyid do/ /sdig med kyi yon tan nyid rin po che'i 'byung gnas su gyur pas na mi zad pa ste yongs su gang ba nyid do/ /skye bo mtha' dag 'bras bu la
<p>245a.7</p>gzhol bar rab tu 'dzud pas na rab tu 'jug pa'i 'bras bu ston to/ /dpal dang bdud rtsi'i phyir du yang zhes pa ni/ 'tshed pa'i phyir du 'gro bar byed pa bzhin du de'i don nyid la bzhi pa'i rnam dbye'o/ /gang gi yi ge ni phan tshun sdud pa'i tshig go/ /dpal ni phun sum tshogs pa'o/ /bdud
<p>245b</p>
<p>245b.1</p>rtsi'i ched du zhes pa bcud len gyi phyir bsten pa'o/ /mkhyen pa dang brtse ba'i rgya mtsho ni srid par bde ba 'dod pa'i mkhas pa rnams kyis dpal gyi phyir te/ sde tshan gsum gyi phun sum tshogs pa'i phyir dang / thar pa 'dod pa rnams kyis bdud rtsi'i phyir te thar pa'i ched du bsten par bya ba
<p>245b.2</p>nyid do zhes pa'o/ /'dir mkhyen pa dang brtse ba'i rgya mtsho la sogs pa rnams kyis thams cad mkhyen pa sems can thams cad la rgyu med par mchog tu mnyes gshin pa'i rang bzhin can bcom ldan 'das bde bar gshegs pa de nyid nye bar mtshon par byed pas na/ /'di ni rab tu dngas
<p>245b.3</p>pa zhes bya ba'i snyan dngags kyi yon tan te/ ji skad du/ dbyangs can gyi mgul rgyan gyi snyan dngags kyi rgyan las/ gang gi don ni rab gsal ba/ /de ni rab tu dngas par brjod/ /dper na/ 'di shar gyur pas rgya grol pad+ma can rnams rgyas gyur cing / /ri dang nags tshal man+d+ra ra ba'i
<p>245b.4</p>me tog gzhon nu bzhin/ /dur ba lhan cig mi gnas rab tu bcom zhing gnyis gnyis gnyen/ /spre'u rab tu khros pas mkhur tshos 'gram pa zangs mdog bzhin/ /zhes pa 'dir mun pa bsal bas dur ba'i mya ngan bsal te/ ngur pa pho mo mtshan mo lhan cig mi gnas pa yin la/ de la
<p>245b.5</p>sogs pa bsal bas/ nyi ma'i mtshan nyid ma bshad kyang don gyis rab tu gsal bar mtshon par byed pa bzhin no/ /tshigs su bcad pa 'di bstan bcos la yang sbyar te/ 'dir snyan dngags smra ba nyid kyis dang por rig pa'i gnas mtha' dag la shes pa sbyin pa dang / de'i dpal ni phun sum
<p>245b.6</p>tshogs pa'o/ /shes pa sbyin pa nyid kyis phun sum tshogs pa'i rgyur gyur pa'i phyir rgya mtsho dang 'dra bas/ rgya mtsho ste bstan bcos so/ /'di ni rgyu'i gzugs can gyi rgyan te/ ji ltar/ zab pas rgya mtsho dang mtshungs zhes pa bzhin no/ /de'i gting med pa nyid ni ji skad bshad pa'i yon tan dang ldan
<p>245b.7</p>pas mtshungs pa med pa nyid do/ /sdug bsngal gyis gzir ba rnams la sdig pa zhes mngon par brjod de/ sdig med ni yon tan nyid dang / bde ba'i rgyur nyung ba dang gsal ba nyid la sogs pa'o/ /bsten pa ni thos pa dang bsam pa dang 'chad pa la sogs pas so/ /mi zad pa ni yang dag par
<p>246a</p>
<p>246a.1</p>rdzogs pa nyid do/ /yang na ming gi sgra thams cad kyi go rims dang / rtags gsal bar brjod pa'i go rims kyi tshad do/ /'di ltar las dang mngon par 'dod pa dag la de yang dag par rab tu sbyin pa'o/ /gang yang las dang byed pa po dag las aN dag go/ /de la 'dir
<p>246a.2</p>'dod pa na spyod pa'i thos pa'i don gyi go rims nyid rgya mtsho'i sgra ste de ni rtags zhes nges par bstan te/ ming dang rtags rjes su bstan pa'i sgra'i'o/ /dpal ni sde tshan gsum gyi phun sum tshogs pa'o/ /de yang slob dpon byA Das/ dpal dang dbyangs dang blo yi sde gsum gyi/ /phun tshogs
<p>246a.3</p>'byor pas mdzes par gyur rnams la/ /'jigs pa med pa'i yo byad gang yin pa'i/ /yon tan de yang dpal zhes rab tu bshad/ /ces gsungs so/ /yang na thams cad mkhyen pa'i gsung gi rang bzhin gyi mtshan nyid gang yin pa ni rang gi don phun sum tshogs pa yin zhing / de'i rgyu
<p>246a.4</p>can sde tshan gsum gyi rgyu ni gzhan gyi don phun sum tshogs pa ste/ de gnyis ka ni dpal lo/ /rang dang gzhan gyi don phun sum tshogs pa dang bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs la 'bad pa las thar pa thob pa ni bdud rtsi'o zhes so/ /de nas bstan bcos gang zhig bsten pas skyes bu rnams kyi
<p>246a.5</p>don sgrub par byed pa gsungs pa/ ming dang rtags rjes su bstan pa brjod par bya zhes te/ thun mong pa'i rtags 'chad par 'dod pa nyid las ma ning gi rtags nyid kyi go rims med de/ dper na/ ngag gnyis kyis tshig gcig ces pa bzhin no/ /mtho ris la sogs pa'i ming rnams la
<p>246a.6</p>'jug pa'i sgra gang zhig yin zhe na/ byom la sogs pa rnams so zhes pas ma nA'i byings las/ ma ning dang ma dbyi ba yang ngo / /yang na na mi ste sgra yang don du ma nyid kyi phyir ro/ /de bshad pa/ Na ma rab tu 'dud pa dang sgra la'o zhes so/ /'dud par byed pa mngon par brjod pa la 'di yis
<p>246a.7</p>nA ma la snga ma bzhin ma ning la sogs pa'o/ /yang na rtags gang dI pa dang a tsal sogs pa rnams kyis gsal bar byed pa'i bud med la sogs pa'i rtags gang yin pa de ni bud med dang skyes pa dang ma ning nyid do/ /de dag rjes su ston pa'i bstan bcos so/ /ming dang rtags 'di dag gis
<p>246b</p>
<p>246b.1</p>slob ma rnams la rjes su ston par byed cing bye brag tu rtogs par byed pas na brjod par bya zhes te nang gi de nyid kyis grub pa la phyi'i de nyid kyis rab tu gsal bar byed pa'o/ /yang na bsngags pa la 'byung 'gyur dang da ltar ba dang nye bar spyod pa las laTa'o/ /de bzhin du yang / 'jig rten
<p>246b.2</p>na nges par 'byung ba bzhin grub pa la mngon par 'dod pa'i ngo bo yang da ltar ba'i don bzhin nam yang na srid pa bzhin tha snyad byed do/ /dper na/ 'ga' zhig 'ga' zhig 'chad de/ bdag ni phal cher 'di'o zhes pa bzhin no/ /de nges par yod ces sems par byed pa dang / yang na
<p>246b.3</p>phal cher thob ces so sor smra'o zhes so/ /de nyid kyi phyir bsngags pa byed pa la srid pa bzhin zhes shin tu bstan pa'i tshig so sor 'chad do/ /'o na sngon gyi slob dpon rnams kyi ming dang rtags rjes su bstan pa'i phyir ci'i don du 'di rjod par byed ce na gsungs pa/ rgyud gzhan rnams las
<p>246b.4</p>bsdus byas nas/ /zhes pa ste/ 'dir rgyud gzhan dang gzhan ni skabs gsum gyi mngon brjod kyi bstan bcos ut+pa li la sogs pa dang / slob dpon byA TI dang / mchog sred dang / tsan+d+ra go mi dang / bA ma na la sogs pas bshad pa'i rtags kyi bstan bcos rnams
<p>246b.5</p>yang dag par bsdus te phung por byas nas 'dir brjod pa yin no/ /de'i phyir 'di ni yongs su rdzogs pa ste/ don gang ji snyed pa'i ming gang yin pa'i ming de thams cad rgyud gzhan rnams las yang dag par bsdus nas mngon par brjod pa'i phyir ro/ /mi zad pa dang na nya'i tshig dang
<p>246b.6</p>cung zad kyi don dang dgos pa rnams don dang bcas par rdzogs par bshad do/ /rab tu byed pas bcings na ming rnams bde blag tu rtogs par byed pas sde tshan gyis mngon par brjod pa ste/ mtshan nyid gsum gyi sde tshan gyis mtshon par byed do zhes pa'i don to/ /mtshungs
<p>246b.7</p>pa rnams 'dus pa'i phyir sde tshan te/ rigs dang bya ba dang yon tan dang rdzas rnams mtshungs pa'i phyir ro/ /gal te yang rgyud gzhan rnams las bsdus nas 'di brjod pa ste/ de lta na yang 'di sde tshan gyi khyad par gyis mang por 'gyur ro zhe na/ mi 'gyur te rkang pa kha skong ba la sogs
<p>247a</p>
<p>247a.1</p>pa snying po med pa'i tshig phrad rnams spangs nas slar yang rjod byed nyung shas su bsdus pa'i gzhung mdor bsdus kyis bshad do/ /khyad par du brjod pa legs bshad ma yin pa spangs pa ni legs sbyar sde rnams so/ /mdor bsdus legs sbyar sde rnams ni sde tshan gyi cha
<p>247a.2</p>shas nyid kyi phyir te mdor bsdus pa'i don bshad pa/ ut+pa li la sogs pa la mdor bsdus med pa dang / ming gi phreng ba la sogs pa rtags kyis dman pa dang / rtags kyi rab tu byed pa la sogs pa ming gis dman pa dang / 'chi ba med pa'i phreng ba la sogs pa ma rdzogs pa dang / 
<p>247a.3</p>bo sA li ta la sogs pa sde tshan gyis stong pa ste de rnams las khyad par du gyur pa'i phyir 'bras bu dang bcas pa nyid do/ /'on kyang ming rnams kyi rtags dang / brjod bya la slar yang ming de bzhin du brjod na ni gzhan rnams la yongs su rdzogs pa dgag pa'i phyir dang / de bzhin du
<p>247a.4</p>yang ming ji snyed pa'i tshig rnams dang / de snyed kyi rtags kyi tshig rnams su byas na ni gzhung mangs par thal bar 'gyur bas/ phal cher te mang por sgra rnams kyi gzugs kyi dbye ba dang / bud med kyi rkyen la A pa la sogs pa'i bya ba byas pa des bud med dang skyes pa dang ma ning du shes
<p>247a.5</p>par bya'o/ /de yang ming rnams dang ming gi khyad par rnams dang pha rol gyi ming bos pas ming thams cad pa'i sgra yang rab tu dbye ba gzhan du 'gyur ro/ /de la ming rnams kyi gzugs kyi dbye ba ni dper na/ kau mo da kI/ mo'o/ ku mud can/ rngo 'o/ /ga dA/ ba con/ khaD+go/ ral gri/ nan+da k+h+phaH dga' byed/ sa li laM/ chu/ ka ma laM/ pad ma dza laM/ chu ma ning zhes so/ / 
<p>247a.6</p>ming gi khyad par gyi 'gyur ba ni dper na/ gaN+Dau ka po lau tat+pa ra ha nu/ pha rol gyi ming bos pas ming thams cad par 'gyur ba ni dper na/ ka tuH kut+taH sne ha yA traM se bAlpA kut+ta yaHsu mAn/ 'ga' zhig lhan cig
<p>247a.7</p>spyod las te/ /'ga' zhig ces pa ni gang du gzugs kyi dbye ba med pa'o/ /'dir rtags nges par bya ba'i phyir khyad par gyi rtags bstan par bya ste/ de yang dper na/ a shwa yu ga shwi nI/ b+hA nuHkaraHbi yad+biSh+Nu pa daM/ a shwa yuka la sogs rnams la gzugs kyi dbye ba med pa'i
<p>247b</p>
<p>247b.1</p>phyir mtha'i rtags kyis nges par bya'o/ /gzugs kyi dbye ba nges par byed pa'i rtags a shwa nI dang ka ra dang / biSh+Nu pad rnams dang lhan cig spyod pa'i rtags de rnams ni nges par bya ba'o/ /de'i khyad par sgrub pa las zhes pa pho mo ma ning de'i khyad par las nye bar blangs pas 'ga' zhig pho mo ma ning du shes par bya
<p>247b.2</p>ba ste/ 'ga' zhig ces pa ni gang du gzugs kyi dbye ba med pa 'am/ lhan cig spyod pas rtags nges par byed pa'i mtshan ma med pa'am/ lhan cig spyod pa'i rtags kyi dmigs bsal mngon par 'dod pa du ma can nyid kyi rtags su 'dod de dper na/ bal+la ri r+m+many+dza riH ste yo s+t+ri yaH su ma na
<p>247b.3</p>saH puSh+paM kha niH mo dang 'byung khungs yin no/ /bi Tang+kaM skyes pa dang ma ning zhes so/ /'o na gzugs kyi dbye bas rtags nges pa'i mngon par 'dod pa 'di zlas dbye'i cha shas rnams la med de/ de lta na kun sdud pa'i zlas dbye la gzugs kyi dbye bas rtags de'i sgrub pa gang gis
<p>247b.4</p>gsal bar byed ce na/ kun sdud pa la ma ning ngo zhes ma ning du sgrub pas so /cig shos dang / cig shos sbyor ba'i zlas dbye la yang gzugs kyi dbye bas rtags gsal bar byed pa gang yin na/ de'i sgrub pa yang de nyid do/ /rta dang rgod ma dag go zhes rtags gzhan gyi dmigs
<p>247b.5</p>bsal can skyes par bsgrubs te/ cig shos dang / cig shos sbyor ba'i zlas dbye ba'i rtags gzhan nyid kyis shes par byed pas so/ /de'i phyir tshig snga ma rnams dang 'di ni rtags tha dad par yang 'gyur la/ rtags tha dad pa rnams kyang bsdus par 'gyur ro/ /gcig gi
<p>247b.6</p>lhag ma la yang nges par zhugs pa'i tshig rnams la rtags nges par byed pa med do/ /de yang rtags tha dad pa rnams su 'gyur te/ dper na/ lha mo dang lha ni lha dag go/ /bya gag mo dang bya gag ni bya gag dag go/ /ba lang mo dang ba lang ni ba lang dag go zhes pa 'di rnams dang / 
<p>247b.7</p>snam bu dkar po dang / ras dkar po dag ni gos dkar po ste de la 'di dkar po nyid dang yang na 'di rnams dkar po zhes 'chad do/ /dbye ba bshad pa'i ched du zhes pa la gang phan tshun tha dad pa'i rtags rnams dang zlas dbye dang gcig gi lhag ma dag ste ming dang rtags kyi dbye ba de rnams
<p>248a</p>
<p>248a.1</p>bshad pa'i phyir/ zlas dbye byas min gcig lhag min te/ rtags dang ming rnams tha dad nyid du ma byas so zhes dgongs pa'o/ /dper na/ gre ha dang ge ha dag khyim mo/ /dza na dang dza na ma dag skye ba la'o/ /mi bden pa dang mi rtag pa gnyis ka mi bden pa'o/ / 
<p>248a.2</p>dzI mU ta sprin dang ri bo dag la'o/ /zhes pa lta bu ste/ mtha'i de nyid kyis byed pa zhes so/ /yang na nges par bsams pa'i mngon par 'dod pa grub pa bsngags par gyur pa la nye bar spyod pa las k+ta'o/ /'o na rtags tha dad pa rnams kyang zlas dbye dang gcig gi lhag mar byas pa dper na/ / 
<p>248a.3</p>rig 'dzin chu skyes gnod sbyin dang / /srin po dri za mi 'am ci/ /zhes dang / shwa shu dang shwa shru ra ni shwa shru ra dag go zhes pa lta bu'o zhe na/ ma bshad pa'i zhes bya ba gsungs te/ rab tu grags pa las gzhan pa'i dbye ba bshad pa ma bstan cing zlas dbye dang gcig gi lhag mar yang
<p>248a.4</p>ma byas so/ /bshad pa rnams kyang rang bzhin gyi go rims las gzhan pa ma bshad do/ /de ltar sbyar ba nyid rtags kyi khyad par dang bral ba'i phyir gcig gi lhag ma yongs su spang ba 'di ni pa Ni ni la sogs par so sor blta bar bya ste/ de rnams su bud med dang skyes pa dang
<p>248a.5</p>ma ning la sogs pa'i gcig gi lhag ma'i mtshan nyid rab tu gsal ba'i phyir ro/ /slob dpon tsan+d+ra go mis gcig gi lhag ma min pa'i sgra'i nus pa bstan pa shes par byed pa ni/ gang gi phyir sgra'i nus pa gcig kyang don du ma brjod pa'i sgrar 'gyur te dper na/ ro da sI'i sgras
<p>248a.6</p>nam mkha' dang sa dag brjod pa bzhin no/ /des na ci'i phyir rtags tha dad pa rnams 'dres par byed/ ji ltar rin chen mdzod la sogs pa bzhin bud med kyi skabs dang skyes pa'i skabs kyi ming rnams ci rigs par rnam par dbye nas so/ /de ltar khyad par sgrub pa dang
<p>248a.7</p>gzugs kyis dbye ba la sogs pa byas na gzhung mangs par 'gyur bas brjod pa'i khur lci ba yongs su bor nas bshad do zhes pa la/ rim pa ma gtogs 'dres pa min/ /zhes gsungs te/ rim pa ni rjes su rim pa'i rab tu rim pa ste go rims dang gnas skabs zhes pa'i
<p>248b</p>
<p>248b.1</p>don to/ /de ma gtogs 'dir 'dres pa ste yang dag par bsres pa'i ngo bor byas pa med de rim pa dang 'gal ba slar yang byas pa lta bu ni med do zhes dgongs pa'o/ /'dir ni mtho ris dang nam mkha' dang phyogs dang dus la sogs pa ji lta ba'i go rims kyi de dang 'brel pa'i lha la sogs
<p>248b.2</p>pa'i don rnams rang rang gi 'brel pa dang bcas pa rnams ji ltar gtso bo'i rang bzhin gyis brjod bya'i don rtogs pa'i phyir te/ de la gang gi rnam grangs rnams dang 'brel pa rnams dang ming rnams de'i brjod bya'i gnas skabs gang dang gang la brten pa de dang de'i go rims rnams bstan pas/ gcig
<p>248b.3</p>dang gnyis dang mang po'i tshig rnams bde blag tu rtogs te rang bzhin ji lta ba bzhin rtogs par 'gyur bas de lta bu'i rim pa'i dbang du byas so/ /de yang mtho ris la sogs pa'i rnam grangs nges par yod pa'i yang ngo'i sgra la sogs pa dang / seng ge dang 'phrog byed la sogs pa'i skabs su dpal
<p>248b.4</p>mo dang gau ri la sogs pa brjod pa ni/ rim pa dang mi 'gal ba'i rtags 'dres pa ste/ rim pa ma gtogs 'dir 'dres pa ma byas zhes ji skad bshad pa bzhin no/ /rnam grangs so so ni bud med kyi skabs la sogs pa'i rim pas ji ltar srid pa bzhin mngon par brjod do/ /'dir rtags gang
<p>248b.5</p>yin pa'i rtags kyi gnas skabs dang 'brel pa de nyid ni tshogs su bklags pa bzhin mtho bar brjod de/ de ltar thams cad du ji ltar srid pa bzhin rtogs par bya'o/ /yang rin chen mdzod du/ swar+g+ga mtho ris dang / mkha' gsum tri de ba dang / gzhi gsum tri piSh+Ta ya rnams ni ma ning ngo zhes pa la sogs pa ci zhe na/ tri piSh+Da ya dang
<p>248b.6</p>swarga dang tri di ba rnams ma ning nyid do/ /lha'i gnas zhes pa la sogs pa ni 'chi ba med pa'i gnas so/ /skyes pa'i skabs la sogs pa rim pa so sor shes pa yang mang po 'dres par blta bar bya'o/ /de ltar rtags 'dres par gyur pa rnams ni rim pa las ring du
<p>248b.7</p>gyur pa'o/ /des na mtho ris dang nam mkha' dang phyogs dang dus la sogs pa'i rim pas rnam grangs so so yang ste/ bud med kyi rab tu byed pa la sogs pa'i rim pas mngon par brjod do/ /rin chen mdzod la sogs pa bzhin skabs so sor rnam grangs brjod pa ni snying po med cing bshad
<p>249a</p>
<p>249a.1</p>pa mangs pa'i rgyur 'gyur bas ci zhig bya zhes pa'o/ /khyad par sgrub pa yang gzhung zor yang ba'i ched du yongs su bshad pa ni/ rtags gsum zhes pa la sogs pa ste/ gsum rnams dang rtags rnams ni rtags gsum can zhes kun sdud pa ste rtags gsum
<p>249a.2</p>mo/ /de'i yul la gsum rnams la zhes pa'i tshig rig par bya'o/ /dper na ta TaM triShu zhes bya ste/ ta TaM ni 'gram la/ tr-iShu ni gsum mo/ /de la gnyis la ni 'khrig ces pa pho mo dag gi tshig ste/ dper na/ a sha ni r+d+wa yoHzhes pa lta bu ste/ a sha niHzhes pa gnam lcags
<p>249a.3</p>dang / dwa yoHzhes pa gnyis so/ /gal te yang gnyis dang gsum gyi sgra dag grangs kyi spyi brjod pa de lta na yang 'dir ji skad bshad pa'i grangs kyi khyad par nyid la 'jug go/ /gnyis kyis dman pa'i sra sa be/ sbrang rtsi can thams cad gnyis su med ces pa la sogs par yang thun mong
<p>249a.4</p>du bltas shing / rjes su dpag pa las 'khrig pa rtogs par byed do/ /mgrin pa nas ma brjod kyang grangs kyi khyad par la gnam lcags gnyis shes pa la sogs pa'i grangs kyi khyad par nyid gnyis kyi sgrar blta'o zhes pa 'dir yang de dang 'dra ba rjes su dpag par bya'o/ /ar+d+ha
<p>249a.5</p>rA tra dang ni shi thi dag gnyis dag go zhes pa la sogs pa ni grangs kyi khyad par thos par byed pa nyid yod do zhes pa ha cang thal ba med do/ /rtags bkag pa ni rtags kyi khyad par gang yin pa ste/ de ni ming gi lhag ma'i don dang lhag ma'i rtags yongs su shes par bya'o/ /lhag
<p>249a.6</p>ma bkag pa'i rtags kyi don mngon par brjod pas na lhag ma'i don te/ dper na/ dwi po\u0f85s+t+ri yaM/ 'dir mo bkag pas pho dang ma ning du shes par bya zhing de bzhin du pho'i rtags la sogs pa bkag pa las yang ngo / 'dir yang rtags gcig 'gog pa'i zol gyis rtags gnyis sgrub pa ni gzhung zor yang ba'i ched do/ /da ni gzhung nyung dus rtogs pa'i phyir bshad pa/ tu mtha' dang / a tha dang po sngon cha
<p>249a.7</p>min/ zhes pa ste/ /dwe paHni gling ste 'di mo yin zhes pa a s+t+ri yaM'o/ /tu mtha' can dang / a tha dang po can ni ming dang / rtags la sogs pa'i tshig snga ma dang lhan cig 'brel yang sngon ma'i
<p>249b</p>
<p>249b.1</p>cha ma yin pa'o/ /de la ming gi tshig ni dper na/ sha b+hA karnyi d+hu tish+tsa bi ra ba sh+ya yastu nI hA ra/ pra le yaM ma hi kA tsA tha hi mA nI hi ma yaM ha ti/ 'dir sh+tsa bi yan chod ni mdzes pa'i rnam grangs so/ /a ba sh+ya yastu zhes pa'i tu'i mtha' mar bcad nas kha ba'i rnam grangs te ma hI kA tsa/ 
<p>249b.2</p>don gzhan phyi ma cig ston pa'o zhes so/ /yan chod do/ /a tha don gzhin ston pas hi mA nI hi ma saM ha tiHzhes pa ni kha ba'i phung po'o/ /rtags la sogs pa'i 'di rnams snga 'gyur la sdang rgya dpe la med/ tshig ni dper na/ an+tar+d+hA bya ba d+hA suM si twan+tad+hiH b+hAr+ya dzA yA tha suM b+hun+ni dA rA/ zhes pa lta bu'o/ /bu
<p>249b.3</p>mo dang bran bza' dag ces pa 'dir tu'i sgra ni dbyug pa dang 'khur ba'i rigs pas bya ba'i tshig 'dren te/ de dang 'brel ba'i ming gi tshig nyid kyang 'dren par byed do/ /de bzhin du g+ha sro di nA ha dI ba ru t+pA be+e di ba sa bA sa ra dag go zhes pa 'dir rtags kyi tshig 'dren par byed do/ /don gyi tshig
<p>249b.4</p>kyang dper na/ shA se twa bi Shang+gaHkoShA ta kya tha kaT+ma laHzhes pa lta bu'o/ /a tha'i sgra ni de ma thag pa'i don te rang gi rnam grangs kyi mtshan nyid kyi phyir a tha'i sgra dang po can yang snga ma'i cha ma yin no/ /a nu kro sho s+ya N+wA ha saH po tA bA na ma tho dz+ha ShaH puM s+ye bAn+d+hu pra hI khron pa nas 'byung
<p>249b.5</p>ba ni skyes bu'o zhes pa 'dir tu'i sgra 'byung ba skyes bu la 'jug pa mi 'gog go/ /gzhan la ltos pa ni snga mar 'gyur ro/ /de la rtags gzhan yang zhes pa de so sor sbyor ba'i phyir rtags snga ma nyid kyang rnam par shes par byed do/ /de la gzugs kyi dbye ba 'byung ba ni mi 'jug ces pa dgag pa'i
<p>249b.6</p>cho ga'i nges pa'i don no/ /de 'byung ba nyid snga ma'i cha ma yin pa ni khron pa'i chu la zhes pa lta bu khron pa skyes bu'i rtags su byas pa na 'di dang lhan cig 'brel ba'i skyes bu ma yin pa rnams kyang 'dis nges pa ni 'bras bu'o/ /ri bo'i khams ni ldong ros sogs/ /btsag can dang ni khyad par
