<p>306a.5</p>'tshed byed do/ /de nas brgyad ni so ma rA dza'i ming ngo / /de nas kr-iSh+Na la sogs pa ko la'i mthar thug pa pi pi li'i ming ste/ bai de hI lus 'phags spyod dang / mA ga d+hI/ yul dbus spyod ces so/ /u Sha NA/ drod skyed do/ /de nas ba shi ra'i bar ni/ ka ri pi pi li ste/ glang po'i pi pi li'i ming ngo / / 
<p>306a.6</p>ba shir ni shing a pA mArga dang / rgya mtsho'i lan tshwa la yang ngo / /pa lang+ga la sogs pa tshigs bcad ni shing ba lang dmigs pa'i ming ngo / /de nas bi shwa la sogs pa brgyad ni bong nga'i ming ngo / /de nas sha ta mU lI la sogs pa bcu ni/ rtsa ba brgya pa'i ming ngo / /de nas pI ta dru la sogs pa bdun
<p>306a.7</p>ni skyer pa'i ming ste/ pI ta dru ni/ shing ser dang / ha ri dra ba/ khu ba ser po la sogs pa'o/ /de nas ba tsa la sogs pa lnga ni/ shu thag gi ming ste/ ba tsa shu thag dang / agra gan+d+ha/ dri'i rtse mo dang / ShaD+g+ran+tha/ mdud pa drug pa dang / go lo mI/ sa'i spu dang / sha ta parba kA/ tshigs brgya pa
<p>306b</p>
<p>306b.1</p>ste/ rtsa ba'i dbye bas dkar po dang dmar po rnam pa gnyis so/ /sman pa'i ma la sogs pa brgyad ni/ ba sha kar grags pa'i ming ste/ bai d+yA mA tr-i/ sman pa'i ma'o/ /ba sa ka/ gnas byed do/ /sid+hA s+ya sing gdong can te 'di'i me tog seng ge'i kha 'dra bas so/ /ba dzi dan+ta ka/ rta so can
<p>306b.2</p>te/ 'di'i me tog rta'i so ltar rtsub pas so/ /de nas bzhi ni a pa rA dzi ta'i ming ste/ gi ri kar+Na/ ri yi r+Na ba'o/ /biSh+Nu krAn+ta/ khyab 'jug gnon pa'o/ /a pa rA dzi ta/ gzhan gyis mi thub pa'o/ /bur shing dri ldan la sogs pa bzhi ni ko yi la kha zhes grags pa'i ming ste/ ik+Shu gan+d+ha/ 
<p>306b.3</p>bur shing dri ldan no/ /ko ki lAk+Sha/ khu byug mig ste/ ko ki la khu byug dang ak+Sha mig go/ /de ni ko yi la khar grags pa'o/ /shA le ya nas/ mi s+t+re pa'i bar ni ma d+hu ri kA ste/ mngar ldan gyi ming ngo / /sI kuN+Da la sogs pa drug ni/ sadz+dzi zhes grags pa'i ming ngo / /bal+le la sogs
<p>306b.4</p>pa drug ni/ bi Dang+ka'i ming ste/ bi DaM ga/ bshang ba'i lus so/ /a mo g+ha/ don yod de 'bras bu dang bcas pa'o/ /kr-i mi g+h+na srin bu 'joms so/ /bA la la sogs pa gnyis ni/ ba Di yA la zhes grags pa'i ming ngo / /tshigs su bcad pa phyed kyis rgun 'brum gyi ming ste/ 
<p>306b.5</p>bod na byi dang gar grags pa/ mr-id+d+hI kA/ rgun 'brum mo/ /gostAnI/ ba'i nu ma'o/ /drak+ShA/ rgun 'brum mo/ /ma d+hur sa/ ro mngar ro/ /ma d+hu ka la sogs pa bzhi ni shing mngar gyi ming ste/ ma d+hU ka/ mngar ldan no/ /ma d+hu yaSh+Di shing mngar ro/ /lAng+ga li la sogs pa bzhi ni/ kAny+tsa ka'i ming
<p>306b.6</p>ste/ shA ra dI/ ston gyi me tog ces pa sngar 'dab ma bdun pa las bshad do/ /khar la sogs pa lnga ni rma bya'i gtsug phud kyi ming ste/ bod bu'o/ /go pI la sogs pa lnga ni sngo bsangs can gyi ming ste/ sh+yA ma la ni sngo bsangs can no/ /kha cig nA ga dzi hwa/ klu'i lce zhes rjod par byed do/ / 
<p>306b.7</p>yo ga la sogs pa bzhi ni rdzu 'phrul can zhes bya ba'i sman gyi ming ngo / /ka da lI dang ram+b+ha la sogs pa drug ni chu shing gi ming ngo / /de nas mud+ga pa r+Ni la sogs pa gsum ni/ sran ma'i lo ma can zhes pa'i shing gi ming ngo / /brta kI la sogs pa lnga ni bA ling+ga Na'i shing gi ming ngo / /nA ku li
<p>307a</p>
<p>307a.1</p>la sogs pa'i tshigs su bcad pa sman shing gi ming ste/ tshong pa la sogs pa rnams kyis rA sna sman zhes btags pa'o/ /bi dA ri gan+d+ha/ rnam 'joms dri zhes bya ba nas/ brtan par gnas kyi bar ni/ sA la par+Ni/ sA la'i 'dab ma'i ming ngo / /kar+pa sI la
<p>307a.2</p>sogs pa'i rkang pa gnyis ni/ ras bal shing gi ming ngo / /de nas tam+bu la sogs pa gsum ni lo ma'i 'khri shing gi ming ste/ tAm+bu la bal+lI/ lo ma'i 'khri shing dang / tAm+bu li/ go la can ni so rtsi can dang / nA ga bal+lI/ klu'i 'khri shing ste klu'i 'jig rten gyi 'khri shing yin pas so/ 
<p>307a.3</p>dwi dza la sogs pa drug ni dri'i rdzas re Nu ka zhes tshong pa la sogs pa rnams la grags la 'bras bu na le sham gyi dbyibs lta bu yod pa'i shing gi ming ngo / /e la ba lu la sogs pa lnga ni shing e la ba lu ka zhes grags pa dri bzang ba'i shing gi ming ngo / /sa li ki la sogs pa gsum
<p>307a.4</p>ni kun+du ru zhes bya ba'i dri bzang po'i shing gi ming ngo / /bA la zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i tshigs bcad phyed ni/ dri bzang po can bA la zhes grags pa ste/ bA laM skra 'dra ba dang / hrI be ra/ ngo tsha'i lus te/ hrI ngo tsha ba dang / be ra lus so/ /brdiSh+Tha zhes pa'ang brda/ rma bya dang nags tshal
<p>307a.5</p>gnyis la 'jug pas 'dir/ nags gnas zhes bya'o/ /dI byAM ke sha/ skra bzangs so/ /am+bu nA ma/ chu ming can no/ /dus rjes 'brang zhes bya ba la sogs pa lnga ni brag ri las byung ba'i dri bzang po'i bcud dang rdzas kyi ming ste/ kA lA nu sA ri/ dus kyi rjes su 'brang ba'o/ /br-id+d+ha/ rgan
<p>307a.6</p>po'o/ /uSh+ma puSh+pa/ rdo'i me tog go/ /shI ta bsil ba'o/ /shi bA/ zhi ba'o/ /shai le ya/ zhes pa shai le dza ste brag skyes so/ /tA la par+Ni la sogs pa lnga ni mu ra zhes grags pa'i dri bzang po'i rdzas kyi ming ste/ mu ra zhes bya ba'i lha ma yin de'i ming nyid kyis na/ dai t+yA/ lha ma yin mo
<p>307a.7</p>dang / mu rA'o/ /tA la par+Ni ta la'i lo ma dang / gan+d+ha ku TI dri brtsegs ma dang / gan+d+hi nI dri ldan ma rnams so/ /ga dza b+hak+Sh+ya/ glang po'i zas te de la sogs pa brgyad ni shing shal+la kI'i ming ste/ gang las sih+la 'bab pa'o/ /de la/ su ba hA/ legs 'bab dang / su ra b+hi/ dri bzangs can
<p>307b</p>
<p>307b.1</p>dang / ra sA ro ldan nam bcud ldan dang / ma he ra Na/ cher g.yo dang / kun+du ru kI/ bcud 'bab dang / sih+la kI/ tshim byed 'dzag dang / h+la di nI tshim byed rnams te sih+la'i ming ngo / /mi 'bar la sogs pa bzhi ni d+hA ta ka'i ming ngo / /pr-i thI kA la sogs pa bzhi ni/ ka ko la'i ming ste/ pr-i thI kA/ 
<p>307b.2</p>sa can ma'o/ /tsan+d+ra bA la/ zla ba'i bye ma 'am zla ba gzhon nu'o/ /e la ka ko la'o/ /niSh+ku TiHhu la tshang mang can no/ /sUk+Sh+ma la sogs pa lnga ni sug smel gyi ming ngo / /byA d+hi la sogs pa drug ni kuT zhes grags pa'i dri bzang po'i ming ste/ kuSh+Tha ru rta'o/ /de nyid la kU Ta ra grags pa'o/ /byA d+hi
<p>307b.3</p>zhes pa nad kyi ming mngon par brjod pa'o/ /dung can la sogs pa gsum ni rtsor ku li zhes grags pa'i ming ngo / /tun+na la sogs pa drug ni/ dga' byed shing gi ming ste/ 'di 'o ma ldan zhing a shwat+tha'i rnam pa can te/ a shwat+tha dang rnam pa mtshungs/ /de ni dga' byed shing du brjod/ / 
<p>307b.4</p>ces 'byung ngo / /srin mo zhes bya ba la sogs pa drug ni tso ra'i ming can gyi dri'i rdzas kyi ming ngo / /sbrul gyi mtshon cha la sogs pa bzhi ni/ stag gi sen mo zhes bya ba'i dri'i rdzas kyi ming ngo / /shu Shi ra la sogs pa lnga ni sdong bu'i ming can gyi dri'i rdzas kyi ming ngo / /d+ha ma ni la sogs pa
<p>307b.5</p>lnga ni/ ha Ta rnam par sgeg pa'i ming can gyi dri'i rdzas so/ /shuk+ti la sogs pa lnga ni na kha'i ming ste/ shuk+ti/ nya phyis 'dra ba'o/ /shang+kha dung 'dra ba'o/ /khu ra rmig pa 'dra ba'o/ /ko la da la/ rgya shug gi 'dab ma lta bu zhes pa'i don to/ /na kha sen mo 'dra ba'o/ /ku Dan+na Ta la
<p>307b.6</p>sogs pa brgyad ni li ga dur gyi ming ste/ ku Dan+na Ta/ li ga dur te/ 'khyog cing gar byed ces bya'o/ /da sha pU raM/ gang ba bcu pa'o/ /bA ne ya nags skyes so/ /pa ri pe la ba dang / p+la ba ga ni/ rkyal byed dam rkyal 'gro'o/ /kai partI/ nya ba pa'am rkyal chen ma'o/ /gran+thi
<p>307b.7</p>par+Na la sogs pa drug ni/ gran+thi ba na'i ming ngo / /ma tu ta ces bya ba nas/ dbyar gyi rgyan zhes pa'i bar gyi tshigs bcad gcig ni/ sbr-ik+ka'i ming ngo / /dka' thub can ma la sogs pa lnga ni/ /spang spos kyi ming ste/ ta pa swInI/ dka' thub can ma dang / dza TI/ ral pa can ma dang / mAM sI
<p>308a</p>
<p>308a.1</p>sha can ma ste spang spos dang / lo ma sA/ spu can ma la sogs pa rnams so/ /twa k+pa tra la sogs pa drug ni shing tsha'i ming ngo / /twa k+pa tra/ pags pa'i 'dab ma zhes so/ /kurba shIR+Sha la sogs pa lnga ni dzI ba ka'i ming sti/ kurba shIR+Sha/ mgo bor byas pa'o/ /dzI ba ka 'tsho
<p>308a.2</p>byed do/ /kir ta ti k+ta la sogs pa gsum ni tsir yi te zhes grags pa ste/ mon yul la sogs par skye ba'i tik+ti'i ming ngo / /sap+ta la sogs pa bdun ni/ bdun ldan zhes bya ba'i dri'i rdzas tshong pa'i nor gyi ming ngo / /a dza mod la sogs pa ni/ ya mA ni ka'i ming ste/ rigs gnyis la ming gi rnam
<p>308a.3</p>grangs bzhi'o/ /a dza mo da ra dga' ba'o/ /rtsa ba rgyas pa la sogs pa gsum ni tshong pa rnams la puSh+ka ra mU la pad+ma'i rtsa ba zhes grags pa ste/ kASh+mi ra kha che skyes so/ /pad+ma pat+t+ra/ pad+ma'i 'dab ma'o/ /mArga la sogs pa gnyis ni b+h+r-ing+ga rA dza bung ba'i rgyal po zhes bya ba'i ming ste/ 'di yang ke
<p>308a.4</p>sha rany+dza na zhes grags pa nyid do/ /dUrba la sogs pa drug ni rtswa dUrba'i ming ste/ dUrba ni/ dUrbar grags pa'o/ /sha ta parbi kA ni/ tshigs brgya pa'o/ /sa ha sra bIr+ya ni/ nus pa stong ldan no/ /b+hArga bya ni b+h+r-i gu'i bu'am ngan spong skyes so/ /ru hA skye ldan no/ /a nan+ta/ mtha' yas rnams
<p>308a.5</p>so/ /go lam la sogs pa bzhi ni dUrba dkar po'i ming ste/ go lo mi/ glang gi spu skyes so/ /sha ta puSh+pa/ nus pa brgya pa'o/ /gaN+DA lI/ /dum bu 'dzin no/ /sha ku lA k+Sha/ bya'i mig go/ /ku ru bin+da la sogs pa gsum ni mon lug gi ming ngo / /bi sha la sogs pa'i tshigs su bcad
<p>308a.6</p>pa ni 'od ma'i ming ngo / /gran+thi la sogs pa gsum ni tshigs can gyi ming ngo / /gun+d+ra la sogs pa gsum ni smyug ma mda' rgyu'i ming ngo / /na Da la sogs pa gsum ni 'dam bu'i ming ngo / /bzhi ni rtswa ku sha'i ming ste/ ku sha ni ngan sel te/ ku ngan pa dang / sha zhi ba'am sel ba'i
<p>308a.7</p>don to/ /ku tha sa gnas dang / nga r+b+ha rten byed dang / sa bi dra dag byed do/ /ka r+t+r-i Ne rtsa chung ngu ste de la sogs pa drug ni rA ma ga pur zhes grags pa dri bzang po'i rtswa'i ming ngo / /gdugs kyi rnam pa zhes bya ba ni rtsa'i khyad par te/ de ltar yang / dri bzang tsha bzhes bya ba/ /de bzhin gdugs
<p>308b</p>
<p>308b.1</p>dang shin tu gdugs/ /gdugs kyi rnam pa zhes bya ste/ /rtsa ba 'dab ma'i dbyibs legs so/ /zhes bshad do/ /nA ri ke la dang / lAng+ga li dag rnam grangs te/ de la nA ri ke la ni mi mo rtse ba zhes bya ste/ bi ta'i shing gi ming ngo / /lAng+ga lI ni gshol ldan no/ /nags dang sman gyi sde'o// // 
<p>308b.2</p>de nas seng ge la sogs pa'i sde la/ tshigs bcad phyed kyis seng ge'i ming ste/ sing+ha seng ge ste/ hi si 'tshe ba la/ ri dgas la 'tshe bar byed do zhes pas a tsa rkyen dang / pr-i Sho da ra la sogs pas dang po dang mtha' phyin ci log tu bya'o/ /mr-i gen+d+ra/ ri dgas dbang po ste/ nags kyi
<p>308b.3</p>ri dgas rnams kyi rgyal po yin pas so/ /pany+tsA s+ya ni/ pany+tsa lnga dang / a s+ya kha'am/ gdong ste/ gdong lnga pa'am/ kha lnga pa zhes bya ste/ kha bzhin du rkang pa gnyis dang lag pa dag gis kyang lag ldan gyi bum pa 'gems par bzod pa'i phyir ro/ /har+Ya k+Sha ni ha ri 'phrog byed/ 
<p>308b.4</p>a k+Shi mig la rang gi yan lag las Sha tsa'o zhes pas Sha tsa sbyar ba ste/ des na 'phrog byed mig ces bya ste/ 'di'i mig dmar ser du yod pas so/ /ke sha rI/ ral pa can no/ /ha ri 'phrog byed ri dgas rnams kyi srog 'phrog par byed pas so/ /de nas stag la ming gsum ste/ shArdUl dang
<p>308b.5</p>dwI pa dang / byA g+h+ra rnams so/ /de la shArdU la ni stag ste/ shr-i 'tshe ba la/ U ra tsa la sogs pa'o/ /dwI pI/ stag gi dbye ba chung zhing bkra ba ste/ de'i pags pa gnyis pa de ldan pas i ni'i rkyen no/ /sbyor ba 'di ni ka ma la shI la'i yin te/ stag phran stag dang byi la sram/ /seng ge'i pags pa
<p>308b.6</p>mdun byas te/ /zhes so/ /byA g+h+ra dri snom ste stag go/ /de nas gnyis ni dred kyi ming ste/ ta rak+Shu/ dred ces bya ba khyi chen po dang tshad mnyam pa/ khyi'i dbyibs can phyugs dang mi la sogs pa la 'tshe ba byed pa'o/ /mr-i gA da na/ ri dgas za byed do/ /phag gi ming la tshigs su bcad pa
<p>308b.7</p>gcig ste/ bA ra ha/ mchog tu 'joms pas na phag go/ /sU ka ra/ gtsang byed de/ su tsa gtsang ba dang ka ra byed pa la/ pr-i Sho da ra la sogs pas tsa phyis shing / gzhan rnams la yang ngo zhes pas su yig ring por bsgyur ba'o/ /g+h+r-i Sh+Ti sgra ldan no/ /ko la po Ti/ khyim gtsang byed/ ki ri
<p>309a</p>
<p>309a.1</p>ni/ sa 'thor byed de/ kr-I rnam par g.yeng ba la/ ika mtha' nye las ki rkyen no/ /ki Di/ sa slong ste/ de bzhin du ki Ti'i khams las ki Ti'o/ /daM Sh+Ti mche ba can dang / g+ho NI sna rings so/ /sta b+d+ha ro mA spu gzings so/ /kro Da sa rlog go/ /b+hU dA sa
<p>309a.2</p>'joms so/ /ka pi nas nags gnas kyi bar gyis spre'u'i ming ngo / /ka piH spre'u 'o/ /sla baM ga dang / sla ba ga/ rgyug 'phyong ngam 'chong byed dam/ 'phar 'gro'o/ /shA kha mr-i ga/ yal ga'i ri dgas dang / ba lI mu kha/ gnyer ma'i gdong dang / mArka Ta/ nyi ma dga' dang / bA na ra
<p>309a.3</p>mi dang 'dra ste/ bA shab+da i bA r+the/ ba'i sgra ni 'dra ba'i don to zhes so/ /kI sha rlung gi bu brgyud dang / ba nau ka sa/ nags gnas rnams so/ /de nas b+hal+lu ka la sogs pa ni/ dom gyi ming ngo / /de nas g+haN+Da ka da/ khaD+ga'i nI la sogs pa gsum ni bse'i ming ngo / /tshigs bcad phyed kyis ma
<p>309a.4</p>he'i ming ste/ lu lA pa/ khyu 'dres dang / ma hi Sha sa steng nyal dang / bA ha dwi Sha/ rta'i dgra dang / kA pa ra/ ma he dang / so ri b+ha rnams so/ /tshigs su bcad pa gcig gis ce sbyang ngo / /b+hU mi mA ya/ sa la rgyu'o/ /go ma yu/ ba lang 'tshe byed do/ / 
<p>309a.5</p>mr-i ga d+hUrta/ ri dgas khram pa dang / shr-i ga la/ ma rungs pa dang / bany+dza ka/ slu byed dang / kroSh+Ti/ 'bod byed dang / phe ru dang / phe rab ngan g.yo ba 'am/ g.yo can no/ /dzam+bu ka/ ce spyang ngo / /tshigs bcad phyed kyis byi la'i ming ste/ o ru zhum bu dang / bi DA la bshang ba sped/ bshang ba
<p>309a.6</p>dug bzhin sped par byed pa'o/ /mA rdzA ra/ khrus mkhan no/ /pr-i Sha daM sha ka/ byi ba za dang / a khu b+hu ka/ byi ba'i zas can rnams so/ /ko ka la sogs pa gsum ni/ 'phar ba'i ming ste/ ko ka mtsha' 'am 'phar ba ste/ khyi dang tshad mnyam pa'i ri dgas ser skya/ go Da la
<p>309a.7</p>sogs pa'i yul du ko ba zhes bya zhing / mA la ba la sogs pa'i yul du bi ka zhes grags pa'o/ /de nas ri dgas la sogs pa'i tshigs su bcad pa phyed kyis ri dgas tsam gyi ming ngo / /e Na ni ri dgas kyi khyad par brjod pa ste de las byung bas e Ne ya'o/ /ka ta li la sogs pa
<p>309b</p>
<p>309b.1</p>drug ni ri dgas kyi khyad par rin po cher gyur pa'i pags pa 'byung bas na pags pa'i skye gnas su brjod do/ /ji ltar ri dgas kyi sgra phyugs gzhan la spyir 'jug cing ri dgas ku rang+ga la bye brag tu 'jug ste/ dper na lcags kyi sgra gser la sogs pa la spyir 'jug pa dang lcags la bye brag
<p>309b.2</p>tu 'jug pa bzhin no/ /de bzhin du pags pa'i skye gnas zhes pa yang ri dgas spyi dang bye brag la 'jug go/ /kr-iSh+Na sA ra la sogs pa nas ri bong gi mthar thug pa ni khyad par ba re re'i ming ste/ de la kr-iSh+Na sA ra ni/ ri dgas gzhung nag go/ /ru ru ni/ sgra sgrogs so/ /n+yad+ku ni/ nges mchod zhes
<p>309b.3</p>bya'o/ /sham+bA ra ni/ mchog bde zhes so/ /go ka r+Na ni/ 'di la ba lang lta bu'i rna ba yod pas ba lang rna ba ste/ gan+no zhes grags pa'o/ /pr-i Sha ta ni/ thig le khra bo can te/ rin chen mdzod las/ pr-iSha ta ri dgas khra bo zhes so/ /e Na/ tsa ru na yan/ mig mdzes te/ byin pa thung zhing
<p>309b.4</p>bong tshod chung ba'o/ /e Na ri dgas chung du'o zhes koSh+Tha'i rgya cher 'grel las so/ /r-i sh+ya ni/ kha dog sngon po rta dang mnyam pa ste/ 'di rwa gsum pa yin cing / ri hi ta zhes kyang bya'o/ /tsa ma ra ni/ g.yag ste/ ma he'i dbyibs can/ yul byang phyogs su skye ba gang gi mjug ma
<p>309b.5</p>las rnga yab 'byung ba'o/ /gan+d+ha rba/ ri dgas kyi khyad par te/ rta sre zhes par shes par bya'o/ /sha ra b+ha ni/ rkang pa brgyad pa gyen mig can/ seng ge yang 'joms pa ste/ b+ha ra ta ra rkang pa brgyad pa gyed mig can/ /sha ra b+ha ni nags na spyod/ /seng ge 'joms par yang dag 'gro/ / 
<p>309b.6</p>thub pa der ni nges par zhugs/ /zhes so/ /de'i rkang pa bzhi ni gyen du phyogs so/ /ga ba ya ni/ ba men te/ ba lang dang dbyibs 'dra ba'o/ /de nas byi ba la ming gsum ste/ an+du ru/ byi ba dang / mU She ka/ rkun po dang / a khu/ 'bigs byed rnams so/ /gi ri kA/ ri'i byi ba
<p>309b.7</p>dang / bA la mU Shi ka /byi ba gzhon nu gnyis ni byi bran gyi ming ngo / /sdom la ming bzhi ste/ lU ta sdom dang / tan+d+ra pA ya thags mkhan dang / U r+Na nA b+ha/ bal gyi lte ba can dang / mArka Ta ka sam/ spre'u mtshungs rnams so/ /de nas bya'i ming las/ phug ron la ming gsum ste/ 
<p>310a</p>
<p>310a.1</p>ka po ta dang / pA rA ba ta/ phug ron dang / ka la ra ba ca co sgrogs sam ngag snyan no/ /de nas khra la ming gsum ste/ sha shA da na/ ri bong za dang / pa r+t+ri 'dab chags khra dang / sh+ya na/ bya khra rnams so/ /'ug pa la ming gsum ste/ u lU ka /steng gi rna ba can to/ U r+d+ha
<p>310a.2</p>kar+Na la/ pr-i Sho da ra la sogs pas/ u lU kar bsgyur ba'o/ /bA ya sA ra ti/ bya rog dgra ste/ bA ya sa/ bya rog dang / a rA ti dgra'o/ /pe tsa ka 'ug pa'o/ /dur bya la ming gnyis te/ lo ha pr-iSh+Tha/ rgyab dmar dang / kang+ka'o/ /de nas tsA sha dang / ko kI di bi gnyis ni spu'i mdog baidU r+ya ltar
<p>310a.3</p>dngas shing gshog pa bkra ba'i bya/ gser gyi gtsug phud ces grags pa'i ming ngo / /de nas bya shing sta mo'i ming gnyis te/ sha ta pa tra/ 'dab ma brgya pa dang / dA rbA g+hA Ta/ shing 'joms sam shing dgra 'am shing sta mo ste/ dA ru shing dang / A g+hAT/ 'joms pa'o/ /de nas khug rta la ming
<p>310a.4</p>gsum te/ sa rang+ga khug rta dang / to ka ka/ chu nyung ste/ sto ka nyung du dang / ka chu ste/ sa yig phyis pa'o/ /tsa ta ka rnams so/ /khyim bya la ming bzhi ste/ kr-i ka bA ku dang / kuk+ka Da khyim bya ste/ ku ku zhes sgrogs pas so/ /tA mra tsU Da/ zangs kyi gtsug phud can no/ /tsa ru NA yu d+ha/ rkang
<p>310a.5</p>pa'i mtshon cha can no/ /grong gi byi'u la ming gnyis te/ tsa Da ka/ mchil pa dang / ka la bing+ka'o/ /khu byug la ming bzhi ste/ ba na pri ya/ nags na dga' dang / pa ra b+h+r-i ta/ gzhan gyis gsos zhes bya ste/ bya rog gis bzung nas gso bar byed pas so/ /ko ki la dang / si ka/ khu byug
<p>310a.6</p>go/ /bya rog gi ming la tshigs su bcad pa gcig ste/ kA zhes pa'i sgra sgrogs pas kA kwa ste bya ka la bing+ka ni rgya mtsho'i gling na gnas pa'i bya'i khyad par ro zhes slob dpon ye shes rdo rjes gsungs pa de/ skad shin tu snyan pa de'o/ rog dang / ka ra Ta/ khwa da dang / a riSh+Ta zhes pa la riSh+Ta 'chi ba'i mtshan nyid de/ 'di la med
<p>310a.7</p>pas a riSh+Ta ste/ 'chi med do/ /ba li puSh+Ta/ gtor mas gsos pa'o/ /sa kr-i t+p+ra dza/ lan cig skyes so/ /d+hA k+Sha sgra ldan no/ /at+ma g+hoSha/ sgrogs pa'i bdag nyid do/ /pa ra b+h+r-i ta/ gzhan gso zhes bya ste/ gzhan khu byug gi phru gu bzung nas gso bar byed pas so/ /ba li b+huka/ gtong ma za
<p>310b</p>
<p>310b.1</p>byed do/ /bA ya sa/ bya rog ste/ na tshod gnas zhes so/ /dro na ka la sogs pa bzhi ni/ bya rog chen po'i ming ngo / /'ol ba dang / bya rgod dang / ne tso la sogs pa ni rab tu grags pa nyid do/ /krung dang / krauny+tsa ni/ khrung khrung zhes bya ste/ kony+tsa zhes grags pa'o/ /ko ka la sogs pa bzhi ni ngur pa'i ming
<p>310b.2</p>ngo / /kAd m+pa dang / ka la haM sa ni chu skyar gyi ming ngo / /gnyis ni bya ku ra ra'i ming ste/ ut+k+ro sha/ rgyang grags thos dang / ku ra ra/ sgra sgrogs so/ /bzhi ni ngang pa sbyi'i ming ste/ haM sa/ ngang pa dang / shwe ta ga ru Da/ mkha' lding dkar po dang / tsa krAng+ga 'khor lo'i yan lag dang / man sau ka sa/ 
<p>310b.3</p>ma dros gnas rnams so/ /rA dza haM sa la la sogs pa ngang pa'i rgyal po la sogs pa'i ming ste/ ba ra Ta'i bar rkang pa so sos ming ngo / /de nas lpags byi'u'i ming la/ dza tu ka/ pha bang dang / a dzi na pa tra lpags pa'i 'dab ma'o/ /b+h+rirga rI la sogs pa bzhi ni dz+hiny+dz+hi ka zhes bya ba'i srog chags gshog
<p>310b.4</p>pa dang bcas pa/ pal cher dgon par gnas pa/ sos ka tsha ba'i dus su kha nas dz+hita ces bya ba'i sgra sgrogs pa'o/ /srin bu me khyer la/ kha d+yo ta/ mkha' snang dang / dz+yo ti skar 'od dang / ing+ga Na/ nam mkha'i 'od rnams so/ /bung ba'i ming la tshigs su bcad pa gcig ste/ ma d+hu bra ta/ sbrang rtsi'i
<p>310b.5</p>brtul zhugs dang / ma d+hu ka ra sbrang rtsi byed dang / ma d+hu li Da/ sbrang rtsi myang dang / ma d+hu pA li ta/ sbrang rtsi skyong dang / dwi re pha/ ra yig gnyis pa ste/ 'di'i ming sbrang ma la ra yig gnyis yod pas so/ /puSh+pa liDa/ me tog myang dang / d+h+r-i ng+ga/ bung ba dang / ShaT+pa da/ rkang pa drug pa dang / b+h+ra ma ra/ 'khor
<p>310b.6</p>'gro dang / a li/ sbrang bu rnams so/ /de nas rma bya'i ming la tshigs su bcad pa gcig ste/ ma yU ra/ sa 'gro dang / bar+hi Na/ mdongs can dang / bar+hi/ mdongs ldan dang / nI la kaN+Tha/ mgrin sngon dang / b+hu dzang+ga b+hu ka lag 'gro za dang / shi khA ba la/ gtsug phud can dang / shi khi/ rtse mo can dang / ke kI
<p>310b.7</p>ke ke'i sgra can dang / me g+ha nA dA nu la si/ 'brug sgra'i rjes su sgeg pa rnams so/ /rma bya'i sgra skad la ke kI zhes bya zhing / mjug ma la gnas pa mig gi dbyibs lta bu'i zla kham ni/ me tsa ka te/ mdongs zhes bya ba la/ me tsa ka nag po la yang sngar bshad do/ /de nas tshigs su bcad pa byed
<p>311a</p>
<p>311a.1</p>dang gsum gyis bya spyi'i ming la kha ga/ mkha' 'gro'o/ /bi hang+ga/ bi ha ga/ bi hang+ga ma/ bi hA ya sa/ rnams mkha' 'gro 'am/ mkha' rgyu'am mkha' spyod sogs so/ /sha kun+ti bya'o/ /pak+Shi 'dab chags so/ /sha ku ni/ sha kun+ta/ sha ku nA/ rnams kyang bya'am nus ldan no/ / 
<p>311a.2</p>dwi dza/ gnyis skyes so/ /pa tra tri/ 'dab ldan no/ /pa tri/ sgro can no/ /pa ta ga/ 'phur byed do/ /sa ta ta/ 'phur 'gro'o/ /pa tra tha ra/ 'dab ma'i shing rta'o/ /aN+Da dza/ sgong skyes so/ /na gau ka/ shing gnas te/ na ga 'gro med ces pa shing gi ming ngo / /ba dzi ki ra/ srin bu za'o/ /biHbya'o/ /bi ski ra
<p>311a.3</p>'dab chags so/ /nI Dod+g+ha ba/ tshangs skyes so/ /ga tun+man+ta/ gshog ldan no/ /p+si tan+ta/ 'phur 'dod do/ /na b+ha sang+ga ma/ mkha' la spyod do/ /de nas ha ri ta la sogs pa bya'i khyad par gyi ming ste/ tit+ti la sogs pa ni sreg pa'i ming ngo / /dzre baM dzI ba la sogs pa shang shang ste'u'i ming ste/ dzI ba ny+dzI ni 'tsho
<p>311a.4</p>ba 'tsho byed ces bya ste/ dug gis 'chi ba 'tsho bar byed pas so/ /garmud ces pa bya spu la sogs pa bya dang 'brel ba'i ming rnams so/ /sa mU ha la sogs pa tshigs su bcad pa gnyis kyis tshogs pa'i ming ste/ sa mU ha/ tshogs pa dang / ni ba ha/ 'dus pa dang / b+Yu ha/ phung po dang / san+do ha/ tshogs
<p>311a.5</p>dang / saM g+ha ta/ 'dus pa dang / si tsa ya la sogs pa bsdus pa la sogs pa rnams so/ /seng ge la sogs pa'i sde'o// //de nas mi'i sde las mi spyi'i ming la/ ma nu Sh+ya/ mi dang / ma nu Sha/ yid skyes dang / ma r+t+ya/ shes ldan dang / ma nu dzA/ ma nu'i bu dang / mA na ba/ yid ldan dang / mi dang / pu mAn+sa/ skyes pa
<p>311a.6</p>dang / pany+tsa dza na/ lnga skyes te/ sa la sogs pa'i 'byung ba lnga rnams las skyes pas so/ /pu ru Sha dang / pU ru Sha/ skyes bu'o/ /n+w-i mi rnams so/ /bud med kyi ming la/ s+t+rI bud med dang / yo Shi ta/ btsun mo dang / a ba lA/ stobs med ma dang / na rI mi mo dang / sI man+ti nI/ mtshams ldan ma dang / ba d+hu 'ching byed ma dang
<p>311a.7</p>pra tI pa da R+shi ne/ zhes pa la/ pra tI pa ni ka TAk+Sha zur mig gi don te/ zur lta ma zhes bya'o/ /bA mA/ g.yon ma dang / ba ni tA/ g.yon byed dang / ma he la/ dga' ston sa gzhi ste/ ma hA dga' ston dang / i la sa gzhi'o zhes kaspi Na mngon par 'byung ba las bshad do/ /khyad par du zhes pa ni bud
<p>311b</p>
<p>311b.1</p>med khyad par can brjod par bya ba de la/ ang+ga nA zhes pa shreSh+ThA ng+gI/ lus mchog ma zhes bya ste/ bud med kyi mtshan nyid dang ldan pa rab tu shis pa'i rkang pa dang lag pa la sogs pa'i lus 'di la yod pa ste/ lus bzang ma zhes bya'o/ /b+hI ru 'jigs can ma ste/ 'jigs pa'i rang
<p>311b.2</p>bzhin ma'o/ /kA ma ni/ 'dod ldan pa'o/ /bA ma lo tsa nA/ g.yon mig ma ste/ mig mdzes ma'o/ /pra ma dA/ rab myos ma ste/ mchog tu rgyags pa'i gzugs dang skal ba bzang po dag gis bskyed pa'i rnam 'gyur can ma'o/ /b+hA bi nI/ sgeg ldan ma ste/ b+ha ba ni sgeg pa'i spyod pa
<p>311b.3</p>yin la de dang ldan pas so/ /kAn+tA/ /lus mdzes ma'o/ /la la nA/ gzhon lus ma ste/ shin tu gzhon pa'i lus can ma'o/ /ni tam+bi nI/ smad rgyas ma'o/ /sun+da ni/ mdzes ma ste/ gzugs mdzes pa phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan pa'o/ /ra ma NI dang / rA mA/ dga' byed ma'o/ / 
<p>311b.4</p>de nas ko pA nA khro byed ma ste/ de lta bu la sogs pa bud med dang 'brel pa'i ming ji snyed pa rtogs par bya'o/ /rA dza swa lA la sogs pa brgyad ni/ rgul ldan ma ste bud med zla mtshan can ma'i ming ngo / /bud med sbrum ma la ming bzhi ste/ A pan+na sa twa/ sems can zhugs ma dang / 
<p>311b.5</p>gurbi NI lus lcim dang / an+ta rbat+t+waM/ nang ldan ma dang / gar+g+hi NI/ snying po ldan ma'o/ /bu la ming lnga ste/ At+ma dza/ bdag skyes dang / ta na ya/ lus 'phel dang / sU nU su ta/ pu tra rnams kyang bu ste de rnams so/ /pha la ming gsum ste/ tA ta/ yab bam pha 'am skyong
<p>311b.6</p>byed do/ /dza na ka skyed byed do/ /pi tra/ pha ste srung byed do/ /ma la ming bzhi ste/ dza na ya tI/ yum mam skyed byed ma dang / pra sU rab skyed ma dang / mA tA/ 'tsho ma dang / dza na nI/ skyed byed ma'o/ /sring mo la gnyis te/ b+ha gi nI/ sring mo 'am che zhe dang / swa sA sring
<p>311b.7</p>mo'o/ /tsha bo'i ming la gnyis te/ na tri dang / pau trI/ bu'i bu'o/ /nye du spyi'i ming la drug ste/ sa go tra/ rus mtshungs pa dang / bA n+ta pa/ 'brel pa dang / dz+nyA ti/ mdza' bshes dang / /ban+d+hu rtsa lag dang / swa gnyen dang / swa dza na/ rang rigs sam rang gi skye bo 'am
<p>312a</p>
<p>312a.1</p>gnyen gyi skye bo'o/ /bza' mi la ming bzhi ste/ daM pa ti/ bza' mi dang / dzaM pa ki/ khyo shug ste/ 'di dag gi dam dang / dzaM zhes pa'i skra dag ni mi zad pa'i tshig chung ma rjod par byed pa dag go/ /b+hAR+YA pa tI/ khyim thab dang / dzA yA pa tI/ bza' mi dang / byis pa'i ming
<p>312a.2</p>la rkang pa gcig te/ shi shu/ byis pa dang / shai sha raM/ bu tsha dang / ba l+yaM phru gu'o/ /dar ma'i ming la rkang ba gcig ste/ tA ru N+ya/ dar ma dang / yo ba naM/ shed ldan nam lang tsho can no/ /rgan po'i ming la rkang pa gcig ste/ s+tha bI raM/ gnas brtan dang / br-id+d+ha twaM/ rgan po dang / dzIr+Na dang
<p>312a.3</p>dza ran/ rgas pa dang [(]'khog [,]'khogs [)]pa'o/ /da sha mI/ bcu pa dang / dz+ya yA na/ ches rgan pa ste/ lo dgu bcu las gong du 'phags pa ni bcu pa'i gnas skabs dang ches rgan pa'o/ /de nas sman gyi spyi'i ming la lnga ste/ b+he Sha dza/ rtsi dang / o Sha d+ha/ sman dang / b+hai Sha dz+ya/ rtsi sman dang / a ga da/ nad
<p>312a.4</p>med dang / dzA yuH'tsho byed ces pa rnams so/ /nad tsam la ming bdun te/ rug dang / ru dza/ nad dang / u pa tA pa/ nye bar gdung bas ste/ nad kyis lus dang yid nye bar gdung bas so/ /ro ga dang / byA d+hi dang / ga da dang / A ma ya rnams kyang nad de/ na tsha dang nyams mi bde ba la sogs pa'o/ / 
<p>312a.5</p>de nas gra Na dang / a ru ni rma'i ming ngo / /sman pa'i ming la tshigs su bcad pa phyed de/ /ro ga hA ri/ nad 'joms te nad 'phrog par byed pas so/ /a gad ma kA ra/ nad sel te/ nad med par byed pas so/ /b+hi Sha ga sman pa'o/ /bai d+ya 'tsho byed de/ tshe'i rig byed rig pas so/ /tsi kit+sa ka gso
<p>312a.6</p>dpyad mkhan rnams so/ /khu ba la ming drug ste/ shu kra khu ba dang / te dzaHzla ba'am gzi brjid/ re ta sI/ thig le dang / bI dza sa bon dang / bIr+Ya/ nus pa dang / in+d+ri ya/ dbang po rnams so/ /de nas ma yu dang sit+taM ni mkhris pa'o/ /ka pha dang / sh+leSh+ma ni bad kan no/ /de nas twaka pags pa ste/ 
<p>312a.7</p>twa tsa yang dag par sgrib pa la'o zhes pas rus pa'i gzeb dang sha dang khrag sgrib par byed pas so/ /a sr-ig+ng+ha ra/ brag 'dzin pags pa'o/ /sha la ming drug ste/ pi sha taM/ cha shas kyi don gyis sha ste/ pa sha cha shas la/ k+ta rkyen no/ /ta ra saM/ bsgral bas sha ste/ tr-i sgrol bar byed pa la/ de ba pa bzhin
<p>312b</p>
<p>312b.1</p>du/ as tsa rkyen no/ /man+sa/ mchod byed do/ /mA na mchod pa la/ ha sa'i sgra bzhin du sa'i rkyen no/ /pA la la skyong byed de sha'o/ /gra bya dang / A miSha sha'o/ /tshigs bcad phyed kyis khrag gi ming ste/ ru d+hir/ khyab gnas te khrag go /a sr-ig a ti sr-i dza ti lhag par 'dor byed la pr-i Sho da ra la
<p>312b.2</p>sogs pas a sr-ig tu bsgyur ba ste/ mtshon ma btab na mi ltung la/ btab na lhag par 'dor bas so/ /lo hi ta dang rak+ta ni dmar bas khrag go /k+Sha ta dza/ rma skyes te khrag go/ /sho Ni taM/ rgyud ldan nam dmar po'o/ /snying la bzhi ste/ puk+ka snying dang / a gra mAn+sa/ sha mchog dang / 
<p>312b.3</p>hr-i da ya/ snying po dang / hrad ces pa yang snying ste/ lus kyi nang na gnas pas sha'i khyad par pad+ma'i rnam pa lta bu kha 'og tu phyogs pa ste/ de ltar yang / pad+ma'i ze'u 'bru dang 'dra ba/ /bu ga ldan pa 'og tu phyogs/ /de ni snying zhes bya ba ste/ kun gyi skye mched chen po'o/ /zhes pa pad+ma dkar
<p>312b.4</p>po'i phreng ba zhes bya ba las so/ /lus kyi rtsa la ming gsum ste/ nA Di dang / d+ha ma ni dang / shi rA rnams te/ bu ga dang ldan zhing rlung 'bab pa dang / srad bu bzhin rus pa 'ching bar byed pa dang / klo ma dang / ma sti Sh+kaM/ klad rgyas sam klad pa ste/ mgo bo las byung ba mar gyi gong du lta bu g+hi b+hi
<p>312b.5</p>zhes grags pa'o/ /nang na gnas pa'i zas las byung ba'i dri ma 'bab pa ni snabs la sogs pa rnam pa bcu gnyis te/ de ltar yang / zhag dang khu ba rkang dang khrag /rna spabs bshang gci snabs mtshan ma/ /bad kan dang ni [(]mchim [,]mchi ma [)]rdul/ /mi yi dri ma bcu gnyis so/ /zhes so/ / 
<p>312b.6</p>gsum gyis mchil ma'i ming ste/ sr-i Ni ka kha chu ngang / s+yan+di nI dang / lA lA/ mchil ma'o/ /gnyis kyis dri chu'i ming ste/ mU tra/ dri chu'am gcin dang / pra sra ba/ gci ba'am rgyun 'bab po/ /U ts+tsA ra la sogs pa bshang ba'i ming ste/ U ts+tsA ra dor bya'o/ /a bska ra/ khyab ldan
<p>312b.7</p>no/ /sham la/ 'dres ma'o/ /sha kr-ita/ 'gro byed do/ /pu ri ShaM/ bshang ba'o/ /gu tha/ phyi sa'o/ /brtsa skaM/ dri ma'o/ /biSh+ThA dang / bi Da dri chen no/ /de nas thod pa'i ming la/ ka ro Ti dang / karba Ta dang / ka pA la rnams so/ /rus pa tsam la ming gsum ste/ kI ka saM dang / ku l+yaM/ gdung ngam rus dang / as+thi/ 
<p>313a</p>
<p>313a.1</p>rus pa'o/ /ka le ba ra la sogs pa bcu gnyis ni lus spyi'i ming ngo / /de la ka le bar 'am ka re ba ra ni khog pa 'am lus so/ /gA traM gong bu'am lus dang / ba su 'dus pa dang / saM ha na naM/ tshogs pa dang / sha rI raM/ thos byed dang / bar+Sh+Ya/ gzugs po dang / bi gra ha/ rnam
<p>313a.2</p>'dzin dang / kA ya lus dang / de ha/ khyab pa dang / mA rti/ lus dang / ta nu dang / ta nU yang lus te/ snga ma ni ta nu rgyas pa la/ me ru'i sgra bzhin/ u rkyen dang / phyi ma ni/ tsa mi ta ni ba d+hi rnams las u'o zhes pas u rkyen du byas pa'o/ /rkang pa la ming bzhi ste/ pA da/ pa da/ 'gro bar byed
<p>313a.3</p>pas rkang pa dang / tsa ra Na/ rgyu byed dang / aM g+h+ri 'gro byed de/ a hi 'gro ba la/ mang po las so zhes pas krin 'o/ /'jig rten dbang phyug gi bstod pa brgya par/ aM hri zhes ha yig gi rjes khrid yod de/ kle sha b+hu hA hi te hA hu ti bi hi ta br-i ha tro hi du Sh+ya g+ni dA hA bA hI nI stA rba hu bi hi ta hi tA pad+ma ha stAM
<p>313a.4</p>hri b+ha baH zhes 'byung ngo / /bud med kyi rtags la ming gsum ste/ u pa s+tha/ nyer gnas dang / b+ha ga cha ba'am skal ba dang / yo ni skye gnas so/ /skyes bu'i rtags la ming bzhi ste/ sha sh+ma pho rtags dang / me tra mjug do dang / ma he na chu 'dar te/ gci ba dang khu ba rnam par 'dor
<p>313a.5</p>bas so zhes so/ /she pha si/ nyal gnas te/ shing nyal ba la/ a sun rkyen dang / phuT A ga ma'o/ /gsum ni 'bras bu'i sgo nga'i ming ste/ muSh+ko nyaN+Da/ 'bras bu'i sgo nga dang / ko Sha mdzod can dang / br-i Sha Na/ spubs can no/ /lto ba la ming lnga ste/ pi tsi N+DaM/ gsus pa dang / 
<p>313a.6</p>ku k+She dku dang / dza Tha ra dang / u da ra/ lto ba dang / run+da rU Na gang ba la'o/ /ad+ha la sogs pa bzhin du dan rkyen dang / thung du la sogs pa'o/ /de nas sta na dang / ku tsa nu ma'i ming ngo / /phrag pa la ming gsum ste/ skan+d+ha phrag pa ste/ kaM ma ste kaM da d+hA ti skan+d+ha/ zhes pas/ kaM
<p>313a.7</p>mgo bo yin pa 'dzin par byed pas phrag pa ste/ pA ra ska ra la sogs pas su Ta A ga ma sbyar ba'o/ /b+hu dza shi raHdpung pa'i mgo'o/ /aM sa phrag pa'o/ /de nas lag pa'i ming la/ b+hu dza/ lag pa ste skyod par byed pas so/ /bA hu 'bar bar byed pas lag pa'o/ /pra biSh+Ta/ 'jug
<p>313b</p>
<p>313b.1</p>par byed pas lag pa'o/ /doHzhi bar byed pas lag pa ste/ dmu nye bar zhi ba la sogs rkyen no/ /pany+tsa sha kha/ yal ga lnga pa ste shing yal ga lnga pa dang 'dra bas so/ /sha ya lag pa ste nyal byed do/ /pA Ni lag pa ste tha snyad ston par byed pas so/ /de nas kur+pa ra zhes pa gru mo yin la/ 
<p>313b.2</p>de'i gong du gnas pa pra gaN+Da/ bar lhu'o/ /gru mo las 'og tu/ pra koSh+Tha lag ngar ro/ /de dang lag mgo'i bar/ ma Ni ban+d+ha/ nor bu 'ching ba zhes bya ste mkhrig ma'o/ /de nas mthe'u chung gi bar la/ ka ra b+ha zhes bya'o/ /mdzub mo'i ming la/ tardza nI/ sdigs mdzub dang / pra de shi nI/ 
<p>313b.3</p>rab tu ston byed ces bya'o/ /sor mo la/ ang+gu lI dang / ang+gu rI/ so ra mo dang / ka ra sha kha/ lag pa'i yal ga zhes bya'o/ /mthe bong la sogs la so so'i ming la/ ang+gu Sh+Tha/ mthe bong ste/ ang+ga tiSh+Tha ti/ zhes pa lus la gnas pas mthe bong ngo / /mdzub mo la pra de shi nI/ sngar bshad
<p>313b.4</p>pa ste/ 'phral gyi tha snyad rab tu ston cing go bar byed pas so/ /ma d+h+ya ma/ gung mo thams cad kyi dbus su skyes pas so/ /a nA mi kA ming med de 'di la ming med pas so/ /kan Sh+Tha/ mthe'u chung ste/ thams cad kyi tha mar gyur pas so/ /de nas sen mo'i ming la/ pu nar+b+ha ba/ slar skye ba
<p>313b.5</p>dang / ka ra du ha/ lag skyes dang / na kha dang / na kha ra/ sen mo zhes pa rnams so/ /de nas tshad kyi ming la/ mdzub mo dang bcas pa'i mthe bong brkyang ba ni/ pra de sha rab tu ston byed ces bya zhing / de bzhin du gung mo dang ldan pa'i mthe bong brkyang ba ni/ tA lA ste/ mtho gang zhes bya
<p>313b.6</p>la/ ming med dang yang dag par ldan pa'i mthe bong brkyang ba ni kar+Na/ ba lang rna ba zhes bya ba dang / mthe'u chung dang ldan pa'i mthe bong brkyang ba ni/ bi sta ste zhes bya ba'i mtho'o/ /de nas mgrin pa'i ming la/ kaN+Tha mgrin pa dang / gal ske dang / gra'i ba mgrin pa dang / shi ro d+hi dang / 
<p>313b.7</p>kan+d+ka ra mgo 'dzin dang / kamU gra'i ba/ dung 'dra'i mgrin pa dang / tri re khA/ ri mo gsum pa ste/ 'di gnyis skyes bu chen po'i ming ste/ /de nas kha'i bu ga la ming bdun te/ bak+t+ra smra byed dang / a s+ya kha dang / bad na/ smra byed dang / ruN+Da dang / A na na/ kha 'am zhal dang / la pa naM/ rjod byed
<p>314a</p>
<p>314a.1</p>dang / mu kha/ sgo 'am kha rnams so/ /sna'i ming la/ g+h+rA Na snom byed dang / gan+d+ha ba ha/ dri len dang / g+ho NA/ nA sA dang / nA si ka sna 'am shangs so/ /mchu'i ming la/ oSh+Tha dang / a d+ha ra ya mchu ma mchu dang / ra da nA ts+tsha da so sgrib dang / da sha na bA sa sI/ 
<p>314a.2</p>so'i gos te de dag dang chos mtshungs pas so/ /de nas g+haN+Da dang / ka po la ni mkhur tshos so/ /de nas so'i ming la/ ra da nA ldad byed dang / da sha nA/ gcod byed dang / dan+ta snyems byed dang / ra dA so rnams so/ /de nas tA lu dang / kA ku dam rkan gyi ming ngo / /de nas lce'i ming la/ 
<p>314a.3</p>ra sa dz+nyA/ ro shes dang / ra sa nA/ ro myang dang / dzi hwa/ lce rnams so/ /dpral ba'i ming la/ la lA Ta/ dpral ba dang / a li ka rgyan gnas dang / go d+hi mig 'dzin te/ gorne tra d+hI ya ti/ zhes pa/ go mig yin te 'dzin par byed do zhes so/ /mig la ming brgyad de/ lo tsa naM/ lta byed
<p>314a.4</p>dang / na ya naM 'dren byed dang / netraM mig dang / ak+Shi NaM/ mthong byed dang / tsak+ShuHgsal byed dang / ak+ShiNI/ khyab byed dang / br-i ka dang / dr-iSh+Ti dang / snang byed dang lta byed do/ /mgo bo la ming lnga ste/ ut+ta mang+gA/ yan lag mchog dang / shi raHmgo bo dang / shIR+Sha mgo bo dang / mUr+d+ha
<p>314a.5</p>na spyi bo dang / masta ka klad pa can no/ /skra la ming drug ste/ tsi ku ru bsags nas gcod pas skra ste/ tsi sogs pa la'o/ /kur gcod pa la'o/ /de dag la pri Sho da ra la sogs pas rkyen phyis te/ tsi ku ra'o/ /kun+ta la/ 'khril ba'o/ /bA la phra bas na skra ste/ ka tsa 'ching bar byed pas skra ste/ ka tsa 'ching ba la/ atsa
<p>314a.6</p>rkyen no/ /ke sha zhes ke masta ke she te/ tiSh+Tha ti/ zhes 'byung ste/ ke zhes pas mgo bo la zhes pa dang / sha ni she te/ nyal ba'i cha shas kyi yi ge ste/ mgo bor nyal te gnas pa dang 'dra bas mgo nyal te skra'o/ /shi ro ru ha/ mgo skyes so/ /ba spu la ming gsum ste/ ta nU ru ha/ lus skyes so/ /ro ma/ ba
<p>314a.7</p>spu ste/ ru ha rab tu skye ba la/ byo ma la sogs pa rnams so zhes pas ma ning rkyen dang / mtha' dbyi ba byas pas/ ro ma zhes grub pa/ de nyid ka pi ri ga la sogs pa rnams so zhes pas la ru bsgyur bas lo ma/ spu 'am ba spu'o/ /de nas rgyan gyi ming la/ a laM kA ra/ a laM kri yA/ A b+ha ra Na/ pa riSh+kA ra
<p>314b</p>
<p>314b.1</p>b+hU ShaN/ maN+Da naM rnams rgyan spyi'i ming ngo / /mu ku Ta dang / ka ri TaM cod pan dang / tsU Da ma Ni/ gtsug gi nor bu dang / shi ro ma Ni/ spyi bo'i nor bu ste mgo rgyan gyi ming ngo / /rna rgyan gyi ming la/ kar+Ni ka ze'u 'bru can dang / tA la pat+t+ra/ ta la'i 'dab dang / kuN+Da la/ 'khyel pa can dang / kar+Na beSh+Te kaM rna
<p>314b.2</p>ba dkris pa ste de rnams so/ /de nas grai be ya ka dang / kan+Tha b+hU Sha mgrin rgyan no/ /lag gdub la/ ka Ta ka dang ba la ya'o/ /ske rags la/ me kha lA 'og pag gam ske rags rgyan can dang / ra sa nA ro ldan zhes pa gnyis so/ /rkang gdub la many+dzi ra dang / nU pu ra dang haM sa ka ngang pa can
<p>314b.3</p>zhes pa la sogs pa'o/ /de nas pags pa la sogs pa rnam pa bzhi ni gos kyi bye brag ste/ gos kyi rgyu yin pas so/ /de la twa ka pags pa ste/ shing shun dang zar ma'i ras la sogs pa'o/ /pa la 'bras bu ste/ ras bal shing gi 'bras bu las byung ba'o/ /kr-i mi srin bu ste/ da ra la sogs
<p>314b.4</p>pa srin bu'i sbubs las skyes pas so/ /ro ma spu ste ri dgas ang+ku zhes bya ba dang / lug la sogs pa'i spu las skyes pa'o/ /na ba am+bar la sogs pa ni/ gos sar zhes pa la sogs pa gos kyi khyad par ro/ /gos tsam gyi ming la brgyad de/ nak+ta ka/ gcer sgrib dang / kan+pa Ta ras
<p>314b.5</p>gos dang / bas+t+ra gos dang / Ats+tsha da naM/ /g.yogs ma'am dgab bya dang / bA sa bgo ba dang / tsem la gos dang / bA sa naM gcer skyob dang / aM shu kaM bgo rgyu'o/ /mchu dang zheng gi ming la dair+g+h+ya/ ring ba'am srid du'o/ /A yA ma dang A ro ha ring ba'o/ /pa ri NA ha dang bi shA la zhing che ba 'am
<p>314b.6</p>yangs pa'am rgya che ba'o/ /pu tse la gos bzang dang pa Ta dar gos te gnyis ni gos bzang po'i ming ngo / /ba rA shi gos kyi phung po dang s+thU la shaT gos mthug po ste gnyis ni gos brtsegs pa'am spom po'i ming ngo / /de nas ni tsol dang prats+tsha da paT smad gos sam dor ma'o/ /ral+la ka dang kam+ba la la ba'am snam
<p>314b.7</p>bu'o/ /pa ri d+hA na dang a d+ho aM aM shu ka ni/ sham thabs sam mthang gos so/ /pra bA ra dang u t+ta ra saM ga ni stod gos sam bla gos so/ /de nas bi tA naM bla re dang / ul+lor steng g.yogs dang / dU Sh+ya gur dang / bat+t+ra biShaM sbra ste/ gos kyi khyim zhes pa'o/ /de nas pra ti si ra dang dza ba ni ka'am ya ba ni kA yol ba dang / 
<p>315a</p>
<p>315a.1</p>ti raSh+ka ra b+hA mi snang byed do yol ba'i ming ngo / /de nas pa ri karma yongs bcos dang / aM ga saM ska ra lus kyi bcas legs te khrus la sogs pa spyi'i ming ngo / /de la mAR+Shi/ 'dag 'chal dang / mArdza nI khrus rtsi dang / mr-i dza dag byed do/ /ud+d+hat+ta na dang / uts+tsha da na dril phyis te/ rdzas kyis dri ma sel
<p>315a.2</p>ba'i ming ngo / /snA naM khrus so/ /A sla ba dang sla ba chur khrus byed pa'i ming ngo / /lus la byug pa'i sman dri bzang po'i ming la/ kung+ku ma gur gum dang / kash+mI ra dzan+ma kha che skyes dang / ag+ni shi kha me'i rtse mo dang / bar mchog ldan dang / bA h+TI ka me ldan dang / pI ta na/ ser po dang / sU R+ya nyi ma dang / rak+ta
<p>315a.3</p>dmar po dang / saM ko tsa kun nas 'khums dang / pi shu na phra ma can dang / de rnams gur kum gyi ming ngo / /d+hI ra brtan pa dang / la hi ta dmar po gnyis ni tsan+dan dmar po'i ming ngo / /rgya skyegs la ming drug ste/ lak+ShA rgya skyegs dang / de nyid ka pi ri ka la sogs pas bsgyur/ rak+ShA de nyid do/ /dzan+tu skye ldan dang / 
<p>315a.4</p>yA ba dang / A lak+ta rgya tshos dang / dru mA ma ya shing nad med do/ /li shi la ming gsum ste/ la bang+ga li shi dang / de ba ku su ma/ lha'i me tog dang / shrI saM dz+nya/ dpal gyi ming can no/ /de nas dzA pa ka zlos pa po dang / kA lI ya dus su phan dang / kA la nU sA ri dus rjes 'brang zhes pa rnams ni tshong pa la sogs pa
<p>315a.5</p>la kA lI ya zhes grags pa'i shing ser po'i ming ngo / /de nas a ga ru'i ming la sa mAr+tha kaM nus ldan dang / baM shi ka rgyud ldan dang / a gu ru zhes pa/ la g+hu nA ma twA gu ru zhes 'byung ste/ yang ba'i ming can nyid kyi phyir mi lci ba'o zhes bya'o/ /rA dzA r+ha rgyal po la 'os zhes bya'o/ /lo ha kr-i mi dza srin skyes dang / dzong+ga
<p>315a.6</p>kaM zhes pa dang / slob dpon byA Dis/kr-iSh+Ta dr-ik+Sha shing nag dang / nr-i pa pri ya mi bdag dga' byed ces kyang bshad do/ /a ga ru khyad par can la a ga ru nag po dang maM ga lI bkra shis can dang mal+li gan+d+hi zhes bshad do/ /de nas yak+Sha d+hU pa la sogs pa lnga ni spos dkar gyi ming ste/ yak+Sha d+hU pa mchod sbyin spos
<p>315a.7</p>dang / sardza ra sa thang chu'i spos dang / a rA la pra rtsi spos dang / sarba ra sa/ khu ba kun ldan dang / ba hu rU pa/ gzugs mang ngo / /pr-ika d+hU pa/ sbyar spos dang / kr-i tri ma d+hU pa/ bcos ma'i spos te/ a ga ru la sogs pa lhan cig skyes pa'i dri rnams dri'i bstan bcos las 'byung ba bzhin phan tshun legs par
<p>315b</p>
<p>315b.1</p>sbyar ba yan lag bcu pa lta bu'o/ /de nas tu ruSh+ka dang paN+D-ika dang / sih+la dang / yA ban zhes pa rnams sih+la'i ming ngo / /de nas shrI ba sa dpal gos te de la sogs pa lnga ni thang chu'i ming ngo / /de nas gla rtsi la ming gsum ste/ mr-i ga nA b+he ri dgas lte ba dang / mr-i gam da ri dgas chang dang / kastU ri gla rtsi'o/ / 
<p>315b.2</p>ka ko la la ming gsum ste ko la ka ma dang kak+ko la kaM dang ko sha pha la sbubs 'bras so/ /ga bur la ming lnga ste/ karbU nus pa dang ldan pas ga bur te/ kr-i pu nus pa la U ra rkyen du byas pa'o/ /g+ha na sA ra/ sprin gyi snying po'o/ /tsan+d+ra saM dz+nyA/ zla ba'i ming can te/ zla ba dang bur phan tshun ming gi
<p>315b.3</p>rnam grangs so/ /si tA b+h+ra/ 'od dkar can no/ /hi ma bA lu ka kha ba'i bye ma'o/ /de nas tshigs su bcad pa phyed kyis tsan+dan spyi'i ming ste/ gan+d+ha sA ra dri'i snying po dang / ma la ya dza/ ma la ya skyes te/ ri bo ma la ya las byung ba'o/ /b+ha dra shrI dpal bzang po/ tsan+dan tsan dan zhes grags pa ste/ 
<p>315b.4</p>tshim byed ces bya ste/ tsa di tshim pa la luT rkyen no/ /tsan dan dkar po la ming gsum ste/ tai la par+Ni ka til mar 'dab can zhes bya ba'i tsan dan ri bom la ya'i phyogs gcig nas 'byung ba'o/ /go shIR+Sha/ sa mchog gam ba lang mgo zhes bya ba ste ba lang mgo'i rnam pa can ma la ya'i phyogs su
<p>315b.5</p>skye ba'o/ /ha ri tsan+dan/ zhes pa la ha ri ni sbal pa ste/ de'i dbyibs can gyi ri bo zhig las skyes pas ha ri tsan dan zhas bya'o/ /de nas tsan dan dmar po'i ming ste/ tai la par+Ni/ til mar 'dab can no/ /pa trAng+gaM 'dab ma'i lus can te dbus dmar ba'i 'dab ma can no/ /rany+dza naM tshos byed do/ / 
<p>315b.6</p>rak+ta tsan+dan tsan dan dmar po'o/ /ku tsan+dan tsan dan ngan pa'i ming ngo / /de nas dzA ti'i ming la/ dzA ti/ sna ma'am sri shing sna ma dang / ko Sha sbubs can dang / dzA ti pha la/ spos kyi rgyal po'am lig shi wer zhes pa'o/ /yak+Sha karda ma/ mchod sbyin gyi byug pa ste/ ga pur dang gla rtsi dang a ga ru dang kak+ko la rnams sbyar ba'o/ / 
<p>315b.7</p>bkod pa'am rgyan gyis brgyan pa'i ming la/ ra tsa nA/ bkod pa dang pa ri s+yan+da/ chos rtsom pa dang / A b+ho ga dang / pa ri pUr+Na/ yongs su rdzogs pa'o/ /dI pa/ mar me dang / pra dA+e pa/ rab 'bar te sgron me'i ming ngo / /gdan la/ pI Tha dang A sa na'o/ /de nas sa murga te/ za ma tog dang / sam+bu Ta ka/ kha sbyar
<p>316a</p>
<p>316a.1</p>ram ga'u'o/ /pra sA d+ha nI/ skra shad dang / kang+ka ti kA so mangs te/ ba so la sogs pa las byas pa skra byi dor byed pa'i cha byad do/ /me long la dar+pa Na dang ma ku ra dang A daR+sha/ kun mthong zhes pa rnams so/ /de nas byany+dza naM rlung g.yab dang ta la br-it+ta kaM bsil yab ces pa ste de rnams mi'i
<p>316a.2</p>sde tshan no// //de nas bram ze la sogs pa'i sde la/ thog mar rigs tsam gyi ming la/ san+ta ti rgyud dang go tra rigs dang dza na na cho 'brang dang / ku la/ rus sam rigs dang / a b+hi dza na/ rtsa lag dang / a n+wa ya rjes skyes sam rjes 'gro dang / bi sha rigs rgyud dang / a n+wa bA ya/ rtsa khrid dang san+tA na rgyud
<p>316a.3</p>do/ /rigs de ni rnam pa bzhi ste/ bram ze dang rgyal rigs dang rje rigs dang dmangs rigs rnams so/ /bram ze la ming drug ste/ dwi dza gnyis skyes te bram ze dang bya dang so rnams la'o/ /a gra dzan+ma/ sngon skyes te rigs bzhi'i thog mar bram ze skyes zhes grag go /b+hU de ba sa'i lha'o/ /ba Da brta
<p>316a.4</p>can no/ /bi sra bram ze'o/ /prah+ma Na tshangs pa'i bu ste/ bram ze rnams tshangs pa'i kha las skyes par grag go /mkhas pa'i ming gi rnam grangs la 'dir nyi shu rtsa gsum ste/ bid bAn/ rig pa can nam rig ldan dang / bi pash+tsi ta rnam gsal dang / do Sha dz+nyA nyes pa shes dang / sad mdzes ldan nam dam pa dang
<p>316a.5</p>su d+hI blo bzang dang / ko bi da/ ci yang rig dang / bud+ha/ rtogs ldan dang / d+hI ra brten pa dang / ma nI Shidz+nya/ sems shes dang / pradz+nyA shes rab can dang / saM khyA na grangs can dang / paN+Di ta mkhas pa'am mdzangs pa dang / ka bi snyan dngags mkhan dang / d+hI mA na/ blo ldan dang / sU ri dpa' bo dang / kr-i tI go ba
<p>316a.6</p>can dang / kr-iSh+Ti mkhas pa dang / lap+d+ha bar+Na grags ldan nam grags thob dang / bi tsak+Sha Na/ rnam par dngas pa'am rnam par gsal ba dang / dU ra daR+shi ring du mthong ba dang / dIr+g+ha diR+shA ring po mthong dang / sho tri ya/ thos ldan dang / ts+tshan+da sa/ sdeb sbyor shes zhes pa rnams so/ ! / rgyal rigs kyi sde
<p>316a.7</p>las rgyal po'i ming la/ rA dza rgyal po dang / ba hu dza dpung ba skyes dang / rgyal rigs rnams tshangs pa'i dpung pa las skyes par grags pas so/ /k+Sha tri yang rma skyob ces bya ste rgyal rigs so/ /pi rA Ta/ rnam par rgyal dang / rAT gsal ba'am rgyal po'o/ /pAr+thi ba/ sa bdag dang / k+Sh+mA b+hu ka sa spyod
<p>316b</p>
<p>316b.1</p>dang / nr-i pa mi bdag dang / b+hU pa sa skyong dang / ma hI k+Shi taH/ sa gzhi skyong ba'o/ /a d+hI shwa ra/ lhag pa'i dbang phyug ste/ rgyal phran du mas btud pa'i rgyal po dang / tsakra brti/ 'khor los sgyur ba dang / sarba b+hau ma/ sa kun dbang ba rnams so/ /glang po che'i ming la dan+tI/ so ldan dang / dad+hA so can dang / ba la
<p>316b.2</p>stobs ldan dang / hasti lag ldan dang / dwi dan+tA so gnyis pa dang / a ne ka pA/ mang po 'thung dang / dwi pA gnyis 'thung dang / mA taM ga dza/ glang mo skyes rnams so/ /rta spyi'i ming la g+ha Ta ka 'dren byed dang / bA ti/ chu 'thung dang / tu ra~M` 'og tu/ nA ga /kuny+dza ra/ ga dza/ tha ra Na/ ka rI/ i b+ha/ stam+be ra ma/ sad mi ste chags can rnams so/ 
<p>316b.3</p>ga tu raM ga ma rnams myur 'gro'am mgyogs 'gro'am 'gro mgyogs zhes bya'o/ /ba dzI gshog pa can dang / bA ha bzhon pa dang / arba rta dang / gan+d+harba 'gro byed dang / a shwa dang / ha yarta dang / sain+d+ha ba/ rgya mtsho skyes te lan tshwa dang ral gri la yang ngo / /sap+ta ya bdun ldan rnams so/ /rta khyad par can
<p>316b.4</p>gyi ming la/ A dzA ne ya/ cang shes dang ku lin+ta/ kye ling / bi nI ta/ rnam dul dang / sA d+hu ma hi na/ legs 'gro dang / bA na yu dza dang / pA ra sI ka dang / kAm+bo dza bah+ni kA ya/ rnams yul de dag tu skyes pa'i ming ste/ rim pa bzhin/ bA na'i yul skyes/ par sig skyes/ 'dar byed skyes dang / me ldan skyes
<p>316b.5</p>zhes bya'o/ /phun sum tshogs pa la ming bzhi ste/ sam+pa da/ phun sum tshogs pa dang / sam+pat+ti/ 'byor ldan nam phun sum tshogs pa dang / shrI dpal lam g.yang dang / lak+Sh+mI phun sum tshogs pa'am dpal lam shis pa'o/ /slob dpon rab 'byor zla bas mdzad pa'i 'chi ba med pa'i mdzod kyi rgya
<p>316b.6</p>cher 'grel pa 'dod pa 'jo ba ji ltar rnyed pa rdzogs so// //'di ni mkhas pa rnams kyis shes par bya ba'i gnas la rig pa'i gnas lnga yod pa las/ sgra rig par gtogs pa/ gsung rab dgongs 'grel dang bcas pa dang / rig byed la sogs pa phyi nang gi gzhung lugs rab 'byams
<p>316b.7</p>las 'byung ba mkhas pa rnams la grags pa'i ming gi tha snyad rab 'byams la rmongs pa med par byed pa/ mngon brjod kyi bstan bcos 'chi ba med pa'i mdzod ces bya ba'i rgya cher 'grel pa ste/ 'di'i rtsa ba ni paN+Di ta 'chi med seng ge zhes bya bas/ sngon gyi slob dpon byA Di dang / mchog sred dang / tsan+d+ra go
<p>317a</p>
<p>317a.1</p>mi dang / bA man la sogs pa'i bstan bcos las btus te khyad par dang bcas pa phul du byung bar mdzad de/ de yang ut+pa li la sogs pa la mdor bsdus pa dang / ming gi phreng ba sogs la rtags kyis dman pa dang / rtags kyi rab tu byed pa sogs la ming gis dman pa
<p>317a.2</p>dang / 'chi med phreng ba sogs ma rdzogs pa dang / po pA li ta la sogs pa sde tshan gyis stong pas 'di yon tan thams cad kyis khyad par du 'phags pa nyid yin pas 'di nyid sngar paN+Di ta kIrti tsan+d+ra dang / yar lungs lo tsA ba grags pa rgyal mtshan gyis tshang bar bsgyur ro/ /'grel pa 'dod pa 'jo ba
<p>317a.3</p>'di ni paN+Di ta rab 'byor zla ba zhes bya bas/ tha snyad kyi gtsug lag rab 'byams las btus nas rnam par phye ba ste/ ming so so'i sgra sgrub tshul rnams ni/ gtso bor slob dpon tsan+d+ra go mi'i lugs yin te/ sngar mchod brjod du/ mtha' yas rgyud kyi mngon brjod chu gter rin chen gang / /snyan
<p>317a.4</p>dngags mgrin pa do shal bang mdzod rnams bkod rnams/ /dpal ldan tsan+d+ra go mis sbyar ba'i phul byung mod/ /des ni rab tu bsgrubs pa'i cho ga bdag gis brtsam/ /zhes 'byung ngo / /gzhan yang / tsan+d+ra pa'i 'grel pa slob dpon d+harma dA sas mdzad pa dang / de'i rgyas 'grel paN+Di ta rat+na
<p>317a.5</p>ma tis mdzad pa dang / de'i yang rgya cher 'grel pa paN+Di ta sUr+Na tsan+d+ra dzi ten+d+ra ste rgyal dbang zla ba gang bas mdzad pa stong phrag sum cu rtsa drug pa dang / des mdzad pa'i byings kyi dpung gnyen dang / 'jam dpal gyi byA ka ra Na'i 'grel pa ka ling+ga'i slob dpon rgyal po dpal gyis mdzad pa stong phrag
<p>317a.6</p>brgyad pa dang / rgyud nyung gi rnam bshad du rgas mdzad pa ste/ ka lA pa'i 'grel pa durga sid+ha dang / bram ze pA Ni'i sgra'i bstan bcos dang / slob dpon mchog sred dang / byA Di dang / ra b+ha sa dang / bA man dang / drang srong rgyas pa sogs kyis ci rigs par mdzad pa'i 'chi med phreng ba dang / rin chen
<p>317a.7</p>mdzod dang / sgeg pa gsal ba dang / skabs gsum gyi lhag ma dang / sngon byung lo rgyus kyi snyan dngags b+hA ra ta dang / sham+ba'i sngon rabs dang / rA ma ya Na dang / markaN+De ya dang / dbyangs can gyi mgul rgyan dang / sha ba ra swa mi/ ri khrod rje'am/ shi bA swa mi/ zhi ba'i rjes mdzad pa'i ka spin mngon par
<p>317b</p>
<p>317b.1</p>'byung ba rtsa 'grel dang / nag mo'i khol gyis mdzad pa'i gzhon nu 'byung ba dang / daN+Di'i tshig rgyan la sogs pa la brten nas gzhung chen po'i tshigs su bcad pa'i grangs kyis btsal na stong phrag bcur longs pa tsam mdzad pa'i phyed lhag gi rgya dpe sne'u gdong rtse'i gtsug lag khang na bzhugs
<p>317b.2</p>pa las phul du byung ba'i mkhyen rab dang thugs rje tshad ma mchis pa mnga' ba gangs ri'i khrod kyi sa skyong mtha' dag gi gtsug gi nor bu la zhabs rten gyi pad+mo'i ge sar rnam par 'god pas skabs gsum dbang po'i khengs pa 'phrog par mdzad cing / lugs gnyis kyi rig lugs dri ma med
<p>317b.3</p>pas/ stobs bcu mnga' ba'i bstan pa yid bzhin gyi nor bu dang / lhar bcas skye dgu'i phan bde dbyig 'dzin gyi gzhi la rgyas shing yun du gnas par mdzad pa'i sa thams cad kyi dbang phyug chos kyi rje chos kyi rgyal po spyan snga rin po che dpal ngag gi dbang phyug grags pa phyogs thams
<p>317b.4</p>cad las rnam par rgyal ba lha'i zhal snga nas kyis legs par bsgyur ces bka' lung dang mthun rkyen bzang po stsal ba la brten nas/ legs par sbyar ba'i skad kyi brda sprod pa'i bstan bcos chen po ka lA pa dang / tsan+d+ra pa 'grel pa dang bcas pa dag thos shing cha shas tsam khong du
<p>317b.5</p>chud la/ sngon gyi lo tsA ba chen po rnams kyis dam pa'i chos ji ltar bsgyur ba'i tshul phyogs tsam mthong ba dpal zhwa lu'i btsun pa 'gos lo tsA ba gsum pa dge slong d+harma pA la b+ha dra zhes bya bas gsung rab rin po che'i ming gi cha rnams la ma rtogs pa'i
<p>317b.6</p>'khrul pa bsal ba dang / dri ma med pa'i gtsug lag gi tshul phyogs tsam gsar du bstan pas bstan pa rin po che'i sgo thams cad nas mi nub cing 'phel ba dang bcas pa'i rten 'brel du gyur par bsams nas/ dpal sa skyong mchog gi bka' spyi bos
<p>317b.7</p>mnos te sgra'i sgrub tshul rgya chen po rnams ni sngon gyi lo tsA ba chen po rnams kyis kyang mngon pa mdzod kyi 'grel pa rgyal sras ma dang / ma hA mA ya'i bka' 'grel yon tan ldan pa la sogs pa bod rnams kyi tshul bzhin mi rtogs par dgongs nas ma bsgyur bar snang
<p>318a</p>
<p>318a.1</p>ba bzhin bzhag /ming so so nas rgya gar skad dang bod skad shan sbyar bas/ skabs don 'ga' zhig gi bshad pa go ba la shin tu phan par snang ba ni rgya dpe la med na'ang / 'dus pa'i 'grel pa don gsal du ban+d+ha ban+d+ha ni chings shig pa'o zhes sogs
<p>318a.2</p>bsgyur snang ba ltar skad gnyis ka bkod de bshad/ dbri bsnan gyi dbang gis bar skabs su mtshams sbyor ba'i tshig phrad dang rnam dbye rnams bod skad la ji ltar bde bas bla thabs su bsnan/ sgra'i sgrub tshul nyung zhing gsal ba 'ga' zhig shong ston rdo rje rgyal mtshan la sogs pas
<p>318a.3</p>brda sprod pa'i tshul bod skad du bsgyur ba dang / bshad pa'i srol btod pa la brten nas/ deng sang yang mkhas pa dag snang bas/ 'ga' zhig la phan par bsams nas bsgyur te/ mdor na sgra sbyor bam po gnyis pa las/ dam pa'i chos bsgyur ba'i lugs ni don dang
<p>318a.4</p>mi 'gal la/ bod skad la yang gar bde bar gyis shig ces gsungs pa ltar bsgyur cing legs par gtan la phab pa'o/ /de ltar gnyis med gsung ba'i gsung rab kyi/ /tshig 'bru bzang po'i tshig gi rgyan 'gyur phyir/ /tha snyad gtsug lag 'grel 'di legs bsgyur
<p>318a.5</p>las/ /thob pa'i legs spyad ston zla ltar dkar zhing / /rgyu skar lam ltar yangs pa gang thob des/ /ma lus 'gro ba'i snying gi mun bsal zhing / /rnam dpyod blo gros snang ba cher rgyas nas/ /blo bzang so so yang dag rig thob shog /ji ltar 'jig rten las dang nyon mongs
<p>318a.6</p>rgyur bcas byed rgyur ldan byung dang / /las dang nyon mongs pa dag ldog rgyu de yang 'dren pas rab tu gsungs/ /gang na skye dang rga dang rgud pa'i sdug bsngal nges par mi gnas pa/ /thar pa mchog de smra ba'i khyu mchog de yis rang gis mkhyen te gsungs/ /gtsug lag gi tshigs su bcad
<p>318a.7</p>pa'o/ /'di'i 'gyur snga phyi'i yi ge pa ni/ skad gnyis smra ba'i bshes gnyen/ mtshan gyi thog ma yi ge mchog /mtha' ni rin po che yis spras/ /a nu ba ma rat+na ste/ /dpe med rin po che yis so/ /zhes bya'o// // 
<p>318b</p>
<p>318b.1</p>@##/ /rgya gar skad du/ kA byA daR+sha/ bod skad du/ snyan ngag me long / 'phags pa 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gdong bzhi gdong gi pad tshal gyi/ /ngang pa'i bu mo thams cad dkar/ /dbyangs can ma ni kho bo yi/ /yid la ring du gnas par mdzod/ / 
<p>318b.2</p>bstan bcos snga ma rnams bsdus shing / /sbyor ba rnams kyang nyer mtshon te/ /ji ltar nus bzhin bdag gis ni/ /snyan ngag rnams kyi mtshan nyid bya/ /'di na kun du mchog rnams kyang / /mchog gi rjes su bstan pa yi/ /tshig rnams nyid kyi drin gyis ni/ /'jig rten lugs la 'jug par byed/ / 
<p>318b.3</p>gal te sgra don snang ba ni/ /'khor ba'i bar du mi gsal na/ /'jig rten gsum po mtha' dag 'di/ /smag rum mun pa nyid du 'gyur/ /sngon gyi rgyal po grags pa'i gzugs/ /ngag gi rang bzhin me long thob/ /de dag nye bar mi gnas kyang / /rang nyid nyams pa med la ltos/ /mkhas pas yang
<p>318b.4</p>dag rab sbyar ba'i/ /ngag ni ngag gi 'dod 'jor bshad/ /de nyid nyes par sbyar na slar/ /sbyor po ba lang nyid rjod byed/ /de phyir snyan ngag dag la skyon/ /chung bar gyur kyang ci zhig ltar/ /btang snyoms mi bya lus mdzes kyang / /skyon gcig gis ni skal ngan 'gyur/ /skye bo bstan bcos mi shes pas/ / 
<p>318b.5</p>yon tan skyon dag ji ltar dbye/ /gzugs kyi dbye ba dmigs pa'i skabs/ /long bdag la yod dam ci/ /de phyir mkhas pas skye dgu rnams/ /bye brag rtogs la mngon dgongs nas/ /rnam bkra lam ldan tshig rnams kyi/ /bya ba'i cho ga nges par sbyar/ /de rnams kyis ni snyan ngag gi/ /lus dang
<p>318b.6</p>rgyan yang rab tu bstan/ /lus ni re zhig 'dod pa yi/ /don gyi rnam bcad tshig gi phreng / /de yang tshigs bcad lhug pa dang / /spel ma rnam gsum nyid du gnas/ /tshigs bcad rkang bzhi de yang ni/ /pr-it+ta dzA ti zhes rnam gnyis/ /de yi spros pa mtha' dag ni/ /sdeb sbyor gzhung du nges par bstan/ / 
<p>318b.7</p>rig de snyan ngag rgya mtsho ni/ /zab mo brgal 'dod rnams kyi gru/ /grol ba dang ni rigs dang mdzod/ /'dus pa zhes bya de 'dra yi/ /tshigs bcad rgya ches rgas bcings/ /cha shas rang bzhin phyir ma brjod/ /sargas bcings pa snyan ngag che/ /de yi mtshan nyid brjod par bya/ /shis brjod phyag bya
<p>319a</p>
<p>319a.1</p>dngos po ni/ /nges par bstan pa'ang de yi sgo/ /sngon byung gtam las gyur pa'am/ /cig shos legs pa la brten pa/ /sde bzhi 'bras bu'i dbang gyur dang / /mkhas shing yid 'ong 'dren pa dang / /grong khyer rgya mtsho ri dang dus/ /nyi zla 'char ba'i bsngags pa dang / /skyed
<p>319a.2</p>tshal chu yi rol rtsed dang / /chang 'thung dga' ba'i dga' ston dang / /ma tshogs pa dang bag ma dang / /gzhon nu skye dang 'phel ba dang / /gros dang pho nya bgrod pa dang / /g.yul dang 'dren pa dar bas kyang / /brgyan par gyur cing mdor bsdus min/ /nyams dang 'gyur ba dag gis gtams/ / 
<p>319a.3</p>sarga shin tu rgya che min/ /mnyan 'os pr-it+ta legs mtshams sbyar/ /kun du sarga dag gi mtha'/ /tha dad ldan pas 'jig rten mdzes/ /snyan ngag dam pa'i rgyan ldan ni/ /bskal pa'i bar du gnas par 'gyur/ /gang zhig yan lag 'gas dman yang / /gal te sbyar rnams phun tshogs
<p>319a.4</p>kyis/ /de rig mgu bar byed pas na/ /'di ni snyan ngag skyon ma yin/ /thog mar 'dren pa yon tan gyis/ /nye bar bkod nas de yis ni/ /dgra la gnod pa byed ces pa'i/ /lam 'di rang bzhin mdzes pa yin/ /rigs dang brtson 'grus thos sogs kyis/ /dgra bo la yang bsngags byas nas/ / 
<p>319a.5</p>de las rgyal phyir 'dren pa ni/ /khyad 'phags brjod pa'ang bdag dga' skyes/ /rkang pa med pa'i tshig rgyun ni/ /lhug pa brjod pa dag dang gtam/ /zhes pa de yi rab dbye gnyis/ /de la 'dren pa nyid kyis ni/ /brjod par bya ba brjod pa lo/ /gzhan ni 'dren pa'am gzhan gyis kyang / /rang gi yon
<p>319a.6</p>tan bsgrags skyon 'dir/ /yang dag don bsngags phyir yod min/ /'on kyang nges pa ma mthong ste/ /der yang gzhan gyis brjod pa'i phyir/ /gzhan gyis brjod dam rang gis zhes/ /dbye ba'i rgyu ni ci zhig yod/ /gal te sgo dang gzhan sgo dang / /yid brten ldan nyid brjod pa ni/ /tha dad pa yi rtags yin
<p>319a.7</p>na/ /zhar gyi gtam rnams dag la yang / /'phags pa sogs bzhin sgo dang ni/ /gzhan gyi sgo dag cis mi 'jug /lam+b+ha sogs sam a shrA sa'i/ /dbye ba mthong yang de las ci/ /de phyir gtam dang brjod pa zhes/ /ming gnyis dag gis rigs gcig mtshon/ /lhag ma brjod pa'i rigs rnams
<p>319b</p>
<p>319b.1</p>kyang / /'di nyid nad du 'dus par 'gyur/ /bu mo 'phrog dang g.yul dang ni/ /bslu dang dar ba la sogs pa/ /sargas bcings pa mtshungs pa nyid/ /de dag khyad byed yon tan min/ /snyan ngag mkhan gyis bsam byas rtags/ /gzhan du yang ni skyon mi 'gyur/ /'dod don bsgrub la sgo ru ni/ / 
<p>319b.2</p>mkhas pa rnams la cis mi 'gyur/ /spel ma zlos gar la sogs te/ /de dag rnams ni gzhan na rgyas/ /lhug pa tshigs bcad rang bzhin gang / /tsam bu zhes pa mngon par brjod/ /ngag gi rang bzhin de dag kyang / /legs sbyar de bzhin rang bzhin dang / /zur chag 'dren ma zhes pa ste/ /rnam
<p>319b.3</p>pa bzhi ru mkhas pas gsungs/ /legs sbyar zhes pa lha yi ni/ /skad du drang srong chen pos gsungs/ /de skyes de mtshungs yul can zhes/ /rang bzhin rim pa du ma yod/ /yul 'khor chen po la brten skad/ /legs bshad rin can dag gi mtsho/ /se rus bcings pa rang bzhin gang / /rang bzhin
<p>319b.4</p>mchog tu gyur par rig /sau ra se na gau Da dang / /lA Di gzhan yang de 'dra'i skad/ /rang bzhin nyid ces bya ba yi/ /tha snyad rnams la nye bar 'gyur/ /ba lang rdzi la sogs pa'i tshig /snyan ngag la zur chag ces gnas/ /bstan bcos rnams la legs sbyar las/ /gzhan pa zur chag nyid du
<p>319b.5</p>brjod/ /legs sbyar sargas bcings la sogs/ /rang bzhin skan+d+ha ka sogs dang / /zur chag o sa ra sogs te/ /zlos gar la sogs 'dres pa'o/ /gtam sogs skad ni thams cad dang / /legs sbyar gyis kyang bcings pa ste/ /rmad byung don can rgya che'i gtam/ /'byung po'i skad kyi rang bzhin
<p>319b.6</p>brjod/ /sgeg dang rol dang stabs la sogs/ /lta ba'i don yin cig shos kyang / /mnyan par bya ba nyid ces pa/ /'di yang lugs gnyis dag tu brjod/ /phan tshun dbye ba phra mo can/ /tshig gi lam ni du ma yod/ /de la phai dar+b+ha dang ni/ /gau Da'i khyad par gsal bar brjod/ /sbyar ba rab dngas
<p>319b.7</p>mnyam nyid dang / /snyan dang shin tu gzhon pa dang / /don gsal ba dang rgya che dang / /brjid dang mdzes dang ting nge 'dzin/ /yon tan 'di bcu bai dar+b+ha'i/ /lam gyi srog tu bshad pa yin/ /'di dag phal cher bzlog pas ni/ /gau Da'i lam dag mtshon pa yin/ /sbyar ba srog chung yi ge mchog /lhod
<p>320a</p>
<p>320a.1</p>pa nyid kyis ma reg pa'o/ /lhod pa mA lA tI mA la/ /lo lA li ka li lA bzhin/ /gau Da pa yi rjes khrid blos/ /de 'dod mA la tI dA ma/ /laM g+hi taM b+h+ra ma raiHzhes/ /bai dar+b+ha yi sbyor lci byed/ /rab dang sa ldan pa grags don can/ /zla ba'i mtshan ma ut+pal gyi/ /'od kyis mdzes pa rgyas
<p>320a.2</p>zhes pa/ /rtogs pa'i skal bzang ldan pa'i tshig /nges tshig yod phyir gau Da pa/ /shin tu grags pa min yang 'dod/ /shin tu dkar min chu las skyes/ /de 'dras mtshan pa 'od dkar can/ /mnyam pa sbyor ba mi mnyam dral/ /de ni 'jam rtsub par ma ste/ /sbyor ba 'jam rtsub par ma yi/ /yi
<p>320a.3</p>ge bkod pa'i skye gnas can/ /khu byug ca co sgrog byed cing / /nyar ma rab 'thor dngas shing dngas/ /chu rgyun chu thigs kyis bran pa'i/ /ma la ya rlung bdag la 'ongs/ /tsan+dan gyis bsgos dri ldang zhing / /'jam pa ma la ya yi rlung / /bdag gi brtan 'gog dga' ma ni/ /mchog gi kha yi rlung dang
<p>320a.4</p>'gran/ /zhes pa mi mnyam ma brtags par/ /don dang rgyan gyi tshogs dag la/ /ltos nas shar phyogs pa dag la/ /snyan ngag lam 'di 'byung bar 'gyur/ /snyan pa nyams ldan tshig dang ni/ /dngos po la yang nyams gnas pa/ /sbrang rtsi spyod pa sbrang rtsis bzhin/ /gang gis blo ldan dga' byed
<p>320a.5</p>pa'o/ /sgra ni gang dang ci yis kyang / /gang zhig mtshungs par nyams myang ba/ /de yi gzugs sogs tshig nye ba/ /rjes su khrid bcas nyams dang ldan/ /gang tshe bram ze dga' ba yi/ /rgyal po 'di yis dpal thob 'gyur/ /de nas bzung ste chos kyi ni/ /dga' ston 'jig rten 'di ru 'byung / /zhes
<p>320a.6</p>'di gau Da pa mi 'dod/ /de dag rjes su khrid la dga'/ /phal cher rjes su khrid pas kyang / /bai dar+g+ha ni 'di nyid 'dod/ /rkang ba rnams dang tshig rnams la/ /yi ge bskor ba rjes su khrid/ /gal te snga ma'i nyams myong ni/ /'du byed rtog byed mi ring nyid/ /ston mtshan dbu rgyan zla ba ni/ /kun+da'i
<p>320a.7</p>phon por 'khrul pa la/ /mtshan ma in+d+ra nI la mtshungs/ /bung ba'i dpal ni yang dag 'dzin/ /mdzes ma mkha' la zla ba yi/ /dkyil 'khor mdzes pas bdag gi yid/ /yid srubs kyis mnan brtse med du/ /'joms par brtson pa 'di la ltos/ /zhes pa shin tu mi ring bar/ /thos pa dag ni
<p>320b</p>
<p>320b.1</p>rjes khrid 'dod/ /dga' ma bzhin gyi chu skyes dang / /mtshungs pa zla ba zhes mi 'dod/ /bdag gi lus dang khro ba phra/ /'dod pa rtsub cing mdza' bo ngan/ /khengs pa nyams shing chags pa rgyas/ /rmongs pa skyes te srog rnams song / /zhes sogs sbyor ba rtsub pa dang / /lhod pa yang ni ster bar
<p>320b.2</p>byed/ /de phyir de lta'i rjes khrid ni/ /lho phyogs pa rnams mi sbyor ro/ /skor ba kho na tshogs pa yi/ /spyod yul zung dang ldan par rig /de yang gcig tu snyan pa min/ /de phyir phyi nas bshad par bya/ /nges par rgyan rnams kun la yang / /don gyi nyams dag sbyin par byed/ /de lta na yang grong pa nyid/ / 
<p>320b.3</p>min pa'i khur 'di phal cher 'dzin/ /'dod ldan bdag la gzhon nu ma/ /khyod ni ji ltar 'dod mi byed/ /ces 'di grong pa'i don bdag nyid/ /nyams dang bral ba kho nar byed/ /g.yon mig 'dod pa gtum po 'di/ /nges par bdag la brtse ba med/ /khyod la khro med dga' zhes pa/ /grong pa'i don min ro
<p>320b.4</p>dang ldan/ /sgra la'ang grong pa nyid yod de/ /de ni legs pa'i cig shos grags/ /dga' ba'i dga' ston brjod pa la/ /ji ltar ya yig la sogs bzhin/ /tshig gi mtshams sbyor gyis zhugs dang / /slar yang dag don dag gis kyang / /nges par rtogs byed grod pa ste/ /yA b+haHba taHpri ya bzhin/ / 
<p>320b.5</p>gzhan la bsnun nas skyes bu ni/ /bir+Ya ldan pa'i bi shran+ta/ /gzhan la bsnun nas skyes bu ni/ /khu ba ldan pa rnam par ngal/ /de lta bu sogs lam dag ni/ /gnyis ka la yang bsngags ma yin/ /b+ha ga ba tI b+ha gi nI/ /zhes sogs kun du khas len nyid/ /de ltar snyan pa rnam par phye/ /shin tu
<p>320b.6</p>gzhon pa bshad par bya/ /rtsub min yi ge mang ba 'di/ /shin tu gzhon pa nyid du 'dod/ /gang phyir thams cad mnyen pa ni/ /sbyor ba lhod pa'i skyon du bshad/ /sprin gyi phreng ba ldan dus su/ /snyan par sgrogs pa'i mgrin ldan pa/ /rma bya yi ni mjug ma dag /zlum por byas nas gar byed do/ /zhes
<p>320b.7</p>pa don rgyas nyid ma yin/ /rgyan yang de 'dra yod min te/ /shin tu gzhon pa nyid kyi dpe/ /dam pa rnams kyi kha na gnas/ /gsal phyir gzhan dag phal cher ni/ /brjod par dka' ba dag kyang sbyor/ /n+yak+Sha sa rgyal rigs rnams kyi phyogs/ /skad cig gis ni nyams par byas/ /don gsal don
<p>321a</p>
<p>321a.1</p>brtag mi dgos nyid/ /'phrog byed kyis ni sa gzhi dag /rmig pas bcad pa'i klu khrag gis/ /dmar ba chu yi gter las phyung / /phag pa chen po dag gis sa/ /chu gter dmar po dag las phyung / /zhes pa 'di nyid bstan pa ni/ /brang 'gro'i khrag ni brtag
<p>321a.2</p>dgos nyid/ /lam 'di gnyis ka dag la yang / /rtogs pa'i skal bzang mi ldan zhing / /sgra dang rigs pa las 'gongs pa/ /'di 'dra phal cher bzhed ma yin/ /gang du 'ga' zhig brjod pa la/ /khyad 'phags ldan pa'i yon tan rtogs/ /de ni rgya cher brjod de des/ /snyan ngag lam
<p>321a.3</p>kun mgon dang bcas/ /slong ba rnams kyi bkren pa'i mig /lan cig khyod gdong la lhung ba/ /lha gcig gnas skabs de yis slar/ /gzhan gyi gdong la blta ma yin/ /zhes pa nyid kyi ngag 'di la/ /gtong ba khyad 'phags legs par mtshan/ /lam 'di nyid kyis gzhan dag kyang / /rigs
<p>321a.4</p>pa mtshungs pas dpag par bya/ /bsngags par 'os pa'i khyad par dang / /ldan pa rgya cher 'ga' zhig 'dod/ /rol pa'i chu skyes rtse dga'i mtsho/ /gser gyi rgyan la sogs pa bzhin/ /brjid pa tshig sdud mang po nyid/ /'di ni lhug pa dag gi gsos/ /tshigs bcad la yang shar phyogs pa/ /'di nyid
<p>321a.5</p>dpung dang gnyen du bzhed/ /de la lci dang yang ba rnams/ /mang dang nyung ba nyid spel bas/ /mtho dma' yi ni rnam pa de/ /brjod pa la sogs rnams la blta/ /nub kyi rim gor lhung ba yi/ /mtha' dag nyi 'od ma la stan can/ /mkhregs pa'i nu ma la gnas pa'i/ /gos dmar g.yo bzhin chu
<p>321a.6</p>ldan ma/ /zhes pa brjid dang ldan pa'i tshig /tshigs bcad la yang shar pa sbyor/ /gzhan dag 'khrugs min mdzes pa yi/ /tshig rnams brjid par 'dod de dper/ /chu 'dzin ngos kyi phang na chags/ /mtshams kyi nyi 'od gos dang ldan/ /chu ldan ma yis su yi yid/ /'dod pas gzir bar byed
<p>321a.7</p>mi 'gyur/ /mdzes pa 'jig rten don dag las/ /ma 'das 'gro kun la mdzes pa'o/ /de yang gtam gyi ma don brjod dang / /bsngags pa la sogs rnams la'ang sbyar/ /dka' thub phung po khyod 'dra yi/ /zhabs kyi rdul ni gtsang ma rnams/ /yang dag btab pa gang yin pa/ /de dag kho na nges par khyim/ / 
<p>321b</p>
<p>321b.1</p>skyon med lus can khyod kyi ni/ /lag pa'i 'khri shing bar dag tu/ /nu ma rab rgyas 'di dag gi /go skabs rnyed par 'gyur ma yin/ /zhes pa khyad par brjod pa yi/ /legs sbyar de dag srid pa nyid/ /'jig rten lugs kyi rjes su ni/ /'brang ba thams cad mdzes par 'gyur/ /'jig rten 'das shing
<p>321b.2</p>brjod 'dod kyis/ /don gang shin tu bkod gyur pa/ /de yis mkhas pa shin tu ni/ /tshim 'gyur cig shos ma yin dper/ /deng nas bzung ste bdag gi khyim/ /lha yi khyim bzhin bsten par 'os/ /khyod kyi zhabs rdul lhung ba yis/ /nyes pa dag ni ma lus bkrus/ /khyod kyi nu ma 'di lta bur/ /rnam par
<p>321b.3</p>rgyas par gyur pa 'di/ /nges par ma brtags byed po yi/ /nam mkha' dag ni chung ngur sprul/ /'di ni ha cang brjod pas na/ /go Da pa mul mdzes par brjod/ /'jug pa snga ma gzhan gyi ni/ /lam la snying po nyid du bshad/ /gzhan gyi chos de gzhan dag la/ /'jig rten lugs kyi rjes 'brangs nas/ /gang du
<p>321b.4</p>yang dag 'dzin byed pa/ /ting nge 'dzin du brjod de mud per/ /ku mu da ni mig 'dzums shing / /pad+ma dag kyang mig 'byed ces/ /mig gi bya ba bkod pa las/ /de yi rjod byed sgra dag thob/ /niSh+Thu ta dang ung+gIr+Na/ /skyugs sogs phal par 'jug bstan pa/ /shin tu mdzes te gzhan du ni/ /grong ba nyid kyi nus pa
<p>321b.5</p>bstan/ /pad+mas nyi zer skyugs pa rnams/ /'thungs nas rdul dmar skyugs pa yi/ /kha yi dag byed zer ma rnams/ /shin tu skyug par byed pa bzhin/ /zhes pa mdzes te mi mdzes pa/ /chung ma skyug pa byed ces pa'o/ /cig car nyid du chos du ma/ /bkod pa dag kyang 'dod de dper/ /lci ba'i mngal khur gyis
<p>321b.6</p>ngal zhing / /'khun par byed pa sprin gyi phreng / /'di dag g.yo med steng gi ni/ /phang pa dag tu yang dag nyal/ /grogs mo'i phang par nyal ba dang / /'khun dang lci ba nyid dang dal/ /zhes pa 'di ni mngal ldan ma'i/ /chos mang po rnams gzhan la bstan/ /ting 'dzin zhes bya'i yon tan gang / /'di ni snyan
<p>321b.7</p>ngag bdog kun te/ /snyan ngag mkhan po don mthun gyi/ /tshogs kyang 'di nyid rjes su 'brang / /de ltar rang bzhin brtags pa las/ /lam ni 'di gnyis rnam par phye/ /de dag dbye ba snyan ngag mkhan/ /so so la gnas brjod mi nus/ /bur shing 'o ma bur sogs kyi/ /mngar ba nyid kyis khyad par che/ /de
<p>322a</p>
<p>322a.1</p>lta mod kyi de brjod par/ /dbyangs can mas kyang nus ma yin/ /rang bzhin gyis grub spobs pa dang / /mang du thos pa dri med dang / /mngon par sbyor ba mi dman pa/ /snyan ngag phun sum tshogs pa'i rgyu/ /gal te sngon gyi bag chags yon tan gyi/ /rjes 'brel spobs pa rmad
<p>322a.2</p>byung med pa la'ang / /thos dang 'bad pa dag gis ngag bsten na/ /ci zhig ltar yang nges par rjes 'dzin byed/ /de phyir grags 'dod rnams kyis rtag tu ni/ /snyom las med par rim pas dbyangs can bsten/ /snyan ngag chung ngu la yang ngal byas mi/ /mkhas pa'i 'dun sa dag tu 'dug la dbang / /snyan ngag
<p>322a.3</p>me long las le'u ste dang po'o// //snyan ngag mdzes par byed pa yi/ /chos rnams rgyan zhes rab tu brjod/ /de ni da lta'ang rnam rtog ste/ /de dag ma lus sus 'chad nus/ /'on kyang rnam rtog sa bon ni/ /sngon gyi slob dpon rnams kyis bstan/ /de nyid rab tu legs sbyar
<p>322a.4</p>phyir/ /yongs su ngal 'di bdag gi'o/ /lam ni rnam par dbye don du/ /rgyan 'ga' zhig ni sngar yang bstan/ /thun mong dag tu rgyan gyi ni/ /rigs gzhan rab tu bstan par bya/ /rang bzhin brjod dang dpe dang ni/ /gzugs can gsal byed bskor ba dang / /'gog dang don gzhan bkod pa
<p>322a.5</p>dang / /ldog pa can dang srid pa can/ /bsdus dang phul byung rab brtags dang / /rgyu dang phra mo cha dang rim/ /dga' dang nyams ldan gzi brjid can/ /rnam grangs brjod dang kun du phan/ /rgya che ba snyon dor sbyar ba dang / /khyad par mtshungs par sbyor ba dang / /'gal dang skabs min bstod pa dang / /zol
<p>322a.6</p>stod nges par bstan pa dang / /lhan cig brjod dang yongs ba rjes shis/ /rab spel de nas dgongs ba can/ /'di dag tshig rnams dag gis ni/ /rgyan du sngon gyi mkhas pas bstan/ /dngos po rnams kyi rang bzhin dang / /gnas skabs sna tshogs dngos gsal byed/ /de ni rang bzhin brjod pa ste/ / 
<p>322a.7</p>dang po'i rgyan yin rigs sogs dper/ /mchu ni dmar zhing gug pa dang / /gshog pa ljang zhing mnyen pa dang / /mgrin pa kha dog sum phreng can/ /ne+e tso 'di dag tshig 'jam ldan/ /mgrin pa'i nang nas snyan sgrags shing / /mig ni kun du 'phrul pa yi/ /phug ron rtse 'dod dga' ma la/ / 
<p>322b</p>
<p>322b.1</p>yongs su bskor nas mchu dag sbyor/ /dga' ma yi ni reg pa 'dis/ /lus la spu lang rgyas pa dang / /yid ni bde bar byed pa dang / /mig dag zum par byed cing 'jug /mgrin sngon lag na thod pa ni/ /gnas pa zla ba'i cod pan dang / /snum zhing dmar ba'i ral pa can/ /khyu mchog rgyal mtshan
<p>322b.2</p>'khrungs par gyur/ /rigs dang bya ba yon tan rdzas/ /rang bzhin brjod pa 'di 'dra ni/ /bstan bcos kun la rgyal srid nyid/ /snyan ngag la yang 'di dag 'dod/ /ji lta ci zhig ltar mtshungs par/ /gsal bar gang du rtogs byed pa/ /de ni dpe zhes bya ste de'i/ /spros pa 'di ni rab bshad
<p>322b.3</p>bya/ /mdzes ma khyod kyi lag mthil ni/ /chu skyes bzhin du kun du dmar/ /zhes pa chos dpe dngos su ni/ /mtshungs pa'i chos dag bstan phyir ro/ /khyod kyi gdong ni pad+ma bzhin/ /mig dag ut+pal sngon po bzhin/ /zhes pa chos cig rtogs byed pa/ /de ni dngos po'i dpe nyid do/ /khyod kyi
<p>322b.4</p>gdong bzhin pad+ma ni/ /rnam par rgyas par gyur zhes pa/ /de ni grags pa bzlog pa'i phyir/ /bzlog pa'i dpe zhes bya bar 'dod/ /khyod kyi zhal bzhin chu skyes te/ /chu skyes bzhin du khyod kyi zhal/ /zhes pa phan tshun khyad 'phags ni/ /rjod par byed 'di phan tshun dpe/ /khyod zhal pad+ma nyid dang
<p>322b.5</p>mtshungs/ /gzhan ni 'ga' zhig dang yang min/ /zhes pa mtshungs pa gzhan bzlog phyir/ /'di ni nges par nyid kyi dpe/ /re zhig khyod gdong pad+ma yi/ /rjes 'gro gzhan yang de 'dra ba/ /gal te yod na de byed 'gyur/ /zhes pa 'di ni nges med dpe/ /khyod gdong mdzes pa kho na yis/ /zla
<p>322b.6</p>ba'i rjes su 'gro min te/ /dga' bskyed las kyis kyang zhes pa/ /'di 'dra bsdus pa'i dpe yang yod/ /khyod kyi zhal ni khyod nyid la/ /mthong zhing zla ba mkha' la mthong / /'di nyid kho na tha dad de/ /gzhan med ces ni phul byung dpe/ /de yi bzhin dpal nga nyid la/ /yod ces zla ba
<p>322b.7</p>snyems mi dgos/ /pad+ma la yang de yod phyir/ /zhes pa 'di ni rab brtag dpe/ /smin legs gal te pad+ma 'ga'/ /rnam par 'phrul pa'i mig ldan na/ /khyod kyi bzhin gyi dpal 'dzin te/ /zhes pa 'di ni rmad byung dpe/ /lus phra khyod gdong ri bong can/ /zhes btags khyod gdong bsam pa
<p>323a</p>
<p>323a.1</p>yi/ /zla ba 'di yang rjes su bsnyags/ /zhes 'di rmongs pa'i dpe ru bshad/ /pad nang bung ba 'khor ram ci/ /khyod gdong la mig g.yo 'am ci/ /bdag gi sems ni rnam par g.yo/ /zhes pa 'di ni the tshom dpe/ /zla ba skyengs byed mdzes pa 'di/ /zla bas tshar gcod pad+ma min/ / 
<p>323a.2</p>de phyir khyod kyi gdong nyid do/ /zhes 'di gtan la phebs pa'i dpe/ /bsil zer can gyi 'gran zla dang / /dpal dang ldan dang dri bzangs kyi/ /khyod kyi gdong ni chu skyes bzhin/ /zhes pa sbyar ba'i dpe ru bshad/ /mtshungs pa'i sgra yis brjod bya'i phyir/ /mnyam nyid dpe ste ji ltar na/ /skyed tshal phreng 'di bu mo
<p>323a.3</p>bzhin/ /mdzes ldan sA la kA na na/ /pad+ma rdul mang zla ba 'dzad/ /de dag las ni khyod kyi bzhin/ /mtshungs pa la yang khyad par bcas/ /zhes pa smad pa'i dpe ru 'dod/ /pad+mas tshangs pa mchog tu bskyed/ /zla ba bde 'byung gtsug gis 'dzin/ /de dag khyod gdong mtshungs zhes pa/ /de ni bsngags
<p>323a.4</p>pa'i dper brjod do/ /yon tan ldan yang skyon 'gyur yang / /zla ba khyod gdong mtshungs zhes pa/ /brjod 'dod bdag gi yid la yod/ /ces pa brjod 'dod dpe zhes rig /'dab brgya pa dang ston zla dang / /khyod kyi gdong dang gsum po ni/ /phan tshun rnam par 'gal zhes pa/ /de ni 'gal ba'i
<p>323a.5</p>dpe brjod do/ /dri ma ldan zhing blun gyur pas/ /zla ba la ni khyod gdong dang / /'gran pa'i nus pa nam yang med/ /ces pa dgag pa'i dpe nyid do/ /khyod gdong ri dgas mig gis mtshan/ /zla ba ri dgas nyid kyis mtshan/ /de lta na yang 'di mtshungs nyid/ /khyad 'phags min zhes ngo
<p>323a.6</p>bstod dpe/ /'di ni bzhin nyid pad+ma min/ /'di dag bung ba ma yin mig /ces pa rnam gsal mtshungs pa las/ /de ni de nyid brjod pa'i dpe/ /zla ba pad+ma dag gi ni/ /mdzes pa las 'das khyod kyi gdong / /bdag rang nyid dang mtshungs par gyur/ /zhes pa thun mong min pa'i dpe/ /pad+ma mdzes
<p>323a.7</p>pa'i snying po kun/ /'ga' zhig dag tu bsdus pa bzhin/ /khyod zhal rnam par mdzes zhes pa/ /de ni 'byung min dpe zhes rig /zla ba'i gzugs las dug bzhin dang / /tsan+dan las ni me bzhin du/ /zhal 'di las ni rtsub mo'i tshig /ces pa srid pa min pa'i dpe/ /tsan+dan chu dang zla ba'i zer/ / 
<p>323b</p>
<p>323b.1</p>zla shel sogs bzhin khyod kyi ni/ /reg pa bsil zhes khyad par dag /gsal bar byed pa mang ba'i dpe/ /lus phra khyod kyi bzhin ras ni/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor las bton bzhin/ /pad+ma'i nang nas phyung ba bzhin/ /zhes pa 'di ni rnam 'gyur dpe/ /'od kyis nyi bzhin nyi ma yis/ /nyin bzhin
<p>323b.2</p>nyin gyis mkha' la bzhin/ /rnam par gnon pas khyod la dpal/ /'dzin zhes de ni phreng ba'i dpe/ /gang yang dag don nyid kyis ni/ /gal te ngag don nyer 'jal na/ /ngag don dpe de bzhin sgra ni/ /gcig dang du mas de rnam gnyis/ /khyod gdong mig ni mi brtan zhing / /so yi 'od zer rab
<p>323b.3</p>gsal ba/ /'dam skyes bung ba g.yo ldan ni/ /ge sar dag gis mtshon bzhin mdzes/ /pad+ma can bzhin lus phra ma/ /pad+ma bzhin du de yi gdong / /sbrang rtsi spyod pas bzhin du ni/ /bdag gis 'thungs shing 'thungs shing rtses/ /dngos po 'ga' zhig nyer bkod nas/ /de yi chos mthun rab bkod
<p>323b.4</p>pa/ /mnyam pa nyid du rtogs pa can/ /zla bo dngos po'i dpe yin dper/ /rgyal po rnams ni skyes gyur kyang / /da lta khyod 'dra gcig kyang med/ /yongs 'du dag la rkang 'thung ni/ /gnyis pa nges par yod ma yin/ /lhag pas dman pa bya ba yi/ /cho ga gcig la rab bsdus nas/ /gang smras de
<p>323b.5</p>ni mtshungs pa dag /sbyor ba'i dpe ru bshad de dper/ /bu lo ma dgra mtho ris dang / /khyod kyis sa bsrung mel tshe byed/ /de yis dregs ldan lha min dang / /khyod kyis mi yi bdag po 'joms/ /rgyal po mdzes pas zla ba dang / /gzi byin gyis ni nyi ma dang / /brtan pas rgya mtsho'i rjes su byed/ / 
<p>323b.6</p>ces pa 'di ni rgyud per dran/ /blo ldan mi dgyes med gang la/ /nges par dpe yi skyon dag ni/ /tha dang rtags dang tshig la med/ /dman dang lhag pa nyid la'ang med/ /ma ning 'di 'gro bud med bzhin/ /bud med 'di smra skyes pa bzhin/ /bdag gi grogs 'di srog rnams bzhin/ /rig pa rnams
<p>323b.7</p>bsgrub nor bzhin no/ /sa gzhi skyong ba khyod bzhin du/ /lha yi rgyal po rnam par mdzes/ /tsha zer can gyi nus pa la/ /mi bdag /gzi yis 'gong bar nus/ /zhes pa de lta bu la sogs/ /skal bzang nam yang gtang min nyid/ /sbyor ba 'ga' la ngag rig rnams/ /mi dgyes pa yod ji ltar na/ / 
<p>324a</p>
<p>324a.1</p>ngang mo bzhin du zla ba dkar/ /mtsho rnams bzhin du mkha' dri med/ /khyi bzhin dpa' bo rje la gus/ /nyi ma bzhin du me khyer gsal/ /'di 'dra spangs te mkhas rnams kyis/ /rgyu yang 'dir ni bsam par byos/ /bzhin ltar lta bu ji ltar sgra/ /mthun mtshungs yang dag mtshungs
<p>324a.2</p>dang mnyam/ /yang dag gsal dang nges par gsal/ /rab gsal gzugs kyi zla bo dang / /gnyen po dang ni dgra zla dang / /so sor rtog dang 'gal dang 'dra/ /blta bcas dang ni bslu ba dang / /rigs mthun rjes su smra ba dang / /gzugs brnyan dang ni so sor sdeb/ /gzugs mtshungs mnyam dang yang dag gzhal/ /mtshan nyid
<p>324a.3</p>mthun 'dra mtshungs pa dang / /mthun phyogs dper byas dpe dang rtog /dman dang cung zad dman sogs dang / /rab tu smra dang so sor bzlag /rags mthun mnyam byas sgra dag dang / /gang yang dman min don can tshig /ri bong mtshan ma'i gdong can sogs/ /'bru mang po yi tshig sdud dang / /'gran
<p>324a.4</p>dang rgyal dang sdang ba dang / /'khu dang mi mthun sgrogs pa dang / /'thab pa dang ni 'phya ba dang / /sma 'bebs byed dang smod pa dang / /co 'dri ba dang 'gog pa dang / /rgod dang phrag dog mi bzod dang / /de yi skal bzang 'phrog byed dang / /de yi mdzes pa zum byed dang / /de dag 'gran las tshar gcod dang / / 
<p>324a.5</p>de dag mtshungs las lhag par mdzes/ /de yi rjes su rkang 'jog dang / /de yi nus pa la 'jug dang / /de yi rjes 'gro rjes su 'ching / /de yi ngang tshul de 'gog dang / /de yi rjes su byed ces pa'i/ /sgra rnams mtshungs pa gsal byed yin/ /tha dad snang min gyur pa yi/ /dpe nyid dag ni gzugs can
<p>324a.6</p>'dod/ /dpung pa 'khri shing lag pa ni/ /pad+ma sor mo yal 'dab bo/ /lag pa'i 'khri shing sor mo rnams/ /yal 'dab sen mo'i 'od zer ni/ /me tog tu gyur dpyid kyi dpal/ /khyod ni nged la mngon sum rgyu/ /zhes pa 'di ni ma bsdus te/ /snga ma bsdus pa'i gzugs can no/ /bzhin zla 'dzum pa'i
<p>324a.7</p>zla 'od ces/ /gzugs can bsdus dang ma bsdus pa'o/ /sor mo dmar ba'i 'dab phreng dang / /sen mo'i 'od kyi ge sar can/ /khyod kyi zhabs kyi chu skyes ni/ /sa skyod rnams kyi spyi bor 'dzin/ /sor mo la sogs 'dab sogs dang / /rkang pa pad+ma nyid byas nas/ /de 'os gnas su rnam bkod pa/ /'di
<p>324b</p>
<p>324b.1</p>ni mtha' dag gzugs can no/ /gtum mo glo bur nyid du ni/ /khyod gdong mchu yi yal 'dab g.yo/ /rdul gyi chu yi thig pa yi/ /dog pa mu tig 'od can 'dzin/ /'di ni rdul chu dog par byas/ /mchu yang yal 'dab nyid byas kyi/ /gdong ni rnam pa gzhan ma byas/ /de phyir cha shas gzugs can no/ /gdong
<p>324b.2</p>pa'i 'dam skyes smin 'khyog cing / /rdul gyi chu ni zags pa dang / /mig dag kun du dmar ba 'di/ /myos pa'i gnas skabs gsal bar byed/ /'dir ni gdong ba'i cha shas dag /rnam 'gyur ma byas gdong pa nyid/ /pad+mar bkod byas des na 'di/ /cha shas can gyi gzugs can no/ /mdzes ma myos pa'i
<p>324b.3</p>mkhur tshos dmar/ /mig gi ut+pal dmar po can/ /khyod kyi gdong gis skye bo ni/ /'dir yang dmar ba'i rang bzhin byas/ /'di ni yan lag gcig gzugs can/ /de ltar 'dir ni gnyis sogs kyi/ /yan lag rnams kyang rtogs par bya/ /ldan dang mi ldan tha dad byed/ /gdong 'di
