<p>343b.3</p>ta'i chu skyes ge sar gsal bar rgyas shing grong dang mchod rten gyis/ /bskor ba'i khang par gtor len tshang skyed rtsom pa'i grong khyer tam sha zhes pas mchod par 'gyur/ /de yi byang phyogs gzhi la bi di sha zhes mchod cha rgyal po'i khab tu myur song nas/ /der ni khyod kyis shin tu che ba'i 'bras bu thob mchog go
<p>343b.4</p>'phang 'phral la thob 'gyur zhing / /che ba'i kha zheng dang ldan mtha' nas lhung lhung skad snyan sgrogs shing dang zhing bsil ldan pa/ /g.yo ba'i rlabs phreng gdong kha smin ma g.yo bzhin pa 'dra'i mtsho de'ang skal bzang khyod 'thung 'gyur/ /gang zhig ni tsa zhes grags ri bor khyod 'ongs thob las der ni ngal
<p>343b.5</p>bso'i ched du gnas/ /ka dam pa yi me tog dga' bas spu long rgyas shing ge sar 'dzum par byed pa bzhin/ /grong khyer rnams ni sman 'tshong ma rnams dga' bar byed pa'i dri bzangs dag gis gang ba rnams/ /rdo yi phrag phrug rnams kyi mchog tu mdzes pa'i lang tsho ma rnams smra ru 'jug pa bzhin/ / 
<p>343b.6</p>ngal sos gyur na bgrong bya gsar skyes rnams kyi me tog gsar pa'i dra ba mdzes pa rnams/ /chu bo chu ngogs skyes pa rnams ni chu thigs rnams kyis bran pa 'phral du 'ongs 'gyur zhing / /chu skyes thog ma'i gdong gi 'gram pa'i rngul thigs ser la rna ba'i ut+pal ngal ba dang / /rnyings gyur la ni nyid kyis
<p>343b.7</p>skad cig bde ba'i grib bsil yongs su gnang bar mdzod cig kye/ /yang ni byang gi phyogs su bgrod cing gang zhig khyed ni 'khyog po'i lam la zhugs pa'i tshe/ /grong khyer udz+dza ya na'i rgyal po'i pho brang nang du phyir phyogs min par gnas par mdzod/ /de na grong gi dga' ma rnams kyi rol sgeg zur mig glog gi
<p>344a</p>
<p>344a.1</p>thag pa g.yo ba ni/ /skyong byed mig gis gal te khyod ni ma mthong 'bras bu med cing bslus pa nyid du 'ang 'gyur/ /rlabs phreng g.yo ldan snyan par sgrogs shing 'dab chags phreng ba'i rked rgyan ska rags sil sil can/ /dal gyis dal gyis 'gro zhing lang ling mdzes pa'i skal bzang
<p>344a.2</p>'khor lo'i lte ba dang ldan pa/ /ro mchog dang ldan chu bo'i na chung bir bin+d+ha ni khyod ni lam na mngon bzhugs nas/ /dga' ma rnams kyis mdza' bo rnams la rol sgeg thog mar ston cing rked rgyan 'grol 'dra mthong / /de rgal sin+d+hu'i chu ni len bu bzhin du lus ni rab tu phra bar gyur pa can/ /dgos su gyur
<p>344a.3</p>pa'i shing ni rnyings pa'i 'dab ma lhung ba rnams kyis khyab par bkram pas dkar/ /kwa ye skal bzang khyod dang bral bar gnas pas lus kyi gnas skabs 'di 'drar 'gyur/ /gang gi chung ma spangs nas che ba'i gnas skabs mdzad dam khyod mkhyen de ni rjod par byed/ /a wan+ta'i yul thog na u da ya na'i
<p>344a.4</p>gtam ni grong gi rgan mos shes pa yod/ /de rjes grong khyer sngar bstan khang pa yangs shing dpal dang phun tshogs che ldan yangs pa can/ /'dzam gling sa gzhir mtho ris mdzes ldan dum bu bsod nams lhag ma rnams kyi skabs gsum pa'i/ /legs bshad 'bras bur gyur pa nyung shas 'ga' zhig dag ni
<p>344a.5</p>phrogs nas 'ongs par gyur pa bzhin/ /gang du bzhad rnams myos pa'i gdangs snyan che bar sgrogs shing yid 'ong sgra ni gsal bar byed/ /nyi gzhon gyis rgyas chu skyes dri bzangs dga' skyed bska ba'i ro ldan yid du 'ong gyur cing / /chu thigs kyis bran dri bzhon bud med chags gzir gdung ba phrog byed lus
<p>344a.6</p>kyi rjes mthun pa/ /bdag po mchog ni 'dod don gnyer bar byed la snyan par sgrogs shing dga' bar byed pa bzhin/ /de yi nor ldan khang pa rnams na len bu spos kyis bdugs pa'i dri bzangs dra ba nas/ /'thon pas khyod lus cher 'gyur khyim gyi gtsug phud can ni dga' bas gnyen mthong gar gyis ni/ / 
<p>344a.7</p>mchod 'bul chu skyes dri bzangs ldan pa bud med rol sgeg ldan pa'i rkang pa'i tshon rnams kyis/ /mtshan pa rnams kyi dbus su dub par gyur pa'i rang nyid sdug bsngal bsal bar bya/ /yang ni srid pa gsum gyi bla ma dpal mgrin gnas su bsod nams ldan khyod bgrod par bya/ /'khor tshogs chos kyis
<p>344b</p>
<p>344b.1</p>khyab bdag mgrin 'od mtshungs bzhin zhes gus dang bcas pas lta bar byed/ /yid 'ong dri ldan chu la lang tsho ma rnams rol sgeg khrus ni byed pa'i dri ldang zhing / /ut+pal ge sar ldan pa'i dri rnams kyis bsgos rlung gi skyed tshal g.yo bar byed pa yod/ /kwa ye chu 'dzin nag po chen po'i gnas su bgrod nas
<p>344b.2</p>nyin zhag gzhan pa'i dus la yang / /nyin mor byed pa 'dren byed yul du 'ongs par gyur gyi bar du khyod ni gnas par mdzod/ /rtse gsum can la thun mtshams la ni gtor ma rnga chen bsgrags shing bstod dbyangs byed pa bzhin/ /khyod kyis 'brug dbyangs bsgrags tshe ma tshang med pa'i 'bras bu thob pas
<p>344b.3</p>kun gyi don yang byed/ /de nas rkang pa bkod par gyur tshe 'og phag dag las sil sil snyan pa'i sgra 'byung zhing / /rol sgeg g.yo ba'i rin chen 'od 'phros lus mdzes rnga yab 'dzin pas ngal ba'i lag pa can/ /tshogs kyi mdzes ma sen rjes gsar pas gdungs la khyod las char thigs thob na tshim
<p>344b.4</p>byed pa/ /khyod la sbrang rtsi byed pa'i phreng ba bzhin du g.yo ba'i zur mig ring ba dag gis blta bar 'gyur/ /phyugs bdag glang chen lpags rlon 'dod bzhin gyon nas gar ni rtsom pa 'phrogs par gyur pa bzhin/ /khyod 'ongs snga dro'i thun mtshams nyi gzhon dmar ba'i 'od kyis dmar ba'i chu skyes 'dzin byed
<p>344b.5</p>cing / /rgyab nas mtho ba'i lag pa zlum po'i nags kyi shing chen dag gis brgyangs nas 'dzin cing gnas/ /zhi ba'i char rgyun 'bab tshe ri yi sras mos g.yo med mig gis gus pas lta bar byed/ /des na bdag po'i gnas su mchog gi btsun mo rnams ni rab dgas sgeg par byed pa na/ /mtshan
<p>344b.6</p>mo'i mun pa stug po rnams kyis mi yi bdag po'i lam gyi snang ba 'gog byed pas/ /khyod kyi glog 'od gser mtshungs 'od kyi snang bas sa gzhi'i lam ni kun nas bstan par mdzod/ /chu char 'brug dbyangs sgra chen mang po ma byed mdzes pa de rnams skrag cing 'chi bar 'gyur/ /de rnams kyis ni khang
<p>344b.7</p>bzangs phug nor nyal sa steng gi rgya phubs 'ga' zhig dag tu ni/ /yun ring 'ongs las dub pa'i rang gi dga' ma glog ma'i don du mtshan mo gnas byas nas/ /nyi ma mthong tshe khyod ni slar yang lhag ma'i lam dag shin tu mgyogs pas bgrod par bya/ /gang phyir snying grogs dag gi don du 'bad pa
<p>345a</p>
<p>345a.1</p>byas pa nges par bya ba byas pa nyid/ /de yi dus su nyin mor byed pas lam ni dor nas myur du 'gro bar bya/ /'od zer rab tu 'phro ba bsgrags na khro ba chung ba min pa khyod la byed par 'gyur/ /mtshan mo bdag po song ba'i bud med mig gi mchi ma sel la bdag po 'ong ba bzhin/ /pad+mo'i
<p>345a.2</p>yum gyi chu skyes gdong gi mig chu de yang rab tu sel ba byed par 'gyur/ /rab tu dang ba'i sems bzhin shin tu zab mo dang ldan mtsho yi chu yi nang du ni/ /khyod kyi gzugs brnyan yang ni rang bzhin skal ba bzang po bdag nyid 'char ba thob par 'gyur/ /de slad de yi ku mu ta ni dkar po rnams kyis khyod la
<p>345a.3</p>bkur sti bsnyen bkur byed/ /brtags pas don yod bya ba'i ched du g.yo ldan nya rnams gyen du 'phar zhing lta bar byed/ /de yi chu gos sngon pos chu yi dogs kyi tshing ra 'phrogs par byas nas spangs pa na/ /ma 'phrog ces ni shing chen yal ga'i lag pa dag gis dbus su cung zad 'dzin pa bzhin/ /kwa
<p>345a.4</p>ye grogs po chu 'thungs lto khengs lji nas lam du 'gro ba yang ni ji ltar yin/ /mdzes ma'i sgron ma mdzes pa'i bro ba shes na ji ltar 'dor ba'i nus pa yod pa yin/ /khyod ni de pa'i ri las nye bar 'gro tshe dal bu dal bu'i rlung ni ldang 'gyur zhing / /bsil ba'i rlung gis bsgos pa'i u du m+WA ra'i nags kyi
<p>345a.5</p>'bras bu 'chang zhing rol rtsed byed/ /khyod kyis char chen phab pas nor 'dzin ma yi dri dang rlangs pa gtsang ma tshogs pa ni/ /so ldan rnams kyi sna yis rngub cing bu ga'i nang du skal bzang glu dbyangs sgrogs par byed/ /der ni skye mched nyi ma las lhag gzi ldan sreg zla las skyes son du phyogs pa can/ / 
<p>345a.6</p>gtsug na zla ba rin chen mang gi dmag tshogs bsrung pa'i don du bskos pa de ni gnas/ /khyod kyi mkha' yi gang+gA'i chu las sprin gyi me tog gsher ba mang po rnams kyis ni/ /me tog gru char bdag nyid phab pa rnams kyis gang zhig de ni khrus ni byed par 'gyur/ /gtsug phud ldan de chu 'thungs dga' bas
<p>345a.7</p>phyin nas ri gzung snyan pa'i sgra sgrogs gar dag byed/ /mig zur dkar ba'i zer gyis 'phrog byed gtsug gi zla ba'i 'od kyi zer ni skyengs byed kyang / /gang gi che ba'i mjug sgro mdongs 'od tshon rtsis bris bzhin mdzes pa 'od gyur pa/ /u ma'i sras ni dga' bar byed pa chu skyes 'dab ma bzhin du rna
<p>345b</p>
<p>345b.1</p>bar byed pa yod/ /smyig ma'i tshal nas skyes pa'i lha de yang dag mchod nas slar yang lam ni brgal bar mdzod/ /grub pa'i khyo shug dag gi lag pa'i pi wang chu thigs brlan la 'jigs pas lam ni ster/ /khyod kyis mthong bar 'gyur ba'i sa bdag dga' ba'i lha yi sras po chu gter gzugs 'dzin
<p>345b.2</p>ni/ /sa yi gzhi la byung zhing lhun po 'dod 'jo'i bu mos 'ongs nas mchod pa byed par 'gyur/ /khyod kyi de yi rlabs ldan mtsho yi chu 'thungs 'ongs pa'i tshe na thag ring mthu las ni/ /chen po yin yang phra mo dang ni sbrang rtsi'i bu yi kha dog bskus par gyur pa dang / /chen po'i sa la in+d+ra nI la mu tig do shal dag ni
<p>345b.3</p>gcig tu bkod pa bzhin/ /mkha' la bgrod pa rnams kyi mig rnams dag gis 'og tu blta zhing nges par mthong bar 'gyur/ /de rnams brgal nas bgrod tshe smin ma 'khri shing gzhon nu rol pa rnams kyis mdzes pa can/ /dkar nag 'od zer dang ldan rnams kyi rdzi ma steng du bskyod par gyur pa'i mdzes pa dag / 
<p>345b.4</p>kun da'i me tog g.yo ba'i rjes 'gro sbrang rtsi byed pa'i dpal gyi mdzes pa bzhin du ni/ /mdzes ldan da sha zhes bya'i grong khyer na chung mig gis blta 'dod la ni rang lus bstan par mdzod/ /dang por tshangs pha 'jug pa zhes bya'i ljongs la khyod ni bgrod bya 'og tu grib bsil bya/ /de nas rgyal rigs bcom pa'i
<p>345b.5</p>dur ldan ku ru ba yi bzhin ni khyod kyis bstan par bya/ /gang du srid sgrub mda' rnon brgya phrag dag gis rgyal rigs mang po'i mgo bo bcad pa ni/ /khyod kyi gru char chen po rab tu mang po phab pas pad+ma rnams ni chad pa bzhin/ /myos par byed pa'i ro ldan dga' ma snar ma'i tshig gis mtshan pa'i chang ni spang byas nas/ / 
<p>345b.6</p>rang gi gnyen la dga' bar 'gyur bas yul las phyir phyogs stobs bzang gang de blta bar bya/ /kwa ye zhi ldan sA ra swa ti'i chu la mngon par phyogs tshe khyod kyis 'thungs byas nas/ /lus kyi kha dog dag ni nag por 'gyur zhing nang gi bsam pa yang ni dkar ba nyid/ /de nas bgrod pa'i phyi nas ka kha pa yi grong
<p>345b.7</p>yod dza hu'i bu mo ri rgyal gyi/ /ngos la bgrod pa dug can rgyal po'i bu ni mtho ris de yi them skas bgrod pa bzhin/ /gang gi dbu ba'i phreng ba rnams kyis gau rI'i zhal gyi khro gnyer rnams la dgod pa bzhin/ /bde 'byung skra nas rlabs kyi lag pa dag gis bzung nas zla phyed 'phrog par byed pa bzhin/ /khyod ni gal te
<p>346a</p>
<p>346a.1</p>de yi chu 'thungs bsams nas lus phyed snga ma mkhar las 'phyang ba ni/ /lha yi glang po bzhin te chu de'i zhing ni dri med dkar ba'i shel bzhin snang ba nyid/ /chu bo de la khyod kyi glag ma bsam pas 'phral la yang dag 'byung 'gyur mdzes pa ni/ /ya mu na yi chu dang gang+gA 'grogs ba'i mdzes pa las
<p>346a.2</p>'ongs gyur la gnas ma yin/ /rdo leb steng du ri dgas gnas pas ri dgas lte ba'i dri bzang 'dzin pa'i rdo ldan zhing / /gang+gA nyid kyi yab gyur kha bar dkar ba'i g.yo med gangs ldan de nyid thob byas nas/ /lam gyis dal ba rnam par 'dul ba'i ched du de yi rtse la slebs nas 'dug pa yi/ /mdzes pa mig gsum
<p>346a.3</p>pa yi bzhon pa dkar ba'i khyu mchog rwa yis 'dam ni blangs pa bzhin/ /de la gal te rlung gis rab bskyod thang shing lag pa kun du 'thabs pa las byung ba'i/ /me yi dug dang me stag dag gis 'brong gi dga' ma'i spu tshogs mang po sreg byed na/ /khyod kyis de rnams zhi ba'i ched du chu 'dzin stong phrag mang po char
<p>346a.4</p>ni bya bar 'os/ /gang phyir chen po rnams kyi phun tshogs 'bras bu mang po'i sdug bsngal zhi bar byed pa nyid/ /der ni khyod kyis sgra chen bsgrags la ma bzod che ba'i dregs pa kun du ldan pa'i rkang brgyad pa/ /khyod kyi steng du mchong bar bya'o snyam nas ma mchongs rang gi yan lag kun du rmas/ /de rnams dag la rab
<p>346a.5</p>tu bzhad ldan thog ser char pa drag phab mang pos gzhom par mdzod/ /rang bzhin ngan pa'i gnas pa dag gi 'bras med rtsom pa'i 'bad pa rnams ni ci yang med/ /der ni che zhing gsal ba'i rdol gtsug na zla phyed 'dzin pa'i rkang bkod rjes la ni/ /rtag tu grub pa rnams kyis gtor ma mchod kyis gus pas
<p>346a.6</p>phyag dang bskor ba mdzod/ /gang zhig mthong na byed pas byas pa'i sdig pa rnams ni shin tu ring por 'dor byed cing / /gus pa 'dzin pa rnams ni de yi 'khor du gnas pa thob byed brtan pa thob par 'gyur/ /dri zhim rnams kyis khengs par gyur pa'i khang pa nang nas snyan pa'i yid 'ong sgra 'byung zhing / /mi'am ci
<p>346a.7</p>mo rnams kyis grong khyer gsum rgyal 'gyur las yang dag dga' bas glu dbyangs sgrogs/ /rda zlum snyan pa'i sgra bzhin gal te khyod kyis rdo yi gtsug lag khang der sgra snyan ni//bsgrags par gyur na nges par phyugs bdag drung du gsum 'dus dbyangs snyan don gyi tshogs pa 'byung / /gangs kyi ril nye ba'i thang la
<p>346b</p>
<p>346b.1</p>rkang pa bskyod tshe de dang de yi khyad par la/ /krauny+tsa'i ri yi lam la rab grags b+h+ri gu'i bdag po'i mda' phug ngang pa'i sgo can yod/ /de nas nor sbyin phyogs su khyod ni rjes su 'gro tshe 'khyog por 'gro ba'i mdzes pa ni/ /stobs ldan slu ba'i ched du khyab 'jugs 'jal rkang pa sngo bsangs yang dag bkod pa bzhin/ / 
<p>346b.2</p>mgrin bcu'i lag pas bskyod bya ri ngos yangs pa dang ldan shel gyi kai la sha yi ri/ /skabs gsum mdzes ma'i gdong gi me long bstan bya'i steng du'ang song ste cung zad gnas par bya/ /gang gi rtse mo shin tu mtho ba ku mu ta ltar mkha' la khyab par gnas pa ni/ /mig gsum pa yis rab tu brgad pa phyogs bcu
<p>346b.3</p>dag nas gcig tu spungs par gyur pa bzhin/ /de yi ri ngos dag la khyod ni 'gro tshe snum pa'i sman mchog dag dang mtshungs pa dang / /de ni gnyis 'thung so ni 'phral la bcad par byas pa lta bur dkar zhing mdzes pa de/ /mdzes pa'i ri bo la ni g.yo ba med pa'i mig gis blta bya nyid du 'gyur ba dang / /stobs
<p>346b.4</p>ldan dkar ba'i dpung pa dag la gos sngon bkod par gyur bzhin 'byung ba bdag gis shes/ /der ni bde 'byung sbrul gyi gdu bu dor nas gau rI'i lag pa dag la 'dzin byed cing / /gal te yang ni rol rtsed ched du zhabs kyis 'gro bas ri la de dag dal 'gro na/ /khyod bgrod lus ni 'khyog por 'gro zhing nang na
<p>346b.5</p>gnas pa'i chu chen dag ni spang bya zhing / /bkab par byas nas steng du 'gro ba rnams la rkang pa'i bde ba reg par bya ba mdzod/ /rigs gnas der ni khyod kyis chu rnams skyugs par byas pas nges par nang na med pa na/ /lha yi na chung rnams kyis khyod ni 'khrul 'khor gyis bzung khang bzangs nang du 'khyer
<p>346b.6</p>bar byed/ /kwa ye grogs bzang tsha bas gdungs pa de rnams ched du gal te khyod ni mi gtong na/ /rol sgeg g.yo ba'i mdzes ma de rnams rna bar rtsub pa'i sgra chen bsgrags pas 'jigs par bya/ /chu thigs dag gis bran pa dang ldan dri bzhon gyis bskyod dpag bsam shing la g.yo bzhin du/ /khyod kyi
<p>346b.7</p>grib 'od shel ltar dkar ba'i gos kyis ri dbang de ni yongs su g.yogs bya zhing / /yid 'ong chu bo bzhi yi rgyun ni gser gyi chu skyes gsar pa ltar de'ang 'thung ba dang / /sa srung bu yi gdong pa'i gos ni ci 'dod spyad cing dga' ba'ang skad cig bya bar mdzod/ /kwa ye 'dod bzhin rgyu byed khyod ni des
<p>347a</p>
<p>347a.1</p>las rgal tshe lcang lo ldan ma shes par 'gyur/ /slar yang ri de g.yo ldan gang+gA'i chu gos ldan ma'i bdag po bzhin du mi mthong min/ /mthong ba'i gzhal med khang steng char sprin che las khyod kyi chu byas sgyugs byas dus su ni/ /gang zhig 'dod ldan ma ni len bu mu tig dra bas bsgrigs pa'i
<p>347a.2</p>phreng ba ldan pa bzhin/ /khyod la glog 'od ldan bzhin sgeg pa'i mdzes ma dang ldan dbang po'i gzhu bzhin bkra bar ldan/ /snyan pa'i dbyangs ni zab pa bzhin du glu dbyangs dag dang rol mo'i dbyangs snyan rnams dang ldan/ /chu yi snying po can bzhin sa gzhi nor bu'i rang bzhin mtho bzhin rtse mo mkha' la reg / 
<p>347a.3</p>gang du khyad par de rnams kyis ni khyod dang khang bzangs mtshungs pa'i ched du nor bur ldan/ /gang du na chung rnams ni lag pad mdzes shing len bu'i kun da gzhon nu'i skra ni 'ching / /gdong gi chu skyes 'dzum zhing dkar ba'i ge sar dpal ni gsar pa dag gis mdzes byas shing / /gtsug phud ku ru ba
<p>347a.4</p>ka'i me tog zhags pas bcings pa mdzes shing rna bar ut+pal can/ /skra mtshams bkra ba'i me tog dag dang ldan pa'ang khyod ni nye bar 'ongs las skyes pa yin/ /gang gi dkar po'i nor bu dang ldan rin chen 'od kyis khyab pa chu skyes ltar mdzes pa'i/ /yang thog gzhi la gnod sbyin rnams ni mchog gis
<p>347a.5</p>dga' ma dang bcas yang dag gnas byas nas/ /dpag bsam shing las rab tu 'khrungs pa'i dga' ma'i ro ldan chang ni kun du 'thung byed cing / /dal bu rnams kyis rnga rnams la ni brdungs pa khyod kyi 'brug sgra zab pa'i dbyangs snyan bzhin/ /gang du rab bgrod ches cher 'dar bas len bu lhung zhing man+da
<p>347a.6</p>ra ba'i me tog ni/ /mtshar bar gyur cing rna ba'i rgyan gyur rab mdzes gser gyi me tog lhung bar gyur pa dang / /nu rgyas mu tig dra ba mtshar bar gyur cing do shal srad bu chad par gyur pa yi/ /'dod ldan ma rnams mtshan mo lam du 'gro la byung ba 'od ldan shar tshe gsal bar byed/ /gang ched chags pas gnod sbyin
<p>347a.7</p>bud med rnams kyi 'og pag bcings pa 'grol zhing gos dag ni/ /bsal la mdza' bo rnams la 'dod mas 'dar bar gyur cing g.yo ba'i lag pa 'phen pa na/ /mchog tu che ba'i 'od zer dang ldan rin chen mar me mngon du mthong bar byed pa ni/ /ngo tshas rmongs pa rnams kyi lag pa dag gis phye ma gtor
<p>347b</p>
<p>347b.1</p>bar gyur pa 'bras med 'gyur/ /gang du chu 'dzin sa steng gnas rnams 'dren byed rtag 'gros gzhal med khang nang nged pa na/ /gang zhig rang gi chu thigs dag gis bkra ba'i ri mo rnams la 'phral du skyon byung nas/ /ngo tsha reg pa bzhin du khyod 'dra dum bu dum bu dag tu 'thon par byed pa ni/ /dra mig
<p>347b.2</p>rnams kyi nang nas du ba zhugs pa 'thon pa rnams kyi rjes su byed pa bzhin/ /gang du bud med mchog rnams bdag po mchog gis kun nas 'khyud pa rnams ni btang ba na/ /lus ni kun nas gdung bar byed la zla ba chu shel srad bu'i dra ba 'phyang ba can/ /khyod kyis bsgribs pa med cing dkar ba'i zla ba'i 'od
<p>347b.3</p>rnams gsal bar mthong bar gyur pa na/ /chu thigs 'bab pa kun nas byugs pas zhi bar byed cing mchog tu dga' ba skyed pa nyid/ /gang du gnod sbyin bdag po'i grogs bzang lha nyid mngon sum nyid du gnas pa shes byas nas/ /'jigs pa mang las yid srubs gzhu ni rkang drug pa yi gzhu
<p>347b.4</p>rgyud can de dor bas chog /bdag po'i 'ben la mdzes ma'i smin ma 'khyog po'i gzhu la zur mig g.yo ba dag gi mda'/ /rol sgeg g.yo ba rtsom par byed pa nyid kyis de yi 'bras bu nges par grub pa nyid/ /de na nor gyi bdag po'i khang bzangs las ni byang gi phyogs na bdag gi grong khyer ni/ /mtho
<p>347b.5</p>ris bdag po'i gzhu dang 'dra ba'i rta babs mdzes pas ring nas 'tsham par byas pa ste/ /gang gi skyed tshal man+da ra dang ljon shing gzhon nu bdag gi mdzes ma'i bu ltar ni/ /bskyangs pa'i mthu las 'phel ba'i me tog chun 'phyang thur du 'phyang ba lag pas thob bya yod/ /bkod ma bzang mo'i chu ni mar ka ta'i
<p>347b.6</p>rdo yi phring ba bsgrigs pa'i lam skas can/ /'di nas mdzes pa'i gser gyi pad+ma rgyas pa rin chen rtsa ldan rnams kyis khyab pa ste/ /gdung ba dang bral ngang pa'i tshogs rnams dag ni gang+gA'i chu la gnas par byas pa'i tshe/ /khyod nyid yang dag mthong bar gyur kyang nye bar gnas pa'i yid 'ong mtsho las 'gro
<p>347b.7</p>mi 'gyur/ /kwa ye grogs bzang khyod ni glog gi dga' ma g.yo bzhin nye bar mthong bar gyur pa na/ /mtsho de'i dogs na mdzes pa'i ri bo yid 'ong mchog gi in+d+ra nI la rnams kyis ni/ /rtse mo mdzes par byas par gsar gyi bskor ba rnams kyis bskor ba khyod kyis blta bya ba/ bdag gi dga' ma dga' byed
<p>348a</p>
<p>348a.1</p>dang bcas de nyid sems gdungs bdag ni shin tu dran par gyur/ /de la ku ru ba ka'i shing gis bskor ba'i yal ga'i khang bzangs dang ldan nye ba na/ /mya ngan med shing dmar dang ke sa ra yi shing chen yal 'dab g.yo ba mdzes pa yod/ /gcig la khyod kyi grogs su gyur ba'i dga' ma bdag dang
<p>348a.2</p>bcas pa'i g.yon pas bsgrun 'dod cing / /gzhan la gdong gi chang 'thungs me tog 'byung ba'i don du dga' ma de ni bdag 'dod gyur/ /de yi dbus na rab dkar shel gyi gzhi la gser gyi sdong po che zhing mtho bar gnas/ /rtsa ba rin chen phreng bas bcings pa rdo rje pha lam che ba min pa 'od 'phro ba/ /gang la khyod
<p>348a.3</p>kyi grogs bzang mgrin sngon gnas nas nyin phyed song tshe rol sgeg gar byed cing / /bdag gi mdzes ma rin chen gdu bu 'thab pa'i dbyangs snyan skal bzang mchog tu mdzes pa yod/ /de rnams kyis ni legs par mtshan pa kwa ye legs pa'i thugs 'dzin khyod kyis blta bar bya/ /sgo yi mtha' dang nye ba dag
<p>348a.4</p>na dung dang pad+ma'i gzugs bris mthong bar byas pa na/ /da lta bdag dang bral bar gyur pas nges par mdzes pa dman pa nyid du gnas par nges/ /nyi ma nub par gyur pas nges par pad+ma dag gis mdzes pa nyams par gyur pa nyid/ /mdzes ma de ni yongs su bskyangs ched myur du gshegs nas glang phrug lus
<p>348a.5</p>bzhin chung ba yis/ /mdzes pa'i ri bo de yi ngos la gnas nas dang por legs bshad snyan pa'i gsung gleng mdzod/ /bdag gi khang nang 'jug tshe me khyer phreng ba lta bu'i snang ba chung shing chung ba ni/ /mdzes shing rol pa'i smin ma g.yo ba'i glog gi mig ni byas nas khyod kyis blta bar 'os/ /de na bdag gi
<p>348a.6</p>dga' ma lus phra mdog mdzes gnyis skyes bkra ba'i phra lam mchu dag ni/ /bil ma smin pa bskyed pa phra zhing 'dren byed g.yo ba'i ri dgas mig can lte ba dma'/ /ro smad sbom zhing dal gyis 'gro mkhas 'o ma 'dzin pa dag gi bar dag mchog tu mdzes/ /na chung dag gi yul la mngon du zhen par byed po
<p>348a.7</p>tshangs pas dang po nyid du gyur/ /gzhon ma de ni bdag gi srog ni gnyis par shes par mdzod ces dal gyis smra bar bya/ /bdag dang lhan cig spyod la shin tu ring bar gyur te ngang mo gcig pur gyur pa bzhin/ /'di la nyin zhag mang po 'ong ba rnams su yid la gcags pa med pa nyid du gyur/ /dgun smad pad+ma can
<p>348b</p>
<p>348b.1</p>ni kha bas nyams pa bzhin du gzugs gzhan thob par bdag gis shes/ /dga' ma de ni nges par mchi ma mang po babs las mig 'phur che ba dag tu gyur/ /steng 'og chu yi pags pa dag ni shugs ring shin tu dro ba'i dbugs ni du ma byas/ /gdong ni legs par bkod la len bu 'phyang bas bsgribs
<p>348b.2</p>pas mtha' dag gsal ba min pa ni/ /zla ba'i 'od kyis mdzes pa khyod ni 'ongs pas bsgribs las snang min sman pa 'dzin pa bzhin/ /gtor ma byed pa'ang bral bas btud par gyur pa bdag 'dra yid kyis rtogs bya 'dri ba'am/ /snyan pa'i tshig gis smra ba'i sha ri ka ni gur gyi nang na gnas shing gnas pa la/ / 
<p>348b.3</p>kwa ye grogs mo de yi dga' ba dran nam zhes pa'i dri ba byed pa bdag kyang ni/ /khyod ni mthong bar gyur pa na ni nga ni mdun du 'ongs shing dga' bar byed par 'gyur/ /kwa ye grogs bzang dri ma'i gos dang bcas pa'i rang gi phang par pi wang bzhag byas nas/ /bdag gi ming nas bod pas mtshan cing 'dod pa'i dbyangs
<p>348b.4</p>snyan cher sgrogs snyan par gyur pa'i tshe/ /rang gis byas par gyur kyang dbyangs snyan dum bu dum bur bcas nas sems zhing yang yang ni/ /mig chus brlan pa'i rgyud mangs cung zad phyi bar byas nas kyang ni de ni 'ong bar 'gyur/ /bdag ni 'ongs pa'i nyin nas brtsams te nyin zhag dang ni zla ba song ba'i lhag ma rnams/ / 
<p>348b.5</p>sa la rnam par 'god cing sgo yi nang du gangs kyi me tog rnams ni sgyur bar byed/ /bdag can nam ni phrad par 'gyur ram snyam pa snying la sems pa'i rtsom pa mang po byed/ /phal cher bud med rnams ni bdag po bral bas yid kyi las kyi gdung ba mang po nyid/ /nyin mo'i bar la bya ba dang ldan bdag dang bral las de
<p>348b.6</p>ltar shin tu min na yang / /mtshan mo shin tu ring las khyod kyi grogs mo bya med gdung ba che bar bdag gis shes/ /legs ma mtshan ring rnams la gnyid bral stan med sa la nyal tshe dra mi gnye bar ni/ /gnas nas blta bya bdag gi phrin rnams bzlas pa rnams ni bde ba'i ched du nus pa nyid/ /bral bas lhag par
<p>348b.7</p>gdungs pas sa yi gzhil gzhogs gcig brten te nyal bar gyur pa ni/ /tshes gcig zla ba shar ba cha gcig lhag ma rtsa bar gnas pa'i lus bzhin du ni gyur/ /bdag dang lhan cig gnas tshe 'dod pa'i dga' ma rnams kyi mtshan mo skad cig bzhin du song / /gang de da ltar bral ba las skyes mchi ma dron mo rnams bcas
<p>349a</p>
<p>349a.1</p>shin tu ring ba nyid/ /khrus kyis dag cing yangs shing rtsub pa'i skra yi len bu 'gram pa dag las 'phyang ba rnams/ /dbugs kyi rlung gis sel bar byed pa rnams la mchu yi 'dab ma dag ni dal bar nges/ /gnyid ni 'dod pa med cing bdag dang phrad pa las byung gnyid ni cung zad 'byung 'gyur zhes/ / 
<p>349a.2</p>dga' ma de ni 'dren byed mchi ma dang bcas shin tu gdungs pa mthong bas 'gog par byed/ /bdag gis bcings pa'i spyi gtsug len bu bral ba'i nyi ma dang po nyid la dor byas nas/ /len bu rnams ni gcig gyur reg pa rtsub pa mi bzad 'gram pa dag la gnas pa las/ /sen mo ring ba'i lag pas reg pa'i nyon
<p>349a.3</p>mongs ldan pas lan cig min par sgyur byed ma/ /rje bo khros pa'i bka' lung rdzogs pa gdung bral gyur pa bdag gis gang bde dgrol bar bya/ /mig ni mchi ma mang po rnams kyis gdungs la rdzi ma rnams kyis bkab par byas nas ni/ /zla ba'i rkang pa'i 'od zer bdud rtsi sil ma rnams ni dra mig nang nas zhugs pa na/ / 
<p>349a.4</p>bkab pa bsal te mngon du 'ongs nas dang por dga' 'gyur ldog pa na ni de bzhin nyid/ /sprin dang bcas pa'i nyin mo sa la gnas pa'i pad+ma rgyas min zum pa ma yin bzhin/ /dga' ma de ni nyin par mdza' bo'i grogs mo rnams kyis skad cig kyang ni gtong min bzhin/ /lus phra ma la gcig ni blta tshe kun gyi rmad byung
<p>349a.5</p>blta bas 'jug par 'gyur ba nyid/ /mtshan mo skye bo rnams ni nyal bar gyur la mdzes ma gnyid bral kwa ye chu 'dzin khyod/ /dra mig dang ni nye bar gnas nas nyal sar nye bar 'ongs te de ni dga' bar mdzod/ /len bu gcig tu gyur la reg pa 'gram pa la gnas sen mo mtho ba'i lag pa yis/ /yang dang yang du sel bar
<p>349a.6</p>byed cing sa yi gzhi yi mal gyi steng du gzhogs gcig ni/ /ltung bar gyur cing de yi mtha' na mchi ma rnams ni 'bab pa do shal chad pa dag /g.yo zhing ltung bar gyur pa bzhin du gnas pa de mthong nyid kyis dal gyis brjod par bya/ /mdzes ma de ni rgyan rnams yang dag gzhag cing lus ni shin tu phral 'dzin byed cing / /gdung
<p>349a.7</p>ba'i sdug bsngal dag gis mal stan steng na yang dang yang du 'dre ldog byed pa na/ /khyod kyang 'phral la chu yi rang bzhin mchi ma 'dzag pa nyid du 'gyur ba gdon mi za/ /phal chos thams cad nang gi bdag nyid bstan pas snying rje ci yang 'jug par 'gyur ba nyid/ /kwa ye grogs po khyod kyi grogs mo bdag la mdza' ba mang du 'dzin pa
<p>349b</p>
<p>349b.1</p>bdag gis shes/ /de phyir de ltar gyur pa rnams ni dang por bral la de ni bdag la sems par byed/ /skal bzang nang gi bsam pa dag gis brjod pa nges par brdzun min bden par shes pa ni/ /bdag gis gang gang brjod pa ma lus yun ring min par khyod la mngon sum nyid du 'gyur/ /len bu rnams kyis mi gzung
<p>349b.2</p>gnyis po g.yo ba 'gog cing mig sman byug pas gtor ba dang / /nyes par byed pa nam yang med par gyur las smin ma'i rnam 'gyur brjed par 'gyur na yang / /khyod ni yang la ri dgas mig can 'dren byed steng ni g.yo bar byed par bdag gis shes/ /gang zhig nya yis bskyod las chu skyes g.yo ba'i dpal ni 'dzin
<p>349b.3</p>par byed pa nyid dang mtshungs/ /de yi bdag gi lag pa'i sen mo'i rjes ni med cing mu tig rnams kyi dra ba ni/ /yun ring nyid nas 'dor bar byas par gyur cing longs spyod nyid kyis rdzogs pa'i mtha' ru ni/ /bdag gis lag pa rnams kyis mnyes par byas pa med kyang khyod 'ongs skal bzang dbang gis ni/ /de yi chu shing gsar
<p>349b.4</p>pa'i sdong po brla yang g.yon pa g.yo ba nyid ni thob par gyur/ /kwa ye chu 'dzin de la de yi dus su gal te bde ba'i nyid ni thob gyur na/ /de tshe khyod ni thun tshod bar du sgra sgrogs min par lhan cig dag tu gnas par mdzod/ /de yi bdag por gyur ba bdag la dka' tshegs chen pos thob par 'gyur ba'i rmi lam ni/ /mgrin par
<p>349b.5</p>lag pa'i 'khri shing dag gis che bar 'khyud pa'i mdud pa 'phral la gtong bar byed/ /rang gi chu yi thigs pa bsil bas bsgos pa'i rlung gi mA la ta ya rnams kyis ni/ /shin tu gzhon pa'i me tog bcas pa de ni bslad nas kyang ni de yi dbugs dbyung mdzod/ /khyod ni glog gi 'dren byed g.yo zhing g.yo ba khyod mdog dang
<p>349b.6</p>mtshungs gnas su gnas byas nas/ /khengs ldan ma la 'brug dbyangs tshig ni snyan pa'i brjod pa khyod kyis yang yang rtsom par mdzod/ /kwa ye khyod ldan chu gzhon ming can bdag ni rje yi grogs bzang yin par shes par mdzod/ /de yi 'phrin snyan yid la bzung nas khyod kyi drung du nye bar 'ongs par gyur ba nyid/ /bdag gi sgra ni
<p>349b.7</p>bsgrags tshe lam bgrod dub pa'i tshogs rnams sgo yi nang du 'bros par byed/ /snyan pa'i sgra dbyangs rnams kyis bud med len bu 'grol zhing 'dod pas gzir bar mtshon par byed/ /ces pa de skad bshad tshe dri bzhon bu ni mi thil yi bu mos mthong ba bzhin/ /de ni dga' bde'i snying gis khyod la mngon phyogs blta zhing bden pa nyid
<p>350a</p>
<p>350a.1</p>du'ang nges pa nyid/ /kwa ye grogs bzang de nas legs par gnas la gzhan yang nyan 'dod sgra ldan ma rnams ni/ /bdag po'i tshig ni snying grogs bdag gis khyer 'ongs gyur las phrad ltar lhag mar lus pa nyid/ /kwa ye tshe ldan bdag gi tshig dang nyid kyis kyang ni de la phan pa'i ched du ni/ /khyod kyi rgyal po mchog
<p>350a.2</p>ni rgyal por ma yi ri yi gnas na gnas shing 'tsho ba nyid/ /khyod ni spangs par gyur la kwa ye mdzes ma dge'am dri zhes de ltar smra bar mdzod/ /gang phyir skye bo rnams ni byed pa nyams la dang por de 'dra'i dbugs dbyung byed pa nyid/ /lus kyi nang nas shin tu phra pas phra gyur dang ni shin tu gdung bas gdungs gyur dang / /mchi ma
<p>350a.3</p>'dzags pas mchi ma 'dzag gyur che bar phrad 'dod nyid kyi phrad 'dod mchog tu gyur/ /dbugs dron shugs rings lhags pas dbugs dron shugs rings mchog tu lhags gyur ring nas 'jug pa can/ /bsod nams chom rkun dag gis lam bkag gyur cing de rnams yid la sim zhing 'jug pa yin/ /grogs mo'i mdun du
<p>350a.4</p>de yi rna ba la ni khyod kyi gdong ni reg par thob gyur pas/ /khyod kyi gang yang gus pa'i gtam gyi ched du gyur pa'i che ba'i sgra 'di brjod par 'os/ /gang de rna ba'i yul las shin tu gang yang 'das shing mig dag gis ni mthong bya min/ /khyod dang dga' bas 'phrad 'dod gyur zhes bdag gis kha yi tshig 'di zer zhes smra bar
<p>350a.5</p>mdzod/ /'khri shing 'ga' la yan lag mdzes pa 'jigs pa bcas ri dgas mo la mig mdzes g.yo ba mthong / /'gram pa'i mdzes 'od ri bong can la skra rnams gtsug phud can gyi mjug sgro'i tshogs la mthong / /smin ma'i rol sgeg mdzes ma rnams ni chu klung rlabs phreng phra mo rnams la rab tu mthong / /e ma gcig tu tshogs pa dang
<p>350a.6</p>ldan g.yon mig khyod dang mtshungs pa 'ga' yang yod ma yin/ /char gyis brlan las dri med sbrang rtsi can bzhin khyod kyi gdong 'di mdzes so lus phra ma/ /khyod ni ring gyur bdag ni phra ba'i lus gyur mda' lnga pa yi gdung ba yang yang byin/ /so ka rdzogs pa'i mtha' ru phyogs kun che ba'i chu 'dzin stug pos bsgribs pas nyi ma yi/ /snang ba rnams ni
<p>350a.7</p>nyams shing rgyun du char 'ong bdag gis zhag gi grangs ji lta ba yin/ /khyod ni rdo leb gzhi la khams kyi mtshon rnams kyis ni dga' dang khro bas legs bris te/ /de rnyed rdzogs nas 'dod pa bya ba'i ched du khyod kyi zhabs drung lhung bar gyur pa na/ /tshig lan ma byung bdag la mchi ma mang po yang yang byung bas zugs pas mig la khro/ /der yang
<p>350b</p>
<p>350b.1</p>bdag cag gnyis ni lhan cig 'grogs pa'i skal ba med pas nyid du gyur pa zhig /khyod ni bdag gi rmi lam dag tu 'ongs shing thob pa ci yang mthong bar gyur pa na/ /kho bos dam du 'khyud par bya ba'i ched du nam mkha' dag la lag yug bya ba ni/ /sa la gnas pa'i nags kyi lha rnams kyis ni nges par ma mthong ma yin mang po ru/ / 
<p>350b.2</p>mu tig brgyud pa bzhin du shing gi yal ga rnams la mchi ma'i dum bu lhung bar 'gyur/ /de wa dA ru'i ljon pa rnams kyi yal ga'i 'dab ma rnams ni 'phral du bcad byas nas/ /de rnams kyi ni 'o ma zags pa'i dri bzang dang ldan lho phyogs zhugs pa'i dri bzhon rnams/ /gang zhig bdag la dang por rab tu 'khyud do kwa ye yon tan ma lus de rnams
<p>350b.3</p>ni/ /gangs kyi ri la gal te song na khyod kyi lus la reg pa nges par gyur ro ce'o/ /thun gsum mun pa can ma yun ring gyur ba skad cig bzhin du bsdus pa ci ltar yin/ /nyin par yang ni gnas skabs kun du cung zad gdung ba'ang ji ltar gyur pa yin/ /kwa ye 'dren byed g.yo ba de ltar gyur pas bdag sems don gnyer skal ba dman par
<p>350b.4</p>gyur/ /khyod dang bral ba'i gdung ba rnams dang che ba'i sdug bsngal rnams kyis brtan par min par byas/ /bdag ni zhag grangs mang po'i bdag nyid bgrang zhing nang gi bsam pas mi 'chi bar ni shes/ /kwa ye dge legs ldan ma khyod kyang mya ngan mang po shin tu bya ba ma yin te/ /bde ba mtha' gcig ldan pas su yin rtag tu sdug bsngal
<p>350b.5</p>mtha' gcig pa yang su zhig yin/ /de dag 'khor lo rtsibs ni cung zad 'og tu 'gro zhing steng du'ang rim gyis bskor ba bzhin/ /khyab 'jug lag 'gro'i gnas na gnyid las langs tshe rje bo khros pa'i bka' lung rdzogs pa nyid/ /de la zla ba bzhin yod de bar mig ni zum par byas nas khyod ni gnas par mdzod/ /phyi nas bdag cag gnyis ni
<p>350b.6</p>yun ring bral bar las byung 'dod pa'i longs spyod de thob ste/ /ston ka'i zla ba rdzogs pa'i mtshan ma rnams la 'dod pa'i longs spyod de dag ldan par 'gyur/ /yang ni brjod pa sngon ni bdag dang khyod ni mal stan gnas na mgrin 'khyud gnyid song bas/ /bdag ni phral la rab tu sad par gyur nas ci yang ngu bar byas par gyur pa na/ /nang nas
<p>350b.7</p>rgod pa dang bcas lan cig min par khyod kyis bdag la dri ba brjod pa na/ /kwa ye g.yo ma 'ga' zhig dang yang dga' byed rmi lam mthong zhes bdag gis khyod la'o/ /de la bdag ni khyod la mtshan ma bzang po sbyin par byed pa yin par rig byas na/ /kwa ye 'dren byed dkar min skye bo ngan pa'i tshig las bdag mi gus 'os ma yin/ /gang phyir
<p>351a</p>
<p>351a.1</p>bral bas gdungs pa longs spyod bral la de rnams mdza' bo'i brjod pa ci zhig yin/ /dngos po rnams ni mthong tshe mchog tu dga' ba'i ri ni mang po'i phung po nyid du 'gyur/ /'di rnams kyis ni dang por bral bas gdungs par gyur pa'i grogs mo de ni dbugs dbyung mdzod/ /mig gsum pa yi khyu mchog lta
<p>351a.2</p>bur dkar ba'i kai lA sha yi ri las slar ldog bya/ /de la'ang rang gi dge ba'i mtshan ma khyer 'ongs de dang de ni bdag la bshad par bya/ /khyod ni kun da'i ge sar g.yo ldan myur 'gro rnams kyis bskul byas myur bar 'ong bar bya/ /kwa ye grogs bzang khyod kyis bdag gi gnyen 'dun dag tu cung zad gnas pa 'di byas nas/ /slar
<p>351a.3</p>yang 'phrin rnams brtan pa khyod las nges par bdag la 'ong bar 'gyur zhes bdag sems so/ /tsUta ka rnams sgra med par yang chu ni sbyin par mdzod ces khyod la zhu bar sems/ /gang phyir skye bo rnams la 'dod par gyur pa rnams kyi bya ba'i don nyid lan gyi tshig /kwa ye chu 'dzin gdung ldan bdag gi brjod pa bdag gi sems
<p>351a.4</p>la don gnyer dga' ba yi/ /tshogs 'di byams par gyur pa'am rjes su rab tu brtse ba'i blos ni 'di rnams kun byas nas/ /khyod kyang 'dod pa'i yul ni thob cing mdzes pa'i char sprin tshogs 'dzin dpal dang ldan pa dang / /glog ma dang yang nam yang mi 'bral gyur cig de bzhin kun kyang dge zhing shis gyur cig /snyan ngag mkhan
<p>351a.5</p>chen po nag mo'i khol gyis mdzad pa'i sprin gyi pho nya rdzogs so// //blo gros dang snying rje dang / brtul ba dang des pa dang / gtong ba la sogs pa'i yon tan phul du phyung ba dpag tu med pas spras pa'i dpon chen nam mkha' brtan pa'i bka' lung gis/ kha che'i paN+Di ta snyan ngag mkhan chen po su ma na shrI dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba mang
<p>351a.6</p>du thos pa'i dge slong byang chub rtse mo dang / lo tsA bar gtogs pa lung rigs smra ba nam mkha' bzang pos dpal sa skya'i gtsug lag khang chen por bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa/ /gang zhig thugs dgongs rnam par dag pa yis/ /'di la bskul zhing mthun rkyen bsgrubs pa dang / /bdag cag 'bad las bsod
<p>351a.7</p>nams gang bsgrubs pas/ /'khor ba las rgal sku gsum thob par shog /byang gi bdag po'i gsung bzang las/ /snyan ngag 'di ni bod skad du/ /kha che paN chen dang lhan cig /dge slong byang chub rtse mos bsgyur/ /'dis 'gro ba dpag tu med pa la phan thogs nas bkra shis shing bde legs su gyur cig/ // 
<p>351b</p>
<p>351b.1</p>@##/ /rgya gar skad du/ ts+tshan+da rat+nA ka ra nA ma/ oM na mo wA gI shwa rA ya/ dzi nA ya mu ni sU R+yA ya pa ra ma dz+yo ti rAt+ma ni/ an+ta rni shi bi mi tra NA man+ta rdi na kr-i te nA maH/ pa d+yaM tsa tuSh+pa dI tats+tsa br-it+ta dzA
<p>351b.2</p>@##/ /bod skad du/ sdeb sbyor rin chen 'byung gnas zhes bya ba/ oM ngag gi dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rgyal ba thub pa nyi ma ni/ /snang ba mchog gi bdag nyid can/ /nang gi mtshan mo bshes bral gyi/ /nang gi nyin byed la phyag 'tshal/ /tshigs bcad rkang bzhi de yang ni/ /br-it+ta
<p>351b.3</p>ti pra b+he da to dwi bi d+haM/ a k+Sha ra saM khyA br-it+ti/ mA trA saM khyA b+ha ba ti dzA ti/ hra swaHswa ro la g+hu l+r-i dzuH/ pa dAn+te Shu ba hu laM gu ru gwa kraH/ pUrbaHswa rA ra hi ta byany+dza nAts+tsa/ dIr+g+ha p+lu tau tsai ba/ b+ha di gu
<p>351b.4</p>dzA ti rnam gnyis dbye/ /yi ge bgrang ba br-it+ta yin/ /phyi mo bgrang ba dzA tir 'gyur/ /dbyangs thung ngu ni yang ba ngang la ste drang po'o/ /rkang pa'i mtha' rnams su mang po zhig lci ba dang ga ste 'khyog po'o/ /dbyangs dang bral ba'i gsal byed las snga ma'o/ /ring po dang p+lu ta nyid kyang ngo / /gsum gyi
<p>351b.5</p>ru Ti ka me TaM/ dzan+ta rgu ru/ san+ta gu ru/ ma she Sha gu ru/ yA di la g+hu tsa/ ran+ta rla g+hu/ tan+ta la g+hu/ na she Sha la g+hu/ ts+tshan+dAM si bi duHShaT+ka rau nya raM b+h+yai kai ka br-it+ti b+hiHpA daiH/ /gA ya t+yuSh+Ni ka nuSh+Tu p+p+r-i ha tIp+saM k+ti ta thA
<p>351b.6</p>thog ma lci ba b+ha ru 'dod/ dza dbus lci ba/ sa mtha' lci ba/ ma kun lci/ ya thog yang ba/ ra dbus yang / ta mtha' yang ba/ na kun yang / drug pa nas brtsams te re re 'phel ba'i rkang pas sdeb sbyor rnams rtogs par byed do/ /dbyangs sgrogs rab dga' rjes bsngags br-i ha tI/ /phreng ldan dang ni
<p>352a</p>
<p>352a.1</p>tr-iSh+Tupra/ dza ga tI sharkar+YaSh+Ni d+h+r-i ta yaH/ pr-i thak+ke ge kai ka a ti pa rAsh+tsa/ shud+d+ha prA bi sa ma t+ya d+heHpa rA tsa kr-i tiH/ i ti Sha DaSh+Ta ha yAH/ sa ma mar+d+ha sa maM bi Sha maM/ tse ti tri bi d+haM pra
<p>352a.2</p>de bzhin gsum bsngags so/ /skye 'gro nus ldan legs spyod brtan 'dzin rnams/ /so so re re phyi ma shin tu pa'o/ /byed ldan dag pa rab kun rnam legs shin tu lhag pa las phyi ma'ang ngo / /de ltar drug brgyad rta rnams so/ /mnyam dang phyed mnyam mi mnyam zhes bya ba/ /br-it+ta rnam pa gsum
<p>352a.3</p>tsak+Sha te br-it+taM/ ta nu ma d+h+yA di ka mu ba tsi tra kA di bak+t+rA di tat+k+ra ma shaH/ s+thA naM ya ti riSh+TaiHtad+bA nu ti b+hA diH/ an+te tsa ra NA nAM/ g+WaH/ lkaH/ pra ti pA daM/ t+Yautsait+ta nu ma d+h+yA/ ku mA ra la li tA dz+saugra / 
<p>352a.4</p>du rab pa bshad bya/ /de ni dbus phra sogs dang nyer bkra sogs/ /kha sgo la sogs rnams dang go rims bzhin/ /'dod pa rnams kyi gnas pa sdod/ /b+ha sogs uta la de ldan no/ /rkang pa rnams kyi mtha' la'o/ /lci ba wa/ yang ba ka/ /rkang pa so so la'o/ /gal te ta ya dbus phra'o/ /gzhon nu ral pa dzas ga / 
<p>352a.5</p>glau tsi tuHsa mA n+ya sau hi/ /la gau tsa tuH pra mA N+ya so+au/ tsa tra pa dA ya di b+hau gau/ mau gau tset+sA bi d+yun+mA lA/ b+hAt+ta la gA mA Na ba kaM/ rAn+na sau ya di ha la mu khI/ b+hu dza ga shi shu su tA nau maH/ dz+nye ya shud+d+ha bi rAN+ma sau dza gau/ /m+nau
<p>352a.6</p>lci yang bzhi pa de ni 'dra mtshungs so/ /lag bzhi pa de ni gzhal dpag go/ /gal te b+ha dag ga dag rkang bkra/ gal te ma dag ga dag glog phreng / b+ha las ta la ga bram ze'i bu/ gal te ra las na sa dag gshol gdong / /na dag ma ni lag 'gro khye'u'i bu/ /mas dza ga dag pa'i snang bar shes par bya/ /ma na
<p>352b</p>
<p>352b.1</p>yAd+gaHkha lu pa Na baHkhyA taH/ /s+yAn+ma yU ra sA ri NI ra dzau rgau/ /rug+ma ba tI sA ya tra b+ha mau sgau/ /dz+nye yA mat+tA ma b+ha sa ga pr-iSh+TA/ /tAdz+dzau ga gi tI ya mu pa s+thi tA s+yAtra/ /s+yA din+d+ra badzrA ya di tau dza gau gaH/ /u ben+d+ra badzra hi dza tau dza gau gaH/ /a
<p>352b.2</p>ya las lci nges 'khar rngar bshad/ /ra dza ra dang ga ni rma bya'i 'gros yin/ gang la b+ha ma sa ga de ni gser ldan/ ma b+ha sa gas bskyed pa myos mar shes par bya/ /ta las dza gnyis ga ga zhes 'di nyer 'khod 'gyur/ /gal te dbang po rdo rje ta gnyis dza lci gnyis/ /dza ta dza lci gnyis ni nye dbang rdo rje ste/ /de ma thag tu
<p>352b.3</p>nan+ta rod+b+hA bi ta lak+Sha NA d+yau/ /pA dau b+ha be tAM bi bi d+hairbi kalpaiH/ /yA sA mu b+hau shra bya ya ti pra pany+tsau/ /smr-i tAHsmr-i tI shai ru pa dzA ta yastA/ /do d+ha ka mits+tsha ti b+ha tri ti yAd+gau/ /mo bA ro bA shA li nI be da lo kaiH/ /mo
<p>352b.4</p>brjod zin la sogs mtshan nyid dag /sna tshogs rnam rtog rnams kyis rkang pa dag tu 'gyur/ /gang de gnyis ka mnyan 'os ngal bso'i spros ba can/ /de rnams nyer bskyed rnams su dran pa'i dbang pos bshad/ /b+ha gsum las ni ga dag 'jo ba por 'dod do/ /ma ba ra gnyis pa rig 'jig rten shA li ni/ /gal te
<p>352b.5</p>bAHsrau bA ya di bA tormi mA lA/ /mo bA nau bA b+h+ra ma ra bi la si tA/ /rAt+pa re na ra la gA ra thod+d+ha tA/ /swA ga tA ra na b+ha gai rgu ru NA tsa/ /na na sa ga gi ti tsa b+ha bed+b+r-it+tA/ /na na ra la gi ti tsai wa b+ha dri kA/ /sh+yan+Yu dI ri tA ra dzau ra lau gu ruH/ /dza sau tsa ta ga gash+tso
<p>352b.6</p>ma bsar ba ni chu rlabs phred/ /ma wa na dag wa ni bung ba rol ba'o/ /ra las pha rol na ra la ga shing rta dregs/ /ra na b+ha ga rnams dang lci bas legs 'ongs so/ /na na sa ga ga zhes bya ba zlum por 'gyur/ /na na ra la ga zhes bya ba bzang ldan nyid/ /ra dza ra la dang ni lci ba dkar mor brjod/ /dza sa ta dang ga ga rnams ni
<p>353a</p>
<p>353a.1</p>pas+thi ti s+yA ta/ /tsan+d+ra bar+t+ma tsa ra yan+t+ri ra na b+ha saiH/ /u shan+ti baM shas+tha mi daM dza tau dza rau/ /s+yA din+d+ra baM shA kha lu ya tra tau dza rau/ /pu tra i ha ba su be dA nau ga baurbau/ /r-i tU dza su dza sU dza lod+d+ha ta ga tiH/ /a tha to Ta ka mab+d+hi sa kA ra kr-i
<p>353a.2</p>@#/ /nyer gnas 'gyur/ /ra na b+ha sas rgyu zhing 'khor ba zla ba'i lam/ /dza ta dza ra 'di ni rig gnas nyid du 'dod/ /gang la ta gnyis dza ra nges par dbang po'i rgyud 'gyur ro/ /na dag ga ba ra ba nor rig byed 'dir sbyor ba'o/ /dus dag la ni dza su dza su chu 'thor 'gro/ /sa yig chu gter byas pa de nas 'gro byed
<p>353a.3</p>taM/ /dru ta bi laM bi ta mA ha na b+hau b+ha rau/ /b+hu dzad+ga pra yA taM tsa tu r+b+hir+Ya kA raiH/ /kIrti tai ShA tsa tU re phi kA prag+bi NI/ /pra mi tAk+Sha rA sa dza sa saiH ka thi tA/ /ma gwA re phau bA bai shwa de bI sha ra shwaiH/ /mo ba n+ya gwA dza la d+ha ramA lAb+d+h+yad+gaiH/ /na na ra ra g+ha Ti tA
<p>353a.4</p>yin/ /na dang b+ha dang b+ha ra dal myur yin par smra/ /ya yig bzhi rnams kyis ni lag 'gro ltung ba yin/ /ra yig bzhi pa de ni me tog phreng can grags/ /sa dza sa sa rnams kyi yi ge nyung ngur grags/ /ma ga wa ra ra wa mda' rtas sna tshogs lha mo'o/ /ma ba na ya ga wa rgya mtsho yan lag chu 'dzin phreng / /na na ra ra 'dus pa dal
<p>353a.5</p>tsa man+dA ki nI/ /ba da ti mu nir+Ya mu mAM na dzau dza rau/ /i ha na ba mA li nI ya di na dzau b+h+yau/ /t+r+YA shA b+hirmu na dza ra wAHpra haR+Shi NI s+yAta/ /dza bau na dzau ri ti ru tsi rA tsa tur+g+ra haiH/ /mo bo b+hat+yAH sai ba ya tirmat+ta ma yU raH/ /sa dza sAH sa gau tsa ka thi taHka la
<p>353a.6</p>gyis 'bab pa yin/ /na dza dza ra ya mu nA ru thub pa smra/ /gal te 'dir ni na dza b+ha ya phreng ba gsar ba'o/ /mu na dza ra wa rnams gsum dang phyogs kyis rab dga' can/ /dza wa na dza ra zhes bzhi dang gza' yis mdzes ma yin/ /ma ba b+ha ta ya rnams de nyid ngal bso rma bya myos/ /sa dza sa dang sa ga rnams ni snyan pa'i ngang par
<p>353b</p>
<p>353b.1</p>haM saH/ /sa dza sA dza gau tsa ya di many+dzu b+hA Shi Ni/ /mA gA bA nau mAHsha ra na ba b+hi ra saM bA d+hA/ /na na bi dza dza bi tsa swa rai ra pa rA dzi tA/ /pra ha ra Na ka li tA na na bi na na bi taiH/ /dz+nye yaM ba san+ta ti la kaM ta b+ha dzA dza gau gaH/ / 
<p>353b.2</p>bshad/ /gal te sa dza sa rnams dang ni dza ga 'jam pa'i ngag /ma ga wa dang na gnyis ma rnams mda' dang dgu yis gnod med do/ /na na ba dang dza dza wa rnams dbyangs kyis gzhan gyi mi thub pa/ /na na wa dang na na wa rnams de yis mtshon cha kha 'bus so/ /ta b+ha dza dza ga ga dpyid kyi thig ler shes par bya/ /sa
<p>353b.3</p>ba su d+hA sla bo na pi tsa rau tsa pany+tsa gra haiH/ /gu ru ni d+ha na ma nu la g+hu ri ha sha shi ka lA/ /pra gi ya ma pi tsa ra sa na ba ka bi ra ma NA/ /ba su mu ni ya ti ri ti ma Ni gu Na ni ka raH/ /na na ga ba ra ra bAH s+yu rmA li nI twaSh+Ta lo kaiH/ 
<p>353b.4</p>la wa na gzhan yang ra dag lnga dang gza' yis nor 'dzin no/ /lci ba tha ma yang ba ma nus 'dir ni ri bong can gyi cha/ /'dir ni gzhan yang ro dang dgu yi ngal bsor gyur na phreng ba'o/ /de lta bu la nor dang thub par ngal gso yon tan nor bu'i tshogs/ /na na ga wa ra ra wa rnams brgyad dang 'jig rten phreng ldan ma/ / 
<p>353b.5</p>na dza b+ha dza rairbi rA dzi ta mi daM sa mU dra kaM /b+h+rak+na na sA mu neHkha br-i Sha b+ha ga dza bi la si taM/ /na dza b+ha dza rA gu rush+tsa ya di tat+ta dA ku sum+b+haM/ /ya mU nA sA b+hA l+WA ra sa ha ra bi rA mA shi Sha ri NI/ /dza sA l+Wa na ra rA wa su gra ha ya tistu pr-i th+wI ma
<p>353b.6</p>na dza b+ha dza ra rnams rnam par spel ba 'di ni rgya mtsho can/ /b+ha ra ka na na sa thub las mkha' la khyu mchog glang chen rtsan/ /gal te na dza b+ha dza ra lci de ni de tshe le brgan rtsi/ /ya mu na su b+ha la wa rnams ro dang 'phrog byed ngal bso gtsug phud can/ /dza sa la wa na ra ra rnams nor dang gza' la sdod pa yangs
<p>354a</p>
<p>354a.1</p>tA/ /did+mu ni baM sha pat+t+ra pa ti taM b+ha ra na ba na na baiH/ /na su ma wa dza dzA bAHswA dAb+d+hi swa rair+ha ri NI ma tA/ /man+dA kran+tA ma ba na su ra rA baHsa mu drartu lo kaiH/ /na dza b+ha dza dzA la gau tsa ya di narku Ta kan+tu ta dA/ /na dza baM na
<p>354a.2</p>@#/ /ldan ma/ /b+ha ra na wa na na wa rnams phyogs dang thub par 'od ma'i 'dab ma ltung / /na su ma wa dza dza wa rnams ro chu dbyangs la ri dgas mo ru 'dod/ /ma wa na su ra ra wa rnams mtsho dus 'jig rten dal gyis gnon pa yin/ /gal te na dza b+ha dza dza la ga rnams de tshe bum ba can du 'dod/ /na dza wa na b+hU dang
<p>354a.3</p>b+ha b+hU b+ha bau mu ni ra so da d+hi ko ki la kaM/ /ma gwAn+sU rau baHku su mi ta la tA bel+li tak+Shartu lo kaiH/ /i ha na na ra tsa tuSh+ka sr-iSh+Tan+tu nA rA tsa mA tsak+Sha te/ /ya mUn+sU re phau baHSha d+h+ri tu tu ra gairme g+ha bi s+phu rdzi tA s+yAta/ /arka shwair+Ya di
<p>354a.4</p>wa thub pa ro dang chu gter khu byug can/ /ma ga ba na su dang ra gnyis pa rnams dbang dus 'jig rten me tog g.yo ba'i 'khri shing ngo / /'dir ni na gnyis ra bzhi bsgrigs pa de ni lcags kyi mda' ru 'chad par byed/ /ya mu na su ra ra wa rnams drug dus mgyogs 'gro'i sprin rnams sgrogs su 'gyur/ /gal te ma sa dza su ta
<p>354a.5</p>maHsa dzau su ta tA bAHshardU la bi krI Di taM/ /sap+tA shwa swA da b+hi n+nA ma ra ba na na ba tAHsush+tset+su ba da nA/ /br-it+ti mI dr-i shan+tu nA ma to ra dzau ra dzau ra dzau gu rurla g+hush+tsa/ /mrau bo nau bash+tsa rau bas+t+ri b+hi ri ti b+hi ra tiHsap+tA kaiHprag+d+ha ra s+yAta/ /ya tra b+ha rau na bau dza ta
<p>354a.6</p>wa rnams nyi ma rta yis stag rnams rtse na pa yi/ /gal te ma ra wa na na ba ta su rnams la bdun rta ro yis phye ba kha mdzes so/ /ra dza ra dza ra dza lci ba yang ba 'di lta bu rnams zlum po zhes byar 'dod/ /ma ra wa na na wa ra ra wa rnams bdun pa gsum gyis sdod pa phreng 'dzin zhes byar 'gyur/ /gang la b+ha ra na wa dza sa dza su
<p>354b</p>
<p>354b.1</p>sa dza sA da shoSh+Na gu bi rA mi ma dra ka mi daM/ /ha ra ra bi b+hin+na ma shwa la li taM na dzau tsa b+ha la bA dza sau tsa dza su tsa/ /mat+tA kr-I DaM ba swak+ShA shA ya di ma mi tsa ga bi tsa na la ka na na na bAH/ /s+yA di ha ta n+wI b+ha ga wa tha na na bA b+haun+Yu sha ra swa ra ta ra Ni bi rA mA/ / 
<p>354b.2</p>phyogs dang nyi mar ngal bso 'di ni zab mo'i dbyangs/ /na dza b+ha la wa dang dza sa dag dang dza su'ang 'phrog byed nyi mar tha dad pa ni rta rol pa/ /gal te ma ma ga wa na la ka na na na wa rnams nor dbang phyogs kyi myos ma rtsen pa'o/ /'dir b+ha lci ba wa dang de nas na na wa dang b+ha dag na yu mda' dbyangs sgrol byed ngal bso lus phrar 'gyur/ / 
<p>354b.3</p>krauny+tsa pa dA b+ha gwA b+ha ga wA naulka na na wa i Shu sha ra ba su mu ni bi ra tiH/ /mau gwau nau lkau surdzo bAHs+yad+pa su ma da na da ha na mu ni b+hir+b+hu dzaM ga bi dzr-im+b+hi taM/ /m+nau nur+d+wirna nu sa ga bi ti na ba ra sa ra sa ka ra Na bi ra ti ra ba bA
<p>354b.4</p>b+ha ga wa b+ha ga wa na dag la ka na na wa rnams mda' mda' nor dang thub par ngal bso khrung khrung rkang / /ma dag ga wa na dag la ka su dang dza dag wa rnams nor lha myos byed me dang thub pa rnams kyis lag 'gro rnams bsgyings so/ /ma na nu dang na nu rnam gnyis sa ga wa zhes bya rnams dgu dang ro ro byed pa ngal bso bzlog
<p>354b.5</p>haHs+yAta/ /pra tha ma ka i ha daN+Da kash+tsaN+Da br-iSh+Ti pra yA to b+ha ben+na dwa ye nA tha raiHsap+ta b+hiH/ /pra ti pa da mi ha re pha br-id+d+hAHs+yu rar+N+NAr+N+Na ba byA la dzI mU ta lI lA ka rod+dA ma shang+khA da yaH/ /pra tsi ta i
<p>354b.6</p>phyogs 'bab tu 'gyur/ /'di nyid du ni rgyun chags dang po gtum pa'i char 'bebs dag tu 'gyur te na gnyis dang ni de nas ra bdun rnams kyis so/ /'dir ni rkang pa so sor re pha 'phel bar 'gyur rnams chu rgyun rgya mtsho sprul dang char sprin rol ba'i 'byung gnas shin tu klubs dang dung sogs so/ /'dir ni na zung
<p>355a</p>
<p>355a.1</p>ha na yu gA d+yaista thA tsaN+Da br-iSh+Ta pra yA tA da yo yaiR+Ya thA daN+Da ko raiH/ /sa ma br-it+tA ni// //u pa tsi tra ka mA hu ra yug+ma yu k+sau sa la gA ya di b+ha tri ta yAd+gau/ /b+ha tri ta yAng+ya di gau dru ta
<p>355a.2</p>@#/ /dag las ya rnams kyis ni rab bsags gtum pa'i char 'bebs sogs bzhin ra yi rgyun chags bzhin du ya yis so/ /mnyam pa'i br-it+tA rnams so// //gal te zung min sa dag sa dang lag dag /zung la b+ha gsum can las ga dag nyer bkrar smra/ /gal te b+ha gsum can las ga dag gyur
<p>355a.3</p>ma d+h+yA ya di pu na re ba b+ha ban+ti na dzau dz+yau/ /ya di sa tri ta yaM gu ru yuk+taM be ga ba tI ya di b+ha tri ta yAd+gau/ /ya s+yA ta dza re pha gA a yug+maM yug+maM b+ha dra bi rAN+ma sau dza gau gaH/ /bi Sha maM sa maM ya di sa dzau sgau ke tu ba tI b+ha re pha na ga gAsh+tsa/ / 
<p>355a.4</p>pa la/ /gal te slar nyid na dza dza ya myur ba'i dbus yin/ /gal te sa gsum can las lci ba dang ldan zhing / /gal te b+ha gsum can las ga dag shugs ldan ma/ /gang la zung min ta dza re pha lci ba/ /zung la ma sa dza lci ga ni bzang po'i snang / /gal te mi mnyam sa dzas dang lci ba/ /mnyam pa b+ha ra na ga lci ba tog ldan ma/ / 
<p>355a.5</p>A khyA ni ka s+yAt+ya di tau dza gau gas+t+wa yu kra daM yuk+ta dza tau dza gau gaH/ /dza tau dza gau gya tra tsa tau dza gau gA A khyA ni kA sau bi pa rI ta pUr+b+bA/ /ya di sa tri ta yAd+b+ha ba to la gau na b+ha b+ha rAsh+tsa ta dA ha ri Na p+lu tA/ /ya di na na ra la gA na dzau dza rau ya di tsa ta dA\u0f85 
<p>355a.6</p>gal te rkang pa zung min ta dag dza lci ga /zung ni dza ta dza ga lci ba kun bsgrags so/ /'dir yang dza ta dza ga ga ta dag dang dza ga lci/ /de ni kun bsgrags zlog pa snga ma can/ /gal te sa gsum can las la dang ga yin zhing / /na b+ha b+ha ra rnams kyang de tshe ri dgas 'phyong / /gal te na na ra dang la dang ga yin zhing / /gal te na dza
<p>355b</p>
<p>355b.1</p>pa ra bak+t+ra mi Sh+ya te/ /a yu gi ha ya di nau ra yaush+tsa yug+maM na dza dza ra gAHka tha yan+ti puSh+pi tA graM/ /re pha dzau ra dzau ta thA dza rau dzra gash+tsa ya ba d+h+wa nAt+ma tus+s+t+ri yA sa mA b+hi d+hA nA/ /da sha da sha ba su la g+hu tsa ya di bi Sha ma mi ta ra da bi
<p>355b.2</p>dza ra de tshe gzhan sgor 'dod/ /gal te 'dir ni zung min na dgar ya'o zung la/ /na dza dza ra ga rnams me tog rgyas pa'i rtse mor brjod/ /ra dza ra dza de bzhin dza ra dza ra ga rnams/ /ya ba'i sgra las ma tu sa yin te bud med mtshungs par brjod/ /gal te mi mnyam bcu dang bcu dang nor ldan dag ni yang ba yin la cig shos dag kyang
<p>355b.3</p>tsa da sha da sha da sha la g+hu kaM/ /gu ru ni d+ha na mu b+ha ya ma pi bi hi ta la li ta pa da bi sr-i ti ya di b+ha ba ti b+ha ba ti shi khA/ /sa ma bi Sha ma tsa ra Na pa ri ga di ta ni dza ni la ya bi ni ma ya bi hi ta da la bi ra tsa
<p>355b.4</p>bcu dang bcu dang bcu rnams yang ba yin zhing / /gal te tha ma gnyis ka dag kyang lci bar byas pa rol pa'i rkang pa rnam par spro bar gyur ba dag ni gtsug phud can du 'gyur/ /mnyam dang mi mnyam rkang pa dag gis yongs su brjod pa'i nges pa'i gnas ni nges pa dang bral byas la 'dab mar bkod pa'i nges
<p>355b.5</p>nA/ /ni ya ta mi ya mi ha b+ha ba ti dza ga ti ku Ti la pa da ni ga da na sa dr-i sha sa ma b+hi d+hA/ /ar+d+ha sa ma br-i t+tA ni// //aSh+TAk+Sha re Shu pA de Shu/ /nA d+yAt+s+nau yo\u0f85m+bu d+herba k+t+raM/ /yuk+pA da yordza kA re Na/ /bak+t+raM pa th+ye ti kIr+t+ti
<p>355b.6</p>pa 'di dag ni/ /'dir ni rkang pa 'khyog po'i 'gro ba dang ldan 'theng po dang ni mtshungs shing 'dra bar mngon par brjod pa yin/ /phyed mnyam pa'i br-it+tA rnams so// //rkang pa yig brgyad dang po las/ /sa na min mtsho las ya kha sgo/ /rkang pa zung dag dza yig gis ni/ /kha sgo phan pa zhes par
<p>356a</p>
<p>356a.1</p>taM/ /dze nA yu dzo ru dA hr-i tA/ /bi pa rI tA di teShAsminra/ /bak+t+raM ta de ba tsa ba lA/ /na kA re NA yu dzo dz+nye yA/ /la g+hu sap+ta ma yug+mA yA/ /bi pu lA sau ma tA mu niH/ /sai ba ta s+ya sA sarba taH/ /b+he nAm+bu d+he stad+bi bu lA/ /re
<p>356a.2</p>@#/ /grags so/ /dza yis zung min brjod pa 'di ni/ /bzlog pa dang po can gyi de'o/ /kha sgo de nyid gya gyu can du/ /na yig zung min las shes bya'o/ /zung la bdun pa yang ba yin pas/ /thub pa de ni yangs mar 'dod do/ /thams cad nas de de nyid de yi/ /mtsho las b+ha yis de yi yangs ma/ /re
<p>356a.3</p>phe Na tsai baM ta to n+yaM/ /na kA re NA pi tsa ta thA/ /e baM ta kA re NA pi bA/ /dr-iSh+TA ma kA re NA pye baM/ /a n+ya da to hi bi tA naM/ /na d+yAt+s+nau sarba pA de Shu/ /dzo\u0f85m+bu r+Yug+ma pA da yoH/ /a yug+ma yor+Ya thA sho b+ha/ /mi ti pra
<p>356a.4</p>phas de las gzhan yang de bzhin/ /na yig gis kyang de bzhin yang ngo / /ta yig gis kyang de bzhin nyid do/ /ma yig gis kyang de ltar blta'o/ /de las gzhan ni bla bre yin no/ /rkang pa kun las thog ma las sa/ /na min rkang zung rgya mtsho las dza/ /zung min dag gi ji ltar mdzes pas/ /sbyor ba phal
<p>356a.5</p>yaHpra yo ga dr-ikra/ /bak+t+ra pra b+hi dAH// //pra tha mo\u0f85Sh+TAk+Sha raHpA dash+tsa tur+b+hi ra ti bar+d+hi tAHpa re\u0f85muSh+mAtra/ /kra ma sho ya s+ya ta de tan+mA nA bi n+yA sa saM sho b+hiH/ /sa la li ta pa da ba da bI kaM pa da tsa tu rur+d+h+waM bu d+hAH 
<p>356a.6</p>cher blta bar bya'o/ /kha sgo'i bye brag rnams so// //rkang pa dang po yi ge brgyad yin no/ /'di las phyi ma rim bzhin bzhi rnams mngon par 'phel ba/ /de dang de rnams sna tshogs rnam par bkod pas yang dag mdzes pa can la/ /rol sgeg dang bcas rkang pa rkang par ldan pa dag na rkang bzhi 'phel du
<p>356b</p>
<p>356b.1</p>prA huH/ /i ha pa da tsa tu rur+d+h+we/ ga ga ni d+ha na ni khi la la g+hu pA daH/ /ya de mu da mu pa na ya ti dza ga ti yu ta A dA/ /sa mu pa hi ta sa la li ta ya ti ga ti ra tha b+ha ba ti pI DaH/ /ya di ni ka Ta mi ha tsa ra Na
<p>356b.2</p>mkhas rnams smra'o/ /'di ni rkang pa bzhi ka 'phel la/ ga dang ga yi mtha' can rkang pa ma lus yang ba/ /rol sgeg dang bcas nye bar phan pa ngal bso'i 'gro bas gal te 'jig rten/ /dga' bar nye bar 'dren byed Ang dang ldan pa'i pI Dar de nas 'gyur te kun nas gtser ro/ /'dir ni yang dag shin tu ltung ba'i rkang
<p>356b.3</p>mA d+yAH/ /sa ma ti pa ta ti pA daH/ pa ri kr-i ta pa ra ba sa ti ra tha ba sa ti ma d+h+ye/ /tra ya mi ta ra da tsa li ta ni dza ni la ya mi ti ka li kA s+yAta/ /ya di tsa ra Na yu ga ma ti sa mI paM/ /pra tha ma ka thi ta i ha sa ma ti
<p>356b.4</p>pa dag ni/ /rkang pa dang po nye las pha rol/ /gnas pa gal te yongs su byas te de nas dbus su gnas par 'gyur/ /cig shos gsum rnams g.yo ba med par gnas ni nges par gyur pa me tog kha ma bye ba/ /'dir ni yang dag shin tu ltung ba'i rkang pa dag ni/ /dang por grags pa gal te nye ba'i rkang pa zung
<p>356b.5</p>ba ta ti pA daH/ /rta di ta ra tsa ra NA nA ma/ tri ta ya ma bi tsa li ta ni dza ba sa ti b+ha ba ti la ba lI lA/ /tra ya mi ta ra da bi tsa li ta me ba/ /pra tha ma ka i ha sa ma ti pa ta ti ya di pA daH/ /ba hu bi d+ha bi hi
<p>356b.6</p>dag 'das pa yin la/ /de las cig shos rkang pa rnams kyi/ /rnam pa gsum ni rnam par g.yo ba med cing nges par gnas par gyur pa yud tsam rol pa/ /'dir ni rkang pa dang po zhes bya cig shos gsum rnams so/ /rnam par g.yo ba med pa nyid ni yang dag 'das par ltung bar gyur cing / /gal te rnam pa mang por
<p>357a</p>
<p>357a.1</p>ta la li ta ya ti ra b+hi ra ti dza na nI yaM/ /ni ya ta ma mr-i ta d+hA rA/ /tsa tu rUr+d+h+wa pra b+he dAH// //pu ra e ba tset+sa dza sa lA ni/ /na sa dza gu ru kA N+ya nan+ta raM/ /ya d+ya tha b+ha na dza la gAH s+yu ta tho/ /sa dza sA dza gau
<p>357a.2</p>@#/ /byas pas rol sgeg sdod kyis mngon par dga' ba bskyed pa can 'di/ /nges par bdud rtsi'i rgyun du 'gyur ro//rkang bzhi 'phel ba'i bye brag rnams so// //gal te snga ma sa dza sa la nyid dang / /bar ma chad du na sa dza lci rnams dang / /de nas gal te b+ha na dza la ga rnams 'gyur/ /de nas sa dza sa dza lci
<p>357a.3</p>tsa b+ha ba tI ya mud+ga tA/ /tra ya mud+ga tA sa dr-i sha me ba/ /b+ha ba ti hi tr-i tI ya ma n+ya thA/ /dz+nye ya te ra na b+ha ga gra thi taM/ /ka tha yan+ti sau ra b+ha ka me ta dI dr-i shaM/ /tr-i ta yaM na yo ra tha sa yosh+tsa/ /b+ha ba ti tsa ra Ne tr-i tI ya ke/ / 
<p>357a.4</p>'gyur 'di ni steng 'gro nyid/ /gsum ni steng 'gro de lta nyid du gyur cing / /gsum pa rnams gzhan du shes par bya ste/ /ra dang na dang b+ha dang lci ba bsgrigs pa/ /de 'dra de ni dri zhim ldan par brjod par 'gyur ba yin/ /gsum pa'i ming can rkang par na dag dang ni/ / 
<p>357a.5</p>sa dag tu'ang 'gyur te rnam pa gsum po ni/ /pra sr-i ta pa da ra tsa na yA la li taM/ /la li taM hi nA ma ka bi b+hi sta di Sh+ya te/ /ud+ga ta pra b+he dAH// //pA de tset+p+ra tha me ma sau dza b+hau gu ru NI tsa/ /s+yu ra tho sa na dza ra gAHpa rany+tsa nau saH/ /a tha na yu ta na na dza yAH/ / 
<p>357a.6</p>rab tu spros pa'i tshig gi bkod pas rol sgeg ldan pa/ /de ni rol pa zhes byar snyan ngag mkhan rnams bzhed pa'o/ /steng 'gro'i bye brag rnams so// //gal te rkang pa dang por ma sa dza b+ha lci ba dag tu 'gyur/ /de nas sa dang na dang dza dang ra dang ga rnams te/ /pha rol na dag dang ni sa yin cing / / 
<p>357b</p>
<p>357b.1</p>pra tsu pi ta mi da mu di ta mu pa s+thi ta pUrbaM/ /pA de s+yur+Ya di nau sa nau na sau tsa tr-i tI ye/ /ka bi yasta da b+hi ga dan+ti bar+d+ha mA naM/ /pra tsu pi ta sa dr-i sha ka ma n+ya di ha b+ha ba ti sa ka laM pra ti naM ya tsa ra Na ga ta la lak+Sh+ma
<p>357b.2</p>de nas na sbyar na na dza ya nyer gnas snga 'di dal 'gror brjod/ /gal te rkang pa gsum po la ni na dag sa na dag dang / /na sa de ni 'dir gzhan mtha' dag dal 'gro dang 'dra zhing / /rkang pa'i gnas kyi mtshan nyid sgrub pa so sor nges pa snyan ngag mkhan po rnams kyis/ /de ni 'phel ba can du mngon par brjod
<p>357b.3</p>bi d+hA naM/ /asmin+ne ba ya dA tr-i tI ya ke ta dza re phAH/ /pra tha me tsa bi ra ti rAR+Sha b+haM ba dan+ti/ /tats+tshud+d+ha bi rAD+bi she Sha NaM/ /pra tsu paM ta ga Na sa ma ma sa raM tr-i ta yany+tsetra/ /pra tsu pi ta pra b+he dAH/ bi Sha ma br-it+tA
<p>357b.4</p>bar gyur pa dag yin no/ /gang tshe gsum pa ta dza ra rnams 'di nyid dang por ngal bso/ /gal te gzhan gsum rnams ni dal 'gro dag dang tshogs de dag /mtshungs par gyur pa dag pa snang ldan gyi/ /khyad par rab mchog ldan du de ni rjod par byed pa yin/ /dal 'gro'i bye brag rnams te/ mi mnyam pa'i br-it+tA
<p>357b.5</p>ni// //ug+tA br-it+ta bi kalpa i ti Ur+d+h+waM dzA ta yonyab+hi d+hA ta byAH/ /na byany+dza ne na mA trA la g+hu nai ka b+ha ba ti gu ru NA dwe/ /pany+tsa b+ha dza sA gu ru yu gaM la g+hu ka tsa tuSh+kaM ka NAsh+tsa turmA trAH/ /te tsAHkho pi tsa turlaHka e ka mA tro
<p>357b.6</p>rnams so// //br-it+tA'i rnam par rtog pa bshad zin nas/ /'di las phyi nas dzA ti brjod par bya/ /yang ba phyi mo gcig ste lci ba ni/ /phyi mo gnyis te gsal byed dag gis min/ /b+ha dang dza sa lci zung yang ba bzhi tshogs las/ /phyi mo bzhi pa de lnga rnams ni tsa zhes bya/ /yang ba bzhi ni kha yang yin/ /phyi mo gcig pa ka
<p>358a</p>
<p>358a.1</p>dwi mA tro daH/ /bi Sha me Shu dza ra hi tash+tse d+da le da le\u0f85Sh+Tau ga NAM b+ha bat+YAr+YA/ /pash+tsAr+d+he kaH ShaSh+Tho do Sh+Ta ma u b+ha ya tra tsAH she ShAH/ /pUrbAr+d+he ShaSh+Tho dzaHkho bA khe twA d+ya la g+hu ni b+ha ba ti ya tiH/ /ShaSh+ThaHkha pa ro\u0f85n+ta
<p>358a.2</p>@#/ /ste phyi gnyis da/ /gal te 'dab ma 'dab mar tshogs brgyad rnams/ /mi mnyam rnams la dza spangs 'phags mar gyur/ /phyi ma phyed la drug ba ka'o gnyis ka yi/ /brgyad pa da ste lhag ma tsa rnams so/ /phyed sngar drug pa dza'am kha'o kha la ni/ /dang po la ni yang ba'i ngal bsor 'gyur/ /kha pha rol la drug pa'i mthar
<p>358a.3</p>ya ti stur+Yo s+ya tha b+ha ba ti tsa ra ma da le/ /tsai s+t+ri b+hi ra yug+ma pA dau ya dA sa mAp+tau ta dA b+ha bet+pa th+ya/ /e ko\u0f85pi niSh+Thi to na ya di tai ra yug+masta dA bi pu lA/ /gu ru ma d+h+ya brti nau tsed+d+wi tI ya tur+Yau ga Nau dza kA rA khyau/ /ar+d+ha dwa ye b+ha
<p>358a.4</p>ngal bso/ /'dab ma phyi mar bzhi pa'ang de nas 'gyur/ /tsa gsum rnams kyi zung min rkang pa dag /gang tshe rdzogs pa de tshe 'phrod mar 'gyur/ /gal te zung min gcig kyang rdzogs min par/ /de rnams kyis ni de tshe yangs ma yin/ /gal te gnyis pa bzhi pa'i tshogs/ /lci gnyis dbus zhugs dza dag bshad/ /phyed pa gnyis la gyur
<p>358a.5</p>be taM b+ha bet+ta dA sarba tash+tsa pa lA/ /pUrbAr+d+ha e ba tsat+ke ba le b+ha bel+lak+Sha NaM tu tsa pa lA yAH/ /na s+yAt+bu na ra pa rAr+d+he mu kha tsa pa lA sau ta dA b+ha ba ti/ /nir+d+hiSh+TaM tsa pa lA yA lak+Sha Na ma pi hA ya ya tra pUrbAr+d+haM/ /pash+tsAr+d+ha me ka mA shrit+ya brta te ja g+ha na ce pa lA sA/ /s+yA du b+ha yo ra pi da la yoH
<p>358a.6</p>de tshe/ /kun nas g.yo bar gyur pa yin/ /gal te snga phyed 'ba' zhig nyid/ /g.yo ba yi ni mtshan nyid gyur/ /slar yang phyi phyed la gyur min/ /de tshe de sgo g.yo bar 'gyur/ /gang la bstan pa'i g.yo mtshan nyid/ /snga ma phyed la spangs nas kyang / /phyi phyed gcig pur brten nas zhugs//de ni lus rten g.yo ba'o/ /gang du 'dab ma gnyis ka yang / / 
<p>358b</p>
<p>358b.1</p>ShaSh+Tha ga No ya tra dzaH kha kA ro bA/ /pUrbAr+d+ha bats+tsa she ShaHpra ti ni ya mo b+ha ba ti b+ha ba ti sA gI tiH/ /ya s+yA ka e ba da la yo ru b+ha yo ra pi b+ha ba ti ShaSh+Tha ga NaH/ /a pa rAr+d+ha bats+tsa she Sho ni ya ma mastA yA hu ru ba gI ti/ /pUrbAr+d+he ShaSh+ThaHs+yAt+ko ya tra dza khau ru pash+tsar+d+he/ /she ShaHpra ti ni ya mo da la bi paR+ya yang+b+ta ba ti b+ha ba
<p>358b.2</p>drug tshogs dza'am kha nyid yin/ /phyed snga bzhin dang lhag ma yang / /so so nges gyur de dbyangs 'gyur/ /gang gi 'dab ma gnyi ga'i yang / /drug pa'i tshogs ni ka nyid 'gyur/ /phyed phyi bzhin dang lhag nges pa/ /de ni nye ba'i dbyangs su smra/ /gang du snga phyed drug gyur ka /phyi phyed la ni dza'am kha dag /lhag nges 'dab ma log pa las/ /gyur pa de ni mchog
<p>358b.3</p>ti sad+gI tiH/ /ya s+yA da le da le\u0f85Sh+Tau tsA khyAHShaSh+Thau ga Na stu dzo bA kho bA/ /pUrbAr+d+ha bats+tsa she ShaHpra ti ni ya mo b+ha ba ti b+ha ba ti sAr+YA gI tiH/ /AR+ya dzA ta yaH// //da tra ya ma yu dzet+mu khe yu dzod+da tsa tuSh+kaM ra la gastu br-iSh+Tha taH/ /bai tA lI yaM ta du ts+ya te
<p>358b.4</p>dbyangs yin/ /gang 'dab 'dab mar brgyad rnams tsa zhes bya/ /drug pa'i tshogs ni dza'am yang na kha/ /phyed snga bzhin dang lhag ma so sor nges/ /gyur pa de ni 'phags ma'i dbyangs su 'gyur/ /'phags ma'i dzA ti rnams so// //zung min dang por da gsum zung da bzhi/ /phyi ma la ni ra la ga rnams te/ /zung la yang drug bar ma chad du
<p>358b.5</p>la g+hu ShaT+kaM na ni ran+ta raM yu dzoH/ /bai tA li yo pa maM mu khe tse dau pa ts+tshan+da si kaM ra yau tu br-iSh+The/ /A pA ta li kA b+ha ga gan+tA mu kha mi ha bai tA lI ya sa mA naM/ /yug+ma mu khe dAt+da 'au dza dau prA ts+ya br-it+ti ra ba shiSh+Ta mA d+ya batra/ /u dI ts+ya br-it+ti rdza dau ya dA mu kha ma yu dzoHpa ri shiSh+Ta mA d+ya batra/ / 
<p>358b.6</p>min/ /de ni ro langs can du brjod par bya/ /gal te dang po ro langs can lta bu/ /phyi mar ya dag ni nye sdeb sbyor/ /'dir ni dang po ro langs can dang mtshungs/ /b+ha ga ga mtha' kun nas srab pa yin/ /da las pha rol dza da zung dang po/ /lhag ma dang po lta bu rab 'phel yin/ /gang tshe zung min dang po dza da dag /lhag ma dang po lta bu phyi 'phel yin/ / 
<p>359a</p>
<p>359a.1</p>u dI ts+ya br-it+te rA yug+ma b+hak+p+ra ts+ya br-it+ti yug b+hak+p+ra pr-it+ta kaM/ /s+yAd+b+ra br-it+ta ka yu dzA\u0f85pa rAn+ti kAM/ /a yuk+pa daish+tsa ru hA si nI/ /bai tA lI ya dzA ta yaH// //a gu ru ra tsa la d+h+r-i ti ru da d+hi tsi pa di ba di/ /gan+te mA trA sa ma kaM li da lAtra/ /b+ho ya di tsa dwi ta
<p>359a.2</p>@#/ /zung min cha ni phyi 'phel las/ /zung cha rab 'phel kun 'phel lo/ /kun 'phel zung ni gzhan gyi mtha' can 'gyur/ /zung min rkang pas mdzes rgod ma'o/ /ro langs can gyi dzA ti rnams so// //rkang pa rkang pa chu gter tsa ste lci med mi g.yo brtan/ /mthar lci 'dab las yang ba phyi mo mnyam/ /gal te tsa gnyis las
<p>359a.3</p>yA du ba tsi trA/ /tsAt+kha dza e ba bA bi sh+lo kaH/ /kho dzo bA bA na bA si kAr+d+hAtra/ /tsA khyAd+Ya di sa dwi ta yaM tsi trA/ /sa ma nan+ta ra ni ba di ta lak+Sha Na b+hAta/ /mA trA sa mA di pA dA ku la kaM /a bi di ta br-it+ta pa ri mA pa ri ga taM/ /mu ni nA\u0f85b+h+ya d+hA pi bA dA ku la
<p>359a.4</p>b+ha nyer bkra yin/ /tsa las kha'am dza nyid khyad par tshigs bcad/ /phyed las kha'am dza ni nags khrod gnas/ /tsa zhes bya las gal te sa gnyis bkra'o/ /bar ma chad du bshad pa'i mtshan nyid bstan/ /phyi mo mnyam sogs rkang pa dkrugs pa la/ /br-it+ta'i tshad rnams rtogs pa med gyur pa/ /thub pas rkang 'khrugs su ni nges bar
<p>359a.5</p>kaM/ /aSh+To baSh+Tau tsAr+d+he ya s+yA gAH/ /s+yuHsauk+tA\u0f85naM ga kr-I DA/ /sa ka la ma pa ra ma pi sa li la ni d+hi gu Ni ta ba su la g+hu ka mu ba ri g+ha Ti ta pa da pi sr-i ti/ /pra ti da la mu pa hi ta da sha da sha da sha la g+hur ba si ti bir tsi ta gu rur ti ru tsi rA/ /tsa da ka da ka tri tsaM dza gi ti khaN+Da ma dzaM b+ha ra hi ta
<p>359a.6</p>brjod/ /gang gi phyed la brgyad brgyad dag ni ga /gzhan yang mtha' dag chu gter nor gyis bsgyur/ /yang ba phyi mar bkod pa'i rkang pa spro/ /de ni lus med rtsen du brjod pa yin/ /'dab ma so sor bcu bcu bcu rnams yang ba bkod mthar lci byas shin tu gsal mdzes so/ /dza med rang gi dang po yin ba b+ha bral gang zhig tsa da ka da ka dang tsa
<p>359b</p>
<p>359b.1</p>ya nA di me/ /mA trA sa ma ka dzA tA yaH// //sarba gu ru br-it+ta mA dau dz+yoSh+Tha gu ro rla g+hu ra d+hAHpa ra sa dr-i shAH/ /pUrbe gAHprA stA re tA ba di mA sarba la g+hu yA batra/ /pid+ga la prAstA raH/ /gu rU pa ri la d+hAHprAstA re paM k+ti/ /r+d+wi gu NA ya tA pra ti ts+tshan+daH/ /gu ru la g+hu b+hir+d+wi
<p>359b.2</p>gzhes dum bu/ /phyi mo mnyam pa'i dzA ti rnams so// //br-it+tA'i dang po thams cad lci/ /lci gtso'i 'og yang phyi rnams 'dra/ /snga mar lci 'di prA stA ra/ /ji srid thams cad yang de srid/ /dmar ser can gyi prAstA ra'o/ /steng lci 'og yang prAstAr la phreng / /nyis 'gyur ring po sdeb sbyor so so ste/ /lci dang yang ba'i nyis 'gyur
<p>359b.3</p>gu Na ga Nai/ /re kai ka bar+d+ha te kra ma shaH/ /a ya masma dI yaHprAstA raH/ /e tA ba ti d+h+waM ki mi ti n+ya sri ta dA pha lAd+dal ye tra/ /bi Sha maM sai kaM da la yad+ge i ha sa me laHphal ti naSh+TaM/ /br-it+ta mi daM ka ti tha mi he t+yu pa ri li khai kA d+ya nu kra ma dwi gu NaM/ /ta tra tu
<p>359b.4</p>tshogs rnams kyis/ /rim pa bzhin du re re spel ba bya/ /'di ni kho bo'i prAstA ra'o/ /'di 'dra 'di lta zhes bya lci/ /de bkod 'bras las 'dab ma bya/ /mi mnyam gcig bcas 'dab ma lci/ /'dir mnyam yang 'bras naSh+Ta'o/ /br-it+tA 'di ni du ba yin zhes 'dir/ /steng
<p>359b.5</p>du gcig sogs rim pas nyis 'gyur bri/ /der ni yang ba'i steng la g+hUr+d+h+wa piN+De sai ke tA ba ti tha mud+d+hiSh+TaM/ /rU paM n+ya s+yot+tiSh+The ra k+Sha ra saM khyaiHsa mo pa ri k+She paiH/ /kra ma kharbai rut+thA nai r+b+r-it+ta ma la g+h+we ka la g+h+wA di/ /pid+ga lI la g+hu kri yA/ /ut+k+Shi pya rU pa mA d+ya ma kr-i te\u0f85pi saM khyAM li khet+ta to\u0f85d+hAH 
<p>359b.6</p>bsdoms gcig dang bcas/ /'di lta nyid yin zhes ba ud+diSh+Tha'o/ /gzugs bkod yi ge'i grangs kyis bslang / /mnyam pa steng du bcug pa yis/ /langs pa rim pas thung du ste/ /br-it+ta yang med gcig yang sogs/ /dmar ser can gyi yang ba'i bya ba'o/ /gzugs ni dang por ma byas kyang / /steng gzhug grangs bri de
<p>360a</p>
<p>360a.1</p>s+thaiH/ /swa swA d+ha ra sa ma mi srar+b+r-it+ta ma la g+h+we ka la g+h+wA di/ /a ya ma sma dI ya la g+hu kri yA/ /kA saM khya br-it+tA nA ma k+Sha ra bA rANi ya ma gu NaM rU paM/ /ud+diSh+TAd+ke Sh+wan+to dwi gu No la g+hu karma piN+Dash+tsa/ /saM khyai ba bar+N+Na gu Ni tA ta tasta dar+d+h+waM ta to\u0f85p+Yu b+ha ya piN+DaH/ / 
<p>360a.2</p>@#/ /nas 'og /gnas pa'i rang rang 'og mnyam bsre/ /br-it+ta yang med gcig yang sogs/ /'di ni kho bo'i yang ba'i bya ba'o/ /br-it+tA rnams kyi grangs ni gzugs/ /zung gi yi ge'i grangs su bsgyur/ /ud+diSh+Ta yi ang+ka'i mtha'/ /nyis 'gyur yang ba'i bya ba bsdu/ /grangs nyid war+N+Nas bsgyur de nas/ /de phyed de nas gnyis ka'ang sdom/ / 
<p>360a.3</p>A dau war+N+Na ma d+h+ya gu ra bo la g+ha bsta da nu mA trAH/ /a d+h+wA tiR+ya ga d+hash+tsa dwi gu Nai ko nA ni bar+N+Na br-it+tA ni/ /tu l+yA hi gu ru la g+hu nAM b+hU mista trAn+ta rA NAny+tsa/ /a nu pUrbaM prastA ro naSh+Tod+diSh+Ta la g+hu kr-i yA tsai ba saM khyA/ /ta thA d+h+wa yo go br-it+te Shu pra t+ya yaH/ /Sha Di mo la dang por yi ge dbus lci yang / /de rjes phyi mo rnams yin no/ / 
<p>360a.4</p>yi ge br-it+ta gnyis kyis bsgyur/ /gcig dman a d+h+wa 'phred dang 'og /lci yang rnams kyi sa dang ni/ /de la bar yang mtshungs pa'o/ /brastA ra dang naSh+Ta ud+diSh+Ta/ /yang ba'i bya ba grangs dang a d+h+wa ste/ /de ltar drug po de rnams rim pa bzhin/ /br-it+ta rnams la rtogs byed rnams yin no/ / 
<p>360a.5</p>g+hu b+hirbar+NA ra hi tA la g+hu ra hi ta naM da lany+tsa ma trA NAM mA trAsh+tsa/ /bar+Na ra hi tA ya thai ba tA ban+ta i ha gu ra baH/ /dwi gu Na gu ru NA tsa mA trA mA tra b+hirbi ra hi tA dwe gu Na bar+NAH/ /gu ru bi ra hi tAsh+tsa war+NA ya thai ba tA ban+ta i ha la g+ha baH/ /gu ru la g+hu piN+Do yA bAn+mA trA gu ru bi ra hi tAsh+tsa yA bat+p+raH/ /mA trA
<p>360a.6</p>yang ba rnams kyi yi ge dor/ /phyi mo'i yang ba dor 'dab ma'ang / /yi ge dor ba'i phyi mo yang / /de rnams ji snyed 'dir lci ba/ /lci ba nyis 'gyur gyi phyi mo/ /yi ge nyis 'gyur phyi mos spangs/ /lci ba bral ba'i yi ge rnams/ /de rnams ji snyed 'dir yang ba/ /lci yang sdom pa ji snyed de/ /phyi mo lci bral ji snyed de/ /ji snyed phyi
<p>360b</p>
<p>360b.1</p>la g+hu piN+Da da laM yA bat+tA ban+ta i ha war+NAH/ /la g+ha bo dwi gu Na gu ru yu tA dwi gu NA war+NA bi brdzi ta la g+hu b+hiH/ /gu ru mi shri tAsh+tsa war+NA ya thai ba tA ba t+ya i ha mA trAH/ /pu N+ya me dzA ya ta yan+me dzi na s+ya bi d+yA mi mAM pra sA da ya taH/ /tat+pa ra mar+thaiHpa ra maM
<p>360b.2</p>mo yang sdom 'dag /de snyed 'dir ni yi ge rnams/ /lci ba nyis 'gyur yang ba bsre/ /yi ge nyis 'gyur yang rnams dor/ /lci ba bsres pa'i yi ge rnams/ /de rnams ji snyed 'dir phyi mo/ /rgyal ba'i rig pa 'di la bdag dad pa'i/ /bsod nams gang zhig bdag la rab skyes pa/ /de yis 'gro kun dam pa'i don
<p>360b.3</p>dza ga to bi d+yAM pra sA da yan+tu/ /shu b+ha mastu sarba dza ga tAM/ /kri ti ri yaM ka li kA la sarba dz+nya rat+nA ka ra shAn+ti pA dA nAM/ /li khi ta mi daM shAkya b+hik+Shu lo ka tsak+Sh+wa gra rat+na d+harma pA la b+ha dre Na/ / 
<p>360b.4</p>dang ni/ /rig pa mchog la rab tu dad gyur cig /dge bar gyur cig 'gro ba thams cad la'o/ /'di ni rtsod pa'i dus kyi thams cad mkhyen pa rin chen 'byung gnas zhi ba'i zhal snga nas mdzad pa'o/ /'di ni shAkya'i dge slong 'jig rten mig mchog rin chen chos skyong bzang pos bris pa'o/ / 
<p>360b.5</p>slad kyi sa gsum na 'gran zla bral ba'i thams cad mkhyen pa chen po don gyi slad du mtshan smos pa byang chub rtse mo'i zhal snga nas bsgyur ba las/ slar yang de nyid kyi bka'i rjes su gnang ba la brten nas/ bla ma de nyid dang skyes bu dam pa rnams kyi bka' drin gyis bskyangs pa'i dge slong nam
<p>360b.6</p>mkha' bzang pos bsgyur ba las/ slar yang zha lu lo tsA ba chos skyong bzang pos dag par bcos pa'o/ /'dis kyang sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa rin po che dang sems can thams cad la phan thogs par gyur cig// 
<p>361a</p>
<p>361a.1</p>@##/ /rgya gar skad du/ ts+tshan+da rat+nA ka ra nA ma/ bod skad du/ sdeb sbyor rin chen 'byung gnas zhes bya ba/ gsung gi dbang phyug 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /nang gi mtshan mo bshes bral gyi/ /nang gi nyin byed thub pa ni/ /snang ba mchog gi bdag nyid can/ /rgyal ba nyi ma
<p>361a.2</p>la phyag 'tshal/ /rang gi snyan ngag dang gzhan gyi snyan ngag rnams la ji ltar bya ba bye brag tu rtogs par 'gyur ba'i phyir bstan bcos brtsam mo/ /de la dmar ser gyi sdeb sbyor rtsa ba'i mdo dang de'i dper brjod ni rgyal ba'i lhas mdzad do/ /de dag gis mdzad du zin kyang de yon brgyad rnams kyis shin tu
<p>361a.3</p>dben par gyur te/ de ltar ni de la prAstA ra la sogs pa rnams la mdor bsdu ba med pa dang / lci yang gi ming la sogs pa rnams la tshigs su bcad pas ma bcings pa dang / phal cher mi gsal ba nyid dang / ngo mtshar ba'i sbyor ba bstan pa yang ma mdzad pa dang / ngal bso dang / lus dang / ming gi
<p>361a.4</p>ming 'dres pa dang sla ba yang med do/ /dper na/ ra dza dag rma bya'i 'gros so/ /de nas rag dag go/ /[ऽ।ऽ।ऽ।ऽ।ऽ।ऽ।ऽ ]nor dang chu gter la ngal bso ba'i na dag sbyor ba ste/ ma ya dag go/ /[।।।।।।ऽऽंऽ।ऽऽं ]dzA ti tsa la sogs pa'i sgo yis 'byed pa ni snga ma rnams kyi bzhed pa'o zhes pa ni sbyor ba'i rim pa
<p>361a.5</p>med pa'o/ /ro langs can ni ra lag phyi ma'o zhes pa la sogs pa'ang 'don sla ba med do/ /ngal bso dang tshogs dag kyang mi mnyam par bcad pa ste/ de'i phyir tshogs kyi mthar ngal bso ba med do/ /'di la yon tan brgyad po 'di rnams kyang yod cing / slar dper brjod kyang mdo yis so/ /de'i phyir 'di de
<p>361a.6</p>bas kyang mchog tu gyur pa yin no/ /yang 'dir tshigs su bcad par gyur na/ mdor bsdus tshigs bcad gsal ba dang / /mdo yis dper brjod bgyis pa dang / /ma 'dres rim pas 'don pa dang / /mthar sdod tshogs nyid yon tan yin/ /tshigs bcad ni rkang bzhi can no/ /gang gi rkang pa bzhi dang bcas pa
<p>361a.7</p>de ni rkang bzhi can no/ /rkang pa bzhi rnams kyi rkang pa'i sgra'am/ rkang pa'i don kun sdud pa ni/ /rkang bzhi can te de ni tshigs su bcad pa zhes bya'o/ /de yang br-it+ta dang / dzA ti'i dbye bas rnam pa gnyis so/ /br-it+ta dang dzA te zhes pa'i dbye ba 'dis tshigs su bcad pa de ni rnam pa gnyis su 'gyur ro/ /yi ge bgrang ba
<p>361b</p>
<p>361b.1</p>br-it+ta yin/ /bgrang ba ni brtsi ba ste gang gi grangs yi ges yin pa de ni br-it+ta ru 'gyur ro/ /phyi mo bgrang ba dzA ti yin/ /gang gi grangs phyi mos yin pa de ni dzA ti ru 'gyur ro/ /gang yi ge re re ba'ang gsal bar 'don par byed pa de ni dbyangs zhes bya'o/ /de ni mdor bsdu na thung ngu dang ring po dang p+lu ta ste
<p>361b.2</p>rnam pa gsum yin no/ /de la thung ngu ni phyi mo gcig pa ste/ de yang / a i u r-i l-i rnam pa lnga'o/ /ring po ni phyi mo gnyis pa ste/ de ni/ A I U r-I e ai o au rnam pa brgyad do/ /p+lu ta ni phyi mo gsum pa ste/ de ni rnam pa dgu yin te/ ji ltar ring po brgyad bris pa de lta bu'i mthar p+lu ta brgyad rnams
<p>361b.3</p>dang / dgu pa l-i yig rkyang pa la gsum yig gis phye ba rnams so/ /de lta bas na dbyangs rnams nyi shu rtsa gnyis so/ /gang yi ge re re ba rnams gsal bar 'don par byed pa ma yin pa de ni gsal byed de/ ka la sogs pa nas ha'i mthar thug pa sum cu rtsa gsum dang / rjes su nga ro dang / rnam par
<p>361b.4</p>gcad bya dang / lce rtsa can dang / mchu can te bzhi rnams dang sum cu rtsa bdun no/ /de lta bas na bstan bcos 'dir yi ge rnams ni lnga bcu rtsa dgu'o/ /yi ge bgrang ba na dbyangs bgrang bar bya'i/ gsal byed rnams ni ma yin no/ /yang 'dir tshigs su bcad par gyur na/ gsal byed rnams ni sum cu
<p>361b.5</p>bdun/ /'dir ni dbyangs yig nyi shu gnyis/ /'di rnams yi ge lnga bcu dgu/ /dbyangs kyi yi ge bgrang bar bya/ /dbyangs thung ngu ni yang ba dang la ste drang po'o/ /dbyangs thung ngu ni yang ba dang la yig gi ming can du 'gyur zhing / ri mo 'god pa na yang drang por 'gyur ro/ /su kr-i ta kl-i pi/ legs byas nus
<p>361b.6</p>shad la/[ ।।।।। ]rkang pa'i mtha' rnams su phal che ba zhig lci ba dang ga ste 'khyog po'o/ /rkang pa'i mtha' rnams su dbyangs thung ngu phal che ba zhig lci ba dang ga'i ming can du 'gyur zhing / ri mo 'god pa na'ang 'khyog po'o/ /phal che ba zhig ces pa ci zhe na/ 'dra mtshungs la sogs pa rnams la mi
<p>361b.7</p>'gyur ro/ /gzhan du ni zung gi rkang pa'i mtha' rnams su ji ltar 'os pa bzhin du 'gyur zhing / dbang po rdo rje la sogs pa la ni zung ma yin pa'i rkang pa'i mtha' rnams su yang ngo / /dbyangs dang bral ba'i gsal byed las snga ma'ang ngo / /dbyangs dang bral ba'i gsal byed las snga ma gang yin pa'i
<p>362a</p>
<p>362a.1</p>thung ngu de yang lci ba dang ga yig yin te/ 'khyog por yang 'gyur ro/ /mr-i t+yuHkiM kl-ip+taH/ shi na nus nas ci/[ ऽऽऽऽऽ ]ring po nyid dang p+lu ta dag kyang ngo / /ring po dang p+lu ta ni thams cad du lci ba dang ga dang 'khyog por 'gyur ro/ /nA rInr-ItU be d+ho de wau/[ ऽऽऽऽऽऽऽऽ ]lha'i
<p>362a.2</p>cha byad bud med gar dag sgyur/p+lu ta ni nges par yang ste/ in+d+ro\u0f85g+nIkl-i\u0f85p+ta shi khaH/ kl-i\u0f85b+ta shi kha dbang po me dag yin/[ ऽऽऽऽ।।ऽ ]gsum gyi thog ma lci ba b+ha ru 'dod/ gsum gyi ni yi ge gsum rnams kyi'o/ /gsum rnams kyi thog ma lci ba gang yin pa de ni b+ha ru 'dod pa ste b+ha'i ming can
<p>362a.3</p>du 'dod do/ /[ऽ।। ]gang gi dang po yang yin lci ba kho na yang yin pa ni dang po lci ba ste/ dang po kho na lci ba'o/ /de bzhin du phyi ma rnams la yang rig par bya'o/ /dza dbus lci/ gsum gyi dbus ma lci ba gang yin pa de ni/ dza ru 'dod pa ste/ dza'i ming can zhes bya bar 'dod do/ /[।ऽ। ]sa mtha' lci/ mtha'
<p>362a.4</p>lci ba'i yi ge gsum gang yin pa de sa ru 'dod pa ste sa zhes bya bar 'dod do/ /[।।ऽ ]ma kun lci/ thams cad lci ba'i yi ge gsum gang yin pa de ni ma ru 'dod pa ste ma zhes bya bar 'dod do/ /[ ऽऽऽ ]ya thog yang / thog ma yang ba'i yi ge gsum
<p>362a.5</p>gang yin pa de ni ya ru 'dod pa ste ya zhes bya bar 'dod do/ /[।ऽऽ ]ra dbus yang / dbus ma yang ba'i yi ge gsum gang yin pa de ra ru 'dod pa ste ra zhes bya bar 'dod do/ /[ ऽ।ऽ ]ta mtha' yang / mtha' yang ba'i yi ge gsum gang yin pa de ni ta ru 'dod pa ste ta zhes bya bar 'dod do/ /[ऽऽ। ]na kun yang / thams cad
<p>362a.6</p>yang ba'i yi ge gsum gang yin pa de ni na ru 'dod pa sten zhes bya bar 'dod do/ /[।।। ]de rnams brgyad do/ /yi ge gsum pa'i tshogs de rnams ni brgyad du 'gyur te/ b+ha dang dza dang sa dang ma dang ya dang ra dang ta dang na rnams so/ /yi ge 'di rnams gang du rjes su brjod pa der de la sogs pa'i ming gi mdo rnams rjes su dran par
<p>362a.7</p>bya'o/ /b+ha thog lci ba dza dbus lci/ /sa mtha' lci ba ma kun lci/ /ya thog yang bar dbus yang / /ta mtha' yang ba na kun yang / /drug pa nas brtsams te re re 'phel ba'i rkang pas sdeb sbyor rnams rtogs par byed do/ /sdeb sbyor zhes bya ba ni br-it+ta gzhag pa nyid kyi phyir ro/ /yi ge drug pa'i rkang pa
<p>362b</p>
<p>362b.1</p>byas pa nas brtsams te/ de nas phyi mar yi ge re re 'phel ba'i rkang pas sdeb sbyor rnams rtogs par byed do/ /dbyangs sgrogs/ rab dga'/ rjes pa ljags/ bri ha tI/ phreng ldan de bzhin gsum bsngags so/ /sdeb spyor gyi rim pa'i rgyun bkod pa de las rim pa bzhin sbyor gyi ming rnams/ 
<p>362b.2</p>rnams 'brel lo/ /yi ge drug gi rkang pas dbyangs sgrogs so/ /yi ge bdun gyi rkang pas rab dga'o/ /yi ge brgyad kyis rjes bsngags so/ /yi ge dgus br-iha tI'o/ /yi ge bcus phreng ldan no/ /yi ge bcu gcig gis gsum bsngags
<p>362b.3</p>so/ /so sor re re phyi mar shin tu yang ngo / /so so'i sgra ni re re'i don to/ /gsum bsngags kyi de ma thag pa'i sdeb sbyor gang yin pa de rnams ni skye 'gro la sogs pa so so re re dang phyi ma shin tu'i ming can du'ang 'gyur ro/ /yi ge bcu gnyis kyi rkang pas skye 'gro'o/ /yi ge bcu gsum gyis shin tu skye 'gro'o/ /yi ge
<p>362b.4</p>bcu bzhis nus ldan no/ /yi ge bco lngas shin tu nus ldan no/ /yi ge bcu drug gis legs spyod do/ /yi ge bcu bdun gyis shin tu legs spyod do/ /yi ge bco brgyad kyis brtan 'dzin no/ /yi ge bcu dgus shin tu brtan 'dzin no/ /so so smos pa ci zhe na/ skye 'gro nus ldan legs spyod brtan 'dzin
<p>362b.5</p>rnams/ shin tu skye 'gro/ shin tu nus ldan/ shin tu legs spyod/ shin tu brtan 'dzin zhes pa'i ming 'di dag tu rim pa bzhin mi 'gyur ro/ /byed ldan dag pa rab kun rnam legs shin tu lhag par las phyi ma yang ngo / /'di nas phyi ma'i sdeb sbyor ni byed ldan 'ba' zhig pa dang / rab la sogs pa las phyi
<p>362b.6</p>ma'i ming can yang ngo / /yi ge nyi shu'i rkang pas byed ldan no/ /yi ge nyi shu rtsa gcig gis rab byed ldan no/ /yi ge nyi shu rtsa gnyis kyis kun byed ldan no/ /yi ge nyi shu rtsa gsum gyis rnam byed ldan no/ /yi ge nyi shu rtsa bzhis legs byed ldan no/ /yi ge nyi shu rtsa lngas shin tu byed ldan no/ /yi ge nyi shu rtsa drug gis
